40001001	Erae lu ŋirorwa atapapaa a Yesu Kristo, a ŋolo arae ekanateker a Daudi a ŋolo arae lopapait ka Aburaam.
40001002	Arae Aburaam papa a Isaka, touru Isaka Yakobo, touru Yakobo Yuda ka ŋikaitotoi keŋ.
40001003	Touru Yuda Peres ka Sera (arae toto kec Tamar). Touru Peres Esiron, touru Esiron Ram.
40001004	Touru Ram Aminadab, touru Aminadab Nason, touru Nason Salmon;
40001005	touru Salimon Boas (arae toto keŋ Raab). Touru Boas Obed (arae toto keŋ Rus). Touru Obed Yese.
40001006	Touru Yese Daudi erwosit. Touru Daudi Solomon (ŋolo sek arae toto keŋ aberu a Uria).
40001007	Touru Solomon Reoboam, touru Reoboam Abija, touru Abija Asa,
40001008	touru Asa Yosapat, touru Yosapat Yoram, touru Yoram Usia,
40001009	touru Usia Yotam; touru Yotam Akas, touru Akas Esekia,
40001010	touru Esekia Manase, touru Manase Amon, touru Amon Yosia,
40001011	touru Yosia Yekonia ka ŋikaitotoi keŋ ŋirwa ŋulu arikorere Ŋisirael nakwap ŋina a Babilon aruwor ŋipi.
40001012	Kedaun arikor ikes Babilon, abu Yekonia touru Saelatiel, touru Saelatiel Serubabel,
40001013	touru Serubabel Abiud, touru Abiud Eliakim, touru Eliakim Asor,
40001014	touru Asor Sadok, touru Sadok Acim, touru Acim Eliud,
40001015	touru Eliud Eleasar, touru Eleasar Matan, touru Matan Yakobo,
40001016	touru Yakobo Yosepu, ŋolo abu toruwor ekile a Maria a ŋina edouni Yesu, ŋolo enyaritae Kristo.
40001017	Ŋanyameta a ŋituŋa a ŋul ameun aneni ka Aburaam tari neni a Daudi, arae daadaŋ ŋatomon ka ŋaomwon, ameun aneni a Daudi tari ŋina arikorere Ŋisirael Babilon aruwor ŋipi, arae ŋatomon ka ŋaomwon, nabo ameun anarikoret Ŋisirael Babilon tari ŋina edounere Kristo, arae ŋuna daŋ ŋatomon ka ŋaomwon.
40001018	Ekoni akidouno a Yesu Kristo etakanuni ne: eikinitae Maria toto a Yesu aruwor aberu a Yosepu, nai ani eriŋa ikes nyeruko, toryamunae Maria epoti aŋuna ka apedor a ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan.
40001019	Aŋuna araakar Yosepu ekile keŋ ŋolo ajokan, abu iŋes totamu aesikin Maria ekililiŋat, anerae pa acamit akisirum iŋes ŋileec alotuŋa.
40001020	Nai ani eriŋa iŋes etamatamae ŋakiro ŋun, totakanu emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon neni keŋ anakiruja tema, “Yosepu lopapait a Daudi, nyikuryaniar akiit Maria toruwor aberu kon, anerae ŋini epoti iŋes ebunit aneni ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan;
40001021	idouni iŋes ikoku ŋini sapat, ilimokini iyoŋ ekeekiro Yesu, anerae eiuni iŋes ŋikeetuŋa anasecisya kec.”
40001022	Apotu ŋun daadaŋ totakanut, ikotere iyookinotor ŋuna koloŋ kirworo Ekapolon anakituk ke ekadwaran ebe,
40001023	“Epotiuni ka idouni apese ŋina nyiryamakina ka ekile ikoku ŋini sapat, enyarao ekeekiro Emmanuel.” (Apolou keŋ atemar, “Ikirukit iwon ka Akuj.”)
40001024	Ani ekienyuni Yosepu, kitiya ikwaŋina alimokinitor emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon iŋes, ya iŋes Maria aruwor akeeberu.
40001025	Nai nyiryamakina tari ŋina edounio Maria ikoku ŋini sapat, tolimok Yosepu ekiro a ikoku Yesu.
40002001	Kedaun akidoun Yesu alo Betelem anakwap a ŋina a Yudaya, ŋirwa ŋulu araakar Erode erwosit, potu ŋikaosok ŋice alo Kide tari Yerusalem,
40002002	iŋitasi ebasi, “Ai eyai erwosit ŋolo a Ŋiyudayan ŋolo ariŋa sek idounio? Anerae ikianyu isua etop keŋ ebuni alo Kide, ikiponit aryedik akima iŋes.”
40002003	Ani iirari erwosit Erode ŋakiro ŋun, kiyaloloŋo ka ŋituŋa a Yerusalem daadaŋ.
40002004	Tonyarau ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok daadaŋ ka ŋiketatamak ŋulu a Ŋikisila, kiŋit ikes neni etemokino kidounere Kristo.
40002005	Tolimokis ikes iŋes temasi, “Betelem, nakwap a Yudaya, anerae igirit ekadwaran ebe,
40002006	‘Iyoŋ Betelem akwap a Yuda, meere iyoŋ idit nooi alotaunio a ŋulu a Yuda. Anerae alotooma kon elomuni ekarikon ŋolo iyoki ŋituŋa kaŋ Ŋisirael.’ ”
40002007	Tonyara nai Erode ŋikaosok ŋul neni kec make, kiŋit ikes kojokan apaki ŋina kire atakanunia etop;
40002008	kiyakiya iŋes ikes Betelem tema, “Toloto akimimaun ejok ŋuna a ikoku, ani kiryamut, ipotu itolimokis, ikotere ayoŋ daŋ alosi oryedik, oma iŋes.”
40002009	Ani kedaut ikes akiirar ŋuna alimokini erwosit ikes torotokis; a nen, kiŋarenik ikes etop ŋolo sek aris ikes kiŋolikis alo Kide, tari ŋina awuoya alokidiama neni ayai ikoku.
40002010	Ani iŋolikinete ikes etop, tolelyana nooi.
40002011	Tolomasi ikes kai, kiŋolikis ikoku ka toto keŋ Maria, toryediko ikes alokiŋaren keŋ, tomaa, toŋaasi nai ŋicweei kec, tolemikis iŋes ŋainakineta nu: egolid, eminae ŋolo ke ekinyate ka eceminae ŋolo akukunyon nooi.
40002012	Aŋuna abunio Akuj kicik ikes anakiruja atemar nyeboŋosi neni eyai Erode, kitoro ikes lorot ece eboŋorete nakwap kec.
40002013	Ani kerotokis ikes, totakanu emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon neni a Yosepu anakiruja tema, “Tonyou, ya ikoku ka toto keŋ tosiya tari Ijipit. Kiboi aina tari ŋina akalimokinia ayoŋ iyoŋ, anerae ecamit Erode akimimaun ŋakiro a ikoku, ecamit akiar.”
40002014	Tonyou Yosepu ya ikoku ka toto keŋ nakwaare, tolot Ijipit.
40002015	Kiboiyoto ikes aina tari ŋina atwania Erode. Etiyakinosi ŋun daadaŋ kiyookinotor ŋuna erworit Ekapolon alokadwaran ebe, “Anyarau ayoŋ Lokoku kaŋ alo Ijipit.”
40002016	Ani eanyuni Erode atemar amodikis ŋikaosok iŋes, tonyunyurikin nooi, kiyakiya ŋisigarya keŋ Betelem ka akwap ŋin daadaŋ akiar ŋidwe ŋulusapa daadaŋ, ŋulu adolito ŋikaru kec ŋiarei ka ŋulu ariŋa ŋikaru kec nyedolo ŋiarei. Kitiya iŋes ŋun itamakina napaki ŋina kiŋitunit iŋes ejok alokaosok.
40002017	Kiyookinos nai ŋakiro ŋuna erworit ekadwaran Yeremia ebala,
40002018	“Aponi kiirarae alo Rama, etoil ŋolo egworo ka kisuta nooi. Rakel iŋes igworo aŋuna a ŋidwe keŋ; ewounit akisirworiuno, anerae aris ketwaka.”
40002019	Ani ketwana Erode, totakanu emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon anakiruja neni a Yosepu alo Ijipit
40002020	tema, “Tonyou, ya ikoku ka toto keŋ, toboŋo nakwap a Ŋisirael, anerae atwaka ŋulu ewarito akiar ikoku.”
40002021	Tonyou nai Yosepu ya ikoku ka toto keŋ, tolot nakwap a Ŋisirael.
40002022	Nai ani iirari iŋes atemar elunyokin Arikaleo lokicoloŋ a papa keŋ ke Erode aruwor erwosit ŋolo a Yudaya, tokuryaniar iŋes alomar Yudaya. Ani kedau Akuj akicik iŋes anakiruja, abu Yosepu tolot Galileya.
40002023	Kiboi alotaun a ŋolo anyaritae Nasaret, kiyookinotor ŋuna erworito ŋikadwarak ebe, “Enyarao iŋes Enasaroit.”
40003001	Alorwa a ŋul, bu Yoana Ekebatisan tolimonok analoŋisat a ŋina a Yudaya
40003002	ebala, “Kibelekinos anasecisya kus, anerae aapuu Apukan ŋina anakuj!”
40003003	Anerae iŋes erworitor ekadwaran Isaya ebala, “Iworoe etoil a ituŋanan a ice analoŋisat ebala, ‘Kitemonokisi erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon; kisidiiryata ŋirotin keŋ!’ ”
40003004	Anapit Yoana elou ŋolo etiyaunitae a ŋajul a ŋuna ke ekaal, tonapite arokoba anacir keŋ, kimuji emaase ka ao analoŋisat.
40003005	Toloto ŋituŋa ŋulu alo Yerusalem, Yudaya, ŋulu ka akwap a ŋina a Yorodan neni keŋ,
40003006	ido kibatisa Yoana ikes anaŋolol alo Yorodan kedaut alimonor ŋasecisya kec.
40003007	Ani iŋolikini Yoana Ŋiparisayon ka Ŋisadukayon ŋulu alalak eponito neni keŋ akibatisao, tolimok ikes tema, “Iyes ŋulu iroko ŋulu ikote ŋapomia, ŋae ikilimokini iyes atemar ipedorete abucar ananyunyura a ŋina ebunit a ŋina ka Akuj?
40003008	Kitiyata ŋiticisyo ŋulu itoodiunete atemar ikiwa iyes kire ŋasecisya kus.
40003009	Nyitamete alotai kus atemar, ‘Erae Aburaam papa kosi.’ Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, epedori Akuj akilocokin ŋamoru nu toruworos ŋidwe ŋulu ka Aburaam!
40003010	Edikino aep iteli ŋikito anataagor; ekitoe daadaŋ ŋolo nyeraii ŋaraito ŋuna ajokak, itelunio tocakakinae nakim.
40003011	“Kire ekebatisae ayoŋ iyes a ŋakipi a ŋuna ka akiki, nai ŋolo ebunit alokaku kaŋ, epol iŋes akilo ayoŋ, nyitemokino ayoŋ akikod tari ŋamuk keŋ. Iŋes ikibatisae iyes a Etau a ŋolo Asegan ka akim.
40003012	Eyakar iŋes nakan keŋ erite ikotere epyetarya ŋikeemomwa ejok analos, tocunak lodulae keŋ, kicunyak nai ŋatunyeny anakim a ŋina nyeduŋe.”
40003013	Bu Yesu alo Galileya tari Yorodan akibatisao aneni a Yoana.
40003014	Adikino Yoana ewouni aŋuna abaakar, “Arae ayoŋ etemokino kibatisa iyoŋ, nai ibu iyoŋ neni kaŋ!”
40003015	Nai toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kimyek kitiyakin ikona tokona. Anerae erae epite lo iŋes ikisiyookinio iwon ŋuna ecamit Akuj daadaŋ.” Kimyek nai iŋes kitiyakin.
40003016	Ani kedaun Yesu akibatis, todoku iŋes anakipi tosodi toŋaari nakuj, kiŋolik iŋes Etau ŋolo ka Akuj ebuni alokidiama ikoni akuri, todo neni keŋ.
40003017	Kiirarae etoil anakuj ebala, “Erae lo Lokoku kaŋ ŋolo minat, alelyani ayoŋ nooi aŋuna keŋ.”
40004001	Ya nai Etau ŋolo ka Akuj Yesu nalongisat, ikotere itemi Satan iŋes.
40004002	Kiriya Yesu eronit ŋapaarasya ka ŋakuwarisya ŋatomoniomwon, ani ekaku tonyam akoro.
40004003	Bu eketemon neni keŋ tema, “Ani kirae iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj, kituluwo ŋamoru nu toruworos akimuj.”
40004004	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Nyeyari ituŋanan ka akimuj bon, nai ka akirot a daadaŋ a ŋina elomunit anakituk ka Akuj.’ ”
40004005	Ya Satan Yesu Yerusalem, lotaun ŋolo ka Akuj, kitowuo iŋes alobibiru a ŋolo ka Akai ka Akuj,
40004006	tolimok iŋes tema, “Ani kirae iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj, kimasar kwap, anerae igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Icikakini Akuj ŋimalaikan keŋ akiyok iyoŋ; igiritae nabo daŋ atemar, ikigagaunete iyoŋ a ŋakan kec, ikotere nyewan amoru tari ŋakejen kon.’ ”
40004007	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Igiritae nabo ebe, ‘Nyitem Ekapolon Akuj kon.’ ”
40004008	Ya nabo Satan Yesu lomoru ŋoloti aoyan, kitoodik iŋes ŋibukui daadaŋ ŋulu ka akwap ka ekecebari daadaŋ,
40004009	ido tolimok Satan iŋes tema, “Ani kiryedik iyoŋ alokiŋaren kaŋ ikitopoloo ayoŋ, akajalakini ayoŋ iyoŋ ŋiboro ki daadaŋ.”
40004010	Tosodi toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Satan tolot! Anerae igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Iryediki iyoŋ kitopoloo Ekapolon Akuj kon, kitiyanak iŋes bon!’ ”
40004011	Torotok nai Satan aneni a Yesu, tosodi potu ŋimalaikan ŋulu ka Akuj kiŋarakis iŋes.
40004012	Ani iirari Yesu atemar kikamar Yoana mabus, tori, tolot Galileya.
40004013	Toesik iŋes Nasaret, tolot akiboi alotaun a ŋolo a Kaperenaum a ŋolo alodiyete anam Galileya, nakwap ŋina a Sebulon ka Naputali.
40004014	Atakanunete ŋun ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna erworit ekadwaran Isaya ebala,
40004015	“Akwap ŋina a Sebulon ka akwap ŋina a Naputali, ŋuna iyakasi lorot ŋolo eteni nanam ekekwaye Yorodan, Galileya, akwap a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan!
40004016	Aanyuwasi ŋituŋa ŋulu eboiyete anakiryonut akica ŋina apolon, tari ŋulu eboiyete alotorube a ŋolo ka atwanare, enuaku akica ikes.”
40004017	Ŋinapei ŋina, kisyak Yesu alimonokin ebala, “Kibelekinos anasecisya kus, anerae aapuu Apukan ŋina anakuj.”
40004018	Ani itori Yesu diye anam ŋina a Galileya, kiŋolik ŋikaitotoi ŋiarei, Simoni (ŋolo anyaritae Petero) ka lokaato keŋ Anderia, ecakakinete ŋatibae nanam, anerae arae ikes ŋikekamak ŋikolya.
40004019	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ, eketuruwori ayoŋ iyes ŋikekamak ŋituŋa.”
40004020	Kimyekis ikes ŋatibae kec atipei, kiwuapakis iŋes.
40004021	Ani erotokini a nen, kiŋolik ŋikaitotoi ŋice ŋiarei, Yakobo ka Yoana, ŋidwe a Sebedeo; arukito ikes ka papa kec anatuba erucete ŋatibae kec. Tonyara Yesu ikes.
40004022	Kimyekis ikes atipei atuba ka papa kec, kiwuapakis Yesu.
40004023	Tolot Yesu kirimo Galileya daadaŋ itatami alosinagogae kec ka tolimonokini Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj, kitaŋaleununuye ŋituŋa alodekesyo a daadaŋ.
40004024	Tokeikin ŋakiro keŋ nakwap a Siria daadaŋ. Yaut ŋituŋa neni keŋ ŋikadyakak daadaŋ ŋulu adyakasi ŋidekesyo ŋulu agelegelya: ŋulu ekamunito ŋipyan, ŋulu erakanarosi ka ŋulu aŋwalak, kitaŋaleu Yesu ikes daadaŋ.
40004025	Kiwuapakis ŋasepico a ŋituŋa ŋuna alalak Yesu, ŋuna aponito alo Galileya, alo Dekapoli, alo Yerusalem, alo Yudaya ka alokekwaye aŋolol Yorodan.
40005001	Ani iŋolikini Yesu ŋasepico a ŋituŋa eponito, todoka kidiama emukura. Ani kiboikin iŋes tocunun ŋikeekasyomak,
40005002	kisyak nai iŋes akitatam ikes ebala,
40005003	“Erereŋ ŋulu eyenete atemar ekulyakaka ŋitai kec alokiŋaren Akuj; erae ajakaanut ŋina anakuj ŋina kec.
40005004	Erereŋ ŋulu iyaloloŋete; ebuni Akuj akisirworiun ikes.
40005005	Erereŋ ŋulu iyapara; eruwor akwap ŋina kec.
40005006	Erereŋ ŋulu iitanito nooi aanyun ŋuna ka akiyookino; einakini Akuj ikes ŋuna iitanito.
40005007	Erereŋ ŋulu isyoniyeneneete ŋuluce; isyoniyo ikes.
40005008	Erereŋ ŋulu esegak ŋitai; anerae eanyunete ikes Akuj.
40005009	Erereŋ ŋulu esisilak; enyarao ikes ŋidwe ka Akuj.
40005010	Erereŋ ŋulu isicanitae aŋuna ka akiyookino; erae Apukan ŋina anakuj ŋina kec.
40005011	“Irereŋ iyes ŋina ikiyanyata ŋituŋa ka ikisicanito, nabo ikireikin ŋakiro ŋuna aronok aŋuna iraakatar iyes ŋulu kaŋ.
40005012	Tolakara ka tolelyana, anerae epol nooi eropit kus anakuj; ŋikadwarak daŋ ŋulu koloŋ, esicanitae ikwaŋinapei.
40005013	“Iraakasi iyes acumbi ŋina ka akwap. Nai ani kepyaniar acumbi, itasasamunio nabo iŋes ikwaani? Eruwor ibore koŋin; aŋun, ebukoryo kiŋa, kipudata ŋituŋa.
40005014	“Iraakasi iyes akica ŋina ka akwap. Nyepedori etaun ŋolo edukitoe kidiama emukura akiŋop.
40005015	Emam ituŋanan ŋini ani kinokak etaa tosodi tobuburik atuba, nai iwuakini neni ikeuna, ikotere kinuakak ŋituŋa daadaŋ alokai.
40005016	Ikwaŋinapei, itemokino akica kus tocai kileere alotuŋa, ikotere ikes eanyuwarete ŋiticisyo kus ŋulu ajokak, kipuro Papa kus ŋolo eyai nakuj.
40005017	“Nyitamete atemar kori abunit ayoŋ alemar Ŋikisila a Moses ka ŋakiro ŋuna etatamete ŋikadwarak. Nyabunit ayoŋ akikisar ikes, nai akisiyookin.
40005018	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, mati kesalu nakuj ka akwap, emam enyukuta kori akirot adio cici ŋina ikisaryo a Lokisila, mati kirikakin ŋakiro daadaŋ.
40005019	Ituŋanan ŋini ebili akiciket tari ŋina edit a Lokisila ka kitatam ŋuluce akitiya ŋunapei, itiditeunio iŋes akilo daadaŋ a Napukan a ŋina anakuj. Nai ŋini iwuapi ikes ka kitatam ŋuluce daŋ, itopolooryo iŋes a Napukan a ŋina anakuj.
40005020	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ani pa kilo akiyookino kus ŋina a ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka ŋina a Ŋiparisayon, nyilomarete iyes Napukan ŋina anakuj.
40005021	“Ipuput iyes atemar alimonokinitae ŋulu a koloŋ atemar, ‘Nyiar. Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eari ŋinice, isitakinio anatukot.’
40005022	Nai tokona akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ituŋanan ŋini eŋoikini lokaato keŋ, itemokino isitakinio anatukot. Nai ŋini iyanyi lokaato keŋ, itemokino yaunae loikiiko ka ŋini etemari ŋinice, ‘Ibaŋaana iyoŋ,’ itemokino tocakakinae tooma nakim ŋina nyeduŋe.
40005023	Aŋun, ani iyauni iyoŋ ainakinet kon Namuroet ŋina ka Akuj, ido totamu eriŋa nyipotoro atemar ikiŋoikinit iyoŋ lokaato kon,
40005024	kimyek ainakinet kon alokiŋaren Namuroet, ido tolot mono kisila ka iŋes, tosodi nai toboŋu inak Akuj ainakinet kon.
40005025	“Kisila atipei ka ŋolo ikisitakinit iyoŋ eriŋa iyes nyedolo loikiiko, ikotere nyikipotok iŋes iyoŋ neni ke ekatubon; tosodi ekatubon ikipotok losigarya ŋulu ikijukakinete iyoŋ mabus.
40005026	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, nyilomuni iyoŋ alomabus, mati kitac daadaŋ tari nikaput.
40005027	“Ipuput iyes atemar abookoi, ‘Nyilom.’
40005028	Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini iŋolikini aberu a ŋinice kiŋobel, aruwor iŋes ekaloman alotau keŋ.
40005029	Ani kikitesec iyoŋ akonikoŋu ŋina aloteten, itemokino todita tocaka nariet! Ejok iyoŋ atwaniyar ekiner epei akilo akonikuwan daadaŋ acakakino tooma nakim ŋina nyeduŋe.
40005030	Ani kikitesec iyoŋ akan kon ŋina aloteten, totubo tocaka nariet. Ejok iyoŋ atwaniyar ekiner epei akilo akonikuwan daadaŋ acakakino tooma nakim ŋina nyeduŋe.
40005031	“Alimunitoe daŋ atemar, ‘Ŋolokile daadaŋ elaki akeeberu, itemokino iŋes ainakin aberu abaruwa ŋina ke elakit.’
40005032	Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ŋolokile elaki akeeberu pa elomit aberu keŋ, eturuwo iŋes aberu ŋin akaloman ka ŋolokile iisi aberu ŋina elakitae, alom iŋes.
40005033	“Nabo ipuput iyes ebe alimokinitae ŋituŋa ŋulu a koloŋ atemar, ‘Nyikoŋ akidiŋ, nai kitiya ŋuna idau iyoŋ akikoŋ neni ka Akuj.’
40005034	Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, nyikoŋ jik; nyikoŋ nakuj, anerae erae neni ipukator Akuj.
40005035	Nyikoŋ tari akwap, anerae erae akwap neni icakit Akuj kori nyikoŋ Yerusalem, anerae erae etaun ŋolo ke Erwosit a ŋolo apolon nooi.
40005036	Nabo ani ikoŋi, nyilimu tari akonikou, anerae nyipedori iyoŋ akitokwaŋun kori akisiryonun tari epeitimat.
40005037	Tolimu atemar ‘Ee’ kori ‘Mam’ – ŋuna daadaŋ iyatakini iyoŋ, eponito aneni a ŋolo Aronon.
40005038	“Ipuput iyes atemar abookoi koloŋ, ‘Akoŋu ka akoŋu, nabo ekelae ka ekelae.’
40005039	Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, nyitacakis aronis ka aronis. Ani kikibap iyoŋ ituŋanan lokeli ŋolo aloteten, inak iŋes ŋoloce daŋ.
40005040	Ani kecamit ituŋanan akiya iyoŋ loikiiko aŋuna ka ademar ekoti kon, inak iŋes esati daŋ.
40005041	Ani kikitiŋak ituŋanan iyoŋ alosit akilomita apei, toloto ka iŋes ŋakilomitae ŋaarei.
40005042	Ani kikilip iyoŋ ituŋanan ibore, inak iŋes. Ani kecamit ituŋanan akideniyor idiobore aneni kon, nyimik iŋes.
40005043	“Ipupete iyes atemar abookoi koloŋ, ‘Tomina ekonikidunyet, ido toremokino ekonimoit.’
40005044	Nai tokona akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, tominas ŋikusimoe ka kilipanakinete ŋulu ikisicanito iyes;
40005045	ikotere nai iruworosi iyes ŋidwe a Papa kus a ŋolo eyai nakuj. Anerae itacaununui iŋes akoloŋ neni a ŋulu aronok ka neni a ŋulu ajokak. Iyakuununui akiru neni a ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna ajokak ka neni a ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna aronok.
40005046	Nai ani kiminasi iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu ikiminasi iyes, aliropit iryamunete iyes? Nyitiyaete mono ŋikerirak ocur ikwaŋinapei a?
40005047	Ani kisirworete iyes ŋikusikaitotoi make, nyo iloitotor iyes ŋulucetuŋa? Nyitiyaete nai ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ ŋun a?
40005048	Itemokino iyes tojokak nooi, ikwaŋinapei eraakar Papa kus ŋolo anakuj ŋolo ajokan nooi!
40006001	“Tocoito nyitiyaete ŋiticisyo ŋulu ke edin alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, icamito atemar ikianyuwasi ikes iyes, anerae ani kitiyata iyes ikoŋina, nyiryamunete edioropit aneni a Papa kus a ŋolo eyai nakuj.
40006002	“Ani iinakini iyoŋ akiŋarakinet neni a ituŋanan a ŋini a ŋican, nyejok akidelar alotuŋa ikwaŋina itiyaata ŋikaŋisoswae alosinagogae ka alorotin. Itiyaete ikes ŋun, ikotere kipuro ŋituŋa ikes. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, adaut ikes aryamun eropit kec.
40006003	Ani ilemikini iyoŋ ituŋanan ŋini a ŋican akiŋarakinet kon, nyiteyenu tari idiotuŋanan;
40006004	ikotere akonikiŋarakinet eruwor ŋina imunono, ido Papa kon ŋolo ite ŋuna nyetakanete iŋes ikiropi iyoŋ.
40006005	“Ani ilipete iyes, nyikokis ŋikaŋisoswae, anerae eminasi ikes akilip ewuasi alosinagogae ka alorotin; ikotere eanyuwaryata ŋituŋa ikes. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, adaut ikes aryamun eropit kec.
40006006	Nai ani ilipi iyoŋ, itemokino toloma nagule kon, togolok ekek, tosodi kilip neni a Papa kon a ŋolo nyetakani. Ido Papa kon ŋolo ite ŋuna itiyae iyoŋ anakimunono, iŋes ikiropi iyoŋ.
40006007	“Ŋolopite ilipya iyoŋ, nyiyat ŋakiro ŋuna alalak ŋuna emam apolou, ikwa ŋituŋa ŋulu nyeyenete Akuj, ŋulu ebasi kori epedoryo akiirar ikes aŋuna a ŋakiro kec a ŋuna alalak.
40006008	Nyikote ikes; anerae eyeni Papa kus ŋuna iitanito iyes eriŋa nyilipa.
40006009	“Itemokino kilipeneneete ikona: ‘Papa kosi ŋolo iyai nakuj; Ekonikiro tokeritetei,
40006010	Akonipukan bu. Kitiyae acamit kon alokwap, ikwaŋina itiyaere anakuj.
40006011	Inakinae isua nakoloŋit na akosikimuj ŋina a jwi jwi;
40006012	Kisyoni isua ŋasecisya kosi, ikwaŋina ikisyoniyo isua daŋ ŋulu eseceneneete aneni kosi.
40006013	Nyikiya isua nakitemyet, nai toiunae isua aneni aronon. [Anerae apukan ka apedor ka apolou erae ŋuna kon, ŋikaru ka ŋikaru. Amen.]’
40006014	“Anerae ani kisyonioto iyes ŋulu eseceneneete neni kus, Papa kus daŋ ŋolo anakuj, ikisyoni iyes.
40006015	Nai ani pa kisyonioto iyes ŋuluce, nyikisyoni Papa kus daŋ iyes.
40006016	“Ani ikanyi iyoŋ, nyitasyono ikwa itasyonotor ŋikaŋisoswae. Elosete ikes esecec ŋireetin, ikotere eanyuniata ŋituŋa atemar ikanyete ikes. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, adaut ikes aryamun eropit kec.
40006017	Nai ani ikanyi iyoŋ, kilota ereet kon kikyera tari ŋitim;
40006018	ikotere nyeanyuniata ŋituŋa atemar ikanyi iyoŋ, mati Papa kon ŋolo nyetakani; ido Papa kon ŋolo ite ŋuna anakimunono iŋes ikiropi iyoŋ.
40006019	“Nyituk aŋuna kus ebari nakwap na, neni epedorya esipiran ka eroiroi akinyasun ka neni epedoryata ŋikokolak akituwokin, tolemasi.
40006020	Nai totuko aŋuna kus ebari nakuj, neni nyepedorya esipiran ka eroiroi akinyasun ka neni nyepedoryata ŋikokolak akituwokin, tolemasi.
40006021	Anerae neni eyai ebari kon, iŋes eyai etau kon daŋ.
40006022	“Erae akoŋu etaa ŋolo ka akuwan. Ani nai kejok akoŋu kon, eyai akuwan kon daadaŋ nakica;
40006023	nai ani kerono akoŋu kon, eyai akuwan kon daadaŋ nakiryonut. Ani nai kerae akica alotooma kon akiryonut, okoe etya akiryonut ŋin ai!
40006024	“Emam ituŋanan ŋini epedori akitiya ŋiticisyo ŋulu a ŋikapolok a ŋiarei, eŋeri epei tosodi tominak ŋoloce, kori imiidikin neni ke epei tosodi tojamuwa ŋoloce. Nyipedorete iyes akitiyanakin Akuj ka ebari.
40006025	“Aŋun, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, nyiyaloloŋete aŋuna ka akiyar kus; aŋuna a ibore a ŋini nyamat kori a ŋini matat. Nyiyaloloŋete tari aŋuna a ŋilowi a ŋulu napan. Meere mono akiyar iloit akimuj ka akuwan iloit ŋilowi a?
40006026	Kiŋolikisi ŋikyeny: nyitaete, nyelemete ka nyetukete natukito, nai Papa kus ŋolo eyai nakuj iŋes itani ikes. Nyiloito nai iyes ŋikyeny a?
40006027	Ŋae alokidiŋ kus alotooma akiyaloloŋ epedori akitooya akiyar keŋ?
40006028	Nabo, nyo iyaloloŋioto iyes aŋuna a ŋilowi? Kiŋolikisi iyes epite ŋolo epolooto ŋatur ŋuna ka ariet; nyitiyaete kori nyedonyete ŋilowi.
40006029	Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, tari Solomon ŋolo asirit nooi, amamukar ŋilowi ŋulu ebusak ŋulu ikote ŋatur ŋun.
40006030	Akuj iŋes itanapi ŋinya ŋulu ka ariet – ŋinya ŋulu elibito tokona, nai ani moi kicunyae. Etya ekitanape ŋolo ikitanapya iŋes iyes ai? Okoe iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu edit anupit!
40006031	Aŋun, nyiyaloloŋete ibasi, ‘Okoe nyo ikimuji, nyo ikimasi’ kori ‘Nyo ikinapi?’
40006032	(Erae ŋituŋa ŋulu nyenupito, ikes iwarito ŋiboro ŋul.) Eyeni Papa kus ŋolo anakuj atemar iitanito iyes ŋiboro lu daadaŋ.
40006033	Nai kiwara mono Apukan ŋina anakuj ka akiyookino ŋina ka Akuj, toruworos nai ŋiboro ŋul daadaŋ ŋulu kus.
40006034	Nyiyaloloŋete aŋuna a moi taparacu, anerae moi taparacu daŋ eyakar ŋuna keŋ. Kimyekisi ŋinakoloŋit kitemokin ŋican keŋ.
40007001	“Nyitubonokis ŋuluce, ikotere nyikitubokin iyes;
40007002	anerae ikitubonokinio iyes ikwaŋinapei itubonokiniata iyes ŋuluce ka etyae ŋolo iinakinete iyes, iŋes ikiinakinio iyes.
40007003	Kaanukiro iteo iyoŋ imilot anakoŋu a lokaato kon, nai nyite akitoe ŋina eyai nakoŋu kon a ilope?
40007004	Nabo ikokini iyoŋ ilimokini lokaato kon atemar, ‘Kimyek olema imilot anakoŋu kon,’ toyai bo akitoe nakoŋu kon ai?
40007005	Iyoŋ ekaŋisoswae! Tolema mono akitoe anakoŋu kon, topedo nai akiŋolikin ejok epite ŋolo lemaret imilot anakoŋu a lokaato kon.
40007006	“Nyiinakis ŋiŋokwo ibore ŋini einakinitae Akuj ka nyimasakis ŋamoru ŋuna elal egyelit lopegei, anerae ipudaarete ikes a ŋakejen, tosodo kibelekinos akitiji iyes.
40007007	“Kiŋita, ikiinakinio; kiwara, iryamunete; kikoŋikoŋo, ikiŋaaryo;
40007008	anerae ŋinituŋanan iŋita, einakinio; ŋini iwarit, eryamuni ka ŋini ikoŋikoŋi, eŋaaryo.
40007009	Ŋae alokidiŋ kus ŋini ani kiŋit ikoku keŋ iŋes amugati, tosodi inak amoru?
40007010	Kori ani iŋita ikoku ekolya inak emun?
40007011	Ani kipedorete nai iyes ŋulu iroko ainakin ŋidwe kus ŋiboro ŋulu ajokak, nyepedori nai Papa kus ŋolo anakuj ŋolo ejok ainakin ŋiboro ŋulu ajokak neni a ŋulu iŋitasi a?
40007012	Kitiyata neni a ŋuluce ŋuna icamito iyes ikes kitiyata neni kus; ŋun ikes erae apolou a Ŋikisila a Moses ka ŋakitatameta ŋuna a ŋikadwarak.
40007013	“Tolomasi alokek a ŋolo adidiŋan, anerae elolom ekek ka epatana erot ŋolo elosi natwanare, elalak ŋulu itorete nen.
40007014	Nai edidiŋ ekek ŋolo elosi nakiyar ka etyono erot ka ekudyoko ŋituŋa eryamunete.
40007015	“Tocoito ŋikadwarak ŋulu alyokonok; epote ikes neni kus epataka ikwa ŋamesekin, nai alotai kec ikote ŋipeei.
40007016	Iyenunete iyes ikes anaraito kec. Egyeryo mono epiini alotiira, kori ŋaboboryo alokodwokodwo a?
40007017	Aŋun, ekitoe ŋolo ajokan eraii ŋaraito ŋuna ajokak, nai ekitoe ŋolo aronon eraii ŋaraito ŋuna aronok.
40007018	Nyepedori ekitoe ŋolo ajokan akira ŋaraito ŋuna aronok ka nyepedori ekitoe ŋolo aronon akira ŋaraito ŋuna ajokak.
40007019	Ŋolokitoe nyeraii ŋaraito ŋuna ajokak eyeparyo tocakakinae nakim.
40007020	Aŋun, iyenunete iyes ŋikadwarak ŋulu alyokonok aloticisyo kec.
40007021	“Meere ŋinituŋanan ebala ayoŋ ‘Ekapolon, Ekapolon,’ elomari Napukan ŋina anakuj, nai ŋini itiyae ŋuna ecamit Papa kaŋ ŋolo anakuj iŋes kitiya.
40007022	Akoloŋit ŋin, etemarete ŋikalalak neni kaŋ, ‘Ekapolon, Ekapolon! Pa aponi isua todwarae alokiro kon ka eritanasi ŋipyan alokiro kon; nabo etiyata ŋakujuwuanisya alokiro kon a?’
40007023	Alimokini nai ayoŋ ikes otema, ‘Pa akayeni ayoŋ iyes. Toloto aneni kaŋ iyes ŋulu itiyaete aronis!’
40007024	“Aŋun, ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini iirari ŋakaakiro kitiya, ikwaanikin ka ituŋanan ŋini aoson ŋini adukokini akai keŋ nataaba.
40007025	Kilim akiru, bu akalele ka tokut ekuwuam kai ŋin, nai abu nyeukor, anerae adukokinitae nataaba.
40007026	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini iirari ŋakaakiro nu nyitiya, ikwaanikin ka ituŋanan ŋini abaŋaanan ŋini adukokini akai keŋ nasinyon.
40007027	Kilim akiru, bu akalele ka tokut ekuwuam kai ŋin, toukor eukore ŋolo aronon.”
40007028	Ani edauni Yesu erwor ŋakiro ŋun, toumokis ŋasepico a ŋituŋa aŋuna ka akitatam keŋ,
40007029	anerae etatami iŋes ka apedor, meere ikwa ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila.
40008001	Ani edokuni Yesu alomukura, kiwuapakis ŋasepico ŋuna alalak iŋes.
40008002	Bu ekile ŋolo ka atapon, toryedik alokiŋaren keŋ tema, “Ekapolon, ani kicamit iyoŋ, ipedori akitaŋaleun.”
40008003	Torwaa Yesu akan keŋ, totap iŋes tema, “Acamit; toŋaleu!” Atipei toŋaleu ekile ŋol.
40008004	Kicik Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyilimok idiotuŋanan, nai tolot kitoodiyar neni ka esacaradoti, ikisyem iŋes iyoŋ, ido tolemu ainakinet ikwaŋina icikakinitor Moses, ikotere toanyunia ŋinituŋanan atemar isegu iyoŋ.”
40008005	Ani elomari Yesu Kaperenaum, bu ekapolokiniton ŋasigarya amiat kisiryam iŋes, todyek tema,
40008006	“Ekapolon, eperi eketiyan kaŋ alore ka eryeba nooi.”
40008007	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Abuni ayoŋ akitaŋaleun iŋes.”
40008008	Nai toboŋok ekapolokiniton ŋasigarya tema, “Ekapolon, eketimit ayoŋ abunore iyoŋ kai kaŋ, nai tolimu iyoŋ akirot, eŋaleuni eketiyan kaŋ.
40008009	Ayoŋ daŋ ekepukatae, nabo apolokinit ayoŋ daŋ ŋasigarya; ani katema ayoŋ epei, ‘Ape!’ elosi. Ani katema ece, ‘Bua!’ ebuni. Tari epito kaŋ katema ayoŋ, ‘Kitiya nu!’ itiyae.”
40008010	Ŋolopite eirarya Yesu ŋakiro keŋ, toumok. Tolimok ŋituŋa ŋulu ewuapito iŋes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, nyeryamuna ayoŋ anupit ŋina epol ikwa naga tari alo Isirael.
40008011	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, epote ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak alo Kide ka ŋice alo To, kiboikinos kimuja ka Aburaam, Isaka ka Yakobo kaapei a Napukan a ŋina anakuj.
40008012	Nai ŋituŋa ŋulu emaikina toya Napukan, ecakakinio ikes nakiryonut, kigworo toryeba ŋikyal a nen.”
40008013	Tolimok Yesu ekapolokiniton ŋasigarya tema, “Ape lore, itiyakin ŋuna inupit iyoŋ neni kon.” Toŋaleu eketiyan ŋolo ke ekapolon a ŋol ŋinapeipaki.
40008014	Ani elomari Yesu kai a Petero, toanyua nakamuran a Petero eperi ikamunit elekes nooi.
40008015	Totap Yesu akan keŋ, toesik elekes iŋes; tosodi aberu tonyou, kisyak akisimuj iŋes.
40008016	Ani eboŋ, yaut ŋituŋa neni a Yesu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋulu ekamunito ŋipyan, ido kirita Yesu ŋipyan ŋul ka akirot a ŋina alimuni iŋes, nabo kitaŋaleu ŋulu adyakasi daadaŋ.
40008017	Etiyae iŋes ŋun, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna koloŋ erworo ekadwaran Isaya ebala, “Abu iŋes ya apalagu yok ka kiwok ŋidekesyo yok.”
40008018	Ani iŋolikini Yesu ŋasepico a ŋituŋa ŋuna alalak irimokinito iŋes kidiŋ, tolimok ŋikeekasyomak alosit ekekwaye anam.
40008019	Bu eketataman a Ŋikisila neni a Yesu tema, “Eketataman, ekewuapi ayoŋ iyoŋ neni ilosi daadaŋ.”
40008020	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Eyakatar ŋikweei ŋaduyon ka eyakatar ŋikyeny ŋakais; nai emam Lokoku a Ituŋanan neni kieŋunet.”
40008021	Tema ekile ece ŋolo arae ekasyoman keŋ ebe, “Ekapolon, kimyekinae mono olot akinuk papa kaŋ.”
40008022	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ, kimyek ŋikatwak tonuka ŋikatwak kec.”
40008023	Ani edokari Yesu nataker, kiwuapakis ŋikasyomak keŋ iŋes.
40008024	Ŋinapeipaki, tokut ekuwuam ŋolo apolon ananam, todikino ŋakipi ŋuna emorokokoete erapuwarete ataker. Nai ajotoe Yesu.
40008025	Kiyotosi ŋikasyomak neni keŋ, kitekienyut iŋes temasi, “Ekapolon! Toiunae, edikino ikitwaki.”
40008026	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyo ikibulitor iyes ikona? Abe edit anupit kus!” Tonyou nai Yesu, kikilyak ekuwuam ka ŋakipi, kililiŋ akwap cek.
40008027	Toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ temasi, “Anituŋanan ŋini ikoni ne, ŋini epupete tari ekuwuam ka ŋakipi en?”
40008028	Ani edokari Yesu ekekwaye anam, nakwap ŋina a Ŋigadara, kiryamunos iŋes ka ŋikilyok ŋiarei ŋulu apote analyalin ŋulu ekamunito ŋipyan. Etededeŋito ŋipyan ikes nooi. Aŋun, amam ituŋanan etorenene lorot ŋol.
40008029	Kiworout ŋikilyok ŋul temasi, “Anukiro eya iyoŋ ka isua, Lokoku ka Akuj? Ibunit iyoŋ amunyar isua eriŋa apaki nyedolo a?”
40008030	Aapi a nen esipan ŋolo a ŋipegei ŋolo adaka.
40008031	Kimaimaa ŋipyan Yesu temasi, “Ani kicamit iyoŋ akiritar isua, kiritarae losipan ye ŋolo a ŋipegei.”
40008032	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Apesi!” Tolomut ŋipyan alokilyok a ŋul, tolomasi lopegei. Tosuro esipan a ŋipegei daadaŋ anakope toloma nanam, kitamat, totwaka.
40008033	Toema ŋikeyokok ŋulu a ŋipegei nariet, toloto lotaun tolimosi ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna apotu totakanikis lopegei ka lokilyok ŋulu ekamunito ŋipyan.
40008034	Tolot nai etaun daadaŋ akisiryam Yesu. Ani eanyuwarete ikes iŋes, todyeka iŋes arotokin anakwap kec.
40009001	Todokak Yesu ataker, tolot nabo ekekwaye toboŋo lotaun keŋ Kaperenaum.
40009002	Kilepuleput ŋituŋa ŋice ekile ŋolo aŋwalit iperikinitoe naperyet keŋ. Ani eanyuni Yesu atemar anupito ikes nooi, tolimok ekaŋwalan tema, “Lokoku, toen etau! Esyoni ŋasecisya kon.”
40009003	Kirworikinos ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋice alotai kec temasi, “Iyanyi ekile lo Akuj.”
40009004	Nai ikwapei ayenia Yesu ŋuna atamete ikes, tolimok ikes tema, “Kaanukiro itamyata iyes ŋuna aronok alotai kus?
40009005	Nyo epatana, alimokin ekaŋwalan atemar, ‘Esyoni ŋasecisya kon,’ kori atemar, ‘Tonyou torotok’?
40009006	Nai acamit ayoŋ iyes toyenut atemar eyakar Lokoku a Ituŋanan apedor ŋinakisyoniyet ŋasecisya anakwap.” Tolimok iŋes ekaŋwalan tema, “Tonyou, tolema aperyet kon, tolot lore!”
40009007	Tonyou nai ekile ŋol, tolot lore.
40009008	Ani iŋolikinete ŋasepico a ŋituŋa ŋuna apotu totakanut, tobul ikes, kipuro Akuj aŋuna keinakinia ŋituŋa apedor ŋina etya ŋin.
40009009	Torotok Yesu a nen; ani eriŋa elosi alorot, toanyuwa ekile ŋolo anyaritae Matayo iboi anapis a ŋina atacere ocur. Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ.” Tonyou Matayo, kiwuapak Yesu.
40009010	Ani eriŋa Yesu imuji alokai, potu ŋikerirak ocur ka ŋikasecak ŋulu alalak; kiboikinos kimuja kaapei ka Yesu ta ŋikeekasyomak.
40009011	Ŋolopite eŋolikiniata Ŋiparisayon ŋun, kiŋita ŋikasyomak a Yesu temasi, “Kaanukiro imujata ekusiketataman kaapei ka ŋikerirak ocur ta ŋikasecak?”
40009012	Ani iirari Yesu ŋakiro kec, toboŋok tema, “Nyiitanito ŋituŋa ŋulu eŋaleete emuron, nai ŋulu edyakasi.
40009013	Toloto toriputu apolou a Ŋakigireta a ŋuna ebasi, ebala Akuj, ‘Acamit ayoŋ akisyon, meere amuronot.’ Anerae nyabunit ayoŋ anyaraun ŋulu iyookino, nai ŋikasecak.”
40009014	Potu ŋikasyomak a Yoana ke Ekebatisan neni a Yesu, kiŋita iŋes temasi, “Kaanukiro ikikanyanakinia isua ka Ŋiparisayon, nai nyikanyeneneete ŋikonikasyomak?”
40009015	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Epedorete mono ŋituŋa ŋulu enyaritae lokiitanu akikany eriŋa ekeitan erukito ka ikes a? Nyepedor ŋun! Nai epote ŋirwa ŋulu elemarere ekeitan aneni kec, togeut ikes nai akikany.
40009016	“Emam ituŋanan ŋini epedori adapakin arac ŋina kitete lolou ŋoloŋorot, anerae kedapaki, ecilar arac ŋina kitete, kiyatakin acilat lolou ŋoloŋorot.
40009017	Kori emam ŋituŋa ŋulu etikakinete ewinyiwiny lotwol ŋulu eŋorotonito, ani ketikakis, ebwaŋabwaŋaari ewinyiwiny ŋitwol ŋul, tosodi tobukor ewinyiwiny daŋ. Nai etikanakinio ewinyiwiny lotwol ŋulu kitet, ikotere nyinyasunosi ikes daadaŋ.”
40009018	Ani eriŋa Yesu irworo neni kec, bu ekapolon ŋolo ke esinagoga epei, toryedik alokiŋaren keŋ tema, “Atwana nakoku kaŋ; bua kare ca kidokok ŋakonikan neni keŋ ikotere toyaru iŋes.”
40009019	Tonyout Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak totupakis iŋes.
40009020	Ayai nen aberu ŋina aleleete ŋaokot ŋikaru ŋitomon ka ŋiarei. Toŋicun iŋes alokaku, totap abilet ŋina ke elou a Yesu.
40009021	Anerae abala iŋes alotau keŋ, “Katap ca ŋolo erae ekeelou daŋ bon, aŋaleuni.”
40009022	Toboboŋ Yesu kiŋolik iŋes tema, “Nakoku, toen etau! Ikitaŋaleu iyoŋ anupit kon.” Toŋaleu aberu ŋin apaki ŋinapei ŋin.
40009023	Ani edoluni Yesu kai ŋina ke ekapolon a ŋolo ke esinagoga, toryamu iguryakina ŋikaeok ŋulu akusete ŋapilui ka ŋituŋa ŋulu aponito akinuk ikoku.
40009024	Tolimok Yesu ŋituŋa tema, “Toloto, anerae nyetwanit apese, nai ejotoe.” Tokyenatar ŋituŋa iŋes.
40009025	Nai ani kitolomar ŋituŋa kiŋa, toloma Yesu nagule ŋina ka apese, kikam akeekan, tonyou apese.
40009026	Tokeikin ŋakiro ŋun akwap ŋin daadaŋ.
40009027	Ani erotokini Yesu a nen, totupakis iŋes ŋikilyok ŋiarei ŋulu amudukaka iworoete ebasi, “Lokoku a Daudi! Kisyoni isua.”
40009028	Ani elomari iŋes kai, potu ŋimudukanotin ŋul neni keŋ; kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Inupito iyes atemar apedori ayoŋ akitaŋaleun iyes a?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ee Ekapolon!”
40009029	Totap nai Yesu ŋakecekonyen tema, “Kitiyakin neni kus ikwaŋina inupitotor.”
40009030	Toŋaleut ŋakecekonyen. Kicik nai Yesu ikes nooi tema, “Nyilimokis idiotuŋanan nu.”
40009031	Nai apotu ikes toloto kielasi ŋakiro ŋuna etiyae Yesu nakwap ŋin daadaŋ.
40009032	Ani erotokinete ŋikilyok ŋul, yaut ŋituŋa neni a Yesu ekile ŋolo pa erworo, anerae ekamunito ŋipyan.
40009033	Ŋinapei eritarere ŋipyan, togeu ekile erwor; toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ temasi, “Nyeanyuna ŋinapei koloŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ikote nu alo Isirael!”
40009034	Nai temasi Ŋiparisayon, “Iritanari iŋes ŋipyan, anerae erae ŋolo epolokinit ŋipyan einakinit iŋes apedor ŋina kiritanaret ikes.”
40009035	Tolot Yesu lotaunio ka lorerya itatami ŋituŋa alosinagogae; tolimonokini ikes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Apukan a ŋina anakuj. Kitaŋaleununu ŋituŋa alodekesyo a daadaŋ ka tolema apalagu daadaŋ.
40009036	Ani iŋolikini Yesu ŋasepico, kisyonioto iŋes, anerae eyaloloŋete ikes ka topapanunito ikwa ŋamesekin ŋuna emam ekeyokon.
40009037	Tolimok nai iŋes ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Elal akilem, nai ekudyoko ŋikalemak.
40009038	Aŋun, kilipa elope ŋolo ka akilem kiyakiya ŋikalemak ŋulu alalak nakilem keŋ.”
40010001	Tonyarau Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, inak ikes apedor daadaŋ ŋina kiritanaret ŋipyan ka ŋina kitaŋaleununuyet ŋituŋa alodekesyo a daadaŋ ta alemar apalagu daadaŋ.
40010002	Ŋirorwa a Ŋikiyakia a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei ikes lu, ŋolo esyaunan Simoni, ŋolo anyaritae Petero ka Anderia lokaato keŋ; Yakobo lokoku a Sebedeo, ka Yoana lokaato keŋ;
40010003	Pilipo ka Batolomayo; Tomas ka Matayo ŋolo arae ekeriran ocur; Yakobo lokoku ka Alipayo ka Tadeo;
40010004	Simoni ŋolo arae Eseletoit ka Yuda Isikariot ŋolo alukini Yesu.
40010005	Kiyakiya Yesu ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei ŋul, kicik ikes tema, “Nyilot nakwapin a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, kori lotaun edio ŋolo a Ŋisamaritayon;
40010006	nai akilo, toloto lotuŋa ŋulu a Isirael ŋulu ikote ŋamesekin ŋuna eolito.
40010007	Toloto kitatama ikes ibasi, ‘Aapuu Apukan ŋina anakuj!’
40010008	Kitaŋaleutu ŋikadyakak, kiteyarutu ŋikatwak, kitesegutu ŋulu ka atapon ka kiritanasi ŋipyan; ipotu iyes toryamut koŋin, aŋun, kipotosi iyes daŋ koŋin.
40010009	Ani irotokinete nyilidakis egolid, ŋisiliŋa kori ŋaboolae locileta a ŋanaŋgae kus.
40010010	Nyitiŋa ecwee analosit kus kori elou ece, ŋamuk kori ebela. Anerae itemokino eketiyan toryamu akimuj keŋ.
40010011	“Ani idolete iyes lotaun kori lore a ituŋanan, tolomasi kiwarut ituŋanan ŋini ikijauni iyes kiboiyoto ka iŋes, tari ŋina irotokinioto iyes a nen.
40010012	Ani ilomarete iyes tooma akai, kimalata ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akai a ŋin.
40010013	Ani kikijaut iyes ŋituŋa alokai a ŋin, itemokino togatakis ikes ekisil kus. Nai ani pa kikijaut ikes iyes, nyigatakis ikes ekisil kus.
40010014	Ani kemam ituŋanan ŋini ikijauni kori ŋini iirari ŋakiro kus, totwakisi apuwa ŋina a ŋakejen kus nen, apaki ŋina irotokinioto iyes alokai a ŋin kori alotaun a ŋol.
40010015	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino erimakinio ŋituŋa ŋulu a Sodoma ka ŋulu a Gomora akilo ŋulu ke etaun a ŋol.
40010016	“Topupokisi, ekeyakiyarit ayoŋ iyes ikwa ŋamesekin alokidiŋ ŋipeei. Topiiryaka ikwa ŋimuno ka kiyapara alopitesyo kus ikwa ŋakuryo.
40010017	Tocoikinito ŋituŋa, anerae eya ŋulu ikikamunete iyes itorikosi loikiikoe ka ikibuŋata alosinagogae kec.
40010018	Ikirikoryo iyes kiŋaren ŋikepukak ka ŋirwosi aŋuna kaŋ, ikotere toruworos iyes ŋisuudae kaŋ alokiŋaren kec ka alokiŋaren ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
40010019	Ani ikipotorete ikes iyes akisitakin, nyiyaloloŋo aŋuna ilosete iyes akirwor kori epite ŋolo limunet, anerae ikiinakinio iyes ŋakiro ŋuna itemokino tolimut apaki ŋin.
40010020	Anerae meere iyes irworosi, nai Etau ŋolo a Papa kus iŋes irworo aneni kus.
40010021	“Ipotori lokaato lokaato keŋ toarae; papa daŋ ipotori ikoku keŋ; elukinete ŋidwe ŋikauruunak kec ka ipotorete ikes toarae.
40010022	Ikitoroniyarete ŋituŋa iyes aŋuna ke ekiro kaŋ, nai ŋini etitinyikini akitodol nasalunet, eiunio.
40010023	Ani ikitidiŋete ikes iyes alotaun ke epei, toema lotaun ece. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, nyirikakinete iyes ekusitic alotaunio a ŋulu a Isirael, eriŋa nyebuno Lokoku a Ituŋanan.
40010024	“Nyepol ekasyoman alokiŋaren ekeeketataman, eketiyan daŋ nyepol alokiŋaren ekeekapolon.
40010025	Itemokino ekasyoman kikoni eketataman keŋ ka eketiyan kikoni ekapolon keŋ. Ani kenyaritae ekapolon ŋolo ka akai atemar Belesebul, enyarao ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akai a ŋin a ŋirorwa a ŋulu aronok nooi.
40010026	“Aŋun, nyikera ikes, anerae emam ibore ŋini erapitae ŋini nyisileereunio ka emam ŋini imunonitae ŋini nyeanyunio.
40010027	Ŋakiro ŋuna akalimokini ayoŋ iyes anakiryonut, tolimosi anakica, nabo ŋuna iirasi iyes iŋaiŋaunitae, kikeutu alokiŋa.
40010028	Nyikera ŋulu earete akuwan, nai nyepedorito akiar etau; nai tokera ŋolo epedori akiar akuwan ka etau, tocakak tooma nakim ŋina nyeduŋe.
40010029	Nyegyelyo atadiidi ŋiarei a ikaput a? Emam tari ipei alokidiŋ kec ŋini ecakakin kwap pa eyeni Papa kus.
40010030	Nai tari ŋitim daadaŋ anakyes kus imaritae.
40010031	Aŋun, Nyikuryaketa; epol etyae kus akilo ŋolo a ŋikyeny a ŋulu alalak!
40010032	“Aŋun, ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini elimori atemar akayeni ayoŋ alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, alimori ayoŋ daŋ atemar ayeni iŋes alokiŋaren Papa kaŋ ŋolo eyai nakuj.
40010033	Nai ŋini epegi atemar akayeni ayoŋ alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, apegi ayoŋ daŋ atemar ayeni iŋes alokiŋaren Papa kaŋ ŋolo eyai nakuj.
40010034	“Nyitamete atemar abunit ayoŋ ayaun ekisil nakwap. Meere ekisil ayaunit ayoŋ, nai ejiye.
40010035	Anerae abunit ayoŋ akitidiŋakin esapat ka papa keŋ, apese ka toto keŋ, ateran ka tata keŋ;
40010036	eruworosi ŋimoi a ituŋanan ŋituŋa ŋulupei alokal keŋ.
40010037	“Ituŋanan ŋini emina papa keŋ kori toto keŋ akilo ayoŋ, nyitemokino aruwor ekewuapan kaŋ; ŋini emina lokoku keŋ kori nakoku keŋ akilo ayoŋ, nyitemokino aruwor ekewuapan kaŋ;
40010038	ka ŋini nyeryoŋi emusalaba keŋ ekewuapak ayoŋ, nyitemokino aruwor ekewuapan kaŋ.
40010039	Ituŋanan ŋini ecamit aiun akiyar keŋ, itotwaniyari; nai ŋini itotwaniyari akiyar keŋ aŋuna kaŋ, eiuni.
40010040	“Ituŋanan ŋini ikijauni iyes, ekejau ayoŋ, nabo ŋini ekejauni ayoŋ, ejau iŋes ŋini ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
40010041	Ituŋanan ŋini ijauni ekadwaran aŋuna eraakar ekadwaran, eryamuni iŋes daŋ eropit ŋolo ke ekadwaran ka ŋini ijauni ituŋanan ŋini iyookino aŋuna eraakar ŋini iyookino, eryamuni iŋes daŋ eropit ŋolo a ituŋanan a ŋini iyookino.
40010042	Nabo ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini itamasi ipei alokidiŋ ŋulu cicik lu, tari epeikopo ŋolo a ŋakipi a ŋuna alilimok, aŋuna eraakar ekewuapan kaŋ, eryamuni kire eropit keŋ.”
40011001	Ani kedau Yesu akitatam ŋikeekasyomak ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, tonyou a nen, tolot akitatam ka alimonokin alotaunio a ŋulu aya diyete nen.
40011002	Ani iirari Yoana Ekebatisan ŋolo ayai mabus ŋakiro ŋuna etiyae Kristo, kiyakiya ŋikeekasyomak neni a Yesu.
40011003	Kiŋita ikes Yesu temasi, “Erae iyoŋ itemokino ibu, kori itemokino isua edareutu ece?”
40011004	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Toloto tolimokisi Yoana ŋuna ipupete ka ŋuna iteete.
40011005	Ekyenyununuyete ŋimudukanotin, erotonokinete ŋikaŋwalak, esegununuyete ŋulu irumit atapon, iiranarete ŋikiŋimanotin, eyarununuyete ŋikatwak, nabo elimonokinio Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni a ŋikulyak.
40011006	Erereŋ nooi ituŋanan ŋini nyejamakini anupit keŋ aŋuna kaŋ.”
40011007	Ani erotokinete ŋikasyomak a Yoana, togeu Yesu alimonokin ŋasepico ŋakiro a Yoana tema, “Ŋina ilositotor iyes neni a Yoana apaki ŋina ayakar iŋes naloŋisat, nyo iitanito iyes akiŋolikin? Eoot ŋolo iloiloi ekuwuam a?
40011008	Nyo ilosito iyes akiŋolikin? Ekile ŋolo anapit ŋilowi ŋulu aninikak ŋulu emilimilete a? Toyenete atemar ŋituŋa ŋulu enapito koŋina, iboiyete ikes alorerya a ŋikapolok.
40011009	Nyo nai kire ilosito iyes akiŋolikin? Ekadwaran a? Ee robo; akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, iŋolikis iyes ituŋanan ŋini iloit nooi tari ekadwaran.
40011010	Yoana iŋes ebala Akuj alokitaabo ebe, ‘Toanyu, eyakiyari ayoŋ ekaakiyakia kiŋaren kon, kitemok erot kon.’
40011011	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, alotuŋa a daadaŋ a ŋulu idounitoe ŋinapei koloŋ, emam ŋini epol akilo Yoana Ekebatisan. Nai ŋini edit akilo daadaŋ a Napukan a ŋina anakuj, epol akilo Yoana.
40011012	Ameun alorwa a Yoana ke Ekebatisan akitodol tokona, eryamunit Apukan ka Akuj ŋican ŋulu apolok; nabo eŋirikinito ŋikadedeŋak alemar iŋes ka agogoŋu.
40011013	Anerae apotu ŋikadwarak daadaŋ ka ŋikisila todwara akitodol neni a Yoana
40011014	ka ani kicamito akinup ŋakiro ŋuna adwarito ikes, Yoana iŋes Eliya ŋolo itemokino bu.
40011015	Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki ŋuna kiiraret, kiira.
40011016	“Nai, nyo esikwaania ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu a ŋirwa a lu? Ikote ikes ŋidwe ŋulu iboiyete alomaket. Enyarae epeiwae kec ŋuluce
40011017	temasi, ‘Ikipotu isua okutakisi arupepe ŋina kimomworet, nai nyimomworikis iyes; aponi isua kikalounoe aŋuna ka atwanare, nai nyiluuroto iyes.’
40011018	Abu Yoana bu eroneene ka pa emasi ŋagwe, nai temasi ŋituŋa, ‘Ikamunit ekipye iŋes.’
40011019	Abu Lokoku a Ituŋanan, imuji ka emasi, ebasi ŋituŋa, ‘Kiŋolikisi ekadakan ka ekameran, ekone a ŋikerirak ocur ka ŋikasecak!’ Nai aosou ŋina ka Akuj itoodiunitae erae ŋina a kire aloticisyo keŋ.”
40011020	Kisyak Yesu akisibura ŋituŋa alotaunio a ŋulu aris sek iŋes kitiyaa ŋakujuwuanisya keŋ ŋuna alalak, anerae apotu ikes nyekiwa ŋasecisya kec.
40011021	“Ekaŋ iyoŋ Korasin! Ekaŋ iyoŋ Betesaida! Anerae kerae koloŋ kitiyatetei ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna etiyakin aneni kus alo Tiro ka Sidon, kekiito ikes koloŋ sek, tonapa ŋilowi ŋulu koris, ido kiwosakinos ekuron, kitoodiuniata atemar akiwua ikes ŋasecisya.
40011022	Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, isyoni Akuj nooi ŋituŋa ŋulu a Tiro ka ŋulu a Sidon Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino akilo iyes.
40011023	Ani bo iyoŋ Kaperenaum! Icamit iyoŋ akitopolooro kon todol nakuj a? Ikilemaryo iyoŋ anakwap, ikimasar nakibois ŋina a ŋikatwak! Anerae kerae koloŋ kitiyatetei ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna etiyakin neni kus, keriŋa Sodoma eyai tari tokona!
40011024	Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, isyoni Akuj nooi ŋituŋa ŋulu a Sodoma, Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino akilo iyes.”
40011025	Apaki ŋin, kirwor Yesu tema, “Alakara ayoŋ neni kon Papa, Ekapolon ŋolo anakuj ka nakwap, anerae ibu iyoŋ kiwua ŋakiro ŋun aneni a ŋikaosok ka ŋipiiryanotin, nai kisileereu neni a ŋidwe a ŋulu cicik.
40011026	Ee, Papa, itiyak iyoŋ ŋun daadaŋ ikwaŋina icamitor iyoŋ elope.
40011027	“Akainaki ayoŋ Papa kaŋ ŋiboro daadaŋ. Emam ituŋanan eyeni atemar Lokoku iŋes ŋae, mati Papa, nabo emam ŋini eyeni atemar Papa iŋes ŋae, mati Lokoku ka ŋulu daadaŋ ecamit Lokoku akitoodikin Papa keŋ neni kec.
40011028	“Potu neni kaŋ iyes daadaŋ ŋulu ikiupit aloticisyo kus ka aŋuna ka akiwokit ŋigogoso; ekesieŋuni ayoŋ iyes.
40011029	Tolemasi ayokot kaŋ tonapa ka kisisyata aneni kaŋ; anerae apatana ka eyapara ayoŋ alotau, ido iryamunete akieŋun ŋina a ŋitai kus.
40011030	Anerae epatana akinap ayokot kaŋ ka eook egogos kaŋ.”
40012001	Alorwa a ŋul, kitoro Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ lomanikor a ŋimomwa akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato. Anyamit ŋikasyomak keŋ akoro, togyeut ŋimomwa kiŋinyut tonyama.
40012002	Nai ani iŋolikinete Ŋiparisayon ŋun, tolimokis Yesu temasi, “Toanyuwa, itiyaete ŋikasyomak kon ŋuna italeo akitiya akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato.”
40012003	Toboŋok Yesu Ŋiparisayon tema, “Nyesyoma iyes ŋuna abu Daudi kitiya apaki ŋina anyamya akoro iŋes ka ŋirukitos keŋ a?
40012004	Abu iŋes toloma kai ŋinakilipet Akuj, tonyam amugati ŋina ainakinitae Akuj, ŋina etaleo iŋes ka ŋirukitos keŋ akinyam mati ŋisacaradotin bon.
40012005	Kori nyesyoma iyes a Lokisila atemar, akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato ebileneneete ŋisacaradotin ŋulu ka Akai ka Akuj ŋakiro a Sabato, nai nyesecito a?
40012006	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, eyai nege ŋini epol akilo Akai ka Akuj.
40012007	Kerae ca toyenunito iyes apolou a ŋakiro a nu, ebala Akuj, ‘Acamit ayoŋ akisyon, meere amuronot,’ pa kitubonokinito iyes ŋulu nyesecito.
40012008	Lokoku a Ituŋanan iŋes erae Ekapolon ŋolo a Sabato.”
40012009	Torotok Yesu a nen, toloma losinagoga,
40012010	neni ayai ekile ŋolo amitarit akan. Ayakasi nen ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu acamito akisitakin Yesu. Kiŋita ikes iŋes temasi, “Ecamakinitae mono a Lokisila yok akitaŋaleunun ŋituŋa akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato a?”
40012011	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋae alokidiŋ kus ŋini nyiriuni amesek keŋ, kimasakin nakipany ŋina aoyan akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato?
40012012	Iloit nooi akiyar a ituŋanan ŋina ka amesek! Aŋun, ecamakinitae a Lokisila akitiya ŋuna ajokak akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato.”
40012013	Tolimok nai iŋes ekile ŋol tema, “Toriyo akan kon.” Toriyo nai ekile akan, toŋaleu kikok ŋinace.
40012014	Nai apotu Ŋiparisayon tolomasi kiŋa, totukut epite ŋoloaret Yesu.
40012015	Nai aŋuna ayenia Yesu atemar etukosi Ŋiparisayon akiar iŋes, torotok anakwap a ŋin, totupasi ŋasepico ŋuna alalak iŋes. Kitaŋaleu iŋes daadaŋ ŋulu adyakasi,
40012016	nabo kicik iŋes ikes tema, “Nyikiteyan ayoŋ ŋituŋa!”
40012017	Etiyae iŋes ŋun, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna koloŋ erworit ekadwaran Isaya ebala,
40012018	“Kiŋolikisi, erae lo eketiyan kaŋ ŋolo aseu ayoŋ, eminat kaŋ ŋolo eketalakarit ayoŋ nooi. Eyakuuni ayoŋ etau kaŋ bu neni keŋ, ikotere tolimokinia ŋituŋa ŋulu a ŋakwapin ŋakiro ŋuna ka atubokino.
40012019	Nyiburae iŋes kori nyiserae ecela, ka emam ituŋanan ŋini iirari etoil keŋ alorotin.
40012020	Nyebili iŋes akasirimaete ŋina edapony kori nyituduŋe iŋes ausi ŋina epurui akitodol ŋina eyaunia akiyookino kipuka.
40012021	Iwuakinete ŋakwapin daadaŋ akigeno kec neni keŋ.”
40012022	Yaut ŋituŋa neni a Yesu ekile ŋolo amudukana ka pa erworo, anerae ekamunito ŋipyan iŋes. Kitaŋaleu Yesu iŋes, tosodi kirworik ka tokienyu daŋ.
40012023	Toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ temasi, “Erae mono kona lo lokoku a Daudi a?”
40012024	Nai ani iirarete Ŋiparisayon ŋakiro ŋun temasi, “Iritanari ekile ŋol ŋipyan, anerae einakinit Belesebul ŋolo erae ekapolon a ŋipyan iŋes apedor.”
40012025	Ikwaŋina ayenia Yesu ŋuna atamete ikes, tolimok ikes tema, “Apukan ŋina nyimorikina ŋituŋa keŋ, nyerubakini; etaun kori ekal ŋolo etyakatyakatar ŋituŋa, nyicasi.
40012026	Ani kiritanari Satan Satan, iŋes atemar atyakatyaka bon; ikokini nai akeepukan icasi ai?
40012027	Ani keritanari ayoŋ ŋipyan alokiro a Belesebul, lokiro a ŋae bo iritanaryata ŋikewuapak kus? Aŋun, eruworosi ikes ŋikatubonokinak kus.
40012028	Nai ani kerae Etau ŋolo ka Akuj eritanarya ayoŋ ŋipyan iŋes atemar adau Apukan ka Akuj adolun neni kus.
40012029	“Ikokini mono ai ituŋanan epedori alomar lore ŋolo ke ekile a ŋolo agogoŋon tolema ŋiboro keŋ, erae pa keroc mono ekile ŋol, tosodi nai tolema ŋiboro keŋ?
40012030	“Ituŋanan ŋini nyeyai lowae kaŋ, akaŋerit ayoŋ, nabo ituŋanan ŋini nyekeŋarakinit ayoŋ akicun, ielieli.
40012031	Aŋun, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, isyoniyo ŋituŋa ŋasecisya ka ŋiyany kec; nai ŋini iyanyi Etau ŋolo Asegan, nyepedoryo akisyon.
40012032	Ŋinituŋanan irworo akirot ŋina ka akitidiŋit Lokoku a Ituŋanan, isyonio iŋes; nai ŋini irworo itidiŋit Etau ŋolo Asegan, nyisyoniyo iŋes alorwa a lu ka alorwa a ŋulu eponito.
40012033	“Ani kiyakatar iyes ekitoe ŋolo ajokan, ipedorete aryamun ŋaraito ŋuna ajokak, nai ani kiyakatar iyes ekitoe ŋolo aronon, iryamunete ŋaraito ŋuna aronok, anerae eyenen ŋolokitoe anaraito keŋ.
40012034	Iyes ŋulu iroko ŋulu ikote ŋapomia, ikokinete iyes irworosi ŋakiro ŋuna ajokak toraakas ŋulu aronok ai? Anerae elimuni akituk ŋuna eya lotau.
40012035	Ituŋanan ŋini ajokan elimuni ŋuna ajokak ŋuna eyakasi lotau keŋ ka ituŋanan ŋini aronon elimuni ŋuna aronok ŋuna eyakasi lotau keŋ.
40012036	“Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino itatamuni ŋinituŋanan ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna kelimunit iŋes, ŋuna pa kitemokino iŋes tolimu.
40012037	Anerae ŋakiro kon ikes ikitubokinere iyoŋ, ikes itoodiunete atemar isecit iyoŋ kori nyisecit.”
40012038	Apotu ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon ŋice temasi neni a Yesu, “Eketataman, ikicamit isua aanyun iyoŋ itiyakini akujuwuanut.”
40012039	Nai toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Okoe nyapeinyamet karonon ka ŋina nyikinyomit Akuj, iitanit iŋes akujuwuanut; nai emam akujuwuanut ŋina einakinio iŋes, mati ŋina a Yona a ŋolo arae ekadwaran.
40012040	Ikwaŋinapei eriyator Yona anakook ke ekolya a ŋolo apolon ŋapaarasya ŋauni ka ŋakuwarisya ŋauni, Lokoku a Ituŋanan daŋ iriyae ŋapaarasya ka ŋakuwarisya ŋauni alotooma ŋalup.
40012041	Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino, enyounete ŋituŋa ŋulu a Ninepe atubokin iyes, anerae apotu ikes tokiwa ŋakecesecisya iirarete ŋakiro a Yona; nai eyai ne ŋolo epol akilo Yona.
40012042	Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino, enyouni akepukan ŋina ka akwap a ŋina a Ceba atubokin iyes; anerae abu iŋes koloŋ tolot erot ŋolo aoyan nooi akiirar ŋakitatameta ŋuna ka aosou a Solomon a ŋolo arae erwosit. Nai eyai ne ŋolo epol akilo Solomon.
40012043	“Nai ani elomari ekipye anituŋanan, elosi nariet kitor neni emam ŋakipi, iwarit neni kieŋunet, nai ani keŋopiki iŋes neni kieŋunet,
40012044	etemari, ‘Aboŋori kai ŋinapei ŋoon ayai.’ Ani eboŋuni iŋes kai ŋin, eryamuni emam ŋini eyai, epyatae ka itemokinitoe.
40012045	A nen, elosi iŋes toriku ŋipyan ŋice ŋikanikaarei ŋulu eroko nooi akilo iŋes, tolomasi tooma ituŋanan kiboiyoto. Ekaku emunaar ituŋanan ŋin nooi adepar neni sek ekoni. Ikwaŋinapei, itiyakin ŋun tari nanyamet na ŋina aronon.”
40012046	Ani eriŋa Yesu isirwori ŋituŋa, potu toto keŋ ka ŋikaitotoi keŋ; towua alokiŋa ecamito akirworikin ka iŋes. [
40012047	Tolimok ituŋanan ice Yesu tema, “Ewuasi toto kon ka ŋikaitotoi kon alokiŋa, ecamito akirworikin ka iyoŋ.”]
40012048	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ŋae toto kaŋ ka ataŋae ŋikaitotoi kaŋ?”
40012049	Tododa Yesu akan lokasyomak keŋ tema, “Kiŋolikisi! Lugu ikes erae toto kaŋ ka ŋikaitotoi kaŋ.
40012050	Anerae ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini itiyae ŋuna ecamit Papa kaŋ ŋolo eyai nakuj, iŋes erae lokaato kaŋ, nakaato kaŋ ka toto kaŋ.”
40013001	Akoloŋit ŋinapei ŋin, toloma Yesu alokai kiboikin diyete anam.
40013002	Potu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak nooi neni keŋ, todoka nai iŋes nataker kiboikin; towo asepic daadaŋ alokipetot.
40013003	Kitatam ikes ŋakiro ŋuna alalak a ŋakitadapeta ebala, “Abu eketan tolot aere ŋikinyom.
40013004	Ani eekini iŋes, todoto ŋikinyom ŋice lorot, potu ŋikyeny kidepasi.
40013005	Todoto ŋice loŋaro neni amam ŋalup ŋuna alalak, toruput atipei, anerae akudyoko ŋalup.
40013006	Nai ani enomokini akoloŋ, torinyiyosi tooko, anerae amam ŋataagor ŋuna aoyak.
40013007	Todoto ŋice kidiŋ ŋikukwa toruput, nai ani epolounete ŋikukwa, toridakis ikes.
40013008	Todoto ŋice nalup ŋuna ajokak toraa ŋaraito, ŋice amiat, ŋice ŋatomonikanikapei ka ŋice ŋatomoniuni.
40013009	Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki ŋuna kiiraret, kiira.”
40013010	Ani epote ŋikasyomak kiŋita Yesu temasi, “Kaanukiro isirworia iyoŋ ŋituŋa a ŋakitadapeta?”
40013011	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ikiinakinitae iyes ayenut ŋuna imunono ŋuna ka Apukan a ŋina anakuj, nai nyeinakinitae ikes.
40013012	Anerae ituŋanan ŋini eyakar ibore, iyatakinio tolalaar, nai ŋini emam ibore eyai, elemaryo tari ŋinidio cici ŋini sek ayakar iŋes.
40013013	Erworo ayoŋ neni kec a ŋakitadapeta, anerae kiŋolikis daŋ nyeanyuwasi, ani kepuput daŋ, nyiirasi kori nyeyenut.
40013014	Eyookinosi aneni kec ŋuna adwarit Isaya ebala, ‘Iirarete kire, nai ŋyeyenunete. Iŋolikinete kire, nai nyianyuwarete.
40013015	Anerae ileleba abaŋao lotuŋa ka agol ŋakeceki, nabo arap ikes ŋakonyen kec; kerae nyikote neni, keanyuwarito ŋakonyen kec ka kiirarito ŋaki kec, nabo keyenunito ŋitai kec, toboŋut neni kaŋ akitaŋaleuno.’
40013016	Nai iterereŋitoe ŋakonyen kus, anerae iteete ka ŋaki kus, anerae epupete.
40013017	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, acamito ŋikadwarak ŋulu alalak ka ŋituŋa ŋulu iyookino akiŋolikin ŋuna iŋolikis iyes, nai apotu nyiŋolikis; nabo acamito akiirar ŋuna iirasi iyes, nai apotu nyiirasi.”
40013018	“Topupokisi nai apolou ŋina ka akitadapet a ŋina ke eketan ŋikinyom.
40013019	Ŋituŋa ŋulu iirarete akirot ŋina ka Apukan ka nyeyenut, ikote ikes ŋikinyom ŋulu adoete lorot. Ani ebuni Satan, tolema alotai kec ŋuna sek aekinitae.
40013020	Isikwaanitae ŋulu adoete loŋaro ka ŋituŋa ŋulu iirarete akirot, tosodo kijaut atipei ka alakara.
40013021	Nai emamukatar ikes ŋataagor alotooma kec ka nyeroparete, ani epote ŋican ka ŋidiŋeta aŋuna ka akirot a ŋin, toesikis ikes.
40013022	Isikwaanitae ŋikinyom ŋulu adoete lokukwa ka ŋituŋa ŋulu iirarete akirot, nai amitakinit ŋuna ka akwap ka ekibure ŋolo ke ebari, eridakinete akirot ŋin nyera.
40013023	Isikwaanitae ŋikinyom ŋulu adoete nalup ŋuna ajokak ka ŋituŋa ŋulu iirarete akirot toyenut. Ŋul ikes kire erayete ŋikinyom, ŋice amiat, ŋice ŋatomonikanikapei, ka ŋice ŋatomoniuni.”
40013024	Tolimok nabo Yesu ikes akitadapet ace tema, “Ikoni Apukan ŋina anakuj ituŋanan ŋini keekini ŋimomwa ŋulu ajokak lomanikor keŋ.
40013025	Nai ani nakwaare ejotoete ŋituŋa daadaŋ, bu emoit toek etirwae lomanikor ŋol, ido tolot iŋes.
40013026	Ani erupunete ŋimomwa topolout toraa, kileereu etirwae.
40013027	Potu ŋiketiyak ŋulu ke elope emanikor kiŋita iŋes temasi, ‘Ekapolon, pa ŋoon ajokak ŋimomwa ŋulu iekini iyoŋ lomanikor kon a? Ai bo kebunio etirwae?’
40013028	Toboŋok iŋes ikes tema, ‘Emoit iŋes kitiya ŋun.’ Temasi nai ŋiketiyak neni keŋ, ‘Icamit iyoŋ isua torutoroe etirwae a?’
40013029	Toboŋok iŋes ikes tema, ‘Mam. Kimyekisi, anerae acepaki kirutosi iyes etirwae iwolikinete ŋimomwa daŋ.
40013030	Kimyekisi topolout daadaŋ kaapei, tari ŋina edolyo akilem. Ani edoli apaki ŋin, alimokini ayoŋ ŋikalemak atemar torututu mono etirwae, toenianasi a ŋikes kicunya, tocunakis nai ŋimomwa lodula kaŋ.’ ”
40013031	Tolimok Yesu ikes akitadapet ace tema, “Ikoni Apukan ŋina anakuj icokit ŋini ikoni ŋini ke ebobore, ŋini abu ituŋanan todupak lomanikor keŋ.
40013032	Edit icokit ŋin nooi akilo ŋicok daadaŋ, nai kerupu, epoloor nooi kilo ŋikito ŋuluce, tosodo nai ŋikyeny potu toduko naten keŋ.”
40013033	Tolimok Yesu ikes akitadapet ace tema, “Ikoni Apukan ŋina anakuj ŋakinyalet ŋuna abu aberu tolemu, kinyalak ka ŋakirya ŋuna adolito ŋidepei ŋiarei, tomurak akitodol ŋina abuunioto daadaŋ.”
40013034	Kirwor Yesu ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ nasepico a ŋituŋa a ŋakitadapeta, nyelimokina iŋes ŋadikiro neni a ŋituŋa emam akitadapet.
40013035	Etiyae iŋes ŋun, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna kirworit ekadwaran ebe, “Erwori ayoŋ neni kec a ŋakitadapeta, alimori daŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ewuaitae ameun anasubunet akwap.”
40013036	Toesik nai Yesu ŋasepico a ŋituŋa, toloma kai. Potu ŋikeekasyomak neni keŋ temasi, “Kiteyenunae isua apolou ŋina ka akitadapet a ŋina ke etirwae alomanikor.”
40013037	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Iŋes ŋini eekini ŋikinyom ŋulu ajokak, erae Lokoku a Ituŋanan.
40013038	Emanikor iŋes akwap. Ŋikinyom ŋulu ajokak ikes ŋidwe ŋulu ka Apukan ka Akuj. Etirwae iŋes ŋidwe a Satan.
40013039	Emoit ŋolo keekini etirwae iŋes Satan; akilem iŋes Akoloŋit ŋina esalunia akwap; ŋikalemak ikes ŋimalaikan.
40013040	Ikwaŋinapei ecunakinere etirwae kicunyae ka akim, itiyakinosi ŋakiro ŋun ikwaŋinapei Akoloŋit ŋina esalunia akwap.
40013041	Iyakuuni Lokoku a Ituŋanan ŋimalaikan keŋ, tocunakis ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu iteseceneneete ŋuluce ka ŋikasecak daadaŋ,
40013042	tocakakinae nakim ŋina erirae. A nen, kigworo ka tokonyanakis ŋikyal.
40013043	Ecaunete nai ikwa akoloŋ ŋulu iyookino a Napukan a Papa kec. Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki ŋuna kiiraret, kiira.
40013044	“Ikoni Apukan ŋina anakuj abaru ŋina eyai lomanikor, ŋina ani eripuni ituŋanan, kiwua. Tosodi tolot togyela ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu eyakar iŋes, togyelu nai emanikor ŋol.
40013045	“Ikoni nabo Apukan ŋina anakuj ekecurutan ŋolo iwarit ŋamoru ŋuna epol egyelit,
40013046	ŋolo ani eryamuni amoru apei ŋina epol egyelit, elosi togyela ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu eyakar iŋes, tosodi togyel amoru ŋin.
40013047	“Ikoni nabo Apukan ŋina anakuj atibait ŋina aponi tocakakinae nanam, kirirau ŋikolya ŋulu agelegelya.
40013048	Ani ilelebikin, kiriut ŋituŋa lokipetot kiboikinos, ido toseut ŋikolya ŋulu ajokak kiwuakis lobukito, tocakasi ŋulu aronok.
40013049	Ikokini nen Akoloŋit ŋina esalunia akwap. Epote ŋimalaikan atyakar ŋulu aronok aneni a ŋulu iyookino.
40013050	Ecakakinete ŋimalaikan ikes nakim ŋina erirae. Kigworo a nen ka tokonyanakis ŋikyal.”
40013051	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Iyenut apolou ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋun daadaŋ a?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ee, ikiyenu.”
40013052	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Itoodiunito ŋakiro ŋun atemar eketataman a Ŋikisila ŋolo itatamitae aŋuna ka Apukan a ŋina anakuj, ikoni elope a akai ŋolo itoodiuni anabaru keŋ ŋiboro ŋulu kitet ka ŋulu ŋorok.”
40013053	Ani kedau Yesu erwor ŋakitadapeta ŋun, tonyou anakwap a ŋin,
40013054	tolot nakwap keŋ. Kitatam iŋes ŋituŋa alosinagoga, ido toumokis daadaŋ ŋulu eirarete ŋuna erworo iŋes temasi, “Ai keryamunia ekile lo aosou ŋina ikoni naga ka apedor ŋina itiyaa ŋakujuwuanisya nu?
40013055	Meere mono logo lokoku ke ekecian ŋabaoi a? Meere toto keŋ Maria a? Meere ŋikaitotoi keŋ Yakobo, Yosepu ka Simoni, ta Yuda a?
40013056	Nyikirukit iwon ka ŋakaitotoi keŋ daadaŋ a? Ai nai keryamunia iŋes ŋakiro nu daadaŋ?”
40013057	Toŋoikis ikes Yesu. Nai tema Yesu neni kec, “Ekerer ekadwaran anakwapin a daadaŋ, nai nyekerer anakwap keŋ ka anateker keŋ.”
40013058	Nyitiya iŋes ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna alalak aŋuna pa anupitotor ikes.
40014001	Apaki ŋin, topup erwosit Erode ŋakiro ŋuna epuritotor ŋituŋa Yesu.
40014002	Tolimok Erode ŋiketiyak keŋ tema, “Erae lo Yoana Ekebatisan, kiteyarun iŋes alokatwak, iŋes nai eyakatar ŋiticisyo ŋulu ka apedor tooma keŋ.”
40014003	Aris Erode kikama Yoana toen ya mabus, aŋuna ke Erodiya a ŋina arae aberu a Pilipo a lokaato ke Erode.
40014004	Alimokinit sek Yoana Ekebatisan Erode atemar, “Italeo iyoŋ akituruwor aberu a lokaato kon ŋina kon!”
40014005	Acamit Erode akiar Yoana, nai tokuryanar aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu anupito atemar erae Yoana ekadwaran.
40014006	Nai akoloŋit ŋina eitunitere akidouno ke Erode, abu nakoku ke Erodiya kidoŋa alokiŋaren ŋituŋa ejok nooi, kitalaka Erode.
40014007	Kikoŋ Erode tema, “Ainakini ikoku en ŋinibore daadaŋ ekeŋisi iŋes ayoŋ!”
40014008	Aŋuna alimokinia toto keŋ iŋes ibore ŋini kiŋita, abu kiŋit tema, “Inakinae ayoŋ akou a Yoana ke Ekebatisan iwuakinitae natuba!”
40014009	Tobul Erode, nai aŋuna sek ekoŋitor iŋes ka aŋuna a ŋipeyok keŋ, abu tolimu tema, “Inakisi.”
40014010	Abu kiyakiya ŋasigarya alosit atubun akou a Yoana ke Ekebatisan a ŋolo ayai apaki ŋin mabus.
40014011	Kiwuakinae akou keŋ natuba, inakinae apese, ina toto keŋ.
40014012	Apotu nai ŋikasyomak a Yoana yaa akuwan keŋ, tonuka. Ani irikakin, toloto tolimokis Yesu.
40014013	Ŋolopite eirarya Yesu ŋakiro ŋuna a Yoana, tonyou anakwap a ŋin, todoka nataker tolot neni keŋ bon, neni asilon. Ani nai iirarete ŋituŋa ŋun, potu alotaunio kec kiwuapasi Yesu.
40014014	Ani eriŋa Yesu edoki anataker, kiŋolik asepic ŋina alalan, kisyonioto ikes iŋes, tosodi kitaŋaleu ŋulu adyakasi.
40014015	Ani edoli eboŋ, potu ŋikasyomak neni keŋ tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Erae nege ariet ka elosi akwap akiwar; kitoboŋo ŋituŋa, ikotere toloto lorerya togyelut idiobore ŋini nyamat.”
40014016	Nai tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyitemokino ikes toloto, inakisi iyes ikes adiokimuj.”
40014017	Tolimokis ikes iŋes temasi, “ Emam ibore ikiyakar isua, mati ŋamugati ŋakan ka ŋikolya ŋiarei make.”
40014018	Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Yautu ikes neni kaŋ.”
40014019	Kisiboik nai Yesu ŋasepico a ŋituŋa lonya. Tolemu nai iŋes ŋamugati ŋunakan ka ŋikolya ŋuluarei, kireo kidiama nakuj, kilipak, tosodi tonyilinyili ŋamugati inak ŋikasyomak tokorakis ikes nasepico.
40014020	Kimuja daadaŋ kimwoko, ido tocunut ŋikasyomak ŋapiyanunet ŋuna apotu kilelebun naditae ŋatomon ka ŋaarei.
40014021	Adolit ekimar a ŋikilyok a ŋulu emujete ŋalipyo ŋakan, pa imarakinitae ŋaberu ka ŋidwe.
40014022	Kitodoku Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ anataker kisiŋaren ikes, toloto ekekwaye anam, kidoŋ iŋes akitolot ŋasepico.
40014023	Kedau iŋes ŋun, todoka iŋes bon lomukura akilip, todoiyo akoloŋ eriŋa iŋes bon eyai nen.
40014024	Nai apaki ŋin aris ataker keeka alokipetot. Kibapabapaete ŋikaguragurae a ŋakipi ataker, anerae akutunit ekuwuam anakan a ŋina alosete ikes.
40014025	Ani ebai akuwar, bu Yesu neni a ŋikasyomak elosi alokidiama nakipi.
40014026	Nai ani eanyuwarete ŋikasyomak keŋ iŋes elosi alokidiama nakipi toryaŋakinos ikes temasi, “Erae ekipye.” Kiworout aŋuna ke ekabule.
40014027	Nai kirworik Yesu neni kec atipei tema, “Totitinyikisi! Erae ayoŋ. Nyikibul!”
40014028	Tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ani kerae iyoŋ, tolimokinae ayoŋ daŋ obu neni kon alosi alokidiama nakipi.”
40014029	Tolimok nai Yesu iŋes tema, “Bua!” Todoku Petero anataker, torotok alokidiama nakipi, tolot neni ayai Yesu.
40014030	Nai ani iŋolikini iŋes ekuwuam ekutunit, tobul, kisyak asipor, kiworou tema, “Ekapolon, toiunae!”
40014031	Kiopeiyo Yesu atipei akan keŋ, kikam iŋes tema, “Okoe edit anupit kon! Kaanukiro ibunio iyoŋ toŋayaŋaya?”
40014032	Ani edokarete ikes nataker, todipakin ekuwuam.
40014033	Apotu ŋikasyomak ŋulu ayakasi nataker toryediko alokiŋaren Yesu kilipa temasi, “Kire, irae iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj!”
40014034	Ketuborosi ikes ekekwaye anam, todolut nakwap ŋina anyaritae Genesaret.
40014035	Ani eyenete ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a ŋin Yesu, kielasi akirot nakwap yaunae ŋikadyakak daadaŋ neni keŋ.
40014036	Kimaimaa ŋikadyakak Yesu acamakin ikes akitap abilet bon ŋina ke elou keŋ. Ŋulu daadaŋ apotu totapa apotu toŋaleut.
40015001	Potu Ŋiparisayon ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila alo Yerusalem neni a Yesu kiŋita iŋes temasi,
40015002	“Nyo nyiwuapitotor ŋikasyomak kon ŋitalyo ŋulu atapapaa yok? Anerae nyilotanarete ikes ŋakan kec eriŋa nyimuja!”
40015003	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Kaanukiro bo ibilitotor iyes daŋ ŋakiciketa ŋuna ka Akuj, aŋuna ka akiwuapya ŋulu kus?
40015004	Anerae ikicikakinit Akuj atemar, ‘Tokerite papa kon ka toto kon ka ituŋanan ŋini iceni papa keŋ kori toto keŋ, itemokino totwan jik.’
40015005	Nai ibasi iyes, Ani ketema ituŋanan isirwori papa keŋ kori toto keŋ, ebe, ‘Ŋini adikino iyoŋ iryamuni aneni kaŋ, erae ŋini einakinitae Akuj,’
40015006	nyitemokino iŋes ainakin papa keŋ ibore ŋin. Iŋes nai atemar ijamakis iyes akirot ka Akuj aŋuna a ŋitalyo kus.
40015007	Iyes ŋikaŋisoswae! Eyookinit kire koloŋ Isaya edwari aŋuna kus ebala,
40015008	‘Eketopoloorito ayoŋ ŋituŋa lu alorwor kec, nai elwaka ŋikecetai aneni kaŋ.
40015009	Nabo ilipete ikes neni kaŋ koŋin, anerae itatamete ikes ŋitalyo a ŋituŋa esibit ŋulu ka Akuj!’ ”
40015010	Tonyarau nai iŋes ŋituŋa neni keŋ tolimok tema, “Topupokisi ikotere iyenunete!
40015011	Meere ibore ŋini elomari nituŋanan epedori akitoroniyar iŋes; nai ŋini elomuni anituŋanan iŋes itoroniyari iŋes.”
40015012	Potu nai ŋikasyomak neni keŋ tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Iyeni iyoŋ atemar abu takadak Ŋiparisayon, iirarete ŋakiro ŋuna ilimuni iyoŋ a?”
40015013	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ekitoe daadaŋ ŋolo nyerae papa kaŋ ŋolo anakuj edupakinit, erutoryo.
40015014	Kimyekisi ikes make. Erae ikes ŋikarikok ŋulu emudukaka alokidiŋ ŋimudukanotin ŋuluce. Ani kerik ituŋanan ŋini emudukana emudukanot, imasakinosi ikes daadaŋ nauwuat.”
40015015	Nai kiŋit Petero Yesu tema, “Tolimokinae isua apolou ŋina ka akitadapet a ŋin.”
40015016	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ibaŋaaka iyes daŋ ikote ŋuluce.
40015017	Nyiyenete iyes atemar ibore daadaŋ ŋini itori nakituk a ituŋanan elosi tooma nakook, ani ekaku tolunyar toloma kiŋa a?
40015018	Nai ŋakiro ŋuna itorunete nakituk a ituŋanan eponito alotau, ido tomunaasi ituŋanan;
40015019	anerae lotau elomununiata ŋakiro ŋuna aronok, ikwa: akiar, elomi, amalao, akoko, alyokonu ka akiyany.
40015020	Ŋun ikes itoroniyarete ituŋanan, nai meere akimuj nyilotara ŋakan itoroniyari ituŋanan.”
40015021	Torotok Yesu a nen, tolot nakwap ŋina alodiye Tiro ka Sidon.
40015022	Bu aberu ŋina arae Akananait ŋina ayai nakwap ŋin, kimaima Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, Lokoku a Daudi! Kisyoni ayoŋ! Edyaka nakoku kaŋ, ikamunit ekipye iŋes!”
40015023	Nai nyelimok Yesu iŋes adiokirot. Ani epote ŋikasyomak keŋ kimaimaa iŋes temasi, “Kirita aberu na tolot! Anerae ikicalanakini iŋes iwon!”
40015024	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ekeyakuunitae ayoŋ neni a ŋituŋa a Isirael make, a ŋulu eoliyorito ikwa ŋameseekin.”
40015025	Nai abu aberu ŋin toryedik alokiŋaren keŋ tema, “Ekapolon, kiŋarakinae!”
40015026	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyejok akimuj a ŋidwe einakinio ŋiŋokwo.”
40015027	Tema aberu elimokini Yesu, “Ee, Ekapolon, nai ŋiŋokwo daŋ idepete ŋarare ŋuna ka akimuj ŋuna ecakunun alomesae a ŋikecekapolok.”
40015028	Tosodi Yesu toboŋok iŋes tema, “Aberu, epol akoninupit, kitiyakin neni kon ikwaŋina icamitor iyoŋ.” Toŋaleu nakoku keŋ apaki ŋinapei ŋin.
40015029	Torotok Yesu a nen kitor diye anam ŋina alo Galileya, todoka lomukura kiboikin.
40015030	Potu ŋasepico a ŋituŋa ŋuna alalak neni keŋ eyaunito ŋikadyakak, ŋikaŋwalak, ŋimudukanotin, ŋikecodok ka ŋituŋa ŋulu pa erworosi ta ŋice daŋ ŋulu alalak. Kiwuakis ikes nakejen a Yesu, kitaŋaleu Yesu ikes.
40015031	Aŋun, toumokis ŋasepico a ŋituŋa eanyuwarete ŋituŋa ŋulu sek pa erworosi, irworosi, ŋikaŋwalak eŋaleunete ka ŋulu ecodok ejokunete ta ŋimudukanotin ekienyunete. Tosodo ŋituŋa ŋul daadaŋ kipuro Akuj ŋina a Isirael.
40015032	Tonyarau Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Ekesyon ayoŋ asepic a ŋituŋa, anerae ikiruk ayoŋ ka ikes ŋirwa ŋiuni emam ibore ŋini emuja ikes. Nyaesikini ayoŋ ikes elosete pa imujito, ikotere nyileleny ikes alorot aŋuna enyamitor akoro.”
40015033	Kiŋita ŋikasyomak iŋes temasi, “Ai nai ikiryamunia iwon akimuj ŋina itemokin ŋituŋa ŋulu etya lu analoŋisat a na?”
40015034	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋamugati ŋayai iyakatar iyes?” Temasi ikes, “Ŋakanikaarei ka ŋikolya ŋidikudyo.”
40015035	Tolimok Yesu asepic a ŋituŋa akiboikin.
40015036	Tolemu ŋamugati ŋunakanikaarei ka ŋikolya, kilipak. Ani kedau akilipakin tonyilinyili, inak ŋikasyomak tokorakis lotuŋa.
40015037	Kimuja ŋituŋa daadaŋ kimwoko, kilelebun akimuj ŋina apiyanunete ikes ŋaditae ŋakanikaarei.
40015038	Arae ekimar a ŋikilyok a ŋulu emujete ŋalipyo ŋaomwon, pa imarakinitae ŋaberu ka ŋidwe.
40015039	Ani kitolot Yesu ŋituŋa, todoka iŋes nataker tolot nakwap a Magadan.
40016001	Potu Ŋiparisayon ka Ŋisadukayon neni a Yesu, kiŋita iŋes akitiyakin adiokujuwuanut ŋina ebunit anakuj.
40016002	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Apaki ŋina edoiyorya akoloŋ itemarete iyes, ‘Ejokyar moi akwap, anerae ereŋ adis.’
40016003	Ani ereŋ adis taparacu, itemarete iyes, ‘Elosi akiru akilim, anerae ereŋ adis ka idisit neni ikitubuli.’ Iyenete iyes apolou ke epite ŋolo eyakar adis, nai ikipiyorit ayenun apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna itiyasi ŋirwa lu!
40016004	Eroko nooi ŋituŋa a ŋirwa a lu nyekerito tari ŋina erae Akuj! Iwarito akitoodikinet ŋina ailiilon! Nai emam akitoodikinet ace ŋina ailiilon ŋina itoodikinio ikes mati ŋina ke ekadwaran a Yona.” Torotok nai Yesu toesik ikes.
40016005	Ani edolete ŋikasyomak a Yesu ekekwaye anam, totamut atemar kimuryak ikes ayaun ŋamugati.
40016006	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Tocoikinito ŋakinyalet ŋuna a Ŋiparisayon ka a Ŋisadukayon.”
40016007	Kirworikis ikes make temasi, “Irworo iŋes ŋun, anerae nyeyaunitae iwon ŋamugati.”
40016008	Nai aŋuna ayenia Yesu ŋuna erworosi ikes, tolimok ikes tema, “Iraakasi iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu edit anupit, kaanukiro irworotor iyes make ibasi imamukatar ŋamugati?
40016009	Ikwa eriŋa iyes nyeyenuna a? Nyitamunito iyes ŋina anyilinyilia ayoŋ ŋamugati ŋunakan ŋuna apotu ŋikilyok ŋalipyo ŋakan kimuja a? Ŋaditae ŋayai ipotu iyes kilelebikis akimuj ŋina apiyanun?
40016010	Ani bo ŋamugati ŋunakanikaarei ŋuna emujete ŋikilyok ŋalipyo ŋaomwon, ŋaditae ŋayai ipotu iyes kilelebikis akimuj ŋina apiyanun?
40016011	Ikokinete nai iyes pa iyenete atemar pa erworo ayoŋ neni kus aŋuna a ŋamugati ai? Nai tocoikinito ŋakinyalet ŋuna a Ŋiparisayon ka ŋuna a Ŋisadukayon.”
40016012	Toyenut nai ŋikasyomak atemar meere ŋakiro a ŋamugati aŋuna emam ŋasip kec erworo Yesu, nai ŋakiro ŋuna itatamete Ŋiparisayon ka Ŋisadukayon.
40016013	Ani elosi Yesu nakwap ŋina anyaritae Kaisaria Pilipi, kiŋit iŋes ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Ebasi mono ŋituŋa ŋae ayoŋ ŋolo abala arae Lokoku a Ituŋanan?”
40016014	Temasi ikes eboŋokinete, “Ebasi ŋice Yoana Ekebatisan, ebasi ŋice Eliya, ka ebasi ŋice Yeremiya, kori epei alokadwarak.”
40016015	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Ani bo iyes ibasi ŋae ayoŋ?”
40016016	Toboŋok Simoni Petero tema, “Irae iyoŋ Kristo, Lokoku ka Akuj a ŋina eyari.”
40016017	Tolimok Yesu Petero tema, “Irereŋ iyoŋ Simoni lokoku a Yona, anerae meere ituŋanan ikisileerek iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋun, nai erae Papa kaŋ ŋolo eyai nakuj.
40016018	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, irae iyoŋ Petero, (apolou keŋ atemar ataaba.) Nataaba ŋin iŋes adukokini ayoŋ akai kaŋ ka nyepedori atwanare akiloun iŋes.
40016019	Akainakini ayoŋ iyoŋ ŋikipuŋguwoi ŋulu ka Apukan a ŋina anakuj; ŋuna nyicamakini iyoŋ anakwap nyecamakinio tari anakuj; ka ŋuna icamakini iyoŋ anakwap ecamakinio anakuj.”
40016020	Kicik nai iŋes ŋikeekasyomak nyelimokis ituŋanan ice atemar erae iŋes Kristo.
40016021	Ameun apaki ŋinapei ŋin, togeu Yesu akisileerekin ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Itemokino ayoŋ olot Yerusalem ekesicani nooi alokatukok, alosacaradotin a ŋulu apolok, aloketatamak a Ŋikisila ka okaari. Nai kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni, ayaruni.”
40016022	Tonyaraiya Petero Yesu nawae togeu akisibura iŋes ebala, “Meere ikoŋina Ekapolon! Nyiryamasi ca ka ŋuna!”
40016023	Toboboŋ Yesu tolimok Petero tema, “Tolot aneni kaŋ Satan! Irae iyoŋ ŋolo ikiretakinit ayoŋ, anerae ŋatameta kon nyeponito aneni ka Akuj, nai eponito alotuŋa.”
40016024	Tolimok nai Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Ŋinituŋanan ecamit akiwuapakin ayoŋ, itemokino toŋero bon, toryoŋ emusalaba keŋ, ekewuapak ayoŋ.
40016025	Anerae ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini iwarit akiricun akiyar keŋ, itotwaniyari, nai ŋini ejali akiyar keŋ aŋuna kaŋ eyari.
40016026	Alipoida eryamuni ituŋanan erae keŋata iŋes akwap daadaŋ, nai totwania akiyar keŋ? Mam jik! Kori nyo epedorya ituŋanan akisyecia akiyar keŋ?
40016027	Anerae ebuni Lokoku a Ituŋanan ka apedor a ŋina a Papa keŋ erukito ka ŋimalaikan, torop ŋinituŋanan ikwaŋina itiyator.
40016028	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, eya nege ŋice ŋulu nyetwakete nyeanyuwara Lokoku a Ituŋanan ebuni anapolou keŋ.”
40017001	Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋikanikapei, ya Yesu Petero, Yakobo, ka Yoana lokaato keŋ a Yakobo, todokasi ikes make kidiama emoru ŋolo aoyan.
40017002	Kilocokin akuwan keŋ alokiŋaren kec, tocau ereet keŋ ikwa akoloŋ ka tokwaŋiata ŋilowi keŋ ikwa akica.
40017003	Apaki ŋin, toanyuwasi ikes Moses ka Eliya irworosi ka Yesu.
40017004	Tolimok Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, ejok nooi iwon akiboi a nege. Ani kikijoikinit iyoŋ, adukokini ayoŋ ŋitogoi ŋiuni ne, epei ŋolo kon, epei ŋolo a Moses ka epei ŋolo ke Eliya.”
40017005	Ani eriŋa Petero irworo, bu edou ŋolo akwaŋan kya, torapuwa ikes aribo kirworik etoil alodou ebala, “Erae lo Lokoku kaŋ ŋolo minat, ŋolo alelyania ayoŋ, topupo iŋes!”
40017006	Ani iirarete ŋikasyomak ŋakiro ŋun, toramakinos kwap kijuuroto ebulit.
40017007	Nai bu Yesu totap ikes tema, “Tonyoutu, nyikibul!”
40017008	Ani ikeunete ikes ŋireetin, kiŋolikis Yesu bon emam ituŋanan ice.
40017009	Ŋolopite adokuniata ikes alomoru, kicik Yesu ikes tema, “Nyilimokis idiotuŋanan atakanikinet ŋin akitodol apaki ŋina iteyarunere Lokoku a Ituŋanan alokatwak.”
40017010	Kiŋita ŋikasyomak Yesu temasi, “Kaanukiro nai abaakatar ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila itemokino kisyau mono Eliya abunore?”
40017011	Toboŋok iŋes ikes tema, “Kire ebuni mono Eliya kitemonok ŋakiro daadaŋ.
40017012	Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, aberakin Eliya abunore, nai pa ayenete ŋituŋa iŋes, apotu kitiyata neni keŋ ŋuna acamito ikes. Ikwaŋinapei, Lokoku a Ituŋanan daŋ iteryamunete ikes ŋican.”
40017013	Toyenut nai ŋikasyomak atemar erworo iŋes ŋuna a Yoana ke Ekebatisan.
40017014	Ani epote Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ nasepic a ŋituŋa, bu ekile ece neni a Yesu, toryedik alokiŋaren keŋ tema,
40017015	“Ekapolon, kisyoni lokoku kaŋ, anerae ikamunit ekipye iŋes ka isicanit nooi, imasanakin nakim ka nakipi daŋ.
40017016	Abu ayoŋ oyau iŋes lokasyomak kon, nai apotu nyepedosi akitaŋaleun.”
40017017	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu nyinupito ka ŋulu ioliyorito! Ikiruki mono ayoŋ ka iyes tari ori? Akadaŋi ayoŋ iyes tari ori? Yautu edya neni kaŋ.”
40017018	Kiŋenyak Yesu ekipye alodya, tolomu, toŋaleu edya atipei.
40017019	Potu nai ŋikasyomak neni a Yesu, kiŋita iŋes aneni kec make temasi, “Nyo bo pa ikipedorya isua akiritar ekipye ŋol?”
40017020	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Anerae edit anupit kus. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ani iyakatar iyes anupit ŋina edit ikwa icokit ŋini ikoni ŋini ke ebobore, ilimokinete tari emoru lo atemar, ‘Kiyoto a ne, tolot ama,’ iyotori; ka emam ibore ŋini ikipiyori iyes akitiyakin. [
40017021	Nai nyenyouni ŋolo ikoni ŋol, mati kiritar ka akilip ka akikany.]”
40017022	Ani ecunakinosi ŋikasyomak a Yesu daadaŋ Galileya, tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Aapuu apaki ŋina ipotokinere Lokoku a Ituŋanan nakan a ŋituŋa,
40017023	a ŋulu earete iŋes. Nai kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni, iteyarunio iŋes.” Aŋun, kiyaloloŋo ŋikeekasyomak nooi.
40017024	Ani epote Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak Kaperenaum, toloto ŋikerirak ocur ŋolo ka Akai ka Akuj neni a Petero kiŋita iŋes temasi, “Etacenene mono eketataman kus ocur ŋolo ka Akai ka Akuj a?”
40017025	Toboŋok Petero tema, “Ee ca!” Ani elomuni Petero kai, kisyau Yesu akiŋit iŋes tema, “Anu itami iyoŋ Simoni? Neni ataŋae iriraata ŋirwosi ŋulu ka akwap ocur, neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka akwap kec kori lotuŋa ŋulu erae ŋigelae?”
40017026	Toboŋok Petero tema, “Neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu gelae.” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Iŋes atemar nyitemokino ŋilopeyek akwap etacete ocur.
40017027	Nai aŋuna nyikicamitor ikes ikiŋoikis iwon, tolot nanam tocakak ekodocet, tolemu ekolya ŋolo isyauni akirum. Toŋaa akeekituk, iryamuni iyoŋ ŋisiliŋa ŋulu itemokino otacata ocur kaŋ ka ŋolo kon.”
40018001	Apaki ŋin potu ŋikasyomak a Yesu neni keŋ kiŋita iŋes temasi, “Ŋae epol nooi a Napukan a ŋina anakuj?”
40018002	Tonyarau Yesu ikoku, kitowuo alokidiŋ kec,
40018003	tolimok ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, mati kibelekinosi iyes kikokis ŋidwe ŋulu cicik, nyilomarete Napukan ŋina anakuj.
40018004	Aŋun, ituŋanan ŋini itiditeun ikwa ikoku en, iŋes epol nooi a Napukan a ŋina anakuj.
40018005	Ituŋanan ŋini ijauni ikoku ŋini cici ŋini ikoni en alokiro kaŋ, ekejau iŋes ayoŋ.
40018006	“Nai ituŋanan ŋini iteseci ipei a ŋulu cicik a lu, a ŋulu akanupito ayoŋ, kitemokino iŋes toenikinae amoru ŋinakiryeet lomosiriŋ keŋ, kimasakinae nanam.
40018007	Ekaŋ iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu itesecete ŋuluce! Anerae itemokino ŋakitemyet ŋun toyakaun, nai ekaŋ iŋes ŋini eyauni ikes!
40018008	“Ani kikitesec iyoŋ akonikan kori akonikeju totubo tocaka. Ejok iyoŋ alomar nakiyar iŋwalit kori icodo, akilo ayakau ka ŋakan ŋaarei kori ŋakejen ŋaarei, ido itocakakin nakim ŋina nyeduŋe.
40018009	Ani kikitesec iyoŋ akoŋu kon, togoro tocaka. Ejok iyoŋ alomar nakiyar emam apeikoŋu akilo ayakau ŋakonyen daadaŋ, ido itocakakin nakim ŋina nyeduŋe.
40018010	“Tocoito ijamuwarete tari ipei a ŋulu cicik a lu, anerae akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, erukito ŋimalaikan kec jwi jwi ka Papa kaŋ ŋolo eyai nakuj. [
40018011	Anerae abuni Lokoku a Ituŋanan aiun ŋulu eolito.]
40018012	“Nyaanu ŋuna itamete iyes? Ani keyakar ituŋanan ŋamesekin amiat, ido tooli apei, nyeesikini mono iŋes ŋuna tomononikanikaomwon ka ŋakanikaomwon anadakar, tosodi tolot akiwarit ŋina eolit a?
40018013	Ani ŋina eryamunia iŋes amesek ŋin, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, elakar iŋes nooi aŋuna atakanunia amesek ŋin akilo ŋuna tomonikanikaomwon ka ŋakanikaomwon ŋuna pa aolito.
40018014	Ikwaŋinapei ikoŋin, nyecamit Papa kus ŋolo anakuj atemar tooliyo ipei a ŋulu cicik a lu.
40018015	“Ani kesec lokaato kon neni kon, tolot neni keŋ kiteyenik iŋes adyakaret keŋ aneni kus make. Ani kiira iŋes ŋuna ilimok iyoŋ, iŋes atemar inyaku iyoŋ lokaato kon.
40018016	Nai ani pa kiira iŋes, ya ituŋanan ipei kori ŋiarei, ikotere kisuudata ŋituŋa ŋuluarei kori ŋuluuni ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna esecit iŋes.
40018017	Ani erae kewou akiirar ikes, tolimok atukot a Ŋikristo. Ani nabo keŋer akiirar tari ŋuna elimokini atukot ŋin, kimyek iŋes kikok aneni kon ituŋanan ŋini nyenupit ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj kori kikok ekeriran ocur.
40018018	“Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes daadaŋ kire atemar, ŋuna daadaŋ nyicamakinete iyes anakwap, nyecamakinio anakuj. Nai ŋuna icamunete iyes anakwap, ecamunio anakuj.
40018019	“Nabo akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ani kecamunosi ŋiarei alokidiŋ kus anakwap, aŋuna a ibore a ŋini ilipasi ikes, itiyakini Papa kaŋ ŋolo anakuj neni kec.
40018020	Anerae neni ecunakin ŋiarei kori ŋiuni alokiro kaŋ, ayakaun ayoŋ kidiŋ kec.”
40018021	Bu Petero neni ayai Yesu kiŋit iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ŋarwa ŋayai itemokino ayoŋ esyoniyo lokaato kaŋ kesec neni kaŋ? Ŋarwa ŋakanikaarei a?”
40018022	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyabala ayoŋ ŋarwa ŋakanikaarei, nai ŋatomonikanikaarei ŋarwa ŋakanikaarei.
40018023	Anerae ikoni Apukan ŋina anakuj ne, ayai erwosit ŋolo acamit aanyun ŋamicae keŋ ŋuna ayakatar ŋiketiyak keŋ.
40018024	Ani isyakini iŋes etic ŋol, yaunae epei ŋolo edenit ŋitalantae ŋalipyo ŋatomon.
40018025	Aŋuna pa apedorya eketiyan ŋol akitac eden, abu ekapolon tolimu atemar togyelarae iŋes, akeeberu, ŋikeedwe ka ŋinibore ayakar iŋes daadaŋ, totacere eden.
40018026	Toryedik eketiyan alokiŋaren ekapolon todyek iŋes tema, ‘Ekapolon, inakinae kare ca adiopaki! Ataci ayoŋ eden daadaŋ.’
40018027	Tosodi ekapolon kisyoni eketiyan ŋol, kikisa tari eden, tolacak iŋes tolot.
40018028	“Nai ŋolopite alosyo eketiyan ŋolopei ŋol kiŋa, kiryamunos ka epei ŋolo edeniyorit ŋidinari ŋulu akudyoko. Kikam tomyed tema, ‘Totac eden kaŋ!’
40018029	Toryedik eketiyan ŋol alokiŋaren keŋ todyek iŋes tema, ‘Inakinae kare ca adiopaki! Ataci ayoŋ eden daadaŋ.’
40018030	“Nai abu iŋes towou, tolot kipotok iŋes mabus toenae akitodol neni etaca eden keŋ.
40018031	Ani eanyuwarete ŋiketiyak ŋuluce ŋakiro ŋun, tobul nooi toloto tolimokis ekecekapolon ŋuna daadaŋ apotu totakanut.
40018032	Tonyarau nai ekapolon eketiyan ŋol, tolimok tema, ‘Iyoŋ eketiyan ŋolo aronon, abu ayoŋ ekisa eden aŋuna ibunio iyoŋ ikidyek ayoŋ.
40018033	Pa kitemokino iyoŋ daŋ akisyon eketiyan ŋoloce ikwaŋina abunio ayoŋ ekesyon iyoŋ a?’
40018034	Toŋo ekapolon nooi, kipotok iŋes mabus toenae akitodol neni etaca eden daadaŋ.”
40018035	Toŋetak Yesu ebala, “Itiyakini Papa kaŋ ŋolo anakuj ikwaŋinapei neni kus erae pa kisyon ŋinituŋanan lokaato keŋ alotau.”
40019001	Ani kedau Yesu erwor ŋakiro ŋun, torotok alo Galileya todoka ekekwaye aŋolol Yorodan tari nakwap a Yudaya.
40019002	Kiwuapito iŋes ŋasepico a ŋituŋa ŋuna alalak, kitaŋaleu iŋes ikes aina.
40019003	Potu Ŋiparisayon ecamito akikatakin iŋes temasi, “Ecamakinito mono Ŋikisila yok ekile akilak akeeberu a ŋakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna ecamit iŋes a?”
40019004	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Nyesyoma iyes Akigiret ŋina ebala, ‘Anakisyakinet abu Akuj tosub ekile ka aberu’ ka nabo,
40019005	‘Aŋakiro a ŋun, eesikini ekile papa keŋ ka toto keŋ, kimorikinos ka akeeberu. Toruworos ŋuluarei ŋul apeikuwan ’ a?
40019006	Aŋun, nyeriŋa ikes erae ŋiarei, nai aruworosi apeikuwan. Aŋun, ŋulu emorik Akuj, nyitemokino idiotuŋanan etyaki.”
40019007	Kiŋita Ŋiparisayon iŋes temasi, “Nyo bo acamakinitor Moses ekile ainakin aberu abaruwa ŋina ke elakit ido kirit iŋes?”
40019008	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Aŋuna ka agogoŋu a ŋakyes kus, abu Moses itocamak iyes akilak ŋaberu kus. Nai amam ŋakiro ŋuna ekote ŋun anakisyakinet.
