40019009	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ŋinituŋanan elaki akeeberu tomam nyelomit aberu keŋ, tosodi kiit ace, eruwor ekaloman.”
40019010	Tolimokis ŋikasyomak Yesu temasi, “Ani kikote ŋakiro ke ekile ka aberu nen, nyitemokino akiitar.”
40019011	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyikamunito ŋakiro ŋun ŋituŋa daadaŋ mati ŋulu einakinit Akuj bon.
40019012	Anerae egelegelya ŋakiro ŋuna nyepedoryata ŋituŋa akiitanar, ŋicetuŋa idounitoe ekolupaka, ŋice itokolupanete ŋituŋa ŋuluce; ŋice nyiitanarete aŋuna ka Apukan a ŋina anakuj. Iŋes ŋini epedori acamun akitatamet na, tocamu.”
40019013	Yaut ŋituŋa ŋice ŋidwe neni a Yesu, ecamito iŋes kidokok ŋakan keŋ nakyes kec kilipak, nai kiŋenyakis ŋikasyomak ŋituŋa.
40019014	Nai tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Kimyekisi ŋidwe potu neni kaŋ. Nyiretakis ikes, anerae erae Apukan ŋina anakuj ŋina a ŋulu ikote lu.”
40019015	Kidokok nai iŋes ŋakan keŋ nakyes a ŋidwe. Ani kiterereŋ iŋes ikes, torotok a nen.
40019016	Bu epeikile neni a Yesu kiŋit iŋes tema, “Eketataman, nyo ibore ŋini ajokan ŋini itemokino ayoŋ etiya oryamunia akiyar ŋina nyedaun?”
40019017	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyo ikiŋisitor iyoŋ ayoŋ ibore ŋini ajokan? Eyai epei bon ŋolo ejok. Ani kicamit iyoŋ alomar nakiyar, kiric Ŋakiciketa.”
40019018	Kiŋit iŋes Yesu tema, “Anukiciketa?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyiar, nyilom, nyikoko, nyisudi ŋakiro!
40019019	Tokerite papa kon ka toto kon, ka tomina ekidunyet kon ikwaŋina iminar iyoŋ akonikuwan.”
40019020	Toboŋok esorokit ŋol tema, “Ericakinit ayoŋ Ŋakiciketa ŋun daadaŋ; nyo nai eriŋa akabucit ayoŋ?”
40019021	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ani kicamit iyoŋ aruwor ituŋanan ŋini ajokan nooi, tolot togyela ŋiboro ŋulu iyakar iyoŋ daadaŋ tokorak lokulyak, ibu nai ikiwuapak ayoŋ. Iryamuni iyoŋ ebari kon anakuj.”
40019022	Ani iirari esorokit ŋol ŋakiro ŋun, torotok esiliyorit, anerae abarit iŋes nooi.
40019023	Tolimok Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, etyonior nooi ekabaran alomar Napukan ŋina anakuj.
40019024	Nabo akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, epatana ekaal alomar anapedot a ŋina ke esindan akilo ekabaran alomar Napukan ŋina ka Akuj.”
40019025	Ani iirarete ŋikasyomak a Yesu ŋakiro ŋun, toumokis nooi temasi, “Ŋae bo nai eiun?”
40019026	Kitek Yesu ikes tema, “Alotuŋa nyepedorosi, nai aneni ka Akuj epedorosi ŋiboro daadaŋ.”
40019027	Tema nai Petero eboŋokini, “Kiŋolik iyoŋ, ikiesik isua ŋiboro daadaŋ ikiwuapak iyoŋ. Nyo ikiryamuni isua?”
40019028	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Kire akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, anakwap a ŋina kitete apaki ŋina iboikinor Lokoku a Ituŋanan lokicoloŋ ŋolo ka apolou keŋ anakuj, iboikinosi iyes daŋ ŋulu ikiwuapakis ayoŋ lokicoloŋo ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, atubonokin ŋatekerin ŋunatomon ka ŋaarei ŋuna a Isirael.
40019029	Nabo ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini aesiki ekeere kori ŋikaitotoi keŋ, papa keŋ, toto keŋ, aberu keŋ, ŋidwe keŋ, kori ŋamanat keŋ aŋuna kaŋ, einakinio eropit ŋolo erae amiat ŋarwa amiat, ka eryamuni akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
40019030	Nai ŋulu alalak ŋulu iŋarenete tokona, isidiyoryo; nabo ŋulu isidiyoro tokona, isiŋarenio.”
40020001	“Ikoni Apukan ŋina anakuj ekapolon ŋolo abu kisyokak taparacu anyaraun ŋituŋa ŋulutacan akitiya lomanikor keŋ ŋolo ke epiini.
40020002	Ani kecamunosi iŋes ka ŋiketiyak eropit ŋolo ka apeikoloŋit a ŋinituŋanan, kiyakiya iŋes ikes lomanikor keŋ.
40020003	Ani edoli ŋisaae ŋiuni, tolot iŋes lomaket, toanyuwa ŋituŋa ŋice ewuasi emam ibore itiyaete.
40020004	Tolimok ikes daŋ tema, ‘Apesi iyes daŋ etic lomanikor, abuni ayoŋ akitac iyes eropit ŋolo itemokino.’ Toloto nai ikes.
40020005	Ani edoli ŋisaae ŋikanikapei ka ŋikanikaomwon, toboŋo iŋes nabo kitiya ikwaŋinapei.
40020006	Ani edoli ŋisaae ŋitomon ka epei, toboŋo nabo toryamu ŋituŋa ŋice ewuasi. Kiŋit iŋes ikes, tema, ‘Kaanukiro iwuatar iyes a ne apaaran daadaŋ emam etic itiyaete?’
40020007	Toboŋokis ikes iŋes temasi, ‘Emam ro ituŋanan ikinyaraiya isua lotic.’ Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, ‘Toloto iyes daŋ etic lomanikor kaŋ ŋolo ke epiini.’
40020008	“Ani edoli eboŋ, tolimok elope ŋolo ke emanikor eketiyan keŋ ŋolo apolokinit ŋuluce tema, ‘Tonyarau ŋiketiyak totac ikes eropit kec, kisyak mono akitac ŋulu apote ekaku, totac nai ŋulu esyaunete aponare.’
40020009	Ani epote ŋiketiyak ŋulu adolunete lotic ŋisaae ŋitomon ka epei, totacae ŋinituŋanan eropit ŋolo ka apeikoloŋit.
40020010	Potu ŋituŋa ŋulu esyaunete lotic, etamete atemar kori ikitacio ikes ka eropit a ŋolo alalan; nai totacae ikes daŋ eropit ŋolo ka apeikoloŋit.
40020011	Ani eryamunete ikes eropit, togeut akiŋuruŋura neni ke elope emanikor.
40020012	Tolimokis temasi, ‘Apotu ŋituŋa lu ŋulu apote ekaku kitiyata epeisaa bon, nai etiyae isua apaaran daadaŋ erirae akoloŋ. Nyo bo itiriyania iyoŋ eropit kec ka ŋolo kosi?’
40020013	“Nai toboŋok elope emanikor epeiketiyan tema, ‘Topupok ekone, nyakamodikinit ayoŋ iyoŋ, icamunit tete iyoŋ etic ŋolo ke eropit a ŋolo ka apeikoloŋit.
40020014	Kijaa eropit kon tolot. Acamit ayoŋ ainakin ekile ŋolo abuni lomanikor ekaku eropit ŋolopei etya ŋolo kon.
40020015	Amamukar mono ayoŋ apedori ŋinakisitiyaet ŋiboro kaŋ ikwaŋina acamitor a? Kori eyai iyoŋ arakao aŋuna ka arimaanut kaŋ?’ ”
40020016	Kirikak Yesu erwor ebala, “Ŋituŋa ŋulu esidyok, eruworosi ŋulu eŋarenok ka ŋulu eŋarenok, eruworosi ŋulu esidyok.”
40020017	Ani itipe Yesu elosi Yerusalem, ya ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei nawae tolimok tema,
40020018	“Kiirasi! Ikidokari tokona iwon Yerusalem neni ipotokinere Lokoku a Ituŋanan losacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka loketatamak a Ŋikisila. Etubokinete ikes iŋes atwanare.
40020019	Ipotokinete ikes iŋes neni a ŋibukui a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, kisoloto, kibuŋata ka kibubukis lomusalaba. Nai kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni, iteyarunio iŋes alokatwak.”
40020020	Bu aberu a Sebedeo ka ŋidwe keŋ ŋuluarei neni a Yesu, toryedik alokiŋaren keŋ, kiŋit ŋuna acamit iŋes.
40020021	Kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyo icamit iyoŋ?” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Kiikinae kare ca ayoŋ aŋuna a ŋisapa kaŋ a ŋuluarei a lu, atemar, kiboikin epei teten kon ka ŋoloce kedyany kon.”
40020022	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyiyenete iyes ŋuna iŋitasi. Ipedorete iyes akimat ekopo ŋolo a ŋican ŋolo alosi ayoŋ akimat a?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ikipedori.”
40020023	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Kire imasete ekopo kaŋ, nai ŋuna ka akiboikin teten ka kedyany kaŋ, nyerae apedor kaŋ ainakin. Erae ŋakiboisyo ŋun ŋuna a ŋulu eseunit Papa kaŋ.”
40020024	Ani iirarete ŋikasyomak ŋuluce ŋulutomon ŋakiro ŋun, toŋoikis ŋikaitotoi ŋuluarei ŋul.
40020025	Tonyarau nai Yesu ŋikeekasyomak daadaŋ tolimok ikes tema, “Iyenete iyes atemar ŋikepukak a ŋakwapin ipukato ŋakwapin ka adedeŋu, ka ŋulu epolokinito ikes daŋ, ipukato ka apedor.
40020026	Nai nyitemokino ŋun totakanut aneni kus; ani ŋini ecamit apolou alokidiŋ kus, itemokino toruwor eketiyan kus.
40020027	Nabo ŋini ecamit akiŋarenikin ŋuluce alokidiŋ kus, itemokino iŋes toruwor epito kus.
40020028	Ikwaŋinapei, pa abunit Lokoku a Ituŋanan akitiyanakino, nai abunit akitiyanakin ka akijal akeekiyar tolakunere ŋulu alalak.”
40020029	Ani erotokinete Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ alo Yeriko, totupak asepic a ŋituŋa ŋina alalan iŋes.
40020030	Eboiyete ŋimudukanotin ŋiarei anawae erot. Ani iirarete ikes atemar itorunit Yesu nen, kiworout temasi, “Lokoku a Daudi, kisyoni isua!”
40020031	Kiyayakis ŋituŋa ikes akililiŋ, nai toreboros ikes kiworout nooi temasi, “Ekapolon, Lokoku a Daudi, kisyoni isua!”
40020032	Towo Yesu, tonyara ikes kiŋit tema, “Nyo icamito iyes etiyak ayoŋ neni kus?”
40020033	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ekapolon, kitekienyu ŋakosikonyen.”
40020034	Kisyoni Yesu ikes totap ŋakonyen kec, tokienyut ikes atipei, kiwuapakis iŋes.
40021001	Ani eapiyarete Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak Yerusalem, todolo Betepage, diyete emoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa. Kiyakiya Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋiarei kiŋaren,
40021002	tolimok ikes tema, “Toloto lore ŋolo eyai kiŋaren kus, iryamunete asigirya eenitae ka ikeetaok. Tolacut ikes torikut neni kaŋ.
40021003	Ani kikiŋit iyes idiotuŋanan ŋakiro ŋadi, tolimokis iŋes atemar, ‘Ekapolon iŋes iitanit ikes.’ Ecamunia iŋes ikes atipei.”
40021004	Apotu ŋakiro ŋun kitiyakin, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna koloŋ adwarit ekadwaran ebala,
40021005	“Tolimokisi ŋituŋa a Sion atemar, kiŋolikisi, ebunit Erwosit neni kus! Itiditeuna iŋes ka edokit isigirya, itaok ŋini ka asigirya.”
40021006	Toloto nai ŋikasyomak kitiyata ikwaŋina alimokinitor Yesu ikes.
40021007	Yaut ikes asigirya ka itaok keŋ neni keŋ, topetakis ŋilowi kec kidiama ŋisigirya, todoka nai Yesu kiboikin.
40021008	Topetanakis ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋikecelowi lorot, kitelut ŋice ŋaten alokito topetakis lorot.
40021009	Tocalut ŋasepico a ŋituŋa ŋuna ayakasi kiŋaren Yesu ka ŋulu ewuapito iŋes ebasi, “Osanna Lokoku a Daudi! Erereŋ ŋolo ebunit alokiro ke Ekapolon! Osanna toyai kidiama nooi!”
40021010	Ani elomari Yesu Yerusalem, kiguryakinos ŋituŋa daadaŋ alotaun temasi, “Ŋae en?”
40021011	Toboŋokis ŋasepico a ŋituŋa temasi, “Erae ŋol ekadwaran, Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret anakwap a ŋina a Galileya.”
40021012	Toloma Yesu Kai ka Akuj, kirita ŋituŋa ŋulu agyelanarete ka ŋulu agyelete ŋiboro alo Kai ka Akuj. Tobuburiyana ŋimesae a ŋulu esyecete ŋisiliŋa ka ŋikicoloŋo a ŋulu agyelanarete ŋakuryo;
40021013	tolimok ikes tema, “Igiritae Nakigireta atemar, ebala Akuj, ‘Enyarao Akai kaŋ Akai ŋinakilipet.’ Nai tokona ituruwosi iyes iŋes Akai ŋina eŋopitotor ŋikokolak.”
40021014	Potu ŋimudukanotin ka ŋikaŋwalak neni keŋ alo Kai ka Akuj, kitaŋaleu iŋes ikes.
40021015	Nai toŋoa ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila, iŋolikinete ŋakiro ŋuna ka aumokin ŋuna etiyae Yesu; ka daŋ ŋakiro ŋuna acalatar ŋidwe alo Kai ka Akuj ebasi, “Osanna Lokoku a Daudi!”
40021016	Kiŋita ikes Yesu temasi, “Ipupi iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna irworosi ikes a?” Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Apupi. Nyesyoma iyes ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta atemar, ‘Itaanyu iyoŋ ŋidwe ŋulu cicik ka ŋulu enakete akipuro ejok!’ ”
40021017	Toesik nai Yesu ikes, toloma kiŋa etaun, tolot tari Betania, toper inaa.
40021018	Ani taparacu eboŋori Yesu lotaun, tonyam akoro iŋes.
40021019	Ani iŋolikini iŋes ebobore anawae, tolot neni keŋ, nai nyeryamu idiobore, mati ŋakwii bon. Tolimok iŋes ekitoe tema, “Nyiraii nabo iyoŋ jik.” Toono ebobore atipei.
40021020	Ani iŋolikinete ŋikasyomak ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakin lokitoe, toumokis temasi, “Ekokini ebobore lo eoni atipei ai?”
40021021	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ani iyakatar iyes anupit ka nyiŋayaŋayato, itiyaete iyes ŋuna etiyak ayoŋ lobobore. Meere ŋuna bon, ilimokinete tari emoru lo atemar ‘Kiyoto a ne, kimasar nanam,’ itiyakinio.
40021022	Ŋuna daadaŋ iŋitasi iyes anakilip iryamunete, erae kiyakatar iyes anupit.”
40021023	Ani elomari Yesu Kai ka Akuj, potu ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok neni keŋ apaki ŋina etatamya iŋes, kiŋita temasi, “Anipedor iyakar iyoŋ, ŋina itiyaa ŋakiro nu? Ŋae ikiinakinit iyoŋ apedor na?”
40021024	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ekeŋisi ayoŋ daŋ iyes apeikiŋiset; ani kikiboŋokis iyes ayoŋ, akalimokini ayoŋ daŋ iyes neni ebunitor apedor ŋina etiyaa ayoŋ ŋakiro nu.
40021025	Ai abunitor akibatis a Yoana, nakuj kori lotuŋa?” Kiŋitanaros ikes make ebasi, “Ani kikitema abunit aneni ka Akuj, etemari iŋes, ‘Nyo bo pa inupitotor iyes iŋes?’
40021026	Nai kikitema abunit alotuŋa, itemokino iwon ocoito ŋituŋa, anerae enupito ikes daadaŋ atemar arae Yoana ekadwaran.”
40021027	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Nyikiyeni isua.” Toboŋok Yesu daŋ ikes tema, “Ayoŋ daŋ nyakalimokini iyes neni ebunitor apedor ŋina etiyaa ayoŋ ŋakiro nu.”
40021028	“Nyo itamete iyes? Ayai koloŋ ekile ŋolo ayakar ŋisapa ŋiarei. Tolot iŋes neni a ŋolo apolon tema, ‘Lokoku, ape kitiya lomanikor ŋolo ke epiini nakoloŋit na.’
40021029	Toboŋok edya tema, ‘Nyalosi ayoŋ.’ Nai ekaku apotu toronikis ŋuna abu iŋes tolimu, ido tolot.
40021030	Tolot ekile nabo neni a ŋolo cici, tolimok ŋakiro ŋunapei ŋun. Tocamu iŋes tema, ‘Ee papa, alosi.’ Nai abu nyelot.
40021031	Ali alosapa a ŋuluarei a ŋul abu kitiya ŋuna acamit papa keŋ?” Toboŋokis ŋituŋa temasi, “Ŋolo apolon.” Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, elomarete ŋikerirak ocur ka ŋamalaae Napukan ka Akuj eriŋa iyes.
40021032	Anerae abu Yoana Ekebatisan bu neni kus akitoodikin iyes erot ŋolo itemokino iyes kiwuapa, ipotu iyes nyinupa ŋakiro keŋ. Nai apotu ŋikerirak ocur ka ŋamalaae tonupa ŋakiro keŋ. Tari kidaut iyes aanyuwar ŋakiro ŋun, ipotu nyikiwa alotai kus tonupa iŋes.
40021033	“Kiirasi akitadapet ace. Ayai ekapolon ŋolo abu kita emanikor ŋolo a ŋikito a ŋulu ecuyo epiini, towuak awuas kiryam, tobokak akipany ŋina cuet epiini ka todukok epemu; ido kicikak neni a ŋiketeok emanikor, tolot nai iŋes nakwap ace.
40021034	Ani edoli apaki ŋina lemet, kiyakiya iŋes ŋiketiyak keŋ neni a ŋiketeok emanikor akijaun ŋaraito.
40021035	Kikamut ŋiketeok emanikor ŋipi, kibuŋata epei, toara ŋoloce ka kimasamasata ŋoloce a ŋamoru.
40021036	Kiyakiya nabo elope emanikor ŋipi ŋice ŋulu alalak ŋulu eloito ŋulu sek eyakiyarit iŋes ekiŋaren; kitiyata neni kec daŋ ikwaŋinapei.
40021037	Ekaku aŋun, kiyakiya iŋes lokoku keŋ neni a ŋiketeok emanikor ebala, ‘Ekerete ikes lokoku kaŋ.’
40021038	Nai ani iŋolikinete ŋiketeok emanikor lokoku ke elope emanikor, kirworiut make temasi, ‘Lokoku keŋ ŋol. Potu oara iŋes eruma iwon emanikor ŋolo ke epiini!’
40021039	Kikamut ŋiketeok emanikor iŋes kijukujukaasi kiŋa awuas, toarakis nen.
40021040	Nyo nai ebuni elope emanikor akitiyakin neni kec eboŋuni?”
40021041	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ebuni iŋes akiar ŋituŋa ŋulu aronok ŋul, kijokok emanikor neni a ŋiketeok a ŋice a ŋulu einakinete iŋes ŋaraito.”
40021042	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyesyoma iyes ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta atemar, ‘Amoru ŋina koloŋ aŋerete ŋikadukok, iŋes tokona itogogoŋit akai alokoona a? Ekapolon elope etiyae nu, erae ŋakiro nu ŋuna etalakarak ŋuna ikite iwon!’
40021043	“Aŋun, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, elemaryo Apukan ka Akuj aneni kus, inakinae neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu iraete ŋaraito. [
40021044	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eramakin namoru ŋin, enyilinyilaar, anikecakakin amoru ŋin kidiama ice, inyaadiyari iŋes.]”
40021045	Ani iirarete ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Ŋiparisayon ŋakitadapeta ŋun, toyenut atemar arae ikes erworor Yesu.
40021046	Nai ani ikatakinete ikes akikamun Yesu, tokuryaketa aŋuna a ŋasepico a ŋituŋa a ŋuna atamete atemar erae Yesu ekadwaran.
40022001	Kirwor nabo Yesu lotuŋa a ŋakitadapeta tema,
40022002	“Ikoni Apukan ŋina anakuj ne; ayai erwosit ŋolo abu kitemonok ŋasuban ŋuna ke ekiitanu alokoku keŋ.
40022003	Kiyakiya ŋipi keŋ anyarare ŋituŋa ŋulu anyaritae nasuban, nai apotu ŋituŋa ŋul towout aponare.
40022004	Kiyakiya nabo ŋipi keŋ ŋice, alimokin ŋulu anyaritae nasuban atemar, ‘Etemok ayoŋ akimuj, aarit ŋimoŋin ka ŋitak ŋulu atumak, etemokin ŋiboro daadaŋ; potu nasuban!’
40022005	Nai apotu ŋituŋa ŋul nyemitakis, toloto akitiya ŋikeceticisyo; tolot epei lomanikor keŋ, ŋoloce tolot lodukan keŋ.
40022006	Kikamut ŋuluce ŋipi, kibuŋata ka tobolyatar.
40022007	Toŋo erwosit nooi, kiyakiya ŋajorei keŋ, tomunyasi ŋikaarak ŋul ka kicunya etaun kec.
40022008	Tonyarau iŋes ŋipi keŋ tolimok tema, ‘Etemokin ŋasuban, nai ŋituŋa ŋulu anyaritae, nyitemokino ikes epote ne.
40022009	Toloto tokona lorotin tonyaraut nasuban ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu iryamunete iyes.’
40022010	Toloto nai ŋipi lorotin, tonyaraut ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aryamunete ikes ŋulu aronok kaapei ka ŋulu ajokak; kilelebun ŋipeyok kai ŋina ke ekiitanu.
40022011	“Nai ani elomari erwosit aanyun ŋipeyok, toanyuwa ekile ŋolo pa anapit elou ŋolo ke ekiitanu.
40022012	Kiŋit erwosit iŋes tema, ‘Ekone, ikokini iyoŋ ilomuni nege pa inapit elou ŋolo ke ekiitanu ai?’ Totakin ekile ŋol cek.
40022013	Tolimok erwosit ŋipi keŋ tema, ‘Toena iŋes ŋakan ka ŋakejen, kimasasi kiŋa nakiryonut. Kigwor aina, tokonyanak ŋikyal.’
40022014	Anerae elalak ŋulu enyaritae, nai ekudyoko ŋulu eseunio.”
40022015	Toloto Ŋiparisayon totukut alokun Yesu anakiro a ŋuna erworo.
40022016	Kiyakiyasi ŋikapolok a Ŋiparisayon ŋikasyomak kec ka ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu ka atukot a ŋina ke Erode neni a Yesu, tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Eketataman, ikiyeni isua atemar irae iyoŋ ŋolo a kire ka itatami ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna ka Akuj, nyimisit iyoŋ ŋuna etamete ŋituŋa, anerae nyityakatyakat ŋituŋa.
40022017	Tolimokinae isua ŋuna itami iyoŋ. Ikicamakinito mono Ŋikisila obukosi ocur neni ke ekepukan a Roma kori mam?”
40022018	Nai aŋuna ayenia Yesu akeceronis, tolimok ikes tema, “Iyes ŋikaŋisoswae! Kaanukiro ikilokitotor iyes ayoŋ?
40022019	Kitoodikinae cenite esiliŋ ŋolo tacet ocur.” Kitoodikis nai ikes Yesu esiliŋ.
40022020	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋolo a ŋae ereet lo ka ŋakigireta nu?”
40022021	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ŋulu ke ekepukan a Roma.” Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Inakisi ekepukan a Roma ŋini erae ikeŋ, inakis Akuj ŋini erae ŋini ka Akuj!”
40022022	Ani iirarete ikes ŋakiro ŋun, toumokis, torotokis, kimyekis Yesu.
40022023	Akoloŋit ŋinapei, potu neni a Yesu Ŋisadukayon ŋulu abasi emam ayarun,
40022024	temasi, “Eketataman, abala koloŋ Moses, ‘Ani ketwana ekile tomam ŋidwe, itemokino lokaato keŋ kirum aberu, touri ŋidwe ŋulu eruwor ŋulu a lokaato keŋ a ŋolo atwana.’
40022025	Ayakasi ŋikaitotoi ŋikanikaarei ŋulu aya ne. Kiita ŋolo kiyae, nai abu iŋes totwan nyeryamuna ŋidwe, tosodi kidoŋ aberu keŋ neni a lokaato keŋ.
40022026	Kitiyakinos ŋakiro ŋunapei neni a lokaato keŋ a ŋolo a ŋiarei, ka ŋolo a ŋiuni daŋ, tari neni a ŋolo a ŋikanikaarei.
40022027	Ani ketwaka ikes daadaŋ, totwan aberu daŋ.
40022028	Aŋun, eruwor mono aberu ŋin ŋina a ŋae, ŋina eyaruniata ŋikatwak? Anerae abu iŋes toruwor aberu a ŋikaitotoi a ŋul a daadaŋ?”
40022029	Nai toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Idyakarito iyes, anerae nyiyenete ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta kori apedor ŋina ka Akuj.
40022030	“Anerae ŋina eyaruniata ŋikatwak, ikokinete ikes ŋimalaikan ŋulu anakuj, ŋulu nyiitanarete kori nyiitanaryo.
40022031	Nabo ŋuna ka ayarun alokatwak, nyesyoma iyes ŋuna ikilimokini Akuj ebala,
40022032	‘Arae ayoŋ Akuj ŋina ka Aburaam, ka Isaka, ta ŋina a Yakobo’ a? Meere iŋes Akuj a ŋikatwak, nai Akuj a ŋulu eyarete.”
40022033	Ani iirarete ŋasepico a ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋun, toumokis aŋuna ka akitatam keŋ.
40022034	Nai ani iirarete Ŋiparisayon atemar esililiŋ Yesu Ŋisadukayon, totukokinos iwapei.
40022035	Abu epei ŋolo arae eketataman a Ŋikisila, toloku Yesu ka akiŋiset
40022036	tema, “Eketataman, anikiciket epol nooi a Lokisila?”
40022037	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Tomina Ekapolon Akuj kon ka ekonitau a daadaŋ, ka akonikiyar a daadaŋ ta a ŋakonitameta a daadaŋ.
40022038	Erae ŋin akiciket ŋina epol nooi ka ŋina eŋarenon.
40022039	Ŋina a ŋaarei daŋ, ikwaan ka ŋina ke ekiŋaren, ‘Tomina ekonikidunyet ikwaŋina iminar iyoŋ akonikuwan.’
40022040	Ŋikisila a Moses daadaŋ ka ŋakitatameta a ŋikadwarak daadaŋ eyakasi nakiciketa ŋuna arei ŋun.”
40022041	Kiŋit Yesu Ŋiparisayon eriŋa etukokina iwapei
40022042	tema, “Itamete iyes atemar ŋae erae Kristo ka Lokoku a ŋae iŋes?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Lokoku a Daudi.”
40022043	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Nyo bo nai itanyaritor Etau ŋolo ka Akuj Daudi iŋes Ekapolon? Ebala Daudi,
40022044	‘Atema Ekapolon neni ke Ekapolon kaŋ, kiboikin iyoŋ teten kaŋ, akitodol neni ewuakinia ŋikonimoi kwap ŋakejen kon.’
40022045	Ani kenyarit Daudi iŋes, ‘Ekapolon,’ ikokini nabo iŋes eruwor Lokoku a Daudi ai?”
40022046	Emam ituŋanan ŋini abu toboŋok Yesu adiokirot, anyoun akoloŋit ŋin, emam ituŋanan ŋini abu totitinyik akiŋit iŋes ŋakiro ŋadi.
40023001	Kisirwor Yesu asepic a ŋituŋa ka ŋikasyomak keŋ,
40023002	tolimok tema, “Ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon ikes einakinitae apedor ŋinakitatamet Ŋikisila a Moses.
40023003	Aŋun, kitiyata ka kiricito ŋakiro ŋuna ikitatamete ikes iyes; nai nyitiyata ŋuna itiyaete ikes, anerae nyitiyaete ikes ŋakiro ŋuna itatamete.
40023004	Isiwuokito ikes ŋulucetuŋa ŋigogoso ŋulu apotyok, ŋulu etyono akiwuok, nai nyecamito ikes akitap tari iwadio.
40023005	Itiyaete ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ecamito atemar kiŋolikis ŋituŋa ekecetic. Itopoloto ikes ŋakebei ŋuna iŋadatae ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, ŋuna etorito ikes loreetin, tonapito alokeperin daŋ. Nabo isanisanito ŋilowi kec ŋulu aoyak.
40023006	Eminasi ikes akiboyonokin lokicoloŋo ŋulu ebusak anasuban ka alosinagogae.
40023007	Ecamito ikes atemar ikimalaetei alomaketa ikwa ŋikapolok ka tonyarito ŋituŋa ikes ‘Eketataman.’
40023008	Nai nyikinyarao iyes ‘Eketataman,’ anerae irae iyes daadaŋ ŋikaitotoi ŋulu eyai eketataman epei bon.
40023009	Nabo daŋ nyibasi idiotuŋanan anakwap a na ‘Papa,’ anerae eyai iyes Papa kus epei bon ŋolo eyai nakuj.
40023010	Nyitemokino itonyarae iyes ‘Ekarikon,’ anerae eyai iyes ekarikon epei; iŋes Kristo.
40023011	Itemokino ŋini epol alokidiŋ kus toruwor ekusiketiyan.
40023012	Ituŋanan ŋini itopolooro bon, itiditeunio ka ŋini itiditeuna bon, itopolooryo.
40023013	“Nai ekaŋ iyes ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon! Ŋikaŋisoswae! Igolokis iyes ekek ŋolo ka Apukan a ŋina anakuj alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, anerae nyilomarete iyes ŋilopeyek ka iretakis ŋulu acamito alomar tooma. [
40023014	“Ekaŋ iyes ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon! Ŋikaŋisoswae! Imodiyanarete ŋiboro anakais a ŋapuseru, ka itusubuna ŋikanupak alotooma akilip kus ŋina aoyan. Iryamunete iyes atubokino ŋina apolon nooi.]
40023015	“Ekaŋ iyes, ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon! Ŋikaŋisoswae! Idokete iyes ŋanamyo kirimo nakwapin ŋuna alalak aŋuna ka aryamun ipeituŋanan bon ŋini eruwor ekewuapan kus. Ani ikiwuapakini ituŋanan ŋin iyes, kituruwosi iŋes ŋini aronon nooi, ŋini elosi nakim ŋina nyeduŋe, kilo akeeronis tari ŋina kus.
40023016	“Ekaŋ iyes, ŋikarikok ŋulu imudukaka! Ibasi iyes ebe, ‘Ani kikoŋ ituŋanan alokiro ka Akai ka Akuj emam ŋakiro, nai ani kikoŋ ituŋanan elimit ŋiboro ŋulu ka Akai a ŋina ka Akuj ŋulu itiyaunitae a egolid, imicao.’
40023017	Iyes ŋibaŋaanotin ŋulu imudukaka! Nyo epol, egolid kori Akai ka Akuj ŋina iteseguni egolid?
40023018	Ibasi nabo iyes, ‘Ani kikoŋ ituŋanan elimit Namuroet emam ŋakiro, nai kikoŋ ituŋanan elimit ainakinet ŋina eyai Namuroet imicao.’
40023019	Iyes ŋimudukanotin! Nyo epol, ainakinet kori Namuroet ŋina iteseguni ainakinet?
40023020	Aŋun, ani kikoŋ ituŋanan elimit Namuroet, ekoŋ iŋes Namuroet ka ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu eya nen;
40023021	ituŋanan daŋ ŋini ikoŋi elimit Akai ka Akuj, ekoŋ iŋes Akai ŋin ka ekoŋ daŋ Akuj ŋina iboi a nen.
40023022	Nabo ituŋanan ŋini ikoŋi elimit nakuj, ekoŋ iŋes ekicoloŋ ŋolo ipukator Akuj ka ekoŋ daŋ Akuj ŋina iboi a nen.
40023023	“Ekaŋ iyes, ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon! Ŋikaŋisoswae! Ilemianakinete iyes Akuj alemikinet apei anatomon a ŋikito a ŋulu itoboboete akimuj. Nai nyiricakinito iyes ŋakitatameta ŋuna apolok ŋuna a ŋikisila, ikwa akitiya ŋuna iyookino, akisyon, ka anupit.
40023024	Iyes ŋikarikok ŋulu imudukaka, ŋulu ilemanarete ecucut anakipi imasete, nai kilikonorete bo ekaal!
40023025	“Ekaŋ iyes, ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon! Ŋikaŋisoswae! Itesegete iyes ekopo ka asaani kiŋa bon, nai tooma kec ileleba akimuj ŋina demuna alotooma narorokanut.
40023026	Iyoŋ Eparisayot ŋolo mudukanot, kitesegu mono tooma ekopo ka asaani, ido nai kitesegu kiŋa daŋ.
40023027	“Ekaŋ iyes, ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon! Ŋikaŋisoswae! Ikote iyes ŋalyalin ŋuna ilelyatae kiwosae neni akwaŋan kiŋa kibusyata, nai tooma kec ileleba ŋakoyo a ŋikatwak ka abosis daadaŋ.
40023028	Aŋun, iyes daŋ itusubuna ŋulu iyookino alokiŋa, nai tooma kus ileleba ŋisoswae ka aronis.
40023029	“Ekaŋ iyes, ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon! Ŋikaŋisoswae! Ibokete iyes ŋalyalin ŋuna ajokak aŋuna a ŋikadwarak ka isibusito ŋalyalin a ŋulu koloŋ eyookino;
40023030	ibasi ebe, ‘Kerae koloŋ oyakas alorwa atapapaa yok, pa kikiŋarakinit isua ikes abukor ŋaokot a ŋikadwarak.’
40023031	Aŋun isuudasi iyes make, anerae icamunito atemar iraakasi ŋidwe atapapaa kus a ŋulu apotu toara ŋikadwarak.
40023032	Kitiyata nai kirikakis ŋunapei koloŋ etiyaete atapapaa kus.
40023033	Iyes ŋulu aronok ŋulu ikote ŋapomia, ikokinete iyes ibucarosi anatubokino ka anakim a ŋina nyeduŋe ai?
40023034	Aŋun, toanyutu iyes atemar ekeyakikini ayoŋ iyes ŋikadwarak, ŋikaosok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila; iarete ŋice, ibubukinete ŋice lomusalabae, ibuŋaete ŋice alosinagogae kus ka isicanete ŋice alotaunio.
40023035	Aŋakiro a ŋun, ikitubokinio iyes aŋuna iaryata ŋituŋa ŋulu iyookino ameun anaokot ka Abel, a ŋolo pa asecit, tari naokot a Sakariya alokoku a Barakia a ŋolo aarakinio kidiŋ Akai ka Akuj ka Namuroet.
40023036	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ etakanunete nanyamet na.
40023037	“Okoe Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Ŋituŋa kon ŋulu earete ŋikadwarak, tocaka a ŋamoru ŋulu iyakuunitae neni kus! Ŋarwa ŋayai acamitor ayoŋ acunakin ŋidwe kon, ikwaŋina ecunakinia akokoroit ŋimiyoi nabebenuk keŋ, nai nyikicamakis iyes ayoŋ!
40023038	Topupokisi tokona, imyekini Akuj Akai kus ŋina ka Akuj.
40023039	Anerae akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, nyikianyunete iyes ayoŋ nabo, mati kedol akoloŋit ŋina itemaryata iyes, ‘Erereŋ ŋolo ebunit alokiro a ŋolo ke Ekapolon.’ ”
40024001	Torotok Yesu alo Kai ka Akuj. Ani eriŋa elosi, potu ŋikeekasyomak kitoodikis iŋes epite ŋolo edukitere Akai ka Akuj.
40024002	Nai tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Iteete iyes ŋiboro lu daadaŋ a? Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, nyidoŋi nege tari amoru apei daŋ ŋina nyeukoryo.”
40024003	Ani iboi Yesu alomoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa, potu ŋikasyomak keŋ kiŋita iŋes aneni kec make temasi, “Tolimokinae isua apaki ŋina etakanuniata ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, nabo nyo ikitaanyuni isua abunore kon ka asalunet ŋina ka akwap?”
40024004	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Tocoito nyikimodik idiotuŋanan iyes.
40024005	Anerae epote ŋikalalak irworosi alokiro kaŋ ebasi, ‘Arae ayoŋ Kristo!’ emodikinete kitooliyosi ŋikalalak.
40024006	Ani iirarete iyes ŋijiesyo ka ŋiemuto ŋulu a ŋijiyesyo, nyikibul, anerae itemokino ŋul totakanut, nai nyitoodiunito ikes atemar adol asalunet.
40024007	Ejikinosi ŋituŋa aŋakwapin, ejikin apukan ka apukan, eyakaun ŋironia ka emaranikini akwap anakiboisyo a ŋuna egelegelya.
40024008	Nai erae ŋun daadaŋ ageunet a ŋican, ikwaŋina egeunia aberu aryeba edoli akidoun.
40024009	“Ikikamunete ikes iyes ikisican ka itaari; ikiremokinosi iyes ŋituŋa daadaŋ aŋuna ke ekiro kaŋ.
40024010	Ejamakinete ŋikalalak anupit Akuj ŋirwa ŋul, eluwonokin ŋituŋa make todiŋanakin.
40024011	Nabo epote ŋikadwarak ŋulu alalak ŋulu alyokonok, tomodikis kitooliyosi ŋikalalak.
40024012	Aŋuna elalaaror aronis, editeuni amina Akuj alotuŋa a ŋulu alalak.
40024013	Nai ŋini etitinyikini tari nasalunet, eiunio.
40024014	Itatamio Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj nakwapin daadaŋ, toyenut ŋituŋa daadaŋ, ani irikakin todolu asalunet.
40024015	“Iŋolikinete iyes ŋiboro ŋulu aronok eyakasi neni einakinitae Akuj, ikwaŋina koloŋ alimunitor ekadwaran Daniel, (toyenu ekasyoman apolou a ŋakiro a nu!)
40024016	Itemokino nai ŋulu eyakasi Yudaya, toema lomoru,
40024017	ŋini edokit akai, nyedoku kwap alemun ibore alokai keŋ;
40024018	ka ŋini eyai lomanikor, nyeboŋu aomun ekeelou.
40024019	Erokyarosi ŋakiro aneni a ŋaberu a ŋuna epotiyete kori itanakete ŋirwa ŋul!
40024020	Kilipa Akuj tomamukaun asuronot ŋin nakiporo kori akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato.
40024021	Anerae alorwa a ŋul, eyakaunosi ŋakisicaneta ŋuna nyetakanuna ŋinapei kesubia Akuj akwap tari tokona, kori nyepote nabo jik ŋican ŋul.
40024022	Nai etuuruwuan Akuj ŋirwa ŋul. Kerae nyituuruwuanit, kemam ituŋanan epuun. Nai aŋuna aminar Akuj ŋulu aseunit iŋes, abu kituuruwuan ŋirwa ŋul.
40024023	“Ani kikilimok iyes ituŋanan tema, ‘Kiŋolikisi, Kristo iŋes lo,’ kori tema, ‘Iŋes ye,’ nyinupa ŋakiro keŋ.
40024024	Anerae epote atakristo ka ŋikadwarak ŋulu alyokonok. Epote ikes akitiya ŋakitoodyanakineta ka ŋaumonokineta ŋuna ailiilok, ikotere itooliyorete tari ŋituŋa ŋulu seuna, erae kepedorete.
40024025	Topupokisi! Akalimokinit ayoŋ iyes ŋakiro nu eriŋa nyedoluno.
40024026	“Kori ani kikilimokis iyes ŋituŋa temasi, ‘Eyai iŋes ama nariet!’ nyiloto inaa, kori ani ketemasi ‘Elo!’ nyinupa.
40024027	Anerae ikoni abunore a Lokoku a Ituŋanan neni imilyaunia akimilyaunet alo Kide tari To.
40024028	Neni eyai ibore ŋini atwan, iŋes iudakin ŋataruk.
40024029	“Ani elunyari ŋican ŋulu a ŋirwa a ŋul, iryoniar akoloŋ, nyecauni elap, ecakunosi ŋikacer anakuj, nabo emaranikinete ŋisubuna daadaŋ ŋulu alokidiama.
40024030	Totakanu nai akitoodikinet a Lokoku a Ituŋanan anakuj. Ikalounete ŋibukui daadaŋ anakwap iŋolikinete Lokoku a Ituŋanan ebuni alodowuon eyakar apedor ka akica ŋina apolon nooi.
40024031	Iyakuuni iŋes ŋimalaikan keŋ apaki ŋina ekutakinere arupepe ŋina apolon, tocunakis ŋiseuna keŋ alowaetin ka akwap a daadaŋ, ameun anakisyakinet tari nasalunet.
40024032	“Toyenutu akitatamet ŋina a kire alobobore. Ani ipuriteunete ŋaten keŋ ka tolibut ŋakwii, iyenunete iyes atemar aapuu akamu.
40024033	Ikwaŋinapei, iyes daŋ ŋina iŋolikiniata ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ etakanunete, toyenutu atemar aapuu Lokoku a Ituŋanan, adolu lokekia kus.
40024034	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, nyelunyar anyamet na eriŋa nyetakanuna ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ.
40024035	Edaunosi nakuj ka akwap, nai nyedaunosi ŋakaakiro jik.
40024036	“Nai ŋuna ka akoloŋit a ŋin, kori ke esaa a ŋol, emam ituŋanan eyeni, nyeyenete tari ŋimalaikan ŋulu anakuj, kori tari Lokoku, nai mati Papa bon.
40024037	Ikokinete ŋirwa ŋulu ebunio Lokoku a Ituŋanan ŋulu koloŋ a Noa.
40024038	Anerae ŋirwa ŋul, eriŋa ŋakipi nyerapuwara akwap, apotu ŋituŋa kimuja ka tomatas. Apotu ŋikilyok kiitanasi, nabo epotonoryo ŋapesur kiitae akitodol akoloŋit ŋina alomarya Noa nataker.
40024039	Nyeanyuna ikes ŋadikiro jik tari ŋina aponiata ŋakipi tomunyasi ikes daadaŋ. Ikokini nen abunore a Lokoku a Ituŋanan.
40024040	Apaki ŋin eyakaun ŋikilyok ŋiarei lomanikor, eayo epei toesikinae ŋoloce.
40024041	Eryamunio ŋaberu ŋaarei iryeete, eayo apei kimyekinae ŋinace.
40024042	“Aŋun totenito, anerae nyiyenete iyes Akoloŋit ŋina ebunio Ekapolon kus.
40024043	Toyenutu nu, kerae toyenunite elope akai esaa ŋolo ebunio ekokolan nakwaare, kekienyit iŋes ka pa kimyekinit ekokolan ituwuokini akai keŋ.
40024044	Aŋun, itemokino iyes daŋ totenito, anerae ebuni Lokoku a Ituŋanan apaki ŋina nyitamakinitotor iyes atemar ebunio.
40024045	“Ŋae nai erae eketiyan ŋolo aoson ŋolo kikinyoma, ŋolo aseu ekapolon keŋ apolokin ŋuluceketiyak tokoranakini akimuj edoli apaki?
40024046	Erereŋ eketiyan ŋol ŋina ebunio ekeekapolon, toryamu iŋes itiyae ikoŋina!
40024047	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, iwuakini ekapolon iŋes topolok ebari keŋ daadaŋ.
40024048	Nai ani kerae iŋes eketiyan ŋolo aronon, etemari alotau keŋ, ‘Adid ekapolon kaŋ,’
40024049	togeu akibuŋa ŋiketiyak ŋuluce, kimuj ka tomatas ka ŋikamerak;
40024050	eboŋuni nai ekapolon ke eketiyan a ŋol akoloŋit ŋina nyetamunitor iŋes ka esaa ŋolo nyeyeni iŋes.
40024051	Isicani ekapolon iŋes nooi, kimorik ka ŋikaŋisoswae; kigwor aina tokonyanak ŋikyal.
40025001	“Ikoni Apukan ŋina anakuj ŋapesur ŋunatomon, ŋuna alemunete ŋitaae kec toloto akisiryam ekeitan.
40025002	Alokidiŋ kec, abaŋaaka ŋakan ka aosok ŋunacekan.
40025003	Apotu ŋuna abaŋaaka yaa ŋitaae kec, nai nyetiŋa akimyet ace.
40025004	Nai apotu ŋuna aosok yaa ŋidooli ŋulu eleleba akimyet ka ŋitaae.
40025005	Todidi ekeitan, tosodi togeut ŋapesur akilura tojotooros.
40025006	“Nai ani enaŋi kidiŋ akuwar, kiirarae ecelet ŋolo abala, ‘Topupokisi, ekeitan lo! Potu kisiryama!’
40025007	Tokyenyut nai ŋapesur ŋunatomon daadaŋ kitemokis ŋitaae kec.
40025008	Tolimokis ŋapesur ŋuna abaŋaaka ŋuna aosok temasi, ‘Inakinae isua akimyet adio, anerae edikino ŋikositaae eduŋeete.’
40025009	Toboŋokis ŋapesur ŋuna aosok temasi, ‘Mam jik! Emam ŋina ikitemokin iyes ka isua. Toloto togyelutu alodukanin.’
40025010	Ani elosito ikes akigyel akimyet, todolu ekeitan. Tolomasi iŋes ka ŋapesur ŋuna atenito kai ŋina eitare, tosodi togolokinoe ekek.
40025011	“ Ani ekaku, todolut ŋapesur ŋunace daŋ temasi, ‘Ekapolon! Ekapolon! Toŋaarae isua daŋ!’
40025012	Toboŋok ekeitan tema, ‘Emam kire jik nyakayeni ayoŋ iyes.’ ”
40025013	Kirikak Yesu ŋakiro ŋun ebala, “Totenito, anerae nyiyenete akoloŋit kori esaa.”
40025014	“Ikote ŋakiro nu ekile epei ŋolo ani eriŋa nyerotokino neni alwanan, abu tonyara ŋiketiyak keŋ daadaŋ kicikak ikes akiuryar ebari keŋ.
40025015	Inak iŋes epei ŋicweei ŋikan ŋulu ke egolid, inak ŋoloce ŋicweei ŋiarei ka inak ŋoloce epei bon. Akorakinitae ŋinituŋanan ikwaŋina itiyaa iŋes. Ani kedau akorakin, torotok.
40025016	Abu eketiyan ŋolo akorakinitae ŋicweei ŋikan tolot atipei kicurutak, toryamu ŋicweei ŋice ŋikan.
40025017	Ikwaŋinapei, eketiyan daŋ ŋolo akorakinitae ŋicweei ŋiarei, abu toryamu ŋicweei ŋice ŋiarei.
40025018	Nai ŋolo akorakinitae ecwee epei, abu tolot tobok akipany kwap, kiwua ecwee ŋolo ainakinit ekapolon keŋ iŋes.
40025019	“Kelunyar apaki ŋina aoyan, toboŋu ekapolon a ŋiketiyak a ŋul aanyun ŋamicae kec.
40025020	Bu eketiyan ŋolo akorakinitae ŋicweei ŋikan, yau ŋicweei ŋice ŋikan tolimu tema, ‘Ekapolon, ikicikakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ ŋicweei ŋikan; epoidau ayoŋ ŋicweei ŋice ŋikan.’
40025021	Tolimok ekapolon iŋes tema, ‘Ikoŋina! Irae iyoŋ eketiyan ŋolo ajokan ka ŋolo ikinyoma. Ikwaŋina ibunio iyoŋ tojokyaror anakicuruta a ŋina edit, ekewuakini iyoŋ nakicuruta ŋina apolon. Bua olakaros kaapei ka ayoŋ.’
40025022	“Bu nai ŋolo akorakinitae ŋicweei ŋiarei tolimok ekapolon tema, ‘Ekapolon, ikicikakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ ŋicweei ŋiarei; epoidau ayoŋ ŋicweei ŋice ŋiarei.’
40025023	Tolimok ekapolon iŋes tema, ‘Ikoŋina! Irae iyoŋ eketiyan ŋolo ajokan ka ŋolo ikinyoma. Ikwaŋina ibunio iyoŋ tojokyar anakicuruta a ŋina edit, ekewuakini iyoŋ nakicuruta ŋina apolon. Bua olakaros kaapei ka ayoŋ.’
40025024	“Ani ekaku, bu ŋolo akorakinitae ecwee epei, tolimok ekapolon tema, ‘Ekapolon, akayeni ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar irae ekile ŋolo atyonon. Ilemi iyoŋ aneni nyitakinit ka icuni aneni nyiekinit.
40025025	Aŋun, abu ayoŋ okuryaniar, ewua ecwee kon ŋolo ke egolid analup, iŋes lo, kijaa erae ŋolo kon.’
40025026	“Nai toboŋok ekapolon keŋ tema, ‘Irae iyoŋ eketiyan ŋolo aronon ŋolo ikalanyana! Iyeni iyoŋ atemar alemi ayoŋ aneni nyetakinit ka acuni aneni nyaekinit.
40025027	Ani kikote neni, nyo pa iwuakinia iyoŋ egolid kaŋ nabeŋki ani aboŋuni ayoŋ, oryamu kiatakin.
40025028	Tolemasi ecwee aneni keŋ, inakisi ŋolo eyakar ŋicweei ŋitomon.
40025029	Anerae ituŋanan ŋini eyakar ibore, iyatakinio tolalaar akilo ŋini sek eyakar, ituŋanan ŋini emam ibore eyakar, elemaryo tari ŋini edit ŋini sek eyakar.
40025030	Nai eketiyan ŋolo erae ekoŋinait lo, tocakasi iŋes kiŋa nakiryonut. Kigwor aina tokonyanak ŋikyal.’
40025031	“Ŋina ebunio Lokoku a Ituŋanan erae Erwosit erukito ka ŋimalaikan, iboikin lokicoloŋ keŋ ŋolo ka apedor.
40025032	Ecunakinosi ŋituŋa a ŋakwapin a daadaŋ kiŋaren keŋ. Totyak iŋes ikes ŋatyaket ŋaarei ikwaŋina etyakia ekeyokon ŋamesekin ka ŋamee.
40025033	Isibakiyari iŋes ŋamesekin teten keŋ ka ŋamee kedyany keŋ.
40025034	Etemari Erwosit isirwori ŋituŋa ŋulu aloteten keŋ, ‘Potu iyes ŋulu ikiterereŋit Papa kaŋ! Toryamut ajakaanut ŋina itemokinitoe aŋuna kus ameun anasubunet akwap.
40025035	Anerae akanyamit ayoŋ akoro, ipotu iyes ikiinakis ayoŋ akimuj. Akanyamit ayoŋ akure, ipotu iyes ikitamat ayoŋ. Agelaana ayoŋ, ipotu iyes ikijaut ayoŋ.
40025036	Aleri ayoŋ, ipotu iyes ikitanap ayoŋ; adyaka ayoŋ, ipotu iyes ikimukeut ayoŋ, akaenitae ayoŋ alomabus, ipotu ikiŋoliut ayoŋ.’
40025037	“Egeunete ŋulu iyookino aboŋokin iŋes temasi, ‘Ekapolon, ori ikianyunitor isua iyoŋ ikinyamit akoro ikisimuji, kori ikinyamit akure ikitamasi?
40025038	Ori iraakar iyoŋ egela, ikijaun, kori ileryo, ikitanapi?
40025039	Ori idyakar iyoŋ, kori ikienitere alomabus ikiŋoliun isua iyoŋ?’
40025040	Eboŋokini nai Erwosit ikes tema, ‘Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋinapaki daadaŋ iponiata iyes kitiyata nugu neni a ipei a ŋikaitotoi kaŋ a ŋulu caryo, ipotu iyes kitiyata neni kaŋ.’
40025041	“Elimokini nai iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu alokedyany keŋ tema, ‘Toloto aneni kaŋ iyes ŋulu ilamam! Toloto nakim ŋina nyeduŋe ŋina itemokinitoe aŋuna a Satan ka ŋimalaikan keŋ!
40025042	Anerae akanyamit ayoŋ akoro, nai nyikisimuja iyes ayoŋ; akanyamit akure, nai nyikitamat iyes ayoŋ.
40025043	Arae ayoŋ egela, nai ipotu iyes nyikijaut ayoŋ; aleri, nai nyikitanap iyes ayoŋ. Adyaka ka akaenitae alomabus, nai ipotu iyes nyikiŋoliut ayoŋ.’
40025044	“Eboŋokinete nai ikes daŋ temasi, ‘Ekapolon, ori ikianyunitor isua iyoŋ ikinyamit akoro kori akure, irae egela kori ileri, idyaka kori ikienitae alomabus, ido nyikiŋarakin isua iyoŋ?’
40025045	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋinapaki daadaŋ iponiata iyes nyiŋarakis ipei a ŋikaitotoi a ŋulu caryo, ipotu iyes nyikiŋarakis ayoŋ.
40025046	Ŋul ikes ecakakinio nakim ŋina nyeduŋe, nai ŋulu iyookino elomarete nakiyar ŋina nyedaun.”
40026001	Ani irikakini Yesu akitatam ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, tolimok ŋikeekasyomak tema,
40026002	“Iyenete iyes atemar edoŋ ŋirwa ŋiarei todol akoloŋit ŋina a ŋasuban a ŋuna a Paska, ŋina ipotorere Lokoku a Ituŋanan kibubukinoe lomusalaba.”
40026003	Apotu nai ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok tocunakinos kai a Kaipa a ŋolo apolokinit ŋisacaradotin;
40026004	tocamunos ikes daadaŋ amodiun Yesu, kikamuniata toara.
40026005	Nai temasi ikes, “Nyikikamu iŋes akoloŋit ŋina a Paska, ikotere nyebu aruruma alotuŋa.”
40026006	Ani imuji Yesu alo Betania alokai a Simoni a ŋolo sek adyaka atapon,
40026007	bu neni keŋ aberu ŋina aryoŋit amot ŋina ka Alabasta ŋina ayai akimyet ŋina akukunyon ŋina alal egyelit, tobukok akimyet ŋin nakou a Yesu a ŋolo emuji alomesa apaki ŋin.
40026008	Nai ani iŋolikinete ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋun, toŋoa nooi temasi, “Okoe ebalibal!
40026009	Anerae kerae togyelaritetei akimyet ŋin a ŋisiliŋa a ŋulu alalak, kekorakinitae ŋikulyak.”
40026010	Nai aŋuna ayenia Yesu ŋakiro ŋuna erworosi ikes, kiŋit tema, “Nyo icanitotor iyes aberu na? Kire etiya iŋes etic ŋolo ajokan neni kaŋ!
40026011	Anerae irukito iyes ka ŋikulyak jwi jwi, nai nyikiruki iyes ka ayoŋ jwi jwi.
40026012	Abukoki iŋes akimyet ŋina akukunyon na neni kaŋ akitemonokin anukia akuwan kaŋ.
40026013	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, neni daadaŋ anakwap itatamere Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak nu, elimoryo tari ŋuna etiya aberu na, aŋuna ka atamunitor iŋes.”
40026014	Akoloŋit ŋinapei ŋin, tolot epei a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei ŋolo anyaritae Yuda Isikariot neni a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu apolok;
40026015	kiŋit ikes tema, “Nyo ikiinakinete iyes ayoŋ, erae kepotu ayoŋ iŋes neni kus?” Tocamut ikes akitac iŋes a ŋisilipae a ŋatomoniuni.
40026016	Anyoun apaki ŋin, kiwar Yuda apaki ŋina etemokino torikorere ikes neni a Yesu.
40026017	Akoloŋit ŋina ke ekiŋaren ŋina a ŋasuban a ŋamugati aŋuna emam ŋakinyalet, potu ŋikasyomak a Yesu neni keŋ temasi, “Ai icamit iyoŋ isua etemokinioto akimuj ŋina a Paska?”
40026018	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Toloto lotaun neni a icetuŋanan, tolimokis iŋes ebe, ‘Ebala Eketataman, adol akaapaki, abuni ayoŋ ka ŋikasyomak kaŋ akinumunum ŋasuban ŋuna a Paska alokai kon.’ ”
40026019	Kitiyata ŋikasyomak keŋ ikwaŋina alimokinitor Yesu ikes, ido kitemokis Paska.
40026020	Ani edoli eboŋ, kiboikin Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei kimuja.
40026021	Ani eriŋa ikes imujete tolimu iŋes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, akalukini ayoŋ epei alokidiŋ kus.”
40026022	Tonomosi ikes ŋakiro ŋun ŋitai nooi, kiŋitiŋita iŋes a ŋipeipei ebasi, “Ekapolon, ayoŋ a?”
40026023	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Iŋes ŋolo ikimori ka ayoŋ anasaani.
40026024	Etwani Lokoku a Ituŋanan ikwaŋina igiritere Nakigireta aŋuna keŋ, nai eroko nooi ŋakiro ŋuna eryamuni ŋolo ipotori Lokoku a Ituŋanan! Kejoikinit koloŋ ekile ŋol nyidoun!”
40026025	Kiŋit Yuda ekalukinon iŋes tema, “Eketataman, ayoŋ a?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Idau iyoŋ alimun.”
40026026	Ani eriŋa ikes imujete, tolemu Yesu amugati, ani kedau akilipakin, tonyilinyili, inak ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Kijaasi, kimuja; erae na akaakuwan.”
40026027	Tolemu nabo ekopo, kitalaka Akuj, inak ikes tema, “Tomata iyes daadaŋ,
40026028	anerae erae nugu ŋaokot kaŋ, ŋaokot ŋuna ka Acamunet, ŋuna ebukoritae ikotere ŋulu alalak isyoniyo ŋasecisya.
40026029	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, nyamasi nabo ŋuna ke epiini, mati kedol akoloŋit ŋina ikimasya iwon a Napukan a Papa kaŋ.”
40026030	Toeikis nai ikes eete ŋolo kitalakaret Akuj, ido tolomasi kiŋa, toloto lomoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa.
40026031	Tolimok Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Lolo nakwaare, ielarosi iyes daadaŋ ikimyekis ayoŋ. Anerae igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Abuni ayoŋ akibuŋa ekeyokon, kielar nai esipan a ŋamesekin.’
40026032	Nai kedaun akiteyarun ayoŋ, ekeŋarenikini ayoŋ iyes Galileya.”
40026033	Tolimok Petero Yesu ka agogoŋu tema, “Nyekemyekini ayoŋ iyoŋ jik, tari kikimyekis iyoŋ ŋuluce daadaŋ!”
40026034	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, lolo nakwaare eriŋa ekokoroit nyeruuno, ipegi iyoŋ ŋapeget ŋauni atemar ikiyeni ayoŋ.”
40026035	Tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Nyapegi ayoŋ jik, tari ketemar akaaryo ayoŋ ka iyoŋ!” Apotu ŋulucekasyomak daadaŋ tolimut ŋunapei ŋun.
40026036	Toloto nai Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ neni anyaritae Getesemani, tolimok ikes a nen tema, “Kiboikinos nege eriŋa ayoŋ alosit ama akilip.”
40026037	Torukosi iŋes ka Petero ka ŋidwe a Sebedeo ŋuluarei. Togeu akibul iŋes ka kiyaloloŋ nooi.
40026038	Tolimok nai ikes tema, “Iyaloloŋi ekaatau nooi esibit eapi atwanare. Kiboikinos nege, tokienyete kaapei ka ayoŋ.”
40026039	Torotok iŋes kiŋaren iwadio, kibusokin kwap kijuuru kilip tema, “Okoe! Papa, ani kepedor, tolema ekopo ŋolo a ŋican lo aneni kaŋ. Meere nai ikwa acamitor ayoŋ, nai ikwaŋina icamitor iyoŋ.”
40026040	Toboŋo nai neni a ŋikasyomak keŋ toryamu ikes ejotoete. Kiŋit nai Yesu Petero tema, “Nyipedorete iyes akikieny ka ayoŋ epeisaa daŋ bon a?
40026041	Tokienyete ka kilipete, ikotere nyilomasi nakitemyet. Ecamit etau, nai epalag akuwan.”
40026042	Toboŋo nabo iŋes akilip tema, “Okoe! Papa, ani pa kitemokino alemar ekopo ŋolo a ŋican lo aneni kaŋ, alemar mati kamat iŋes, kitiyakin ŋuna icamit iyoŋ.”
40026043	Ani eboŋuni iŋes nabo, toryamu ikes eriŋa ejotoete, anerae abu tokuruwo ikes akikieny.
40026044	Toesik nabo Yesu ikes tolot kilip akilipet ŋina a ŋauni, kirwor ŋakiro ŋunapei sek.
40026045	Toboŋu neni a ŋikasyomak keŋ tolimok ikes tema, “Eriŋa iyes ijotoete ka ieŋunito a? Kiŋolikisi, adol esaa ŋolo ipotokinere Lokoku a Ituŋanan nakan a ŋikasecak.
40026046	Tonyoutu, oloto! Kiŋolikisi, adolu ekalukinon kaŋ!”
40026047	Ani eriŋa Yesu irworo, todolu Yuda epei alokidiŋ ŋikasyomak ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei erukito ka ŋituŋa ŋulu atiŋito ŋatumio ka ŋabiroi. Eyakuunitae ikes aneni a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok.
40026048	Aris sek ekalukinon kelimoki ŋituŋa atemar, “Ŋolo anui ayoŋ, iŋes ŋolo; kikamutu iŋes!”
40026049	Tolot Yuda neni a Yesu atipei tolimok iŋes tema, “Maata Eketataman!” Tonu iŋes.
40026050	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ekone, kitiya atipei ŋuna ibunitor iyoŋ!” Potu nai ikes kikamut Yesu ka agogoŋu.
40026051	Tolemu epei a ŋulu arukito ka Yesu atum, kitel akit ŋina ke epito a ŋolo ke esacaradoti a ŋolo apolon totubo.
40026052	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kinyakak atum kon nakuraro, anerae ŋulu daadaŋ ejiete ka atum, earyo ka atum.
40026053	Itami iyoŋ atemar nyapedori ayoŋ akiŋit Papa kaŋ kiyaku neni kaŋ atipei ŋajorei a ŋimalaikan ŋuna edeparito ŋatomon ka ŋaarei a?
40026054	Nai ani kikokis neni, iyookinosi ikwaani Ŋakigireta ŋuna igiritae ebe itemokino ŋun totakanut?”
40026055	Apaki ŋin tolimok Yesu ŋituŋa tema, “Kan nyo iponitotor iyes akikamun ayoŋ itiŋito ŋatumio ka ŋabiroi esibit arae ayoŋ ekokolan? A ŋinakoloŋit abu ayoŋ oyakaun Kai ka Akuj etatami, ipotu iyes nyikikamut ayoŋ.
40026056	Nai etiyakinosi nugu daadaŋ kiyookinotor ŋuna igirito ŋikadwarak.” Toesikis nai ŋikasyomak daadaŋ iŋes kielaros.
40026057	Torikosi ŋituŋa ŋulu ekamunete Yesu iŋes neni a Kaipa a ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi, ka neni ka Atukot a ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka neni a ŋikatukok.
40026058	Nai ewuapit Petero Yesu aneni alwana tari tooma ere ŋolo ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi. Toloma iŋes tooma, kiboikinos kaapei ka ŋisigarya idarit aanyun ŋuna itiyakinosi.
40026059	Kiwara ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Atukot daadaŋ erot ŋolo kisudokinet Yesu ŋakiro, ikotere totubokinere iŋes atwanare.
40026060	Nai nyeryamut ikes ŋakiro ŋadi daŋ, ata ŋina alalaata ŋisuudae ŋulu alyokonok. Ekaku, potu ŋiarei kiŋaren
40026061	temasi, “Abala etuŋanan lo ebe, ‘Apedori akituwor Akai ka Akuj, odukok nabo alotooma ŋirwa ŋiuni.’ ”
40026062	Tonyou Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi, kiŋit Yesu tema, “Emam iyoŋ akirot ŋina iboŋokini a? Anukiro ikisitakinitotor iyoŋ ŋituŋa lu?”
40026063	Nai kililiŋ Yesu cek. Tolimok Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi iŋes tema, “Ekesikoŋi ayoŋ iyoŋ alokiro ka Akuj a ŋina eyari, tolimokinae isua kirae iyoŋ Kristo Lokoku ka Akuj.”
40026064	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Idau iyoŋ alimun. Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, kelunyar nu, ianyuwarete Lokoku a Ituŋanan iboi aloteten Akuj ŋina alokidiama nooi ka ebunit alokidiama ŋidouwon ŋulu anakuj.”
40026065	Ŋolopeikiro, tocil Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋilowi keŋ tema, “Eyany iŋes Akuj! Nyo nabo eriŋa ikiitanitor ŋisuudae ŋice? Iirasi tokona iyes ŋiyany keŋ.
40026066	Ibasi tokona iyes ai?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Itemokino totwan.”
40026067	Kisyakis ikes akimwaanakin iŋes loreet, kibuŋata ŋice ka kibapabapata ŋice iŋes
40026068	ebasi, “Todwar iyoŋ Kristo! Ŋae ikibap iyoŋ?”
40026069	Apaki ŋin, kiboiye Petero alokiŋa aneni alapatan. Bu apeiketiyan neni ayai iŋes tema, “Irukito iyoŋ daŋ ka Yesu ŋolo alo Galileya.”
40026070	Nai topeg iŋes ŋun alokiŋaren kec daadaŋ tema, “Nyayeni ayoŋ ŋuna irworo iyoŋ.”
40026071	Ani eriŋa iŋes elosi nakan ŋina ke epuke, toanyuwa aketiyan ace iŋes, tolimok ŋulu awuasi alodiyete tema, “Arukito ekile logo ka Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret.”
40026072	Topeg nabo iŋes ŋun daŋ, kikoŋ tema, “Nyayeni ayoŋ ekile ŋol!”
40026073	Ani elunyar apaki adio, potu ŋituŋa ŋulu awuasi alodiyete temasi neni a Petero, “Kire jik, irae iyoŋ daŋ epei alokidiŋ kec, anerae itoodiunit epite ŋolo irworor iyoŋ.”
40026074	Togeu nai Petero akilama bon ka akikoŋ ebala, “Nyayeni ayoŋ ekile ŋol!” Apaki ŋinapei ŋin, toruuni ekokoroit.
40026075	Totamu nai Petero ŋakiro ŋuna alimokinit Yesu iŋes atemar, “Ani eriŋa ekokoroit nyeruuno, ipegi iyoŋ ŋapeget ŋauni atemar ikiyeni ayoŋ.” Toloma iŋes kiŋa, kigwor nooi.
40027001	Ani taparacu eriŋa akwap elilim, apotu ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok daadaŋ ka ŋikatukok totukut epite ŋoloaret Yesu.
40027002	Toena ikes iŋes torikosi inakis Pilato ŋolo awuoikinit apukan ŋina a Roma alo Yudaya.
40027003	Ani eanyuni Yuda ŋolo alukinon atemar atubokin Yesu atwanare, toronikis ŋuna kebu iŋes kitiya, tosodi kinyaka ŋisilipae ŋulutomoniuni neni a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok
40027004	ebala, “Asec ayoŋ aŋuna apwakakinia ekile ŋolo nyesecit atwanare.” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Erae ŋun ŋuna kon. Emam ŋuna ikikamunito isua a nen!”
40027005	Kimasak Yuda ŋisilipae Kai ka Akuj, toloma kiŋa; tolot nariet tomyedakin.
40027006	Kideput ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ŋisilipae ŋul temasi, “Italeo a lokisila yok akiwuakin ŋisilipae lu neni iŋadao ŋulu ka Akai ka Akuj, anerae erae ŋisilipae lu ŋulu a ŋaokot.”
40027007	Tocamut ikes atemar togyelere ŋisilipae ŋul emanikor ŋolo ke ekayan ŋamoti, tonukanakinetei ŋalyalin ŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
40027008	Aŋun, iŋes eriŋa enyaritere emanikor ŋol, “Emanikor a Ŋaokot” tari tokona.
40027009	Kiyookin nai ŋakiro ŋuna koloŋ adwarit ekadwaran Yeremiya ebala, “Tolemut ikes ŋisilipae ŋatomoniuni, ebei keŋ ŋolo atubokinito ŋituŋa a Isirael
40027010	ka inakinae ikes togyeluniata emanikor ŋolo ke ekayan ŋamoti, ikwapei ekecikakinitor Ekapolon ayoŋ.”
40027011	Towo Yesu alokiŋaren Pilato, a ŋolo abu kiŋit iŋes tema, “Irae iyoŋ erwosit a Ŋiyudayan a?” Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Ilimu iyoŋ.”
40027012	Nai nyeboŋok ŋakiro ŋuna esitakinitotor ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok iŋes.
40027013	Tolimok nai Pilato iŋes tema, “Nyipupi iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ikisitakinitere iyoŋ a?”
40027014	Nai nyeboŋok iŋes tari apeikirot. Aŋun, toumok Pilato nooi.
40027015	Anasuban a daadaŋ a ŋuna a Paska, alacanakini Pilato emabus epei ŋolo acamito ŋituŋa.
40027016	Ayai nai nen ekeworon ŋolo ayai mabus ŋolo anyaritae Baraba.
40027017	Ani kedaut ŋituŋa acunakin, kiŋit Pilato ikes tema, “Ŋae icamito iyes olacak ayoŋ aŋuna kus, Baraba kori Yesu ŋolo enyaritae Kristo?”
40027018	Anerae ayeni iŋes atemar arikunito ikes Yesu neni keŋ aŋuna ka arakaanut kec.
40027019	Ani eriŋa Pilato iboi alokicoloŋ a ŋolo etubonokinere, kiyaku aberu keŋ ŋakiro nu neni keŋ: “Nyiloma nakiro ŋuna ke ekile a ŋol, a ŋolo iyookino! Anerae ekecanito ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna bien nakwaare erujat ayoŋ aŋuna keŋ.”
40027020	Apotu ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok kitutuko ŋituŋa, tolimokis Pilato tolacak Baraba, ido toarae Yesu.
40027021	Kiŋit nabo Pilato ikes tema, “Ŋae alokidiŋ ŋuluarei lugu icamito iyes ayoŋ olacak aŋuna kus?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Baraba!”
40027022	Kiŋit Pilato ikes tema, “Ekokini nai ayoŋ Yesu ŋolo enyaritae Kristo ai?” Toboŋokis ikes daadaŋ temasi, “Kibubuk iŋes lomusalaba!”
40027023	Kiŋit Pilato ikes tema, “Anironis itiyat iŋes?” Tocelut ikes nooi ebasi, “Kibubukinoe iŋes!”
40027024	Ani eanyuni Pilato atemar, agogoŋioto ŋakiro nooi, aŋuna ageunia aruruma, tolemu ŋakipi kilota ŋakan keŋ alokiŋaren ŋituŋa tema, “Nyekekamunito ayoŋ ŋuna ka atwanare ke ekile a lo! Erae ŋun ŋuna kus!”
40027025	Toboŋokis ikes daadaŋ temasi, “Kimyekisi ŋaokot keŋ pena nakyes kosi ka ŋuna a ŋikosidwe.”
40027026	Tolacak nai Pilato Baraba aŋuna kec, kimyek iŋes Yesu kibuŋae, kipoto nai kibubukinoe lomusalaba.
40027027	Yaasi ŋisigarya ŋulu a Pilato Yesu tooma kai ŋina ke ekawuoikiniton ekepukan a Roma anakwap a ŋin, tocunun ŋisigarya daadaŋ kirimokis Yesu kidiŋ.
40027028	Tolaca iŋes, kitanapa elou ŋolo kipurat areŋan.
40027029	Toyeut nai aikit ŋina a ŋikukwa kiwuakis nakou keŋ, kiwuakis akasirimaete daŋ nakan keŋ ŋina aloteten; toryediko nai alokiŋaren keŋ tokyenatar iŋes ebasi, “Maata erwosit a Ŋiyudayan!”
40027030	Kimwaanakis ikes iŋes, tolemasi akasirimaete toramiata iŋes nakou.
40027031	Ani kedaut ikes akyenar iŋes, tolacasi elou ŋolo kipurat areŋan kitanapa ŋilowi keŋ, yaasi iŋes akibubukin lomusalaba.
40027032	Ani elomarete ikes kiŋa etaun, toryamut ecekile ŋolo abunit alo Kurene, ŋolo anyaritae Simoni, kitiŋakis iŋes akiryoŋ emusalaba a Yesu.
40027033	Ani edolete ikes nakwap ŋina anyaritae Gologota, (akeepolou iŋes atemar akwap ŋina ka akuulu,)
40027034	inakis ikes Yesu epiini ŋolo emorikinitae ka apid; ani iiri iŋes, towou akimat.
40027035	Kibubukis ikes iŋes lomusalaba, tokora ŋikeelowi ilamilamete atedor ŋini eai.
40027036	Kidoŋo ikes neni iboiyete iteete iŋes.
40027037	Egiritae kidiama akeekou ŋakiro ŋuna esitakinere iŋes ikona, “ERAE LOGO YESU ERWOSIT A ŊIYUDAYAN.”
40027038	Ekaku kibubukinoe ŋikokolak ŋice ŋiarei daŋ, epei teten keŋ ka ŋoloce kedyany.
40027039	Kimuŋumuŋa ŋulu etorunete nen ŋakyes kec iyanyete iŋes
40027040	ebasi, “Okoe! Iyoŋ ŋoon ibala ituwori Akai ka Akuj, ido todukok nabo alotooma ŋirwa ŋiuni! Toiun cenite kirae iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj! Todoku alomusalaba!”
40027041	Ŋisacaradotin daŋ ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ta ŋikatukok tokyenatar iŋes ebasi,
40027042	“Aiununui iŋes paaran ŋituŋa ŋuluce, nai tokona nyeiun iŋes bon! Nyerae mono iŋes erwosit a Ŋisirael a? Ani kedoku iŋes alomusalaba, ikinupi iwon iŋes.
40027043	Ikinyomit iŋes Akuj, toesikisi toiu Akuj iŋes tokona erae kemina iŋes, anerae ebala, ‘Arae ayoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj.’ ”
40027044	Ŋikokolak daŋ ŋulu ebubukinitoe ka iŋes, kiyanya iŋes alopite a ŋolopei.
40027045	Ameun alosaa a ŋolo a ŋikanikapei tari losaa ŋolo a ŋikanikaomwon ŋulu ka apaaran, kiryoniar akwap daadaŋ cuc.
40027046	Ani edoli ŋisaae ŋikanikaomwon, kikalou Yesu nooi tema, “Eli, Eli, lema sabakasani?” Apolou keŋ atemar, “Akuj kaŋ, Akuj kaŋ, kaanukiro ikiesikinia iyoŋ ayoŋ?”
40027047	Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu awuasi a nen temasi, “Enyarit iŋes Eliya.”
40027048	Toem atipei epei alokidiŋ kec tolemu ibore ŋini ekwaan ka acaago, kilumok lopiini ŋolo adadaŋ, toenik nakasirimaete inak iŋes kijuju.
40027049	Nai temasi ŋuluce, “Kidareu mono eteutu erae kebuni Eliya aiun iŋes!”
40027050	Kiworou nabo Yesu ke etoil a ŋolo apolon, kiridak nai.
40027051	Tocila anaŋga ŋina eneno alo Kai ka Akuj beret ageun alokidiama tari kwap. Tomaranik akwap tobwaŋabwaŋas ŋamoru.
40027052	Toŋaaros ŋalyalin toyarut ŋawat a ŋikanupak a ŋulu atwakito.
40027053	Torotokis ikes analyalin keyaru Yesu alokatwak, toloto Yerusalem toanyuwasi ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ikes a nen.
40027054	Ani eanyuni ekapolokiniton a ŋisigarya kaapei ka ŋisigarya keŋ epite ŋolo amaranikinia akwap ka ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna etiyasi, tobul ikes nooi temasi, “Kire, kerae iŋes Lokoku ka Akuj!”
40027055	Ayakasi nen ŋaberu ŋuna alalak ŋuna eteete aneni alwanan ŋuna etiyasi. Atupunete ikes iŋes alo Galileya kiŋaranakinete.
40027056	Arae ikes Maria Magadalena ka Maria toto a Yakobo ka Yosepu ta toto a ŋidwe a Sebedeo.
40027057	Ani edoli eboŋ, bu ekile ŋolo abarit ŋolo anyaritae Yosepu ŋolo anakwap a ŋina ka Arimatea. Arae iŋes daŋ ekasyoman a Yesu.
40027058	Tolot iŋes neni a Pilato, kiŋitak ainakino akuwan a Yesu. Tocamak Pilato atemar inakinae iŋes akuwan a Yesu.
40027059	Tolemu Yosepu akuwan, kilogilogak anaŋga ŋina kitete;
40027060	kiperik nalyal ŋina kitete, ŋina sek abokit iŋes nataaba aŋuna keŋ ke elope. Kikokorik amoru ŋina apolon lopuke ka alyal, torotok nai iŋes.
40027061	Eboiyete Maria Magadalena ka Maria ŋinace a epeiwae alyal.
40027062	Ani edoli akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, totukokin ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Ŋiparisayon kiŋaren Pilato
40027063	temasi, “Ekapolon, ikitamunit isua ŋuna abu ekalyokonon ŋol kirwor eriŋa eyari abala, ‘Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni, ayaruni.’
40027064	Aŋun, tolimok ŋiketeok alyal kidara ejok todol ŋirwa ŋiuni, ikotere nyelot ŋikasyomak keŋ akokoiyar akuwan keŋ, ido ekaku tolimokis ŋituŋa atemar eteyarun iŋes alokatwak. Eroniar alyokonu ŋina ke ekaku akilo ŋina sek ke ekiŋaren.”
40027065	Tolimok Pilato ikes tema, “Iyakatar iyes ŋisigarya ŋulu eteok, kiyakiyasi ikes kiteto alyal ejok lopite ŋolo ipedoryata.”
40027066	Toloto nai ikes togolo alyal ejok kimuleleiyasi, kiwuakis ŋisigarya kiteto.
40028001	Ani kelunyar akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, akiwalaret ŋina ke Esabit, apotu Maria Magadalena ka Maria ŋinace toloto aanyun alyal.
40028002	Ŋolopeikiro tomaranik akwap; bu emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon anakuj, kikokoriyo amoru nawae, kiboikin kidiama keŋ.
40028003	Anoki iŋes ikwa akimilyaunet ka akwaŋ elou keŋ kya ikwa ŋalepan.
40028004	Tobul ŋisigarya, tomaranikis kiketaros kikokis ŋituŋa ŋulu atwak.
40028005	Tolimok nai emalaika ŋaberu tema, “Nyikibul iyes, anerae ayeni ayoŋ atemar iwarito iyes Yesu ŋolo ebubukinio lomusalaba.
40028006	Emam iŋes a ne, anerae ayaru ikwaŋinapei alimunitor iŋes. Potu kiŋolikisi neni eperikinitoe iŋes.
40028007	Nai toloto atipei tolimokis ŋikasyomak keŋ atemar ayaru iŋes alokatwak ka elosi iŋes Galileya ikiŋarenikinit iyes; ianyunete iyes iŋes aina. Eŋuna adau ayoŋ alimokin iyes.”
40028008	Aŋun, torotokis ikes atipei analyal ebulit ka elakara nooi; toŋeda alimokin ŋikasyomak a Yesu ŋakiro daadaŋ.
40028009	Ŋolopeikiro, kiryamun Yesu ka ikes tolimok tema, “Toyai ekisil neni kus.” Potu ikes toryediko, totapa ŋakejen keŋ kilipa.
40028010	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyikibul, toloto tolimokisi ŋikaitotoi kaŋ toloto Galileya, akaanyuwarete ikes ayoŋ aina.”
40028011	Ani erotokinete ŋaberu, torotokis ŋisigarya daŋ ŋice ŋulu eteete alyal lotaun, kitatamikis ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna apotu totakanut.
40028012	Ani ecunakinosi ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok Natukot, tolemut ŋisiliŋa ŋulu alalak inakis ŋisigarya,
40028013	tolimokis ikes temasi, “Tolimokisi ŋituŋa atemar, ‘Apotu ŋikasyomak keŋ potu nakwaare tokokoiyasi akuwan keŋ ejotoo isua!’
40028014	Ani kiira ekapolon a Ŋiromanin ŋakiro ŋun, ikitunupi isua iŋes, nyiryamut iyes akisicanio.”
40028015	Kijaasi ŋisigarya ŋisiliŋa kiwuapa ŋakiro ŋuna alimokinitae. Ekeikina ŋakiro nu Loyudayan daadaŋ tari nakuwar na.
40028016	Toloto ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋulutomon ka epei Galileya, lomoru ŋolo sek alimokinit Yesu ikes alosit.
40028017	Ani iŋolikinete ikes iŋes, kilipa neni keŋ, nai aya ŋice ŋulu aŋayaŋayato.
40028018	Toapiya Yesu diyete kec tolimok ikes tema, “Akainakin ayoŋ apedor daadaŋ ŋina anakuj ka ŋina alokwap.
40028019	Aŋun, toloto kituruwosi ŋituŋa a ŋakwapin a daadaŋ ŋikasyomak kaŋ, kibatisata ikes alokiro a Papa ka a ŋolo a Lokoku ka a ŋolo ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan.
40028020	Kitatama ikes toyenut ka kiwuapa ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna adau ayoŋ akicikakin iyes; ka daŋ toyenete atemar ikirukit ayoŋ ka iyes ŋirwa daadaŋ tari ŋina esalunia akwap.”
41001001	Erae nugu Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna a Yesu Kristo a Lokoku ka Akuj.
41001002	Isyakinito ŋakiro nu alopite a ŋolo koloŋ adwarya Isaya ebe, “Abu Akuj tema, ‘Eyakiyari ayoŋ ekaakiyakia kiŋaren eriŋa iyoŋ nyeloto.’
41001003	Ebuni iŋes akiwor analoŋisat ebala, ‘Kitemonokisi erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon; kisidiiryata neni itori iŋes!’ ”
41001004	Tolot Yoana Ekebatisan naloŋisat akitatam ka akibatis, ebala, “Tokiwa ŋasecisya kus, ikotere ikisyoni iyes Akuj.”
41001005	Toloto neni a Yoana ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu a Yudeya ka Yerusalem; ani kedaut ikes akiki ŋakecesecisya, kibatisa iŋes ikes anaŋolol a ŋina anyaritae Yorodan.
41001006	Anapit Yoana elou ŋolo etiyaunitae a ŋajul a ŋuna ke ekaal ka tonapite arokoba anacir keŋ, kimuji emaase ka ao analoŋisat.
41001007	Kitatam iŋes ŋituŋa tema, “Ebunit alokaku kaŋ ŋolo epol akilo ayoŋ, ŋolo nyitemokino ayoŋ tari okukokin olacak ŋarukanes ŋuna a ŋamuk keŋ.
41001008	Ekebatisae ayoŋ iyes a ŋakipi, nai ikibatisae iŋes iyes a Etau a ŋolo Asegan.”
41001009	Alorwa a ŋul, bu Yesu alore a Nasaret, anakwap a Galileya, kibatisa Yoana iŋes daŋ alo Yorodan.
41001010	Ani elomuni Yesu anakipi, toanyuwa nakuj eŋaara, bu Etau ŋolo Asegan kidiama keŋ ikoni akuri.
41001011	Ŋinapeipaki kirworik etoil anakuj ebala, “Irae iyoŋ Lokoku kaŋ ŋolo minat ŋolo alelyania ayoŋ.”
41001012	Ŋolopeikiro ya Etau Yesu naloŋisat.
41001013	Kiboi Yesu analoŋisat ŋirwa ŋatomoniomwon, kitem nai Satan iŋes. Ayakasi ŋityaŋ daŋ naloŋisat ŋin, nai apotu ŋimalaikan kiŋarakis iŋes.
41001014	Kedaun akiwuakin Yoana mabus, bu Yesu Galileya, kitatam Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Akuj,
41001015	ebala, “Adolu apaki, aapuu Apukan ka Akuj. Tokiwa ŋasecisya kus, tonupa Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak!”
41001016	Ani itori Yesu diye anam ŋina a Galileya, kiŋolik Simoni ka lokaato keŋ Anderia ecakakinete atibait nanam, anerae arae ikes ŋikekamak ŋikolya.
41001017	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ, eketuruwori ayoŋ iyes ŋikekamak ŋituŋa.”
41001018	Kimyekis ikes ŋatibae kec atipei, kiwuapakis iŋes.
41001019	Torotok iŋes kiŋaren iwadio, kiŋolik Yakobo ka Yoana, ŋidwe a Sebedeo, eyakasi nataker erucete ŋakecetibae.
41001020	Tonyarau Yesu ikes atipei, kiwuapakis nai iŋes, toesikis papa kec ka ŋiketiyak ŋulu eotyak anataker.
41001021	Tonyout Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak, toloto Kaperenaum. Ani akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, tolot Yesu losinagoga kisyak akitatam ŋituŋa.
41001022	Toumokis daadaŋ aŋuna ka akeekitatam, anerae etatami iŋes erae ŋolo eyakar apedor, meere ikwa ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila.
41001023	Keyai tooma losinagoga ekile ŋolo ekamunit ekipye, kiworou
41001024	tema, “Icamit iyoŋ akikokin isua ai, iyoŋ Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret? Ibunit iyoŋ amunyar isua a? Akayeni ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar irae epei bon ŋolo Asegan, ŋolo ka Akuj.”
41001025	Kiŋenyak Yesu ekipye tema, “Kililiŋ, tolomu alokile a lo!”
41001026	Kitamaranik nooi ekipye iŋes kidesak kwap, kiworou nooi. Apaki ŋin, tolomu ekipye aneni keŋ.
41001027	Toumokis daadaŋ, kiŋitanaros ebasi, “Anukiro nu? Erae mono akitatam na ŋina kitete a? Anerae itatami iŋes ka apedor, ka epupete tari ŋipyan ŋakeekiro!”
41001028	Kielakin atipei ŋakiro a Yesu akwap daadaŋ ŋina edunyatar Galileya.
41001029	Ŋinapeipaki alomuniata Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak alosinagoga, torukosi ka Yakobo ta Yoana kai a Simoni ka Anderia.
41001030	Toryamut nakamuran a Simoni ikamunit elekes nooi; aponi tolimokinae Yesu atipei.
41001031	Kikamu Yesu iŋes akan, kitonyou. Toŋaleu iŋes, kisyak akisimuj ikes.
41001032	Ataboŋ ŋin edoiyori akoloŋ, yaut ŋituŋa ŋikadyakak ŋulu ekamunito ŋipyan neni a Yesu.
41001033	Tocunakinos ŋituŋa ŋulu ke etaun a ŋol daadaŋ lokek ŋolo ka akai;
41001034	kitaŋaleu iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋulu adyakasi ŋidekesyo ŋulu agelegelya. Kirita daŋ ŋipyan ŋulu pa acamit iŋes elimunete adiokirot, anerae ayenete ikes iŋes.
41001035	Ani taparacu eriŋa akoloŋ nyipiripiruna, tonyou Yesu, tolot neni asilon akilip.
41001036	Toloto Simoni ka ŋikeerukitos akiwarit iŋes;
41001037	ani eryamunete iŋes temasi, “Ikiwarito iyoŋ ŋituŋa.”
41001038	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Apena lorerya ŋice alodiye a ne, ikotere etatam aina daŋ, anerae ŋakiro abunitor ayoŋ ŋun.”
41001039	Tolot nai Yesu lorerya ŋulu a Galileya daadaŋ akitatam alosinagogae, kiritana ŋipyan alotuŋa.
41001040	Bu ekile ŋolo adyaka atapon neni a Yesu, kimaima iŋes, toryedik alokiŋaren keŋ tema, “Ani kicamit iyoŋ, ipedori akitaŋaleun.”
41001041	Abu Yesu kisyoni iŋes, torwaa akeekan, totap iŋes tema, “Acamit; toŋaleu!”
41001042	Ŋolopeikiro, todaun atapon alokile a ŋol, toŋaleu iŋes.
41001043	Tolimok Yesu iŋes alosit atipei, kicik daŋ nooi tema,
41001044	“Nyilimok idiotuŋanan, nai tolot kitoodiyar neni ke esacaradoti, ikisyem iŋes iyoŋ; ido tolemu ainakinet aŋuna ka ajokun kon, ikwaŋina icikakinitor Moses, ikotere toanyunia ŋinituŋanan atemar ijoku iyoŋ.”
41001045	Nai tolot iŋes kisera ŋuna ka aŋaleun keŋ emam akuryanu, kirwor ŋakiro ŋuna alalak nooi. Todaun Yesu epite ŋololomaret lotaun ileere. Aŋun, kiboi iŋes alokiŋa etaun. Ponito ŋituŋa neni keŋ alowaetin a daadaŋ.
41002001	Kelunyarosi ŋirwa ŋice, toboŋo Yesu Kaperenaum, kiirasi nai ŋituŋa atemar eyai iŋes lore.
41002002	Potu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak nooi, kilelebun tari lokek ŋolo ka akai a ŋina etatamya Yesu ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
41002003	Kilepuleput ŋituŋa ŋiomwon ekile ŋolo alilimiyorito ŋakoyo ka akuwan neni a Yesu.
41002004	Nyepedosi ikes adolyo iŋes neni keŋ, aŋuna amamukar neni kitoro. Todokasi kidiama akai, toketasi alowae a ŋolo ayai Yesu, kiyooliyosi nai iŋes tooma.
41002005	Ani eyenuni Yesu anupit kec, tolimok ekadyakan tema, “Lokoku, esyoni ŋasecisya kon.”
41002006	Aya ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila kai ŋin. Kiŋitanaros alotai kec ebasi,
41002007	“Kaanukiro irworor ekile logo ikona? Erae ŋin akiyany Akuj, anerae emam ituŋanan epedori akisyon ŋasecisya, mati Akuj bon.”
41002008	Ani eyenuni Yesu alotau keŋ atemar etamete ikes alotai kec, kiŋit ikes tema, “Kaanukiro itamyata iyes ŋakiro ŋun alotai kus?
41002009	Nyo epatana, atemar neni ke ekaŋwalan, ‘Esyoni ŋakonisecisya’, kori atemar, ‘Tonyou, tolema akonidaket, tolot?’
41002010	Nai acamit ayoŋ iyes toyenut atemar eyakar Lokoku a Ituŋanan apedor ŋinakisyoniyet ŋasecisya anakwap.” Tosodi tolimok ekadyakan ŋol tema,
41002011	“Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, tonyou, tolema akonidaket, tolot lore!”
41002012	Tonyou nai iŋes atipei, tolema adaket keŋ iteete ŋituŋa daadaŋ. Toumokis ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋun nooi kipuro Akuj ebasi, “Okoe, nyeanyuna ŋinapei koloŋ ŋakiro nu!”
41002013	Tolot nabo Yesu lokipetot ka anam a ŋina a Galileya. Potu ŋasepico neni keŋ, togeu iŋes akitatam ikes.
41002014	Ani elosi iŋes alorot, toanyuwa ekeriran ocur ŋolo anyaritae Lepi, lokoku ka Alipayo, iboi anapis a ŋina etacere ocur. Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ”. Tonyou nai Lepi, kiwuapak Yesu.
41002015	Ani imuji Yesu alokai a Lepi, potu ŋikerirak ocur ŋulu alalak ka ŋikasecak, kiboikinos neni ayai Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ. Alalak ŋituŋa ŋulu ewuapito iŋes nooi.
41002016	Ani iŋolikinete ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋulu arae Ŋiparisayon Yesu imujete ka ŋikerirak ocur ta ŋikasecak, kiŋita ikes ŋikasyomak temasi, “Kaanukiro imujata iŋes ka ŋikerirak ocur ta ŋikasecak?”
41002017	Ani iirari Yesu akiŋiset ŋin, tema, “Nyiitanito ŋituŋa ŋulu eŋaleete emuron, nai ŋulu edyakasi. Nyabunit ayoŋ anyarare ŋulu iyookino, nai ŋikasecak”.
41002018	Alorwa a ŋulu ekanyata ŋikasyomak a Yoana ka Ŋiparisayon, potu ŋicetuŋa neni a Yesu temasi, “Kan nyo ikanyata ŋikasyomak a Yoana ka ŋulu a Ŋiparisayon akimuj, tomam nyikanyete ŋulu kon?”
41002019	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Epedorete mono ŋituŋa ŋulu enyaraunitae lokiitanu akikany eriŋa ekeitan erukito ka ikes a? Nyikanyete ikes eriŋa ekeitan erukito ka ikes.
41002020	Nai epote ŋirwa ŋulu elemarere ekeitan aneni kec. Ŋirwa ŋul nai ikanyata ikes.
41002021	“Emam ituŋanan epedori adapakin arac ŋina kitete lolou ŋoloŋorot; ani kedapaki, ecilar ŋina kitete alolou a ŋoloŋorot, kiyatakin acilat nooi.
41002022	Kori emam ituŋanan ŋini epedori atikakin ewinyiwiny lotwol ŋulu eŋorotonito; ani ketikaki, ebwaŋabwaŋaar ŋitwol, tosodi tobukor ewinyiwiny daŋ. Nai etikanakinio ewinyiwiny lotwol ŋulu kitet.”
41002023	Apeipaaran ŋina araakar akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, kitoro Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak lomanikor a ŋimomwa. Kisyakis ŋikasyomak keŋ agyere ŋimomwa tolosete.
41002024	Kiŋita Ŋiparisayon iŋes temasi, “Toanyuwa! Nyo itiyaata ŋikasyomak kon ŋuna italeo akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato?”
41002025	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyesyoma iyes ŋuna abu Daudi kitiya lotuŋa keŋ apaki ŋina anyamitor ikes akoro a?
41002026	Ŋina abunio iŋes toloma kai ŋinakilipet Akuj, ŋirwa ŋulu araakar Abiasar Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi, bu tonyam ŋamugati ŋuna ainakinitae Akuj, ŋuna acamakinitae ŋisacaradotin bon akinyam. Ani kenyam, inak ŋikeerukitos daŋ tonyama.”
41002027	Tolimok nabo Yesu ikes tema, “Asubunio Sabato aŋuna a ituŋanan, meere ituŋanan aŋuna a Sabato.
41002028	Aŋun, Lokoku a Ituŋanan iŋes erae Ekapolon tari a Sabato.”
41003001	Toloma nabo Yesu losinagoga, ayai nen ekile ŋolo amitarit akan.
41003002	Tolokut ŋituŋa iŋes kepedori akitaŋaleun ekile ŋol akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, ikotere isitakiniata iŋes.
41003003	Tonyara Yesu ekile ŋolo amitarit akan tema, “Bua kiŋaren nege.”
41003004	Kiŋit ŋituŋa tema, “Nyo ecamakinitae kitiyae akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, ŋuna ajokak kori ŋuna aronok, akiteyar kori akiar?” Kililiŋa ikes cek.
41003005	Kitek Yesu ikes daadaŋ eŋoit, kitiilito daŋ aŋuna ka aniniku a ŋakecetameta. Tolimok nai ekaŋwalan tema, “Toriyo akonikan.” Toriyo iŋes, toŋaleu akeekan.
41003006	Tolomasi Ŋiparisayon kiŋa, totukut kaapei ka ŋituŋa ŋulu ka atukot a ŋina ke Erode epite ŋoloaret Yesu.
41003007	Toloto Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak nanam, kiwuapakis ŋasepico ŋuna aponito alo Galileya, alo Yudaya,
41003008	Yerusalem, Idumea; ka anakwap a ŋina alokekwaye Yorodan ka ŋice daŋ alokidiŋ Tiro ka Sidon. Tocunun ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak neni keŋ, aŋuna sek kiiraritotor ŋuna ajokak ŋuna etiyae Yesu.
41003009	Tolimok Yesu ŋikeekasyomak akitaapuun ataker neni keŋ, ikotere nyeridyata ŋituŋa iŋes,
41003010	anerae abu iŋes kitaŋaleu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak. Todiŋuna ŋulu adyakasi daŋ ecamito akitap iŋes.
41003011	Ŋinapaki daadaŋ iŋolikiniata ŋituŋa ŋulu a ŋipyan Yesu, aramanakin ikes kiŋaren keŋ, kiworoete ebasi, “Irae iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj!”
41003012	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyikiteyan ayoŋ ŋituŋa!”
41003013	Todoka Yesu lomukura, tonyarau ŋituŋa ŋulu acamit iŋes, potu nai ŋul neni keŋ.
41003014	Toseu iŋes ŋikilyok ŋitomon ka ŋiarei, tolimok ikes tema, “Akaseu ayoŋ iyes oruko ka ayoŋ toloseneneete akitatam
41003015	ka toryamut apedor ŋina kiritanaret ŋipyan.”
41003016	Ŋirorwa a ŋikilyok a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei ikes luta: Simoni (ŋolo abu Yesu tolimok ecekiro Petero),
41003017	Yakobo ka lokaato keŋ Yoana, ŋidwe a Sebedeo, ŋulu abu Yesu tolimok ekecekiro Boanerige, (iŋes atemar ŋidwe ŋulu adedeŋ ikwa agirokinet),
41003018	Anderia, Pilipo, Batolomayo, Matayo, Tomas ka Yakobo lokoku ka Alipayo, Tadeo, Simoni ŋolo arae Eseletoit
41003019	ka Yuda Isikariot ŋolo alukini Yesu.
41003020	Tolot nai Yesu lore, tocunun nabo asepic neni keŋ, todaun iŋes ka ŋikeekasyomak apaki ŋinakimujet.
41003021	Ŋina eiraryata ŋituŋa keŋ ŋakiro ŋun, toloto arikun iŋes, anerae abasi ŋituŋa ebe ekerepik iŋes.
41003022	Tari ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋulu apote alo Yerusalem temasi, “Eyai iŋes Belesebul ŋolo isiritanari iŋes ŋipyan, ŋolo erae daŋ ekapolon a ŋipyan.”
41003023	Tonyarau nai Yesu ŋituŋa neni keŋ, kisirwor ikes a ŋakitadapeta tema, “Ikokini Satan iritari Satan ai?
41003024	Akwap ŋina etyakatyakatar ŋituŋa bon, nyepedori akicat.
41003025	Ani ketyakatyakasi ŋituŋa ŋulu ke epeikal, nyepedorete akiboi kaapei.
41003026	Ani kelosikin Satan bon, nyepedori akicat, nai esaluni.
41003027	“Emam ituŋanan ŋini epedori alomar kai a ituŋanan a ŋini agogoŋon ademar ŋikeeboro, mati mono keen elope a ŋiboro a ŋul; tosodi nai tolema ŋiboro alokai keŋ.
41003028	“Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, isyoniyo ŋasecisya a ŋituŋa daadaŋ ka ŋiyany kec.
41003029	Nai iŋes ŋini iyanyi Etau ŋolo Asegan, nyisyoniyo jik, anerae asec iŋes asecit ŋina nyisyoniyeneneo.”
41003030	Alimuni Yesu ŋun, anerae abasi ŋituŋa ŋice, “Ikamunit ekipye iŋes.”
41003031	Potu Maria ka ŋikaitotoi a Yesu, towua alokiŋa akai, kiyakiyasi nai ituŋanan anyarare Yesu.
41003032	Kiboiyete ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak anawae Yesu. Tolimokis ikes iŋes temasi, “Eyakasi toto kon ka ŋikaitotoi kon kiŋa ikinyarito iyoŋ.”
41003033	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋae toto kaŋ ka ataŋae ŋikaitotoi kaŋ?”
41003034	Kitek iŋes daadaŋ ŋulu aya nawae keŋ, tolimok tema, “Kiŋolikisi, lugu ikes erae toto kaŋ ka ŋikaitotoi kaŋ!
41003035	Aŋun, ŋini itiyae ŋuna ecamit Akuj, iŋes erae lokaato kaŋ, nakaato kaŋ ka toto kaŋ.”
41004001	Togeu nabo Yesu akitatam alodiye anam ŋina a Galileya. Potu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak nooi neni keŋ, todoka nai iŋes nataker, kiboikin. Ayai ataker nanam, toya ŋituŋa lokipetot.
41004002	Kitatam iŋes ŋakiro ŋuna alalak a ŋakitadapeta, tema anakitatam keŋ,
41004003	“Kiirasi! Abu eketan tolot aere ŋikinyom lomanikor.
41004004	Ani eekini iŋes, todoto ŋikinyom ŋice lorot, potu ŋikyeny kidepasi.
41004005	Todoto ŋice loŋaro neni amam ŋalup ŋuna alalak, toruput atipei, anerae akudyoko ŋalup.
41004006	Ani enomokini akoloŋ ikes, torinyiyosi tooko.
41004007	Todoto ŋice kidiŋ ŋikukwa, toruput, nai ani epolounete ŋikukwa, toridakis ikes.
41004008	Todoto ŋice nalup ŋuna ajokak, topolout toraa, ece ŋatomoniuni, ece ŋatomonikanikapei ka ece amiat.”
41004009	Tolimok nai Yesu ikes tema, “Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki ŋuna kiiraret, kiira.”
41004010	Ani iboi Yesu aneni keŋ bon, potu ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei ta ŋituŋa ŋulu aris keyenut iŋes, kiŋita apolou ŋina a ŋakitadapeta.
41004011	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ikiinakinitae iyes ayenun ŋuna imunono ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj. Nai ŋituŋa ŋuluce itatamio a ŋakitadapeta,
41004012	ikotere ‘Ani kiŋolikis daŋ, nyeanyuwasi; ani kepuput daŋ, nyiirasi. Anerae kerae toanyuwarito ka kiirarito, keboŋorito neni ka Akuj akisyonio.’ ”
41004013	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Nyiirara iyes apolou ŋina ka akitadapet a ŋin a? Ikokinete nai iyes iirarete apolou ŋina a ŋakitadapeta a ŋunace a daadaŋ ai?
41004014	Eekini eketan ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
41004015	Ikote ŋicetuŋa ŋikinyom ŋulu apotu todoto lorot, ŋinapei iiraryata ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, bu Satan atipei, tolema ŋakiro ŋuna aris keekin neni kec.
41004016	Ikote ŋicetuŋa ŋikinyom ŋulu adoete loŋaro neni akudyoko ŋalup. Ŋinapei iiraryata ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, kijaut atipei ka alakara.
41004017	Nai emamukatar ikes ŋataagor alotooma kec ka nyeroparete; ani epote ŋican ka ŋatyokisyo aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun, toesikis ikes.
41004018	Ikote ŋicetuŋa ŋikinyom ŋulu apotu todoto tooma lokukwa; ikes ŋulu iirarete ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj,
41004019	nai amitakinit ŋuna ka akwap, ekibure ŋolo ke ebari, ka ekibure ŋolo a ŋiboro a daadaŋ, elomunete tooma toridakis ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, nyera.
41004020	Nai ŋulu adoete nalup ŋuna ajokak, ikes ŋituŋa ŋulu ani kiirasi ŋakiro tocamut, toraa; ice ŋatomoniuni, ice ŋatomonikanikapei ka ice amiat.”
41004021	Tolimok nabo Yesu ikes tema, “Eyai mono ituŋanan ŋini inokakini etaa, ido tobuburik atuba kidiama keŋ, kori kiwuak kwap ekitaada a? Nyepedori ŋun, nai ani kinokakin, iwuakinio neni ikeuna.
41004022	Anerae emam idiobore ŋini imunonitae ŋini nyisileereunio, nabo emam ŋini iwuaitae ŋini nyitatakanunio.
41004023	Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki ŋuna kiiraret, kiira!”
41004024	Tolimok nabo tema, “Tocoikisi ŋuna iiranarete iyes. Etyae daadaŋ ŋolo iinakiniata iyes ŋuluce, ikiinakinio iyes daŋ etya nenipei ka iyatakinio.
41004025	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eyakar idiobore, iyatakinio tolalaar, nai ŋini emamukar, edemaryo tari ŋini eyakar iŋes.”
41004026	Tema nai Yesu, “Ikoni Apukan ka Akuj ituŋanan ŋini eekini ŋikinyom lomanikor.
41004027	Ejotoe iŋes nakwaare, tokienyu iwalari; ŋirwa daadaŋ ŋulu ikonia iŋes nen, erupete ŋikinyom topoloete pa eyeni iŋes epoloe kec.
41004028	Erupunete ŋikinyom analup, kisyaut ŋakwii, tosodi ekaku tosurosi, toraa.
41004029	Ani ekokete, elemuni elope atipei ekileŋ tolemia; anerae adol ŋirwa ŋulu elemere.”
41004030	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Nyo isikwaanere Apukan ka Akuj? Isikwaanio kan akitadapet ani?
41004031	Ikoni iŋes icokit ŋini ikoni ŋini ke ebobore ŋini edit nooi akilo ŋicok daadaŋ anakwap, nai ani kedupakin nalup,
41004032	epoloor ekeekitoe akilo ŋikito daadaŋ. Epetari ŋaten ŋuna apolok, toduko ŋikyeny.”
41004033	Tolimonok Yesu ikes ŋakiro a ŋakitadapeta a ŋuna alalak, a ŋuna ekwaan ka ŋin, ikwaŋina apedoryata ikes akiirar.
41004034	Nyitatama iŋes ŋituŋa emam akitadapet, nai ani erae iŋes bon ka ŋikeekasyomak, kirwor ŋakiro ileerete.
41004035	Akoloŋit ŋin, kedoiyo akoloŋ, tolimok Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Apena, odokasi ekekwaye anam.”
41004036	Toesikis ŋikasyomak asepic a nen, tolomasi nataker neni ayai Yesu, yaasi ikes iŋes. Ayakasi ŋatakerin ŋace daŋ ŋuna arukitotor ikes.
41004037	Tokut ekuwuam ŋolo apolon ananam, tokuut ŋakipi, togeut akilapanakin nataker, kiburiburi akilelebun.
41004038	Apaki ŋin, ajotoe Yesu alokaku ataker anakicoloŋiet. Kitekienyut ŋikasyomak iŋes temasi, “Eketataman, nyimisit iyoŋ ikitwaki iwon a?”
41004039	Tokienyu iŋes, kiretak ekuwuam, tolimok anam tema, “Todipakin! Kinapakin!” Todipakin ekuwuam, kililiŋ akwap cek.
41004040	Kiŋit nai Yesu ikes tema, “Nyo ikuryakyata iyes? Emam iyes anupit a?”
41004041	Tobul ikes nooi, kiŋitanaros make ebasi, “Ŋae mono ekile lo, ŋolo epupete tari ekuwuam ka anam ŋakiro keŋ lo?”
41005001	Ani edolete Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak ekekwaye anam ŋina a Galileya, nakwap ŋina a Ŋigadara,
41005002	todoku iŋes anataker. Kisiryam ekile ŋolo abuni analyalin, ŋolo ekamunito ŋipyan.
41005003	Eboiyenene ekile ŋol analyalin, amam ituŋanan apedori akien iŋes tari a ŋiriko.
41005004	Ŋirwa ŋulu alalak, aeneeneo ŋakejen ka ŋakan keŋ a ŋasuwa ka ŋiriko, nai aŋedeŋede ŋiriko ka tobilibiliye ŋasuwa. Amam ituŋanan ŋini apedori akitapatanun iŋes.
41005005	Erimit iŋes ŋalyalin ka ŋimoru akuwar ka apaaran, kiworoe, toduŋuduŋo bon a ŋamoru.
41005006	Ani iŋolikini ekile ŋol Yesu eriŋa elwana, toŋed, toryedik alokiŋaren keŋ,
41005007	kiworou nooi tema, “Anukiro eya iyoŋ ka ayoŋ, Yesu Lokoku ka Akuj, a ŋina alokidiama nooi? Ekemaimai kare ca ayoŋ iyoŋ aŋuna ka Akuj ebe, nyikisican kare ca!”
41005008	(Alimuni iŋes ŋun, anerae abala Yesu, “Tolomutu ŋipyan alokile a lo!”)
41005009	Kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema, “Ŋae ekonikiro?” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Erae ekaakiro Ajore, anerae ikilalak isua.”
41005010	Torubak iŋes imaimai Yesu nyirita ikes anakwap a ŋin.
41005011	Toyai nen esipan a ŋipegei ŋolo adaka diye emukura.
41005012	Todyeka ŋipyan Yesu acamakin ikes tolomasi lopegei.
41005013	Tocamak nai Yesu ikes, tolomut, tolomasi lopegei. Tosuros ŋipegei, kimasaros anakope, tolomasi nanam kitamat ikes daadaŋ totwaka. Aapiyarit ekecekimar ŋalipyo ŋaarei.
41005014	Toema ŋikeyokok ŋulu a ŋipegei lorerya ka lomanikorin alimokin ŋituŋa ŋuna atakanikis lopegei. Potu nai ŋituŋa aanyun ŋuna kitiyakinosi.
41005015	Ani edolete ikes neni a Yesu, toanyuwasi ekile ŋolo sek ekamunit ajore a ŋipyan iboi alodiye Yesu, enapit ŋilowi keŋaleu. Toumokis nai ikes nooi ka tokuryanito.
41005016	Apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu keanyunito itaŋaleunio ekile ŋol, tolimokis ŋituŋa ŋuna apotu totakanikis lokile ŋolo a ŋipyan ka lopegei.
41005017	Tosodo kimaimaa ikes Yesu alosit anakwap kec.
41005018	Ani eriŋa Yesu edoki nataker, kimaima ŋolo sek ekamunito ŋipyan iŋes tema, “Kimyekinae kare ca ayoŋ orukosi ka iyoŋ!”
41005019	Nai towou Yesu tolimok iŋes tema, “Toboŋo lore neni a ŋikonikonei, tolimok ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna etiya Ekapolon neni kon, ikisyoniyo iyoŋ.”
41005020	Toboŋo nai iŋes, togeu alimonokin ŋituŋa anakwap a ŋina a ŋitaunio a ŋitomon a ŋina anyaritae Dekapoli ŋakiro ŋuna abu Yesu kitiya neni keŋ, toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
41005021	Ani kedoka Yesu ekekwaye anam, abu asepic ŋina alalan totukokin neni ayai iŋes.
41005022	Bu ekapolon ŋolo ke esinagoga daŋ epei ŋolo anyaritae Yairo. Ani iŋolikini iŋes Yesu, toramakin nakejen keŋ,
41005023	todyek iŋes nooi tema, “Eapikinit nakoku kaŋ ŋina cici atwanare. Bua kare ca kidokok ŋakonikan kidiama keŋ, ikotere toŋaleu iŋes.”
41005024	Tonyou Yesu, torukosi ka iŋes, kiwuapakis iŋes ŋituŋa eroorito alowaetin a daadaŋ.
41005025	Ayai nen aberu ŋina aleleete ŋaokot ŋikaru ŋitomon ka ŋiarei.
41005026	Abu toryamu ŋican alomurok a ŋulu alalak, kisunyak ŋikeeboro lomurok; nai nyeŋaleu jik.
41005027	Kiirarit sek iŋes ŋakiro ŋuna a Yesu, bu alokaku anasepic, totap elou a Yesu.
41005028	Aŋuna sek atamya iŋes atemar, “Ani ca katap ŋikeelowi daŋ bon, aŋaleuni.”
41005029	Totap iŋes elou a Yesu, totubos ŋaokot atipei, toanyu iŋes alope atemar kaŋaleu anadyak keŋ.
41005030	Toyenu Yesu daŋ alotau keŋ atemar alot agogoŋu aneni keŋ, toboboŋ iŋes nasepic tema, “Ŋae atap elou kaŋ?”
41005031	Temasi ŋikeekasyomak neni keŋ, “Ite robo ca iyoŋ daŋ asepic ikirookinit iyoŋ, tobali iyoŋ ebe, ‘Ŋae atap elou kaŋ?’ ”
41005032	Toŋoleŋolek Yesu ecamit aanyuwar ituŋanan ŋini atapi elou keŋ.
41005033	Nai ikwaŋina ayenia aberu ŋuna apotu kitiyakin neni keŋ, bu iŋes emarani ka ebulit, toryedik alokiŋaren Yesu, tolimok iŋes ŋuna a kire daadaŋ.
41005034	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nakoku, ikitaŋaleu iyoŋ anupit kon. Toŋaleu, tolot a ekisil.”
41005035	Ani eriŋa Yesu irworo ŋun, potu ŋice alokai a Yairo, tolimokis Yairo temasi, “Atwana nakoku kon. Nyo eriŋa iyoŋ icanitor Eketataman?”
41005036	Nyemitak Yesu ŋakiro ŋuna erworosi ikes, tolimok Yairo tema, “Nyiyaloloŋ, nai tonupae ayoŋ.”
41005037	Nyecamak Yesu idiotuŋanan arukor ka iŋes, mati Petero ka Yakobo ta Yoana lokaato a Yakobo.
41005038	Potu ikes kai a Yairo neni eŋolikinia Yesu ŋituŋa iworoete, igworosi nooi.
41005039	Toloma Yesu tooma kai, kiŋit ikes tema, “Ekainyo ecelet lo? Nyo igworosi iyes? Nyetwanit ikoku, nai ejotoe.”
41005040	Tojamuwasi ikes daadaŋ ŋakiro a Yesu. Kitoloma nai Yesu ikes daadaŋ kiŋa, mati papa ka toto a ikoku, ta ŋulu sek arukitotor iŋes. Tolomasi neni aperyo ikoku.
41005041	Kikamu Yesu akan a ikoku tema, “Talita kumi,” akeepolou iŋes atemar, “Apese, akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ, tonyou!”
41005042	Tonyou apese atipei, torotok (arae ŋikeekaru ŋitomon ka ŋiarei). Apotu ŋakiro ŋun kitubulo ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
41005043	Kicikak Yesu ikes ka agogoŋu tema, “Nyeyenu idiotuŋanan ŋakiro ŋun.” Tolimok ikes ainakin iŋes adiokimuj.
41006001	Torotok Yesu a nen, tolot Nasaret, nakwap keŋ, erukito ka ŋikeekasyomak.
41006002	Ani edoli akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, kisyak iŋes akitatam alosinagoga. Toumokis ŋikalalak ŋulu apupete ŋakiro keŋ temasi, “Ai keryamunia ekile lo ŋakiro nu daadaŋ? Aniosou na ŋina einakinitae iŋes? Tari ŋiticisyo ŋulu ka akujuwuanut, itiyae iŋes.
41006003	Meere mono iŋes ekecian ŋabaoi, lokoku a Maria a? Meere ŋikaitotoi keŋ Yakobo, Yoses, Yuda ta Simoni a? Emam mono ŋakeekaitotoi keŋ a ne a?” Aŋun, toŋero ikes iŋes.
41006004	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ekerer ekadwaran anakwapin a daadaŋ, nai nyekerer anakwap keŋ, anateker keŋ ka alore keŋ.”
41006005	Nyitiya iŋes adiokujuwuanut aina, mati akidokokin ŋakeekan kidiama ŋikadyakak ŋidi, kitaŋaleu ikes.
41006006	Toumok Yesu aŋuna ka apega kec. Kirimo nai iŋes lorerya ŋulu aya nen itatami ŋituŋa.
41006007	Tonyarau Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, kiyakiya ikes a ŋiarerei. Inak ikes apedor ŋina kiritanaret ŋipyan.
41006008	Tolimok ikes tema, “Nyiya idiobore aŋuna ke erot kus, mati ebela bon, nyiya akimuj, nyiya ecwee ŋolo kilipanaret, kori nyiwuakis ŋisiliŋa locweei ŋulu alolowi kus.
41006009	Tonapa ŋamuk bon, nyirota ŋilowi.”
41006010	Tema nabo, “Ŋinakibois ilomaryata iyes kai, kiboiyoto a nen akitodol ŋina irotokinioto.
41006011	Akibois daadaŋ ŋina nyikijauniata iyes ŋituŋa, kori ewouniata akiirar iyes, totwakisi apuwa ŋina a ŋakejen kus nen, kitoodiu nen atemar esecito ikes.”
41006012	Toloto ikes kitatama ŋituŋa akiki ŋasecisya kec.
41006013	Kiritanasi ikes ŋipyan ŋulu alalak, nabo kiosanakis akimyet neni a ŋikadyakak a ŋulu alalak, kitaŋaleut ikes.
41006014	Abu erwosit Erode kiira ŋakiro ŋun, aŋuna abunio ekiro a Yesu toru nooi. Abasi ŋice, “Kiteyarun Yoana Ekebatisan alokatwak, iŋes nai eyakatar ŋiticisyo ŋulu ka apedor tooma keŋ!”
41006015	Nai abasi ŋice, “Erae iŋes Eliya,” ka abasi ŋice, “Erae iŋes ekadwaran ŋolo ikwaan ka ŋikadwarak ŋulu koloŋ.”
