41006016	Nai ŋina eirarya Erode ŋakiro ŋun, abu tema, “Yoana monopei ŋolo atubori ayoŋ akou ayaru a?”
41006017	Anerae sek abu Erode kiyakiya ŋituŋa akikamun Yoana, toen iŋes alomabus aŋuna ke Erodiya, aberu a Pilipo a lokaato keŋ, ŋina abu Erode kituruwo akeeberu.
41006018	Kikamu iŋes Yoana, anerae abu Yoana tolimok iŋes tema, “Italeo iyoŋ akituruwor aberu a lokaato kon ŋina kon!”
41006019	Aŋun, abu Erodiya toŋoik ka kiman Yoana, kiwar akiar iŋes, nai abu nyepedo.
41006020	Anerae akerit Erode Yoana, ayeni atemar arae ŋuna a kire ŋakiro ŋuna erworo Yoana ka arae iŋes ituŋanan ŋini eyookino ka ŋini ka Akuj; aŋun, emyekinit iŋes Yoana. Amina Erode akipup Yoana, erae daŋ kisiyaloloŋeneete ŋakitatameta a Yoana iŋes.
41006021	Todol nai akoloŋit ŋina ewuakinitor Erode ŋasuban ŋuna eitunitor akidouno keŋ. Tonyara Erode ŋikapolok ŋulu ka apukan keŋ, ŋikapolokinitok ŋasigarya ka ŋikapolok ŋulu yenen alo Galileya.
41006022	Tolomu nakoku ke Erodiya tooma kidoŋa, kitalaka Erode ka ŋipeyok ŋulu eboiyete ka iŋes. Tolimok Erode apese ŋin tema, “Kiŋitae ayoŋ ŋinibore daadaŋ icamit iyoŋ, akainakini.”
41006023	Kikoŋ iŋes tema, “Ŋinibore daadaŋ icamit iyoŋ, akainakini, tari kerae atyaket ŋina ke ebuku kaŋ.”
41006024	Toloma apese, tolot neni a toto keŋ, kiŋit iŋes tema, “Nyo itemokino ayoŋ eŋit erwosit?” Toboŋok toto keŋ iŋes tema, “Kiŋitakinae akou a Yoana ke Ekebatisan.”
41006025	Kiwonyak iŋes atipei neni ke erwosit tema, “Acamit akou a Yoana ke Ekebatisan iwuakinitae natuba.”
41006026	Tobul erwosit nooi, nai aŋuna ekoŋitor iŋes ka aŋuna a ŋipeyok keŋ, kitim iŋes akiŋer akikoŋiet keŋ.
41006027	Ŋolopeikiro, kiyakiya erwosit esigarit ŋolo apolokinit ŋasigarya, tolimok iŋes ayaun akou a Yoana. Tolot nai iŋes mabus, totub akou a Yoana;
41006028	yau iwuakinitae natuba, inak apese. Ya nai apese inak toto keŋ.
41006029	Ani iirarete ŋikasyomak a Yoana ŋun, potu ikes yaa akeekuwan, tonuka.
41006030	Toboŋosi Ŋikiyakia neni a Yesu, tolimokis iŋes daadaŋ ŋuna kepotu ikes kitiyata ka kitatama.
41006031	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Potu mono iyes make nawae neni asilon, kieŋut iwadio.” Anerae alalak ŋituŋa eponito ka eboŋete daŋ. Todaun ikes apaki ŋinakimujet.
41006032	Toloto ikes make neni asilon eyakasi nataker.
41006033	Toanyuwasi ŋituŋa ikes elosete, toyena, toŋeda alorerya a daadaŋ, toberaros kiŋaren.
41006034	Ani edokuni Yesu anataker, toanyuwa asepic ŋina apolon; kisyonioto iŋes ŋituŋa, anerae ekote ikes ŋamesekin ŋuna emam ekeyokon. Kisyak nai akitatam ikes ŋakiro ŋuna agelegelya.
41006035	Ani edoli eboŋ, potu ŋikasyomak a Yesu neni keŋ temasi, “Erae nege ariet ka elosi akwap akiwar;
41006036	kitoboŋo ŋituŋa, ikotere toloto lomanikorin ka lorerya ŋulu eapiyete togyelut idiobore ŋini nyamat.”
41006037	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Inakisi iyes ikes akimuj.” Temasi ikes, “Elosyo ba isua akigyel ŋamugati a ŋidinari a ŋamiae a ŋaarei, inakinae ikes kimuja?”
41006038	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋamugati ŋayai iyakatar iyes? Apesi toanyutu.” Kedaut ikes aanyun, temasi, “Ŋakan ka ŋikolya ŋiarei.”
41006039	Tema Yesu ikes, “Kisiboikisi ŋituŋa daadaŋ etukonoro neni eyakasi ŋinya ŋulu alibak.”
41006040	Kiboikinos ikes kwap a ŋatukon, ŋice a ŋamiae, ŋice a ŋatomonikan.
41006041	Kijaa nai Yesu ŋamugati ŋunakan ka ŋikolya ŋuluarei, kireo nakuj kilipak, tonyilinyili ŋamugati, inak ŋikeekasyomak akorakin natukon a ŋituŋa, tokorak nai iŋes daŋ ŋikolya ŋuluarei lotuŋa.
41006042	Kimuja ikes daadaŋ, kimwoko.
41006043	Tocununae ŋapiyanunet a ŋamugati ka ŋuna a ŋikolya ileleba ŋaditae ŋatomon ka ŋaarei.
41006044	Arae ŋituŋa ŋulu apotu kimuja ŋalipyo ŋakan.
41006045	Kedaun ŋun, kitodoka Yesu ŋikeekasyomak nataker, kisiŋaren ikes ekekwaye anam tari Betesaida, kidoŋ iŋes akitolot asepic.
41006046	Kedau iŋes ŋun, todoka lomukura akilip.
41006047	Ani edoiyori akoloŋ, ariŋa ataker eyai kidiŋ anam, toyai Yesu daŋ lokekwat nenilapat.
41006048	Toanyuwa iŋes ikes emeto ataker ka agogoŋu, anerae akutunit ekuwuam alokiŋaren kec. Ani ebai akuwar, tolot Yesu neni kec. Alosi iŋes alokidiama nakipi, ecamit akiryamun ka ikes.
41006049	Ani eanyuwarete ikes iŋes elosi alokidiama nakipi, kiworout, anerae abasi kori ekipye.
41006050	Abu ikes daadaŋ tobul nooi iŋolikinete iŋes. Kirworik Yesu atipei tema, “Nyikibul, erae ayoŋ pei!”
41006051	Todoka iŋes nataker neni ayakasi ikes, tojoŋo nai ekuwuam akikut. Toumokis ikes nooi alotai kec.
41006052	Anerae pa ayenete ikes apedor ŋina etalalaunia iŋes ŋamugati, anerae aninik ŋatameta kec.
41006053	Kedaut ikes adokar ekekwaye, todolo Genesaret, toenikis ataker lokipetot.
41006054	Ŋolopite adokuniata ikes anataker, toyena ŋituŋa Yesu atipei,
41006055	toŋeda ikes lokidunyeta kec. Kisyakis adakunun ŋikadyakak a ŋiperito kec nakibois ŋina daadaŋ ayai Yesu.
41006056	Neni daadaŋ ayakaunun Yesu, kerae lorerya, nadakarisinei, kori lotaunio, namanat kori lomaketa, adakununuyete ŋituŋa ŋikadyakak nen, kiperikis nenilapat, kilipa iŋes acamakin ŋikadyakak akitap tari ŋina erae abilet ke elou keŋ bon. Ŋulu daadaŋ apotu totapa, apotu toŋaleut.
41007001	Ani ketukokinosi Ŋiparisayon kaapei ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋice ŋulu aponito alo Yerusalem neni ayai Yesu,
41007002	apotu toanyuwasi ŋikasyomak a Yesu ŋice imujete a ŋakan a ŋuna pa elotot lopite ŋolo elosyata Ŋiparisayon.
41007003	(Anerae pa emujete Ŋiparisayon ka Ŋiyudayan ŋuluce daadaŋ, mati ilotarito ŋakecekan, a ŋina ewuapitotor ikes ŋitalyo ŋulu atapapaa kec.
41007004	Tari ŋina eboŋunioto ikes alomaket daŋ, pa emujete, mati mono kitesegut ŋakecewat. Aya nabo ŋicetalyo ŋulu alalak ŋulu ericito ikes, ikwa akilot ŋikopoi, ŋamoti ka ŋiboro ŋulu alalak ŋulukimujet daadaŋ, ŋulu etiyaunitae a ŋasuwa a ŋuna areŋak ka elosete ikes ŋikitaadae daŋ.)
41007005	Kiŋita Ŋiparisayon ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila Yesu temasi, “Kaanukiro nyiwuapitotor ŋikonikasyomak ŋitalyo ŋulu atapapaa, anerae imujete ikes eŋoryaka ŋakan?”
41007006	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Abu Isaya todwar ŋuna a ŋisoswae kus, ikwa igiritere Nakigireta atemar, ebala Akuj, ‘Eketopoloorito ayoŋ ŋituŋa lu alorwor kec, nai elwaka ŋikecetai aneni kaŋ;
41007007	nabo ilipete ikes neni kaŋ koŋin, anerae itatamete ikes ŋitalyo a ŋituŋa esibit ŋulu ka Akuj!’
41007008	Iesikis iyes Ŋakiciketa ŋuna ka Akuj, aŋuna ka akiricit ŋitalyo a ŋituŋa.”
41007009	Tolimok nabo Yesu ikes tema, “Iyenete iyes kire epite ŋolo ŋeryet ŋakiciketa ŋuna ka Akuj, ikotere iricakiniata ŋitalyo kus.
41007010	Anerae abu Moses tema, ‘Kitopoloorite papa kon ka toto kon; abu nabo iŋes tema, iŋes ŋini iceni papa keŋ kori toto keŋ, itemokino totwan jik.’
41007011	Nai ibasi iyes, ‘Ani ketema ituŋanan papa keŋ, kori toto keŋ ebe, ŋini adikino iyoŋ iryamuni aneni kaŋ, erae Koroban (iŋes atemar, ibore ŋini einakinitae Akuj)’.
41007012	Aŋun, nyeriŋa iyes icamakinete iŋes itiyae idiobore aŋuna a papa keŋ kori a toto keŋ.
41007013	Ituruwosi iyes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ŋakoŋinae aŋuna a ŋitalyo kus a ŋulu iricito iyes ka ŋice daŋ ŋulu itatamete iyes ŋulucetuŋa.”
41007014	Tonyarau nabo Yesu ŋituŋa neni keŋ, tolimok ikes tema, “Topupokinae ayoŋ, iyes daadaŋ, ido kiirasi.
41007015	Emam ibore ŋini alokiŋa ituŋanan ŋini elomari tooma keŋ, kitoroniya iŋes. Nai ibore ŋini elomuni anituŋanan, iŋes itoroniyari iŋes. [
41007016	Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki ŋuna kiiraret, kiira.]”
41007017	Torotok iŋes anasepic, toloma kai. Kiŋita ŋikeekasyomak iŋes apolou ŋina ka akitadapet a ŋin.
41007018	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ikwa iyes daŋ emam aosou ikwa ŋuluce a? Nyiyenete iyes atemar emam ibore ŋini alokiŋa ituŋanan ŋini ani keloma tooma keŋ kitoron iŋes a?
41007019	Anerae nyelomari ibore ŋin lotau keŋ, nai nakook keŋ, tosodi tolomu kiŋa.” (Alimuni Yesu ŋun akisileereunio atemar, esegak ŋamuja daadaŋ.)
41007020	Tema nabo Yesu, “Ŋinibore elomuni anituŋanan, iŋes itoroniyari ituŋanan.
41007021	Anerae alotooma ŋitai a ŋituŋa elomunete ŋatameta ŋuna aronok, adoteu, akoko, akiar,
41007022	elomi, akiŋobel, aronis, amodiyo, ekibure ŋolo aronon, arakao, akiyany, akisupa, abaŋao;
41007023	ŋun daadaŋ ikes ŋuna aronok ŋuna elomunete alotooma ituŋanan, kitoroniyasi iŋes.”
41007024	Torotok Yesu a nen, tolot nakwap ŋina a Tiro. Toloma iŋes kai, aŋuna pa acamitor toyenu idiotuŋanan atemar eyai iŋes nen, nai nyepedo iŋes akiŋop.
41007025	Ani iirari aberu ace ŋina ekamunit ekipye nakoku keŋ ŋakiro ŋuna alimitere Yesu, bu iŋes neni a Yesu atipei, toramakin nakejen keŋ.
41007026	Pa arae aberu ŋin Ayudayat, edounitoe iŋes alokitela a ŋolo anyaritae Siroponike. Kimaima iŋes Yesu akiritar ekipye aneni anakoku keŋ.
41007027	Nai tema Yesu neni keŋ, “Kimyek ŋidwe kimwoko mono, anerae nyejok alemar akimuj a ŋidwe, kimasakinae loŋokwo.”
41007028	Tolimok aberu iŋes tema, “Kire, Ekapolon, nai idepete ŋiŋokwo daŋ ŋarare ka ŋapiyanunet a ŋidwe alokwap emesa.”
41007029	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Aŋuna ka akirot a ŋin, ape tolot, alot ekipye aneni a nakoku kon.”
41007030	Tolot iŋes kai keŋ, toryamu nakoku keŋ eperi alokitaada, kelot ekipye.
41007031	Torotok Yesu nabo alokukoru a Tiro, kitor Sidon tari nanam ŋina a Galileya ka nakwap ŋina a ŋitaunio a ŋitomon, ŋina anyaritae Dekapoli.
41007032	Yaut ŋituŋa neni keŋ ekiŋim ŋolo pa apedori erwor ejok, kimaimaa ikes Yesu akidokokin akeekan kidiama keŋ.
41007033	Toriko nai Yesu ekiŋim nawae alotuŋa a ŋuluce, kiwuak ŋikeemoyo tooma naki keŋ, kimwaak ŋakimul, totap aŋajep keŋ.
41007034	Kireo kidiama, kiyeŋak nooi, tema, “Epata!” iŋes atemar, “Toŋaar!”
41007035	Toŋaar ŋaki keŋ, tolacakin aŋajep, kirworik iŋes ejok.
41007036	Kicik Yesu ikes nyelimokis idiotuŋanan, nai ani tari kicik iŋes ikes nooi, kielasi ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ecikit iŋes ikes atemar nyilimosi.
41007037	Toumokis ikes nooi temasi, “Etiya iŋes ŋiboro daadaŋ ejok, esiira ŋikiŋimanotin ka esirworik ŋulu sek nyirworosi.”
41008001	Alorwa a ŋul, tocunakin nabo asepic ace ŋina alalan. Aŋuna amamukar ikes ibore ŋini nyamat, tonyarau Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema,
41008002	“Ekesyon ayoŋ asepic, anerae ikiruk ka ayoŋ ŋirwa ŋiuni emam ibore ŋini nyamat.
41008003	Nai kemyek ayoŋ ikes toloto lorerya enyamit akoro, ilelenyi alorot, aŋuna eponitotor ŋice aneni alwanan.”
41008004	Kiŋita ŋikasyomak keŋ Yesu temasi, “Ai eryamunotor ŋamugati ŋuna itemokin ŋituŋa lu daadaŋ analoŋisat a na?”
41008005	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋamugati ŋayai iyakatar iyes?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ŋakanikaarei.”
41008006	Tolimok Yesu asepic akiboikin; tolemu ŋamugati ŋunakanikaarei, tolakar neni ka Akuj, tonyilinyili, inak ŋikeekasyomak, tokorakis lotuŋa.
41008007	Ayakatar nabo ŋikasyomak ŋikolya ŋidikudyo ŋulu cicik. Kilipak Yesu ŋulu daŋ tema, “Tokorakisi lotuŋa.”
41008008	Kimuja ikes kimwoko; tocunakis ŋikasyomak ŋapiyanunet, kilelebun ŋaditae ŋakanikaarei.
41008009	Arae ŋituŋa ŋulu emujete ŋalipyo ŋaomwon. Tolimok nai Yesu ŋituŋa alosit lorerya kec.
41008010	Ekaku a ŋun, todokasi Yesu kaapei ka ŋikeekasyomak nataker, toloto tari nakwap ŋina anyaritae Dalamanuta.
41008011	Potu Ŋiparisayon ŋice neni a Yesu, togeut akitepeg iŋes; aŋuna acamitotor alokun iŋes. Kiitana akujuwuanut ŋina itoodiunit atemar ebunit iŋes aneni ka Akuj.
41008012	Kieŋak Yesu nooi tema, “Nyo ecamitor anyamet na akujuwuanut? Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, emam akujuwuanut ace ŋina itoodikinio iŋes.”
41008013	Kimyek nai iŋes ikes a nen, torotok todoka nabo nataker, tolot ekekwaye anam.
41008014	Kebu kimuryak ŋikasyomak akiya ŋamugati ŋuna itemokino; ayaito ikes amugati apei bon nataker.
41008015	Kicik Yesu ikes tema, “Tocoikinito ŋakinyalet ŋuna a Ŋiparisayon ka ŋuna ke Erode.”
41008016	Kirworikinos ikes make temasi, “Irworo iŋes ŋun, aŋuna emamukatar iwon ŋamugati.”
41008017	Ayeni Yesu ŋakiro ŋuna erworosi ŋikasyomak, tosodi nai kiŋit ikes tema, “Nyo irworotor iyes ibaakatar emam ŋamugati iyakatar? Eriŋa iyes nyeanyuna ka nyeyenuna a? Eninik ŋakusitameta a?
41008018	Ikwapei eyakatar iyes ŋakonyen, nyiteete a? Ikwapei eyakatar iyes ŋaki, nyipupete a? Ka nyitamunito mono iyes,
41008019	apaki ŋina anyilinyilia ayoŋ ŋamugati ŋakan aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋalipyo a ŋakan a? Ŋayai ŋaditae ipotu iyes kilelebikis ŋapiyanunet?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ŋatomon ka ŋaarei.”
41008020	Kiŋit nabo Yesu ikes tema, “Ani bo ŋina paaran anyilinyilia ayoŋ ŋamugati ŋakanikaarei aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋalipyo a ŋaomwon, ŋaditae ŋayai ipotu iyes kilelebikis ŋapiyanunet?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ŋakanikaarei.”
41008021	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Eriŋa iyes nyiirara a?”
41008022	Ani edolunete ikes Betesaida, yaut ŋituŋa ŋice emudukanot neni a Yesu, kimaimaa ikes iŋes temasi, “Totap iŋes.”
41008023	Kikamu Yesu emudukanot akan, toriko nawae ere, kimwaak ŋakimul nakonyen keŋ. Kidokok ŋakeekan kidiama keŋ, kiŋit iŋes tema, “Ite iyoŋ idiobore a ?”
41008024	Kireo emudukanot kidiama tema, “Ete ayoŋ ŋituŋa; ikote ikes ŋikito, nai elosete.”
41008025	Totapak nabo Yesu ŋakeekan nakonyen ke emudukanot. Tojokut jik ŋakonyen, toanyuwa iŋes ibore daadaŋ ileere.
41008026	Tolimok nai Yesu iŋes tema, “Tolot jik lore kon, nyitor nabo Betesaida.”
41008027	Torotokis Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak tari lorerya ŋulu a Kaisaria Pilipi. Kiŋit iŋes ŋikeekasyomak alorot tema, “Ebasi mono ŋituŋa ŋae ayoŋ?”
41008028	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ebasi Yoana Ekebatisan, nai ebasi ŋice Eliya ka ŋice ebasi epei alokadwarak.”
41008029	Kiŋit iŋes ikes nabo, “Ani bo iyes, ibasi ŋae ayoŋ?” Toboŋok Petero tema, “Irae iyoŋ Kristo.”
41008030	Kicik Yesu ikes nyiteyenut iŋes idiotuŋanan.
41008031	Togeu Yesu akitatam ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Isicanio Lokoku a Ituŋanan nooi ka eŋerete iŋes ŋikatukok, ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila. Nabo earyo, nai kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni iteyarunio iŋes.”
41008032	Erworo iŋes ŋakiro ŋun ileerete. Toriko Petero Yesu nawae, kiŋenyak iŋes nooi.
41008033	Toboboŋ Yesu kiŋolik ŋikeekasyomak, kiŋenyak iŋes Petero tema, “Tolot aneni kaŋ, Satan, anerae ŋatameta kon nyeponito aneni ka Akuj, nai eponito alotuŋa.”
41008034	Tonyarau Yesu asepic ka ŋikeekasyomak, tolimok ikes tema, “Ŋinituŋanan ecamit akiwuapakin ayoŋ, itemokino iŋes toŋero bon, toryoŋ emusalaba keŋ ekewuapak ayoŋ.
41008035	Ituŋanan ŋini ecamit aiun akiyar keŋ, itotwaniari, nai ŋini itotwaniyari akiyar keŋ aŋuna kaŋ ka aŋuna a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak, eiuni.
41008036	Alipoida eryamuni ituŋanan erae keŋata akwap daadaŋ, ido kitotwaniya akeekiyar?
41008037	Nyo epedorya ituŋanan akisyeca akeekiyar?
41008038	Anerae ŋinituŋanan irumete ŋileec aŋuna kaŋ ka aŋuna a ŋakaakiro ananyamet a na a ŋina aloman ka a ŋina asecesecan; Lokoku a Ituŋanan daŋ irumete ŋileec aŋuna keŋ apaki ŋina eboŋunio iŋes ka apedor a Papa keŋ kaapei ka ŋimalaikan ŋulu ka Akuj.”
41009001	Torubak Yesu irworo ebala, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, eyakasi ne ŋulu nyiirete atwanare, eriŋa nyeanyuwara Apukan ka Akuj ebuni ka apedor.”
41009002	Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋikanikapei, ya Yesu Petero, Yakobo, ta Yoana, todokasi ikes make kidiama emoru ŋolo aoyan. Kilocokin akuwan keŋ alokiŋaren kec.
41009003	Tomilimiliata ŋikeelowi, tokwaŋiata kya, lopite ŋolo nyitokwaŋia idiotuŋanan anakwap.
41009004	Toanyuwasi ŋirukitos keŋ Eliya ka Moses irworosi ka iŋes.
41009005	Tolimok Petero Yesu tema, “Eketataman, ejok nooi iwon akiboi a nege, ikidukokini isua ŋitogoi ŋiuni, epei ŋolo kon, epei ŋolo a Moses ka epei ŋolo ke Eliya.”
41009006	Kire pa ayeni Petero ŋunalimuno, anerae abu tobul ikes nooi.
41009007	Bu edou, torapuwa ikes aribo, kirworik etoil alodou ebala, “Erae lo Lokoku kaŋ ŋolo minat, topupo iŋes.”
41009008	Toŋoleŋolekis ikes, nai nyeanyuwasi idiotuŋanan, mati Yesu bon.
41009009	Ani edokunete ikes alomoru, kicik Yesu ikes nyelimokis idiotuŋanan ŋuna apotu ikes toanyut, akitodol ŋina eyarunia Lokoku a Ituŋanan alokatwak.
41009010	Kirica ikes ŋakiro ŋun alotai kec, nai kiŋitanaros make apolou ŋina ka ayarun alokatwak.
41009011	Kiŋita ikes Yesu temasi, “Nyo ebaakatar ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila itemokino mono Eliya kisyau abunore?”
41009012	Toboŋok Yesu ikes, “Kire ebuni Eliya ekiŋaren akitemokin ŋakiro daadaŋ eriyan; nyo elimunitotor Ŋakigireta atemar eryamuni Lokoku a Ituŋanan ŋican ŋulu alalak ka eŋeryo daŋ?
41009013	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, abu Eliya, nai etiyata ŋituŋa neni keŋ ŋuna ecamito, ikwapei alimunitotor Ŋakigireta ŋakiro keŋ.”
41009014	Ani eboŋorete ikes neni a ŋikasyomak a ŋuluce, kiŋolikis asepic ŋina alalan irimokinit ŋikasyomak kidiŋ, kimocoete ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila.
41009015	Ani eanyuwarete ŋituŋa Yesu, toumokis nooi, toema kimalata iŋes.
41009016	Kiŋit Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Nyo ipeganakinotor iyes ka ikes?”
41009017	Toboŋok epei anasepic tema, “Eketataman, ayaunit ayoŋ lokoku kaŋ neni kon, ikamunit ekipye ŋolo nyisirwori iŋes.
41009018	Neni ikamunia iŋes daadaŋ, imasakini kwap, tokuut ŋikurudoi anakituk, kitoryeb ŋikyal ka kiteregegianar. Alimokinit ayoŋ ŋikasyomak kon akiritar ekipye ŋol, nai apotu nyepedosi.”
41009019	Tolimok Yesu ŋituŋa tema, “Iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu emam anupit! Ikiruki mono ayoŋ ka iyes tari ori? Akadaŋi ayoŋ iyes tari ori? Yautu edya neni kaŋ.”
41009020	Yaut nai ikes edya neni keŋ. Ŋinapei eŋolikinia ekipye Yesu, kitamaranik edya, kidesak kwap, kisibelibelok, ido tokuut ŋikurudoi anakituk keŋ.
41009021	Kiŋit Yesu papa keŋ tema, “Ŋirwa ŋiyai aya iŋes ikoni ne?” Tema papa keŋ, “Ŋinapei koloŋ ameun alokiditeu keŋ.
41009022	Ŋacepakio imasanakini iŋes nakim ka nakipi, ecamit akiar iŋes. Nai ani kipedori akiŋarakin, kisyoni isua, kiŋarakinae.”
41009023	Tema Yesu neni keŋ, “Ani kipedori a! Epedorosi ŋiboro daadaŋ aneni a ŋini enupit.”
41009024	Atipei, kikalou papa a ikoku tema, “Anupit, nai kitunupae ejok.”
41009025	Ani iŋolikini Yesu asepic emotuno, kiyayak ekipye tema, “Iyoŋ ekipye ŋolo nyisirwori ka ŋolo itikiŋimanit, akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ, tolomu alotooma keŋ; nyiloma nabo neni keŋ jik.”
41009026	Tokopo ekipye edya kimasak kwap, kikilyau edya, kirakar. Tolomu nai ekipye kiŋa, kikok edya ekatwan, temasi ŋikalalak, “Atwana!”
41009027	Nai kikamu Yesu akeekan kitonyou, towo iŋes.
41009028	Ani elomari Yesu kai, kiŋita ŋikasyomak keŋ iŋes aneni kec bon temasi, “Nyo pa ikipedorya isua akiritar ekipye ŋol?”
41009029	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyepedori ekipye ŋolo ikoni ŋol anyoun, mati ka akilip bon.”
41009030	Torotokis Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ a nen, kitoro Galileya. Nai pa acamit Yesu idiotuŋanan toyenu neni ayai iŋes,
41009031	anerae etatami Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ. Abala iŋes neni kec, “Einakinio Lokoku a Ituŋanan neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu earete iŋes; kedaut akiar, eyaruni iŋes kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni.”
41009032	Nai nyeyenut ikes ŋuna erworo Yesu, tokuryaketa daŋ akiŋit iŋes.
41009033	Todolo ikes Kaperenaum. Ani elomarete kai, kiŋit Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Anukiro takae ipegasi iyes alorot?”
41009034	Kililiŋa ikes, anerae apegasi ikes alorot ebasi, “Ŋae epol akilo?”
41009035	Kiboikin nai Yesu kwap, tonyara ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei tema, “Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini ecamit aruwor ŋini eŋarenon, itemokino toruwor iŋes ŋini esidyon ka eketiyan a daadaŋ.”
41009036	Toriku nai iŋes ikoku ŋini cici, kitowuo alokidiŋ kec, tonu iŋes, tolimok ŋikasyomak keŋ tema,
41009037	“Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini ijauni ŋidwe ŋulu cicik ikwa en alokiro kaŋ, ekejaunit ayoŋ daŋ; ka ŋini ekejaunit ayoŋ, ijaunit iŋes tari ŋini ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.”
41009038	Tema Yoana neni a Yesu ebe, “Eketataman, eŋolikinitae isua ekile iritanari ŋipyan alokiro kon, kiretakinae isua iŋes, anerae meere iŋes erukitos yok.”
41009039	Tema Yesu, “Nyiretakis iŋes, anerae nyepedori idiotuŋanan ŋini itiyae ŋuna ka aumokin alokiro kaŋ akirworor ayoŋ atipei ekaku.
41009040	Anerae ŋini nyikitepegi iwon, erae ŋini yok.
41009041	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini ikitamasi iyes ŋakipi, aŋuna iraakatar iyes ŋulu a Kristo, eryamuni iŋes eropit keŋ.”
41009042	“Ituŋanan ŋini iteseci ŋidwe ŋulu cicik ŋulu akanupito ayoŋ ikwa lu, emaikina iŋes toenikinae amoru ŋinakiryeet lomosiriŋ keŋ, kimasakinae nanam.
41009043	Ani kikitesec iyoŋ akonikan, totubo; ejok iyoŋ alomar nakiyar emam akan, akilo iyoŋ ayakau ŋakan ŋaarei, nai itocakakin nakim ŋina nyeduŋe; [
41009044	neni nyetwania ekecekurut ka neni nyeduŋeo akim.]
41009045	Ani kikitesec iyoŋ akonikeju, totubo; ejok iyoŋ alomar nakiyar emam apeikeju, akilo iyoŋ acakakino nakim ŋina nyeduŋe eya ŋakejen ŋaarei; [
41009046	neni nyetwania ekecekurut ka neni nyeduŋeo akim.]
41009047	Ani kikitesec iyoŋ akonikoŋu, togoro todita; ejok iyoŋ alomar Napukan ka Akuj emam apeikoŋu, akilo iyoŋ ayakau ŋakonyen ŋaarei, nai itocakakin nakim ŋina nyeduŋe;
41009048	neni nyetwania ekecekurut ka neni nyeduŋeo akim.
41009049	“Itojoki akim ŋinituŋanan daadaŋ, ikwaŋina itojokya acumbi akimuj.
41009050	“Ejok acumbi, nai ani kepyaniar, ikokinio nabo itasasamunio ai? Aŋun, toyakatar acumbi tooma kus ka kiboiyete daadaŋ imaasi.”
41010001	Abu Yesu torotok aina, tolot nakwap ŋina a Yudeya, todoka ekekwaye aŋolol Yorodan, totukokinos ŋasepico neni keŋ. Kitatam iŋes ikes ikwa araakar epite keŋ.
41010002	Potu Ŋiparisayon ŋice ecamito akitem Yesu, kiŋita iŋes temasi, “Ecamakinito mono Ŋikisila yok ekile akilak akeeberu a ?”
41010003	Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Alital koloŋ ikicikakinit iyes Moses?”
41010004	Temasi ikes, “Abu koloŋ Moses itocamak isua tema ebe epedori ekile akigir abaruwa ŋina ke elakit, tosodi nai totyakas ka aberu keŋ.”
41010005	Nai tema Yesu ikes, “Ikigirakinit Moses iyes ŋakiciketa ŋun aŋuna ka aniniku a ŋakusitameta.
41010006	Nai anakisyakinet akisub akwap, abu Akuj tosub ikes, ekile ka aberu.
41010007	Aŋun, eesikini ekile papa keŋ ka toto keŋ, kimorikinos ka akeeberu.
41010008	Toruworos ikes apeikuwan. Aŋun, nyeriŋa ikes erae ŋiarei, nai aruworosi apeikuwan.
41010009	Aŋun, ŋulu emorik Akuj, nyitemokino idiotuŋanan etyaki.”
41010010	Ani elomarete Yesu ka ŋikasyomak kai, kiŋita ŋikasyomak iŋes akirot ŋinapei ŋin.
41010011	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋolokile daadaŋ elaki aberu keŋ, tosodi kiit aberu ace, alom iŋes ka asec alokiŋaren aberu keŋ;
41010012	ka ani keŋer aberu ekile keŋ tocamu ekile ece, alom iŋes ka asec alokiŋaren ekile keŋ.”
41010013	Torikut ŋituŋa ŋice ŋidwe ŋulu cicik neni a Yesu ecamito iŋes kidokok ŋakeekan neni kec; nai kiŋenyakis ŋikasyomak ŋituŋa.
41010014	Ani iŋolikini Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ itiyaete ŋun, toŋo nooi tolimok ikes tema, “Kimyekisi ŋidwe potu neni kaŋ! Nyiretakis ikes, anerae erae Apukan ka Akuj ŋina a ŋulu ikote lu.
41010015	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋinituŋanan nyijauni Apukan ka Akuj ikwa ikoku ŋini cici, nyelomari jik Napukan ŋin.”
41010016	Totun iŋes ŋidwe, kidokok ŋakeekan neni kec, kiterereŋ.
41010017	Ani erotokini Yesu iwace, tomotun epeikile neni keŋ, toryedik alokiŋaren keŋ, kiŋit iŋes tema, “Eketataman ŋolo ajokan, nyo itemokino ayoŋ etiya oryamunia akiyar ŋina nyedaun?”
41010018	Kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema, “Kaanukiro ikinyaritor iyoŋ ayoŋ ŋolo ajokan? Emam ituŋanan ŋini ajokan, mati Akuj bon.
41010019	Iyeni iyoŋ Ŋakiciketa: ‘Nyiar, nyilom, nyikoko, nyisudi ŋakiro, nyitunae ka tokerite papa kon ka toto kon.’ ”
41010020	Tema ekile ŋol, “Eketataman, ŋinapei koloŋ alokiditeu kaŋ, ericit ayoŋ Ŋakiciketa ŋun daadaŋ.”
41010021	Kitek Yesu iŋes, tominak iŋes tema, “Ipeibore bon ikibucit iyoŋ; ape togyela ibore daadaŋ ŋini iyakar iyoŋ, tokorak ŋikulyak, iryamuni iyoŋ ebari kon anakuj.”
41010022	Ani iirari ekile ŋol ŋakiro ŋun, torotok esiliyorit, anerae abarit iŋes nooi.
41010023	Toŋoleŋolek Yesu, tolimok ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Kitotyon ŋikabarak alomar Napukan ka Akuj!”
41010024	Toumokis ŋikasyomak keŋ aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun. Nai tema nabo Yesu neni kec, “Ŋidwe, kitotyon nooi ŋikabarak alomar Napukan ka Akuj.
41010025	Epatana ekaal alomar anapedot a ŋina ke esindan, akilo ekabaran alomar Napukan ka Akuj.”
41010026	Tobul ikes nooi, kiŋita iŋes temasi, “Ŋae bo nai eiun?”
41010027	Kitek Yesu ikes tema, “Nyepedorosi ŋiboro ŋul alotuŋa, nai aneni ka Akuj epedorosi ŋiboro daadaŋ.”
41010028	Kirwor Petero neni a Yesu tema, “Ikiesik isua ŋiboro daadaŋ ikiwuapak iyoŋ.”
41010029	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, emam ipei daŋ ŋini aesiki ere keŋ, ŋikaitotoi, ŋakaitotoi, toto keŋ, papa keŋ, ŋidwe kori ŋamanat aŋuna kaŋ ka aŋuna a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak,
41010030	ŋini nyeryamuni ŋarwa amiat anakwap a na, ŋakais, ŋikaitotoi, ŋakaitotoi, atatoto, ŋidwe ka ŋamanat, nai ka ŋican daŋ. Eryamuni daŋ iŋes rwanu akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
41010031	Nai, ŋikalalak ŋulu iŋarenete tokona, isidiyoryo; nabo ŋulu isidiyoro tokona, isiŋarenio.”
41010032	Ani itipeete Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak kidiama Yerusalem, kiŋarenikinite iŋes ikes. Toumokinito ikes ka tobulite daŋ ŋulu ewuapito iŋes. Tonyaraiya nai Yesu ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei nawae, tolimok ikes ŋuna epote akitiyakin neni keŋ tema,
41010033	“Kiirasi! Ikidokari iwon tokona Yerusalem, neni ipotokinere Lokoku a Ituŋanan losacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka loketatamak a Ŋikisila. Etubokinete ikes iŋes atwanare ka ipotokinete daŋ neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
41010034	Epote ikes akisol iŋes, kimwaanakis, kibuŋata ka toara daŋ; nai kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni, eyaruni iŋes.”
41010035	Potu Yakobo ka Yoana, ŋidwe a Sebedeo neni a Yesu temasi, “Eketataman, ikicamit isua iyoŋ ikitiyak isua ŋuna daadaŋ ikiŋisi iyoŋ.”
41010036	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Nyo icamito iyes ayoŋ eketiyak iyes?”
41010037	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Kimyekinae isua eboikinos ipei teten kon ka ipei kedyany kon apaki ŋina iboikinor iyoŋ napolou kon.”
41010038	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyiyenete iyes ŋuna ilipasi. Ipedorete iyes akimat ekopo ŋolo a ŋican lo ŋolo alosi ayoŋ akimat a? Kori ipedorete iyes akibatisao ikwaŋina ekebatisatere ayoŋ a?”
41010039	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ikipedori.” Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ekopo ŋolo a ŋican lo ŋolo amasi ayoŋ, imasete iyes daŋ; ebatisimu ŋolo ekebatisatere ayoŋ, ikibatisaere iyes daŋ.
41010040	Nai akiboikin teten kori kedyany kaŋ, meere ayoŋ aseuni, anerae erae ŋiwaetin ŋul ŋulu a ŋulu eseunit Akuj.”
41010041	Ani iirarete ŋikasyomak a Yesu ŋulutomon ŋakiro ŋun, toŋoikis ikes Yoana ka Yakobo.
41010042	Tonyarau Yesu ikes tolimok tema, “Iyenete iyes atemar ŋikepukak a ŋakwapin ipukato ŋakwapin ka adedeŋu, ka ŋulu epolokinito ikes daŋ, ipukato ka apedor.
41010043	Nai nyitemokino ŋun totakanut aneni kus; ani ŋini ecamit apolou alokidiŋ kus, itemokino toruwor eketiyan kus.
41010044	Nabo ŋini ecamit akiŋarenikin ŋuluce alokidiŋ kus, itemokino iŋes toruwor epito a ŋuluce a daadaŋ.
41010045	Anerae pa abunit Lokoku a Ituŋanan akitiyanakino, nai abunit akitiyanakin ka akijal akeekiyar, toiunere ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak.”
41010046	Todolut Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak Yeriko; ani erotokinete ikes a nen erukito ka asepic ŋina alalan, bu lokoku a Timayo ŋolo anyaritae Batimayo, ŋolo amudukana, kiboikin nawae erot ilipanar.
41010047	Ani iirari iŋes atemar erae Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret itorunit nen, kisyak akiwor ebala, “Yesu Lokoku a Daudi, kisyoni ayoŋ!”
41010048	Kiyayakis iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak temasi, “Kililiŋ!” Nai torebor iŋes nooi tema, “Lokoku a Daudi, kisyoni ayoŋ!”
41010049	Towo Yesu tema, “Tonyarautu iŋes bu.” Tonyaraut nai ikes emuduk, temasi neni keŋ, “Toen etau, tonyou, ikinyaritae iyoŋ.”
41010050	Kimasa iŋes elou keŋ, tokuraun, tolot neni a Yesu.
41010051	Kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema, “Icamit iyoŋ ekekoki ayoŋ iyoŋ ai?” Toboŋok emuduk tema, “Eketataman, kitekienyunae.”
41010052	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ape, ikitaŋaleu iyoŋ akoninupit.” Tokienyu iŋes atipei, kiwuapak Yesu alorot a ŋolo ewuapit Yesu.
41011001	Toapiyasi Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak Yerusalem, toriŋa eya diyete ŋitaunio ŋulu a Betepage ka Betania, lomoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa. Kiyakiya Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋiarei,
41011002	tolimok ikes tema, “Toloto tolomasi lore ŋolo eyai kiŋaren kus. Ani kilomasi, iryamunete isigirya ŋini eenitae, ŋini emam icetuŋanan adok, tolacut iyaut laalo.
41011003	Ani kikiŋit idiotuŋanan iyes atemar, ‘Kaanukiro ilacata iyes isigirya?’ temasi iyes, ‘Ekapolon iitanit iŋes, inyakunio atipei.’ ”
41011004	Toloto ikes, toryamut isigirya eenitae kiŋa epuke diye erot, tolacut iŋes.
41011005	Kiŋita ŋituŋa ŋulu awuasi a nen ikes temasi, “Kaanukiro ilacata iyes isigirya ?”
41011006	Tolimokis nai ŋikasyomak ŋituŋa ŋuna alimokinit Yesu ikes; kimyekis nai ŋituŋa ikes torikosi isigirya.
41011007	Torikut nai isigirya neni a Yesu, kidokokis ŋikecelowi kidiama keŋ, kiboikin Yesu kaku keŋ.
41011008	Topetanakis ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋikecelowi lorot ka ŋice ŋaten ŋuna etelunete ikes anariet, ŋuna aya ŋakwii.
41011009	Ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu alosete alokiŋaren ka alokaku a Yesu, acelasi ebasi, “Osanna! Erereŋ ŋolo ebunit alokiro ke Ekapolon!
41011010	Erereŋ apukan ŋina a Papa yok a Daudi ŋina ebunit! Osanna toyai kidiama nooi!”
41011011	Toloma nai Yesu Yerusalem tooma Akai ka Akuj kiŋolyanak ŋiboro daadaŋ. Kedau akiŋolyanakin, toloto ka ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei lotaun ŋolo a Betania, aŋuna abunio akwap towaria.
41011012	Ani iwalari, toboŋut ikes alo Betania, tonyam Yesu akoro.
41011013	Toanyuwa iŋes ebobore aneni alwanan elibit, tolot nai aanyun kepedori aryamun ŋadiboboryo. Ani eapiyari iŋes diye, toryamu erae ŋakwii make; anerae ariŋa apaki ŋina eraeta ŋiboboryo.
41011014	Kicen Yesu ebobore tema, “Nyenyami nabo ituŋanan ŋaraito kon jik ameun tokona!” Kiirasi tari ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋakiro ŋun.
41011015	Todolo Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak Yerusalem. Toloma Yesu Kai ka Akuj, tosurok ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu agyelanarete ka agyelete ŋiboro alo Kai ka Akuj. Kibelukwaana ŋimesae a ŋulu esyecete ŋisiliŋa ka kimasana ŋikicoloŋo a ŋulu agyelanarete ŋakuryo.
41011016	Nyecamak iŋes idiotuŋanan elomarya idiobore kiŋa Akai ka Akuj.
41011017	Kisyak Yesu akitatam ebala, “Elimunitoe alotooma Ŋakigireta ebe, ‘Enyarao Akai kaŋ Akai ŋina ilipyata ŋituŋa ŋulu a ŋibukui a daadaŋ,’ nai tokona, ituruwosi iyes iŋes Akai ŋina eŋopitotor ŋikokolak!”
41011018	Ani iirarete ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋakiro ŋun, totamatamata epite ŋoloaret iŋes. Nai akerito ikes Yesu, anerae aumokinit asepic daadaŋ aŋuna ka akitatam keŋ.
41011019	Ani ewari, torotokis Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ alotaun a ŋol.
41011020	Ani taparacu itorete ikes diye ebobore, toanyuwasi keono deu, ameun anataagor.
41011021	Totamu Petero ŋakiro a Yesu neni ke ekitoe, tema, “Eketataman, toanyuwa, keono ebobore ŋolo iceni iyoŋ.”
41011022	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Toyakatar anupit neni ka Akuj.
41011023	Anerae akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋinituŋanan etemari emoru lo ‘Kiyoto a ne, kimasar nanam;’ ani pa keŋayaŋayat alotau keŋ, nai tonupite atemar itiyakin ŋuna daadaŋ irworo iŋes kire, itiyakinio neni keŋ.
41011024	Aŋun, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ŋinibore iŋitasi iyes ilipete ka tonupito atemar idaut aryamun, iryamunete iyes.
41011025	Apaki daadaŋ ŋina ilipyata iyes, kisyonioto ŋini daadaŋ itiyat aronis neni kus, ikotere Papa kus daŋ ŋolo eyai nakuj ikisyoni iyes. [
41011026	Ani pa kisyonioto iyes ŋuluce, Papa kus daŋ ŋolo eyai nakuj nyikisyoni iyes.]”
41011027	Toboŋut ikes nabo Yerusalem. Ani elosi Yesu alo Kai ka Akuj, potu ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ta ŋikatukok neni keŋ
41011028	temasi, “Anipedor iyakar iyoŋ, ŋina itiyaa ŋakiro nu? Ŋae ikiinakinit iyoŋ apedor ŋinakitiyaet ikes?”
41011029	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ekeŋisi ayoŋ iyes akiŋiset apei bon; ani kiboŋokis iyes, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes neni ebunitor apedor ŋina etiyaa ayoŋ ŋakiro nu.
41011030	Ai abunitor akibatis a Yoana, nakuj kori lotuŋa? Toboŋokinoe ayoŋ!”
41011031	Kiŋitanaros ikes make ebasi, “Ani kikitema abunit anakuj, etemari iŋes, ‘Nyo bo pa inupitotor iyes iŋes?’
41011032	Ikitemari mono abunit alotuŋa a?” (Akerito ikes ŋituŋa, anerae anupito ŋulu alalak atemar arae Yoana ekadwaran ŋolo a kire.)
41011033	Aŋakiro a ŋun, toboŋokis ikes Yesu temasi, “Nyikiyeni isua.” Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ayoŋ daŋ nyakalimokini iyes neni ebunitor apedor ŋina etiyaa ayoŋ ŋakiro nu.”
41012001	Togeu Yesu akirworo neni a ŋituŋa a ŋakitadapeta ebala, “Abu ituŋanan todupak ŋikito ŋulu ke epiini, towuak awuas kiryam. Tobok akipany ŋina cuet epiini, todukok epemu, kicikak ŋiketeok emanikor, tolot iŋes acekwap.
41012002	Ani edoli apaki ŋina lemet, kiyakiya iŋes epito keŋ epei neni a ŋiketeok emanikor ayaun ŋadiraito ŋuna ke epiini.
41012003	Kikamut ŋiketeok epito ŋol, kibuŋata, kitoboŋosi emam epiini.
41012004	Kiyakiya nabo iŋes epito ece, kibuŋata ŋolo daŋ nakou nooi, tobolyatar.
41012005	Kiyakiya nabo elope emanikor epito ece ŋolo apotu ŋiketeok toara; kiyakiyana nabo ŋice ŋulu alalak, ŋulu apotu ŋiketeok toara ŋice ka kibuŋata ŋice.
41012006	Lokoku keŋ ŋolo donupei bon ŋolo minat edoŋit nyiyakiyara. Kiyakiya iŋes lokoku keŋ, etami atemar ekerete ikes iŋes.
41012007	Nai totukut ŋiketeok emanikor akiar iŋes temasi, ‘Lokoku keŋ lo, potu oara, eruma iwon emanikor ŋolo ke epiini.’
41012008	Kikamut ikes iŋes, toara, tocakakis kiŋa emanikor.”
41012009	Kiŋit nai Yesu ikes tema, “Nyo nai ebuni elope ŋolo ke emanikor akitiyakin neni kec? Ebuni iŋes akiar ŋiketeok daadaŋ, inak emanikor neni a ŋice.
41012010	Nyesyoma mono iyes Ŋakigireta ŋuna igiritae ebe, ‘Amoru ŋina koloŋ aŋerete ŋikadukok iŋes tokona itogogoŋit akai alokoona.
41012011	Ekapolon elope etiyae nu, erae ŋakiro nu ŋuna etalakarak ŋuna ikite iwon!’ ”
41012012	Kiwara ŋikapolok a Ŋiyudayan akikamun Yesu, anerae apotu ikes toyenut atemar arae ikes erworor Yesu anakitadapet keŋ, nai tokera ŋikapolok a Ŋiyudayan asepic, kimyekis Yesu tolot.
41012013	Kiyakiyasi ŋikapolok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan Ŋiparisayon ŋice ka ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu ka atukot a ŋina ke Erode neni a Yesu, ikotere ikes elokuniata Yesu alorwor keŋ.
41012014	Ani edolunete ikes neni a Yesu, temasi, “Eketataman, ikiyeni isua atemar irworo iyoŋ ŋuna iyookino ka nyimisit ŋuna etamete ŋituŋa. Nyityakatyakat iyoŋ ŋituŋa, nai itatami ŋuna a kire ŋuna ka Akuj. Ikicamakinito mono isua Ŋikisila akibuk ocur neni ke ekepukan a Roma kori mam?
41012015	Ikibuki kori nyikibuki?” Nai toyenu Yesu atemar alokunito ikes iŋes; kiŋit ikes tema, “Kaanukiro ikilokunitotor iyes ayoŋ? Yautu esiliŋ oanyu.”
41012016	Yaut ikes esiliŋ, kiŋit nai Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋolo a ŋae ereet lo ka ŋakigireta nu?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ŋulu ke ekepukan a Roma.”
41012017	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Inakisi ekepukan a Roma ŋini erae ikeŋ, inakis Akuj ŋini erae ŋini ka Akuj.” Toumokis ikes nooi aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun.
41012018	Potu Ŋisadukayon neni a Yesu. Nai aŋuna pa anupitotor ikes atemar eyai ayarun alokatwak, kiŋita ikes Yesu temasi,
41012019	“Eketataman, egirit koloŋ Moses aŋuna kosi ebala, ‘Ani ketwana lokaato ke ekile, toesik aberu emam ikoku, irumi lokaato keŋ aberu ŋin, touruunia ŋidwe aŋuna a lokaato keŋ’.
41012020	Ayakasi ŋikaitotoi ŋikanikaarei, abu ŋolo apolon kiit aberu, totwan emam ŋidwe.
41012021	Kirum nai ŋolo a ŋiarei aberu, totwan ŋolo daŋ emam ŋidwe; ŋolo a ŋiuni daŋ ikwaŋinapei.
41012022	Totwaka ŋikaitotoi ŋulukanikaarei daadaŋ emam ŋidwe; ani ekaku totwan aberu daŋ.
41012023	Nai anayarun, eruwor mono aberu ŋin ŋina ka ali? Anerae abu iŋes toruwor aberu a ŋikaitotoi a ŋulukanikaarei a ŋul.”
41012024	Tolimok nai Yesu ikes tema, “Meere ba ŋakiro ŋun ikitooliyosi iyes, anerae nyiyenete iyes Ŋakigireta kori apedor ŋina ka Akuj?
41012025	Anerae ŋina eyaruniata ŋikatwak, nyiitasi ikes nabo ka nyipotonorosi akiitanaro, nai ikwaanikinosi ikes ka ŋimalaikan ŋulu eya nakuj.
41012026	Nai nyesyoma iyes alokitaabo a Moses ŋuna a ŋikatwak a ŋulu eyarunete, ikwapei kirworor Akuj neni keŋ anamoni ebala, ‘Arae ayoŋ Akuj ŋina ka Aburaam ka Isaka ta ŋina a Yakobo’ a?
41012027	Meere iŋes Akuj a ŋikatwak, nai Akuj a ŋulu eyarete. Aŋun, idyakarito iyes nooi.”
41012028	Ayai nen eketataman a Ŋikisila epei ŋolo apupi ŋakiro ŋun. Toyenu iŋes atemar aboŋoki Yesu Ŋisadukayon ejok, kiŋit nai eketataman ŋol Yesu tema, “Anikiciket epol akilo ŋunace daadaŋ?”
41012029	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ŋina esyaunan iŋes na: ‘Isirael kiira! Erae Ekapolon Akuj yok apei bon.
41012030	Tomina Ekapolon Akuj kon a ekonitau a daadaŋ ka a akonikiyar a daadaŋ, ka a ŋakonitameta a daadaŋ ta a akonigogoŋu a daadaŋ.’
41012031	Ŋina a ŋaarei iŋes na: ‘Tomina ekonikidunyet ikwaŋina iminar iyoŋ akonikuwan.’ Emam acekiciket ŋina epol akilo ŋunaarei ŋun.”
41012032	Tema eketataman ŋol, “Kire Eketataman, ilimu iyoŋ ŋuna iyookino atemar erae Akuj apei, emam ace mati iŋes bon
41012033	ka aminakin iŋes a etau a daadaŋ ka a ŋatameta a daadaŋ, ta a agogoŋu a daadaŋ; nabo ka aminakin ekidunyet ikwaŋina eminar ituŋanan akeekuwan, iloit ŋipeyosinei ka ŋamuronisya daadaŋ.”
41012034	Ani eanyuni Yesu atemar aboŋoki iŋes ejok, tolimok tema, “Emam nyilwana iyoŋ a Napukan ka Akuj!” Kedaun ŋun, emam icetuŋanan ŋini abu toŋirik akiŋit Yesu acekiŋiset.
41012035	Ani itatami Yesu ŋituŋa alo Kai ka Akuj, kiŋit ikes tema, “Kaanukiro ebaakatar ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ebe erae Kristo lokoku a Daudi?
41012036	Alimokini Etau ŋolo Asegan Daudi alimun ebe: ‘Atema Ekapolon neni ke Ekapolon kaŋ, kiboikin iyoŋ teten kaŋ, akitodol neni ewuakinia ŋikonimoi kwap ŋakejen kon.’
41012037	Enyarit Daudi iŋes ‘Ekapolon’; ikokini nai iŋes eruwor lokoku keŋ ai?” Abu asepic ŋina alalan kiira akitatam a Yesu ka alakara.
41012038	Anakitatam keŋ, tema Yesu, “Tocoito ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila, ŋulu eminasi akirimit enapito ŋikaasoi ŋulu aoyak, nabo ecamito kimalae ikwa ŋikapolok alomaket.
41012039	Eseete ŋikicoloŋo ŋulu ebusak akiboikin alosinagogae ka anasuban.
41012040	Emodiyanarete ŋiboro anakais a ŋapuseru ka itoodiuna ikes anakilipeta kec a ŋuna aoyak. Eryamunete ikes atubokino ŋina apolon nooi.”
41012041	Kiboikin Yesu alo Kai ka Akuj diye asaduku ŋina acakyo ŋisiliŋa. Kitek ŋituŋa ecakete ŋisiliŋa. Tocakakis ŋikabarak ŋulu alalak ŋisiliŋa ŋulu alalak.
41012042	Bu apuserut apei ŋina akulyakana, tocakak nasaduku ŋikapun ŋiarei ŋulu ayakar iŋes.
41012043	Tonyarau Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ, tolimok ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, acakaki apuserut na anakulyako keŋ akilo ikes daadaŋ ŋulu acakakis ŋisiliŋa nasaduku.
41012044	Anerae, acakete ŋuluce daadaŋ ŋisiliŋa ŋulu erae ŋikoŋinae alobari kec, nai acakaki apuserut na anakulyako keŋ ŋulu daadaŋ ayakar ka edaritor akeekiyar.”
41013001	Ani elomuni Yesu alo Kai ka Akuj, tema epei alokasyomak keŋ, “Eketataman, kiŋolik! Okoe kibusyata ŋamoru nu ka ŋaduketa!”
41013002	Tema Yesu iŋes, “Ite iyoŋ ŋaduketa ŋuna apolok nu a? Emam amoru apei daŋ ŋina idoŋi kidiama ŋinace nyeukoro.”
41013003	Ŋolopite eboiyo Yesu alomoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa, a ŋolo eteosi ka Akai ka Akuj, kiŋita Petero, Yakobo, Yoana ka Anderia iŋes aneni kec bon temasi,
41013004	“Tolimokinae isua apaki ŋina etakanuniata ŋakiro ŋun, nyo itoodiuni atemar adol akoloŋit ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋun?”
41013005	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Tocoikinito nyikimodik idiotuŋanan iyes.
41013006	Anerae epote ŋikalalak irworosi alokiro kaŋ ebasi, ‘Arae ayoŋ Kristo!’ Emodikinete ka itooliyorete ŋikalalak.
41013007	Ani iirarete iyes ŋijiyesyo ka ŋiemuto ŋulu a ŋijiyesyo, nyikibul, anerae itemokino ŋul totakanut, nai nyitoodiunito ikes asalunet.
41013008	Ejikinosi ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap kaapei ka ŋulu ka akwap a ŋinace, ejikin apukan ka apukan, emaranikini akwap anakiboisyo a ŋuna egelegelya ka eyakaun ŋironia. Erae ŋin akisyakinet a ŋican, ikwaŋina egeunia aberu aryeba edoli akidoun.
41013009	“Tocoito iyes, anerae epote ikes arikor iyes loikiikoe ka ikibuŋaete alosinagogae. Ikitowuoyo iyes alokiŋaren ŋikepukak ka ŋikapolok ŋice daŋ aŋuna kaŋ. Apaki ŋin, iŋes iruworotor iyes ŋisuudae kaŋ.
41013010	Nai itemokino mono kitatamae Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak nakwapin daadaŋ.
41013011	Ani ikirikorete ikes iyes loikiiko, nyiberakinosi akiyaloloŋ ikotere ŋuna ilosete iyes alimokin ikes. Nai kirworo ŋuna ikiinakinio iyes akirwor apaki ŋina ikiinere iyes akirworikin, anerae meere iyes irworosi, nai Etau ŋolo Asegan.
41013012	Ebuni lokaato akipotor lokaato keŋ toarae, papa daŋ ipotori ikeekoku; isyakinete ŋidwe akisubura ŋikecekauruunak ka ipotorete ikes toarae.
41013013	Ikiŋerete iyes ŋituŋa daadaŋ aŋuna ke ekaakiro; nai ŋini etitinyikini tari nasalunet, eiunio.”
41013014	“Iŋolikinete iyes asiilyo etakanuni neni nyitemokino etakanunia. (Itemokino ŋini esyomi toyenu apolou a ŋakiro a ŋun!) Apaki ŋin, itemokino ŋulu eyakasi Yudeya, toema lomoru.
41013015	Ituŋanan ŋini eyai kidiama akai, nyedoku kwap, kori nyeloma alemun idiobore alokai keŋ.
41013016	Ituŋanan ŋini eyai lomanikor, itemokino nyeboŋu lore alemun elou keŋ.
41013017	Erokyarosi ŋakiro aneni a ŋaberu a ŋuna epotiyete kori itanakete alorwa a ŋul.
41013018	Kilipa nyetakanut ŋun ŋirwa ŋulu ka alilimu.
41013019	Anerae alorwa a ŋul, eyakaunosi ŋakisicaneta ŋuna nyetakanuna ŋinapei koloŋ kesubia Akuj ŋiboro daadaŋ anakwap tari tokona; kori nyepote nabo jik ŋican ŋulu ikote ŋul.
41013020	Kerae nyituuruwuanit Akuj ŋirwa ŋul, kemam ituŋanan epuun. Nai aŋuna aminar Akuj ŋulu aseunit iŋes, abu kituuruwuan ŋirwa ŋul.
41013021	“Ani kikilimok iyes ituŋanan tema, ‘Kiŋolikisi, Kristo iŋes lo,’ kori ‘Kiŋolikisi, iŋes ye’, nyinupa ŋakiro keŋ.
41013022	Anerae epote ŋikamodyanakinak ka ŋikadwarak ŋulu amodiyanak ebasi ebe ikirae ikes atakristo. Epote ikes akitiya ŋakitoodyanakineta ŋuna ailiilok ŋuna isuparete ŋituŋa ŋulu seuna erae kepedorete.
41013023	Tocoikinito! Adau ayoŋ alimokin iyes ŋakiro daadaŋ eriŋa ŋirwa ŋul nyedoluno.”
41013024	“Nai alorwa a ŋul, kelunyar ŋican, isiryonio akoloŋ ka nyecauni elap.
41013025	Ecakunosi ŋikacer anakuj, emaranikinete ŋisubuna daadaŋ ŋulu eya kidiama.
41013026	Apaki ŋin, iŋolikinete ŋituŋa Lokoku a Ituŋanan ebunit alodowuon ka apedor a ŋina apolon ka akica keŋ.
41013027	Ebuni iŋes akiyakiyar ŋimalaikan acunakin ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu seuna alowaetin ka akwap a daadaŋ, ameun anakisyakinet tari nasalunet.”
41013028	“Toyenutu akitatamet ŋina ke ebobore. Ŋolopite ipuriteunioto ka elibuniata ŋakwii ŋuna a ŋaten keŋ, iyenunete iyes atemar aapuu akamu.
41013029	Ikwaŋinapei, iyes daŋ ŋina iŋolikiniata ŋakiro ŋun etakanunete, toyenutu atemar aapuu Lokoku a Ituŋanan, adolu lokekia kus.
41013030	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, nyelunyar anyamet na eriŋa nyetakanuna ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ.
41013031	Edaunosi nakuj ka akwap, nai nyedaunosi ŋakaakiro jik.”
41013032	“Nai, ŋuna ka Akoloŋit a ŋin, kori ke esaa a ŋol, emam ituŋanan eyeni, nyeyenete tari ŋimalaikan ŋulu ka Akuj, kori Lokoku daŋ, nai mati Papa bon.
41013033	Tocoito, tokienyete, anerae nyiyenete apaki ŋina edolunio esaa ŋol.
41013034	Ikoni apaki ŋin ituŋanan ŋini anyouni alore keŋ, tolot iwace, kimyek ekeere, inak ŋiketiyak keŋ apedor, ŋoloketiyan ekeetic. Kicikak eketen ekidor akikieny apaki daadaŋ.
41013035	Tokienyete nai, anerae nyiyenete iyes apaki ŋina eboŋunio elope ŋolo ke ere; kerae eboŋ, kori kidiŋ akuwar, kori ebai, kori taparacu.
41013036	Ikotere ani kebu iŋes atipei, nyikiryamu iyes ijotoete.
41013037	Ŋuna akalimok ayoŋ iyes, alimok ŋituŋa daadaŋ. Tokienyete!”
41014001	Ani idoŋit ŋirwa ŋiarei todol akoloŋit ŋina a Paska, ŋina a ŋasuban a ŋamugati a ŋuna emam ŋakinyalet; kiwara ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila epite ŋolo kikamunet Yesu pa eyenio, toaryata iŋes.
41014002	Temasi ikes, “Nyikikamu iŋes akoloŋit ŋina a Paska, ikotere nyebu aruruma alotuŋa.”
41014003	Ani eyai Yesu Betania kai a Simoni a ŋolo sek adyaka atapon, yaunae akimuj. Ani eriŋa iŋes imuji, bu aberu ŋina atiŋit ecupa ŋolo aoyan ŋolo etiyaunitae anamoru a ŋina anyaritae Alabasta, ŋolo ayai akimyet ŋina akukunyon, ŋina anyaritae Narido. Alal egyelit ŋolo ka akimyet a ŋin. Tobwaŋa aberu ŋin iwadio alocupa, ido tobukok akimyet nakou a Yesu.
41014004	Toŋoa ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu aya nen temasi, “Kaanukiro icanicanere akimyet ŋina akukunyon na?
41014005	Anerae kerae togyelaritetei a ŋisilipae a ŋulu edeparito ŋamiae ŋauni, kekorakinitae ŋikulyak.” Kisiburata ikes aberu ŋin neni aronon.
41014006	Tema nai Yesu, “Kimyekisi iŋes bon; nyo isiburaata iyes iŋes? Adau iŋes akitiyakin etic ŋolo ajokan neni kaŋ.
41014007	Anerae irukito iyes ka ŋikulyak ŋirwa daadaŋ. Ipedorete akiŋarakin ikes apaki daadaŋ ŋina icamitotor. Nai nyikiruki iwon ŋirwa daadaŋ.
41014008	Etiya iŋes ŋuna epedori; ekeos iŋes ayoŋ eriŋa nyenuka.
41014009	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋinakwap daadaŋ itatamere Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, elimoryo ŋakiro ŋuna etiya aberu na aŋuna ka atamunitor iŋes.”
41014010	Tolot Yuda Isikariot ŋolo arae epei a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei losacaradotin ŋulu apolok, akipotokin Yesu neni kec.
41014011	Tolakaros ikes nooi iirarete ŋakiro keŋ temasi, “Ikiinakinio iyoŋ ŋisiliŋa”. Kiwar nai Yuda apaki ŋina etemokino torikorere ŋisacaradotin neni a Yesu.
41014012	Akoloŋit ŋina eŋarenikini ŋina a Paska, ŋina a ŋasuban a ŋamugati a ŋuna emam ŋakinyalet ka ŋina eareneere ŋimeesekin, kiŋita ŋikasyomak Yesu temasi, “Ai icamit iyoŋ isua oloto etemokinioto neni imuja iyoŋ Paska?”
41014013	Kiyakiya nai Yesu ikes ŋiarei tema, “Toloto lotaun, iryamasi iyes ka ekile iwuokit amot a ŋakipi; kiwuapakisi iŋes
41014014	tari kai ŋina elomari iŋes. Tolimokis elope ka akai a ŋin atemar, ‘Ebala Eketataman, nyaani agule ŋina itemokino iŋes ka ŋikasyomak keŋ tonyamiata imesek ŋini a Paska?’
41014015	Ikitoodikini iŋes iyes agule ŋina eyai kidiama, ŋina itemokino ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu iitana. Kitemokis nen ejok aŋuna yok.”
41014016	Toloto nai ŋikasyomak, tolomasi lotaun, toryamut ikwaŋina alimokinitere ikes. Kitemokis nai akimuj a Paska a nen.
41014017	Ani enaŋi ŋisaae ŋulu ka ataboŋ, torukut Yesu ka ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei.
41014018	Ani eriŋa ikes imujete, tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, akalukini ayoŋ epei alokidiŋ kus; ŋol, iŋes ŋolo ikimuji ka ayoŋ.”
41014019	Tonomosi ikes ŋakiro ŋun ŋitai nooi, kisyakis akiŋitiŋit Yesu a ŋipeipei ebasi, “Ayoŋ a?”
41014020	Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Erae epei a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, ŋolo ikilumonokini ka ayoŋ amugati nasaani.
41014021	Kire etwani Lokoku a Ituŋanan ikwapei igiritere Nakigireta, nai eroko nooi ŋakiro ŋuna eryamuni ekile ŋolo elukini iŋes! Kejoikinit koloŋ ekile ŋol nyidoun!”
41014022	Ani imujete ikes, tolemu Yesu amugati, kilipak, totyak, inak ikes tema, “Kijaasi, kimuja; erae na akaakuwan.”
41014023	Tolemu nai ekopo, ani kedau akitalakar Akuj, inak ikes, tomata daadaŋ.
41014024	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Erae nu ŋaokot kaŋ, ŋuna ka Acamunet, ŋuna ebukoritae ikotere ŋikalalak.
41014025	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, nyamasi nabo ayoŋ ŋuna ke epiini akitodol akoloŋit ŋina amasya ekitetyana a Napukan ka Akuj.”
41014026	Toeikis nai ikes eete ŋolo kitalakaret Akuj, ido tolomasi kiŋa, toloto lomoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa.
41014027	Tolimok Yesu ŋikasyomak tema, “Ielarosi iyes daadaŋ; anerae igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Abuni ayoŋ akibuŋa ekeyokon, kielaros nai ŋamesekin.’
41014028	Nai ekaku kadau ayoŋ ayarun, ekeŋarenikini ayoŋ iyes alosi Galileya.”
41014029	Tema Petero neni a Yesu, “Tari kielarosi ŋuluce daadaŋ, nyalosi ayoŋ.”
41014030	Toboŋok Yesu Petero tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, takae nakwaare, eriŋa ekokoroit nyeruuno aruunet ŋina a ŋaarei, ipegi iyoŋ ŋapeget ŋauni atemar ikiyeni ayoŋ.”
41014031	Toboŋok Petero ka agogoŋu tema, “Nyapegi ayoŋ jik, tari ketemar akaaryo ayoŋ ka iyoŋ!” Tolimut ŋikasyomak ŋuluce daadaŋ ikwaŋinapei.
41014032	Ani edolunete Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak neni anyaritae Getesemani, tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Kiboikinos nege eriŋa ayoŋ alosi akilip.”
41014033	Torukosi Yesu ka Petero, Yakobo ta Yoana. Togeu iŋes akiil ka kiyaloloŋ,
41014034	tolimok ŋikasyomak tema, “Iyaloloŋi ekaatau nooi esibit eapi atwanare. Kiboikinos nege, tokienyete.”
41014035	Tolot nai iŋes kiŋaren iwadio toramakin kwap, kilip, tema, “Ani kepedor, tolunyar apaki ŋina aronon na aneni kaŋ”.
41014036	Kilip nabo iŋes tema, “Papa, apa kaŋ! Ipedori iyoŋ alemar ŋican daadaŋ, tolema ekopo ŋolo a ŋican lo aneni kaŋ; meere ka acamit kaŋ, nai ikwaŋina icamitor iyoŋ.”
41014037	Toboŋo nabo Yesu neni kec, toryamu ikes ejotoete, tema neni a Petero, “Simoni, ijotoe iyoŋ a? Nyipedori iyoŋ akikieny tari epeisaa daŋ a?
41014038	Tokienyete ka kilipete, ikotere nyilomasi nakitemyet. Ecamit etau, nai epalag akuwan.”
41014039	Toboŋo nabo Yesu akilip, kirwor ŋakiro ŋunapei ŋun.
41014040	Ani eboŋuni nabo, toryamu ikes ejotoete, anerae abu tokuruwo ikes akikieny, pa ayenete ikes tari ŋakiro ŋuna boŋokino Yesu.
41014041	Ani eboŋori Yesu aboŋoret ŋina a ŋauni, tolimok ikes tema, “Eriŋa iyes ijotoete ka ieŋunito a? Etemokin, adol esaa! Eapi Lokoku a Ituŋanan akipotokin nakan a ŋikasecak.
41014042	Tonyoutu, oloto! Kiŋolikisi, adolu ekalukinon kaŋ.”
41014043	Ani eriŋa Yesu irworo, todolu Yuda Isikariot, ŋolo sek arae epei a ŋikasyomak a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, erukito ka ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak, ŋulu atiŋito ŋatumio ka ŋabiroi. Kiyakuunito ikes ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ta ŋikatukok.
41014044	Aris sek Yuda kelimoki ŋikekamunak a Yesu atemar, “Ŋolo anui ayoŋ, iŋes ŋolo. Kikamutu iŋes torikosi, totiŋito kojokan.”
41014045	Ŋinapei adolunio Yuda, tolot neni a Yesu tema, “Eketataman!” Tosodi tonu iŋes.
41014046	Kikamut ikes Yesu ka agogoŋu.
41014047	Tosodi epei aneni a ŋulu awuasi alodiye, tolemu atum anakuraro, kitel eketiyan ŋolo ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi, totubo akit.
41014048	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Kan nyo iponitotor iyes akikamun ayoŋ itiŋito ŋatumio ka ŋabiroi esibit arae ayoŋ ekokolan?
41014049	Ikirukit ayoŋ ka iyes ŋirwa daadaŋ alo Kai ka Akuj etatami, ipotu iyes nyikikamut ayoŋ. Nai itemokino kiyookinos Ŋakigireta.”
41014050	Toesikis ŋikasyomak daadaŋ iŋes, kielaros.
41014051	Ayai esorokit epei ŋolo atupit Yesu tonapite elou. Acamito ŋituŋa akikamun iŋes,
41014052	nai abu iŋes kipiiri eleri, toesik elou.
41014053	Torikosi ikes Yesu neni ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi; totukokinos ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok daadaŋ ka ŋikatukok kaapei ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila.
41014054	Atupit Petero Yesu aneni alwana, tari tooma ere ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi. Kiboikinos ka ŋisigarya kiwuaŋas anakim.
41014055	Kiwara ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Atukot daadaŋ ŋakiro ŋunakisitakinet Yesu, ikotere earere; nai toŋopikis.
41014056	Anerae apotu ŋikesitakinak ŋulu alalak ŋul, kirworo ŋuna pa eyookino, nabo pa acamuna ŋikecesuudae.
41014057	Tonyout ŋice, kisudokis temasi,
41014058	“Ikipotu isua eirasi iŋes ebala, ‘Etuwori Akai ka Akuj na ŋina adukete ŋituŋa a ŋakan, ido alotooma ŋirwa ŋiuni, odukok ace ŋina nyepedorete ŋakan a ŋituŋa akiduk’ ”.
41014059	Ŋakiro a ŋul daŋ, pa acamuna.
41014060	Tonyou Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi, towo alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, kiŋit Yesu tema, “Emam iyoŋ akirot ŋina iboŋokini a? Anukiro ikisitakinitotor iyoŋ ŋituŋa lu?”
41014061	Kililiŋ Yesu cek, nyeboŋok adiokirot. Kiŋit nabo Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi iŋes tema, “Irae iyoŋ Kristo Lokoku ka Akuj a ŋina ipuroe a?”
41014062	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Arae; nabo iŋolikinete iyes Lokoku a Ituŋanan iboi aloteten Akuj ŋina alokidiama nooi ka ebuni alodowuon a ŋulu anakuj!”
41014063	Tocilicili Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋikeelowi tema, “Nyo nabo eriŋa ikiwaritor ŋisuudae ŋice!
41014064	Idaut iyes daŋ akiirar ŋiyiany keŋ. Nyo itamete tokona iyes?” Temasi daadaŋ, “Itemokino iŋes totwan.”
41014065	Kisyakis ŋice akimwaanakin iŋes, akirap ŋakonyen keŋ ka akibapabap iŋes ebasi, “Totedo ŋini ikibap iyoŋ?” Kibapabapata ŋisigarya daŋ iŋes.
41014066	Ani eriŋa Petero eyai lore ŋol, kitoru aketiyan apei ŋina ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi diye keŋ.
41014067	Ani iŋolikini iŋes Petero iwuaŋa anakim, kitek iŋes, tolimu tema, “Iyoŋ daŋ irukito ka Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret!”
41014068	Topeg Petero ŋun tema, “Nyayeni ayoŋ iŋes, nabo nyiyeni iyoŋ ŋuna irworo.” Torotok Petero a nen, tolot kiŋa diye epuke. [Apaki ŋinapei ŋin, toruuni ekokoroit.]
41014069	Toanyuwa nabo aketiyan ŋin iŋes, tolimok ŋituŋa ŋulu awuasi alodiye tema, “Erae lo epei alokidiŋ kec!”
41014070	Topeg nabo Petero ŋun. Kelunyar apaki ŋinauriyen, temasi ŋituŋa ŋulu awuasi alodiye Petero, “Kire jik irae iyoŋ daŋ epei alokidiŋ kec, anerae irae iyoŋ Egalilayat.”
41014071	Nai togeu Petero akilama ka akikoŋ tema, “Nyayeni ayoŋ ekile ŋolo ilimito iyes.”
41014072	Esaa ŋolopei, toru ekokoroit aruunet ŋina a ŋaarei. Totamu Petero ŋakiro ŋuna alimokinit Yesu iŋes ebe, “Takae nakwaare, eriŋa ekokoroit nyeruuno aruunet ŋina a ŋaarei, ipegi iyoŋ ŋapeget ŋauni atemar ikiyeni ayoŋ.” Ani etamuni Petero ŋun, kisyak akigworo nooi.
41015001	Taparacu sek, totukokinos ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok ka ŋiketatamak ŋulu a Ŋikisila ta Atukot daadaŋ. Toena ikes Yesu torikosi inakis Pilato.
41015002	Kiŋit Pilato Yesu tema, “Irae iyoŋ erwosit a Ŋiyudayan a?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes, “Ilimu iyoŋ.”
41015003	Kisitakis ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok Yesu a ŋakiro a ŋuna alalak.
41015004	Kiŋit nabo Pilato Yesu tema, “Emam ŋuna iboŋokini iyoŋ a? Kiira iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ikisitakinitotor ikes iyoŋ, elalak!”
41015005	Nai nyeboŋok Yesu adiokirot daŋ. Toumok nai Pilato nooi.
41015006	Anasuban a daadaŋ a ŋuna a Paska, amina Pilato alacanakin emabus daadaŋ ŋolo iŋisete ŋituŋa iŋes alacakin.
41015007	Ayai epei ŋolo anyaritae Baraba, ŋolo aŋerit apukan, ŋolo aenitae alomabus kaapei ka ŋulu aŋerito apukan, ŋulu kepotu toara icetuŋanan alojiye.
41015008	Tocelut ŋituŋa, kisyakis akilip Pilato alacakin emabus ikwaŋinapei sek elacanakinia.
41015009	Toboŋok Pilato ikes tema, “Icamito iyes olacak ayoŋ erwosit a Ŋiyudayan a?”
41015010	Totamu Pilato atemar, “Ekepotokis ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ayoŋ Yesu aŋuna ka arakao.”
41015011	Kicocoa nai ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ŋituŋa temasi, “Tolimokisi Pilato tolacak Baraba.”
41015012	Kiŋit nabo Pilato ŋituŋa tema, “Ekokini ayoŋ ekile lo ŋolo ibasi iyes erwosit a Ŋiyudayan ai?”
41015013	Tocelut nabo ikes temasi, “Kibubuk iŋes lomusalaba!”
41015014	Kiŋit Pilato ikes tema, “Nyo esecit iŋes?” Tocelut nabo nooi temasi, “Kibubuk iŋes!”
41015015	Aŋuna acamitor Pilato akitalakar aruruma ŋin, abu tolacak Baraba. Kisibuŋa ŋisigarya Yesu, ani irikakinete, yaasi ikes iŋes kibubukis lomusalaba.
41015016	Torikosi ŋisigarya Yesu tooma kai ŋina ke ekawuoikiniton ekepukan a Roma anakwap a ŋin, tonyaraut ŋisigarya ŋuluce daadaŋ.
41015017	Kitanapa Yesu elou ŋolo kipurat areŋan, toyeut aikit ŋina a ŋikukwa, kiwuakis nakou keŋ.
41015018	Kisyakis akyenar iŋes imalaete ebasi, “Toyai jik erwosit a Ŋiyudayan!”
41015019	Kikoŋikoŋo akeekou a ebela, kimwaanakis iŋes ka toryediko alokiŋaren keŋ.
41015020	Kedaut akisol iŋes, tolacasi elou ŋolo kipurat areŋan aneni keŋ, kitanapikis nai ŋilowi keŋ. Yaa ikes iŋes akibubukin lomusalaba.
41015021	Kiryamas ikes lorot ka ecekaloton ŋolo anyaritae Simoni, papa ka Alekisanda ka Rupus. Arae iŋes ŋolo alo Kurene, alosi lotaun. Toreikis ikes iŋes akiryoŋ emusalaba a Yesu.
41015022	Torikosi ikes Yesu tari Gologota, akeepolou iŋes atemar, “Akwap ŋina ka Akuulu.”
41015023	Inakis ikes iŋes epiini ŋolo enyalitae ka apid, towou Yesu akimat.
41015024	Kibubukis ikes Yesu, tokora ŋikeelowi, kilamilama ikotere totedoryata ŋini elemari elou ŋolo alacunete ikes aneni a Yesu, kiwuakis kiŋaren kec.
41015025	Ebubukinio Yesu lomusalaba ŋisaae ŋiuni ŋulu ka ataparacu.
41015026	Kigira lomusalaba ŋakiro ŋuna esitakinitere ebe, “ERWOSIT A ŊIYUDAYAN”.
41015027	Kibubukis ikes ŋikademanarak ŋiarei kaapei ka iŋes, epei teten ka ŋoloce kedyany keŋ. [
41015028	Kiyookinotor Ŋakigireta ŋuna igiritae ebe, “Aponi kimarakinae iŋes kaapei ka ŋikasecak.”]
41015029	Ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu kepotu kitorut nen, kiyanya yesu, kimuŋimuŋete ŋakyes ebasi, “Okoe! Iyoŋ ŋoon ibala ebe ituwori Akai ka Akuj, ido todukok nabo alotooma ŋirwa ŋiuni!
41015030	Toiun iyoŋ bon, todoku alomusalaba!”
41015031	Ŋisacaradotin daŋ ŋulu apolok kaapei ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila kisoloto iŋes ebasi, “Aiununui iŋes paaran ŋulucetuŋa, nai tokona nyeiun iŋes bon.
41015032	Eteutu cenite Kristo, erwosit a Isirael, edokuni alomusalaba; ikotere ikiyanyuni ka ikinupi daŋ.” Tari ŋulu ebubukinitoe kaapei ka iŋes, apotu tojamuwasi iŋes.
41015033	Ameun ŋisaae ŋikanikapei tari ŋikanikaomwon ŋulu ka apaaran, kiryoniar akwap daadaŋ cuc.
41015034	Ani edoli ŋisaae ŋikanikaomwon, kiworou Yesu a etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakasani?” Akeepolou iŋes atemar, “Akuj kaŋ, Akuj kaŋ, kaanukiro ikiesikinia iyoŋ ayoŋ?”
41015035	Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋulu edunyito iŋes ŋakiro ŋun, temasi, “Kiirasi, enyarit iŋes Eliya.”
41015036	Tomotun epei alokidiŋ kec, kilumok ibore ŋini yabuk lopiini ŋolo adadaŋan, toenik lobela, inak Yesu tomat. Tema iŋes ebe, “Edareutu mono! Eteutu cenite kebuni Eliya alacun iŋes alomusalaba.”
41015037	Kiworou Yesu a etoil a ŋolo apolon, kiridak nai.
41015038	Tocila anaŋga ŋina eneno alo Kai ka Akuj beret ageun alokidiama tari kwap.
41015039	Ŋolopite aanyuwarya ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat ŋolo awuoi a nen atemar eridak Yesu tema, “Kire, kerae ekile lo Lokoku ka Akuj.”
41015040	Toyakas ŋaberu ŋace ŋuna eteete iŋes aneni alwanan, arae Maria Magadalena, Maria toto a Yakobo ka Yose ta Salome.
41015041	Ani apaki ŋina ayakar iŋes Galileya, apotu ikes tonupa ŋakiro keŋ ka kiŋaranakinete iŋes. Aya nabo daŋ ŋaberu ŋuna alalak ŋuna apote kaapei ka Yesu tari Yerusalem.
41015042	Ani eboŋ akoloŋit ŋina a ŋakan ŋina etemonokinere aŋuna a Sabato,
41015043	bu Yosepu ŋolo ka Arimatea. Arae iŋes ekile ŋolo apolon a Natukot a Ŋiyudayan ka edarit Apukan ka Akuj bu. Tolot iŋes neni a Pilato, kiŋitak akuwan a Yesu.
41015044	Toumok Pilato iirari atemar keris Yesu atwana. Tonyara iŋes ekarikon a ŋisigarya amiat, kiŋit iŋes erae kire ketwanit Yesu.
41015045	Kedau Pilato akiirar aneni ke ekarikon a ŋisigarya, abu tocamak Yosepu alemar akuwan a Yesu.
41015046	Togyelu Yosepu anaŋga, ani kelemu akuwan kwap, kilogilogak anaŋga. Tosodi ya akuwan a Yesu nalyal ŋina abokakinitae nataaba. Kikokorik amoru ŋina apolon lokek ka alyal.
41015047	Kiteete Maria Magadalena ka Maria toto a Yose, neni eperikinio akuwan a Yesu.
41016001	Ani kelunyar akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, togyelut Maria Magadalena ka Maria toto a Yakobo, ta Salome akimyet ŋina akukunyon, ikotere kiwosyata akuwan a Yesu.
41016002	Ani taparacu Esabit ipiripiriuni akoloŋ, toloto ikes nalyal.
41016003	Kirworos alorot make ebasi, “Ŋae ikiŋarakini iwon akikokoriyor amoru alokek ka alyal?”
41016004	Ani nai ireorete ikes kidiama, toanyuwasi amoru kikokoriyor nawae, torae bo amoru ŋina apol nooi.
41016005	Toloto jik, ani elomarete ikes nalyal, toanyuwasi ekile ŋolo sorokit iboi alowae a ŋolo aloteten, enapit elou ŋolo akwaŋan kya. Tobul ikes nooi.
41016006	Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Nyikibul! Ayeni ayoŋ atemar, iwarito iyes Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret, ŋolo ebubukinitoe lomusalaba. Ayaru iŋes, emam a ne. Kiŋolikisi neni eperikinitoe iŋes.
41016007	Nai toloto, tolimokisi ŋikeekasyomak ka Petero atemar, ‘Elosi iŋes Galileya, ikiŋarenikini iyes! Iryamunete iŋes aina, ikwapei ikilimokinitor iŋes iyes.’ ”
41016008	Kelomasi ikes kiŋa, toema analyal, anerae amaranete ka tobulite daŋ. Nyelimokis ikes idiotuŋanan ŋakiro ŋun, anerae abulit ikes nooi.
41016009	Ani keyaru Yesu taparacu akoloŋit ŋina ke Esabit, totakanu iŋes neni a Maria Magadalena ŋina eritari iŋes ŋipyan ŋikanikaarei aneni keŋ.
41016010	Tolot iŋes, tolimok ŋirukitos keŋ ŋulu egworosi ka kiyaloloŋete daŋ.
41016011	Ani iirarete ikes Maria Magadalena ebala, “Ayaru Yesu, eŋolik ayoŋ”, nyenupa ikes ŋakiro keŋ.
41016012	Ekaku, totakanu Yesu egelaana neni a ŋuluarei, apaki ŋina alosyoto ikes alorot.
41016013	Toloto ikes tolimokis ŋuluce, nai nyenupa ikes daŋ.
41016014	Ekaku, abu Yesu totakanu neni a ŋikasyomak keŋ a ŋulutomon ka epei apaki ŋina emujata. Kisibura iŋes ikes aŋuna pa anupitotor ka aŋuna ka aniniku a ŋatameta kec, anerae nyenupa ikes ŋakiro a ŋulu kepotu toanyut iŋes eyaruni.
41016015	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Apesi nakwapin daadaŋ, kitatama ŋituŋa daadaŋ Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Akuj.
41016016	Ituŋanan ŋini enupi kibatisae, eiunio, nai ŋini nyenupi, etubokinio.
41016017	Ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna einakinio ŋikanupak akitiya ikes nu: iritanarete ikes ŋipyan alokiro kaŋ, epedorete erwor ŋaŋajepa ŋuna kitet;
41016018	ikamunete ikes ŋimuno a ŋakecekan, kemata ikes tari ibore ŋini aaran, nyewani ikes jik; idokokinete ŋakecekan lokadyakak, kitaŋaleut.”
41016019	Kedau Ekapolon Yesu erwori neni kec, aponi yae iŋes nakuj, kiboikin nakan ŋina aloteten Akuj.
41016020	Toloto ŋikasyomak alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lobukui daadaŋ, kitiyata ikes ka Ekapolon kaapei, kitoodiun daŋ akitatam kec erae ŋina iyookino aŋuna a ŋakujuwuanisya a ŋuna etiyaete ikes.]
42001001	Ekapolon Teopilo, Ageut ŋikalalak akigir ŋiemuto a ŋakiro a ŋuna etiyakinosi alokidiŋ yok.
42001002	Ikote nenipei ikilimokinitotor iwon ŋituŋa ŋulu aanyunito ka kiseraete daŋ anageunet.
42001003	Aŋun, esibit ejok ayoŋ daŋ akigir ŋakiro ŋun iriyan neni kon, anerae adau ayoŋ akimimaun ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, ameun anakisyakinet kec.
42001004	Etiyae ayoŋ ŋun, ikotere toyenunia iyoŋ abeit kire ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋuna kikitatamianakinio iyoŋ.
42001005	Ŋirwa ŋulu araakar Erode erwosit a Yudaya, ayai esacaradoti ŋolo anyaritae Sakariya, ŋolo ka atukot a ŋina ka Abiya. Ayai iŋes aberu ŋina anyaritae Elisabet, ŋina arae ŋina anateker ka Aron.
42001006	Eyookino ikes daadaŋ alokiŋaren Akuj, ericakinito ŋakiciketa ka Ŋikisila ŋulu ke Ekapolon, emam akisec.
42001007	Nai amamukatar ikes ikoku, anerae akolupana Elisabet; nabo daŋ amojoŋito ikes.
42001008	Apeikoloŋit etiyae Sakariya ekeetic ŋolo ke esacaradoti alokiŋaren Akuj, akoloŋit ŋina araakar akitiyaet ŋina ka atukot a ŋina a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu ayai Sakariya.
42001009	Aponi iŋes toseunae alomar Kai ka Akuj a Ekapolon akicunyakin eminae ŋolo ke ekinyate a Namuroet, ikwaŋina ecikakinitere ŋisacaradotin.
42001010	Elipi asepic a ŋituŋa alokiŋa nen apaki ŋina ecunyakinere eminae ŋolo ke ekinyate.
42001011	Apaki ŋin, totakanu emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon neni keŋ ewuoi aloteten Namuroet ŋina ecunyere eminae ŋolo ke ekinyate.
42001012	Ani iŋolikini Sakariya emalaika, toryaŋakin tobul.
42001013	Nai tolimok emalaika iŋes tema, “Nyikuryaniar Sakariya, anerae eira Akuj akonikilip, idouni akoniberu Elisabet ikoku ŋini sapat, ilimokini iyoŋ ekeekiro Yoana.
42001014	Iryamuni iyoŋ alelyan ka alakara, elakarosi nooi ŋikalalak aŋuna ka akidouno keŋ;
42001015	anerae erwoniar iŋes alokiŋaren Ekapolon. Nyitemokino iŋes tomat epiini kori idiobore ŋini ikitemerakini, ilelebun iŋes Etau ŋolo Asegan, tari eriŋa eyai nakook a toto keŋ.
42001016	Inyakuni iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋulu a Isirael neni ke Ekapolon Akuj kec.
42001017	Iŋarenikini iŋes Ekapolon, etitiny ka togogoŋ ikwa ekadwaran Eliya. Imorikini iŋes atapapa ka ŋidwe, tocamunos; nabo ibelekini iŋes ŋulu eŋerito Akuj kiwuapa aosou a ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna iyookino, kitemok ŋituŋa kidarut Ekapolon.”
42001018	Kiŋit Sakariya emalaika tema, “Ekokini ayoŋ aanyuni ŋakiro ŋun ai? Anerae amojoŋit ayoŋ, akaaberu daŋ alunyarosi ŋikaru keŋ.”
42001019	Toboŋok emalaika tema, “Ayoŋ Gaburiel, ŋolo awuoi alokiŋaren Akuj. Ekeyakuunitae ayoŋ neni kon, alimokin iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ajokak ŋun.
42001020	Tokona aŋuna iwuounia iyoŋ akinup ŋakiro kaŋ ŋuna iyookin apeikoloŋit, ikisililiŋio iyoŋ nyirworik akitodol akoloŋit ŋina iyookinotor ŋakiro ŋun.”
42001021	Apaki ŋin edarito ŋituŋa Sakariya, toumokinito daŋ aŋuna adidiyo iŋes alo Kai ka Akuj.
42001022	Ani elomuni iŋes kiŋa, nyepedo akisirwor ikes. Toyenut nai ikes atemar keanyu iŋes atakanikinet alo Kai ka Akuj. Kisirwor iŋes ikes a ŋakan, ido torubak pa irworo.
42001023	Ani kelunyar ŋirwa ŋulu ke etic keŋ, tolot Sakariya lore keŋ.
42001024	Ekaku a ŋirwa a ŋul, abu akeeberu Elisabet topoti, kiboi iŋes alokai ŋilapyo ŋikan ebala,
42001025	“Erae nu ŋuna etiyak Ekapolon neni kaŋ, ŋirwa lu ŋulu ekesyonio iŋes ayoŋ; alema ŋileec kaŋ alotuŋa!”
42001026	Ani edoli Elisabet ŋilapyo ŋikanikapei epoti, kiyakiya Akuj emalaika Gaburiel nakwap ŋina a Galileya, lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Nasaret;
42001027	neni ka apese a ŋina pa eryamakina ka ekile, ŋina eikinitere Yosepu ŋolo anateker a Daudi. Arae ekiro ka apese Maria.
42001028	Tolot emalaika toloma kai ŋina ayai Maria, kimala iŋes tema, “Maata iyoŋ ŋina ikitojokit Akuj! Iyakasi iyoŋ ke Ekapolon!”
42001029	Tosuri etau a Maria nooi totamatama ebala, “Okoe, alimalas lo?”
42001030	Tolimok emalaika iŋes tema, “Nyikuryaniar Maria, anerae ikiseu Akuj iyoŋ,
42001031	ipotiuni iyoŋ kidou ikoku ŋini sapat, tolimok ekeekiro Yesu.
42001032	Erwoniar iŋes ka enyarao Lokoku ka Akuj a ŋina alokidiama nooi. Isiboikini Akuj iŋes lokicoloŋ a papa keŋ Daudi.
42001033	Ipukae iŋes ateker a Yakobo ŋikaru ka ŋikaru, nabo nyedaun Apukan keŋ!”
42001034	Tolimok Maria emalaika tema, “Arae ayoŋ apese ŋina nyikiryamakina ka ekile, epedor ŋakiro ŋun ikwaani?”
42001035	Toboŋok emalaika tema, “Ebuni Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kon, nabo ikirapuwari iyoŋ apedor ŋina ka Akuj a ŋina alokidiama, ikwa aribo ŋina ke edou. Aŋun, ikoku ŋini idouni iyoŋ, eruwor ŋini ka Akuj ka enyarao Lokoku ka Akuj.
42001036	Toanyu mono iyoŋ tari nakaaya kon daŋ Elisabet, ŋina sek ebookoi akolup, adol ŋilapyo ŋikanikapei epoti ikoku ŋini sapat, tari kemojoŋit daŋ.
42001037	Anerae emam ibore ŋini ipiyori Akuj.”
42001038	Tema nai Maria, “Arae ayoŋ aketiyan ŋina ke Ekapolon; kitiyakin neni kaŋ ikwaŋinapei ilimunio iyoŋ.” Kelunyar ŋun, tonyou emalaika tolot.
42001039	Alorwa a ŋulupei, abu Maria tonyou atipei, tolot nakwap ŋina a ŋikamukumukui lotaun ŋolo a Yudaya.
42001040	Toloma iŋes lore a Sakariya, kimala Elisabet.
42001041	Ŋolopite eirarya Elisabet emalas a Maria, kicurok ikoku anakook keŋ, kilelebikin Etau ŋolo Asegan tooma keŋ.
42001042	Kiworou iŋes a etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Irereŋ iyoŋ alokidiŋ ŋaberu ka ikoku ŋini ipoti iyoŋ erereŋ iŋes daŋ.
42001043	Okoe, anukiro apolok etiyakin neni kaŋ nu, ŋuna abunio tari toto ke Ekapolon kaŋ neni kaŋ?
42001044	Anerae ŋolopite eirarya ayoŋ emalas kon, kicurok ikoku ka alelyan anakook kaŋ.
42001045	Irereŋ iyoŋ aŋuna inupya atemar iyookin akirot ŋina ke Ekapolon aneni kon!”
42001046	Tema Maria, “Itopoloorit ekaatau Ekapolon;
42001047	elelyani etau kaŋ aŋuna ka Akuj Ekaiunan kaŋ,
42001048	anerae adau iŋes akiŋolikin akitiditeuna a aketiyan keŋ. Ameun tokona, akanyaraete ayoŋ ŋanyameta daadaŋ akarereŋon,
42001049	anerae Akuj ŋina ka apedor eketiyak ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna apolok, eseg ekiro keŋ.
42001050	Eyai akisyon keŋ neni a ŋulu ekerito iŋes ananyameta a daadaŋ.
42001051	Etiya iŋes ŋakiro ŋuna apolok a akeekan, eela ŋulu eturok alotai kec.
42001052	Ekota iŋes ŋikapolok alokicoloŋo kec, ka etopoloo ŋulu itiditeuna alotai kec.
42001053	Esimwon a ŋiboro a ŋulu ajokak ŋulu enyamit akoro, erita ŋulu abarak eokito ŋakan.
42001054	Eŋarak iŋes Isirael eketiyan keŋ, aŋuna atamunia akisyon keŋ;
42001055	ikwaŋina kirworor neni atapapaa yok, Aburaam ka ŋiletok keŋ ŋikaru ka ŋikaru.”
42001056	Kiboyoto nai Maria ka Elisabet ŋilapyo ŋiuni; ani ekaku, toboŋo lore kec.
42001057	Todol ŋirwa ŋulu edounio Elisabet, kidou iŋes ikoku ŋini sapat.
42001058	Kiirasi ŋikeekidunyet ka ŋikeeyeneta atemar esyon Akuj iŋes, tolakaros ka iŋes kaapei.
42001059	Ani edoli ŋirwa ŋikanikauni ŋulu kileŋeret ikoku, kiitana ŋituŋa alimokin iŋes ekiro ŋolo anyaritae Sakariya, ekiro a papa keŋ.
42001060	Tema toto keŋ, “Nyenyarao iŋes ikoŋina, elimokinio Yoana.”
42001061	Temasi ikes, “Emam anateker kon ituŋanan elimokinitae ekiro ŋol.”
42001062	Toketut nai ikes papa keŋ akiŋit ekiro ŋolo ecamit iŋes tolimokinae ikoku.
42001063	Kilipu iŋes abao ŋina kigira, kigir ebe, “Erae ekeekiro Yoana.” Toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
42001064	Anenipei tolacakin aŋajep a Sakariya, toŋaar etoil keŋ, togeu iŋes akipuro Akuj.
42001065	Min akuryanu lokidunyet daadaŋ, tokeikin daŋ ŋakiro ŋun akwap ŋina a Yudaya daadaŋ ŋina a ŋikamukumukui.
42001066	Ŋulu daadaŋ eirarete, apotu totamatamata alotai kec temasi, “Okoe, eruwor ikoku en nyo? Anerae ileere atemar eyai apedor ŋina ke Ekapolon neni keŋ.”
42001067	Kilelebun Etau ŋolo Asegan neni a Sakariya todwar iŋes tema,
42001068	“Kipuroe Ekapolon Akuj a Isirael, anerae abu iŋes lotuŋa keŋ alacakin ikes.
42001069	Ikiinak iwon Ekaiunan ŋolo etiron anateker a Daudi eketiyan keŋ.
42001070	Erae nu ŋuna koloŋ ikiikinit iŋes iwon alorwor a ŋikadwarak a ŋulu ka Akuj
42001071	ebe, itemokino iwon itoiun alomoe yok ka anapedor a ŋulu ikiremokino iwon.
42001072	Etoodik iŋes atapapaa yok akisyon keŋ ka atamu Acamunet keŋ ŋina asegan.
42001073	akikoŋiet ŋina koloŋ ekoŋi iŋes neni a papa yok Aburaam.
42001074	Erae akikoŋiet keŋ aiun iwon alomoe yok, opedoryata nai iwon akitiya ekeetic emam akuryanu.
42001075	Oruworotor iwon ŋulu asegak ŋulu ikiyookino aneni keŋ ŋirwa daadaŋ ŋulu ikiyarya iwon.
42001076	Iyoŋ ikoku ŋini cici, ikinyarao ekadwaran ŋolo ka Akuj a ŋina alokidiama nooi; anerae iŋarenikini iyoŋ Ekapolon, kitemonok ŋirotin keŋ.
42001077	Tolimonok ikes atemar eiunio ikes aŋuna isyoniyere ŋasecisya kec.
42001078	Epatana nooi Akuj yok ka isyoniono. Abu aiuno keŋ neni yok ikoni neni ipiripirunia akoloŋ
42001079	ka ayau akica neni a ŋulu eyakasi nakiryonut ŋina ka asecit ka atwanare, ikitena iwon lorotin ŋulu ke ekisil.”
42001080	Topolou ikoku togogoŋior alotau keŋ; kiboi iŋes anariet akitodol akoloŋit ŋina etoodikinere iŋes neni a Ŋisirael.
42002001	Ŋirwa ŋul, tolimu Agusto ekepukan a Roma atemar itemokino kigirae ka kimarae ŋituŋa ka akwap daadaŋ.
42002002	Arae ŋin akigiro ŋina esyaunan ŋirwa ŋulu araakar Kurino ekepukan ŋolo a Siria.
42002003	Toloto nai ŋituŋa daadaŋ akigiro; a ŋinituŋanan tolot lokitela a papa keŋ.
42002004	Tonyou Yosepu daŋ alore a Nasaret a ŋolo eyai nakwap ŋina a Galileya, tolot lotaun a Daudi ŋolo anyaritae Betelem anakwap a ŋina a Yudaya. Alosi iŋes inaa, anerae arae iŋes ŋolo anateker a Daudi.
42002005	Torukosi iŋes ka Maria ŋina eikinitae iŋes akiit, ŋina daŋ apoti.
42002006	Ani eriŋa ikes eya Betelem, todol ŋirwa ŋulu idounio Maria.
42002007	Kidou iŋes ikoku keŋ ŋini sapat ŋini kiyae, kimukok ŋilowi, kiperik iŋes nataker ŋina amasyata ŋaatuk, anerae amam ikes neni perot ka adidiŋ akai ŋina a ŋipeyok.
42002008	Ayakasi nakwap ŋin ŋikeyokok ŋulu aperikinito ŋikecebaren nakwaare.
42002009	Totakanik emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon neni kec, tocaik akica ŋina ke Ekapolon ikes, tokuryaketa ikes nooi.
42002010	Tolimok emalaika ikes tema, “Nyikuryaketa, akainunit ayoŋ iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna italakarete nooi ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
42002011	Anerae nakuwar na, edoun Ekaiunan kus alotaun a Daudi – Kristo ŋolo erae Ekapolon!
42002012	Erae na akitaanyikinet ŋina ianyuniata iyes: iryamunete ikoku ŋini cici ŋini imukoritae a ŋilowi eperi anataker a ŋina emasyata ŋaatuk!”
42002013	Ŋinapeipaki, bu asepic ŋina a ŋimalaikan anakuj, kimorikin ka emalaika ŋol, toeikis ipurosi Akuj ebasi,
42002014	“Akipuro toyai kidiama neni ka Akuj, ka ekisil nakwap neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu italakarito Akuj!”
42002015	Ani eboŋorete ŋimalaikan nakuj, kirworikinos ŋikeyokok make temasi, “Oloto Betelem, oanyutu ŋakiro ŋuna ketakanut ŋuna ikilimok Ekapolon iwon.”
42002016	Kikomakis ikes atipei, toryamut Maria ka Yosepu ta ikoku ŋini cici ŋini aperi anataker.
42002017	Ani iŋolikinete ŋikeyokok iŋes, tolimokis ikes ŋakiro ŋuna alimokinit emalaika ikes aŋuna a ikoku a ŋin.
42002018	Ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu apotu kiirasi, toumokis aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna erworosi ŋikeyokok.
42002019	Kiric nai Maria ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, ido eomoomoe alotau keŋ.
42002020	Toboŋosi ŋikeyokok ipurosi ka emaete Akuj, aŋuna a ŋakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna eirarete ikes ka ŋuna eŋolikinete daŋ, ikoŋinapei alimokinitere ikes.
42002021	Ani edoli ŋirwa ŋikanikauni ŋulu kileŋeret ikoku, tolimokinae ekeekiro Yesu, ekiro ŋolo alimori emalaika eriŋa nyepotiuno iŋes.
42002022	Ani edoli akoloŋit ŋina kitesegunet Maria ka Yosepu, ikwaŋina igiritere Lokisila a Moses, toloto ikes Yerusalem akitoodiyar ikoku kiŋaren Ekapolon.
42002023	(Ikwaŋinapei igiritere Lokisila ŋulu ke Ekapolon ebe, “Ŋinikoku sapat ŋini erae ikiyae, itemokino kitaleoroe neni ke Ekapolon.”)
42002024	Tolemut daŋ ikes amuronot ŋina einakinio Akuj, ŋakuryo ŋaarei kori ŋicwi ŋulu a ŋakuryo ŋiarei, ikwaŋina elimunitere a Lokisila ke Ekapolon.
42002025	Ayai Yerusalem ekile ŋolo anyaritae Simeon. Arae iŋes ekile ŋolo eyookino ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj; edarit iŋes akoloŋit ŋina eiunere Isirael, nabo ayai Etau ŋolo Asegan neni keŋ.
42002026	Alimokinit Etau ŋolo Asegan iŋes atemar nyetwani eriŋa nyiŋolikina Kristo ŋolo ke Ekapolon.
42002027	Yau Etau ŋolo Asegan iŋes Kai ka Akuj. Ani eyaunete ŋikauruunak ikoku Yesu Kai ka Akuj akitale ikwaŋina elimunitere a Lokisila,
42002028	todak Simeon ikoku, kipur Akuj tema,
42002029	“Iyook tokona iyoŋ Ekapolon akiikinet kon, kimyekinae nai ekoniketiyan eeŋu a ekisil.
42002030	Anerae aanyu ayon elope aiuno kon,
42002031	ŋina itemok iyoŋ alokiŋaren ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
42002032	Akica ŋina ecaikini lobukui ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ka ŋina erae akipuro ŋina a ŋituŋa kon Isirael.”
42002033	Toumokis Papa ka toto a ikoku aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna erworoe aŋuna a ikoku.
42002034	Kiterereŋ Simeon ikes, tolimok nai iŋes Maria toto a Yesu tema, “Aseu Akuj ikoku en, ikotere inyasunotor ŋikalalak ka ikotere eiunotor ŋikalalak alo Isirael. Erae daŋ iŋes akitaanyikinet aneni ka Akuj ŋina epegete ŋikalalak,
42002035	ikotere ileereunioto ŋakiro ŋuna imunonito ikes alotai kec. (Tari iyoŋ alope, ikiryebete ŋican etau esibit ikicumitae ka atum.)”
42002036	Ayai akadwaran ŋina anyaritae Ana, nakoku a Panuel a ŋolo ka ateker a ŋina ka Aser. Amojoŋit iŋes nooi. Kiboito iŋes ka lokile keŋ ŋikaru ŋikanikaarei bon ameun ŋina eisere iŋes.
42002037	Arae iŋes apuserut ŋina adolito ŋikeekaru ŋatomonikanikauni ka ŋiomwon. Pa arotonokini iŋes alo Kai ka Akuj; etiyae etic ŋolo ke Ekapolon Akuj apaaran jwii ka akuwar kya, kikanyanakini akimuj kilipi akilip bon.
42002038	Todolu iŋes apaki ŋinapei ŋin tolakar neni ka Akuj, tolimok ŋakiro ŋuna a ikoku lotuŋa daadaŋ ŋulu edarito aiuno a Yerusalem.
42002039	Ani kedaut ikes akitiya ŋakiro daadaŋ ikwaŋina ecikakinitere a Lokisila a ŋulu ke Ekapolon, toboŋosi Galileya, toloto lore kec Nasaret.
42002040	Topolou ikoku, togogoŋior, kilelebun aosou; kiterereŋ Akuj iŋes. Akuj aŋuna keŋ.
42002041	A ŋolokaru aloseneneete ŋikauruunak a Yesu Yerusalem nasuban ŋuna a Paska.
42002042	Ani edolete ŋikaru a Yesu ŋitomon ka ŋiarei, toloto ikes Yerusalem ikwapei araakar ekecetal.
42002043	Ani edaunosi ŋasuban ŋuna a Paska, toboŋosi ikes lore; nai kebu esapat Yesu kidoŋ Yerusalem pa eyenete ŋikeekauruunak.
42002044	Atamete ikes atemar kori ayai iŋes nasepic a ŋikalotok; toloto ikes akoloŋit ŋin daadaŋ akiwarit iŋes loyeneta ka lokonei kec.
42002045	Ani eŋopikini iŋes ikes, toboŋosi Yerusalem akiwarit iŋes.
42002046	Kedaunosi ŋirwa ŋiuni, apotu toryamut iŋes alotooma Akai ka Akuj iboiyete ka ŋiketatamak, epupi ŋuna erworosi ikes, nabo kiŋisenenee ikes ŋakiro.
42002047	Toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu apupete iŋes aŋuna ka aosou a ŋina a ŋakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna aboŋonokini iŋes ikes.
42002048	Ani iŋolikinete ŋikauruunak keŋ Yesu, toumokis. Tolimok toto keŋ iŋes tema, “Aa robo lokoku, inyoni bo itiyaa iyoŋ neni kosi ikona? Ikiyaloloŋi ayoŋ ka Papa kon nooi ikiwarit iyoŋ.”
42002049	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Kaanukiro ikiwaritotor iyes ayoŋ? Pa iyenete iyes atemar itemokino ayoŋ oyai Kai a Papa kaŋ a?”
42002050	Nai nyeyenut ikes apolou ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋuna alimokini iŋes ikes.
42002051	Toboŋosi nai iŋes ka ikes Nasaret, kiboyoto ka ikes epupi ŋakecekiro. Kiricak toto keŋ ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ alotau keŋ.
42002052	Abu Yesu topolou ka kiyatakin aosou italakarit Akuj ka ŋituŋa.
42003001	Alokaru a ŋolo a ŋitomon ka ŋikan ipukat Tiberio akwap ŋina a Roma, torae Ponitio Pilato ekepukan a Yudaya, kipukate erwosit Erode Galileya, kipukate Pilipo lokaato ke Erode ŋakwapin ŋuna a Iture ka Trakonita, kipukate Lusania akwap ŋina ka Abilene,
42003002	toraakas Anas ka Kaipa ŋisacaradotin ŋulu Apolok nooi, abu akirot ŋina ka Akuj bu neni a Yoana a Lokoku a Sakariya analoŋisat.
42003003	Tolot Yoana nakwapin daadaŋ ŋuna edunyasi ka aŋolol Yorodan, kitatam ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ebala, “Tokiwa ŋasecisya kus, ikibatisae a ŋakipi, kisyonio Akuj ŋasecisya kus.”
42003004	Ikwaŋinapei igiritere lokitaabo ŋolo ke ekadwaran Isaya ebe, “Iworoe etoil a ituŋanan a ice analoŋisat ebala: ‘Kitemonokisi erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon; kisidiiryata neni itori iŋes!
42003005	Itemokino nenidipal daadaŋ kitiriyanae, itemokino ŋimukura ka ŋimoru tobwaŋabwaŋae. Itemokino ŋirotin ŋulu ilugilugito kisidiiri ka ŋirotin ŋulu sagam kitusulututae;
42003006	nabo eanyunete ŋituŋa daadaŋ aiuno ŋina ka Akuj!’ ”
42003007	Tolimok Yoana ŋasepico ŋuna aponito neni keŋ akibatisao tema, “Iyes ŋulu iroko ŋulu ikote ŋapomia, ŋae ikilimokini iyes atemar ipedorete abucar ananyunyura a ŋina ebunit aneni ka Akuj?
42003008	Kitiyata ŋiticisyo ŋulu itoodiunete atemar ikiwa iyes kire ŋasecisya kus. Tojoŋoto atemar alotai kus erae Aburaam papa kus. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, epedori Akuj akilocokin ŋamoru nu toruworos ŋidwe ŋulu ka Aburaam!
42003009	Edikino aep iteli ŋikito anataagor; ekitoe daadaŋ ŋolo nyeraii ŋaraito ŋuna ajokak, itelunio, tocakakinae nakim.”
42003010	Kiŋita ŋasepico iŋes temasi, “Ikokinio nai tokona isua ai?”
42003011	Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eyakar ŋilowi ŋiarei, itemokino tomora ka ŋini eleri; ani nabo ŋini eyakar akimuj, itemokino tomora ka ŋuluce.”
42003012	Potu ŋikerirak ocur daŋ akibatisao. Kiŋita ikes iŋes temasi, “Eketataman, nyo itemokino isua kitiyae?”
42003013	Toboŋok iŋes ikes tema, “Nyiriraut ŋisiliŋa ŋulu edeparito ŋulu ikilimokinitae iyes.”
42003014	Kiŋita ŋisigarya daŋ iŋes temasi, “Ani bo isua ikikokini ai?” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Nyidemasi tari ipeituŋanan daŋ idiobore ka agogoŋu, kori nyisitakis ituŋanan idio koŋin; tonaikinitotor eropit kus.”
42003015	Ikwaŋina edaritotor ŋituŋa daadaŋ, totamakis ikes atemar kori erae Yoana Messia.
42003016	Toboŋok Yoana ikes daadaŋ tema, “Kire ekebatisae ayoŋ iyes a ŋakipi, nai ebunit ŋolo ekeloit ayoŋ ŋolo nyapedori ayoŋ tari alacakin ŋakeemuk. Ikibatisae iŋes iyes a Etau a ŋolo Asegan ka akim.
42003017	Eyakar iŋes nakan keŋ erite, ikotere epyetarya ŋimomwa ejok analos, tocunak lodulae keŋ; kicunyak nai ŋatunyeny anakim a ŋina nyeduŋe.”
42003018	Alorotin a ŋice a ŋulu alalak, abu Yoana kiserak Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lotuŋa.
42003019	Nai abu Erode erwosit, aŋuna etoronia Yoana iŋes aŋuna eturuworya iŋes Erodiya ŋina arae aberu a lokaato keŋ ŋina keŋ ka aŋuna a ŋiboro a ŋulu aronok a daadaŋ a ŋulu kitiyat iŋes;
42003020	kiyatak aronis keŋ, toen Yoana alomabus.
42003021	Apeikoloŋit kedaun akibatis ŋituŋa daadaŋ, kibatisae Yesu daŋ. Ani eriŋa Yesu ilipi, toŋaar nakuj.
42003022	Bu Etau ŋolo Asegan ikoni akuri min kidiama keŋ, ido kirworik etoil anakuj tema, “Irae iyoŋ Lokoku kaŋ ŋolo minat ŋolo alelyania ayoŋ.”
42003023	Aapikinito ŋikaru a Yesu ŋatomoniuni apaki ŋina esyakinia iŋes akitatam. Atamakinito ŋituŋa atemar erae iŋes lokoku a Yosepu, a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Eli, ŋolo arae
42003024	lokoku a Matat, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Lepi, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Malaki, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yannai, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yosepu, a ŋolo arae
42003025	lokoku a Matatia, a ŋolo arae lokoku ka Amos, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Naum, a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Esili, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Nagai,
42003026	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Maat, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Matatia, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Semein, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yosek, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yoda,
42003027	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yoanan, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Resa, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Serubabel, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Selatiel, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Neri,
42003028	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Meleki, a ŋolo arae lokoku ka Adi, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Kosam, a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Elimadam, a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Ere,
42003029	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yosua, a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Eliesa, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yorim, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Matat, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Lepi,
42003030	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Simeon, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yuda, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yosepu, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yonam, a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Eliakim,
42003031	a ŋolo arae lokoku ka Melea, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Mena, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Matata, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Natan, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Daudi,
42003032	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yese, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Obed, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Boas, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Salimon, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Nason,
42003033	a ŋolo arae lokoku ka Aminadab, a ŋolo arae lokoku ka Arani, a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Esiron, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Peres, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yuda,
42003034	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yakobo, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Isaka, a ŋolo arae lokoku ka Aburaam, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Tera, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Nakor,
42003035	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Serugo, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Reu, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Peleg, a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Eber, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Sela,
42003036	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Kainan, a ŋolo arae lokoku ka Arupakisad, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Sem, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Noa, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Lamek,
42003037	a ŋolo arae lokoku a Metusela, a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Enok, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Yared, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Malaleel, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Kainan,
42003038	a ŋolo arae lokoku ke Enos, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Set, a ŋolo arae lokoku ka Adam, a ŋolo arae lokoku ka Akuj.
42004001	Toboŋu Yesu alo Yorodan ileleba Etau ŋolo Asegan ŋolo abu toriko iŋes naloŋisat,
