42004002	kiboi aina ŋirwa ŋatomoniomwon, kitem Satan iŋes. Kiriya iŋes ŋirwa ŋul daadaŋ nyimuja, tonyam nai akoro.
42004003	Tolimok Satan iŋes tema, “Ani kirae iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj, tolimok ceni amoru na toruwor akimuj.”
42004004	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Nyeyari ituŋanan ka akimuj bon.’ ”
42004005	Toriko Satan Yesu kidiama emoru, kitoodik iŋes ŋibukui ŋulu ka akwap daadaŋ apeikitoodikinet bon,
42004006	tolimok iŋes tema, “Akainakini ayoŋ iyoŋ apolou ka ebari lo daadaŋ; akainakinio koloŋ ayoŋ daŋ ka apedori ayoŋ ainakin ŋinituŋanan acamit.
42004007	Ŋiboro lu daadaŋ eruworosi ŋulu kon, erae kiryedik iyoŋ alokiŋaren kaŋ, ikima ayoŋ.”
42004008	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Iryediki iyoŋ kitopoloo Ekapolon Akuj kon, kitiyanak iŋes bon!’ ”
42004009	Toriko nabo Satan Yesu Yerusalem, kitowuo iŋes alobibiru a ŋolo ka Akai ka Akuj, tolimok iŋes tema, “Ani kirae iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj, kimasar kwap a ne.
42004010	Anerae igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Icikakini Akuj ŋimalaikan keŋ akiyok iyoŋ.’
42004011	Igiritae nabo daŋ atemar, ‘Ikigagaunete iyoŋ a ŋakan kec, ikotere nyewan amoru tari ŋakejen kon.’ ”
42004012	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ebookoi ebe, ‘Nyitem Ekapolon Akuj kon.’ ”
42004013	Kedau Satan akitem Yesu a ŋirotin a daadaŋ, abu iŋes toesik Yesu mono.
42004014	Toboŋo Yesu Galileya ileleba apedor ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan neni keŋ, tokeikin ŋakiro keŋ nakwap ŋin daadaŋ.
42004015	Etatami iŋes alosinagogae kec ka apotu ŋituŋa daadaŋ kituruut iŋes.
42004016	Bu nai Yesu Nasaret neni koloŋ apolounio iŋes; ani akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, tolot losinagoga ikwaŋinapei sek. Abu iŋes tonyou akisyom;
42004017	inakinae iŋes ekitaabo ŋolo ke ekadwaran Isaya. Toŋaa iŋes ekitaabo, toŋau neni egiritae ebe,
42004018	“Eyai Etau ke Ekapolon neni kaŋ, anerae ekeos iŋes ayoŋ aŋuna ka akiserakin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lokulyak. ekeyakuu iŋes ayoŋ alimokin ŋulu eenitae atemar elacakinio ikes ka aŋaar ŋakonyen a ŋimudukanotin ka alakakin ŋipi,
42004019	ta akiseraun atemar adol apaki ŋina eiunia Ekapolon ŋituŋa keŋ.”
42004020	Togolok Yesu ekitaabo, inak eketiyan, kiboikin nai iŋes. Kitekis ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aya losinagoga iŋes nooi.
42004021	Kisyak iŋes alimonokin ikes tema, “Nakoloŋit na, eyookinosi ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta nu, ikwaŋina sek ipupyoto iyes esyomyo.”
42004022	Apotu ŋituŋa daadaŋ kipuro iŋes ka toumokis ikes a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak a ŋuna erworo iŋes temasi, “Meere nai lo lokoku a Yosepu a?”
42004023	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ayeni ayoŋ atemar ikilimokinete iyes ayoŋ akitadapet ŋina ebala, ‘Emuron, kitaŋaleun bon. Ikiira isua daadaŋ ŋuna kibu iyoŋ kitiya alo Kaperenaum. Kitiya a ne anakwap kon daŋ ŋunapei.’
42004024	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, emam ekadwaran ŋolo ecamitae anakwap keŋ.”
42004025	“Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, alalak ŋapuseru alo Isirael ŋirwa ŋulu ke Eliya, ŋina aŋopiyarya akiru ŋikaru ŋiuni ka ŋilapyo ŋikanikapei, bu eron ŋolo aronon nooi nakwap ŋin daadaŋ.
42004026	Nai aponi nyiyakiyar Eliya tari neni ka apei a ŋuna aya Isirael, mati neni ka apuserut ka apei a ŋina ayai Serepito, nakwap ŋina a Sidonia.
42004027	Nabo aya ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋulu erumit atapon alo Isirael ŋirwa ŋulu ke ekadwaran Elisa; emam ikes ipei daŋ ŋini aponi kitaŋaleunoe, mati Naaman ŋolo ka akwap a ŋina a Siria.”
42004028	Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋulu aya losinagoga ŋakiro ŋun, toŋoa nooi.
42004029	Tonyout ikes, kijukasi iŋes kiŋa etaun, torikosi iŋes nakope ŋina ke emukura a ŋolo adukitoe etaun, anerae acamito ikes akimasar Yesu a nen.
42004030	Nai kitor Yesu kidiŋ kec, tolot.
42004031	Tolot Yesu Kaperenaum, lotaun epei alo Galileya; kitatam iŋes ŋituŋa akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato.
42004032	Toumokis ŋituŋa aŋuna ka akitatam keŋ, anerae etatami iŋes ka apedor.
42004033	Ayai tooma losinagoga ekile ŋolo ekamunit ekipye. Abu iŋes kiworou tema,
42004034	“Wooi! Eya iyoŋ ŋakiro ka isua Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret a? Ibunit iyoŋ amunyar isua a? Akayeni ayoŋ iyoŋ, irae iyoŋ ŋolo Asegan ŋolo ka Akuj!”
42004035	Kiŋenyak Yesu ekipye tema, “Kililiŋ, tolomu alokile a lo!” Toramak ekipye ekile ŋol kwap kidiŋ ŋituŋa, tolomu nai aneni keŋ, nyewana iŋes.
42004036	Toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ kirworikinos make temasi, “Anikirot na, ŋina eyakar ekile lo apedor ka apolou ŋina kiŋenyakinet ŋipyan, ido tolomut!”
42004037	Tokeikin arwonu a Yesu akwap ŋin daadaŋ.
42004038	Tonyou Yesu alosinagoga, tolot kai a Simoni. Ekamunit elekes nakamuran a Simoni nooi, ido aponi tolimokinae Yesu ŋakiro ka adyak keŋ.
42004039	Tolot Yesu towo alodiye ekitaada ŋolo ka aberu a ŋin, kiŋenyak elekes aesikin iŋes, toesik nai elekes iŋes atipei. Tonyou iŋes atipei, kisyak akisimuj ikes.
42004040	Ani edoiyori akoloŋ, apotu ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu adyakasi ŋikecetuŋa ŋidekesyo ŋulu agelegelya, yaut ikes neni a Yesu. Kidokonok iŋes ikes daadaŋ ŋakan, kitaŋaleu.
42004041	Tari ŋipyan apotu tolomut alotuŋa iworoete ebasi, “Irae iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj!” Nai kikilyanak Yesu ikes nyecamak tari epei akirworikin, anerae ayenete ikes atemar Yesu erae Kristo.
42004042	Ani iwalari, tonyou Yesu alore, tolot nariet. Kisyakis ŋituŋa akiwarit iŋes; ani eryamunete, kiitana akiretakin iŋes nyelot iwace.
42004043	Nai tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Itemokino ayoŋ etatam Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj tari lotaunio ŋuluce daŋ; anerae erae ŋun ekeyakuunitere ayoŋ.”
42004044	Kitatamenenee iŋes alosinagogae a ŋulu ka akwap a ŋin.
42005001	Apeikoloŋit ewuoi Yesu alokipetot a ŋolo ka anam a Genesaret, todiŋun ŋituŋa neni keŋ ecamito akiirar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
42005002	Kiŋolik iŋes ŋatakerin ŋaarei eya lokipetot ŋolo ka anam, aya ŋikekamak ŋikolya kiŋa kec, alokete ŋatibae kec.
42005003	Todoka Yesu nataker apei ŋina arae ŋina a Simoni, tolimok iŋes tema, “Kisiyoto iwadio alokipetot.” Kiboikin nai Yesu nataker, kitatam ŋituŋa eyakasi lokipetot.
42005004	Ani kirikak Yesu akitatam, tolimok iŋes Simoni tema, “Kisiyoto ataker nenicukul, tolokak ŋatibae kus nanam, kikamuniata ŋikolya.”
42005005	Tolimok Simoni iŋes tema, “Eketataman, ikitiya isua akuwar kya, nai emam ibore ikikam ipei daŋ. Ani bo ca tokona kilimunit iyoŋ ikoŋina, acakakini ayoŋ ŋatibae nanam.”
42005006	Tocakakis ikes ŋatibae, ido kikamut ŋikolya ŋulu alalak nooi, ŋulu adikino eŋedeŋedaarete ŋatibae kec.
42005007	Toketut ikes ŋikecerukitos ŋulu anataker a ŋinace aponare akiŋarakin ikes. Potu nai ikes kilelebikis ŋikolya natakerin ŋunaarei ŋun, todikino esiporete.
42005008	Ani iŋolikini Simoni Petero ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakin, toryedik alokiŋaren Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, kiyotok aneni kaŋ, anerae arae ayoŋ ekasecan!”
42005009	Tobul iŋes ka ŋirukitos keŋ aŋuna ka alalau a ŋikolya a ŋulu apotu ikes kikamut.
42005010	Tobul tari Yoana ka Yakobo ŋidwe a Sebedeo ŋulu arukitotor Simoni. Tolimok Yesu Simoni tema, “Nyikibul! Ameun tokona, iruwor iyoŋ ekekaman ŋituŋa.”
42005011	Tomiasi ikes ŋatakerin lokipetot, kimyekis nai ŋiboro daadaŋ, kiwuapakis Yesu.
42005012	Apeikoloŋit, ayai Yesu lotaun ece, ayai nen ekile ŋolo erumit atapon. Ani eanyuwari iŋes Yesu, toramakin kiŋaren nakejen keŋ, kijuuru kimaima iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ani kicamit iyoŋ, ipedori akitaŋaleun!”
42005013	Torwaa Yesu akan keŋ, totap iŋes tema, “Acamit; toŋaleu!” Ŋolopeikiro, todaun atapon alokile a ŋol.
42005014	Kicik Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyilimok idiotuŋanan ŋakiro nu, nai tolot kitoodiyar neni ka esacaradoti, ikisyem iŋes iyoŋ; ido tolemu ainakinet aŋuna ka asegun kon, ikwaŋina icikakinitor Moses; ikotere toanyunia ŋinituŋanan atemar isegu iyoŋ.”
42005015	Nai apotu ŋituŋa togeut akirworor Yesu nooi; aŋun, potu ŋasepico a ŋituŋa neni keŋ akiirar ŋakiro ka akitaŋaleuno alodekesyo kec.
42005016	Nai tolot Yesu neni asilon akilip.
42005017	Apeikoloŋit itatami Yesu, ayakasi Ŋiparisayon ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila daŋ lotuŋa ŋul, ŋulu aponito alorerya a daadaŋ a ŋulu ka akwap a ŋina a Galileya, Yudaya ka Yerusalem daŋ. Ayai neni a Yesu apedor ŋina ka Akuj ŋina kitaŋaleunet.
42005018	Kilepuleput ŋikilyok ŋice ekile ŋolo alilimiyorito ŋakoyo ka akuwan, eperi anaperyet keŋ, ecamito ayaar iŋes tooma kai akiperikin kiŋaren Yesu.
42005019	Ikwaŋinapei alalakyata ŋituŋa, abu todaun ikes epite ŋolo yaaret iŋes tooma. Todokaryata nai ikes iŋes kidiama akai, topedo inaa, kiyooliut iŋes ka aperyet keŋ kidiŋ ŋituŋa kiŋaren Yesu.
42005020	Ani iŋolikini Yesu anupit kec tema, “Ekile, esyoni ŋasecisya kon.”
42005021	Apotu ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon kiŋitas make temasi, “Ŋae ŋini iyanyi Akuj ikona en? Emam ituŋanan ŋini epedori akisyon ŋasecisya, mati Akuj bon!”
42005022	Ikwaŋina ayenia Yesu ŋuna atamete ikes, tolimok ikes tema, “Nyo itamyata iyes ŋakiro ŋuna ikote ŋun alotai kus?
42005023	Nyo epatana nooi, alimokin ekaŋwalan atemar, ‘Esyoni ŋasecisya kon,’ kori atemar, ‘Tonyou, torotok’?
42005024	Nai acamit ayoŋ iyes toyenut atemar, eyakar Lokoku a Ituŋanan apedor ŋinakisyoniyet ŋasecisya anakwap.” Tolimok iŋes ekaŋwalan tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, tonyou, tolema akoniperyet, tolot lore!”
42005025	Tokuraun iŋes atipei alokiŋaren kec, tolema akeeperyet, tolot lore ipuro Akuj.
42005026	Totaaŋaŋa ŋituŋa daadaŋ nooi! Kitopoloosi Akuj temasi alokabule kec, “Okoe! Ikiŋolik nakoloŋit na ŋakiro ŋakapolok!”
42005027	Kedaun ŋakiro ŋun, tolot Yesu kiŋa, toanyuwa ekeriran ocur ŋolo anyaritae Lepi, iboi anapis a ŋina etacere ocur. Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ.”
42005028	Tonyou nai Lepi, toesik ibore daadaŋ, kiwuapak iŋes.
42005029	Kitiya Lepi ŋasuban alokai keŋ aŋuna a Yesu; aya nen ŋikerirak ocur ŋulu alalak ka ŋituŋa ŋuluce daŋ.
42005030	Tosodo Ŋiparisayon ŋice ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋulu arukito ka iŋes, kiŋuruŋurakinos, kiŋita ŋikasyomak a Yesu temasi, “Nyo imujata ka imasyata iyes ka ŋikerirak ocur ta ŋikasecak?”
42005031	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyiitanito ŋituŋa ŋulu eŋaleete emuron, nai ŋulu edyakasi.
42005032	Nyabunit ayoŋ anyarare ŋulu iyookino, nai ŋikasecak, ikotere tokiwa ŋasecisya kec.”
42005033	Tolimokis ikes iŋes temasi, “Ikanyeneneete ŋikasyomak a Yoana, nabo ilipete daŋ; ŋikewuapak a Ŋiparisayon daŋ ikote nenipei, nai imujete ŋikasyomak kon ka emaseneneete!”
42005034	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ipedorete iyes akisikany ŋituŋa ŋulu enyaraunitae lokiitanu eriŋa ikes erukito ka ekeitan a?
42005035	Nai epote ŋirwa ŋulu edemarere ikes ekeitan. Ŋirwa ŋul, ikes nai ikanyakineta ikes.”
42005036	Tolimok nabo Yesu ikes akitadapet na tema, “Emam ituŋanan ŋini eciluni arac alolou a ŋolokitete, todapak lolou ŋoloŋorot. Ani kitiya ituŋanan ikoŋina, ecili elou ŋolokitete, nabo emam nyikwaanikin arac keŋ ka elou ŋoloŋorot.
42005037	Kori emam tari ituŋanan ŋini epedori atikakin ewinyiwiny lotwol ŋulu eŋorotonito. Ani ketikaki, ebwaŋabwaŋaari ewinyiwiny ŋitwol ŋul, tosodi tobukor ewinyiwiny daŋ.
42005038	Nai etikanakinio ewinyiwiny lotwol ŋulu kitet!
42005039	Ka daŋ emam ituŋanan ŋini iitanit ewinyiwiny kenaiki ŋagwe ŋuna adwarak, anerae etemari ebe, ‘Ejokak ŋuna adwarak.’ ”
42006001	Akoloŋit ace ŋina a Sabato, kitoro Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak lomanikor, togyeut ŋikeekasyomak ŋimomwa kiŋinyut, tonyama.
42006002	Kiŋita Ŋiparisayon ŋice ikes temasi, “Nyo itiyaata iyes ŋakiro ŋuna italeo akitiya akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato?”
42006003	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyesyoma iyes ŋuna abu Daudi kitiya apaki ŋina anyamya akoro iŋes ka ŋikeerukitos a?
42006004	Abu iŋes toloma kai ŋinakilipet Akuj, tolemu tonyam amugati ŋina ainakinitae Akuj, tosodi inak ŋikeerukitos daŋ; torae bo ŋina etaleo idiotuŋanan akinyam, mati ŋisacaradotin bon.”
42006005	Tolimok nabo ikes tema, “Lokoku a Ituŋanan iŋes erae Ekapolon a Sabato.”
42006006	Akoloŋit nabo ace ŋina a Sabato, tolot Yesu losinagoga akitatam ŋituŋa. Ayai nen ekile ŋolo amitarit akan ŋina aloteten.
42006007	Eteunito ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋice ka Ŋiparisayon, erae kitaŋaleuni Yesu ituŋanan akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, ikotere eryamuniata ŋakiro ŋunakisitakinet iŋes.
42006008	Ayeni Yesu ŋuna atamete ikes, nai tolimok ekile ŋolo amitarit akan tema, “Tonyou, bua kiŋaren ne.” Tonyou ekile ŋol, tolot, towo a nen.
42006009	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Ekeŋisi ayoŋ iyes, nyo ecamakinitae a Lokisila akitiya akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato? Akiŋarakin kori akiwan? Akiteyar kori akiar?”
42006010	Kitek Yesu ikes daadaŋ a ŋipeipei, ido tolimok ekaŋwalan tema, “Toriyo akan kon.” Toriyo nai iŋes akan keŋ, toŋaleu.
42006011	Toŋoa ikes nooi, kisyakis atukun ŋuna kitiyakina neni a Yesu.
42006012	Apaki ŋin, tolot Yesu lokamukumukut akilip; kiboi iŋes a nen akuwar kya, ilipi neni ka Akuj.
42006013	Ani iwalari, tonyarau Yesu ŋikeekasyomak, toseu ŋitomon ka ŋiarei, tonyara ikes Ŋikiyakia:
42006014	Simoni (ŋolo aponi tonyarae Petero) ka lokaato keŋ Anderia, Yakobo ka Yoana, Pilipo ka Batolomayo,
42006015	Matayo ka Tomas ka Yakobo lokoku ka Alipayo ka Simoni (ŋolo anyaritae Eseletoit)
42006016	ka Yuda lokoku a Yakobo ta Yuda Isikariot ŋolo abu toluk Yesu.
42006017	Ani edokunete Yesu ka ikes alomukura, towua ikes aneni alapatan ta asepic ŋina a ŋikewuapak keŋ ka asepic a ŋituŋa a ŋulu aponito alo Yudaya, Yerusalem, alo Tiro ka Sidon, ŋuna edunyito anam;
42006018	aponito ikes daadaŋ akiirar ŋakiro keŋ ka ewarito akitaŋaleuno alodekesyo kec. Kitaŋaleunoe tari ŋituŋa ŋulu ekamunito ŋipyan.
42006019	Acamito ŋituŋa daadaŋ akitap iŋes, anerae ayai apedor neni keŋ ŋina etaŋaleuni ikes daadaŋ.
42006020	Kiŋolik Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Irereŋ iyes ŋulu ikulyakaka; Apukan ka Akuj erae ŋina kus!
42006021	“Irereŋ iyes ŋulu ikinyamit akoro tokona; ikisimwokyo iyes rwanu! “Irereŋ iyes ŋulu igworosi tokona; ikyeniyete iyes rwanu!
42006022	“Irereŋ iyes ŋina ikiremokinotor iyes ŋituŋa, ikikotasi, ikisolokis ka kirworotor ŋikusirorwa aŋuna a Lokoku a Ituŋanan!
42006023	Tolakaros itiyakin ŋun. Kicurokisi ka alelyan, anerae epol eropit kus anakuj; atapapaa kec daŋ koloŋ etiyato ikoŋinapei lokadwarak.
42006024	“Ekaŋ iyes ŋulu ibarito; idaut iyes aryamun alakara kus!
42006025	“Ekaŋ iyes ŋulu imwokito tokona; anerae ikinyami iyes akoro! “Ekaŋ iyes ŋulu ikyenasi tokona; iyaloloŋete ka igworete daŋ!
42006026	“Ekaŋ iyes ŋulu ikipuroe tokona; atapapaa kec daŋ koloŋ ekote neni ipurosi ŋikadwarak ŋulu alyokonok.
42006027	“Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes ŋulu ipupete atemar, tominas ŋikusimoe, kitiyata ejok neni a ŋulu ikiremokino iyes.
42006028	Togatakisi arereŋu neni a ŋulu ikilamete iyes, kilipakinito ŋulu ikibolyatar iyes.
42006029	Ani kikibap iyoŋ ituŋanan lokeli, inak ŋoloce daŋ; ani ikidemari ituŋanan iyoŋ ekoti, inak esati daŋ.
42006030	“Inak ŋinituŋanan ikilipi iyoŋ; ŋini ikidemari iyoŋ ŋikoniboro, nyiŋit akinyakakino.
42006031	Kitiya neni a ŋuluce, ŋuna icamit iyoŋ ikes kitiyata neni kon.
42006032	“Ani kiminakis iyes ŋulu ikiminasi iyes bon, aliropit nai iryamunete iyes? Ŋikasecak daŋ eminasi ŋulu eminasi ikes!
42006033	Ani kijokak iyes aneni a ŋulu ejokak aneni kus, aliropit nai iryamunete? Ŋikasecak daŋ itiyaete ikoŋina!
42006034	Ani kipotokis iyes ŋikusiboro neni a ŋulu iyenete iyes atemar epedorete akitac, aliropit nai iryamunete iyes? Ŋikasecak daŋ einanakinete ŋulucekasecak, ikotere eryamuniata etya nenipei.
42006035	Nai tominas ŋikusimoe, tojokak aneni kec ka kipotonorete tomam akiitanit atacanot. Epoloor nai eropit kus ka iruworosi ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj a ŋina alokidiama nooi, anerae erimaana iŋes neni a ŋulu nyelakanarosi neni keŋ ka ŋulu aronok.
42006036	Toyakatar akisyon, ikwaŋina eyakar Papa kus akisyon.
42006037	“Nyitubonokis ŋuluce, ikotere nyikitubok Akuj iyes. Nyitoroniyasi ŋuluce, ikotere nyikitoroniya Akuj iyes. Kisyonioto ŋuluce, ikotere ikisyoni Akuj iyes.
42006038	Kipotonorete neni a ŋuluce, ikiinakini Akuj iyes etyae ŋolo ajokan idicakinitae, ŋolo iyaŋiyaŋakinitae ka ŋolo ilapanar; iŋes iwuakini Akuj locwee kon. Etyae ŋolo iinakinete iyes, iŋes ikiinakinio iyes daŋ.”
42006039	Tolimok Yesu ikes akitadapet tema, “Epedori mono emuduk akirik emuduk ŋoloce a? Nyibusokinosi mono ikes daadaŋ nakipany a?
42006040	Emam ekasyoman ŋolo iloit eketataman keŋ, nai ŋinituŋanan itatamitae ejok nooi, iriyanikin ka eketataman keŋ.
42006041	“Kaanukiro iteo iyoŋ imilot anakoŋu a lokaato kon, nai nyite akitoe ŋina eyai nakoŋu kon a elope?
42006042	Nabo ikokini iyoŋ ilimokini lokaato kon ebe, ‘Lokaato kaŋ, kimyek olema imilot ŋini eyai nakoŋu kon,’ nyite iyoŋ akitoe ŋina eyai nakoŋu kon ai? Iyoŋ ekaŋisoswae! Tolema mono akitoe anakoŋu kon, topedo nai akiŋolikin ejok epite ŋolo lemaret imilot anakoŋu a lokaato kon.
42006043	“Emam ekitoe ŋolo ajokan ŋolo eraii ŋaraito ŋuna aronok; kori daŋ emam ekitoe ŋolo aronon ŋolo eraii ŋaraito ŋuna ajokak.
42006044	Anerae ŋolokitoe daadaŋ eyenitae a ŋaraito keŋ. Nyipedori iyoŋ agerun ŋaboboryo alokaramwae, kori nyipedori agerun ŋalebulebwo alopeeto.
42006045	Ituŋanan ŋini ajokan alotau keŋ, itiyae ŋakiro ŋuna ajokak. Ituŋanan ŋini aronon alotau keŋ, itiyae ŋakiro ŋuna aronok. Anerae irworo akituk ŋuna ilapun alotau.
42006046	“Kaanukiro ikinyaritotor iyes ayoŋ ‘Ekapolon, Ekapolon,’ nyitiyaete bo ŋuna akalimokini ayoŋ iyes?
42006047	Ituŋanan ŋini ebuni neni kaŋ, kiira ŋakiro kaŋ kitiya ikes, eketoodikini ayoŋ iyes neni ikoni iŋes.
42006048	Ikoni iŋes ekile ŋolo aduki akai. Tobok iŋes akipany, kidulo tari natabab, todukok akisyakinet nen. Toleleu akalele, kilap aŋolol, tonaŋ akai ŋin; nai nyiryaŋak, anerae adukuk nooi.
42006049	Nai ŋini iirari ŋakaakiro nu nyitiya, ikoni iŋes ekile ŋolo aduki akai kwap emam akisyakinet ŋina ajokan. Kilap aŋolol, tonaŋ akai ŋin, toritakin daadaŋ atipei, kinyasun akai ŋin nooi.”
42007001	Kedau Yesu erwor ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ lotuŋa, abu tolot Kaperenaum.
42007002	Ayai ekapolokiniton ŋasigarya amiat ŋolo adyaka epito keŋ ŋolo minat nooi, toapiye iŋes atwanare.
42007003	Ani iirari ekapolon ŋol ŋakiro ŋuna alimitere Yesu, kiyakiya ŋikatukok a Ŋiyudayan neni a Yesu akiŋitakin iŋes abunore akitaŋaleun epito keŋ.
42007004	Ani epote ikes neni a Yesu, kimaimaa iŋes temasi, “Itemokino iyoŋ kiŋarak ekile lo,
42007005	anerae emina iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap yok, nabo abu itodukok iwon esinagoga.”
42007006	Torukosi nai Yesu ka ikes. Ani eapiyarete ikes kai ŋina ke ekapolokiniton ŋasigarya, kiyakiya ekapolokiniton ŋasigarya ŋikeekonei neni a Yesu alimokin atemar, “Ekapolon, nyican akonikuwan aŋuna ka abunore ne.
42007007	Eketimit ayoŋ abunore iyoŋ kai kaŋ, nyitemokino tari ayoŋ obu neni iyai iyoŋ, nai tolimu iyoŋ akirot bon, ejokuni ekaaketiyan.
42007008	Ayoŋ daŋ ekepukatae, nabo apolokinit ayoŋ daŋ ŋacesigarya. Ani katema ayoŋ epei ‘Ape!’ elosi. Ani katema ece, ‘Bua!’ ebuni. Tari epito kaŋ katema ayoŋ ‘Kitiya nu!’ itiyae.”
42007009	Ani iirari Yesu ŋakiro ŋun, toumok nooi. Tosodi toboboŋ tolimok ŋituŋa ŋulu ewuapito iŋes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, nyeryamuna ayoŋ anupit ŋina epol ikwa naga tari alo Isirael!”
42007010	Ani eboŋorete ŋituŋa ŋulu eakit ekapolokiniton ŋasigarya, toryamut epito keŋ keŋaleu.
42007011	Ani ekaku, tolot Yesu lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Nain, torukosi ka ŋikeekasyomak ta asepic a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ewuapito iŋes.
42007012	Ani eapuuni iŋes lokek ŋolo ke etaun, kiryamas ka ŋituŋa ŋulu elepilepito edya ŋolo atwanit edakarete kiŋa; kerae iŋes epei bon idounitoe, nabo arae toto keŋ apuserut. Arukito toto keŋ ka asepic a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ke etaun.
42007013	Ani iŋolikini Ekapolon apuserut, kisyoni iŋes tema, “Tojoŋo akigworo.”
42007014	Tolot Yesu toapiya nibore ŋini elepilepitere, totap, tosodi towua ŋituŋa ŋulu adakito. Kirworik Yesu tema, “Edya, abala ayoŋ iyoŋ: Toyaru!”
42007015	Kiboikin edya ŋolo sek atwanit togeu erwor, tosodi Yesu inak iŋes neni a toto keŋ.
42007016	Totaaŋaŋa ŋituŋa daadaŋ kitopoloosi Akuj temasi alokabule kec, “Kedolu ekadwaran ŋolo apolon kidiŋ yok. Abu Akuj aiun ŋituŋa keŋ!”
42007017	Tokeikinos ŋakiro ŋun Yudaya daadaŋ ka ŋakwapin ŋuna alodiyete keŋ.
42007018	Apotu ŋikasyomak a Yoana tolimokis iŋes ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ.
42007019	Tonyara nai Yoana ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋiarei kiyakiya neni ke Ekapolon akiŋit atemar, “Erae iyoŋ itemokino ibu, kori itemokino isua edareutu ece?”
42007020	Ani edolete ikes neni a Yesu, tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Ikiyakuunit isua Yoana Ekebatisan akiŋit iyoŋ atemar, ‘Erae iyoŋ itemokino ibu, kori itemokino isua edareutu ece?’ ”
42007021	Apaki ŋinapei ŋin, abu Yesu kitaŋaleu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋulu agelegelya ŋidekesyo, ŋulu aŋwalak ka ŋulu ekamunito ŋipyan; toŋaa daŋ ŋakonyen a ŋimudukanotin a ŋulu alalak.
42007022	Toboŋok Yesu ŋituŋa ŋulu eyakuunit Yoana tema, “Apesi, tolimokisi Yoana ŋuna iŋolikis iyes ka ŋuna iirasi daŋ. Ekyenyununuyete ŋimudukanotin, erotonokinete ŋikaŋwalak, esegununuyete ŋulu irumit atapon, iiranarete ŋikiŋimanotin, eyarununuyete ŋikatwak; nabo elimonokinio Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lokulyak.
42007023	Erereŋ nooi ituŋanan ŋini nyejamakini anupit keŋ aŋuna kaŋ!”
42007024	Ani kerotokis ŋituŋa ŋulu eyakuunit Yoana, togeu Yesu akitatam asepic a ŋituŋa ŋakiro a Yoana tema, “Ŋina ilositotor iyes neni a Yoana apaki ŋina ayakar iŋes naloŋisat, nyo iitanito iyes akiŋolikin? Eoot ŋolo iloiloi ekuwuam a?
42007025	Nyo ilosito iyes akiŋolikin? Ekile ŋolo anapit ŋilowi ŋulu aninikak ŋulu emilimilete a? Toyenete atemar ŋulu enapito ikoŋina ka ŋulu ebarito jwi jwi, ikes iboiyete alorerya a ŋikapolok!
42007026	Nyo nai kire ilosito iyes aanyun? Ekadwaran a? Ee robo; akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, iŋolikis iyes ituŋanan ŋini iloit nooi tari ekadwaran.
42007027	Yoana iŋes ŋolo ebala Akuj a Nakigireta ebe, ‘Toanyu, eyakiyari ayoŋ ekaakiyakia kiŋaren kon, kitemok ekonirot.’
42007028	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, alotuŋa a daadaŋ a ŋulu idounitoe ŋinapei koloŋ, emam ŋini epol akilo Yoana. Nai ŋini edit akilo daadaŋ a Napukan ka Akuj, epol akilo Yoana.”
42007029	(Ani iirarete ŋituŋa daadaŋ ka ŋikerirak ocur ŋakiro ŋun, tocamut atemar itiyae Akuj ŋuna iyookino, anerae ebatisatae ikes ke ebatisimu a Yoana.
42007030	Nai apotu Ŋiparisayon ka ŋiketatamak ŋulu a Ŋikisila toŋero ebatisimu ŋolo ayeunit Akuj aŋuna kec, aŋuna aŋeryoto ebatisimu ŋolo a Yoana.)
42007031	Torubak Yesu irworo ebala, “Nyo esikwaania ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu a ŋirwa a lu? Ikote ikes nyo?
42007032	Ikote ikes ŋidwe ŋulu iboiyete alomaket. Enyarae epeiwae kec ŋuluce temasi, ‘Ikipotu isua okutakisi arupepe, nai nyimomworikis iyes; aponi isua kikalounoe aŋuna ka atwanare, nai nyiluuro iyes.’
42007033	Abu Yoana Ekebatisan; eroneene ka nyemasi epiini daŋ; itemasi iyes, ‘Ikamunit iŋes ekipye.’
42007034	Abu Lokoku a Ituŋanan, imuji ka emasi epiini; nai itemasi iyes, ‘Kiŋolikisi ekadakan ka ekameran, ekone a ŋikerirak ocur ka ŋikasecak!’
42007035	Nai aosou ŋina ka Akuj itoodiunitae erae ŋina a kire aneni a ŋulu ecamunito iŋes.”
42007036	Tonyarau Eparisayot Yesu akimuj ka iŋes, tolot nai iŋes kai ke Eparisayot akimuj.
42007037	Ayai nen aberu ŋina ke etaun ŋina arae akasecan nooi. Ani iirari iŋes atemar imujete Yesu kaapei ka Eparisayot, tolot iŋes nen etiŋit ecupa ŋolo eleleba akimyet ŋina akukunyon.
42007038	Min iŋes kaku nakejen a Yesu igworo, kitapapal ŋakejen a Yesu a ŋakiyo keŋ, toninaiya nai iŋes ŋakejen a ŋitim keŋ, tonu, kiwosak akimyet.
42007039	Ani iŋolikini Eparisayot ŋolo anyarit Yesu nakimuj ŋakiro ŋun, abu totamak bon tema, “Kerae kire torae ekile lo ekadwaran, keyeni atemar aniberu na ŋina etapit iŋes na; nabo keyeni atemar erae iŋes akasecan!”
42007040	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Eyakasi ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna acamit alimokin iyoŋ Simoni.” Kiik Simoni tema, “Ewa, Eketataman, tolimokinae robo.”
42007041	Tolimu Yesu tema, “Ayai ituŋanan ice ŋini edeniyorito ŋituŋa ŋiarei ŋidinari keŋ. Emicae iŋes ipei ŋidinari ŋamiae ŋakan, ŋoloce ŋidinari ŋatomonikan.
42007042	Aŋuna pa apedoryata ikes akitac iŋes, abu tojal ŋamicae ŋun daadaŋ. Ali alokidiŋ ŋuluarei ŋul eminakini iŋes nooi?”
42007043	Toboŋok Simoni tema, “Atami ayoŋ ŋolo ajalakinio ŋidinari ŋulu alalak.” Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ilimu iyoŋ iyookino.”
42007044	Tosodi toboboŋ Yesu neni ka aberu, tolimok Simoni tema, “Ite iyoŋ aberu na a? Abu ayoŋ olomu kai kon, ibu iyoŋ nyikiinak ayoŋ ŋakipi ŋuna kilotaret ŋakaakejen, nai etapapal iŋes ŋakaakejen a ŋakiyo keŋ ka aninaiya a ŋitim keŋ.
42007045	Nyenuwa iyoŋ ayoŋ, nai enui iŋes ŋakejen kaŋ ameun ŋinapei takae alomunia ayoŋ ne.
42007046	Nyiwosakina iyoŋ akimyet nakou kaŋ, nai eosak iŋes akimyet ŋina akukunyon nakejen kaŋ.
42007047	Aŋun, akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, esyoni ŋasecisya keŋ ŋuna alalak, anerae etoodiu iŋes amina keŋ ŋina epol nooi, nai iŋes ŋini isyoniyo iwadio, edit amina keŋ.”
42007048	Tosodi tolimok Yesu aberu tema, “Esyoni ŋasecisya kon.”
42007049	Togeut ŋituŋa ŋulu aya ka iŋes lomesa akiŋitiŋita make temasi, “Okoe, ŋae ituŋanan ŋini epedori tari akisyon ŋasecisya en?”
42007050	Tolimok Yesu aberu tema, “Ikiteyar iyoŋ anupit kon, tolot ke ekisil.”
42008001	Kedaun ŋakiro ŋun, kirimo Yesu lotaunio ka lorerya, akitatam Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj. Torukito ka ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei;
42008002	ka ŋaberu daŋ ŋace ŋuna abu Yesu kitaŋaleu ikamunito ŋipyan ikes ka alodekesyo. Araakasi ikes Maria (ŋina arae ekiro keŋ Magadalena) ŋina etaŋaleunio ikamunito ŋipyan ŋikanikaarei;
42008003	Joanna, aberu a Kusa a ŋolo eyokit ŋiboro ŋulu ke Erode, ka Susanna ka ŋace ŋuna alalak ŋuna eŋaranakinete ikes a ŋiboro kec.
42008004	Potu ŋituŋa neni a Yesu alowaetin a daadaŋ, alotaunio a ŋulu alalak toruwor asepic; tolimok Yesu ikes akitadapet na tema,
42008005	“Ayai ekile ŋolo abu tolot akitakin ŋikinyom keŋ. Ani eekini iŋes, todoto ŋice lorot, ido kipudaasi ŋituŋa ka kidepasi ŋikyeny.
42008006	Apotu ŋice todoto loŋaro; ani erupunete, apotu tookiyosi, anerae amam pa apalal ŋalup.
42008007	Apotu ŋikinyom ŋice todoto kidiŋ lokukwa, tosodo toruput kaapei ka ŋikukwa, torida ŋikukwa ikes.
42008008	Nabo apotu ŋice todoto nalup ŋuna ajokak, toruput topolout, tokoniu ŋolokinyomit amiat.” Kedau Yesu erwor ŋun, tolimok ikes ikeunit tema, “Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki ŋuna kiiraret, kiira!”
42008009	Kiŋita ŋikasyomak Yesu apolou ŋina ka akitadapet a ŋin.
42008010	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ikiinakinitae iyes ayenun ŋuna imunono ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj, nai ŋituŋa ŋuluce elimokinio a ŋakitadapeta. Tosodi ani kiŋolikis daŋ, nyeanyuwasi; ani kepuput daŋ, nyiirasi.”
42008011	“Apolou ŋina ka akitadapet iŋes na: ekinyomit iŋes akirot ŋina ka Akuj.
42008012	Ŋikinyom ŋulu adoete lorot erae ŋituŋa ŋulu iirarete, nai bu Satan tolema akirot alotai kec, ikotere nyenupa ikes toiunos.
42008013	Ŋikinyom ŋulu adoete loŋaro erae ŋituŋa ŋulu iirarete akirot kijaut ka alelyan, nai emamukatar ikes ŋataagor, enupete ca iwadio, nai ani edoli ŋirwa ŋulu itemere, tosodo topalikis.
42008014	Ŋikinyom ŋulu adoete lokukwa, erae ŋituŋa ŋulu iirarete akirot; nai amitakinit ŋuna ka akwap ka ekibure ŋolo a ŋiboro daadaŋ elomunete tooma toridakis akirot ŋina ka Akuj nyera.
42008015	Ŋikinyom ŋulu adoete nalup ŋuna ajokak erae ŋituŋa ŋulu iirarete akirot, kiricakis, tonupa a ŋitai a ŋulu ajokak ka totitinyikis akitodol ŋina erayata.
42008016	“Emam ituŋanan inokakini etaa, tosodi tobuburik atuba kori kiwuak kwap ekitaada. Nai iwuakini iŋes neni ikeuna, ikotere kiteoto ŋituŋa daadaŋ elomarete kai.
42008017	Anerae emam ibore ŋini imunonitae ŋini nyisileereunio, kori ibore daadaŋ ŋini iwuaitae ŋini nyitatakununio yaunae nakica.
42008018	“Tocoito robo ikwaŋina iiraryata; anerae ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eyakar ibore einakinio ŋini elal, nai ŋini daadaŋ emam ibore eyai, edemaryo tari ŋinidio cici ŋini etami iŋes atemar ayakar.”
42008019	Potu toto a Yesu ka ŋikaitotoi a Yesu, nai nyepedosi akidol diyete Yesu aŋuna ka asepic a ŋina apolon.
42008020	Tolimokinae Yesu temarae, “Ewuasi toto kon ka ŋikonikaitotoi alokiŋa, ecamito aanyun iyoŋ.”
42008021	Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Toto kaŋ ka ŋikaitotoi kaŋ ikes ŋulu iirarete ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, kiwuapa.”
42008022	Apeikoloŋit, todokasi Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak nataker tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Apena, odokasi ekekwaye anam.” Kisyakis ikes amiar ataker.
42008023	Ani eriŋa ikes eya nanam, kinapakin Yesu tojotoor. Tokut atipei ekuwuam ŋoloti apolon ananam, kiburiburi ataker akilelebun. Toryamut ikes ŋican ŋulu apolok.
42008024	Kiyotosi ŋikasyomak neni a Yesu, kitekienyut iŋes temasi, “Eketataman, Eketataman! Edikino ikitwaki.” Tonyou Yesu, kikilyak ekuwuam ka ŋakipi ŋuna emorokokoete, todipakinos ikes, kililiŋ akwap cek.
42008025	Kiŋit Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Ai eyai anupit kus?” Tobul ikes, toumokis kiŋitas make temasi, “Ŋae ekile lo ŋolo elimokini tari ekuwuam ka ŋakipi kiirasi iŋes lo?”
42008026	Todolut nai ikes nakwap ŋina a Ŋigadara ŋina eteosi ka Galileya.
42008027	Ani edokuni Yesu anataker, kiryama ka ekile ŋolo abunit alotaun, ŋolo ekamunito ŋipyan. Eboit iŋes ekaoyan eleri, nabo kiboiye analyalin toŋerite ere.
42008028	Ani iŋolikini iŋes Yesu, kiworou toramakin kiŋaren keŋ, tocelu tema, “Anukiro eya iyoŋ ka ayoŋ, Yesu Lokoku ka Akuj, a ŋina alokidiama nooi? Akadyekit ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, nyikisican kare ca!”
42008029	Alimuni iŋes ikoŋina, anerae eŋenyakini Yesu ŋipyan alomun aneni keŋ. Etokoponorete iŋes ŋipyan ŋirwa ŋulu alalak, tari keeni iŋes a ŋiriko ŋakejen ka ŋakan, aŋedanari kipiiri nariet aŋuna ka agogoŋu a ŋipyan a ŋul.
42008030	Kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema, “Ŋae ekonikiro?” Toboŋok ekile tema, “Erae ekiro kaŋ ‘Ajore’,” anerae alomarito ŋipyan ŋulu alalak tooma keŋ.
42008031	Kimaimaa ŋipyan ŋul Yesu nyecakak ikes nauwuat ŋina aoyan.
42008032	Ayai nen esipan ŋolo apolon ŋolo a ŋipegei ŋolo adaka nagum ke emoru. Kilipa ŋipyan Yesu aesikin ikes tolomasi lopegei. Tocamak iŋes ikes.
42008033	Tosodo tolomut ŋipyan ŋul alokile, tolomasi lopegei; tosuro esipan daadaŋ anakope, tosuror tooma nanam, kitamat totwaka.
42008034	Ani iŋolikinete ŋikeyokok ŋulu a ŋipegei ŋakiro ŋuna etiyakinosi, kipiiryoto alimor lotuŋa ŋulu aya lotaun ka lorerya.
42008035	Toloto ŋituŋa aanyun ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakin. Potu neni a Yesu, toryamut ekile ŋolo etolomunere ŋipyan iboi a nakejen a Yesu, enapit ŋilowi, kejokyar akeekuwan; tokuryaketa ikes.
42008036	Tolimokis ŋulu aris keyenut epite ŋolo etaŋaleunere ekile ŋolo ekamunito ŋipyan.
42008037	Apotu nai ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a Gadara kiŋitakis Yesu alosit iwace, anerae abu tobul ikes nooi. Todoka nai Yesu nataker, toboŋo.
42008038	Tosodi ekile ŋolo sek eritaryo ŋipyan aneni keŋ, kimaima Yesu arukor ka iŋes. Nai kitoboŋo Yesu iŋes lore keŋ tema,
42008039	“Toboŋo lore kon, kiserak lotuŋa ŋakiro ŋuna etiya Akuj neni kon.” Tolot nai iŋes tolimok ŋituŋa daadaŋ alotaun ŋuna abu Yesu kitiyak neni keŋ.
42008040	Ani eboŋuni Yesu alokekwaye anam, kisiryam asepic a ŋituŋa iŋes, anerae edarito ŋituŋa iŋes.
42008041	Bu ekile ŋolo anyaritae Yairo, ŋolo apolokinit esinagoga. Toramakin kiŋaren Yesu, kimaima iŋes abunore kai keŋ,
42008042	anerae adyaka nakoku keŋ ŋina donupei, toapiye atwanare. Arae ŋikaru keŋ ŋitomon ka ŋiarei. Nai ani eriŋa Yesu elosi toridak nooi asepic a ŋituŋa iŋes.
42008043	Ayai nen aberu ŋina aleleete ŋaokot ŋikaru ŋitomon ka ŋiarei. Kisunyak iŋes ŋikeeboro daadaŋ lomurok, nai amam tari ipeituŋanan daŋ ŋini apedori akitaŋaleun iŋes.
42008044	Toŋicun iŋes alokaku, totap abilet ŋina ke elou a Yesu; totubos ŋaokot atipei.
42008045	Kiŋit Yesu tema, “Ŋae ŋini akatap ayoŋ?” Topega ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋun, ido tema Petero, “Eketataman, ikilukakinito iyoŋ ŋituŋa kidiŋ ka ikijukito daŋ.”
42008046	Nai tema Yesu, “Akatapit sek ayoŋ ituŋanan, anerae abu ayoŋ oyenu atemar alot agogoŋu aneni kaŋ.”
42008047	Ani eanyuni aberu ŋin atemar pa apedorit iŋes akimunon ŋakiro ŋun, bu emarani, toryedik alokiŋaren Yesu. Kitatamik iŋes alokiŋaren ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋakiro ŋuna atapya iŋes elou a Yesu ka epite ŋolo aŋaleunio iŋes atipei.
42008048	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nakoku, ikitaŋaleu iyoŋ anupit kon. Tolot a ekisil.”
42008049	Ani eriŋa Yesu irworo ŋun, bu ituŋanan ice alore a Yairo, tolimok Yairo tema, “Eridak nakoku kon, tojoŋo akicanit eketataman.”
42008050	Kiira Yesu ŋakiro ŋun, tolimok Yairo tema, “Nyikibul, nai tonup iyoŋ, eyari iŋes.”
42008051	Ani edoli iŋes lore, nyecamak iŋes ŋituŋa alomar ka iŋes tooma kai, mati Petero, Yoana, Yakobo, Papa ka toto a ikoku.
42008052	Kigworos daadaŋ kiworoete aŋuna a ikoku. Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Tojoŋoto akigworo, nyetwanit iŋes – ejotoe!”
42008053	Tokyenatar daadaŋ iŋes, anerae ayenete atemar atwanit apese kire.
42008054	Nai kikam Yesu akan ka apese, tonyara iŋes tema, “Nakoku, tokienyu!”
42008055	Toyaru apese, tonyou atipei, tolimok nai Yesu ŋikekauruunak ainakin iŋes adiokimuj.
42008056	Toumokis ŋikauruunak ka apese nooi, todaun ŋuna elimunete, nai kicik Yesu ikes tema, “Nyilimokis tari ipeituŋanan daŋ ŋuna etiyakinosi.”
42009001	Tonyarau Yesu ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, inak ikes apedor ka apolou ŋina kiritanaret ŋipyan ka ŋina kitaŋaleununuyet ŋikadyakak.
42009002	Kiyakiya ikes akisera ŋakiro ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj ka akitaŋaleunun.
42009003	Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Nyitiŋa idiobore ilosete; ebela kori ecwee, akimuj kori ŋisiliŋa; nyitiŋa daŋ ŋilowi ŋiarei.
42009004	Ani ŋinakai ilomarete iyes, kiboyoto a nen tari akoloŋit ŋina irotokinioto.
42009005	Ani ca neni nyikijauniata ŋituŋa iyes, torotokis a nen, totwakis apuwa ŋina a ŋakejen kus nen, kitoodiu neni atemar esecito ikes.”
42009006	Torotokis ikes, kimanimana ŋirerya daadaŋ iseraete Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, nabo kitaŋaleununuyete ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
42009007	Ani iirari erwosit Erode ŋolo arae ekepukan a Galileya ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakinos, kibiler iŋes nooi, anerae abasi ŋituŋa ŋice, “Yoana Ekebatisan iŋes ayaru!”
42009008	Tolimut ŋice temasi, “Eliya iŋes atakanu,” nabo abasi ŋice, “Epei alokidiŋ ŋikadwarak ŋulu ŋorok iŋes ayaru.”
42009009	Tolimu Erode tema, “Abe bo abu ayoŋ etutubo ŋasigarya akou a Yoana. Ŋae nai ituŋanan ŋini apupi ayoŋ ŋakiro keŋ en?” Kiitan iŋes aanyun Yesu.
42009010	Ani eboŋunete Ŋikiyakia, tolimokis Yesu ŋakiro ŋuna apotu ikes kitiyata. Ya Yesu ikes neni asilon diyete etaun ŋolo anyaritae Betesaida.
42009011	Ani iirari asepic a ŋituŋa atemar alot iŋes inaa, kiwuapak iŋes. Kijau iŋes ikes, tolimok ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj, kitaŋaleu ŋulu adyakasi daŋ.
42009012	Ani isyakini akoloŋ adoiyor, potu Ŋikiyakia ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei temasi, “Kimyek ŋituŋa toloto lorerya ka lomanikorin ŋulu eapiyete, toryamut neni perot ka akimuj daŋ, anerae esil akwap na.”
42009013	Nai tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Inakisi iyes pei ikes idiobore ŋini nyamat.” Temasi ikes, “Eya isua ŋamugati ŋakan ka ŋikolya ŋiarei make, mati ca kikilot isua akigyel akimuj aŋuna a ŋituŋa a lu a daadaŋ.”
42009014	Aapikinit ekimar a ŋikilyok a ŋulu aya nen ŋalipyo ŋakan. Tolimok Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Totyakatyakata ŋituŋa, kisiboikis a ŋatomonikan.”
42009015	Kitiyata nai ikes ikwaŋina alimokinitere, kisiboikis ŋituŋa.
42009016	Tolemu Yesu ŋamugati ŋakan ka ŋikolya ŋiarei, kireo kidiama nakuj, kilipak, tonyilinyili inak ŋikasyomak keŋ, tokorakis ŋituŋa.
42009017	Kimuja daadaŋ kimwoko, ido tocunut ŋikasyomak ŋapiyanunet ŋuna apotu kilelebun ŋaditae ŋatomon ka ŋaarei.
42009018	Acekoloŋit, ilipi Yesu bon, potu ŋikeekasyomak neni keŋ. Kiŋit iŋes ikes tema,
42009019	“Ebasi mono ŋituŋa ŋae ayoŋ?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Yoana Ekebatisan, nai ebasi ŋice irae iyoŋ Eliya, nabo daŋ ŋice ebasi irae iyoŋ epei alokidiŋ ŋikadwarak ŋulu ŋorok ayaru.”
42009020	Kiŋit iŋes ikes tema, “Ibasi bo iyes ŋae ayoŋ?” Toboŋok Petero tema, “Irae iyoŋ Kristo ŋolo ka Akuj.”
42009021	Kicik nai Yesu ikes nyelimokis ŋun idiotuŋanan.
42009022	Kiyatak iŋes erwor keŋ tema, “Itemokino Lokoku a Ituŋanan kisicanae nooi, toŋero ŋikatukok ka ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila. Earyo iŋes, nai kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni, eyaruni.”
42009023	Tolimok nai iŋes ikes daadaŋ tema, “Ŋinituŋanan ecamit akiwuapakin ayoŋ, itemokino toŋero bon, tosodi toryoŋ ekeemusalaba a ŋinakoloŋit ekewuapak ayoŋ.
42009024	Ituŋanan ŋini ecamit aiun akiyar keŋ, itotwaniyari; nai ŋini itotwaniari akiyar keŋ aŋuna kaŋ, eiuni.
42009025	Alipoida eryamuni ituŋanan, erae keŋata akwap daadaŋ, nai totwania akeekiyar?
42009026	Anerae ŋini irumito ŋileec aŋuna kaŋ ka aŋuna a ŋakaakiro, irumete Lokoku a Ituŋanan daŋ ŋileec aŋuna keŋ ŋina ebunio anapolou a ŋina a Papa ta ŋina a ŋimalaikan a ŋulu ka Akuj.
42009027	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, eya ne ŋice ŋulu nyiirete atwanare, eriŋa nyeanyuwara Apukan ka Akuj.”
42009028	Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋikanikauni, tolot Yesu lomoru akilip, erukito ka Petero, Yoana ka Yakobo.
42009029	Ani eriŋa Yesu ilipi, kilocokin ereet keŋ ka tokwaŋiata ŋilowi keŋ kya.
42009030	Totakanut ŋikilyok ŋiarei, Moses ka Eliya, kirworikin ka iŋes.
42009031	Kirworo Moses ka Eliya ŋulu atakanunete anakica a ŋina ka Akuj ŋakiro ŋuna ka atwanare a Yesu a ŋina alosi akitiyakin alo Yerusalem.
42009032	Elurasi Petero ka ŋikeerukitos, ani ekienyunete kojokan, kiŋolikis akica ŋina ka apolou keŋ ka ŋikilyok ŋuluarei ŋulu awuasi ka iŋes.
42009033	Ani erotokinete Moses ka Eliya, tema Petero neni a Yesu, “Eketataman, ejok nooi iwon akiboi a nege! Kimyekinae isua odukutu ŋitogoi ŋiuni, epei ŋolo kon, epei ŋolo a Moses ka epei ŋolo ke Eliya.” (Pa ayeni iŋes ŋuna erworo.)
42009034	Ani eriŋa iŋes irworo, bu edou, torapuwa ikes aribo, tobul ikes ŋolopite alomaryata lodou.
42009035	Kirworik etoil alodou tema, “Erae lo Lokoku kaŋ ŋoloseuna; topupo iŋes!”
42009036	Ani iiraryo etoil, arae Yesu bon awuoi a nen. Kililiŋa ŋirukitos a Yesu cek, nyelimokis idiotuŋanan ŋuna apotu ikes kiŋolikis.
42009037	Ani taparacu iwalari, totiyaunos Yesu ka ŋirukitos keŋ ŋuluuni alomoru, tosodi kiryamun ka asepic a ŋituŋa.
42009038	Tocelu ekile anasepic tema, “Eketataman, ekemaimai ayoŋ iyoŋ, bua kare ca toanyu lokoku kaŋ, anerae erae iŋes ikaakoku ŋini donupei!
42009039	Ikamununui ekipye iŋes, kisiworou, kidesak kwap, kirakar, tokuut ŋikurudoi anakituk; nabo torubak eryeba nooi ekaoyan!
42009040	Abu ayoŋ odyek ŋikasyomak kon akiritar ekipye ŋol aneni keŋ, nai abu tokuruwo ikes.”
42009041	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Okoe ŋipeituŋa nyenupito, nabo eoliyorito. Ikiruki mono ayoŋ ka iyes tari ori ka akadaŋi iyes tari ori?” Kedaun ŋun, tolimok Yesu ekile ŋol tema, “Yau lokoku kon ne.”
42009042	Ani eriŋa edya ebunit, toramak ekipye iŋes kwap kirakar. Kikilyak Yesu ekipye, kitaŋaleu edya, ido inak iŋes neni a papa keŋ.
42009043	Toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ aŋuna ka apedor a ŋina ka Akuj.
42009044	“Kiirasi kojokan ŋakiro ŋuna akalimokini ayoŋ iyes! Ipotokinio Lokoku a Ituŋanan nakan a ŋituŋa.”
42009045	Nai pa ayenete ŋikasyomak keŋ apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna erworo iŋes. Emunonitae aneni kec, ikotere nyeyenuniata; tokuryaketa ikes akiŋit iŋes ŋakiro ŋun.
42009046	Topegakinos ŋikasyomak a Yesu ecamito ayenun ituŋanan ŋini epol nooi alokidiŋ kec.
42009047	Nai ani eripuni Yesu ŋuna atamete ikes, abu toriko ikoku ŋini cici, kitowuo alodiye keŋ,
42009048	tolimok ikes tema, “Ŋinituŋanan ijauni ikoku ŋini cici ŋini ikoni en alokiro kaŋ, ekejauni ayoŋ; a nen ŋini ekejauni ayoŋ, ijaunit tari ŋini ekeyakuunit ayoŋ. Anerae ŋini itiditeuna alokidiŋ kus, iŋes epol nooi.”
42009049	Tolimok Yoana Yesu tema, “Eketataman, eŋolikinitae isua ekile iritanari ŋipyan alokiro kon, kiretakinae isua iŋes, anerae nyerae iŋes epei alokidiŋ yok.”
42009050	Tolimok Yesu Yoana ka ŋikasyomak ŋuluce tema, “Nyiretakis iŋes, anerae ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini nyikitepegi iyes, erae ŋini kus.”
42009051	Ani eapuunete ŋirwa ŋulu boŋoret Yesu nakuj, abu iŋes totyaku alosit Yerusalem.
42009052	Kiyakiya iŋes ŋituŋa ŋice kiŋaren ŋulu apotu tolomasi lore ece alo Samaria akitemokin ibore daadaŋ aŋuna ka abunore keŋ.
42009053	Nai apotu ŋituŋa a nen towout akijaun Yesu, anerae arae iŋes ekaloton Yerusalem.
42009054	Ani iŋolikinete Yoana ka Yakobo ŋulu arae ŋikasyomak a Yesu ŋakiro ŋun, temasi, “Ekapolon, icamit iyoŋ onyarautu akim anakuj, tomunya ŋituŋa lu a?”
42009055	Nai toboboŋ Yesu kiŋenyak ikes.
42009056	Toloto ikes ecere ŋolo ayai kiŋaren.
42009057	Ani eriŋa ikes eya lorot, tolimok ecekile Yesu tema, “Ekewuapi ayoŋ iyoŋ neni ilosi daadaŋ.”
42009058	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Eyakatar ŋikweei ŋaduyon, ka eyakatar ŋikyeny ŋakais; nai emam Lokoku a Ituŋanan neni kieŋunet.”
42009059	Tolimok nabo Yesu ecekile tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ.” Tosodi ŋolo tolimu tema, “Kimyekinae mono olot akinuk papa kaŋ.”
42009060	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kimyek ŋikatwak tonuka ŋikatwak kec. Ape iyoŋ kisera ŋakiro ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj.”
42009061	Tolimu nabo ece tema, “Ekewuapi ayoŋ iyoŋ Ekapolon; nai kimyekinae mono olot olimok ŋituŋa kaŋ atemar kidoŋo robo ejok.”
42009062	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini ani ketikaki ŋakeekan lomeleku, torubak nabo iŋoliyanari kaku, nyitemokino aŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj.”
42010001	Ekaku a ŋakiro a ŋun, toseu Ekapolon ŋicetuŋa ŋulu arae ŋatomonikanikaarei ka ŋiarei; kiyakiya a ŋiarerei kiŋareno lorerya ka nakwapin daadaŋ ŋuna eitanit iŋes akidol.
42010002	Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Elal akilem, nai ekudyoko ŋikalemak. Aŋun, kilipa elope ŋolo ka akilem kiyakiya ŋikalemak ŋulu alalak nakilem keŋ.
42010003	Toloto toyenete atemar, ekeyakiyarit ayoŋ iyes nakwapin ikwa ŋamesekin, ŋuna eya kidiŋ ŋipeei.
42010004	Nyitiŋa ecwee a ŋisiliŋa, kori ŋolo ilipanarotor, kori ŋamuk, nyicanican apaki akimal ŋituŋa.
42010005	Ŋinakai daadaŋ ilomarete iyes temasi mono, ‘Toyai ekisil lore lo.’
42010006	Ani keyai ituŋanan ŋini emina ekisil lore ŋol, idoŋi ekisil ŋol neni keŋ; ani kemam, nyidoŋi ekisil ŋol nen, nai eboŋuni neni kus.
42010007	Kiboikinos kai ŋina tomata ka kimuja ibore daadaŋ ŋini ikiinio, anerae itemokino eketiyan eropyo. Nyirimito ka nyitubonorosi anakais a ŋituŋa.
42010008	Ŋolore daadaŋ ilomarete iyes ikijaun, kimuja akimuj daadaŋ ŋina ikiinakinio.
42010009	Kitaŋaleununutu ŋikadyakak a nen, tolimokisi ŋituŋa temasi, ‘Aapuu Apukan ka Akuj neni kus.’
42010010	Nai ŋolotaun ilomarete iyes, ido nyikijaun, torotokisi ibasi,
42010011	‘Tari apuwa ŋina alotaun kus ŋina etapunito ŋakejen kosi, ikitwakini isua neni kus. Nai toyenete atemar aapuu Apukan ka Akuj!’
42010012	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, isyoni Akuj nooi ŋituŋa a Sodoma Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino akilo ŋituŋa ŋulu ke etaun a ŋol!
42010013	“Ekaŋ iyoŋ Korasin! Ekaŋ iyoŋ Betesaida! Anerae kerae koloŋ kitiyatetei ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna etiyakin aneni kus alo Tiro ka Sidon, kekiito ikes koloŋ sek, tonapa ŋilowi ŋulu koris, ido kiwosakinos ekuron, kitoodiuniata atemar akiwua ikes ŋasecisya!
42010014	Isyoni Akuj nooi ŋituŋa ŋulu a Tiro ka ŋulu a Sidon Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino akilo iyes.
42010015	Ani bo iyoŋ Kaperenaum! Icamit iyoŋ akitopolooro kon todol nakuj a? Ikilemaryo iyoŋ anakwap, ikimasar nakibois ŋina a ŋikatwak!”
42010016	Tolimok Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini ikiirari iyes, ekeira tari ayoŋ; ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini ikiŋeri iyes, akaŋer tari ayoŋ; ŋini akaŋer ayoŋ, aŋer tari ŋini ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.”
42010017	Toboŋut ŋulu tomonikanikaarei ka ŋiarei elakara nooi temasi, “Ekapolon, aponi isua toreunae tari ŋipyan alokiro kon!”
42010018	Tema iŋes ebe, “Eŋolikinit ayoŋ Satan ecakun anakuj ikoni akimilyaunet.
42010019	Topupokisi! Akainak ayoŋ iyes apedor daadaŋ ŋina reunet ŋimuno ka ŋitwania ta areun apedor daadaŋ ŋina a ŋolo Aronon; emam ibore ŋini ikiwani iyes.
42010020	Nai nyilakarosi aŋuna ireuniata iyes ŋipyan, nai itemokino iyes tolakara aŋuna igiritere ŋikusirorwa nakuj.”
42010021	Esaa ŋolopei kilelebun Etau ŋolo Asegan neni a Yesu, tolelyan iŋes nooi, tolimu tema, “Alakara ayoŋ neni kon, Papa, Ekapolon ŋolo anakuj ka nakwap, anerae ibu iyoŋ kiwua ŋakiro nu aneni a ŋikaosok ka ŋipiiryanotin; nai kisileereu neni a ŋidwe a ŋulu cicik. Ee, Papa, itiyak iyoŋ ŋun daadaŋ ikwaŋina icamitor iyoŋ elope.
42010022	“Akainaki ayoŋ Papa kaŋ ŋiboro daadaŋ. Emam ituŋanan ŋini eyeni atemar Lokoku iŋes iŋae, mati Papa; nabo emam ŋini eyeni atemar Papa iŋes iŋae, mati Lokoku ka ŋulu daadaŋ ecamit Lokoku akiteyenun Papa keŋ neni kec.”
42010023	Tolimok nai Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ make tema, “Erereŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu iteete ŋuna iteete iyes!
42010024	Anerae akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, acamito koloŋ ŋikadwarak ka ŋikepukak ŋulu alalak akiŋolikin ŋuna iŋolikis iyes, nai apotu nyiŋolikis; nabo acamito akiirar ŋuna iirasi iyes, nai apotu nyiirasi.”
42010025	Tosodi tonyou eketataman a Ŋikisila, kikatak Yesu tema, “Eketataman, nyo itemokino ayoŋ etiya, ikotere oryamunia akiyar ŋina nyedaun?”
42010026	Kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyo bo igiritae Lokisila? Anukiro isyom iyoŋ alokitaabo a ŋol?”
42010027	Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Tomina Akuj Ekapolon kon a ekonitau a daadaŋ ka akonikiyar a daadaŋ ka akonigogoŋu a daadaŋ ta ŋatameta kon a daadaŋ; nabo tomina ekonikidunyet, ikwaŋina iminar iyoŋ akonikuwan.”
42010028	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ilimu iyoŋ ŋuna iyookino, kitiya ŋun, ido toyar.”
42010029	Nai ikwapei acamitor iŋes akitojoka, abu iŋes kiŋit Yesu tema, “Ŋae erae ekaakidunyet?”
42010030	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ayai ekile ece ŋolo anyouni alo Yerusalem totiyaar Yeriko. Kituumikis ŋikokolak iŋes alorot, kikamut, kibuŋata, tolaca daŋ, toesikis iŋes eperi irakara.
42010031	Kitoru esacaradoti lorot ŋol, kiŋolik ekile ŋol eperi, tosep kitor iwace.
42010032	Bu Elepeit daŋ kitoru nen; ani kiŋolik ekile ŋol eperi, tosep kitor iwace.
42010033	Nai ani ebuni Esamaritanoit emeta erot ŋolopei ŋol, todolu neni ayai ekile ŋol, kiŋolik eperi, kisyoni iŋes nooi.
42010034	Kidunya iŋes lokile, kimad ka toen ŋakeejemei. Todakak nai iŋes losigirya keŋ, ya lore ece kimuke iŋes aina.
42010035	Ani iwalari akwap, tolemu iŋes ŋidinari ŋiarei, inak elope ere tema, ‘Kiuryakinae ekile lo; ani aboŋuni ayoŋ, akatacakini iyoŋ ibore daadaŋ ŋini isitiya iyoŋ aŋuna keŋ.’ ”
42010036	Kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema, “Ŋae alotuŋa a ŋul itami iyoŋ atemar abu toruwor ekidunyet a ekile a ŋolo apotu ŋikokolak kidica alorot?”
42010037	Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Erae ŋolo abu kisyoni iŋes.” Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ape iyoŋ daŋ, kitiya ikwaŋinapei.”
42010038	Ani elosete Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak, kitoro lore ece ŋolo ejaunia ikes aberu ŋina anyaritae Marita.
42010039	Ayai nakaato keŋ a Marita ŋina anyaritae Maria, ŋina abu kiboikin nakejen a Yesu akipup ŋakiro ŋuna etatami iŋes.
42010040	Etumorit Marita etic ŋolo eidar iŋes; tosodi tolot neni eboiyo Yesu, kiŋit iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, nyikironikinit iyoŋ neni ekemyekinitor ayoŋ nakaato kaŋ etiyae etic bon a? Tolimok iyoŋ iŋes bu ekeŋarak ayoŋ!”
42010041	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Marita, Marita! Iyaloloŋi iyoŋ ka ituupa ŋakiro ŋuna alalak akidiŋ;
42010042	nai ipeibore bon epol. Aseu Maria ibore ŋini ajokan ŋini nyelemaryo aneni keŋ!”
42011001	Apeikoloŋit kilip Yesu aiwace. Ani irikakini, abu epei alokidiŋ ŋikasyomak keŋ, tolimok iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, kitatamae isua akilip, ikwaŋina koloŋ etatamya Yoana ŋikasyomak keŋ.”
42011002	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ani ilipete temasi: ‘Papa, ekonikiro tokeritetei; akonipukan bu.
42011003	Inakinae isua a ŋinakoloŋit akosikimuj ŋina a jwi jwi.
42011004	Kisyoni isua ŋakosisecisya, anerae isyoniyeneneo isua ŋulu eseceneneete aneni kosi. Nyikiya isua nakitemyet.’ ”
42011005	Tosodi tolimok Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Eyai mono iyes ipei ŋini elosi neni alokone keŋ nakwaare, ido tolimok iŋes tema, ‘Ekone, inakinae ayoŋ ŋamugati ŋauni, anerae
42011006	abu lokone kaŋ ŋolo erae ekaloton, nai emam ayoŋ akimuj ŋina ainakini iŋes.’
42011007	Toboŋok nai lokone keŋ alotooma kai tema, ‘Nyikican ayoŋ! Agol takae ayoŋ ekek, ikijotoor ayoŋ ka ŋikaadwe, emam tokona epite ŋolo anyounio ayoŋ okoinak iyoŋ idiobore.’
42011008	Kire akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, tari pa kekienyu iŋes ainakin iŋes ŋamugati aŋuna ka akoneo keŋ, nai enyouni iŋes ainakin iŋes ibore daadaŋ ŋini iitanit aŋuna nyitimyo iŋes arubakin anyarit iŋes.
42011009	“Aŋun, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, kiŋita, ikiinakinio; kiwara, iryamunete; kikoŋikoŋo, ikiŋaaryo.
42011010	Anerae ŋinituŋanan iŋita, einakinio; ŋini iwarit, eryamuni; ka ŋini ikoŋikoŋi, eŋaaryo.
42011011	Eyai alokidiŋ kus papa ŋolo ani iŋita ikoku keŋ ekolya, inak iŋes emun a?
42011012	Kori ani iŋita abeeye, inak iŋes ekiitwan a?
42011013	Kipedorete nai iyes ŋulu iroko ainakin ŋidwe kus ibore ŋini ajokan, nyepedori nai Papa kus ŋolo anakuj ŋolo ejok nooi akilo iyes ainakin Etau ŋolo Asegan neni a ŋulu iŋitasi a?”
42011014	Apeikoloŋit kirita Yesu ekipye ŋolo pa apedori erwor. Ani kirita, togeu ekile ŋolo pa erworo erwor; toumokis ŋasepico a ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋun.
42011015	Tosodo ŋice temasi, “Erae Belesebul ŋolo epolokinit ŋipyan einakinit iŋes apedor ŋina kiritanaret ŋipyan.”
42011016	Ewarito ŋice alokun iŋes; kiŋita iŋes akitiyakin adiokujuwuanut, toyenuniata ikes atemar ebunit iŋes aneni ka Akuj.
42011017	Nai ayeni Yesu ŋuna atamete ikes, aŋun tolimok ikes tema, “Akwap ŋina etyakatyakatar ŋituŋa, tojiyete make, inyasun; ani ketyakatyaka ŋituŋa ŋulu ke epeire, ielarosi ikes.
42011018	Ani ketyakatyaka apukan a Satan tojiyoto ŋajorei keŋ make, erubakini nai ekeebuku eyai ikwa ai? Ibasi iyes eritanari ayoŋ ŋipyan ka apedor a ŋina aryamunit aneni a Belesebul.
42011019	Ani keritanari ayoŋ ŋipyan alokiro a Belesebul, lokiro a ŋae bo iritanaryata ŋikewuapak kus? Aŋun, ikes nai rwanu eruworosi ŋikatubok ŋakiro kus.
42011020	Nai ani keritanari ayoŋ ŋipyan ka apedor a ŋina ka Akuj, akeepolou iŋes atemar abu Apukan ka Akuj neni kus.
42011021	“Ani eyai ekile ŋolo egogoŋ lore keŋ, totiŋite ŋiboro keŋ daadaŋ ŋulu jiyet, emam ibore elemari ŋiboro keŋ.
42011022	Ani bo ca nai kebu ece ŋolo iloit iŋes, edemari iŋes ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu jiyet ŋulu sek aruunitor iŋes, totyakatyaka ŋikeeboro.
42011023	“Ituŋanan ŋini nyeyai lowae kaŋ, akaŋerit ayoŋ; nabo ituŋanan ŋini nyekeŋarakinit ayoŋ akicun, ielieli.”
42011024	“Ani elomari ekipye anituŋanan elosi nariet kitor neni emam ŋakipi, iwarit neni kieŋunet, nai nyeryamu. Ani keŋopiki iŋes neni kieŋunet, etemari, ‘Aboŋori kai ŋinapei ŋoon ayai!’
42011025	A nen, eboŋori iŋes toryamu akai ŋin ejok, epyaaritae.
42011026	Ido tolot, toriku ŋipyan ŋice ŋikanikaarei ŋulu eroko nooi akilo iŋes, potu nai kiboikinos. Ekaku, emunaar ituŋanan ŋin nooi adepar neni sek ekoni.”
42011027	Ani kelimu Yesu ŋun, kikeu aberu anasepic a ŋituŋa etoil, tolimok Yesu tema, “Erereŋ nooi aberu ŋina koloŋ kikidouni iyoŋ ka ikitanak!”
42011028	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kire iyookino, nai erereŋ nooi ŋulu iirarete ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, ido kiwuapa!”
42011029	Ani esutunete ŋituŋa neni ayai Yesu, tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Okoe, eroko ŋituŋa ka anyamet a na nooi! Iitanito ikes akitoodikinet, nai emam akitoodikinet ŋina einakinio ikes, mati ŋina a Yona ke ekadwaran.
42011030	Ikwaŋinapei koloŋ araakar ekadwaran Yona akitoodikinet lotuŋa ŋulu alo Ninepe, eruwor Lokoku a Ituŋanan daŋ akitoodikinet lotuŋa ŋulu ka anyamet a na.
42011031	Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino, enyouni akepukan ŋina ka akwap a ŋina a Ceba akitub ŋakiro ŋuna ka anyamet a na; anerae abu iŋes koloŋ tolot erot ŋolo aoyan nooi, ebunit akiirar ŋakitatameta ŋuna ka aosou a Solomon a ŋolo arae erwosit; nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, eyai nege ŋini epol akilo tari Solomon.
42011032	Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino, enyounete ŋituŋa ŋulu a Ninepe akitub ŋakiro ŋuna ka anyamet a na; anerae apotu ikes tokiwa ŋasecisya iirarete alimonokin ŋina a Yona; nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, eyai nege ŋini epol akilo tari Yona!
42011033	“Emam ituŋanan ŋini inokakini etaa, ido kiwua, kori tobuburik atuba; nai iwuakinio neni ikeuna, ikotere kiteoto ŋituŋa ŋulu elomarete kai.
42011034	Erae akoŋu etaa anakuwan kon; ani kejok akoŋu kon, eyai akuwan kon daŋ daadaŋ nakica; nai ani kerono akoŋu kon, eyai akuwan kon daŋ daadaŋ nakiryonut.
42011035	Tocoik nyeruwor akica ŋina eyai tooma kon akiryonut.
42011036	Aŋun, ani keyai akuwan kon daadaŋ nakica, tomam akiryonut ŋina eyai tari edit, ecauni ibore daadaŋ ikwa etaa ŋolo ecai aneni kon.”
42011037	Ani eriŋa Yesu irworo, tonyara Eparisayot iŋes akimuj kaapei ka iŋes; toloma nai iŋes kiboikin kimuj.
42011038	Toumok Eparisayot iŋolikini Yesu imuji nyilotara ŋakan.
42011039	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Itesegete iyes Ŋiparisayon ekopo kus ka asaani kus kiŋa bon, nai ileleba tooma kus ademon ka aronis.
42011040	Ŋibaŋaanotin! Meere mono Akuj ŋina asubi kiŋa, asubi tooma daŋ a?
42011041	Nai inakisi ŋiboro ŋulu eya tooma kus lokulyak, ikotere tosegyar ibore daadaŋ aneni kus.
42011042	“Ekaŋ iyes Ŋiparisayon! Ilemyanakinete iyes Akuj alemikinet apei anatomon a ŋikito a ŋulu itoboboete akimuj, nai ijamakinito iyes ŋakiro ŋuna iriyan ŋuna ka Akuj ka amina keŋ. Itemokino iyes akitiya nu tomam ajamakinit ŋunace.
42011043	“Ekaŋ iyes Ŋiparisayon! Iminasi iyes akiboyonokin lokicoloŋo ŋulu ajokak alosinagogae ka akimalao alomaketa ikitopolooritae.
42011044	Ekaŋ iyes! Ikote iyes ŋalyalin ŋuna nyileereete, ŋuna icakacakaete ŋituŋa pa eyenete.”
42011045	Abu epei a ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila, tolimok iŋes tema, “Eketataman, ikimor iyoŋ isua daŋ alorwor kon!”
42011046	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ekaŋ iyes daŋ ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila! Iyes ŋulu isiwuokito ŋuluce ŋigogoso ŋulu apotyok ŋulu etyono adakun, nai nyicamito bo iyes ŋilopeyek akitap ŋigogoso ŋul tari a ekimoin ke epei.
42011047	Ekaŋ iyes! Anerae idukete iyes ŋalyalin ŋuna a ŋikadwarak a ŋulu aarete atapapaa kus.
42011048	Aŋun, isuudato iyes ka icamunito ŋuna apotu atapapaa kus kitiyata, anerae aarete ikes ŋikadwarak, tosodo iyes toduko ŋalyalin kec.
42011049	Iŋes nai ebaakar aosou ŋina ka Akuj ebe, ‘Eyakiyari ŋikadwarak kaŋ ka ŋikiyakia neni kec, earete ikes ŋice, kitidiŋa ŋice.’
42011050	Nai isicanio ŋituŋa ŋulu ka anyamet a na aŋuna a ŋaokot a ŋikadwarak ŋinapei anakisyakinet akwap,
42011051	ameun anaokot a ŋuna ka Abel tari naokot a Sakariya a ŋolo aarakinio kidiŋ Namuroet ŋina icunyere ekinyate ka akibois ŋina emyekinitae aŋuna ka Akuj. Ee, kire akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, isicanio ŋituŋa ŋulu ka anyamet a na aŋuna kec a daadaŋ!
42011052	“Ekaŋ iyes ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila! Iwua iyes ekipuŋguwo ŋolo eŋae akai ŋina eyai aosou; tari iyes ŋilopeyek nyelomara, nabo iretakis iyes tari ŋulu acamito alomar!”
42011053	Ani erotokini Yesu a nen, tolomakis ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon akisirwor iŋes neni aronon nooi ka akiŋitiŋit iŋes ŋakiro ŋuna alalak nooi.
42011054	Alokito ikes iŋes ecamito aripun, keya ŋakiro ŋuna aronok ŋuna epedori iŋes alimun.
42012001	Tocunakinos ŋituŋa ŋalipyo ŋuna alalak nooi neni a Yesu, kidiŋidiŋakinos, kicakacakas. Tolimok Yesu ŋikeekasyomak apaki ŋin tema, “Tocoito ŋakinyalet ŋuna a Ŋiparisayon, ŋuna erae ŋisoswae.
42012002	Emam ibore ŋini erapitae ŋini nyisileereunio ka ŋini imunonitae ŋini nyeyenunio.
42012003	Daadaŋ ŋuna ilimut iyes anakiryonut, iiraryo anakica; nabo ŋuna iŋaiŋaut iyes togwolito ŋikekya a ŋakais, ikeunio alokiŋa.
42012004	“Ŋikaakonei, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, nyikerito ŋulu earete akuwan bon, nai tomam ibore ŋini aronon ice ŋini epedorete ikes akitiyakin ekaku.
42012005	Eketoodikini ayoŋ iyes ŋini itemokino tokerito; tokerito Akuj ŋina epedori akiar, nabo eyakar iŋes apedor ŋina cakakinet tooma nakim ŋina nyeduŋe. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, tokerito iŋes!
42012006	“Nyegyelyo atasurui ŋikan a ŋikapun a ŋiarei a? Nai emam tari ipei alokidiŋ kec ŋini imuryakin aneni ka Akuj.
42012007	Tari ŋitim ŋulu anakyes kus imaritae daadaŋ. Nai nyikuryanito, anerae epol etyae kus nooi akilo ŋolo atasurui.
42012008	“Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ŋinituŋanan akalimori ayoŋ alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, elimori Lokoku a Ituŋanan daŋ iŋes alokiŋaren ŋimalaikan ŋulu ka Akuj.
42012009	Ŋini akaŋeri ayoŋ alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, eŋeryo iŋes daŋ alokiŋaren ŋimalaikan ŋulu ka Akuj.
42012010	“Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini elimuni akirot itoroniyarit Lokoku a Ituŋanan, isyoniyo; nai ŋini iyanyi Etau ŋolo Asegan, nyisyoniyo jik.
42012011	“Ani ikiyaunete ikes iyes losinagogae kori kiŋaren ŋikepukak kec, nyitemokino iyes kiyaloloŋo ŋuna iboŋokinete kori ŋuna ilimunete;
42012012	anerae Etau ŋolo Asegan iŋes ebuni akitatam iyes ŋuna itemokino tolimut apaki ŋin.”
42012013	Abu ituŋanan anasepic a ŋituŋa, tolimok Yesu tema, “Eketataman, tolimok lokaato kaŋ okotyakak ayoŋ ebari ŋolo koloŋ ikiesikinia papa kosi isua.”
42012014	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ekile, ŋae akainakini ayoŋ apedor ŋina tubet kori ŋina atyakatyakaa ebari kus?”
42012015	Tolimok iŋes ŋituŋa daadaŋ tema, “Tocoikisi, kiyokito ŋawat kus anarorokanut a daadaŋ, anerae meere ebari itopoloe akiyar a ituŋanan.”
42012016	Tolimok nai Yesu ikes akitadapet na tema, “Ayai ekabaran ŋolo ayakar emanikor ŋolo akoneene tobwaŋ akimuj ŋina alalan.
42012017	Kisyak iŋes akitam tema, ‘Emam ayoŋ edula ŋolo apolon ŋolo ewuakini akaakimuj daadaŋ. Ekokini mono ai?’
42012018	Totamu nai iŋes tema, ‘Aanyu ayoŋ ŋuna etiyakini: eelari ŋikaadulae, oyeu ŋulu apolok ŋulu itemokin ŋikaamomwa ka ŋiboro ŋuluce daadaŋ.
42012019	Ani erikakini otema alotau kaŋ, ee roca ekaatau! Iyakar tokona iyoŋ ibore ŋini ajokan daadaŋ ŋini ikiteyari iyoŋ ŋikaru ŋulu alalak. Kiboikin jik kieŋa, kimuj, tomat ka kileile!’
42012020	Nai tolimok Akuj iŋes tema, ‘Iyoŋ ebaŋaanot! Lolo nakwaare iitanio akiyar kon; ŋae irumi ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu icunit iyoŋ aŋuna ka akonikiyar?’ ”
42012021	Toŋetak Yesu erwor keŋ tema, “Ikote nen ŋulu etukete ebari kec kituruwosi ŋolo a ŋawat kec make, nai tomam nyebarito alokiŋaren Akuj.”
42012022	Tolimok Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Aŋun, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, nyiyaloloŋete aŋuna ka akimuj a ŋina iitanito iyes ayarya, kori aŋuna a ŋilowi a ŋulu iitanito a ŋulu napan.
42012023	Anerae iloit akiyar tari akimuj, nabo iloit akuwan tari ŋilowi.
42012024	Kiŋolikisi iyes ŋikurukwa: nyeete ikes ŋikinyom kori nyelemete; emam ikes ŋidulae kori ŋatukito; nai Akuj alope itani ikes! Epol etyae kus nooi akilo ŋolo a ŋikyeny!
42012025	Ŋae alokidiŋ kus alotooma akiyaloloŋ epedori akitedepakin akeekiyar ŋirwa ŋulu sek etubunitoe?
42012026	Ani pa kipedorete iyes asubakin ŋakiro ŋuna epataka ŋun, nyo iŋuruŋuratar iyes kan ŋuluceboro?
42012027	Kiŋolikisi epite ŋolo erupyata ŋatur ka epolooto anariet: emam nyedonyete ikes kori nyesonyete ŋilowi. Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, tari erwosit Solomon ŋolo asirit nooi, amamukar ŋilowi ŋulu ebusak ŋulu ikote ŋatur ŋun.
42012028	Akuj iŋes itanapi ŋinya – ŋinya ŋulu elibito tokona, nai ani moi kicunyae. Etya nai ekitanape ŋolo ikitanapya iŋes iyes ai? Okoe iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu edit anupit!
42012029	“Nyiyaloloŋete tokona ibasi, ‘Okoe, nyo ikinyami kori nyo ikimasi?’
42012030	(Anerae ŋibukui ŋulu nyerae ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan ikes nyelakakinete akiwarit ŋiboro lugu daadaŋ.) Eyeni Papa kus atemar iitanito iyes ŋiboro lu daadaŋ.
42012031	Nai kiwara mono Apukan keŋ, ikiinakini iŋes iyes ŋiboro ŋul daadaŋ ilapara.
42012032	“Nyikuryaketa iyes erae kikudyoko daŋ! Anerae iwarit Papa kus ainakin iyes Apukan keŋ.
42012033	Togyelasi ŋikusiboro daadaŋ, inakis ŋisiliŋa lokulyak. Kitiyautu ŋicweei ŋulu emam nyenyamunosi. Kiwuaa ekusibari anakuj, aneni nyediteunia tari iwadio cici, anerae emam ekokolan eapiyari nen, nabo emam esipiran ŋolo inyasuni iŋes.
42012034	Anerae neni eyai ebari kon, iŋes eyai etau kon daŋ.
42012035	“Tonyikito ŋikusilowi ejok, tonokete ŋikusitaae.
42012036	Kikote ŋiketiyak ŋulu idarito ekecekapolon eboŋuni alokiitanu. Ani eboŋuni iŋes, ikoŋikoŋokini ekek, toŋaasi ikes atipei.
42012037	Erereŋ nooi ŋiketiyak ŋulu erukauni ekapolon kec ekienyete apaki ŋina eboŋunio iŋes. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, enyiki iŋes ŋilowi keŋ, kisiboik ikes tokorak akimuj.
42012038	Erereŋ ikes nooi ŋina erukaunere ekienyete, tari kedolu iŋes kidiŋ akuwar kori iwali akwap!
42012039	Toyenete nabo atemar kerae toyeni elope ere esaa ŋolo edolunio ekokolan, kekienyit iŋes, ikotere nyebwaŋi akai keŋ.
42012040	Iyes daŋ totenito, anerae ebuni Lokoku a Ituŋanan apaki ŋina nyiyenete iyes.”
42012041	Kiŋit Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, isua make ilimunitor iyoŋ akitadapet na kori ŋituŋa daadaŋ?”
42012042	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Ŋae bo erae eketiyan ŋolo aoson ŋolo kikinyoma, ŋolo iwuakini ekapolon toruwor ekapolokiniton ŋolo a ŋiketiyak keŋ, tokoranakini ikes akimuj apaki ŋina ecamitere?
42012043	Erereŋ eketiyan ŋolo ŋina ebunio ekeekapolon, toryamu iŋes itiyae ikoŋina!
42012044	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, iwuakini ekapolon iŋes topolok ebari keŋ daadaŋ.
42012045	Nai ani ketema eketiyan ŋol alotau keŋ, ‘Adid ekapolon kaŋ abunore,’ elomakini akibuŋa ŋiketiyak ŋuluce, ŋaberu ka ŋikilyok, nabo imuji, tomat tomerakin;
42012046	eboŋuni ekapolon ke eketiyan a ŋol akoloŋit ŋina nyetamunitor iŋes ka esaa ŋolo nyeyeni iŋes. Isicani ekapolon ŋol iŋes nooi, kikwaanikinos ka ŋulu nyerae ŋikanupak.
42012047	“Aŋun, eketiyan ŋolo eyeni ŋuna ecamit ekapolon keŋ, nai kiboikin pa etenit kitiya ŋun, ibuŋao nooi.
42012048	Nai ŋolo itiyae ŋuna aronok pa eyeni ŋuna ecamit ekapolon keŋ, ibuŋae ekapolon keŋ iŋes iwadio. Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini einakinitae ibore ŋini alalan, iitanio ŋini alalan aneni keŋ ka ŋini icikakinito ŋituŋa ŋiboro ŋulu alalak, iitanio aneni keŋ ŋulu alalak adepar.
42012049	“Abunit ayoŋ ayaun akim nakwap, okoe kerae toris tokona kerirau!
42012050	Eyai akibatisao ŋina itemokino ayoŋ oryamu, nai akaryebete ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋun etau tari neni irikakinotor!
42012051	Itamete iyes atemar abunit ayoŋ ayaun ekisil nakwap a? Mam. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ayaunit ayoŋ atyakatyaka.
42012052	Ameun tokona, ani keyakasi ŋituŋa ŋikan ŋulu ke epeikal, eremokin ŋiuni ŋiarei, nabo eremokin ŋiarei ŋiuni.
42012053	Eyakaun atyakatyaka eremokin papa ka lokoku keŋ ka eremokin lokoku daŋ ka papa keŋ; eremokin nabo toto ka nakoku keŋ, nakoku daŋ eremokin ka toto keŋ, nabo eremokin tata ka ateran keŋ ka eremokin ateran daŋ ka tata keŋ.”
42012054	Tolimok nabo Yesu asepic a ŋituŋa tema, “Ani iŋolikinete iyes edou ebuni alo To, itemasi atipei aapuu akiru akilim, ido kilim kire.
42012055	Ani ekutuni ekuwuam anakan a ŋina alo Kwap, itemasi iyes emwanuni akoloŋ nooi, ido tomwanu kire.
42012056	Iyes ŋikaŋisoswae! Iŋolikinete iyes epite ŋolo eyakatar akwap ka adis, ido toyenut apolou kec; nyo bo pa iyenuniata iyes apolou ŋina a ŋirwa a lu?
42012057	“Inyoni pa itubunioto iyes ŋilopeyek ŋuna iyookino iyes kitiyata?
42012058	Ani ikisitakini iyoŋ ituŋanan itoriko neni etubere ŋakiro, kirworiutu kisila eriŋa nyedolo neni ikitubokinere. Ani pa kitiya iyoŋ ŋun, ikirikori iŋes iyoŋ lokatubon, ido itorikok ekatubon ŋasigarya ŋuna ikiwuakinete iyoŋ mabus.
42012059	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, nyilomuni iyoŋ a nen jik, mati kitac amica kon daadaŋ tari nikaput.”
42013001	Apaki ŋin, aya nen ŋituŋa ŋulu alimokinete Yesu epite ŋolo aarya Pilato ŋituŋa ŋulu a Galileya eriŋa emurosi neni ka Akuj.
42013002	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Itamete iyes atemar kesecaka nooi ŋituŋa ŋulu a Galileya ŋul akilo Ŋigalileyan ŋuluce aŋuna aryamuniata ikes ŋican ŋul a?
42013003	Nyikote neni! Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ani pa kikiwa iyes ŋasecisya kus, itwakete iyes daŋ ikwa ikes.
42013004	Ani bo ŋituŋa ŋulutomon ka ŋikanikauni ŋulu aritakin arwatata toar alo Siloam? Itamete iyes itoodiunito ŋun atemar kesecaka ikes nooi akilo ŋituŋa daadaŋ alo Yerusalem a?
42013005	Nyikote neni! Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ani pa kikiwa iyes ŋasecisya kus, itwakete iyes daŋ ikwa ikes.”
42013006	Tolimok nai Yesu ikes akitadapet tema, “Kedupit ekile ebobore lomanikor keŋ. Abu iŋes toroiya ŋaboboryo keraunito alobobore a ŋol, nai nyeryamu tari apei.
42013007	Aŋun, tolimok iŋes eketen ŋolo ke ebobore tema, ‘Kiira tokona, adol ŋikaru ŋiuni abuneene ayoŋ nege aroiun ŋadiboboryo, nai nyeryamuna tari apei. Toyepa! Kaanukiro ewuar iŋes analup koŋin?’
42013008	Toboŋok eketiyan ŋolo ke emanikor tema, ‘Ekapolon, kimyek mono ekaru lo bon, aboki ayoŋ akipany natorom keŋ, ido obukok ŋasike.
42013009	Acepaki erauni ŋaraito ekaru ŋolo moi. Ani kemam, toyepa nai iyoŋ iŋes.’ ”
42013010	Apeikoloŋit ŋina a Sabato kitatam Yesu ŋituŋa alosinagoga.
42013011	Ayai aberu ŋina ayakar ekipye ŋolo etoŋwalit iŋes ŋikaru ŋitomon ka ŋikanikauni. Akudokina iŋes pa apedori akitenar.
42013012	Ani iŋolikini Yesu iŋes, bu tonyara iŋes tema, “Aberu, ikilacakin iyoŋ anadyak kon!”
42013013	Kidokok Yesu ŋakan kidiama keŋ, torikin iŋes atipei tojokyar, kisyak akipuro Akuj.
42013014	Nai abu ekapolon ŋolo ke esinagoga toŋo aŋuna etaŋaleunio Yesu aberu akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, ido tolimok ŋituŋa tema, “Eya ŋirwa ŋikanikapei ŋulu itemokino kitiyaata etic; itemokino aponare akitaŋaleuno ŋirwa ŋul, meere akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato!”
42013015	Tolimok Ekapolon iŋes tema, “Iyes ŋikaŋisoswae! Nyelacanakini idiotuŋanan alokidiŋ kus ekeemoŋ kori ekeesigirya ananok, ido tomia nakipi akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato a?
42013016	Eyai tokona ne aberu ŋina erae akanateker a ŋina ka Aburaam, ŋina aenit Satan ŋikaru ŋitomon ka ŋikanikauni, emam nai nyitemokino alacakin iŋes akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato a?”
42013017	Ani elimuni Yesu ŋun, kiruma ŋikeemoi daadaŋ ŋileec. Nai alakara asepic daadaŋ, anerae ajokak ŋakiro ŋuna etiyae Yesu.
42013018	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Ikoni Apukan ka Akuj ai? Nyo isikwaanere iŋes?
42013019	Ikoni neta: elemuni ituŋanan icokit ŋini ikoni ŋini ke ebobore, min todupak lomanikor keŋ. Ani erupuni, topoloor nooi toruwor ekitoe, potu ŋikyeny toduko ŋakais kec naten keŋ.”
42013020	Kiŋit nabo Yesu ikes tema, “Nyo tokona esikwaania ayoŋ Apukan ka Akuj?
42013021	Ikoni neta: ikoni ŋakinyalet ŋadi ŋuna elemuni aberu kinyalak ka ŋakirya ŋuna edolito ŋidepei ŋiarei, tomurak akitodol ŋina abuunioto daadaŋ.”
42013022	Ani elosi Yesu Yerusalem, kitor kidiŋ ŋitaunio ka ŋirerya kitatami ŋituŋa.
42013023	Kiŋit icetuŋanan iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ŋituŋa ŋidikudyo bon eiunosi a?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema,
42013024	“Toŋirikisi ka agogoŋu alomar alokek a ŋolo adidiŋan. Anerae akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, eŋirikinete ŋikalalak alomar tooma, nai nyepedorete.
42013025	Kedau elope ŋolo ke ekal anyoun togol ekek, iwuoyete iyes alokiŋa, kisyakis akikoŋikoŋ ekek ibasi, ‘Ekapolon, toŋaarae isua olomutu!’ Eboŋokini iŋes tema, ‘Nyayeni ayoŋ neni iponitotor iyes!’
42013026	A nen ilimokinete iyes iŋes itemasi, ‘Abe bo ikimuji ka ikimasi isua ka iyoŋ kaapei; itatami bo iyoŋ alorerya kosi.’
42013027	Eboŋokini nabo iŋes tema, ‘Nyayeni ayoŋ neni iponitotor iyes, katosi aneni kaŋ, iyes ŋulu itiyaete ŋakiro ŋuna aronok!’
42013028	Ikalounete iyes nooi, ikonyanakinete ŋikusikyal apaki ŋina iŋolikiniata Aburaam ka Isaka ka Yakobo ta ŋikadwarak daadaŋ eyakasi Napukan ka Akuj, nai ani eruwor iyes itogolor kiŋa!
42013029	Epote ŋituŋa alo Kide, alo To, alo Kuju ka alo Kwap kiboikinos nasuban a Napukan ka Akuj.
42013030	A nen ŋice ŋulu isidiyete tokona, iŋarenete; ŋice ŋulu iŋarenete tokona, eruworosi ŋulu isidiyete.”
42013031	Apaki ŋin, potu Ŋiparisayon ŋice neni a Yesu, tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Itemokino iyoŋ torotok a ne tolot iwace, anerae ecamit erwosit Erode akiar iyoŋ.”
42013032	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Apesi tokona tolimokisi ekwee ŋol ebe, ‘Eritanari ayoŋ atasatan, nabo etaŋaleuni ŋikadyakak daŋ akoloŋit naga ka moi taparacu, ani akoloŋit ŋina kiuniyet, erikak etic kaŋ.’
42013033	Nai itemokino akoloŋit naga ka moi taparacu ta ŋinace olot kiŋaren; anerae nyemaikina ekadwaran earyo aiwace, mati erae Yerusalem.
42013034	“Okoe ŋituŋa a Yerusalem ŋulu iarete ŋikadwarak, nabo tocaka a ŋamoru ŋulu iyakuunitae neni kus! Ŋarwa ŋayai acamitor ayoŋ acunakin ŋidwe kon, ikwaŋina ecunia akokoroit ŋimiyoi nabebenuk keŋ, nai nyikicamakis iyes ayoŋ.
42013035	Topupokisi tokona, imyekinio Akai kus ŋina ka Akuj. Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, nyikiŋolikinete iyes ayoŋ nabo akitodol akoloŋit ŋina itemaryata, ‘Erereŋ ŋolo ebunit alokiro a ŋolo ke Ekapolon!’ ”
42014001	Ani akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato elomari Yesu akimuj kai ke ekepukan ke ece a ŋolo arae Eparisayot, kiteut Ŋiparisayon iŋes.
42014002	Bu ekile ŋolo abuto ŋakejen ka ŋakan neni a Yesu.
42014003	Kiŋit nai Yesu ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon tema, “Ecamakinitae mono a Lokisila yok itaŋaleunio ituŋanan akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato kori emam?”
42014004	Nai kililiŋa ikes totakin cek. Ido kikamu Yesu akan ŋina ke ekile a ŋol kitaŋaleu iŋes, kimyek tolot.
42014005	Tosodi Yesu kiŋit ikes tema, “Ŋae alokidiŋ kus ŋini nyiriuni lokoku keŋ kori ekeemoŋ atipei kimasakin nakare akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato?”
42014006	Nai nyepedosi ikes aboŋokin Yesu adiokirot.
42014007	Kiŋolik Yesu epite ŋolo aseata ŋipeyok ŋice ŋikicoloŋo ŋulu ajokak, ido tolimok ikes daadaŋ akitadapet tema,
42014008	“Ani ikinyarae iyoŋ ituŋanan nasuban ŋuna ke ekiitanu, tocoite nyiseu akibois ŋina ajokan, anerae epedor ayakaun ituŋanan ice ŋini enyaraunitae, ŋini epol akilo iyoŋ,
42014009	ido ebuni ŋolo ikinyaraunit iyes daadaŋ, itolimok iyoŋ tema, ‘Tonyou kimyek ekile lo kiboikin nege.’ A nen ikirumete iyoŋ ŋileec, tosodi tolot akiboikin kaku.
42014010	Nai ani ikinyarao iyoŋ, tolot kiboikin kaku, tosodi ani ebuni ŋolo ikinyarit iyoŋ tema, ‘Bua ekaakone, kiboikin neni ajokan nege.’ Ikikerete iyoŋ ŋipeyok ŋuluce daadaŋ ikiŋolikinete ibuni kiŋaren.
42014011	Anerae ŋinituŋanan itopolooro bon, itiditeunio; nai ŋini itiditeuna bon, itopolooryo.”
42014012	Tolimok nai Yesu ekepukan daŋ ŋolo anyaraunit iŋes tema, “Ani icamit iyoŋ akisimuj ŋituŋa, nyinyarau ŋikonikonei kori atalokaato kon kori ŋikoniyeneta ka ŋikidunyet ŋulu erae ŋikabarak, anerae ikinyaraete ikes daŋ iyoŋ, tosodi totaca ŋuna aris iyoŋ kitiya neni kec.
42014013	Nai ani itemokini iyoŋ akimuj, tonyarau ŋikulyak, ŋikecodok, ŋikaŋwalak ka ŋimudukanotin.
42014014	Iryamuni iyoŋ arereŋu, anerae emam ikes ibore ikiinakinete iyoŋ. Ikitaci iyoŋ Akuj akoloŋit ŋina eyaruniata ŋituŋa ŋulu ajokak.”
42014015	Ani iirari ipei a ŋulu emujete ka Yesu ŋakiro ŋun, tolimok iŋes Yesu tema, “Erereŋ nooi ŋulu iboikinosi kimuja a Napukan ka Akuj!”
42014016	Nai tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ayai koloŋ ekile ŋolo abu kipo akimuj ŋina alalan, tonyarau ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak nakimuj.
42014017	Ani edoli apaki ŋinakimujet, kiyaki iŋes epito keŋ anyarare ŋipeyok tema, ‘Potu, anerae etemokin ibore daadaŋ!’
42014018	Nai tolomakis daadaŋ alimunun a ŋipeipei atemar ‘Nyalosi.’ Tolimok ŋolo ke ekiŋaren eketiyan ŋol tema, ‘Ariŋa tokona ayoŋ agyeli emanikor, acamit alosit akiŋolikin. Ekeŋisit iyoŋ ikimyek ayoŋ olot.’
42014019	Tema ece, ‘Ariŋa tokona ayoŋ agyeli ŋicuugae ŋitomon, acamit alosit akisisyare; ekeŋisit iyoŋ ikimyek ayoŋ.’
42014020	Tema nabo ece, ‘Ariŋa tokona ayoŋ eitari, a ŋakiro a ŋun, nyapedori ayoŋ abunore.’
42014021	“A nen, abu eketiyan toboŋo tolimok ekapolon ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ. Toŋo elope ŋasuban nooi, tolimok eketiyan keŋ tema, ‘Tonyou atipei kirimo lomaketa daadaŋ ka kidiŋ ŋakais ŋuna ke etaun a lo, tosodi iyau nege ŋikulyak, ŋikecodok, ŋimudukanotin ka ŋikaŋwalak.’
42014022	Ani irikakini eketiyan ŋun daadaŋ, tolimok ekapolon keŋ tema, ‘Ekapolon, etiya ayoŋ daadaŋ, ikwaŋina ilimunitor iyoŋ, nai eriŋa iwace elolom.’
42014023	Tolimok nai ekapolon iŋes tema, ‘Ape kiŋa etaun ka nariet kitiŋau ŋituŋa, ikotere kilelebun akai kaŋ.
42014024	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, emam tari ipei alokidiŋ ŋulu enyaraunitae ŋini epedori akiir akimuj kaŋ!’ ”
42014025	Ani elosete ŋasepico ŋuna a ŋituŋa ka Yesu kaapei, toboboŋ Yesu tolimok ikes tema,
42014026	“Ŋinituŋanan ebuni neni kaŋ, nyeruwor ekaakewuapan, mati kakaminaki iŋes ayoŋ nooi akilo papa keŋ, toto keŋ, aberu keŋ, ŋidwe keŋ, atalokaato keŋ, atanakaato keŋ ta akiyar keŋ a ilope.
42014027	Ŋinituŋanan nyeryoŋi emusalaba keŋ, ido ekewuapak ayoŋ, nyeruwor iŋes jik ekaakewuapan.
42014028	“Ani eyai ipei alokidiŋ kus ŋini ecamit akiduk akai ŋina apolon, iboikin iŋes mono kimar etyae a ŋisiliŋa a ŋulu duket, toanyu erae keya ŋulu itemokino akirikakinia akiduk.
42014029	Ani pa kitiya iŋes ikoŋina, ipiyori iŋes akirikakin akai ŋina sek aris kedukokin arwatata. Elomakinete ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu iteete akienar iŋes,
42014030	temasi, ‘Aberakin ituŋanan en akisyakin akiduk, nai tokona epiyo akirikakin!’
42014031	“Ani enyouni erwosit ŋolo ka ajore a ŋina a ŋituŋa a ŋalipyo a ŋatomon ecamit akitijiyore erwosit ŋolo eyakar ajore ŋina a ŋituŋa a ŋalipyo a ŋatomoniarei, iboikin iŋes mono totam erae kepedori iŋes ejiye ka iŋes.
42014032	Ani pa kepedori, iyakiyari iŋes ŋituŋa kisiryama erwosit ŋoloce eriŋa elwana, kiŋit akisil ka iŋes.”
42014033	Toŋetak Yesu erwor keŋ ebala, “Ikoŋinapei, emam tari ipei alokidiŋ kus ŋini eruwor ekewuapan kaŋ, mati kipoto ibore daadaŋ ŋini eyakar iŋes.
42014034	“Ejok acumbi, nai ani kepyaniar, itasasamunio nabo ikwaani?
42014035	Nyemaikina tari imorikinio ka ŋalup kori ka ŋasike; nai ecakaryo. Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki ŋuna kiiraret, kiira!”
42015001	Tocunun ŋikerirak ocur ka ŋikasecak akiirar ŋakiro a Yesu.
42015002	Tolomakis Ŋiparisayon ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila akiŋuruŋura ebasi, “Okoe! Abe erukito bo ituŋanan en ka ŋikasecak, nabo imujete ka ikes!”
42015003	Tolimok Yesu ikes akitadapet na tema,
42015004	“Ani alokidiŋ kus keyakar ituŋanan ŋamesekin amiat, tooli apei, ikokini iŋes ai? Nyimyekini iŋes ŋuna tomonikanikaomwon ka ŋakanikaomwon anadakar, tolot kiwara ŋina eolit tari neni eryamunia a?
42015005	Ani eryamuni, elelyani iŋes nooi, toryoŋak amesek ŋin loseket keŋ.
42015006	Apaki ŋina edolyo iŋes lore keŋ, enyarauni ŋikeekonei kaapei ka ŋikidunyet tema, ‘Olelyana kaapei, anerae aryamu ayoŋ amesek kaŋ ŋina aolit.’
42015007	Ikwaŋinapei, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, eyakaun alelyan nakuj aŋuna ke ekasecan a epei a ŋolo ekii ŋasecisya keŋ, akilo ŋuluce ŋulu tomonikanikaomwon ka ŋikanikaomwon ŋulu ajokak, ŋulu nyiitanito akiki ŋasecisya kec.
42015008	“Kori ikokini ai aberu ŋina eyakar ŋisilipae ŋitomon, ido tocakar epei? Emam mono nyinokakini iŋes etaa, topyeu akai, kiwar ŋiwaetin ka akai daadaŋ tari ŋina eryamunia a?
42015009	Ani eryamuni, enyarauni ŋakeekonei ka ŋikidunyet iwapei tema, ‘Olelyana kaapei ka ayoŋ, anerae aryamu ayoŋ esilipa kaŋ ŋolo acakara!’
42015010	Ikwaŋinapei, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, elelyanete ŋimalaikan ŋulu ka Akuj ikotere epeikasecan ŋolo ekii ŋasecisya keŋ.”
42015011	Tolimu Yesu tema, “Ayai ekile ŋolo aya ŋidwe ŋulusapa ŋiarei.
42015012	Abu ŋolo cici tolimok iŋes tema, ‘Papa, totyakakinae ayoŋ ŋiboro ŋulu ebeunito neni kaŋ anabaru kon.’ Totyakaki nai papa keŋ edya ŋol ŋiboro keŋ.
42015013	Ani eriŋa nyelunyara ŋirwa ŋulu alalak, abu edya ŋol tocunak ŋiboro ŋulu ayakar daadaŋ, towot lobuku ece ŋolo alwanan; kirika iŋes aina ŋiboro keŋ alopite a ŋolo aronon.
42015014	Kedau iŋes akielielaar ikes daadaŋ, bu eron nakwap ŋin, toŋopik iŋes ibore imuji.
42015015	Tolot nai iŋes toruwor epito aneni a icetuŋanan anakwap a ŋin, a ŋini abu kiwuak iŋes akiyok ŋipegei.
42015016	Emuit iŋes akimor ka ŋipegei ŋapoco, nai amam ipei daŋ ŋini apedori ainakin iŋes tari ŋadi.
42015017	Ani ekaku, kiito iŋes ekecere tema, ‘Imujete ŋiketiyak a papa kaŋ akimuj kimwoko topiyanut, nai okaarite ayoŋ akoro a ne!
42015018	Anyouni ayoŋ oboŋo neni a papa kaŋ, olimok iŋes otema, “Papa, asec ayoŋ alokiŋaren Akuj ka alokiŋaren kon;
42015019	nyitemokino nabo ayoŋ okanyarae lokoku kon, kitusubunae ayoŋ eketiyan kon.” ’
42015020	Tonyou nai iŋes, tolot neni a papa keŋ. “Ani eriŋa iŋes elwana, towuat papa keŋ iŋes ebunit kisyoni iŋes, kikomak kisiryamia, totunakin, tonu iŋes.
42015021	Tolimok edya ŋol papa keŋ tema, ‘Papa, asec ayoŋ alokiŋaren Akuj ka alokiŋaren kon; nyitemokino nabo ayoŋ okanyarae lokoku kon.’
42015022	Nai tolimok papa keŋ ŋiketiyak keŋ tema, ‘Apesi atipei yautu elou ŋolo ajokan kitanapa. Kiwuakisi ekaboboot lokimoin keŋ ka kitanapa ŋamuk.
42015023	Toramutu itaok ŋini atuman toarakis, onyama olakaros!
42015024	Anerae lokoku kaŋ lo, atwanit, nai tokona ayaru; aolit, nai tokona atakanu.’ Ido kisyakis ikes akimuj ka akimomwor.
42015025	“Apaki ŋin ayai lokoku keŋ ŋolo apolon lomanikor. Ani eboŋuni iŋes eapuuni lore, kiira ŋituŋa ikareyete ka idoŋaete.
42015026	Tonyara iŋes eketiyan epei, kiŋit iŋes tema, ‘Anukiro nu?’
42015027	Toboŋok eketiyan ŋol iŋes tema, ‘Lokaato kon aboŋu lore, ido abu papa kon tema toara itaok ŋini atuman, anerae aboŋu iŋes neni ajokan emam ŋace.’
42015028	“Toŋo edya ŋolo apolon nooi, towou alomar tooma lore; tosodi tolomu papa keŋ kiŋa, kimaima iŋes tema, ‘Tolomu tooma.’
42015029	Toboŋok iŋes papa keŋ tema, ‘Kiŋolik, etiya ayoŋ ekonitic ŋikaru ŋulu alalak emam nyeŋero ŋakonikiro; nai emam tari idiokale daŋ ŋini ibu iyoŋ ikiinak ayoŋ olakarotor ka ŋikonei kaŋ.
42015030	Nai abu lokoku kon logo kisunyak ŋiboro kon daadaŋ namalaae, ani tokona eboŋuni iŋes lore, iarak iyoŋ iŋes itaok ŋini atuman!’
42015031	Toboŋok papa keŋ iŋes tema, ‘Lokoku, ikirukit iwon ŋirwa daadaŋ, nabo ibore daadaŋ ŋini ikiyakar ayoŋ erae ŋini kon.
42015032	Nai itemokino iwon olakaros; anerae lokaato kon lo, atwanit, nai tokona ayaru; aolit, nai tokona atakanu!’ ”
42016001	Tolimok Yesu ŋikeekasyomak tema, “Ayai ekile ŋolo abarit, ŋolo ayakar ekawoikiniton etic ŋiboro keŋ. Tolimokinae nai ekabaran atemar ebolyar ekawoikiniton etic ŋiboro keŋ.
42016002	Tosodi ekapolon tonyarau iŋes kiŋit tema, ‘Anukiro nu ŋuna apupi ayoŋ atemar itiyae iyoŋ? Kitoodikinae cenite ekimar a ŋiboro kaŋ daadaŋ, anerae acepaki nyirubakini iyoŋ irae eketiyan kaŋ.’
42016003	Totamatama eketiyan alotau keŋ tema, ‘Akalema tokona ayoŋ ekapolon alotic, ekokini ayoŋ ai? Meere ayoŋ ituŋanan ŋini agogoŋon, ŋini apedori akitare, nabo ekerumito ŋileec alosit akilipanar.
42016004	Nai ayeni ayoŋ ŋuna etiyakini; ikotere ani kekerita ayoŋ ekapolon alotic keŋ, ekejaut ŋituŋa alorerya kec.’
42016005	“Tonyarau iŋes ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu ayakatar ŋamicae ŋuna ke ekapolon keŋ. Tonyaraununu ikes a ŋipeipei, kiŋit ŋolo ke ekiŋaren tema, ‘Nyo etyae a ibore a ŋini ikimicae iyoŋ ekapolon kaŋ?’
42016006	Toboŋok iŋes tema, ‘Akimyet ŋina ilelebun ŋamoti ŋuna apolok amiat.’ Tolimok ekawuoikiniton etic iŋes tema, ‘Ekimar kon logo, kiboikin kigirak ŋatomonikan make.’
42016007	Tosodi kiŋit iŋes ŋoloce tema, ‘Etya ai ibore ikimicao iyoŋ?’ Toboŋok iŋes tema, ‘Ŋicweei ŋulu a ŋimomwa amiat.’ Tolimok ekawuoikiniton etic iŋes tema, ‘Ekimar kon logo, kiboikin atipei, kigirak ŋatomonikanikauni.’
42016008	“Abu ekapolon kipur ekawuoikiniton etic ŋolo aronon ŋol, aŋuna etiyaa iŋes ŋuna ka apiiryanut, anerae ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a na, epiiryaka nooi aloticisyo akilo ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akica.”
42016009	Tolimu nai Yesu tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes daŋ atemar kikoneutu ŋikonei ke ebari kus a ŋolo ka akwap a na. Ani edaun ebari kus anakwap a na, ikijaunete ikes iyes lore ŋolo eyai akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
42016010	Ŋinituŋanan ikinyomitae anibore a ŋini edit, ikinyomitae iŋes tari a ŋini alalan; ŋinituŋanan nyikinyomitae anibore a ŋini edit, nyikinyomitae iŋes tari a ŋini alalan.
42016011	Ani pa kikikinyomitae iyoŋ alobari a ŋolo ka akwap a na, ŋae ikijokokini iyoŋ ebari ŋolo a kire?
42016012	Ani pa kikikinyomitae iyoŋ a ibore a ituŋanan a ŋinice, ŋae ikiinakini iyoŋ ŋini itemokino toruwor ŋini kon?
42016013	“Emam eketiyan epedori akitiya ŋiticisyo ŋulu a ŋikapolok a ŋiarei; eŋeri epei, tosodi tominak ŋoloce, kori imiidikin neni ke epei, tosodi tojamuwa ŋoloce. Nyipedorete iyes akikicarikin akitiyanakin Akuj ka ebari.”
42016014	Ani iirarete Ŋiparisayon ŋulu aminasi ŋisiliŋa ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, tojamuwasi iŋes.
42016015	Tolimok nai Yesu ikes tema, “Iraakasi iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu itojokasi anakonyen a ŋituŋa, nai eyeni Akuj ŋuna alotai kus. Anerae ibore ŋini itopoloorito ŋituŋa, erae asiilyo aneni ka Akuj.
42016016	“Etatamyo koloŋ Ŋikisila a Moses ka ŋakigireta ŋuna a ŋikadwarak tari lorwa ŋulu a Yoana ke Ekebatisan. Ŋinapei alorwa a ŋul, aponi kisyakinae alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj. Nabo ecamit ŋinituŋanan alomar Napukan ka agogoŋu.
42016017	Nai epatana nakuj ka akwap aŋopiyar, akilo tari enyukuta epei a Lokisila aruwor koŋin.
42016018	“Ŋinituŋanan elaki akeeberu kiit ace, aruwor ekaloman; ŋini daŋ iitari aberu ŋina elakitae, aruwor ekaloman.”
42016019	“Ayai ekile ŋolo abarit, tonapite ŋilowi ŋulu apol egyelit nooi, kiramirami akimuj ŋisaae daadaŋ.
42016020	Ayai nabo nen ekulyakit ŋolo anyaritae Lasaro, ŋolo erikarito ŋajemei akuwan daadaŋ. Arikununuyo iŋes lokek ke ekile a ŋolo abaran a ŋol,
42016021	iitanit akimuj ŋina acakunun alomesa keŋ. Aponeneete ŋiŋokwo daŋ akime ŋajemei keŋ.
42016022	“Totwan ekulyakit ŋol, yaasi ŋimalaikan iŋes kisiboikis diyete Aburaam anakuj. Totwan ekabaran daŋ, tonukae.
42016023	Aryeba ekabaran nooi aneni aya ŋikatwak. Ani ireori iŋes kidiama, toanyuwa Aburaam elwana nooi ka Lasaro iboi alodiye keŋ.
42016024	Tosodi iŋes togeu anyaraiyanar ke etoil a ŋolo apolon ebala, ‘Papa Aburaam, kisyoni kare ayoŋ! Kiyaku Lasaro kilumok ekimoin keŋ nakipi ŋadi, ido kitililimik naŋajep kaŋ, anerae akapipilikinit ayoŋ akim na nooi!’
42016025	“Nai abu Aburaam tolimok iŋes tema, ‘Lokoku, toyeni atemar anakiyar kon, iboi iyoŋ neni ajokan, kiboiye Lasaro neni aronon; nai tokona eyai iŋes nege nalakara ka iyai iyoŋ napipilu.
42016026	Akilo ŋun daadaŋ, eyai auwuat ŋinati aoyan ŋina iriwokina kidiŋ yok, ido ani ŋulu ebasi oloto a ne opotu neni kus, nyepedosi, kori ŋulu ecamito aponare aina neni kosi, nyepedosi.’
42016027	Toboŋok ekabaran ŋol iŋes tema, ‘Nai ekemaimai ca ayoŋ iyoŋ papa atemar kiyakiya Lasaro lore ŋolo a papa kaŋ,
42016028	neni eya atalokaato kaŋ ŋulukan. Kicik iŋes ikes toyenut, ikotere nyepotu nakim ŋina apipilan nooi na.’
42016029	“Tolimok Aburaam iŋes tema, ‘Eyakatar atalokaato kon Moses ka ŋikadwarak, itemokino kiirasi ikes.’
