42016030	Toboŋok ekabaran ŋol tema, ‘Papa Aburaam, nyitemokino ŋuna; nai ani kelot ituŋanan idio ŋini ayaru alokatwak neni kec, kire ekiyete ikes asecenen.’
42016031	Toboŋok Aburaam iŋes tema, ‘Ani pa kiirasi ikes Moses ka ŋikadwarak, nyepedorete akinup tari keyaru ituŋanan alokatwak.’ ”
42017001	Tolimok Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Kire epote ŋakitemyeta ŋuna epedorete akitesec ŋituŋa, nai ekaŋ iŋes ŋini eyauni ŋakiro ŋun!
42017002	Kitemokino iŋes toenikinae amoru ŋinakiryeet lomosiriŋ, tocakakinae nanam, akilo iŋes akitesec ipei a ŋulu cicik a lu.
42017003	Tocoikinito! Ani kesec lokaato kon, kiyayak iŋes; ani keki, kisyoni.
42017004	Ani kesec iŋes aneni kon ŋarwa ŋakanikaarei apeipaaran, ido toboŋu ŋarwa ŋakanikaarei tolimu tema, ‘Aki, kisyoni,’ itemokino nai kisyoni iŋes.”
42017005	Tolimokis Ŋikiyakia Yesu temasi, “Ekapolon, kiyatak anupit kosi.”
42017006	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Kerae tari todit anupit kus totya icokit ŋini ikoni ŋini ke ebobore, kipedosi alimokin ekitoe lo atemar, ‘Torutun anataagor, min torup ananam!’ Iirari iŋes.
42017007	“Ani keyai ipei alokidiŋ kus ŋini eyakar eketiyan ŋolo itae kori iyoki ŋamesekin, ŋina ebunio iŋes alomanikor, itemari iyoŋ iŋes kiboikin kimuj a?
42017008	Mam jik! Ilimokini iyoŋ iŋes itema, ‘Tonap arapet, kidoroki akaakimuj atipei. Kidareu daŋ emuj ka omat ayoŋ mono, ani ekaku, kimuj nai iyoŋ.’
42017009	Nyejok alimokin eketiyan atemar alakara aŋuna ke etic keŋ, kori ai?
42017010	Ikote neni tari aneni kus. Ani kitiyata iyes ŋuna ikicikakinitae daadaŋ, temasi, ‘Ikirae isua ca ŋiketiyak, ikitiya isua ŋuna make ikicamakinitae akitiya!’ ”
42017011	Ani elosi Yesu Yerusalem, kitor kidiŋ Samaria ka Galileya.
42017012	Ani eapiyari lore ŋolo alosi, kiryamun ka ŋikilyok ŋitomon ŋulu erumit atapon ŋulu apotu towua anawae.
42017013	Kiworout ikes ebasi, “Yesu Eketataman, kisyoni isua!”
42017014	Kiŋolik Yesu ikes tolimok tema, “Toloto neni a ŋisacaradotin ikisyemeto ikes iyes.” Ani elosete ikes alorot, toŋaleut ikes tosegut.
42017015	Nai ani eanyuni epei alokidiŋ kec atemar aŋaleu, toboŋo elakara ipuro Akuj ka iworoe ke etoil a ŋolo apolon.
42017016	Tolot toramakin kwap nakejen a Yesu kijuuru, tolakar neni keŋ. Arae iŋes Esamaritanoit.
42017017	Kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema, “Pa takae arae ŋikilyok ŋitomon etaŋaleunio a? Nyaalu bo ŋikanikaomwon?
42017018	Inyoni eraakar ituŋanan ŋini ka acekwap eboŋuni akipuro Akuj?”
42017019	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Tonyou tolot, ikitaŋaleu iyoŋ anupit kon.”
42017020	Kiŋita Ŋiparisayon ŋice Yesu temasi, “Ori ebunio Apukan ka Akuj?” Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyebuni Apukan ka Akuj etakanete ŋakitoodiuneta keŋ.
42017021	Emam ituŋanan ŋini etemari, ‘Kiŋolik, eyai ne!’ kori ‘Eyai ama!’ Anerae eyai Apukan ka Akuj neni kus.”
42017022	Tolimok nai Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Epote ŋirwa ŋulu iitaniata iyes akiŋolikin tari apeikoloŋit ŋina a Lokoku a Ituŋanan, nai nyiŋolikinete jik.
42017023	Epote ŋice ŋulu ikilimokinete iyes temasi, ‘Kiŋoliyasi ama!’ kori ‘Kiŋoliutu nege!’ Nai nyilot kori nyiwuapakis ikes.
42017024	Anerae ikoni abunore a Lokoku a Ituŋanan akimilyaunet ŋina ebuni ke epeiwae akwap tari lowae ŋoloce, kinuak akwap daadaŋ.
42017025	Nai itemokino mono iŋes kisicanae nooi, nabo toŋero ŋituŋa ŋulu a ŋirwa a lu.
42017026	Ikwaanikinosi ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋirwa a Lokoku a Ituŋanan ka ŋuna koloŋ a ŋirwa a ŋulu a Noa.
42017027	Emujete ŋituŋa daadaŋ ka tomasete, eitanarete ŋikilyok, nabo epotonoryo ŋapesur kiitae tari akitodol akoloŋit ŋina alomarya Noa nataker; nai tomunyasi ŋakipi ŋituŋa ŋuluce daadaŋ.
42017028	Ikwaanikinosi ŋirwa ŋul ka ŋirwa ŋulu a Lot, emujete ŋituŋa daadaŋ ka tomasete, agyelete, nabo togyelanarete, etaete ka todukete.
42017029	Nai akoloŋit ŋina arotokinio Lot alo Sodoma, totiyaun akim ka Sulpa alokidiama ikwa akiru, tomunya ŋituŋa ŋuluce daadaŋ.
42017030	Ikokinete ŋakiro neni Akoloŋit ŋina etakanunia Lokoku a Ituŋanan.
42017031	“Akoloŋit ŋin, nyitemokino ituŋanan ŋini eyai kidiama akai, edokuni alemun ŋiboro keŋ ŋulu eya tooma akai. Ituŋanan ŋini eyai lomanikor daŋ, nyitemokino iŋes eboŋuni kai.
42017032	Totamunito aberu a Lot!
42017033	Ŋinituŋanan iwarit aiun akiyar keŋ, ecakari; ŋini ejali akiyar keŋ, eiuni.
42017034	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, Akoloŋit ŋin nakwaare, eryamunio ŋituŋa ŋiarei alokitaada; elemaryo ipei, toesikinae ŋinice.
42017035	Eryamunio ŋaberu ŋaarei iryeete; elemaryo apei, toesikinae ŋinace. [
42017036	Eryamunio ŋikilyok ŋiarei itiyaete etic alomanikor; elemaryo epei, toesikinae ŋoloce.]”
42017037	Kiŋita ŋikasyomak keŋ iŋes temasi, “Ai Ekapolon?” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Neni eyai ibore ŋini atwan, iŋes iudakin ŋataruk.”
42018001	Tosodi Yesu tolimok ŋikeekasyomak akitadapet aŋuna ka akitatamya ikes atemar itemokino ikes akilipenen jwi jwi tomam akiup.
42018002	Tolimu iŋes tema, “Ayai lotaun ece ekatubon ŋakiro ŋolo pa akerit Akuj ka pa amisit ŋituŋa.
42018003	Ayai apuserut lotaun ŋolopei ŋol, ŋina abuneene neni ke ekatubon, ecamit kiirarae ŋakiro keŋ ebala, ‘Totub akirot ŋina akatyakit ayoŋ ka ituŋanan ŋini ikiŋoitor!’
42018004	Abu ekatubon ya apaki ŋina aoyan nyetyaka ŋakiro; nai ani ekaku, totamu iŋes tema, ‘Tari pa kakerit ayoŋ Akuj kori ŋituŋa,
42018005	nai aŋuna ekecania ayoŋ apuserut naga, atubi ayoŋ ŋakeekiro eriyan, anerae acepaki akanipi iŋes ayoŋ aŋuna ka abunenen keŋ jik!’ ”
42018006	Tema Ekapolon, “Kiirasi ŋakiro ŋuna alimuni ekatubon ŋolo aronon.
42018007	Ani bo Akuj, nyepedori mono iŋes akitiya neni ajokan loseuna keŋ ŋulu igworonokinete iŋes apaaran jwii ka akuwar kya ecamito akiŋarakino a? Edidi iŋes akiŋarakin ikes a?
42018008	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, einakini iŋes ikes ibore ŋini ecamito atipei. Nai ŋina ebunio Lokoku a Ituŋanan, eryamuni mono iŋes anupit anakwap a?”
42018009	Tolimu Yesu akitadapet naga ikotere ŋituŋa ŋulu abasi ikirae ŋulu iyookino ka tojamuwarito daŋ ŋuluce.
42018010	“Apotu ŋikilyok ŋiarei, toloto Kai ka Akuj akilip; arae epei Eparisayot, torae ŋoloce ekeriran ocur.
42018011	“Towo Eparisayot kilip nenipei keŋ bon tema, ‘Akuj, alakara ayoŋ neni kon, anerae nyikikwaan ayoŋ ka ŋituŋa ŋuluce, ŋikademanarak, ŋikokolak, ŋikalomak, kori daŋ ikwa ekeriran ocur ŋol.
42018012	Aroneene ayoŋ ŋaroniet ŋaarei a ŋolosabit, nabo akalemianakini iyoŋ atutubet apei ŋina kitomonet a ŋinibore a daadaŋ aryamuni ayoŋ.’
42018013	“Towo ekeriran ocur aneni alwana, nyireo ŋakeekonyen tari nakuj, toram etau keŋ tema, ‘Akuj, kisyoni ayoŋ ekasecan!’
42018014	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, abu ekeriran ocur tolot lore keŋ iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj, akilo Eparisayot; anerae ŋinituŋanan itopolooryo bon, itiditeunio; nai ŋini itiditeuna bon, itopolooryo.”
42018015	Torikut ŋicetuŋa ŋidwe neni a Yesu, ecamito iŋes kidokok ŋakeekan neni kec; nai ani iŋolikinete ŋikeekasyomak ŋun, kiretakis ikes.
42018016	Tonyarau Yesu ŋidwe neni keŋ tema, “Kimyekisi ŋidwe potu neni kaŋ! Nyiretakis ikes, anerae erae Apukan ka Akuj ŋina a ŋulu ikote lu.
42018017	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋinituŋanan nyijauni Apukan ka Akuj ikwa ikoku ŋini cici, nyelomari jik Napukan ŋin.”
42018018	Kiŋit ekepukan ece ŋolo a Ŋiyudayan Yesu tema, “Eketataman ŋolo ajokan, nyo itemokino ayoŋ etiya oryamunia akiyar ŋina nyedaun?”
42018019	Kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema, “Kaanukiro ikinyaritor iyoŋ ayoŋ ŋolo ajokan? Emam ituŋanan ŋini ajokan, mati Akuj bon.
42018020	Iyeni iyoŋ Ŋakiciketa, ‘Nyilom, nyiar, nyikoko, nyisudi ŋakiro, tokerite papa kon ka toto kon.’ ”
42018021	Tolimu ekepukan tema, “Eketataman, ŋinapei koloŋ alokiditeu kaŋ, ericit ayoŋ Ŋakiciketa ŋun daadaŋ.”
42018022	Ani iirari Yesu ŋakiro ŋun, tolimok iŋes tema, “Ipeibore bon ikibucit iyoŋ: togyela ibore daadaŋ ŋini iyakar iyoŋ, tokorak ŋisiliŋa lokulyak, ikotere min ebari kon nakuj. Ani ekaku, ibu ikiwuapak ayoŋ.”
42018023	Ŋolopite eirarya iŋes ŋakiro ŋun, torotok esiliyorit nooi, anerae abarit iŋes nooi.
42018024	Kiŋolik Yesu iŋes kesiliyo, tolimu tema, “Egogoŋ nooi ŋikabarak alomar Napukan ka Akuj!
42018025	Epatana ekaal akitor napedot ŋina ke esindan, akilo ekabaran alomar Napukan ka Akuj!”
42018026	Potu ŋituŋa ŋulu eirarete ŋakiro ŋun, kiŋita iŋes temasi, “Ŋae bo nai eiun?”
42018027	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋuna nyepedorosi alotuŋa, epedorosi aneni ka Akuj!”
42018028	Tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Ikijal isua ŋiboro kosi daadaŋ, ikiwuapak iyoŋ.”
42018029	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, emam ituŋanan aesiki ekal keŋ, kori akeeberu, ŋikeekaitotoi, ŋikeekauruunak ka ŋikeedwe aŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj,
42018030	ŋini nyeryamuni abaru ŋina alalan tokona ka akiyar ŋina nyedaun alokaru a ŋulu esidyok.”
42018031	Tonyaraiya Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei nawae, tolimok ikes tema, “Kiirasi! Ikidokari iwon tokona Yerusalem, nabo ŋuna daadaŋ igirito ŋikadwarak ikotere Lokoku a Ituŋanan iyookinosi.
42018032	Ipotokinio iŋes lobukui ŋulu nyerae ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan, tokyenatar ikes iŋes kibuŋata ka kimwaanakis.
42018033	Ibuŋaete ikes iŋes toara; nai kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni, eyaruni iŋes.”
42018034	Nai nyeyenut ŋikasyomak apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna erworo iŋes tari iwadio, anerae ewuaitae apolou ŋina ke erwor keŋ aneni kec ka pa ayenete ikes ŋakiro ŋuna acamit Yesu alimun.
42018035	Ani edoli Yesu diyete Yeriko, eboi ekile ŋolo amudukana alodiyete erot kilipanar.
42018036	Ani iirari emuduk asepic a ŋituŋa itori diye, kiŋit tema, “Anukiro nu?”
42018037	Tolimokinae iŋes temarae, “Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret iŋes itorunit diye ne.”
42018038	Tosodi iŋes kiworou tema, “Yesu! Lokoku a Daudi! Kisyoni kare ca ayoŋ!”
42018039	Kiŋenyakis ŋituŋa ŋulu eŋarenete iŋes temasi, “Kililiŋ!” Nai torebor iŋes nooi tema, “Lokoku a Daudi! Kisyoni kare ca ayoŋ!”
42018040	Towo Yesu tolimu tema, “Yautu ekile neni kaŋ.” Ani eapuuni emuduk diyete keŋ, kiŋit Yesu iŋes tema,
42018041	“Inyoni icamit iyoŋ ayoŋ etiyak neni kon?” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, acamit okienyu nabo.”
42018042	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Tokienyu nabo! Ikitaŋaleu iyoŋ akoninupit.”
42018043	Tokienyu iŋes atipei, kiwuapak Yesu ipuro Akuj elakara. Ani iŋolikini asepic a ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋun, kipur Akuj.
42019001	Toloma Yesu Yeriko erae ekalunyan.
42019002	Ayai nen ekile ŋolo anyaritae Sakayo ŋolo apolokinit ŋikatubok ocur, torae daŋ ekabaran.
42019003	Acamit iŋes aanyun atemar ikoni ituŋanan ebe Yesu ai, nai ikwaŋina auruwuania iŋes, toŋop epite ŋolo iŋolikinia iŋes Yesu, anerae alalak ŋituŋa.
42019004	Tosodi nai iŋes toem kiŋaren ŋituŋa, todoka kidiama ekitoe, ikotere eanyuwari Yesu ŋolo etorunit lorot ŋol.
42019005	Ani edoli Yesu lokitoe ŋol, kireo kidiama tolimok Sakayo tema, “Sakayo, todoku atipei, acamit ayoŋ aruwor epeyonon nakoloŋit na alokai kon.”
42019006	Todoku Sakayo atipei, kijau iŋes Yesu ka alelyan.
42019007	Togeut ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu eteete iŋes akiŋuruŋura ebasi, “Alot ituŋanan en aruwor epeyonon ŋolo ke ekasecan!”
42019008	Tonyou nai Sakayo tolimok Yesu tema, “Topupok Ekapolon! Alosi ayoŋ ainakin atyaket ŋina ke ekaabari lokulyak, nabo ani keyai ituŋanan ŋini sek amodiyarit ikeebore, atacakini ŋatacakinet ŋaomwon.”
42019009	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Abu aiuno kai na nakoloŋit na; anerae erae ekile lo daŋ ekanateker ka Aburaam.
42019010	Anerae abuni Lokoku a Ituŋanan akiwarit ka aiun ŋulu eoliyorito.”
42019011	Ani eriŋa ŋituŋa epupete ŋuna erworo Yesu, tolimok iŋes ŋituŋa akitadapet, anerae aapiyarito ikes Yerusalem, nabo totamakinito ŋituŋa atemar kori eapi atipei Apukan ka Akuj atakanun.
42019012	Kirworik Yesu tema, “Ayai ekabaran ŋolo anyouni tolot nakwap ŋina alwanan ecamit akituruworo erwosit, ani ekaku, toboŋu lore keŋ.
42019013	Tosodi iŋes tonyarau ŋiketiyak keŋ ŋitomon eriŋa iŋes nyerotokino, tokorak ikes ŋisiliŋa ŋitomon ŋulu etiyaunitae ke egolid itiriyanit tolimok tema, ‘Kicurutaata ikes tari ŋina aboŋunio ayoŋ.’
42019014	Nai aremokino ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap keŋ iŋes, kiyakiyasi ŋituŋa neni alosi iŋes temasi, ‘Nyikicamit isua ituŋanan ŋin eruwor erwosit kosi.’
42019015	“Toboŋu iŋes lore kedaun akituruwor erwosit. Tonyarau iŋes ŋikeeketiyak ŋulu ainakinit iŋes ŋisiliŋa ecamit aanyun etyae ŋolo kepotu ikes kipoidaut.
42019016	Bu ŋolo ke ekiŋaren tolimok iŋes tema, ‘Ekapolon, aryamu ayoŋ alosiliŋ kon ŋice ŋitomon.’
42019017	Tolimok ekapolon iŋes tema, ‘Ejok nooi, irae iyoŋ eketiyan ŋolo ikikinyomitae! Ikwaŋina ikikinyomitere iyoŋ anibore a ŋini cici, ipolokini iyoŋ ŋitaunio ŋitomon.’
42019018	Tosodi bu ŋolo a ŋiarei tema, ‘Ekapolon, aryamu ayoŋ alosiliŋa kon ŋice ŋikan.’
42019019	Tolimok ekapolon ŋolo daŋ tema, ‘Ipolokini iyoŋ ŋitaunio ŋikan.’
42019020	“Bu eketiyan ŋoloce tema, ‘Ekapolon, ekonisiliŋ lo; ewuait ayoŋ alidakinit narac.
42019021	Akakerit ayoŋ iyoŋ, anerae irae iyoŋ ekile ŋolo atyonon. Ilemanari iyoŋ ŋini nyerae ikon, nabo ilemi iyoŋ ŋini pa itakinit.’
42019022	Tolimok ekapolon eketiyan ŋol tema, ‘Irae iyoŋ eketiyan ŋolo aronon! Akatubokini ayoŋ iyoŋ a ŋakiro a ŋuna ilimu iyoŋ elope! Iyeni iyoŋ atemar arae ayoŋ ekile ŋolo atyonon ŋolo alemanari ibore ŋini nyerae ikaŋ, nabo alemi ŋini nyitakina ayoŋ.
42019023	Nyo bo ani kikote neni, pa iwuakinia iyoŋ esiliŋ kaŋ nabeŋki, ikotere ani aboŋuni ayoŋ, orukau kiyatakin?’
42019024	“Tolimok ekapolon ŋituŋa ŋulu awuasi a nen tema, ‘Tolemasi esiliŋ aneni keŋ, inakis ŋolo a ŋisiliŋa a ŋulutomon.’
42019025	Tolimokis ikes ekapolon temasi, ‘Ekapolon, eyakasi sek iŋes ŋitomon!’
42019026	Toboŋok ekapolon ikes tema, ‘Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ŋinituŋanan eyakar ibore, iyatakinio. Nai ituŋanan ŋini emamukar ibore, edemaryo tari ŋinidio cici daŋ ŋini eyakar iŋes!
42019027	Nai ani ikwa ŋimoi kaŋ lu, ŋulu nyakacamito ayoŋ akipuka ikes, torikutu ikes ne toŋolae ete ayoŋ!’ ”
42019028	Ani kedau Yesu erwor ŋakiro ŋun, torubak elosi Yerusalem kiŋarenik ikes.
42019029	Ani eapikini iŋes ŋitaunio ŋulu a Betepage ka Betania, ŋulu aya diye emoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa, kiyakiya iŋes ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋiarei kiŋaren,
42019030	tolimok ikes tema, “Apesi lore ŋolo eyai kiŋaren kus; ani ilomarete, iryamunete eenitae isigirya ŋini emam ituŋanan adok, tolacut torikut nege.
42019031	Ani kikiŋit idiotuŋanan iyes atemar, ‘Kaanukiro ilacata iyes isigirya?’ Tolimokis iŋes atemar, ‘Ekapolon iitanit iŋes.’ ”
42019032	Toloto ikes toryamut ibore daadaŋ ikoni neni alimokinitor Yesu ikes.
42019033	Ani eriŋa ikes elacete isigirya, kiŋita ŋilopeyek ikes temasi, “Kaanukiro ilacata iyes isigirya?”
42019034	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ekapolon iitanit iŋes.”
42019035	Torikut nai ikes isigirya neni a Yesu, kidokokis ŋikecelowi kidiama, ido kiŋarakis Yesu adokar nisigirya.
42019036	Ani erotokini iŋes a isigirya, topetakis ŋituŋa ŋilowi kec lorot.
42019037	Ani eapuuni Yesu Yerusalem neni etiyaaror erot ŋolo eteni moru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa, tolomak asepic a ŋikasyomak alelyan ka akipuro Akuj iworoete nooi, ikotere ŋakiro ŋuna kepotu ikes toanyut. Temasi ikes,
42019038	“Erereŋ erwosit ŋolo ebunit alokiro ke Ekapolon! Toyai ekisil nakuj ka akipuro neni ka Akuj alokidiama nooi!”
42019039	Tolimokis Ŋiparisayon ŋice ŋulu aya nasepic a ŋituŋa Yesu temasi, “Eketataman, kiyayak ŋikonikiyakia kililiŋa!”
42019040	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ani kililiŋa ikes, ecelunete ŋamoru nu.”
42019041	Toapiya Yesu Yerusalem; ani iŋolikini, kikalou aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ke etaun a ŋol,
42019042	tema, “Okoe, kerae ca toyenete iyes nakuwar na ibore ŋini erae ikisilet! Nai tokona iwuaitae anakonyen kus!
42019043	Epote ŋirwa ŋulu ikirikauniata iyes ŋimoi kus itoroosi alowaetin a daadaŋ.
42019044	Ikinyasunete ikes iyes ka ŋidwe kus ŋulu eya tooma ŋakorya kus; emam amoru tari apei daŋ ŋina imyekinio ewuoi, anerae pa iyenete iyes apaki ŋina ebunio Akuj aiun iyes!”
42019045	Toloma Yesu Kai ka Akuj, kirita ŋimucurus.
42019046	Tolimok ikes tema, “Elimunitoe a Nakigireta ebe, ‘Enyarao Akai kaŋ Akai ŋinakilipet.’ Nai tokona ituruwosi iyes iŋes akai ŋina eŋopitotor ŋikokolak!”
42019047	Etatami Yesu ŋirwa daadaŋ alo Kai ka Akuj. Acamito ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ta ŋikatukok akiar Yesu;
42019048	nai toŋopik ikes epite ŋoloaret iŋes, anerae apupete ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋakiro a Yesu, emam ŋini acamit tari apeikirot ebucar.
42020001	Akoloŋit apei ŋina ayakar Yesu Kai ka Akuj itatami ŋituŋa Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, potu ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ta ŋikatukok neni keŋ,
42020002	kiŋita iŋes temasi, “Tolimokinae cenite iyoŋ isua neni ebunitor apedor ŋina itiyaa iyoŋ ŋakiro nu. Ŋae ikiinakinit iyoŋ apedor na?”
42020003	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ekeŋisi ayoŋ daŋ iyes apeikirot. Tolimokinae cenite iyes ayoŋ.
42020004	Ai abunitor apedor ŋina ebatisaa Yoana ŋituŋa, neni ka Akuj kori lotuŋa?”
42020005	Togeut ikes akiŋitanar make ebasi, “Okoe ikitemari mono ai? Ani kikitema iwon, ‘Abunit aneni ka Akuj,’ etemari iŋes, ‘Ani nyo bo pa inupyata iyes ŋakiro a Yoana?’
42020006	Nabo kikitema iwon, ‘Abunit alotuŋa,’ ikicaki iwon asepic a ŋituŋa a ŋamoru, anerae enupito ikes nooi atemar arae Yoana ekadwaran.”
42020007	Tosodi toboŋokis temasi, “Nyikiyeni isua neni abunitor.”
42020008	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyakalimokini ayoŋ daŋ iyes neni ebunitor apedor ŋina etiyaa ayoŋ ŋakiro nu.”
42020009	Tolimok Yesu ŋituŋa akitadapet na, “Abu ekile kita emanikor ŋolo a ŋikito a ŋulu ecuyo epiini, ido kicikak ŋituŋa ŋulu etiyaete lomanikor, tolot nai iŋes akiboi lobuku ece.
42020010	Ani edoli ŋirwa ŋulu elemere, kiyakiya iŋes epito keŋ loketiyak akijaun ŋadiraito; nai apotu ŋiketiyak kikamut epito ŋol, kibuŋata, kitoboŋosi iŋes emam idiobore etiŋit.
42020011	Kiyakiya nabo iŋes epito keŋ ece, kibuŋata ŋolo daŋ, tobolyatar, kitoboŋosi a ŋakan.
42020012	Kiyakiya nabo iŋes epito keŋ ŋolo a ŋiuni; kitereŋut ŋiketiyak ke emanikor ŋolo daŋ, kiritasi alomanikor.
42020013	Tosodi elope ŋolo ke emanikor tolimu tema, ‘Ekokini ayoŋ ai? Eyakiyari ayoŋ lokoku kaŋ ŋolo minat, acepaki ekerete ikes iŋes!’
42020014	Nai ani eanyuwarete ŋiketiyak ŋulu ke emanikor iŋes, kirworikinos make temasi, ‘Lokoku keŋ lo! Potu oara eruma iwon emanikor ŋolo ke epiini!’
42020015	Yaasi ikes iŋes kiŋa emanikor, toarakis inaa.” Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Anukiro nai itiyakini elope ŋolo ke emanikor loketiyak ŋul?
42020016	Ŋina ebunio iŋes eari ŋiketiyak ŋulu ke emanikor, tosodi inak emanikor loketiyak ŋice.” Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋun temasi, “Nyikiryama ca ka ŋun!”
42020017	Kiŋolik Yesu ikes tolimok tema, “Nyo nai apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta ikona? ‘Amoru ŋina koloŋ aŋerete ŋikadukok, iŋes tokona itogogoŋit akai alokoona!’
42020018	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eramakin namoru ŋin, enyilinyilaar; ani ecakakin amoru ŋin ice kidiama, inyaadiyari iŋes toruwor apuwa.”
42020019	Acamito ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok akikamun Yesu apaki ŋin, anerae ayenete atemar arae ikes alimunitor Yesu akitadapet ŋin. Nai tokera akikamun iŋes aŋuna a ŋituŋa.
42020020	Kiwara ikes erot ŋolo kikamunet iŋes, ikotere torikosi iŋes lokapolok ŋulu a Ŋiromanin. Kiluŋuluŋa ikes ŋibekae, inakis ŋisiliŋa kiyakiyasi nai alokun Yesu alorwor keŋ. Toloto ŋibekae neni a Yesu esubito ŋituŋa ŋulu ajokak.
42020021	Tolimokis ŋibekae ŋul Yesu temasi, “Eketataman, ikiyeni isua atemar iyookino ŋakiro ŋuna irworo iyoŋ ka ŋuna itatami daŋ. Nyimisit iyoŋ kepol ituŋanan kori kemam, nai itatami iyoŋ ŋuna a kire ŋuna ka Akuj alopite a ŋolo iyookino.
42020022	Tolimokinae isua, ikicamakinito mono Ŋikisila obukosi ocur neni ke ekepukan a Roma kori mam?”
42020023	Ikwaŋina ayenia Yesu atemar alokunito ikes iŋes a ŋakiro a ŋun, tolimok ikes tema,
42020024	“Kitoodikinae cenite esiliŋ.” Tosodi Yesu kiŋit ikes tema, “Ŋolo a ŋae ereet lo ka ŋakigireta nu?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ŋulu ke ekepukan a Roma.”
42020025	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Inakisi ekepukan a Roma ŋini erae ikeŋ, inakis Akuj ŋini erae ŋini ka Akuj.”
42020026	Toŋopikis ikes ŋakiro ŋuna lokunet iŋes a nen alokiŋaren ŋituŋa. Toumokis ikes nooi a ŋakiro a ŋuna aboŋokini Yesu, kililiŋa cek.
42020027	Potu neni a Yesu Ŋisadukayon ŋice ŋulu apegasi atemar eyarunete ŋikatwak, kiŋita ikes Yesu temasi,
42020028	“Eketataman, egirit koloŋ Moses aŋuna kosi ebala, Ani ketwana lokaato keŋ ke ekile, toesik aberu keŋ emam ŋidwe, itemokino lokaato keŋ kirum aberu, touru ŋidwe aŋuna alokaato keŋ a ŋolo atwan.
42020029	Aya ŋikaitotoi ŋikanikaarei; kiita ŋolo apolon totwan, nyeryamuna ŋidwe.
42020030	Kirum ŋolo a ŋiarei aberu;
42020031	ka ŋolo a ŋiuni ka ŋuluce daadaŋ kiruma aberu, nai totwaka ikes daadaŋ, nyeryamuna ŋidwe.
42020032	Ekaku abu aberu daŋ totwan.
42020033	Ani akoloŋit ŋina eyaruniata ŋituŋa daadaŋ, eruwor aberu ŋin ŋina a ŋae? Anerae arae iŋes aberu a ŋulukanikaarei a daadaŋ.”
42020034	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a na iitanarete ka iitanaryo,
42020035	nai ŋulu eryamun iyookino ikotere ŋirwa ŋulu eponito ka ayarun ŋina a ŋikatwak, nyiitanarete kori nyiitanaryo.
42020036	Nyetwakete ikes nabo, anerae ikwaanikin ikes ka ŋimalaikan; eraakasi ikes ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj ka ŋulu ka ayarun alokatwak.
42020037	Tokona ŋuna ka ayarun alokatwak itoodiunit Moses daŋ anakigireta a ŋuna ka amoni a ŋina anoki atemar eyarunete ŋikatwak, anerae enyarit iŋes Ekapolon ebe, ‘Akuj ŋina ka Aburaam, Akuj ŋina a Isaka ka ŋina a Yakobo.’
42020038	Erae iŋes Akuj ŋina a ŋulu eyarete, meere Akuj ŋina a ŋulu etwakito; anerae aneni keŋ eyarete daadaŋ.”
42020039	Kirworikis ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋice temasi, “Eketataman, irwor iyoŋ ejok!”
42020040	Anerae apotu Ŋisadukayon tokera akiŋit iŋes ŋakiŋiseta ŋace.
42020041	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Nyo ebaakatar ŋituŋa erae Kristo lokoku a Daudi?
42020042	Anerae ebala Daudi elope alokitaabo a ŋolo a ŋieosyo ebe, ‘Atema Ekapolon neni ke Ekapolon kaŋ, kiboikin iyoŋ teten kaŋ,
42020043	akitodol neni ewuakinia ŋikonimoi kwap ŋakejen kon.’
42020044	Ani kenyarit Daudi iŋes ‘Ekapolon;’ ikokini nai iŋes eruwor lokoku keŋ ai?”
42020045	Ani epupokini asepic ŋina a ŋituŋa Yesu, tolimok iŋes ŋikasyomak keŋ tema,
42020046	“Tocoikinito ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila; eminasi ikes akirimit enapito ŋikaasoi ŋulu aoyak, nabo ecamito kimalae ikwa ŋikapolok alomaket. Eseete ikes ŋikicoloŋo ŋulu ebusak alosinagogae ka anasuban.
42020047	Edemete ikes ŋapuseru ŋiboro kec ka daŋ ilipete ekaoyan iwogasi neni erae koŋin! Eryamunete ikes atubokino ŋina aronon nooi!”
42021001	Toŋoleŋolek Yesu toanyuwa ŋikabarak iwuanakinete ŋisiliŋa nasaduku ŋina ayai tooma Kai ka Akuj.
42021002	Toanyuwa iŋes tari apuserut ŋina a ŋican ecakakini ŋikapun ŋiarei.
42021003	Tolimu Yesu tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ewuak apuserut ŋina a ŋican na ŋisiliŋa ŋulu alalak nasaduku, akilo ŋituŋa ŋuluce daadaŋ;
42021004	anerae ecakanakinete ŋuluce daadaŋ ŋisiliŋa ŋulu erae ŋipiya alobari kec. Nai acakaki apuserut ŋin anakulyako keŋ ŋulu daadaŋ ayakar ka edaritor akeekiyar.”
42021005	Ani irworosi ŋikasyomak ŋice ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akai ka Akuj, akibuses ŋina a ŋamoru keŋ ka epite ŋolo esibusitere, tolimu Yesu tema,
42021006	“Nu daadaŋ ŋuna iteete iyes edoli akoloŋit ŋina nyidoŋio tari apeimoru ewuoi a nege; eukoryo ŋamoru daadaŋ.”
42021007	Kiŋita ikes iŋes temasi, “Eketataman, ori mono itiyakinotor ŋakiro ŋun? Nyo eruwor akitoodikinet ŋina itoodiuni atemar adol apaki?”
42021008	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Tocoito nyikimodik ituŋanan. Epote ŋikalalak irworosi alokiro kaŋ ebasi, ‘Ayoŋ iŋes ŋolo!’ kori ebasi, ‘Adol apaki!’ Nai tocoito iwuapakinete ikes.
42021009	Kiuryasi nyikibul iirarete ŋakiro ŋuna ke ejiye ka ŋuna ke egurigur; itemokino ŋakiro ŋun totakanut mono, nai nyitoodiunito ikes atemar adol asalunet.”
42021010	Kirworik nabo Yesu tema, “Ejikinosi ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap ka apei ka ŋulu ka akwap ka ace; ejikin apukan ka apukan, epeibuku ka ŋulu ke ecebuku.
42021011	Eyakaun amaran ŋina ka akwap alowaetin a ŋulu egelegelya, nabo eyakaun eron ka ŋidekesyo daadaŋ ŋulu aronok; etakanunete ŋakitoodikineta ŋuna atyonok alokidiama, kitubulo ŋituŋa.
42021012	Nai eriŋa ŋun daadaŋ nyitiyakina, ikikamunio iyes ikisicani nooi, ikiyaaryo iyes losinagogae ka mabus, ido itorikor akitowuo alokiŋaren ŋikarikok ka ŋikapolok aŋuna kaŋ.
42021013	Apaki ŋin, iŋes iruworotor iyes ŋisuudae kaŋ.
42021014	Kiuryasi nyikibul iyes ikotere ŋunalimuno kori epite ŋolo limunet,
42021015	anerae ayoŋ elope akainakini iyes ŋakiro ŋuna ka aosou ŋuna emam ipei daŋ alokidiŋ ŋikusimoe ŋini epedori akiloc, kori apegakin.
42021016	Ikilukinete iyes ŋikusikauruunak, atalokaato kus, ŋiyeneta kus ka ŋikusikonei ka epedorete tari akiar iyes ŋice.
42021017	Ikiremokinosi ŋituŋa daadaŋ iyes aŋuna ke ekiro kaŋ.
42021018	Nai emam tari etimat epei anakyes kus ŋolo ecakar.
42021019	Ani kidaŋidaŋakis iyes ŋun, iunete akusikiyar.
42021020	“Ani iŋolikinete iyes Yerusalem irikaunito ŋajorei a ŋimoi, toyenete atemar aapiki akinyasun iŋes.
42021021	Itemokino ŋulu eyakasi Yudaya, toema lomoru; nabo ŋulu eyakasi Yerusalem, itemokino torotokis ka ŋulu eyakasi nariet, itemokino nyelot lotaun.
42021022	Anerae erae ŋul ŋirwa ŋulu ka anyaŋan, kiyookinotor ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta daadaŋ.
42021023	Erokyarosi nooi ŋirwa ŋulu anaberu a ŋuna epotiyete ka ŋuna itanakete! Anerae eyakaun ŋican ŋulu apolok nakwap na, nabo emini anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj lotuŋa ŋul!
42021024	Earyo ikes ŋice ka atum, ŋice eruworosi ŋirikon nakwapin ŋunace; ipudaete ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan Yerusalem, akitodol ŋirwa ŋulu esalunia apukan a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
42021025	“Eyakaun ŋakitoodikineta nakoloŋ, lolap ka lokacer. Egeuni akwap daadaŋ aryeba ka amaran aŋuna ke eruye ka akimorokok ŋina ka anam.
42021026	Emaranikinete ŋituŋa kirakanaros ebulit aŋuna a ŋican a ŋulu epote nakwapin daadaŋ; anerae emaranikinete tari ŋiboorei daadaŋ ŋulu alokidiama.
42021027	Tosodi etakanuni Lokoku a Ituŋanan, iŋolikinio ebunit alodowuon ka apedor ka akica ŋina apolon.
42021028	Ani edoli ŋirwa ŋulu iyookinotor ŋun daadaŋ, towua kireosi ŋakyes kus kidiama, anerae aapuu aiuno kus.”
42021029	Abu Yesu tolimok ikes akitadapet na tema, “Totamakisi mono iyes epite ŋolo ke ebobore ka ŋikito ŋuluce daadaŋ.
42021030	Ani iŋolikinete iyes ŋakwii kec itilijaunete, toanyut atemar aapuu akamu.
42021031	Ikwaŋinapei, ani iŋolikinete iyes ŋun itiyakin, toanyutu atemar aapuu Apukan ka Akuj adolun.
42021032	“Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, nyedaun anyamet na eriŋa nyitiyakina ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ.
42021033	Edaunosi nakuj ka akwap, nai nyedaunosi ŋakiro kaŋ jik.
42021034	“Tokienyete! Kiuryasi adakanu, amera ka apodo ŋuna ka akiyar a na, nyikitumosi iyes, todolu akoloŋit ŋin atipei pa iyenete iyes,
42021035	ikwa aloc. Itiyakin ŋakiro ŋun lotuŋa ŋulu a ŋakwapin a daadaŋ.
42021036	Torubakisi ikienyete, nabo kilipete jwi jwi, ikotere toryamut agogoŋu ŋina ibucarotor anakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna etakanunete ka towueta alokiŋaren Lokoku a Ituŋanan.”
42021037	Ŋirwa ŋul, etatami Yesu alo Kai ka Akuj jwi jwi, ani ewari tolot lomoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa.
42021038	Esyokanakinete ŋituŋa daadaŋ Kai ka Akuj akipup ŋakiro keŋ.
42022001	Toapuut ŋasuban a ŋamugati a ŋuna emam ŋakinyalet, ŋasuban ŋuna enyaritae Paska.
42022002	Ewarito ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila atukun epite ŋoloaret Yesu, nai akuryanito ikes aŋuna a ŋituŋa.
42022003	Toloma Satan lotau a Yuda a ŋolo anyaritae Isikariot, ŋolo arae epei a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei.
42022004	Tolot Yuda akirworiun ka ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikapolok ŋulu a ŋiketeok Akai ka Akuj epite ŋolo kipotokinet Yesu neni kec.
42022005	Tolakaros ikes, tocamut ainakin iŋes ŋisiliŋa.
42022006	Tocamu nai Yuda ŋisiliŋa, kisyak akiwarit apaki ŋina etemokino torikorere ikes neni a Yesu pa eyenete ŋituŋa.
42022007	Todol akoloŋit ŋina a ŋamugati a ŋuna emam ŋakinyalet, akoloŋit ŋina a Paska ŋina eŋolere imesek.
42022008	Kiyakiya Yesu Petero ka Yoana tema, “Toloto kitemokis akimuj ŋina a Paska emuja.”
42022009	Kiŋita ikes Yesu temasi, “Ai icamitor iyoŋ isua etemokinioto?”
42022010	Toboŋok iŋes ikes tema, “Topupokisi! Ani ilomarete iyes lotaun, iryamete ka ekile eryoŋit amot ŋina a ŋakipi. Kiwuapakisi iŋes tari kai ŋina elomari,
42022011	ido tolimokis elope ŋolo ka akai temasi, ‘Ebala Eketataman, ai eyai agule ŋina itemokino ayoŋ ka ŋikaakasyomak emujata akimuj ŋina a Paska?’
42022012	Ikitoodikini iŋes iyes agule ŋina eyai kidiama ŋina aloloman ŋina esubakinitae, kitemokis ibore daadaŋ a nen.”
42022013	Toloto ikes toryamut ibore daadaŋ ikoni neni alimokinitor Yesu ikes; tosodo kitemokis akimuj ŋina a Paska.
42022014	Ani edoli apaki, kiboikinos Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ kimuja.
42022015	Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Ekemuit ayoŋ nooi akimor ka iyes akimuj ŋina a Paska naga, eriŋa ŋican kaŋ nyedoluno!
42022016	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, emam nabo jik nyemuji akimuj na akitodol akoloŋit ŋina iyookinor apolou keŋ a Napukan ka Akuj.”
42022017	Tolemu nai Yesu ekopo, tolakar neni ka Akuj, ido tolimu tema, “Kijaasi lo, tomora,
42022018	anerae akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ameun tokona emam nabo nyamasi epiini akitodol Akoloŋit ŋina ebunio Apukan ka Akuj.”
42022019	Tosodi tolemu amugati, tolakar neni ka Akuj, tonyilinyili, inak ikes tema, [“Erae naga akaakuwan ŋina ejalyo ikotere iyes. Kitiyaete ikona ikiitunitotor ayoŋ.”
42022020	Ikwaŋinapei kedaun akimuj, abu iŋes tolemu ekopo, inak ikes tema, “Erae logo ekopo ŋolo a ŋaokot kaŋ aŋuna ka Acamunet a ŋina kitete ŋuna ebukoritae ikotere iyes.]
42022021	“Nai kiŋolikisi, ikirukit ayoŋ a ne alomesa ka ŋolo akalukini ayoŋ!
42022022	Kire etwani Lokoku a Ituŋanan ikwaŋina adwaritere; nai ekaŋ ekile ŋolo erikokini iŋes ŋituŋa!”
42022023	Togeut ikes akiŋitanar make atemar ŋae alokidiŋ kec itiyakini ŋakiro ŋun.
42022024	Topegakinos ŋikasyomak a Yesu irworosi make ebasi, ŋae alokidiŋ kec epol akilo ŋuluce.
42022025	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Epolokinito ŋirwosi ŋulu a ŋibukui a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋituŋa kec; nabo ŋulu ipukato enyaritae ‘Ŋikeŋaranakinak ŋituŋa.’
42022026	Nai nyitemokino ŋakiro ikote neni aneni kus; itemokino ŋini epol aneni kus kikwaanikin ka ŋini edit ka ekarikon kikwaanikin ka eketiyan.
42022027	Nyaani ŋini epol, ŋini iboi alomesa kori ŋini ekori akimuj? Meere mono ŋini iboi alomesa a? Nai ayai ayoŋ kidiŋ kus arae ekejanakinan.
42022028	“Irae iyes ŋulu ikiruk ka ayoŋ anakikatakineta kaŋ a daadaŋ.
42022029	Ikwaŋina eketuruworya Papa kaŋ ayoŋ Ekapolon, eketuruwori ayoŋ iyes daŋ ŋikapolok,
42022030	ikotere kimuja ka tomata daŋ a Napukan kaŋ. Kiboikinotor lokicoloŋo, totubonokis ŋatekerin ŋunatomon ka ŋaarei ŋuna a Isirael.
42022031	“Simoni, Simoni! Topupok mono iyoŋ! Aryamu Satan apedor ŋina kikeikeet iyes daadaŋ, ikwaŋina ikeikeya eketan ŋimomwa.
42022032	Nai ekelipak ayoŋ iyoŋ Simoni, ikotere nyepuripuryaar anupit kon. Ani iboŋuni iyoŋ nabo neni kaŋ, itemokino iyoŋ kitogogoŋ ŋikonikaitotoi.”
42022033	Toboŋok Petero iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, atenit ayoŋ arukor ka iyoŋ mabus ka natwanare!”
42022034	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Petero, akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, eriŋa ekokoroit nyeruuno nakoloŋit na, ipegi iyoŋ ŋapeget ŋauni atemar ikiyeni ayoŋ.”
42022035	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋina ekeyakiaritor ayoŋ iyes emam ecwee ŋolo a ŋisiliŋa, ekikapu kori ŋamuk, ayai ibore ŋini ipotu iyes kicanakinosi a?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Amam ibore ikicana.”
42022036	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nai tokona ŋini daadaŋ eyakar ŋisiliŋa kori ekikapu, itemokino kiric; ani ŋini emamukar atum, itemokino togyela elou, tosodi togyelu atum.
42022037	Anerae akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, itemokino kiyookin aneni kaŋ Ŋakigireta ŋuna igiritae ikona: ‘Emaritae iŋes ka ŋikasecak kaapei.’ ”
42022038	Tolimokis ŋikasyomak iŋes temasi, “Ekapolon! Kiŋolik! Eya ŋatumio ŋaarei ne!” Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Etemokin!”
42022039	Tonyou Yesu alotaun, tolot moru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa, ikwaŋinapei sek aloseneneo iŋes, kiwuapakis ŋikeekasyomak iŋes.
42022040	Ani edoli iŋes nen, tolimok ikes tema, “Kilipa, ikotere nyilomasi nakitemyet.”
42022041	Torotok iŋes aneni kec tari neni ebai neni edoe amoru imasaryo, ido toryedik kilip.
42022042	Tema, “Papa, ani kicamit iyoŋ, tolema ekopo lo ŋolo a ŋican aneni kaŋ! Nai meere aŋuna ka acamit kaŋ, nai kitiyakin acamit kon.” [
42022043	Bu emalaika anakuj, kitogogoŋ iŋes.
42022044	Kilip iŋes imukekinit toryeba nooi alotau, kikokis ŋakinyinyir keŋ edoete kwap ŋaokot.]
42022045	Ani enyouni Yesu aneni elipya, toboŋo torukau ŋikeekasyomak kejotoorosi, kiinaasi ŋakiro ŋuna anomorito ŋikecetai.
42022046	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Nyo ijotooto iyes? Tonyoutu, kilipa, ikotere nyilomasi nakitemyet.”
42022047	Ani eriŋa Yesu irworo, todolu asepic ŋina a ŋituŋa, ŋina arikit Yuda ŋolo arae epei alokidiŋ ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei. Kikomaiya Yuda neni a Yesu, tonu iŋes.
42022048	Tolimu Yesu tema, “Yuda, iluki iyoŋ Lokoku a Ituŋanan ka akinu a?”
42022049	Ani iŋolikinete ŋikasyomak ŋuna alosete akitiyakin, kiŋita ikes Yesu temasi, “Ekapolon, icamit iyoŋ isua etelo ikes a ŋatumio a?”
42022050	Kitel epei alokidiŋ kec epito ŋolo ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi nakit ŋina aloteten, totubo.
42022051	Nai tolimu Yesu tema, “Etemokin!” Totap iŋes akit ŋina ke epito, kitaŋaleu.
42022052	Tolimok Yesu ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikapolok ŋulu a ŋisigarya a ŋulu eteok Akai ka Akuj, ta ŋikatukok ŋulu aponito akikamun iŋes tema, “Nyo iponitotor iyes itiŋito ŋatumio ka ŋabiroi esibit arae ayoŋ ekokolan?
42022053	Ikirukit iyes ka ayoŋ ŋirwa daadaŋ alo Kai ka Akuj, ipotu iyes nyikikamut ayoŋ. Nai tokona erae esaa lo ŋolo kus, ŋolo ka apedor a ŋina ka akiryonut.”
42022054	Kikamut ikes Yesu, torikosi kai ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi, kiwuapite Petero ikes aneni alwanan.
42022055	Enokakinitae akim kidiŋ alapatu, tosodi tolot Petero min neni a ŋulu eboiyete a nen irikaunito akim.
42022056	Ani iŋolikini aketiyan apei Petero iboi alodiye akim, kitek iŋes, tolimu tema, “Arukito ekile lo daŋ ka iŋes!”
42022057	Nai topeg Petero ŋun, tema, “Iyoŋ aberu na, nyayeni ayoŋ iŋes!”
42022058	Kelunyar apaki ŋina auruwuana, toyen ekile ece Petero tolimu tema, “Irae iyoŋ jik epei alokidiŋ kec!” Nai toboŋok Petero iŋes tema, “Ekile, meere ayoŋ!”
42022059	Kelunyar epeisaa, kitogogoŋ nooi ituŋanan ice tema, “Arukito jik ekile lo ka Yesu, anerae erae iŋes daŋ ŋolo alo Galileya!”
42022060	Tosodi Petero tema, “Nyayeni ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna irworo iyoŋ!” Atipei eriŋa iŋes irworo, toru ekokoroit.
42022061	Toboboŋ Ekapolon Yesu kitek Petero. Totamu Petero ŋakiro ŋuna alimokinit Yesu iŋes atemar, “Eriŋa ekokoroit nyeruuno nakoloŋit na, ipegi iyoŋ ŋapeget ŋauni atemar ikiyeni ayoŋ.”
42022062	Toloma Petero kiŋa, kigwor nooi.
42022063	Tokyenatar ŋikilyok ŋulu eyokiyete iŋes ka kibuŋata daŋ.
42022064	Torapa daŋ ereet keŋ, kiŋita iŋes temasi, “Todwar! Ŋae ŋini ikirami iyoŋ? ”
42022065	Tolimokis iŋes ŋakiro ŋuna alalak ŋuna a ŋiyany.
42022066	Ani iwalari akwap, totukokin ŋikatukok ka ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ta ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila, torikoroe nai Yesu Natukot kec.
42022067	Kiŋita ikes Yesu temasi, “Tolimokinae mono iyoŋ isua, iyoŋ iŋes irae Kristo a?” Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Tari kakalimok ayoŋ iyes, nyinupete ŋakiro kaŋ;
42022068	ani tari kekeŋit ayoŋ iyes akirot, emam nyiboŋokinete.
42022069	Nai ameun tokona, iboikin Lokoku a Ituŋanan teten Akuj ŋina alokidiama nooi!”
42022070	Kiŋita ikes daadaŋ temasi, “Irae nai iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj a?” Toboŋok iŋes ikes tema, “Ilimut iyes atemar arae ayoŋ.”
42022071	Tolimut ikes temasi, “Okoe, nyo nabo ikiitanitor ŋisuudae ŋice? Ikiira iwon ŋilopeyek ŋakiro ŋuna alimu iŋes!”
42023001	Tonyout ŋituŋa daadaŋ a Natukot, torikosi Yesu neni a Pilato.
42023002	Togeut ikes akisitakin iŋes a nen ebasi, “Ikiryamuni isua ekile lo icocoi ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap kosi ka ikiteŋerit isua akibuk ocur neni ke ekepukan a Roma, ebala nabo arae iŋes Kristo – erwosit.”
42023003	Kiŋit Pilato Yesu tema, “Irae iyoŋ erwosit a Ŋiyudayan a?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes, “Ilimu iyoŋ.”
42023004	Tolimok Pilato ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka asepic ŋina a ŋituŋa tema, “Emam ibore ŋini aronon ŋini itiyat ekile lo, ŋini itemokino isitakinere.”
42023005	Nai kibunyakinos ikes jik temasi, “Itutuki iŋes ŋituŋa a ŋakiro a ŋuna itatami, a ŋuna isiryamit iŋes Yudaya daadaŋ. Esyakini paaran alo Galileya, nai adolu tari ne daŋ.”
42023006	Ani iirari Pilato ŋakiro ŋun, kiŋit ikes tema, “Erae ekile lo Egalilayat a?”
42023007	Ani eanyuni iŋes atemar abunit Yesu anakwap a ŋina epukat erwosit Erode, kiyakiya iŋes Yesu neni ke Erode. Ŋirwa ŋul, ayai Erode Yerusalem.
42023008	Tolakar Erode nooi eanyuwari Yesu, anerae apupi sek iŋes ŋakiro a Yesu, nabo ŋarwa ŋuna alalak emuit iŋes aanyun Yesu. Acamit iŋes akiŋolikin Yesu itiyae ŋakujuwuanisya ŋadi.
42023009	Kiŋitiŋit Erode Yesu ŋakiro ŋuna alalak, nai kililiŋ Yesu cek.
42023010	Ayakasi nen ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila, kisitakis iŋes enyunyurasi nooi.
42023011	Apotu Erode ka ŋisigarya keŋ kitiyata ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋileec neni a Yesu ka tobolyatar iŋes. Ani kedaut, kitanapa iŋes elou ikwa erwosit, kinyakasi nai iŋes neni a Pilato.
42023012	Ameun apaki ŋin, tomaikin Erode ka Pilato, anerae adiŋasi sek ikes ekiŋaren.
42023013	Tocunak Pilato ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikepukak ŋulu a ŋituŋa iwapei,
42023014	tolimok ikes tema, “Ipotu iyes torikut ekile lo neni kaŋ ibasi itutuki ŋituŋa. Eŋitiŋit tokona ayoŋ iŋes alokiŋaren kus, nai emam ŋakiro aryamu ayoŋ alokile a lo, ŋuna itemokino etubokinere iŋes.
42023015	Emam tari Erode daŋ ibore ŋini aronon ŋini aripu aneni keŋ; iŋes enyakunia iŋes neni yok. Emam ibore ŋini aronon etiya iŋes, ŋini itemokino earere.
42023016	Aŋun, atemari ayoŋ kibuŋata iŋes, kimyekinae tolot.” [
42023017	Ŋirwa daadaŋ ŋulu a Paska alacanakini Pilato emabus epei.]
42023018	Tocelu asepic a ŋituŋa daadaŋ tema, “Toara ekile lo! Ikicamit isua Baraba tolacakinae!”
42023019	(Aenitae Baraba alomabus ikotere aruruma ŋina esyakini iŋes alotaun, nabo aarit tari ituŋanan.)
42023020	Aŋuna acamitor Pilato alacakin Yesu, kisirwor nabo iŋes asepic a ŋituŋa.
42023021	Nai tocelut ikes temasi, “Kibubuk! Kibubuk iŋes!”
42023022	Kiŋit Pilato ikes ŋina kiuniyet tema, “Nyo ibore aronon ŋini itiyat iŋes? Emam asecit ŋina aripu ayoŋ, ŋina itemokino iŋes earere! Aŋun, atemari ayoŋ kibuŋata iŋes, kimyekinae tolot.”
42023023	Nai torubakis ikes ecelasi nooi ebasi itemokino kibubukinoe iŋes lomusalaba, torebo acela kec neni daadaŋ.
42023024	Tosodi Pilato akitub ŋakiro atemar kitiyata ŋituŋa ikwaŋina acamitotor ikes.
42023025	Tolacak Pilato ekile ŋolo acamito ikes atemar tolacakinae, ekile ŋolo aenitae alomabus aŋuna ka aruruma ka akiar; ido kipotok iŋes Yesu lotuŋa ŋul, kitiyata ikwaŋina acamitotor.
42023026	Apaki ŋina arikoryata ikes Yesu, kitowua ekile ŋolo anyaritae Simoni ŋolo arae ŋolo anakwap a Kurene, ŋolo abunit alorerya. Toryoŋakis emusalaba loseket keŋ, kisiwuapakis iŋes Yesu.
42023027	Kiwuapak asepic ŋina a ŋituŋa ŋina alalan Yesu. Aya daŋ nen ŋaberu ŋuna egworosi nooi aŋuna a Yesu.
42023028	Nai toboboŋ Yesu, kiŋolik ikes tolimok tema, “Ŋaberu ŋuna a Yerusalem! Nyigworosi aŋuna kaŋ, nai kigworos aŋuna kus ka aŋuna a ŋidwe kus.
42023029	Anerae epote ŋirwa ŋulu etemaryata ŋituŋa, ‘Erereŋ nooi ŋaberu ŋuna kolupanotin ka ŋuna nyidouno ta ŋuna nyitanaka!’
42023030	Ŋirwa ŋul, elimokinete ŋituŋa ŋimoru etemarete, ‘Totiyakinetei isua!’ Nabo elimokinete ŋimukura etemarete, ‘Kiwuae isua!’
42023031	Ani kitiyakis ikes ŋun eriŋa akitoe epalal, anu nai itiyakinete ŋina eonio iŋes?”
42023032	Torikoroe ŋikeworok ŋice ŋiarei yaarae akiar ka Yesu kaapei.
42023033	Ani edolete ikes neni anyaritae “Akuulu,” kibubukis Yesu lomusalaba ka ŋikeworok ŋuluarei, epei lowae ŋolo aloteten, epei kedyany.
42023034	Kirworik Yesu tema, “Papa kisyoni ikes, anerae nyeyenete ŋuna itiyaete.” Tokora ikes ŋikeelowi ka akilamilam ŋisigirya.
42023035	Awuasi ŋituŋa a nen iteete iŋes, tokyenatar ŋikapolok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan iŋes ebasi, “Aiununui ŋoon iŋes ŋuluce, kimyekisi cenite toiun bon, erae kerae iŋes Kristo ŋolo ka Akuj ŋoloseuna!”
42023036	Tokyenatar ŋasigarya daŋ iŋes, inakis epiini ŋolo enyalitae ka apid,
42023037	tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Ani kirae iyoŋ erwosit a Ŋiyudayan, toiun bon!”
42023038	Egiritae ŋakiro nu kidiama emusalaba ŋolo ebubukinitoe iŋes, “ERAE LO ERWOSIT A ŊIYUDAYAN.”
42023039	Tosodi ekeworon epei ŋolo ebubukinitoe ka iŋes, kiyany iŋes tema, “Meere iyoŋ irae Kristo a? Toiun bon, itoiu isua daŋ!”
42023040	Toboŋok nai ŋoloce iŋes tema, “Nyikerit iyoŋ Akuj a? Ikitubokinitae iwon ka iŋes kaapei.
42023041	Nai iwon ikitubokinitae kire aŋuna ikitiyat; nai emam ŋakiro ŋuna aronok ŋuna itiyat ekile lo.”
42023042	Ido tema iŋes, “Yesu, totamunitetei ayoŋ, ŋina iboŋunio iyoŋ irae Erwosit.”
42023043	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, napeikoloŋit na ikiruki iyoŋ ka ayoŋ anajakaanut a ŋina ka Akuj!”
42023044	Ani edoli ŋisaae ŋikanikapei ŋulu ka apaaran, kiryoniar akwap daadaŋ cuc akitodol ŋisaae ŋikanikaomwon esoŋakini akoloŋ.
42023045	Tocila anaŋga ŋina eneno alo Kai ka Akuj beret ageun alokidiama tari kwap.
42023046	Kiworou Yesu tema, “Papa! Ewuak ayoŋ ekaatau nakan kon!” Kedau alimun ŋun, kiridak.
42023047	Ani eanyuwari ekapolon ŋolo a ŋasigarya ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakin, kipur Akuj tema, “Kire, kemam ekile lo aronis.”
42023048	Ani eanyunete ŋituŋa daŋ ŋulu acunakina neni ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakin, toboŋosi lorerya kec eramete ŋitai.
42023049	Nai ŋulu daadaŋ anaikina sek ka Yesu, kaapei ka ŋaberu ŋuna ewuapunete iŋes alo Galileya, apotu towua aneni alwanan, kiteto ŋakiro daadaŋ.
42023050	Ayai nen ekile ŋolo anyaritae Yosepu, ŋolo abunit alotaun a ŋolo anyaritae Arimatea anakwap a Yudaya. Arae iŋes epei a Natukot a ŋina a Ŋiyudayan, ajok ka eyookino.
42023051	Abu iŋes towou acamun ŋakiro ŋuna acamit Atukot ŋina a Ŋiyudayan akitiyakin neni a Yesu ka edarit iŋes abunore ŋina ka Apukan ka Akuj.
42023052	Tolot iŋes neni a Pilato, kiŋitak akuwan a Yesu.
42023053	Tolemu iŋes akuwan a Yesu alomusalaba, kilogilogak elou ŋolo apolon, kiperik nalyal ŋina abokakinitae nataaba neni sek amam ituŋanan anukakinitae.
42023054	Arae akoloŋit ŋin ŋina a ŋakan, toapikinite akidol akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato.
42023055	Kiwuapakis ŋaberu ŋuna arukunete ka Yesu alo Galileya Yosepu tari nalyal, toanyuwasi epite ŋolo eperikinitere akuwan a Yesu.
42023056	Toboŋosi nai lorerya kec akitemokin akimyet ŋina akukunyon ŋina kiwosakina nakuwan keŋ. Kieŋut ikes akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, ikwa egiritere Lokisila a Moses.
42024001	Taparacu akoloŋit ŋina ke Esabit, todilokis ŋaberu nalyal ekodito akimyet ŋina akukunyon ŋina etemokinito ikes.
42024002	Toryamut ikes amoru kikokoriyor alokek ka alyal,
42024003	ido tolomasi tooma; nai nyeryamut akuwan ŋina ke Ekapolon Yesu.
42024004	Ani eriŋa ikes ewuasi a nen eŋayaŋayato a ŋakiro a ŋun, towua ŋinapeipaki ŋikilyok ŋiarei ŋulu anapito ŋilowi ŋulu amilimilete alodiye kec.
42024005	Tobul ŋaberu nooi kijuuroto; kiŋita ŋikilyok ŋul ikes temasi, “Kaanukiro iwaritotor iyes ituŋanan ŋini eyari lotuŋa ŋulu etwakito?
42024006	Emam iŋes a ne, anerae ayaru. Totamutu ŋina paaran ikilimonokinia iŋes iyes, ŋina ayakar iŋes Galileya ŋina abaakar,
42024007	‘Itemokino Lokoku a Ituŋanan kipotokinoe nakan a ŋikasecak, kibubukinoe lomusalaba, ido toyaru kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni!’ ”
42024008	Totamut nai ŋaberu ŋakiro ŋuna abala Yesu ŋun,
42024009	toboŋosi analyal, tolimokis ŋulutomon ka epei ka ŋituŋa ŋuluce daadaŋ ŋakiro ŋun.
42024010	Arae ŋaberu ŋun Maria Magadalena, Joanna ka Maria toto a Yakobo ta ŋakecerukitos; ikes alimokinete ŋikasyomak ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ.
42024011	Nai tobas ŋikasyomak erae ŋakiro ŋuna alimokinete ŋaberu ikes alyokonu, towout akinup.
42024012	(Nai tonyou Petero kipiiri nalyal. Todol iŋes nalyal tokukokin toripik, kiŋolik ŋilowi ŋulu sek aenitere akuwan a Yesu ebilakina make eya nalyal. Toboŋo iŋes lore eŋayaŋayat pa eyeni ŋuna kepotu kitiyakin.)
42024013	Akoloŋit ŋinapei ŋin, alosete ŋikewuapak a Yesu ŋiarei lore ŋolo anyaritae Emmaus, neni arae ŋakilomitae ŋatomon ka apei alo Yerusalem.
42024014	Eanete ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna apotu kitiyakin.
42024015	Apaki ŋina eaniata ikes, todita Yesu ikes elosete, torukosi kaapei.
42024016	Kiŋolikis ikes Yesu, nai kibiler nyeyan ikes iŋes.
42024017	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Anukiro ŋuna ianete iyes alorot nu?” Towua ikes esiliyorito.
42024018	Toboŋok epei kec ŋolo anyaritae Kileopa iŋes tema, “Iyoŋ bon irae epeyonon alo Yerusalem, ŋolo nyiyeni ŋakiro ŋuna etiyakin a nen ŋirwa lupei bien lu a?”
42024019	Tema Yesu iŋisi ikes, “Anukiro?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Ŋakiro ŋuna etiyakin neni a Yesu a ŋolo a Nasaret. Arae iŋes kire ekadwaran ŋolo ka Akuj, ŋolo etiyae ŋakujuwuanisya, nabo etatami ŋakiro ŋuna apolok alokiŋaren Akuj ka alokiŋaren ŋituŋa.
42024020	Apotu ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikarikok totubut atemar itemokino iŋes toarae; kibubukis iŋes lomusalaba.
42024021	Ikigeno sek isua atemar kori iŋes eiuni ŋituŋa ŋulu a Isirael! Nabo, erae tokona ŋirwa ŋiuni alunyarosi ŋinapei etiyakinotor ŋakiro ŋun.
42024022	Nai ikituumikis isua ŋaceberu ŋuna erae ŋarukitos kosi; kedilokinito ikes taparacu nalyal a Yesu,
42024023	nai nyeryamut akuwan keŋ. Toboŋut ikes ebasi ebe ikianyu atakanikinet ŋina a ŋimalaikan a ŋulu abasi ayaru iŋes.
42024024	Toloto ŋice aneni kosi nalyal, torukaut ikote nenipei abasi ŋaberu, nai nyiŋolikis iŋes.”
42024025	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Okoe egogoŋ iyes ŋakyes! Etyono ŋitai kus akinup atipei ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna a ŋikadwarak.
42024026	Nyiyenete iyes atemar etemokino Kristo toryamu ŋican, ikotere tolomarya napolou keŋ a?”
42024027	Kisyak nai iŋes akisileerekin ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta aŋuna keŋ, ameun alokitaaboi a ŋulu a Moses tari lokadwarak daadaŋ.
42024028	Ani eapiyarete ikes diye ere ŋolo alosete, tosub acamit Yesu akiporor;
42024029	nai kimaimaa ikes iŋes temasi, “Bua apena lore kosi, anerae awar ka eryoniu akwap.” Tolot iŋes toloma tooma, toruko ka ikes.
42024030	Ani iboikinosi Yesu ka ikes akimuj alomesa, tolemu iŋes amugati, kilipak ka tonyilinyili inak ikes.
42024031	Toŋaar ŋatameta kec, toyena iŋes, nai topuripuryaar iŋes anakonyen kec.
42024032	Kirworikinos ikes temasi, “Pa mono ariraete ŋitai yok ka alakara apaki ŋina erworor iŋes neni yok alorot ka ŋina ikisileerekinio iŋes iwon ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta a?”
42024033	Torotokis ikes atipei, toboŋosi Yerusalem. Torukaut ŋulutomon ka epei ka ŋuluce ecunakina iwapei,
42024034	tolimokis ikes temasi, “Erae kire ŋakiro ŋun! Ayaru Ekapolon atakanu daŋ neni a Simoni!”
42024035	Kitatamikis ŋikewuapak ŋuluarei ŋul ikes ŋakiro ŋuna atakanikinito ikes alorot ka epite ŋolo ayeniata ikes Ekapolon apaki ŋina anyilinyiliya iŋes amugati.
42024036	Ani eriŋa ikes itatamete ŋakiro nu, towo Yesu alokidiŋ kec tolimu tema, “Ekisil toyai neni kus.”
42024037	Tobul ikes nooi temasi kori ikiŋolik ekipye.
42024038	Nai tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Anukiro eryebete ŋitai kus? Nyo elalaa aŋayaŋayat alotai kus?
42024039	Kiŋolikisi ŋakaakan ka ŋakaakejen; erae ayoŋ. Totapae ayoŋ kiŋolikis; emamukar ekipye akuwan ka ŋakoyo ikwaŋina tokona iteoto iyes ayakar ayoŋ.”
42024040	Ani kelimu Yesu ŋun, kitoodik iŋes ikes ŋakan ka ŋakejen keŋ.
42024041	Nai eriŋa ikes jik nyenupa aŋuna ka alelyan ka aumokinit ŋina apolon nooi. Aŋun, kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Iyakatar iyes ibore idio ŋini nyamat a?”
42024042	Inakis ikes iŋes atubet ŋina ke ekolya a ŋolo apeitoi.
42024043	Kijau iŋes, tonyam alokiŋaren kec.
42024044	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Erae ŋakiro nu ŋuna paaran akalimokinit ayoŋ iyes eriŋa iwon ikirukit; ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna egiritae a ŋuna kaŋ Lokisila ŋulu a Moses ka nakigireta ŋuna a ŋikadwarak ta lokirukisyo a Daudi; itemokino daadaŋ kiyookin.”
42024045	Toŋaaros ŋatameta kec toyenut ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta.
42024046	Tolimok ikes tema, “Nugu ikes ŋuna igiritae atemar itemokino Kristo toryamu ŋican, ido toyaru kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni.
42024047	Itemokino kitatamae akiki ka akisyon ŋasecisya lobukui daadaŋ alokiro keŋ, akisyakin alo Yerusalem.
42024048	Irae iyes ŋisuudae a ŋakiro a nu.
42024049	Eyakuuni ayoŋ neni kus ŋolo ikiik Papa iyes. Nai itemokino iyes kidareut a ne alo Yerusalem, akitodol akoloŋit ŋina iryamuniata iyes apedor ŋina ebunit alokidiama.”
42024050	Tosodi toriko iŋes ikes Betania. Kikyaa iŋes ŋakeekan a nen, kiterereŋ ikes.
42024051	Ani eriŋa iŋes iterereŋi ikes, kikyaarae iŋes alokiŋaren kec, tolot nakuj.
42024052	Toryediko ikes, kilipa neni keŋ; ani irikakin, toboŋosi Yerusalem elakara nooi,
42024053	ido toloto akiboi alo Kai ka Akuj, ipurosi Akuj jwi jwi ka elelyanete.
43001001	Anakisyakinet, ayai Akirot; arukito Akirot ka Akuj, arae Akirot Akuj.
43001002	Ŋinapei anakisyakinet arukito iŋes ka Akuj.
43001003	Abu Akuj tosub ŋiboro daadaŋ aneni keŋ; kerae tomam iŋes, pa kesubunitae idiobore.
43001004	Ayai akiyar daadaŋ neni keŋ, arae akiyar ŋin akica aŋuna a ŋituŋa.
43001005	Ecai akica ŋin anakiryonut, nai nyilouna akiryonut akica.
43001006	Ayai ekile ŋolo eyakuunitae aneni ka Akuj, ŋolo anyaritae Yoana.
43001007	Abunit iŋes akiteyenun ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna ka akica, ikotere tonupyata daadaŋ aneni keŋ.
43001008	Pa arae Yoana akica, nai abunit iŋes akiteyenun ŋakiro ŋuna ka akica.
43001009	Akirot iŋes arae akica ŋina a kire, ŋina abuni nakwap acaikin ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
43001010	Ayai Akirot nakwap, tosub Akuj akwap aneni keŋ, nai nyeyenuna akwap iŋes.
43001011	Abu iŋes bu lore keŋ, nai apotu ŋituŋa keŋ nyijaut iŋes.
43001012	Nai ŋulu daadaŋ apotu kijaut iŋes, tonupa ekiro keŋ, abu iŋes inak ikes apedor ŋina ruworet ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj.
43001013	Pa aruworosi ikes ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj alopite a ŋolo sek euriyere ŋituŋa, anagogoŋu ka anacamit a ituŋanan, nai Akuj alope iŋes abu kituruwo ikes ŋidwe keŋ.
43001014	Bu Akirot toruwor ituŋanan, oruko ka isua. Aanyun isua apolou keŋ, apolou ŋina aryamuni iŋes aneni ka Akuj Papa ikwapei Lokoku keŋ ŋolo donupei ka eleleba neni keŋ ajokis ka ŋuna a kire.
43001015	Kiteyenu nai Yoana iŋes tocelu tema, “Iŋes lo ŋolo abala ayoŋ erworo ebe, ‘Ebunit alokaku kaŋ, nai epol iŋes akilo ayoŋ, anerae ayai iŋes eriŋa tari nyeuruuna ayoŋ.’ ”
43001016	Analalau a ŋina ka ajokis keŋ, ikiterereŋ iŋes iwon daadaŋ, ikitoropikinit iŋes iwon ŋarereŋisyo.
43001017	Abu Akuj ikiinak iwon Ŋikisila kisitoru neni a Moses, nai ajokis keŋ ka ŋuna a kire, isitorunit neni a Yesu Kristo.
43001018	Emam ituŋanan eanyunit Akuj; nai Lokoku ŋolo donupei ŋolo erae epei ka Papa, iŋes ikitaanyu iwon Akuj.
43001019	Erae na akiteyenunet a Yoana ŋina a kire apaki ŋina eyakiyaryata ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan ŋisacaradotin ka Ŋilepei neni keŋ akiŋit iŋes atemar, “Ŋae iyoŋ?”
43001020	Nyewou Yoana aboŋokin ikes ŋakiro. Kirwor pa iwuait, nai ileereete tema, “Meere ayoŋ Kristo.”
43001021	Kiŋita nai ikes iŋes temasi, “Ŋae nai iyoŋ? Eliya a?” Toboŋok Yoana ikes tema, “Meere.” Kiŋita nabo temasi, “Irae iyoŋ ekadwaran a?” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Meere.”
43001022	Kiŋita nai ikes iŋes temasi, “Ŋae iyoŋ? Itemokino isua oyaa aboŋokinet kon neni a ŋulu ikiyakuunito isua. Anu ikilimokini iyoŋ isua aŋuna kon?”
43001023	Toboŋok Yoana ikes aŋakiro a ŋuna koloŋ kirworit ekadwaran Isaya ebala, “Ayoŋ etoil a ituŋanan a ŋini ecela analoŋisat ebala, ‘Kisidiiryata erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon!’ ”
43001024	Kiŋita ŋulu eyakito Ŋiparisayon iŋes temasi,
43001025	“Kaanukiro nai ibatisaa iyoŋ ŋituŋa, erae pa kirae iyoŋ Kristo, Eliya kori ekadwaran?”
43001026	Toboŋok Yoana ikes tema, “Ebatisae ayoŋ a ŋakipi, nai alokidiŋ kus eyai ipeituŋanan ŋini eriŋa iyes nyeyenuna.
43001027	Iŋes ebuni alokaku kaŋ ka nyitemokino ayoŋ tari alacakin ŋarukanes ŋuna a ŋamuk keŋ.”
43001028	Etiyasi ŋun daadaŋ alotaun a Betania, alo Kide aŋolol Yorodan, neni ebatisaa Yoana ŋituŋa.
43001029	Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini ŋin, kiŋolik Yoana ebunit Yesu neni keŋ, ido tolimu tema, “Kiŋolikisi Imesek ŋini ka Akuj, ŋini elemari asecit ŋina ka akwap.
43001030	Iŋes lo ŋolo abala ayoŋ erworo ebe, ‘Ebunit alokaku kaŋ, nai epol iŋes akilo ayoŋ, anerae ayai iŋes eriŋa tari nyeuruuna ayoŋ.’
43001031	Pa ayeni ayoŋ apaki ŋin atemar arae iŋes ŋae; nai abu ayoŋ ebatisa a ŋakipi, ikotere itoodikinor iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu a Isirael.”
43001032	Kiteyenu Yoana ŋuna abu iŋes kiŋolik tema, “Abu ayoŋ eŋolik Etau ŋolo ka Akuj ebuni anakuj ikoni akuri, min neni keŋ.
43001033	Ariŋa jik ayoŋ pa ayeni iŋes, nai abu Akuj, ŋina ekeyakuunit ayoŋ akibatis a ŋakipi, okolimok tema, ‘Ituŋanan ŋini iŋolikini iyoŋ Etau ŋolo ka Akuj ebuni anakuj, min neni keŋ, iŋes ŋolo ebuni akibatis a Etau a ŋolo Asegan.’
43001034	Adau tokona ayoŋ akiŋolikin ka eketeyenik iyes atemar erae iŋes Lokoku ka Akuj.”
43001035	Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini ŋin, awuasi nabo Yoana ka ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋiarei anenipei.
43001036	Kiŋolik iŋes Yesu elosi, tolimok ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Kiŋolikisi Imesek ŋini ka Akuj.”
43001037	Ani iirarete ŋikasyomak ŋuluarei ŋakiro ŋun, kiwuapakis ikes Yesu.
43001038	Kiŋoliya Yesu kaku, kiŋolik ikes iwuapito iŋes, kiŋit tema, “Nyo iwarito iyes?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Rabbi (iŋes atemar Eketataman)! Ai eyai ekonire?”
43001039	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Potu, ido ianyunete.” Toloto nai ikes, toanyut neni eboiyo iŋes, toruko ka iŋes akoloŋit ŋin. Aapiyarit apaki ŋin ŋisaae ŋitomon ŋulu ka apaaran.
43001040	Epei a ŋuluarei a ŋulu aris kiirasi ŋakiro a Yoana ka kiwuapakis Yesu, arae Anderia lokaato a Simoni Petero.
43001041	Abu Anderia kisyau aryamun Simoni lokaato keŋ, tolimok tema, “Ikiryamu isua Messia” (iŋes atemar Kristo).
43001042	Yau iŋes Simoni neni a Yesu. Kitek Yesu Simoni, tolimok tema, “Ikwa irae iyoŋ Simoni, lokoku a Yoana a? Ikinyarao iyoŋ tokona Kepa” (iŋes atemar ataaba kori Petero a Ŋagirik).
43001043	Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini ŋin, totyaku Yesu alosit nakwap a Galileya. Kiryamun iŋes ka Pilipo, tolimok tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ.”
43001044	Arae Pilipo ka Anderia ta Petero ŋulu alo Betesaida.
43001045	Kiryamunos nai Pilipo ka Nasaniel, tolimok Pilipo iŋes tema, “Ikiryamu isua iŋes ŋolo egirit Moses ŋakiro keŋ Lokisila, ŋolo daŋ igirito ŋikadwarak ŋakiro keŋ. Erae iŋes Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret, lokoku a Yosepu.”
43001046	Tolimu Nasaniel tema, “Epedori mono idiobore ŋini ajokan alomun alo Nasaret a?” Tolimok nai Pilipo iŋes tema, “Bua, ido toanyu!”
43001047	Ani iŋolikini Yesu Nasaniel ebunit neni keŋ, tolimok ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Erae lo Esiraelit ŋolo a kire! Emam amodiyo aneni keŋ!”
43001048	Kiŋit Nasaniel Yesu tema, “Ikiyenuni iyoŋ ayoŋ ikwaani?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Eriŋa tari Pilipo nyenyarauna iyoŋ, aris ayoŋ kakaanyuwa iyoŋ alokwap ebobore.”
43001049	Toboŋok Nasaniel tema, “Eketataman, irae iyoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj ka irae Erwosit ŋolo a Isirael.”
43001050	Tema Yesu, “Inup iyoŋ tokona aŋuna alimunio ayoŋ atemar akaanyuwarit iyoŋ alokwap ebobore a? Ibuni iyoŋ aanyun ŋakiro ŋuna apolok nooi akilo ŋun.”
43001051	Kiyatak iŋes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, iŋolikinete iyes nakuj eŋaara ka ŋimalaikan elosete kidiama ka eponito kwap neni a Lokoku a Ituŋanan.”
43002001	Ani kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiarei, toyakaun ekiitanu lotaun ŋolo a Kana, nakwap a Galileya. Ayai toto a Yesu nasuban ŋun.
43002002	Anyaritae Yesu daŋ ka ŋikeekasyomak lokiitanu ŋol.
43002003	Ani keŋobasi ŋituŋa epiini, tolimok toto a Yesu iŋes tema, “Kedaun epiini kec!”
43002004	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Okoe akimat! Kaanukiro eraakar iwon ikimitakinit? Eriŋa apaki kaŋ nyedolo.”
43002005	Tolimok nai toto keŋ ŋiketiyak tema, “Kitiyata ŋuna daadaŋ ikilimokini iŋes iyes.”
43002006	Ayakasi nen ŋamoti ŋakanikapei ŋuna etiyaunitae anamoru, ŋuna esitiyaeneneete Ŋiyudayan ŋakipi kec akitesegununuya ŋawat kec, ikwaŋina ecikikakinitotor Ŋikisila; apedori apeimot aŋobar ŋilitae ŋulu eapikinito amiat.
43002007	Tolimok Yesu ŋiketiyak tema, “Kilelebikisi ŋakipi namoti nu.” Kileleba ikes ŋamoti.
43002008	Tolimok nai ikes tema, “Tookosi tokona ŋadi, inasi ekapolokiniton ŋasuban.” Tookosi ikes, inasi iŋes.
43002009	Ani iiri ekapolokiniton ŋasuban ŋakipi ŋuna aris keruwor epiini, nyeyenu iŋes neni kebunio epiini, (nai ayenete ŋiketiyak ŋulu aokunete ŋakipi). Tonyarau nai iŋes ekeitan,
43002010	tolimok tema, “Jwi jwi anakisyakinet ŋasuban, itamasyo mono ŋituŋa epiini ŋolo ebob; ani nai emerakinosi, tomata ŋolo epyana. Nai kibu iyoŋ ŋinapei tete kiŋada epiini ŋolo ebob.”
43002011	Arae ŋin akujuwuanut ŋina esyaunan ŋina etiyae Yesu alo Kana, anakwap a ŋina a Galileya. Alopite a ŋol kisileerek iŋes ikes apolou keŋ, tonupa ŋikasyomak keŋ iŋes.
43002012	Kedau ŋun, tolot Yesu totiyaar lotaun a Kaperenaum, torukosi ka toto keŋ ka ŋikaitotoi keŋ ta ŋikasyomak keŋ. Kiriyata ikes aina ŋirwa ŋulu ekudyoko.
43002013	Aapiyarit akoloŋit ŋina a Paska, ido tolot Yesu todoka Yerusalem.
43002014	Toloma iŋes Kai ka Akuj, toryamu ŋituŋa ŋulu agyelanarete ŋaatuk, ŋamesekin, ŋakuryo ka ŋikesyecak ŋisiliŋa ŋulu eboiyete alomesae kec.
43002015	Kitiyau Yesu adaset a ŋaunoi, kiritarya ikes daadaŋ kaapei ka ŋamesekin ta ŋaatuk alo Kai ka Akuj, kielana ŋisiliŋa a ŋulu esyecak, ka tobuburiyana ŋimesae kec.
43002016	Tolimok ŋulu agyelanarete ŋakuryo tema, “Tolemasi ŋiboro lu a ne! Nyituruworosi Akai a Papa kaŋ ŋina kicurutaet!”
43002017	Totamut ŋikasyomak keŋ atemar igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Amina kaŋ Akai kon, Akuj, enepi alotau kaŋ ikwa akim.”
43002018	Kiŋita ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan iŋes temasi, “Anikujuwuanut ipedori iyoŋ akitiya ikitoodikinia isua atemar ikicamakinitae iyoŋ akitiya nu?”
43002019	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Tobwaŋabwaŋaasi Akai ka Akuj na; abuni ayoŋ adukokin nabo alorwa a ŋiuni bon.”
43002020	Toboŋokis ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan temasi, “Abu Akai ka Akuj na ya ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon ka ŋikanikapei edukyo, kire ipedori iyoŋ adukokin iŋes alotooma ŋirwa ŋiuni a?”
43002021	Nai arae Akai ka Akuj ŋina alimit Yesu akuwan keŋ.
43002022	Kedau Yesu ayarun alokatwak, apotu ŋikasyomak keŋ totamut ŋuna alimunit iŋes, tosodo tonupa Ŋakigireta ka ŋakiro ŋuna erworit Yesu.
43002023	Ani eriŋa Yesu eyai Yerusalem, alorwa a ŋulu a Paska, apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak tonupa ekiro keŋ, anerae eteete ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna etiyae iŋes.
43002024	Nai pa ekinyomit Yesu ikes, anerae ayeni ŋatameta a daadaŋ.
43002025	Pa eitanit iŋes idiotuŋanan akiteyenikin iŋes ŋuna a ŋituŋa, anerae ayeni iŋes ŋuna aya tooma lotai kec.
43003001	Ayai alokidiŋ Ŋiparisayon ecekile ŋolo anyaritae Nikodemo, ŋolo daŋ arae epei a ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan.
43003002	Abu iŋes tolot nakwaare neni a Yesu tolimok tema, “Eketataman, ikiyeni isua atemar irae iyoŋ eketataman ŋolo ibunit aneni ka Akuj, anerae emam idiotuŋanan epedori akitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna itiyae iyoŋ, mati erukito Akuj ka iŋes.”
43003003	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, emam ituŋanan epedori akiŋolikin Apukan ka Akuj, mati kidoun iŋes nabo.”
43003004	Kiŋit Nikodemo Yesu tema, “Epedori ituŋanan akidouno nabo ikwaani kemojoŋ? Epedori mono iŋes alomar nakook a toto keŋ kidounoe nabo a?”
43003005	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, ani pa kidoun ituŋanan a ŋakipi ka Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, nyelomari iŋes jik Napukan ka Akuj.
43003006	Ŋini idounitoe ka akuwan erae akuwan; ŋini idounitoe a Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj, erae etau.
43003007	Nyiumok robo aŋuna akalimok ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar itemokino iyes daadaŋ ikidoun nabo.
43003008	Ekusi ekuwuam neni ecamit ka iirari iyoŋ akirurum keŋ, nai nyianyuni neni ebunitor kori neni elosi. Ikote nenipei aneni a ŋinituŋanan idounitoe a Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj.”
43003009	Kiŋit Nikodemo Yesu tema, “Epedori nai ŋakiro ŋun ikwaani?”
43003010	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Irae iyoŋ eketataman ŋolo apolon alo Isirael, ka nyiyeni iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ!
43003011	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, ikirworo isua ŋuna ikiyeni ka ikiteyenunit daŋ ŋuna ikianyu, nai nyicamunito iyes ŋuna ikiteyenunit isua.
43003012	Ani pa kinupito iyes ŋuna erworo ayoŋ ŋuna ka akwap, ikokinete nai iyes inupete, erae kakalimok ayoŋ iyes ŋuna anakuj ai?
43003013	Emam ituŋanan ipei daŋ adol nakuj, mati Lokoku a Ituŋanan bon ŋolo ebunit anakuj.”
43003014	Ikwaŋina abunio Moses kikyaarya analoŋisat emun ŋolo etiyaunitae a asuat, itemokino Lokoku a Ituŋanan daŋ kikyaarae kidiama ikwaŋinapei,
43003015	ikotere ŋini enupi eryamuni akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
43003016	Kire, abu Akuj tomina akwap nooi, tojal tari Lokoku keŋ ŋolo donupei, ikotere ŋini enupi iŋes nyebukori, nai toryamu akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
43003017	Anerae pa eyakuunit Akuj Lokoku keŋ atubokin akwap, nai ikotere eunio akwap aŋuna keŋ.
43003018	Iŋes ŋini enupi Lokoku ka Akuj, nyetubokinio; ŋini nyenupi, etubokinitae sek, anerae nyenupit iŋes ekiro a Lokoku ka Akuj a ŋolo donupei.
43003019	Atubokino iŋes na ebe: abu akica bu nakwap, nai aminasi ŋituŋa akiryonut akilo akica, anerae aroko ŋuna etiyaete ikes.
43003020	Ituŋanan ŋini itiyae aronis itidiŋit akica ka nyebuni nakica, anerae ekuryanit atemar isileereunio ŋiticisyo keŋ ŋulu aronok.
43003021	Nai iŋes ŋini itiyae ŋuna a kire elomuni nakica, ikotere kisileereunoe atemar itiyat iŋes ŋiticisyo keŋ anakimorikina ka Akuj.
43003022	Kedaun ŋun, toloto Yesu kaapei ka ŋikeekasyomak nakwap ŋina a Yudeya, kiriyata iŋes ka ikes aina ibatisae ŋituŋa.
43003023	Yoana daŋ ebatisae alo Ainoni alo diyete Salim, anerae alalak ŋakipi a nen, poneneete ŋituŋa akibatisao.
43003024	Etiyasi ŋun eriŋa Yoana nyeena alomabus.
43003025	Apeipaki tolomu epeget alokidiŋ ŋikasyomak a Yoana ka e Yudayat ece aŋakiro a ŋuna atapito akitesegun ŋawat, ikwa icikakinitotor Ŋikisila.
43003026	Potu ikes neni a Yoana temasi, “Eketataman, itamunit iyoŋ ekile ŋolo irukitotor iyoŋ alo Kide aŋolol Yorodan, ŋolo ibu iyoŋ ikiteyenik isua a? Ibatisae iŋes ŋituŋa tokona ka acunar ŋituŋa daadaŋ neni keŋ!”
43003027	Toboŋok Yoana tema, “Nyepedori idiotuŋanan aryamun idiobore, mati einakinitae anakuj.
43003028	Iyes ŋilopeyek iraakasi ŋisuudae a ŋuna alimunit ayoŋ ebe, ‘Meere ayoŋ Kristo, nai ekeyakitae ayoŋ akiŋarenikin iŋes.’
43003029	Ŋini eyakar ateran, iŋes erae ekeitan; nai ekone ŋolo ke ekeitan ŋolo eyai nen, elelyani nooi aŋuna epupyo etoil ŋolo ke ekeitan. Erae alakara na ŋina kaŋ ka elelebun lotau kaŋ.
43003030	Itemokino iŋes torwoniar, nai itemokino ayoŋ ocaryonior.”
43003031	“Ŋolo ebunit alokidiama, epol akilo daadaŋ. Ŋolo ebunit alokwap, erae ŋolo ka akwap; irworo daŋ ŋuna ka akwap. Nai ŋolo ebunit anakuj,
43003032	iŋes irworo ŋuna adau akiteyenun ka ŋuna eira aina. Nai emam ituŋanan acamu ŋuna iteyenunit iŋes.
43003033	Ŋini acamu ŋakiro keŋ, iŋes iteyenunit atemar, erae Akuj ŋina a kire.
43003034	Ŋolo iyakuunit Akuj, iŋes irworo ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, anerae ilelebikinit Akuj Etau ŋolo Asegan neni keŋ, pa ipimim.
43003035	Emina Akuj Papa Lokoku keŋ ka ewuak ŋiboro daadaŋ nakan keŋ.
43003036	Ŋini enupi Lokoku, iŋes eyakar akiyar ŋina nyedaun; ŋini nyepupi Lokoku, nyeryamuni akiyar ŋin, nai eyai anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj neni keŋ.”
43004001	Kiirasi Ŋiparisayon atemar eryamununui ka ibatisae Yesu ŋikasyomak ŋulu alalak akilo Yoana.
43004002	(Nyibatisa Yesu idiotuŋanan, nai ŋikasyomak keŋ bon ebatisaete).
43004003	Ani nai iirari Yesu ŋuna erworoe, torotok iŋes alo Yudeya, toboŋo Galileya.
43004004	Aŋun, etemokino Yesu kitor Samaria.
43004005	Kitor iŋes lotaun ŋolo alo Samaria ŋolo anyaritae Sikar, diyete emanikor ŋolo koloŋ ainakini Yakobo lokoku keŋ Yosepu.
43004006	Ayai nen akare a Yakobo, kiboikin Yesu diyete akare aŋuna aupitor iŋes analosit keŋ. Aapiyarit ŋisaae ŋikanikapei ŋulu ka apaaran.
43004007	Bu aberu ŋina arae Asamaritanoit aokun ŋakipi. Tema Yesu iŋes, “Kitamatae.”
43004008	Apaki ŋin, alosito ŋikasyomak a Yesu lotaun akigyel akimuj.
43004009	Kiŋit Asamaritanoit ŋin Yesu tema, “Kaanukiro iŋitar iyoŋ ŋolo irae Eyudayat ŋakipi aneni kaŋ orae ayoŋ Asamaritanoit?” (Alimuni iŋes ikoŋina, anerae pa acamanara Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋisamaritayon.)
43004010	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Kerae toyeni iyoŋ ainakinet ŋina ecamit Akuj ainakin iyoŋ ka ŋolo ebala iyoŋ ‘Kitamatae,’ kiŋisit iyoŋ iŋes ka kikiinakinit ŋakipi ŋuna eteyarak.”
43004011	Tolimok aberu iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, imamukar iyoŋ ibore ŋini okunet ŋakipi, nabo daŋ eoya akare. Ai nai ilemunia iyoŋ ŋakipi ŋuna eteyarak ŋun?
43004012	Ipol mono iyoŋ akilo tari papaa kosi Yakobo ŋolo awaduni akare na, ŋina apotu iŋes tomata ka ŋikeedwe ta ŋikeebaren a?”
43004013	Toboŋok Yesu aberu ŋin tema, “Ŋini emasi ŋakipi nu, enyami akure nabo;
43004014	nai ŋini emasi ŋakipi ŋuna ainakini ayoŋ iŋes, nyenyami akure nabo jik. Ŋakipi ŋuna abuni ayoŋ ainakin iŋes, eruworosi aneni keŋ eitanit ŋolo a ŋakipi a ŋuna eyaunete akiyar ŋina nyedaun.”
43004015	Tema aberu ŋin iŋes, “Okoe Ekapolon! Inakinae ayoŋ ŋakipi ŋun, ikotere nyakanyam akure nabo jik ka ojoŋo aboŋunun ne, akiok.”
43004016	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ape, tonyarau lokile kon, ido toboŋu ne.”
43004017	Toboŋok aberu ŋin iŋes tema, “Amamukar ayoŋ ekile.” Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Iyookinit iyoŋ ilimunit atemar imamukar ekile;
43004018	anerae idau iyoŋ akiruk ka ŋikilyok ŋikan; ka ŋolo tokona irukitotor iyoŋ, meere lokile kon. Aŋun, ilimu iyoŋ ŋuna a kire.”
43004019	Tolimok aberu iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, aanyu ayoŋ atemar irae iyoŋ ekadwaran.
43004020	Apotu atapapaa kosi kilipa neni ka Akuj alomoru a lo, nai ibasi iyes Ŋiyudayan ebe Yerusalem bon ejokya akilipya neni ka Akuj.”
43004021	Tolimok nai Yesu iŋes tema, “Aberu, tonup ŋuna kaŋ, ebunit apaki ŋina nyilipyata iyes neni ka Akuj a Papa alomoru a lo kori alo Yerusalem.
43004022	Iyes Ŋisamaritayon, nyiyenete iŋes kire ŋini ilipete neni keŋ; isua Ŋiyudayan, ikiyeni ŋini ikilipi neni keŋ, anerae ebunit aiuno aneni a Ŋiyudayan.
43004023	Nai ebunit apaki ka iŋes napei na, ŋina ilipyata ŋikelipak ŋulu a kire neni a Papa alotooma Etau ka alorot a ŋolo a kire, anerae ikes ŋikelipak ŋulu iitanit Papa.
43004024	Erae Akuj Etau; ŋulu ilipete neni keŋ, itemokino kilipa alotooma Etau ka alorot a ŋolo a kire.”
43004025	Tolimok aberu ŋin Yesu tema, “Ayeni ayoŋ atemar ebuni Messia, ŋolo enyaritae Kristo. Ŋina ebunio iŋes, ikilimokini iŋes isua ŋakiro daadaŋ.”
43004026	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ayoŋ lopei lo, ŋolo erworo neni kon.”
43004027	Ŋinapeipaki, todolut ŋikasyomak keŋ, toumokis eryamunete Yesu irworosi ka aberu. Nai emam idio daŋ ŋini abu kiŋit tema, “Nyo iitanit iyoŋ?” kori “Nyo irworotor iyoŋ ka aberu na?”
43004028	Kimyek aberu amot keŋ, kikumukumak toloma lotaun, tolimok ŋituŋa tema,
43004029	“Potu kiŋolikisi ekile ŋolo abu okolimok ayoŋ daadaŋ ŋuna adau ayoŋ akitiya. Meere ba ca iŋes Kristo?”
43004030	Tolomut ikes kiŋa etaun, toloto neni ayai Yesu.
43004031	Ani eriŋa ikes eponito, kimaimaa ŋikasyomak Yesu temasi, “Eketataman, kimuj kare ca!”
43004032	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ayakar ayoŋ akimuj ŋina nyiyenete iyes!”
43004033	Kirworikinos ŋikasyomak make temasi, “Keinu idiotuŋanan iŋes akimuj a?”
43004034	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Akaakimuj iŋes akitiya ŋuna ecamit Akuj ŋina ekeyakuunit ayoŋ ka akirikakin ekeetic.
43004035	Meere eminae atemar idoŋit ŋilapyo ŋiomwon tolemikinae a? Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, kireosi lomanikorin; akoko ikes etemokin akilem!
43004036	Eryamuni ŋolo elemi eropit ŋolo ka akilem – ŋaraito ŋuna ka akiyar a ŋina nyedaun, ikotere elelyanete ŋolo etan ka ŋolo aleman kaapei.
43004037	Erae nugu ŋakiro ŋuna a kire: ‘Eekini ipeituŋanan, tosodi tolem ŋinice!’
43004038	Abu ayoŋ ekeyakia iyes akilem aneni pa iekinito. Etiyata ŋuluce ka ilema iyes anakinyinyir kec.”
43004039	Apotu Ŋisamaritayon ŋulu alalak ŋulu alotaun a ŋol, tonupa Yesu aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna abu aberu ŋin kiteyenik ikes tema, “Abu iŋes okolimok ayoŋ daadaŋ ŋuna adau ayoŋ akitiya.”
43004040	Ani epote Ŋisamaritayon neni keŋ, kiŋitakis iŋes akiriya ka ikes; kiriya iŋes a nen ŋirwa ŋiarei.
43004041	Aŋuna ka akitatam keŋ, apotu nabo ŋice ŋulu alalak tonupa iŋes.
43004042	Tolimokis ŋituŋa ŋul aberu ŋin temasi, “Meere ŋakiro kon bon tokona ikinupitor isua iŋes, nai ikiira isua ŋilopeyek atemar, erae lo kire Ekaiunan ŋolo ka akwap.”
43004043	Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiarei, tolot Yesu Galileya.
43004044	Aberakin sek iŋes elope akiteyenun atemar, “Nyitopolooritae ekadwaran anakwap keŋ.”
43004045	Nai ani edoluni iŋes Galileya, kijaut ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a ŋin iŋes, anerae keris ikes keanyut ŋuna daadaŋ etiyae iŋes alo Yerusalem akoloŋit ŋina a Paska, aŋuna kelositotor inaa.
43004046	Toboŋo nabo Yesu lotaun ŋolo a Kana, nakwap a Galileya, neni etuluworya iŋes ŋakipi toruwor epiini. Ayai nai lotaun a Kaperenaum ekarikon ece ŋolo adyaka lokoku keŋ.
43004047	Ani kedau ekile ŋol akiirar atemar aboŋu Yesu Galileya anakwap a ŋina a Yudeya, tonyou iŋes alo Kaperenaum, tolot neni a Yesu, todyek iŋes abunore akitaŋaleun lokoku keŋ ŋolo aapi atwanare.
43004048	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ani pa kiŋolikis iyes ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta, nyinupete.”
43004049	Tema nai ekarikon neni keŋ, “Ekapolon, bua kare ca apena eriŋa lokoku kaŋ nyetwana.”
43004050	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ape tolot, eyari lokoku kon.” Tonup ekile ŋol ŋuna alimokini Yesu, ido kionyak lore keŋ.
43004051	Ani eriŋa iŋes elosi alorot, kiryama ka ŋiketiyak keŋ, tolimokis iŋes atemar aŋaleu lokoku keŋ.
43004052	Kiŋit nai ekarikon ikes esaa ŋolo ageunia lokoku keŋ aŋaleun. Tolimokis ikes iŋes temasi, “Bien ŋisaae ŋikanikaarei emyekinia elekes iŋes.”
43004053	Totamu nai papa ke edya atemar kerae esaa ŋolopei kelimokinia Yesu iŋes atemar, “Eyari lokoku kon.” Apotu nai iŋes ka ŋituŋa keŋ tonupa.
43004054	Arae ŋin akujuwuanut ŋina a ŋaarei ŋina abu Yesu kitiya akitoodikin apolou keŋ, keboŋu alo Yudaya tari Galileya.
43005001	Kelunyar ŋun, toyakaun ŋasuban ŋuna a Ŋiyudayan Yerusalem, ido todoka Yesu daŋ inaa.
43005002	Eyai diyete epuke ŋolo enyaritae “Epuke ŋolo a ŋamesekin” alo Yerusalem, abwal ŋina erikaunito ŋibarasanin ŋikan. Enyaritae abwal ŋin a Ŋaburaniyae Betesaida.
43005003	Aperete ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋulu adyakasi lobarasanin ŋul; ŋimudukanotin, ŋikaŋwalak ka ŋulu elilim ŋakoyo. [Edarito ikes ŋakipi kicakulakinae,
43005004	anerae ŋicesaae abuneene emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon nabwal akicakulakin ŋakipi. Ituŋanan ŋini esyauni alomar nakipi icakulakini emalaika, aŋaleuni iŋes alodeke a daadaŋ a ŋolo adyaka iŋes.]
43005005	Ayai nen ekile ŋolo adyaka ŋikaru ŋatomoniuni ka ŋikanikauni.
43005006	Kiŋolik Yesu iŋes eperi, toanyu atemar kedyaka ekile ŋol ŋikaru ŋulu alalak. Kiŋit nai Yesu iŋes tema, “Icamit iyoŋ aŋaleun a?”
43005007	Toboŋok ekadyakan ŋol tema, “Ekapolon, emam ayoŋ ituŋanan ŋini ekelumokini nabwal edoli apaki ŋina icakulakinotor ŋakipi, anerae ani ekatakini ayoŋ akiculumikin nakipi, kisyau ice kiŋaren okodepa ayoŋ.”
43005008	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Tonyou, tolema akoniperiet, torotok.”
43005009	Toŋaleu ekile ŋol atipei, tolema aperyet keŋ, ido torotok. Arae akoloŋit ŋin ŋina a Sabato.
43005010	Apotu nai ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan tolimokis ekile ŋolo etaŋaleunio temasi, “Erae akoloŋit na ŋina a Sabato, nyecamakinitae iyoŋ iwokit aperyet kon!”
43005011	Nai tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Abu ekile ŋolo eketaŋaleuni ayoŋ, okolimok tema, ‘Tonyou, tolema akoniperiet, torotok.’ ”
43005012	Kiŋita ikes iŋes temasi, “Ŋae mono etuŋanan ŋolo atemari iyoŋ, ‘Tonyou, tolema akoniperiet, torotok’? ”
43005013	Nai pa ayeni ŋolo etaŋaleunio atemar kerae ŋae, anerae aberakin Yesu aŋopikin nasepic ŋina ayai inaa.
43005014	Ekaku, abu Yesu toryamu ekile ŋol alo Kai ka Akuj, tolimok iŋes tema, “Kiira, iŋaleu iyoŋ tokona; tojoŋo asecesec, ikotere nyitiyakin ibore ice ŋini aronon nooi neni kon.”
43005015	Tolot ekile ŋol, tolimok neni a ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan atemar arae Yesu etaŋaleuni iŋes.
43005016	Apotu ŋikarikok kitidiŋa Yesu, anerae abu kitiya ŋun akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato.
43005017	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Itiyae Papa kaŋ ŋapakio daadaŋ ka etiyae ayoŋ daŋ ikwaŋinapei.”
43005018	Ani iirarete ŋikarikok ŋakiro ŋun, toŋoa tocamito tari akiar Yesu; meere aŋuna abunio iŋes tobilia ekisil ŋolo a Sabato bon, nai daŋ aŋuna abaakar iŋes erae Akuj Papa keŋ – iŋes atemar iriyan ka iŋes.
43005019	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, emam idiobore ŋini epedori Lokoku akitiya bon, nai itiyae iŋes ŋuna make iŋolikini iŋes Akuj Papa keŋ itiyae, anerae ŋuna daadaŋ itiyae Papa, itiyae Lokoku daŋ ikwaŋinapei.
43005020	Anerae emina Papa Lokoku keŋ, itoodyanakini iŋes ŋuna daadaŋ itiyae iŋes elope. Itoodikini nabo daŋ iŋes ŋiticisyo ŋulu apolok akilo ŋul, ikotere iumokinete iyes.
43005021	Ikwaŋinapei iteyarununuya Papa ŋikatwak ka inak akiyar, einakini Lokoku daŋ akiyar neni a ŋulu ecamit iŋes.
43005022	Nyetubonokini Papa idiotuŋanan, nai einakinit iŋes Lokoku atubonokin,
43005023	ikotere ŋituŋa daadaŋ tokerito Lokoku ikwa ekeritotor Papa. Iŋes ŋini nyekerit Lokoku, nyekerit tari Papa ŋolo abu kiyaku iŋes.
43005024	“Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋini iirari akaakirot, ido tonup iŋes ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, eyakar akiyar ŋina nyedaun, nyetubokinio iŋes, nai alunyar iŋes anatwanare nakiyar.
43005025	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ebunit apaki ka iŋes napei na, ŋina eponiata ŋikatwak akiirar etoil ŋolo a Lokoku ka Akuj; ikes ŋulu iirarete, eyarete.
43005026	Ikwaŋinapei eyakar Papa akiyar tooma keŋ, ainaki iŋes Lokoku keŋ daŋ akiyar ikwaŋinapei.
43005027	Adau iŋes ainakin Lokoku apedor ŋina tubokinet, anerae erae iŋes Lokoku a Ituŋanan.
43005028	Nyiumokis aŋuna a ŋakiro a nu; ebunit apaki ŋina iiraryata ŋikatwak ŋulu eyakasi nalyalin ekeetoil.
43005029	Elomunete ikes kiŋa; ŋulu itiyato ŋuna ajokak, eyarunete toryamut akiyar; ŋulu itiyato ŋuna aronok, eyarunete totubokinae.
43005030	“Emam idiobore ŋini apedori ayoŋ akitiya aŋuna ka apedor kaŋ bon. Atubonokini ayoŋ ikwaŋina akalimokinitere; eriyan ekaatubokine, anerae nyewarit ayoŋ ŋuna acamit, nai acamit a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
43005031	“Ani keteyenun ayoŋ bon, erae akiteyenun kaŋ ŋina ka alyokonu.
43005032	Eyai icetuŋanan ŋini eketeyenunit ayoŋ ka ayeni ayoŋ atemar ŋuna elimunit iŋes aŋuna kaŋ erae ŋuna a kire.
43005033	Yoana iŋes ituŋanan ŋini ipotu iyes kiyakikis ŋikiyakitono kus ka eteyenu iŋes ŋuna a kire.
43005034	Nyeitanit ayoŋ ŋisuudae alotuŋa, nai alimunit ayoŋ ŋun, ikotere iiunotor iyes.
43005035	Ekwaan Yoana ka etaa ŋolo enepi tocai ka ipotu iyes tolakaros adiotipei anakica keŋ.
43005036	Nai ayakar ayoŋ akiteyenunet ŋina iloit tari ŋina a Yoana; anerae ŋiticisyo ŋulu akainaki ayoŋ Papa kaŋ akirikakin, ikes ikiteyenunito atemar Papa iŋes ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
43005037	Papa daŋ ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, iŋes elope eteyenu ŋuna a kire aŋuna kaŋ. Nyiirara iyes etoil keŋ, kori nyeanyuna tari neni ikoni iŋes.
43005038	Nyelomarito ŋakiro keŋ tooma kus, anerae nyinupito ŋolo abu iŋes kiyaku.
43005039	Isyomete iyes Ŋakigireta ibasi kori iryamunete akiyar ŋina nyedaun alotooma kec, torae bo ŋakiro ŋuna akayenunere ayoŋ ikes igiritae Nakigireta ŋunapei ŋun!
43005040	Nai iwounito bo iyes aponare neni kaŋ, ikotere toryamuniata akiyar.
43005041	“Nyewarit ayoŋ akitopolooro alotuŋa,
43005042	nai akayeni ayoŋ iyes – nyiminasi iyes Akuj.
43005043	Abunit ayoŋ ka apedor a ŋina a Papa kaŋ ka nyijauna iyes ayoŋ; nai ani kebu ice ka apedor keŋ a ilope, iŋes ijaunete iyes.
43005044	Icamito iyes ikitopoloosi ŋulucetuŋa, nai nyiwarito aryamun akitopolooro aneni a ŋolo bon erae Akuj. Ikokinete nai iyes ikinupete ayoŋ ai?
43005045	Nyibasi robo kori ayoŋ ekesitakini iyes alokiŋaren a Papa kaŋ, nai Moses, ŋolo iwuakinito iyes akusikigeno neni keŋ, iŋes ebuni akisitakin iyes.
43005046	Kerae kire tonupito iyes Moses, kikinupito iyes ayoŋ daŋ, anerae abu iŋes kigir ŋuna ekekamunito ayoŋ.
43005047	Nai ikwaŋina nyinupitotor iyes ŋuna egiri iŋes, ikokinete nai iyes inupete ŋuna erworo ayoŋ ai?”
43006001	Kedau ŋun, tolot Yesu tolunyar ekekwaye anam ŋina a Galileya, anam ŋina anyaritae Tiberia.
43006002	Totupakis ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak Yesu, anerae keris ikes kiŋolikis ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna etaŋaleunio Yesu ŋituŋa ŋulu adyakasi.
43006003	Apotu Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak todokasi kidiama emukura, kiboikinos.
43006004	Aapuunit apaki ŋina a ŋasuban a Ŋiyudayan ŋina enyaritae Paska.
43006005	Kireo Yesu, kiŋolik ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak eponito neni keŋ. Kiŋit iŋes Pilipo tema, “Ai mono tokona ikipedorya iwon agyelunia ŋamugati ŋadi, ikotere ŋituŋa lu daadaŋ kimuja?”
43006006	(Eŋisit iŋes Pilipo ŋakiro ŋun aŋuna ka arosya iŋes, anerae ayeni Yesu elope ŋuna itiyakini.)
43006007	Toboŋok Pilipo tema, “Kerae tari toyakas ŋidinari ŋamiae ŋaarei, pa kitemokin akigyel ŋamugati ŋuna eryamuni ŋinituŋanan adio cici
43006008	Abu epei alokasyomak keŋ, ŋolo anyaritae Anderia, lokaato a Simoni Petero, tolimok Yesu tema,
43006009	“Eyai nege edya ŋolo eyakar ŋamugati ŋakan ka ŋikolya ŋiarei. Nai epedori mono akimuj ŋin akiryam ŋituŋa lu daadaŋ a?”
43006010	Tolimok Yesu ŋikasyomak tema, “Kisiboikisi ŋituŋa!” (Alibit nen asebuk ŋinya.) Kiboikinos ŋituŋa daadaŋ; arae ŋikilyok ŋalipyo ŋakan.
43006011	Tolemu nai Yesu ŋamugati, tolakar neni ka Akuj, tokorak ŋituŋa ŋulu eboiyete, tokorarae ŋikolya daŋ; toryamu a ŋinituŋanan etyae ŋolo eitanit iŋes.
43006012	Ani kimwoko ŋituŋa, tolimok Yesu ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Tocunutu ŋapiyanunet daadaŋ, ikotere nyicanicanaar.”
43006013	Kiriraut nai ikes ŋapiyanunet ŋuna apotu kilelebun ŋaditae ŋatomon ka ŋaarei, anamugati a ŋunakan a ŋuna emujete ŋituŋa.
43006014	Ani iŋolikinete ŋituŋa akujuwuanut ŋina abu Yesu kitiya, kisyakis atemar, “Kire erae lo ekadwaran ŋolo itemokino bu nakwap!”
43006015	Ayeni Yesu atemar acamito ŋituŋa areikin iŋes ka agogoŋu aruwor erwosit kec, aŋun abu tosi tolot lokamukumukui.
43006016	Ani ewari, toloto ŋikasyomak a Yesu nanam,
43006017	todoka ataker toloto ekekwaye tari lotaun a Kaperenaum. Kiryoniar akwap eriŋa Yesu nyebuno neni kec.
43006018	Tokut ekuwuam ŋoloti agogoŋon ananam, kilolik ŋakipi.
43006019	Kedaut ŋikasyomak amiar ataker ŋakilomitae ŋuna aapiyarito ŋakan kori ŋakanikapei, apotu kiŋolikis Yesu elosi alokidiama nakipi, ebunit keapuu nataker, ido tobul ikes nooi.
43006020	Nai tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyikibul, erae ayoŋ.”
43006021	Tocamut nai ikes, kitodokut iŋes nataker, todolo atipei neni alosete.
43006022	Taparacu keŋ, apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu aya ekekwaye anam toanyut atemar apeitaker bon ayai nen. Ayenete ikes atemar pa abu Yesu todoka nataker, nai ŋikeekasyomak bon adokarito.
43006023	Kepotu ŋatakerin ŋuna alo Tiberia todolut diyete neni emuja asepic ŋina a ŋituŋa ŋamugati, kedau Yesu alakar neni ka Akuj.
43006024	Ani iŋolikinete ŋituŋa emam Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak a nen, todoka ŋatakerin ŋun, toloto Kaperenaum akiwarit Yesu.
43006025	Ani eryamunete ŋituŋa Yesu alokekwaye anam, kiŋita iŋes temasi, “Eketataman, ori idolunio iyoŋ nege?”
43006026	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ikiwarito iyes ayoŋ meere aŋuna iponiata toyenut apolou a ŋakujuwuanisya, nai erae aŋuna iponiata kimuja ŋamugati, kimwoko.
43006027	Nyitiyata aŋuna ka akimuj a ŋina ebosiyari, nai kitiyata toryamut akimuj ŋina eropari tari nakiyar ŋina nyedaun, ŋina ikiini iyes Lokoku a Ituŋanan. Anerae neni keŋ iwuakinit Akuj Papa emacar ŋolo eminar iŋes.”
43006028	Kiŋita nai ikes Yesu temasi, “Ikikokini isua ai, ikotere kitiyaere etic ŋolo ka Akuj?”
43006029	Toboŋok nai Yesu ikes tema, “Etic ŋolo ka Akuj iŋes lo: itemokino tonupa ŋolo iyakuunit iŋes.”
43006030	Kiŋita ŋituŋa Yesu temasi, “Anikujuwuanut ibuni iyoŋ akitiyakin, eŋolikisi isua, ido onupa ŋakiro kon?
43006031	Apotu koloŋ atapapaa kosi kimuja Manna analoŋisat ikwapei igiritere Nakigireta ebe, ‘Abu iŋes inak ikes akimuj ŋina anakuj kimuja.’ ”
43006032	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, pa arae Moses ikiini iyes akimuj ŋina anakuj, nai Papa kaŋ ikiinakini iyes akimuj ŋina a kire ŋina anakuj.
43006033	Anerae akimuj ŋina ka Akuj iŋes ŋina ebunit anakuj ainakin akwap akiyar.”
43006034	Temasi ikes iŋes, “Ekapolon, inanakinetei isua jwi jwi akimuj ŋin.”
43006035	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Arae Ayoŋ akimuj ŋina ka akiyar. Ŋini enyami akimuj ŋin, nyenyami akoro jik ka ŋini akanupi ayoŋ, nyenyami akure jik.
43006036	Aris ayoŋ kakalimok iyes atemar tari daŋ kikianyunito ayoŋ, nyenupa iyes ayoŋ.
43006037	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini akainit ayoŋ Papa kaŋ ebuni neni kaŋ, nyeritari jik ayoŋ iŋes ebuni neni kaŋ;
43006038	anerae nyabunit ayoŋ anakuj akitiya acamit kaŋ, nai akitiya acamit a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
43006039	Acamit a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, iŋes na: nyitemokino ayoŋ etooliyo idiotuŋanan ŋini akainaki iŋes ayoŋ; nai akilo, eteyaru ikes Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon.
43006040	Ŋuna ecamit Papa kaŋ ikes nu: ŋini eanyuni ka tonup Lokoku, eryamuni akiyar ŋina nyedaun. Eteyaruni ayoŋ iŋes Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon.”
43006041	Kisyakis Ŋiyudayan akiŋuruŋura aŋuna a Yesu, anerae abu iŋes tema, “Arae Ayoŋ akimuj ŋina abuni anakuj.”
43006042	Kirworikinos ikes make temasi, “Meere lo lokoku a Yosepu a? Nyikiyeni mono iwon papa keŋ ka toto keŋ a? Ikokini iŋes elimuni ebe ebunit iŋes anakuj ai?”
43006043	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Tojoŋoto alokidiŋ kus akiŋuruŋura.
43006044	Emam idiotuŋanan ŋini ebuni neni kaŋ, mati keyau Papa ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ iŋes neni kaŋ, eteyaru iŋes Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon.
43006045	Igirit ekadwaran epei ebe, ‘Ebuni Akuj akitatam ŋituŋa daadaŋ.’ Ŋulu iirarete Papa, toyenut aneni kaŋ, epote neni kaŋ.
43006046	Nyabala ayoŋ aanyu idiotuŋanan Papa, nai ŋolo ebunit aneni ka Akuj, iŋes bon aanyu Papa.
43006047	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋini enupi, eryamuni akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
43006048	Arae Ayoŋ akimuj ŋina ka akiyar.
