43006049	Tari koloŋ kimujito atapapaa kus Manna analoŋisat, apotu totwaka ekaku.
43006050	Nai ŋini imuji akimuj ŋina ebunit anakuj, nyetwani.
43006051	Arae Ayoŋ akimuj ŋina ka akiyar a ŋina ebunit anakuj; ŋini imuji akimuj ŋin, eyari iŋes jik. Akimuj ŋina ainakini ayoŋ toyarya akwap, erae akuwan kaŋ.”
43006052	Topegakinos nai Ŋiyudayan make temasi, “Ikokini ekile lo ikiinakini iwon akuwan keŋ kimujae ai?”
43006053	Aŋun, tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ani pa kimuja iyes akuwan a Lokoku a Ituŋanan ka tomata ŋaokot keŋ, nyiyakaunotor akiyar tooma kus.
43006054	Ŋini imuji akaakuwan, tomat ŋaokot kaŋ, eyakar iŋes akiyar ŋina nyedaun, abuni ayoŋ akiteyarun iŋes Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon.
43006055	Anerae erae akaakuwan akimuj kire ka ŋaokot kaŋ ŋamatan kire.
43006056	Ŋini imuji akaakuwan ka tomat ŋaokot kaŋ, iboi alotooma kaŋ, ayoŋ daŋ eboi alotooma keŋ.
43006057	Ikwaŋinapei ekeyakuunia ayoŋ Papa ŋolo eyari, nabo ayoŋ daŋ oyari aŋuna a Papa, ikwaŋinapei, ŋini ekemuji ayoŋ, eyari aŋuna kaŋ.
43006058	Erae ŋin akimuj ŋina ebunit anakuj; nyikoni iŋes akimuj ŋina apotu atapapaa kus kimuja, nai apotu totwaka ekaku. Kire, ŋini imuji akimuj ŋin, eyari jik.”
43006059	Alimuni Yesu ŋakiro ŋun alosinagoga itatami ŋituŋa alo Kaperenaum.
43006060	Ani iirarete ŋikasyomak a Yesu ŋulu alalak ŋakiro ŋun, temasi, “Egogoŋ ekitatame lo! Ŋae epedori akiirar?”
43006061	Ikwaŋina ayenia Yesu elope atemar eŋuruŋurasi ikes aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun, abu kiŋit ikes tema, “Ekoto ŋakiro ŋun akiteesikin iyes etic lo a?
43006062	Ani bo nai kiŋolikis iyes Lokoku a Ituŋanan edokari neni ebunitor iŋes?
43006063	Erae Etau ŋolo ka Akuj iŋes ikiini akiyar; ecaryono apedor ŋina a ituŋanan. Ŋuna akalimok ayoŋ iyes erae ŋuna ileleba Etau tooma kec ka eyaunete akiyar.
43006064	Nai alokidiŋ kus eyakasi ŋulu nyenupito.” (Anakisyakinet, ayeni Yesu ŋulu pa anupito iŋes ka ayeni daŋ ekalukinon keŋ.)
43006065	Tolimu nabo Yesu tema, “Ikes ŋakiro ŋuna abunio ayoŋ okolimok iyes atemar, emam ŋini ebuni neni kaŋ, mati kecamaki Papa iŋes.”
43006066	Ani iirarete ikes ŋun, apotu ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋulu alalak tojamakis, tojoŋoto arukit ka iŋes.
43006067	Kiŋit Yesu ŋikasyomak ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei tema, “Icamito iyes daŋ arotokin a?”
43006068	Toboŋok Simoni Petero iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, neni a ŋae ikilosi? Iyakar iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ka akiyar a ŋina nyedaun.
43006069	Ikinup ka ikiyenu daŋ atemar irae iyoŋ ŋolo donupei, ŋolo ka Akuj.”
43006070	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyeseuna ayoŋ iyes ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei a? Nai, eyai kidiŋ kus ŋolo erae ŋolo a Satan!”
43006071	Erworo iŋes aŋuna a Yuda, alokoku a Simoni Isikariot. Anerae, tari ŋina araakar epei alokidiŋ ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, aapi iŋes alukin Yesu.
43007001	Kedaun ŋun, abu Yesu tolot nakwap ŋina a Galileya; pa acamit iŋes alosit Yudeya, anerae ewarito ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan akiar iŋes.
43007002	Aapuunit apaki ŋina a ŋasuban a Ŋiyudayan ŋina adukere ŋitogoi.
43007003	Tolimokis ŋikaitotoi keŋ iŋes temasi, “Torotok a ne, tolot Yudeya, ikotere ŋikewuapak kon eanyunete ŋuna itiyae iyoŋ.
43007004	Anerae emam ituŋanan ŋini iwuai ŋuna itiyae iŋes, erae kecamit aruun alotuŋa. Ani kitiyae iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ikote ŋun, kitoodikin iyoŋ neni ka akwap!”
43007005	(Anerae pa anupito tari ŋikaitotoi keŋ ŋakiro keŋ.)
43007006	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Eriŋa apaki kaŋ nyedoluno, nai apaki kus, eyai ne jwi jwi.
43007007	Nyepedori akwap akitidiŋ iyes, nai eketidiŋit ayoŋ, anerae arubakinit alimonokini iŋes atemar eroko nooi ŋikeeticisyo.
43007008	Apesi toloto nasuban, nai nyalosi ayoŋ, anerae eriŋa apaki kaŋ.”
43007009	Kedau alimokin ikes ŋun, kidoŋ iŋes Galileya.
43007010	Kedaut ŋikaitotoi a Yesu alosit nasuban, tolot nai iŋes daŋ nasuban emam idiotuŋanan ayeni.
43007011	Anasuban a ŋun, ewarito ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan Yesu, kiŋitas ebasi, “Ai mono eyai iŋes?”
43007012	Alal nooi anasuban akiŋaiŋaa ŋina a ŋituŋa aŋuna keŋ. Abasi ŋice, “Erae iŋes ekile ŋolo ajokan.” Ŋice abasi, “Emam, ibatarit iŋes ŋituŋa.”
43007013	Nai amam ŋini atitinyikini akikeun ŋakiro, aŋuna ayakar akuryanu aŋuna a ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan.
43007014	Ani edoli kidiŋ ŋasuban, toloma Yesu Kai ka Akuj, kisyak akitatam ŋituŋa.
43007015	Toumokis ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan iŋolikinete iŋes temasi, “Nyo eosyo ekile lo nooi, torae bo nyitatamitae iŋes Ŋikisila?”
43007016	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Akitatam kaŋ meere ŋina kaŋ, erae ŋina a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
43007017	Ani keseu idiotuŋanan ŋuna ecamit Akuj, eyenuni iŋes erae kebunit akitatam na aneni ka Akuj, kori erae kerworo ayoŋ aŋuna ka apedor kaŋ bon.
43007018	Ŋini irworo aŋuna ka apedor keŋ bon, iwarit akitopolooro; nai ŋini iitanit apolou a ŋolo iyakit iŋes, irworo ŋuna a kire, emam adiolyokonu eyai neni keŋ.
43007019	Meere Moses ikiinit iyes Ŋikisila a? Nai emam alokidiŋ kus ipei daŋ ŋini iricit Ŋikisila ŋul. Kaanukiro iwaritotor iyes akiar ayoŋ?”
43007020	Toboŋokis ŋituŋa iŋes temasi, “Eyai ekipye tooma kon. Ŋae iwarit akiar iyoŋ?”
43007021	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Abu ayoŋ etiya apeikujuwuanut bon ka ipotu iyes daadaŋ toumokis.
43007022	Abu koloŋ Moses ikicikak iyes akileŋer ŋisapa kus, (nai pa arae Moses ekesyakinan, arae atapapaa kus), aŋun isyakis iyes akileŋer ŋidwe kus tari akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato.
43007023	Ani kileŋeryo ikoku ŋini sapat akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato ikotere nyebilere Ŋikisila a Moses, nyo bo ikiŋoikinitotor iyes ayoŋ aŋuna etaŋaleunio ituŋanan akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato?
43007024	Nyitubonokinete alopite a ŋolo etakaniata ŋiboro, nai totubonokinete alopite a ŋolo eriyan.”
43007025	Temasi ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu a Yerusalem ebe, “Meere ekile ŋolo iwarito ŋikarikok akiar lo a?
43007026	Kiŋolikisi epite ŋolo irworor iŋes alotuŋa, emam ituŋanan ŋini elimokini iŋes adiokirot. Kori ca eyenete ikes atemar erae iŋes Kristo?
43007027	Tari kikote neni daŋ, ikiyeni iwon neni ebunitor ekile lo. Nai ŋina ebunio Kristo, emam ŋini eyenuni neni ebunitor iŋes.”
43007028	Ikwaŋina etatamya Yesu alo Kai ka Akuj apaki ŋin, tocelu iŋes tema, “Okoe ikiyenete mono iyes ayoŋ ka iyenete neni abunitor ayoŋ a? Nyabunit ayoŋ aŋuna ka apedor kaŋ bon, nai ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ iŋes erae ŋolo a kire. Nyiyenete iyes iŋes,
43007029	nai ayeni ayoŋ iŋes, anerae abunit ayoŋ aneni keŋ, ekeyakuunit iŋes ayoŋ.”
43007030	Kikatakis nai ikes akikamun iŋes, nai emam ŋini abu totap iŋes, anerae ariŋa apaki keŋ nyedoluno.
43007031	Nai tonupa ŋulu alalak anatukot iŋes temasi, “Ŋina moi ebunio Kristo, kire ebuni iŋes akitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna alalak akilo ekile lo a?”
43007032	Kiirasi Ŋiparisayon ŋituŋa iŋaiŋaatar Yesu, kiyakiyasi nai ikes ka ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ŋiketeok Akai ka Akuj akikamun iŋes.
43007033	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ikiruki ayoŋ ka iyes adiotipei, oboŋo nai neni a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
43007034	Ipote iyes akiwar ayoŋ, nai nyikiryamunete, anerae nyipedorete iyes aponare neni ayakaun ayoŋ.”
43007035	Kiŋitiŋitas Ŋiparisayon make ebasi, “Ai mono tokona neni ti ebala iŋes alosi ne, neni nyeryamunere iwon iŋes ne? Kori ecamit iŋes alosit lotuŋa yok ŋulu eyakasi nakwap a Ŋigirik aŋuna ka akitatam Ŋigirik?
43007036	Ebala iŋes eponio iwon akiwarit iŋes, nai nyikiryamuni tari a iwadio ka nabo daŋ ebala, nyikipedori iwon aponare neni eyakaun iŋes. Anukiro mono ŋuna irworo iŋes ŋun?”
43007037	Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon ŋina apolon nooi akilo, anasuban a ŋuna edukere ŋitogoi, tonyou Yesu tocelu tema, “Ŋini enyamit akure, bu neni kaŋ tomat.
43007038	Igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ituŋanan ŋini akanupi ayoŋ, ‘Epote ŋilelyan ŋulu a ŋakipi a ŋuna eteyarak alel alotau keŋ.’ ”
43007039	Alimuni Yesu ŋakiro ŋun aŋuna ke Etau a ŋolo aryamunete ŋulu enupito iŋes. Anapaki a ŋin ariŋa Etau nyeinakina lokanupak, anerae ariŋa Yesu nyitopolooro.
43007040	Kedaut ŋituŋa akiirar ŋakiro ŋuna erworo Yesu, apotu ŋice kirworo temasi, “Erae lo kire ekadwaran!”
43007041	Temasi ŋice, “Erae lo Kristo!” Nai temasi ŋice, “Ebuni mono kire Kristo alo Galileya a?
43007042	Kire igiritae Nakigireta ebe, erae Kristo lopapait a Daudi, ebuni iŋes alo Betelem alore a ŋolo koloŋ ayai Daudi.”
43007043	Totyakatyakas ŋituŋa aŋuna agelegelaakatar ŋakiro ŋuna erworosi ikes aŋuna a Yesu.
43007044	Acamito ŋicetuŋa akikamun iŋes, nai emam ŋini abu totap iŋes.
43007045	Ani eboŋunete ŋisigarya, kiŋita ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Ŋiparisayon ikes temasi, “Kaanukiro pa irikunioto iyes iŋes laalo?”
43007046	Toboŋokis ŋisigarya ikes temasi, “Emam ekile ŋolo erwor ikoŋina irworor ekile ŋol!”
43007047	Kiŋita Ŋiparisayon ikes temasi, “Ikibata iyes daŋ ekile ŋol a?
43007048	Iŋolikis iyes edio alokarikok kori aloparisayon enupi iŋes a?
43007049	Nai asepic na bon ŋina a ŋituŋa iŋes enupit, anerae nyeyeni Ŋikisila a Moses; aŋun, ilamam iŋes nooi.”
43007050	Abu nai Nikodemo, ŋolo alosit neni a Yesu nakwaare, ŋolo arae epei alokarikok a Ŋiyudayan, tolimok ŋuluce tema,
43007051	“A Lokisila yok, nyikicamakinitae iwon atubokin ituŋanan nyiirara ŋakiro keŋ ka nyeripuna ŋuna esecit iŋes.”
43007052	Toboŋokis ikes iŋes temasi, “Ibunit iyoŋ daŋ alo Galileya a? Toripipi Ŋakigireta, ido toanyu atemar, emam jik ediokadwaran ŋolo ebuni alo Galileya.”
43007053	Toboŋosi nai ŋituŋa daadaŋ lorerya kec.
43008001	Nai tolot Yesu lomoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa.
43008002	Ani iwalari, toboŋo iŋes Kai ka Akuj, tocunakin ŋituŋa neni keŋ, kiboikin iŋes, kisyak akitatam ikes.
43008003	Torikut ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ka Ŋiparisayon aberu ŋina kikamunio elomi, yaut iŋes, kitowua alokiŋaren kec.
43008004	Tolimokis ikes Yesu temasi, “Eketataman, ekamunio aberu na elomi.
43008005	Igiritae Lokisila a Moses atemar, ani ŋina ikoni na, itemokino tocakae a ŋamoru. Nai anu itami iyoŋ aŋuna keŋ?”
43008006	Eŋisete ikes Yesu ŋakiro ŋun alokunia iŋes, ikotere isitakiniata iŋes ekaku. Nai kijuuru Yesu, kisyak akigir kwap a ekimoin.
43008007	Aŋuna etoropiunioto ikes ŋakiŋiseta neni a Yesu, abu Yesu tonyou, tolimok ikes tema, “Ani keyai alokidiŋ kus ŋini emam asecit, kisyau akimas aberu na ka amoru.”
43008008	Kijuuru nabo, kigir kwap a ekimoin.
43008009	Ani iirarete ikes ŋakiro ŋun, kisyakis arotokin a ŋipeipei, ageun alokasikou, kidoŋ Yesu bon ka aberu ewuoi alokiŋaren keŋ.
43008010	Tonyou Yesu, kiŋit aberu tema, “Aberu, nyaalu ikes? Emam idiotuŋanan ikitubok iyoŋ a?”
43008011	Tolimok aberu ŋin Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, emam ipei daŋ.” Tolimok nai Yesu iŋes tema, “Ayoŋ daŋ nyakatubokini iyoŋ, nai tolot, nyisec nabo.” ]
43008012	Kirwor nabo Yesu neni kec tema, “Arae Ayoŋ akica ŋina ka akwap; ŋini ekewuapakini ayoŋ, nyelomari nakiryonut, nai eryamuni akica ŋina ka akiyar.”
43008013	Tolimokis Ŋiparisayon Yesu temasi, “Iteyenun iyoŋ bon. Akiteyenuna kon erae amodiyo.”
43008014	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Tari keteyenuna ayoŋ bon, iyookino akiteyenuna kaŋ, anerae ayeni ayoŋ neni abunitor ka ayeni daŋ neni alosi. Nai nyiyenete iyes neni abunitor ayoŋ kori neni alosi.
43008015	Itubonokinete iyes alopite a ŋituŋa, emam ituŋanan ŋini atubok ayoŋ.
43008016	Ani tari katubok ayoŋ idiotuŋanan, iyookino akaatubokinet, anerae meere ayoŋ bon atubi, nai ayoŋ ka ŋolo ekeyakuunit.
43008017	Igiritae Lokisila kus ebe, ani ecamunosi ŋituŋa ŋiarei, iyookino akiteyenunet kec.
43008018	Eteyenuna ayoŋ bon, nabo Papa kaŋ ŋolo ekeyakuunit, iŋes eketeyenunit ayoŋ.”
43008019	Kiŋita nai ikes Yesu temasi, “Ai eyai Papa kon?” Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyikiyenete iyes ayoŋ, kori Papa kaŋ. Kerae itoyenete ayoŋ, kiyenete Papa kaŋ daŋ.”
43008020	Kirwor Yesu ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ apaki ŋina etatamya alo Kai ka Akuj, anagule a ŋina ewuakinitae ŋasadukui ŋuna a ŋisiliŋa. Emam ituŋanan abu kikamu iŋes, anerae ariŋa nyedoluno apaki keŋ.
43008021	Tolimok nabo Yesu ikes tema, “Alosi ayoŋ. Ikiwarete iyes ayoŋ, nai itwakete anasecit kus; nyipedorete iyes aponare neni alosi ayoŋ.”
43008022	Kirworikinos ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan make temasi, “Eara mono tokona iŋes bon a? Anerae ebala ebe, ‘Nyipedorete iyes aponare neni alosi ayoŋ!’ ”
43008023	Tolimok nabo ikes tema, “Irae iyes ŋulu alokwap, nai arae ayoŋ ŋolo alokidiama; ŋulu ka akwap a na iyes, nai meere ayoŋ ŋolo ka akwap a na.
43008024	Akalimokinit ayoŋ iyes atemar, itwakete anasecit kus. Kire itwakete anasecit kus, erae pa kinupa atemar ‘Arae Ayoŋ ŋolo Arae Ayoŋ.’ ”
43008025	Kiŋita ikes iŋes temasi, “Ŋae iyoŋ?” Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ayoŋ iŋes ŋolopei aberakin ayoŋ alimokin iyes anakisyakinet.
43008026	Ayakar ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna alalak ŋuna kirworo aŋuna kus ka ŋuna tubokinet iyes. Nai ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, iŋes erae ŋolo a kire; alimonokini ayoŋ akwap ŋuna eira ayoŋ aneni keŋ.”
43008027	Pa ayenete ikes atemar erworo iŋes ŋuna a Papa keŋ.
43008028	Aŋun, tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ani kidaut iyes akikyaar Lokoku a Ituŋanan kidiama, iŋes nai iponiata iyes ayenun atemar ‘Arae Ayoŋ ŋolo Arae Ayoŋ,’ toyenutu daŋ atemar nyetiyae ayoŋ idiobore aŋuna ka apedor kaŋ bon, nai erworo ayoŋ ŋuna eketatamit Papa kaŋ alimor.
43008029	Nabo ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ iŋes ikirukit ka ayoŋ; nyakaesikinit iŋes ayoŋ bon, anerae etiyae ayoŋ jwi jwi ŋuna italakarito iŋes.”
43008030	Ŋulu alalak ŋulu apotu kiirasi Yesu irworo ŋakiro ŋun, apotu tonupa iŋes.
43008031	Tolimok Yesu Ŋiyudayan ŋulu anupito iŋes tema, “Ani kiricakis iyes ŋakiro kaŋ, iraakasi kire iyes ŋikasyomak kaŋ.
43008032	Iyenunete ŋuna a kire ka ikilacakinete iyes ŋuna a kire.”
43008033	Tolimokis ikes Yesu temasi, “Ikirae isua ŋiletok ka Aburaam ka nyeruworo isua jik ŋipi ŋulu a idiotuŋanan. Kaanukiro ibaakar iyoŋ ebe, ‘Ikilacakinete?’ ”
43008034	Toboŋok nai Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋini eseci, aruwor epito ŋolo ka asecit.
43008035	Nyepedori epito aruwor ituŋanan ŋini eropari alokal, nai esapat ŋolo euruunitae alokal, eropari jik.
43008036	Ani kikilacak iyes Lokoku ka Akuj, ikilacakin iyes kire.
43008037	Ayeni ayoŋ atemar irae iyes ŋiletok ka Aburaam; nai iwarito bo iyes akiar ayoŋ, anerae nyelomarito ŋakiro kaŋ tooma kus.
43008038	Erworo ayoŋ ŋuna adau Papa kaŋ akitoodikin ayoŋ, iyes daŋ kitiyata ŋuna idaut akiirar aneni a papa kus.”
43008039	Toboŋokis ikes Yesu temasi, “Ikirae isua ŋidwe ka Aburaam!” Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Kerae kire toraakas iyes ŋidwe ka Aburaam, kitiyato iyes daŋ ŋiticisyo ŋulu etiyae iŋes.
43008040	Ŋuna daadaŋ adau ayoŋ akitiya erae alimokin iyes ŋuna a kire ŋuna abu ayoŋ eira aneni ka Akuj; nai iwarito bo iyes akiar ayoŋ. Pa ekote ŋuna etiyae Aburaam nen.
43008041	Itiyaete iyes ŋuna etiyae papa kus.” Tolimokis ikes Yesu temasi, “Pa aponi ikiuruun isua alotooma elomi; Akuj bon erae Papa kosi.”
43008042	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Kerae torae Akuj Papa kus, kikiminasi iyes ayoŋ, anerae abunit ayoŋ aneni ka Akuj. Pa abunit ayoŋ aŋuna kaŋ, nai iŋes ekeyakuuni ayoŋ.
43008043	Kaanukiro ikipiyoritor iyes akiirar ŋuna erworo ayoŋ? Anerae iwounito iyes apupokin ŋakiro kaŋ.
43008044	Irae iyes ŋidwe a papa kus a Satan ka icamito iyes akiwuap ŋuna ecamit iŋes. Arae iŋes ekaaran ŋinapei anakisyakinet, ka nyikamunito iŋes ŋuna a kire, anerae emam ŋuna a kire aneni keŋ. Ani elimuni iŋes alyokonu, itiyae ŋuna erae ekeepite, anerae erae ekalyokonon ka erae papa ka alyokonu.
43008045	Nai erworo ayoŋ ŋuna a kire; ŋakiro ŋun, ikes iwounitotor iyes akinup ayoŋ.
43008046	Ŋae alokidiŋ kus epedori akitoodiun atemar asecit ayoŋ? Ani kerworo ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna a kire, nyo bo nai nyikinupitotor iyes ayoŋ?
43008047	Ŋini ebunit aneni ka Akuj epupi ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj; nai nyiponito iyes aneni ka Akuj, iŋes nyipupyoto ŋakiro ŋun.”
43008048	Kiŋita Ŋiyudayan Yesu temasi, “Pa nai ikiyookinit isua ikibala irae iyoŋ Esamaritanoit ka eyai ekipye neni kon a?”
43008049	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Emam ekipye aneni kaŋ; akerit ayoŋ Papa kaŋ, nai nyikikerito iyes ayoŋ.
43008050	Nyewarit ayoŋ bon akitopolooro; nai eyai epei ŋolo iwarit apolou kaŋ, iŋes etubi aŋuna kaŋ.
43008051	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋini iricakini ŋakiro kaŋ, nyetwani jik.”
43008052	Tolimokis Ŋiyudayan Yesu temasi, “Kire ikidau isua tokona aanyun atemar eyai ekipye neni kon. Abu Aburaam totwan, totwaka tari ŋikadwarak daŋ; nai ibala iyoŋ ebe ‘Ŋini iricakini ŋakiro kaŋ, nyetwani jik.’
43008053	Ipol mono iyoŋ akilo tari papaa kosi Aburaam, ŋolo abu totwan a? Ŋikadwarak daŋ, apotu totwaka! Itami mono iyoŋ atemar ŋae iyoŋ?”
43008054	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Ani ketopolooro ayoŋ bon, erae apolou kaŋ akoŋinait; Papa kaŋ eketopoloorit ayoŋ, iŋes ŋolopei ibasi iyes erae Akuj kus.
43008055	Nyiyenete iyes iŋes; ayoŋ bon ayeni iŋes. Kerae otema ayoŋ nyayeni iŋes, karuwor ayoŋ ŋolo alyokonon ikwa iyes. Nai ayeni ayoŋ iŋes, ka ericakinit ŋakiro keŋ.
43008056	Abu papaa kus Aburaam tolelyan, anerae ayeni atemar alosi iŋes aanyun akoloŋit ŋina abunio ayoŋ; abu kire toanyu, ido tolakar nooi.”
43008057	Kiŋita Ŋiyudayan Yesu temasi, “Eriŋa nyedolo ŋikonikaru tari ŋatomonikan, ianyunit iyoŋ Aburaam a?”
43008058	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, tari eriŋa Aburaam nyeuruuna, Arae Ayoŋ ŋolo Arae Ayoŋ!”
43008059	Kideput Ŋiyudayan ŋamoru ecamito acakya iŋes, nai abu Yesu toŋop, tosi alo Kai ka Akuj.
43009001	Ani eriŋa Yesu elosi alorot, kiŋolik iŋes ekile ŋolo edounitoe emudukana.
43009002	Kiŋita ŋikasyomak keŋ iŋes temasi, “Eketataman, ŋae esecit, ekile lo kori ŋikauruunak keŋ, idounitere iŋes emudukana?”
43009003	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyesecit ekile lo kori nyesecito ŋikauruunak keŋ. Erae amuduko keŋ ŋinakisileereunet apedor ŋina ka Akuj aneni keŋ.
43009004	Itemokino iwon etiyata ŋiticisyo ŋulu a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ eriŋa erae apaaran; ebunit akiryonut ŋina ka akuwar, ŋina nyepedorya idiotuŋanan akitiya.
43009005	Ani ca eriŋa ayoŋ ayai nakwap, Arae Ayoŋ akica ŋina ka akwap.”
43009006	Kedau akirwor ŋun, abu kimwaak ŋakimul kwap, tomunau ecoto edio a ŋakimul, kiwosak nakonyen ke emuduk.
43009007	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ape kilota ŋakonyen kon anabwal a ŋina a Siloam” (apolou keŋ atemar “Iyakitae”). Tolot iŋes, kilota, toboŋu ekienyi.
43009008	Apotu ŋikidunyet ka ŋituŋa ŋulu sek eteete iŋes ilipanar temasi, “Okoe, meere mono ekile lo ŋolo sek iboiyonokin epeiwae nen, kilipanar a?”
43009009	Temasi ŋice, “Kire, erae iŋes!” Tobas ŋice, “Meere iŋes, ikwaan erae akikwaan.” Nai tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Erae ro ayoŋ pei!”
43009010	Kiŋita ŋituŋa ŋul iŋes temasi, “Aa ro bo, akienyunete mono ŋakonikonyen ikwaani?”
43009011	Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Ekile ŋolo enyaritae Yesu amunauni ecoto, kiwosak nakonyen kaŋ, okolimok ayoŋ tema, ‘Ape nabwal ŋina a Siloam, kilota.’ Abu nai ayoŋ olot nabwal, elota, ido okienyu.”
43009012	Kiŋita ikes iŋes temasi, “Ai bo tokona eyai iŋes?” Toboŋok iŋes ikes tema, “Nyayeni ayoŋ!”
43009013	Apotu nai ŋituŋa ŋul yaasi ekile ŋolo sek amudukana neni a Ŋiparisayon.
43009014	Arae akoloŋit ŋina amunaunia Yesu ecoto kitaŋaleunio emuduk ŋina a Sabato.
43009015	Kiŋita nabo Ŋiparisayon ekile ŋol epite ŋolo kekienyunia. Tolimok nai iŋes ikes tema, “Abu iŋes kiwosak ecoto nakonyen kaŋ, olot ayoŋ elota ka akienyi tokona.”
43009016	Temasi Ŋiparisayon ŋice, “Nyebunit ekile ŋol aneni ka Akuj, anerae nyiricakinit iŋes ekisil ŋolo ka akoloŋit a ŋina a Sabato.” Nai temasi ŋice, “Okoe, ikokini mono ekile ŋolo erae ekasecan itiyae ŋakujuwuanisya ŋun ai?” Tosodi totyakatyakas ikes.
43009017	Kiŋita nabo Ŋiparisayon ekile ŋol temasi, “Itami tokona iyoŋ atemar ŋae ekile ŋolo ikitekienyuni iyoŋ?” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Erae iŋes ekadwaran.”
43009018	Nai apotu Ŋiyudayan nyenupa atemar kemudukana ekile ŋol, ido ekienyi tokona, akitodol neni anyarauniata ikes ŋikauruunak keŋ.
43009019	Kiŋita ikes ŋikauruunak temasi, “Erae mono logo lokoku kus a? Ibasi iyes ebe edounio iŋes emudukana. Ekokini bo iŋes ekienyuni ai?”
43009020	Toboŋokis ŋikauruunak keŋ ikes temasi, “Ikiyeni atemar erae iŋes lokoku kosi ka edounio iŋes emudukana.
43009021	Nai nyikiyeni isua epite ŋolo iteo tokona kori nyikiyeni daŋ ŋini kitekienyuni ŋakonyen keŋ. Kiŋita iŋes, anerae epol, epedori erwor bon.”
43009022	Alimunete ŋikauruunak keŋ ŋun aŋuna akeritotor ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan; anerae atukito sek Ŋiyudayan atemar, ŋini enupi ebe Yesu iŋes erae Kristo, ikisaryo alosinagoga.
43009023	Ŋakiro ŋun, ikes alimunioto ŋikauruunak atemar, “Epol iŋes, kiŋita!”
43009024	Tonyarata ikes nabo ŋolo sek amudukana, tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Kikoŋ alokiŋaren Akuj atemar ilimuni iyoŋ ŋuna a kire; ikiyeni isua atemar ekasecan ekile ŋolo kikitekienyuni iyoŋ.”
43009025	Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ani kerae iŋes ekasecan, nyayeni ayoŋ ŋun, nai ayeni apeikirot: amudukana sek ayoŋ, nai tokona akienyi!”
43009026	Kiŋita nabo ŋulupeituŋa iŋes temasi, “Ikikokini mono iŋes iyoŋ ai? Etekienyuni mono iŋes ŋakonyen kon ikwaani?”
43009027	Toboŋok ekile ŋol ikes tema, “Adau ayoŋ alimokin iyes tete sek, nai ipotu towout akiirar. Nyo icamitotor akiirar nabo? Kori ca icamito iyes daŋ aruwor ŋikasyomak keŋ?”
43009028	Kisoloto ikes iŋes temasi, “Iyoŋ irae ekasyoman keŋ, nai isua ikirae ŋikasyomak a Moses.
43009029	Ikiyeni isua atemar abu koloŋ Akuj kirwor neni a Moses, nai ŋol, nyikiyeni tari neni ebunitor!”
43009030	Toboŋok ekile ŋol ikes tema, “Okoe eumokina nu! Ibasi iyes nyiyenete neni ebunitor, nai adau iŋes akitekienyun ŋakaakonyen!
43009031	Ikiyeni iwon atemar nyepupi Akuj ŋikasecak, epupi ŋulu ekerito iŋes bon ka ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna ecamit iŋes ikes kitiyata.
43009032	Ŋinapei koloŋ kisyakinia akwap, emam ituŋanan eirar, ebala etekienyu idiotuŋanan ice ŋini idounitoe emudukana.
43009033	Kerae nyebunit ekile ŋol aneni ka Akuj, kemam idiobore itiyakini iŋes.”
43009034	Tolimokis ŋituŋa ŋul iŋes temasi, “Ikidounitoe iyoŋ irae ekasecan ka itusubuna iyoŋ eketataman isua a?” Kiritasi nai ikes iŋes alosinagoga.
43009035	Ani iirari Yesu atemar kiritar ekile ŋol, tolot kiwara iŋes, kiŋit tema, “Inup iyoŋ Lokoku a Ituŋanan a?”
43009036	Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ŋae mono iŋes, ikotere onup iŋes?”
43009037	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Iberakin iyoŋ akiŋolikin iŋes ka iŋes ŋolopei irworotor iyoŋ!”
43009038	Tema nai ekile ŋol, “Ekapolon! Anup!” Kisyak aryedik, kilip neni a Yesu.
43009039	Tolimu nai Yesu tema, “Abunit ayoŋ nakwap atubonokin, ikotere ŋulu sek emudukaka ekienyunete, ido ŋulu sek ekienyete tomudukakyata.”
43009040	Kiirasi Ŋiparisayon ŋice ŋulu aya diyete keŋ ŋakiro ŋun, kiŋita ikes Yesu temasi, “Ibala tokona iyoŋ ikimudukaka isua daŋ a?”
43009041	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Kerae tomudukaka iyes, kemam iyes asecit; nai aŋuna irworotor atemar ‘Ikite,’ irubakinito iyes irae ŋikasecak.”
43010001	Tolimu Yesu tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ituŋanan ŋini nyelomari nanok ŋina a ŋamesekin alopuke, nai todoka tooma alowae ke ece, erae ituŋanan ŋin ekokolan ka ekademanaran.
43010002	Nai ituŋanan ŋini elomari alopuke a ŋolo ka anok, erae iŋes kire ekeyokon ŋolo a ŋamesekin.
43010003	Ebuni eketen ŋolo ke epuke aŋaar iŋes, iirarete ŋamesekin etoil keŋ, enyarae iŋes ŋamesekin keŋ a ŋirorwa kec, tomia ikes kiŋa.
43010004	Ani keyau iŋes ŋamesekin keŋ daadaŋ kiŋa, iŋarenikini iŋes ikes, ido kiwuapakis ŋamesekin iŋes, anerae eyenete ikes etoil keŋ.
43010005	Nyiwuapakinete ikes ituŋanan ŋini egelaana, nai esurorosi nariet, anerae nyeyenete ikes ŋitoilon a ŋituŋa a ŋulu gelayek.”
43010006	Abu Yesu tolimok ikes akitadapet ŋin, nai nyeyenut ikes ŋuna erworo iŋes.
43010007	Aŋun, tolimok Yesu ikes nabo tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, Arae Ayoŋ epuke ŋolo a ŋamesekin.
43010008	Ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu apote eriŋa ayoŋ, arae ikes ŋikokolak ka ŋikademanarak; nai nyiirara ŋamesekin ŋakiro kec.
43010009	Arae Ayoŋ epuke; ituŋanan ŋini elomuni kitoru neni kaŋ, eiun iŋes; elomuni iŋes tooma ka elomari kiŋa, toryamu akimuj.
43010010	Elomuni ekokolan akoko bon, akiar ka akinyasun ŋamesekin; nai abunit ayoŋ ainakin ikes akiyar, akiyar ŋina ka akileile.
43010011	“Arae Ayoŋ ekeyokon ŋolo ajokan. Ejali ekeyokon ŋolo ajokan akeekiyar aŋuna a ŋamesekin keŋ.
43010012	Ituŋanan ŋini etacio, nyerae iŋes ekeyokon; ka nyerae ŋamesekin ŋuna keŋ; ani kiŋolik iŋes epeot ebunit, eesikini ŋamesekin, toem; toporok nai epeot ŋamesekin, kielielaa.
43010013	Eemi iŋes, anerae erae iŋes etacat ka nyemitakinit ŋamesekin.
43010014	Arae Ayoŋ ekeyokon ŋolo ajokan. Ayeni ayoŋ ŋamesekin kaŋ ka akayenete ikes ayoŋ,
43010015	ikwapei akayenia ayoŋ Papa kaŋ ka ayeni ayoŋ daŋ iŋes. Ajali ayoŋ akiyar kaŋ aŋuna a ŋamesekin.
43010016	Eyakasi ŋamesekin kaŋ ŋace ŋuna emam alosipan a lo; itemokino ayoŋ ocun ikes daŋ ka iirarete ikes etoil kaŋ; toruworos nai ikes epeisipan ŋolo ke epeikeyokon.
43010017	“Akamina ayoŋ Papa kaŋ, anerae ajalit akiyar kaŋ oyeni atemar aryamuni nabo.
43010018	Emam ituŋanan ŋini akademari ayoŋ akiyar kaŋ, nai ajalit ayoŋ iŋes anacamit kaŋ a elope. Ayakar ayoŋ apedor ŋina jalet iŋes ka ayakar ayoŋ apedor ŋina ryamunet iŋes nabo. Erae ŋun ŋuna ekecikak Papa kaŋ ayoŋ akitiya.”
43010019	Totyakatyakas Ŋiyudayan nabo aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun.
43010020	Temasi ŋulu alalak, “Eyai ekipye neni keŋ! Kiruma ŋikerep iŋes! Nyo epupere ŋakiro keŋ?”
43010021	Nai temasi ŋice, “Kire, nyepedori ituŋanan ŋini eyai ekipye neni keŋ, erwor ikona. Epedori ekipye akitekienyun emudukanot a?”
43010022	Ani edoli ŋirwa ŋulu a ŋasuban a ŋuna eitunitere Akoloŋit ŋina eterereŋere Akai ka Akuj alo Yerusalem, torae akwap alilim.
43010023	Kitor Yesu Kai ka Akuj, lobarasan a Solomon.
43010024	Tocunakinos Ŋiyudayan kirikaut Yesu temasi, “Ikitaŋayaŋayat mono iyoŋ isua tari ori? Ani kirae iyoŋ Kristo, tolimokinae ilereete.”
43010025	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Abu ayoŋ okolimok iyes, nai nyinupito. Ŋiticisyo ŋulu etiyae ayoŋ alokiro a Papa kaŋ, ikes eketeyenunito ayoŋ.
43010026	Nai nyinupito iyes, anerae meere iyes ŋamesekin kaŋ.
43010027	Epupete ŋamesekin kaŋ ekaatoil, ayeni ayoŋ ikes ka ekewuapito ayoŋ.
43010028	Ainakini ayoŋ ikes akiyar ŋina nyedaun, nyebukorosi ikes jik, emam daŋ ŋini ekopori ikes anakan kaŋ.
43010029	Papa kaŋ, ŋolo akainakini ayoŋ, epol iŋes akilo daadaŋ, emam idiotuŋanan ŋini epedori akopor ikes anakan a Papa.
43010030	Ikirae ayoŋ ka Papa ŋipei.”
43010031	Kideput nabo Ŋiyudayan ŋamoru akimasya Yesu.
43010032	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Eketoodik ayoŋ iyes ŋiticisyo ŋulu alalak ŋulu ajokak, ŋulu eponito aneni a Papa. Ali aloticisyo a ŋul icamitotor iyes akimasya ayoŋ a ŋamoru?”
43010033	Toboŋokis Ŋiyudayan iŋes temasi, “Meere aŋuna ke ediotic a ŋolo ajokan ikimasere isua iyoŋ, nai aŋuna iyanyia iyoŋ Akuj! Irae iyoŋ ituŋanan, nyo nai ibaakar iyoŋ ikwaanasi ka Akuj!”
43010034	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Igiritae Lokisila kus ebe ebala Akuj, ‘Irae iyes ŋakujo.’
43010035	(Ikiyeni atemar iyookino Ŋakigireta kire;) ido abu Akuj tonyara ŋituŋa ŋulu alimokinio ŋakiro keŋ, ŋakujo.
43010036	Ani nai kikote nen, ikokinete iyes ai ibasi, ‘Iyanyi iyoŋ Akuj!’ anerae abu ayoŋ olimu atemar, ‘Arae Ayoŋ Lokoku ka Akuj,’ ikwapei araakar ayoŋ abu Akuj okotyaku ekeyakuu nakwap.
43010037	Ani pa ketiyae ayoŋ ŋiticisyo ŋulu a Papa kaŋ, nyikinupa ayoŋ.
43010038	Nai ani ketiyae ayoŋ ikes, tonupa ikes erae tari pa kikinupito ayoŋ; ikotere toyenuniata ayenunet apei jik atemar, eyai Papa tooma kaŋ ka ayai ayoŋ tooma Papa.”
43010039	Kikatakis nabo ikes akikamun iŋes, nai abu tobucar aneni kec.
43010040	Tolot nabo Yesu ekekwaye aŋolol Yorodan, neni sek ebatisaa Yoana ŋituŋa; kiboi aina.
43010041	Potu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak neni keŋ temasi, “Nyitiya Yoana adiokujuwuanut, nai ŋuna daadaŋ abu iŋes kirwor aŋuna ke ekile a lo, erae ŋuna a kire.”
43010042	Tonupa ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak iŋes aina.
43011001	Todyakakin ecekile ŋolo anyaritae Lasaro ŋolo alo Betania, alore a Maria ka nakaato keŋ Marita.
43011002	(Arae Maria na ŋina eosakini akimyet ŋina akukunyon nakejen a Yesu, ido toninaiya a ŋitim keŋ. Lokaato keŋ Lasaro iŋes adyaka).
43011003	Apotu ŋakaitotoi keŋ kiyakiyasi ŋakiro neni a Yesu temasi, “Ekapolon, edyak lokone kon!”
43011004	Ani iirari Yesu ŋakiro ŋun, tolimu tema, “Ekaku, nyerae edeke ŋol ŋolo aaran, nai erae ŋolo itoodiuni apolou ŋina ka Akuj ka ikotere etakanunia apolou ŋina a Lokoku ka Akuj.”
43011005	Amina Yesu Marita ka Maria ta lokaato kec Lasaro.
43011006	Kedau iŋes tari akiirar atemar edyak Lasaro, kiriya nabo ŋirwa ŋiarei aneni alimokinere.
43011007	Ani ekaku, tolimok ŋikasyomak keŋ tema, “Apena oboŋosi Yudeya.”
43011008	Toboŋokis ŋikasyomak temasi, “Eketataman, ŋirwa ŋulupei ŋoon lu, acamito Ŋiyudayan akimas iyoŋ a ŋamoru, icamit nabo iyoŋ aboŋor inaa a?”
43011009	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyerae mono ŋisaae ŋulu ka apaaran ŋitomon ka ŋiarei a? Ani elosi ituŋanan naparan, nyigukini, anerae ite iŋes akica ŋina ka akwap a na.
43011010	Ani elosi ituŋanan nakwaare, igukini, anerae emam akica aneni keŋ.”
43011011	Tolimok nabo ikes tema, “Ejotoe lokone yok Lasaro, alosi ayoŋ akitekienyun iŋes.”
43011012	Tolimokis ŋikasyomak iŋes temasi, “Ani kejotoe iŋes, Ekapolon, eŋaleuni.”
43011013	Erworo Yesu atemar atwana Lasaro, nai abasi ikes kori ejotoe kire.
43011014	Aŋun, kisileerek Yesu ikes tema, “Adau Lasaro atwanare,
43011015	nai aŋuna kus, alakara ayoŋ aŋuna pa ikirukitor ayoŋ ka iŋes, ikotere iyes inupyata. Nai apena oanyutu iŋes.”
43011016	Abu Tomas (ŋolo anyaritae Emuut) tolimok ŋikasyomak ŋuluce tema, “Apena iwon daŋ orukosi ka Eketataman, otwaka kaapei.”
43011017	Ani edoluni Yesu, toryamu Lasaro kenuki ka kelunyar daŋ ŋirwa ŋiomwon.
43011018	Aapikina Betania ka Yerusalem, arae ŋakilomitae ŋauni,
43011019	ido aponito Ŋiyudayan akimaima Marita ka Maria aŋuna ka atwanare a lokaato kec.
43011020	Ani iirari Marita atemar ebunit Yesu, tolot akisiryam iŋes, nai edoŋit Maria kai.
43011021	Tolimok Marita Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, kerae toyai iyoŋ nege, pa ketwanit lokaato kaŋ.
43011022	Nai tokona daŋ ayeni atemar, epedori Akuj ainakin iyoŋ ibore daadaŋ ŋini iŋita iyoŋ.”
43011023	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Eyaruni lokaato kon!”
43011024	Tolimok Marita iŋes tema, “Ayeni ayoŋ atemar iteyarunio iŋes Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon.”
43011025	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Arae Ayoŋ ayarun ka akiyar, ŋinituŋanan akanupi ayoŋ, eyaruni tari ketwana daŋ.
43011026	Nabo ŋini eyari, okonupite ayoŋ, nyetwani jik. Inupit iyoŋ nu a?”
43011027	Tolimok Marita iŋes tema, “Ee, Ekapolon, anup ayoŋ atemar irae iyoŋ Kristo, Lokoku ka Akuj, ŋolo etemokino bu nakwap.”
43011028	Ani kedau Marita alimun ŋun, tolot neni a nakaato keŋ Maria, tolimok aneni keŋ bon tema, “Eyai Eketataman nege, ikinyarit iyoŋ.”
43011029	Ani iirari Maria ŋakiro ŋun, tonyou atipei, tolot neni a Yesu.
43011030	(Ariŋa Yesu nyelomuna lore, ayai neni kisiryamia Marita iŋes.)
43011031	Ani iŋolikinete Ŋiyudayan ŋulu emaimayete Maria alokai iŋes enyouni atipei, totupakis iŋes ebasi kori elosi iŋes nalyal akigworo.
43011032	Todol nai Maria neni ayai Yesu, toryedik alokiŋaren keŋ, tolimok iŋes tema, “Okoe Ekapolon, kerae toyai iyoŋ nege, pa ketwanit lokaato kaŋ.”
43011033	Ani iŋolikini Yesu Maria igworo ka igworosi tari Ŋiyudayan ŋulu arukito ka iŋes, tonomosi iŋes ŋakiro etau, kiyaloloŋ,
43011034	kiŋit ikes tema, “Ai inukakis iyes iŋes?” Tolimokis ikes iŋes temasi, “Ekapolon, bua toanyu.”
43011035	Kigwor Yesu.
43011036	Temasi Ŋiyudayan, “Kiŋolikisi, kemina iŋes Lasaro!”
43011037	Nai temasi ŋice, “Okoe, abu iŋes kitekienyu emudukanot! Pa mono kepedorit iŋes akiretakin atwanare a Lasaro a?”
43011038	Tolot nai Yesu nalyal emarani ekeetau nooi. Arae alyal aturukan, togolokinitetei amoru lopuke.
43011039	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Tolemasi amoru alopuke.” Tolimok Marita, nakaato keŋ ke ekatwan Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, abosu tokona iŋes, anerae adau akiriya analyal ŋirwa ŋiomwon.”
43011040	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Pa akalimokinit ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar ani kinup, iŋolikini apolou ŋina ka Akuj a?”
43011041	Tolemasi nai ikes amoru analyal. Kireo Yesu kidiama nakuj tema, “Alakara ayoŋ neni kon Papa, anerae ikiira iyoŋ ayoŋ.
43011042	Ayeni ayoŋ atemar ikiiranari iyoŋ ayoŋ jwi jwi; nai alimunit ayoŋ ŋakiro nu, ikotere tonupyata ŋituŋa lu ŋulu ewuasi a nege daadaŋ atemar, iyoŋ kire ikiyakit ayoŋ.”
43011043	Kedau alimun ŋun, tocelu nooi tema, “Lasaro! Tolomu kiŋa!”
43011044	Tolomu ekatwan ŋol analyal, ilogilogakinitae ŋanaŋgae ŋuna nuket nakejen ka nakan keŋ; ereet daŋ aenen. Tolimok nai Yesu ikes tema, “Tolacasi ŋanaŋgae, toesikis tolot.”
43011045	Aŋun, apotu Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak ŋulu arukunete ka Maria, ido kiŋolikis ŋuna etiyae Yesu, tonupa iŋes.
43011046	Nai apotu ŋice alokidiŋ kec toloto neni a Ŋiparisayon, tolimokis ŋuna abu Yesu kitiya.
43011047	Tocunakinos nai ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Ŋiparisayon Natukot kec temasi, “Okoe, ikikokini ai? Kire itiyae ekile lo ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna alalak.
43011048	Ani kikilakak iwon iŋes itiyae jik ikona, epote ŋituŋa daadaŋ akiwuapakin iŋes, potu nai Ŋiromanin akinyasun Akai ka Akuj kaapei ka akwap yok.”
43011049	Nai abu epei alokidiŋ kec ŋolo anyaritae Kaipa, ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi alokaru a ŋol tema, “Emam ibore iyenete iyes ipei daŋ!
43011050	Nyiyenete iyes atemar ejok epeikile totwan aŋuna a ŋituŋa akilo abukor akwap daadaŋ a?”
43011051	Nyelimuno iŋes ŋakiro nu erae ŋuna keŋ, nai aŋuna araakar iŋes Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi alokaru a ŋol, adwari iŋes atemar etwani Yesu aŋuna ka akwap a ŋina a Ŋiyudayan.
43011052	Meere aŋuna ka akwap a ŋin bon, nai ikotere ecunakini iwapei ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj, ŋulu ielara.
43011053	Ameun akoloŋit ŋin, totukut ikes epite ŋoloaret Yesu.
43011054	Aŋun, nyitor nabo Yesu nakwap a Ŋiyudayan ileere, nai tolot nakwap ŋina aapi analoŋisat, lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Epuraim, kiboiyoto ka ŋikeekasyomak aina.
43011055	Aapuunito ŋasuban ŋuna a Paska. Aponito Yerusalem ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak alorerya akiteseguno, ikwapei icikakinitotor Ŋikisila, eriŋa nyedolo Paska.
43011056	Ewarito ikes Yesu, kirworos ewuasi alo Kai ka Akuj ebasi, “Anu itamete iyes? Ebuni iŋes nasuban kori mam?”
43011057	Aris nai ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Ŋiparisayon kicika ŋituŋa atemar, ani ŋini eyeni neni eyai Yesu, itemokino kitaanyu ikes, ikotere kikamunae iŋes.
43012001	Ani idoŋit ŋirwa ŋikanikapei todol Paska, bu Yesu Betania neni ayai Lasaro, ŋolo kebu Yesu kiteyaru alokatwak.
43012002	Kipokinoe iŋes akimuj ŋina ke eboŋ; arae Marita akori akimuj ka arae Lasaro epei a ŋulu aya lomesa kaapei ka Yesu.
43012003	Tolemu Maria akimyet ŋina akukunyon ŋina anyaritae Narido ŋina apol egyelit, kiwos ŋakejen a Yesu, ido kisuta a ŋitim keŋ; torebuwa akukunyu keŋ akai daadaŋ.
43012004	Nai abu Yuda Isikariot, epei alokasyomak a Yesu (ŋolo abu toruwor ekalukinon keŋ) tema,
43012005	“Nyo pa agyelarere akimyet ŋina akukunyon na a ŋidinari a ŋamiae a ŋauni ka inakinae lokulyak?”
43012006	Pa alimunit iŋes ŋun aŋuna esyonitotor iŋes ŋikulyak, nai aŋuna araakar ekokolan. Eŋadae iŋes ecwee ŋolo a ŋisiliŋa ka alemanari ŋisiliŋa ŋulu ewuakinitae tooma keŋ.
43012007	Tolimu Yesu tema, “Kimyekisi aberu na bon; etiyae iŋes nu ka aŋuna ka akoloŋit a ŋina akanukere ayoŋ.
43012008	Irukito iyes ka ŋikulyak jwi jwi, nai nyikiruki ayoŋ ka iyes jwi jwi.”
43012009	Ani eyenuni asepic ŋina a Ŋiyudayan atemar eyai Yesu Betania, potu ikes daadaŋ nen. Pa alosete ikes inaa aanyun Yesu bon, nai eitanito aanyun tari Lasaro ŋolo kebu Yesu kiteyaru alokatwak.
43012010	Aŋun, totukut ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok akiar Lasaro daŋ,
43012011	anerae ŋakiro ŋuna ka ayarun a Lasaro ikes aŋeritotor Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak ŋisacaradotin, ido apotu tonupa neni a Yesu.
43012012	Ani taparacu keŋ, kiira asepic ŋina a ŋituŋa a ŋulu aponito nasuban ŋuna a Paska atemar ebunit Yesu Yerusalem.
43012013	Apotu kigyenyut ŋaten ŋuna ke ekiŋol, toloto akisiryam iŋes ecelasi ebasi, “Osanna! Erereŋ ŋolo ebunit alokiro ke Ekapolon! Erereŋ Erwosit ŋolo a Isirael!”
43012014	Toryamu Yesu isigirya, todokak, ikwapei igiritere Nakigireta ebe,
43012015	“Nyikuryaketa ŋituŋa a Sion! Kiŋolikisi, ebunit Erwosit neni kus edokit itaok ŋini ka asigirya!”
43012016	Apaki ŋin, nyeyenut ŋikasyomak keŋ apolou ŋina a ŋakiro a nu, nai ani itopolooryo Yesu anayarun keŋ, totamut ikes atemar kigiritae ŋun Nakigireta aŋuna keŋ ka keponi kitiyakinae neni keŋ.
43012017	Aris ŋituŋa ŋulu arukito ka Yesu apaki ŋina anyaraa iŋes Lasaro analyal kiteyaru alokatwak, kiteyenut ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakin.
43012018	Arae ŋakiro ŋun ikes aponiata ŋituŋa toloto akisiryam Yesu, anerae aris kiirasi atemar etiya iŋes akujuwuanut.
43012019	Kirworikinos nai Ŋiparisayon make temasi, “Toanyuwasi tokona, emam idiobore ŋini ikipedori iwon akitiyakin. Kiŋolikisi! Ewuapakis ŋituŋa daadaŋ iŋes!”
43012020	Alotooma ŋituŋa ŋulu alosito akilip Yerusalem nasuban ŋuna apolok, ayakasi Ŋigirik daŋ ŋidi.
43012021	Toloto ikes neni a Pilipo (a ŋolo abunit alo Betesaida, anakwap a Galileya), tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Ekapolon, ikicamit isua aanyun Yesu!”
43012022	Tolot Pilipo tolimok Anderia ŋakiro ŋun, torukosi nai ikes kaapei tolimokis Yesu.
43012023	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Adolu tokona apaki ŋina itopoloorere Lokoku a Ituŋanan.
43012024	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, erubakini ekinyomit ŋolo ke emomwae erae epei, mati kedupakin nalup totwan; ani ketwana, torup nai tolalata.
43012025	Ituŋanan ŋini emina akiyar keŋ, itotwaniyari, nai ŋini ejali akiyar keŋ anakwap a na, eiuni ikotere akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
43012026	Ŋini itiyae etic kaŋ, itemokino ekewuapak ayoŋ; neni ayai ayoŋ, itemokino toyai iŋes daŋ; ŋini eruwor eketiyan kaŋ, ebuni Papa akitopoloor iŋes.
43012027	“Eryeba ekaatau iyaloloŋi nooi. Okoe, atemari ayoŋ ai? Atemari, Papa toiunae ayoŋ anapaki a na a? Nai arae aŋuna ka apaki a na abunio ayoŋ, ikotere onaikinia ŋican ŋulu ka apaki a na.
43012028	Papa, kitopoloo ekiro kon!” Kirworik nai etoil anakuj ebala, “Etopoloo ayoŋ iŋes ka etopoloori iŋes nabo.”
43012029	Apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu awuasi alodiye keŋ kiirasi etoil, temasi ŋice kori agirokinet, temasi ŋice, “Erwor emalaika neni keŋ!”
43012030	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Nyirworo etoil ŋol aŋuna kaŋ, nai erwor aŋuna kus.
43012031	Adol tokona apaki ŋina etubere ŋakiro ŋuna ka akwap a na; imasaryo tokona ekepukan ŋolo ka akwap a na.
43012032	Ani kedaun akikyaar ayoŋ kidiama anakwap, eriuni ŋituŋa daadaŋ neni kaŋ.”
43012033	(Alimuni iŋes ŋun akitoodiunia epite ŋolo etwania iŋes.)
43012034	Toboŋokis ŋituŋa temasi, “Igiritae Lokisila atemar, eropari Kristo jik. Ikokini nai iyoŋ ibala, itemokino Lokoku a Ituŋanan kikyaarae ai? Ŋae mono Lokoku a Ituŋanan ŋol?”
43012035	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Eyakaun akica ka iyes adiouriyen. Torubakisi ilosete eriŋa akica eyai, ikotere nyedolu akiryonut neni kus. Ituŋanan ŋini elosi anakiryonut, nyeyeni neni elosi.
43012036	Ani eriŋa iyakatar akica, tonupa akica, ikotere toruworos iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akica.”
43012037	Ani tari kitiya iŋes ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna alalak iteete ikes, nyenupa ikes iŋes.
43012038	Apotu nu kitiyakin, kiyookinotor ŋakiro ŋuna egirit Isaya ekadwaran ebala, “Ekapolon, ŋae idio ŋini abu tonup ŋakosikiro? Neni a ŋae abu Ekapolon kitoodik apedor keŋ?”
43012039	Aŋun, nyepedosi ikes akinup, anerae egirit nabo Isaya ebala,
43012040	“Etumudukan Akuj ŋakecekonyen ka etabaŋaan ikes, ikotere nyiŋolikis a ŋakonyen kec ka nyeyenut ŋatameta kec, nyeboŋut neni kaŋ, tosodi etaŋaleu ayoŋ ikes.”
43012041	Alimuni Isaya ŋakiro ŋun, anerae abu kiŋolik apolou a Yesu, kisyak nai akirwor aŋuna keŋ.
43012042	Tari kikote neni, apotu tari ŋikapolok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak tonupa Yesu. Nai aŋuna akeritotor ikes Ŋiparisayon, nyelimut ikes ŋakiro ŋun epupete ŋituŋa, ikotere nyiritar ikes alosinagoga.
43012043	Aminasi ikes akitopolooro alotuŋa akilo akitopolooro aneni ka Akuj.
43012044	Tocelu Yesu nooi tema, “Ŋini akanupi ayoŋ, anup iŋes tari ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, meere ayoŋ bon.
43012045	Ŋini ekeŋolik ayoŋ, eŋolik iŋes tari ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
43012046	Abu ayoŋ nakwap na arae akica, ikotere ŋini akanupi ayoŋ, nyidoŋ nakiryonut.
43012047	Ani kiira ituŋanan ŋakiro kaŋ nyiwuapak, nyatubokini ayoŋ iŋes. Pa abuni ayoŋ atubonokin ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap, nai aiun ikes.
43012048	Ŋinituŋanan akaŋeri ayoŋ, nyecamu ŋakiro kaŋ, eyakar iŋes ekatubon. Ŋakiro ŋuna erworo ayoŋ, ikes eruworosi ekatubon keŋ Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon.
43012049	Anerae nyerworo ayoŋ aŋuna ka apedor kaŋ bon, erae Papa ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, iŋes ekecikakinit ŋakiro ŋuna itemokino olimu ka erwor.
43012050	Ayeni ayoŋ atemar akiciket keŋ iŋes eyauni lotuŋa akiyar ŋina nyedaun. Ŋuna alimuni ayoŋ, alimuni alopite a ŋolo akalimokinitor Papa.”
43013001	Ani eapuuni apaki ŋina a ŋasuban a Paska, toanyu Yesu atemar kedol apaki ŋina esikinet akwap na, toboŋo neni a Papa. Amina jwi jwi Yesu ŋulu keŋ ŋulu ayakasi nakwap, akitodol tari natwanare.
43013002	Ani imujete ikes eboŋ, keris Satan, aŋuna ka alukinio Yesu, keloma lotau a Yuda Isikariot, a ŋolo arae lokoku a Simoni.
43013003	Ayeni Yesu atemar abu Papa kiwuak ŋiboro daadaŋ nakan keŋ; ayeni daŋ iŋes atemar abuni aneni ka Akuj, ido eboŋori nabo nenipei keŋ.
43013004	Tonyou nai Yesu alomesa, tolaca ekaaso, toenik ataulo nacir.
43013005	Tobukok ŋakipi nakalaat, kisyak akilot ŋakejen a ŋikasyomak, toninaiya ka ataulo a ŋina anapit iŋes anacir.
43013006	Ani edoluni iŋes neni a Simoni Petero, kiŋit Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, iyoŋ ilotari ŋakejen kaŋ a?”
43013007	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyiyeni iyoŋ tokona ŋuna etiyae ayoŋ, nai ibuni iyoŋ ayenun ekaku.”
43013008	Tolimok Petero Yesu tema, “Mam jik nyilotari iyoŋ ŋakaakejen!” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ani pa kelota ayoŋ ŋakejen kon, nyikiruki iyoŋ ka ayoŋ nabo.”
43013009	Tolimok Simoni Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, ani kikote neni, meere ŋakaakejen bon, ŋakan ka akou daŋ!”
43013010	Tolimu Yesu tema, “Ŋini adau akiloŋari, eseg iŋes; nyiitanit akiloŋa nabo, mati ŋakejen bon. Isegak iyes, nai meere daadaŋ.”
43013011	(Anerae ayeni Yesu ŋini alukinon iŋes; iŋes alimunio atemar, “Isegak iyes, nai meere daadaŋ.” )
43013012	Kedau Yesu akilotar ŋakejen kec, tonap ekaaso keŋ, toboŋo lomesa. Kiŋit ikes tema, “Iyenete iyes apolou a ŋuna adau ayoŋ akitiya neni kus a?
43013013	Ikinyarito iyes ayoŋ Eketataman ka Ekapolon. Ee, iyookinito iyes, anerae arae kire ayoŋ.
43013014	Ikwapei elotarya ayoŋ ŋolo arae Ekapolon ka Eketataman ŋakejen kus, itemokino iyes daŋ kilosete ŋakejen a ŋuluce.
43013015	Adau ayoŋ ainakin iyes akitaanyikinet, ikotere kitiyata iyes daŋ ikwaŋina adaunia ayoŋ akitiya neni kus.
43013016	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, emam epito ŋolo epol akilo ekeekapolon, nabo daŋ emam ekiyakitono ŋolo epol akilo ŋolo iyakit iŋes.
43013017	Ani kiyenete iyes nu, irereŋ iyes erae kitiyata nu.
43013018	Nyerworo ayoŋ aŋuna kus a daadaŋ, ayeni ŋulu adau ayoŋ aseun; nai ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta ebe, ‘Abu ituŋanan ŋini ikimori ka ayoŋ okoluki ayoŋ.’
43013019	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes nugu eriŋa nyetakanuna, ikotere ani etakanunete, tonupyata atemar, ‘Arae Ayoŋ ŋolo Arae Ayoŋ!’
43013020	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋini ijauni ituŋanan ŋini eyakit ayoŋ, ekejauni ayoŋ, nabo ituŋanan ŋini ekejauni ayoŋ, ijauni ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.”
43013021	Kedau Yesu alimun ŋun, kiyaloloŋ nooi alotau keŋ, kiteyenu ŋakiro nu pa imunonit tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ebuni ipei alokidiŋ kus alukin ayoŋ.”
43013022	Kiŋolyanakinos ŋikeekasyomak make eumokinito, pa ayenete ŋolo erworor Yesu.
43013023	Eboi epeikasyoman, ŋolo amina iŋes, alodiyete keŋ.
43013024	Aŋun, toketu Simoni Petero ekasyoman ŋol tema, “Kiŋit iŋes ŋini irworor iŋes?”
43013025	Tosodi ekasyoman ŋol kiyoto diyete Yesu, kiŋit iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ŋae ŋini irworor iyoŋ?”
43013026	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ekile ŋol, iŋes ŋolo ainakini ayoŋ amugati kelumok loboka.” Kedau Yesu akilumokin, inak Yuda, lokoku a Simoni Isikariot.
43013027	Ani kedau Yuda akinyam amugati, toloma Satan lotau keŋ. Tolimok Yesu Yuda tema, “Kiburuburak akitiya ibore ŋini ilosi akitiya!”
43013028	Amam alokidiŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu eboiyete alomesa ŋini ayeni apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna erworo iŋes.
43013029	Atamete ŋice atemar kori aŋina eŋadaa Yuda ecwee ŋolo a ŋisiliŋa, alimokinit Yesu iŋes alosit agyelun ŋiboro ŋulu eitanitae aŋuna a ŋasuban. Abasi ŋice kori kelimokini Yesu iŋes ainar ŋikulyak idiobore.
43013030	Kedau Yuda akijaar amugati, toloma kiŋa atipei. Arae akuwar akwap.
43013031	Keloma Yuda kiŋa, tema Yesu, “Tokona, etopoloor Lokoku a Ituŋanan, ka etopoloor Akuj aŋuna keŋ.
43013032	Ani nai kitopoloor Akuj aŋuna keŋ, itopoloori Akuj daŋ Lokoku a Ituŋanan ka apolou keŋ ka alope, kitopoloo iŋes atipei.
43013033	Ŋikaadwe, eriŋa ayoŋ ikirukit ka iyes adiouriyen. Ipote iyes akiwar ayoŋ, nai ikwapei abunio ayoŋ olimokinia Ŋiyudayan, akalimokini iyes daŋ tokona atemar, ‘Nyipedorete iyes aponare neni alosi ayoŋ.’
43013034	Akainakini tokona akiciket ŋina kitete: tominin make; ikwaŋina akaminar ayoŋ iyes, iyes daŋ tominin make.
43013035	Ani kitiyata iyes ikoŋina, eyenunete ŋituŋa atemar irae iyes ŋikasyomak kaŋ, erae kiminin iyes make.”
43013036	Kiŋit Simoni Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, ai ilosi iyoŋ?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyikitupakini iyoŋ ayoŋ neni alosi tokona, nai ikitupuni iyoŋ ayoŋ ekaku.”
43013037	Kiŋit nabo Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, kaanukiro nyakatupakinia ayoŋ iyoŋ tokona? Ajali ayoŋ akiyar kaŋ aŋuna kon.”
43013038	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ijali kire iyoŋ akiyar kon aŋuna kaŋ a? Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, eriŋa ekokoroit nyeruuno, ipegi iyoŋ ŋapeget ŋauni atemar ikiyeni ayoŋ.”
43014001	“Nyiyaloloŋo, tonupa Akuj, tonupae ayoŋ daŋ.
43014002	Elalak ŋagulei alotooma akai a Papa kaŋ. Kerae nyikote neni, pa kakalimokinit ayoŋ iyes atemar alosi ayoŋ akitemokin akibois aŋuna kus.
43014003	Ani kalot ayoŋ akitemokin akibois aŋuna kus, aboŋuni nai ayoŋ okocuna iyes neni kaŋ, ikotere kiboiyoto iyes daŋ aneni ayai ayoŋ.
43014004	Iyenete iyes erot ŋolo elosi neni alosi ayoŋ.”
43014005	Kiŋit Tomas Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, nyikiyeni isua neni ilosi iyoŋ, ikianyuni nai isua erot ŋol ikwaani?”
43014006	Tolimok Yesu Tomas tema, “Arae Ayoŋ erot, Arae ŋuna a kire ka Arae akiyar; nyepedori ituŋanan abunore neni a Papa, mati kitoru neni kaŋ.
43014007	Ikwaŋina tokona ikiyeniata iyes ayoŋ, iyenunete Papa kaŋ daŋ; ameun tokona, iyenete iyes iŋes ka ianyut daŋ.”
43014008	Tolimok Pilipo Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, kitoodikinae isua Papa, ido kimwonikinetei nai isua.”
43014009	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Pilipo, ikirukit iyoŋ ka ayoŋ ŋinapei, nai eriŋa iyoŋ nyeyenuna ayoŋ a? Ŋini adau aanyun ayoŋ, aanyu Papa kaŋ daŋ, kaanukiro nai ibaakar iyoŋ, ‘Kitoodikinae isua Papa?’
43014010	Nyinupit iyoŋ atemar ayai ayoŋ tooma Papa ka eyai iŋes tooma kaŋ a? Ŋuna daadaŋ erworo ayoŋ nyerworo ka apedor kaŋ bon, nai Papa ŋolo iboi alotooma kaŋ, iŋes itiyae ŋiticisyo keŋ.
43014011	Tonupae ayoŋ atemar ayai ayoŋ tooma Papa ka eyai Papa tooma kaŋ. Ani kemam, tonupae ayoŋ aŋuna a ŋiticisyo a ŋulu etiyae ayoŋ.
43014012	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ŋini akanupi ayoŋ, itiyae daŋ ŋiticisyo ŋulu etiyae ayoŋ; itiyae iŋes ŋiticisyo ŋulu iloito tari ŋulu kaŋ, anerae aboŋori ayoŋ neni a Papa.
43014013	Ŋinibore daadaŋ iŋisete iyes alokiro kaŋ, etiyakini ayoŋ, ikotere kitopolooroe Papa aneni a Lokoku.
43014014	Ŋinibore ikiŋisete iyes ayoŋ alokiro kaŋ, etiyakini ayoŋ.
43014015	“Ani kikiminasi iyes ayoŋ, iricakinete ŋakiciketa kaŋ.
43014016	Elipi ayoŋ Papa, ikiinakini iŋes iyes ekeŋarakiniton ece ŋolo irukyoto iyes jik.
43014017	Erae iŋes Etau ŋolo irworo ŋuna a kire ŋuna ka Akuj. Nyepedori akwap akijaun iŋes, anerae nyite akwap iŋes, kori nyeyeni iŋes. Iyenete iyes iŋes, anerae iboiyuni iŋes neni kus ka eyakaun iŋes tooma kus.
43014018	“Nyakaesikini ayoŋ iyes make ikokiyanito, aboŋuni ayoŋ neni kus.
43014019	Apaki adio cicinyekeŋolikinete nabo ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a na, nai ikiŋolikinete iyes ayoŋ ka aŋuna ayarya ayoŋ, iyarete iyes daŋ.
43014020	Akoloŋit ŋin, ipote iyes aanyun atemar ayai ayoŋ tooma Papa kaŋ, iyakasi iyes tooma kaŋ ka ayai ayoŋ tooma kus.
43014021	“Ŋini ecamunit ŋakiciketa kaŋ, kiricakinite, iŋes akamina ayoŋ. Ŋini akamina ayoŋ, iŋes eminakini Papa kaŋ; aminakini ayoŋ daŋ iŋes ka esileereun neni keŋ.”
43014022	Abu Yuda (meere Yuda Isikariot) kiŋit Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, ikokini iyoŋ isileereun neni kosi, nai meere lotuŋa ŋulu ka akwap ai?”
43014023	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ŋinituŋanan akamina ayoŋ, iricakini ŋakiro kaŋ. Eminakini Papa kaŋ iŋes ka ikiponi isua neni keŋ, eboiyoto ka iŋes.
43014024	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini nyakamina ayoŋ, nyiricakini ŋakiro kaŋ. Ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ipupete iyes, meere ŋuna kaŋ, nai erae ŋuna a Papa a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
43014025	“Akalimok ayoŋ iyes ŋakiro ŋun, eriŋa ayoŋ ikirukit ka iyes.
43014026	Ebuni nai ekeŋarakiniton, Etau ŋolo Asegan, ŋolo iyakuuni Papa alokiro kaŋ, ikitatam iyes ŋakiro daadaŋ ka ikitatamunite iyes ŋuna daadaŋ adau ayoŋ alimokin iyes.
43014027	“Ekemyekinia ayoŋ iyes ekisil; ekisil kaŋ iŋes akainakini iyes, nyikoni iŋes ekisil ŋolo ka akwap. Nyiyaloloŋo kori nyikibul!
43014028	Iirasi iyes ŋuna akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, ‘Alosi ayoŋ, nai aboŋuni neni kus.’ Kerae itominasi iyes ayoŋ kire, kilelyana, anerae alosi ayoŋ neni a Papa a ŋolo epol akilo ayoŋ.
43014029	Akalimok tokona ayoŋ iyes ŋakiro nu, eriŋa ikes nyetakanuna, ikotere ani ŋina etakanuniata, tonupa.
43014030	Nyikirworo ayoŋ ka iyes ekaoyan, anerae ebunit ekepukan ŋolo ka akwap a na. Nyeyakar iŋes apedor ŋina ekepukaa ayoŋ,
43014031	nai etiyae ayoŋ ikwaŋina ekecikakinitor Papa, ikotere eyenuniata ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap atemar amina ayoŋ Papa. Tonyoutu, oloto a ne.
43015001	“Arae Ayoŋ ekitoe ŋolo ke epiini ŋolo a kire, Papa kaŋ iŋes erae eketan.
43015002	Ani ŋinateni kaŋ nyeraii, etubori iŋes ka ani ŋina eraii, eipanari iŋes, ikotere tosegyar, tora ŋaraito ŋuna alalak.
43015003	Adaun iyes akitesegun a ŋakiro a ŋuna adau ayoŋ akitatam iyes.
43015004	Kiboiyoto alotooma kaŋ ka ayoŋ tooma kus. Nyeraii ateni bon, mati eyai lokitoe. Ikwaŋinapei ikoŋin, nyirayete iyes ŋaraito, mati kiboiyoto alotooma kaŋ.
43015005	“Arae Ayoŋ ekitoe ŋolo ke epiini, irae iyes ŋaten. Ŋini iboi alotooma kaŋ ka ayoŋ alotooma keŋ, iŋes erauni ŋaraito ŋuna alalak; anerae emam idiobore ŋini itiyakinete iyes amam ayoŋ.
43015006	Ŋini nyiboi alotooma kaŋ, etuboryo ikwa ateni, tooniyo. Ŋaten ŋuna aoko ecunakinio, tocakakinae nakim, tonomiya.
43015007	Ani kiboiyoto iyes alotooma kaŋ, nabo kiboiyoto ŋakiro kaŋ alotooma kus, kiŋita ibore daadaŋ ŋini icamito, ikiinakinio.
43015008	Itopolooritae Papa kaŋ ŋina irayata iyes ŋaraito ŋuna alalak; epite ŋol itopolooritere Papa kaŋ, ido itoodiunete iyes atemar, irae ŋikasyomak kaŋ.
43015009	Akamina ayoŋ iyes ikwaŋina akaminar ayoŋ Papa kaŋ, kidoŋo namina kaŋ.
43015010	Ani kiricakis iyes ŋakiciketa kaŋ, idoŋete namina kaŋ, ikwaŋina ericakinia ayoŋ ŋakiciketa a Papa kaŋ, edoŋitor namina keŋ.
43015011	“Adau ayoŋ alimun ŋakiro ŋun, ikotere alelyan kaŋ eyakaun neni kus jik ka ikotere alelyan kus ilelebikin.
43015012	Akaakiciket iŋes na: tominin make, ikwaŋina akaminar ayoŋ iyes.
43015013	Emam amina ŋina epol akilo ŋina ejalya ituŋanan akeekiyar aŋuna a ŋikonei keŋ.
43015014	Irae iyes ŋikonei kaŋ, erae kitiyata ŋuna ekecikakini ayoŋ iyes.
43015015	Nyeriŋa ayoŋ akanyarit iyes ŋiketiyak, anerae nyeyeni eketiyan ŋuna itiyae ekapolon keŋ, nai tokona akanyarit ayoŋ iyes ŋikonei, anerae akalimok ayoŋ iyes ŋuna daadaŋ eira aneni a Papa kaŋ.
43015016	Nyeseuna iyes ayoŋ; nai akaseu ka akatyaku ayoŋ iyes, toloto toraa ŋaraito ŋuna alalak ŋuna nyedaun, ikotere ani ŋinibore daadaŋ iŋitasi aneni a Papa alokiro kaŋ, ikiinakini.
43015017	Ekecikakini ayoŋ iyes nu: tominin make.
43015018	“Ani kikitidiŋa iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap, toyenete atemar aris keketidiŋa ayoŋ eriŋa iyes.
43015019	Kerae toraakas iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a na, kikiminak iyes akwap na, anarakau ŋulu keŋ. Nai akaseu ayoŋ iyes anakwap a na, ka nyirae iyes ŋulu keŋ. Iŋes nai ikitidiŋitor iyes akwap na.
43015020	Totamunito ŋuna adau ayoŋ alimokin iyes atemar, ‘Emam eketiyan ŋolo epol akilo ekeekapolon.’ Ani kekesicanito ikes ayoŋ, epote ikes akisican iyes daŋ; ani kiricakinito ikes ŋakiro kaŋ, iricakinete ŋuna kus daŋ.
43015021	Nai itiyakinete ikes ŋun daadaŋ neni kus aŋuna kaŋ, anerae nyeyenete ikes ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ.
43015022	Kerae nyabunit ayoŋ, esirwor ikes, kemam ikes asecit; nai tokona emam epite ŋolo etemaryata ikes, ‘Nyikisecit.’
43015023	Ŋini eketidiŋit ayoŋ, itidiŋit Papa kaŋ daŋ.
43015024	Kerae nyetiyat ayoŋ alokidiŋ kec ŋiticisyo ŋulu nyitiya idiotuŋanan, kemam ikes asecit; nai tokona adaut ikes akiŋolikin ŋun ka akitidiŋ ayoŋ ka Papa kaŋ daŋ.
43015025	Apotu ŋun kitiyakin, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna igiritae Lokisila kec ebe, ‘Apotu ikes eketidiŋa ayoŋ koŋin.’
43015026	“Ebuni ekeŋarakiniton, ŋolo eyakuuni ayoŋ aneni a Papa. Erae iŋes Etau ŋolo irworo ŋuna a kire; ebuni iŋes akiteyenun ayoŋ.
43015027	Irae iyes daŋ ŋisuudae kaŋ, anerae ikirukit iyes ka ayoŋ ŋinapei anakisyakinet.
43016001	“Adau ayoŋ alimun ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, ikotere nyioliyosi iyes ananupit kus.
43016002	Ikiritarete ikes iyes alosinagogae; kire ebuni apaki ŋina ikiaryata ŋituŋa iyes ebasi kori ikitiyae ŋuna ecamit Akuj.
43016003	Itiyaete ikes ŋun, anerae nyeyenuna ikes Papa kori ayoŋ.
43016004	Nai akalimok ayoŋ iyes ŋakiro ŋun, ikotere ani apaki ŋina itiyakinotor neni kus, totamut atemar aris ayoŋ kakalimok iyes.
43016005	Nai tokona aboŋori ayoŋ neni a ŋolo ekeyakuunit ayoŋ, nai emam iyes ipei daŋ ŋini ekeŋisi ayoŋ tema, ‘Ai ilosi iyoŋ?’
43016006	Aŋuna tokona adaunia ayoŋ alimokin iyes ŋun daadaŋ, eyaloloŋ ŋikusitai nooi.
43016007	Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes ŋuna a kire atemar, ikijoikini iyes kalot ayoŋ, anerae pa kalot ayoŋ aneni kus, nyebuni ekeŋarakiniton neni kus. Nai kalot ayoŋ, eyakuuni iŋes neni kus.
43016008	Ani edoluni iŋes, itunupi ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap ŋuna ka asecit ka ŋuna ka akiyookino, ta ŋuna ka atubokino.
43016009	Itunupi ŋuna ka asecit, anerae nyakanupito ikes ayoŋ.
43016010	Itunupi ŋuna ka akiyookino, anerae alosi ayoŋ neni a Papa, nyikianyuwasi nabo.
43016011	Itunupi ŋuna ka atubokino, anerae adaun ekepukan ŋolo ka akwap a na atubokin.
43016012	“Eyakasi ŋakiro ŋuna alalak ŋuna acamit ayoŋ alimokin iyes, nai nyipedorete atitinyikin.
43016013	Nai ani ebuni Etau ŋolo irworo ŋuna a kire, ikiyoori iyes nakiro daadaŋ ŋuna a kire; anerae nyirwori iŋes aŋuna ka apedor keŋ bon, nai ebuni iŋes akirwor ŋuna iirarit, nabo ikilimokini iyes ŋuna epote.
43016014	Eketopoloori iŋes ayoŋ, anerae ebuni iŋes akijaar ŋuna kaŋ, itolimok iyes.
43016015	Ŋinibore daadaŋ eyakar Papa kaŋ, erae ŋini kaŋ, iŋes nai alimunitor ayoŋ atemar, ebuni iŋes akijaar ŋuna kaŋ, itolimok iyes.
43016016	“Apaki adio cicinyikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo; apaki adiocici ekaku, ikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo.”
43016017	Kiŋitanaros ŋikasyomak keŋ ŋice ebasi, “Okoe! Nyo mono apolou ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋun? Ikilimok iŋes iwon atemar, ‘Apaki adiocici nyikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo; apaki adiocici ekaku, ikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo;’ ka daŋ abala, ‘Anerae alosi ayoŋ neni a Papa.’
43016018	Nyo mono tokona apolou ŋina ka akirot a ŋina ebala iŋes ‘Iwadiocici’. Ikikuruwo apolou ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋuna irworo iŋes!”
43016019	Ayeni Yesu atemar acamito ikes akiŋit iŋes ŋakiro ŋun. Aŋun, tolimok ikes tema, “Ikwa ŋuna iŋitanarosi iyes alokidiŋ kus ŋuna alimunit ayoŋ atemar, ‘Apaki adio cicinyikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo; apaki adio ciciekaku, ikianyuwarete ayoŋ nabo’ a?
43016020	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ipote iyes akigworo ka akiwolol, nai elelyani akwap nooi; ipote iyes akiyaloloŋ, nai ibelekin akiyaloloŋ kus toruwor alelyan.
43016021	Iyaloloŋi aberu apaki ŋina eryebakinor, anerae adol akeepaki ŋina idounio; nai ani kedau iŋes akidoun, imuryakini iŋes aryeba, anerae elelyani iŋes akidoun ikoku nakwap.
43016022	Ikote nenipei ŋakiro aneni kus: iyaloloŋete iyes tokona, nai akaanyuni ayoŋ iyes nabo, ido tolelyana ŋitai kus. Emam idiotuŋanan elemari alelyan ŋin aneni kus.
43016023	“Ani ŋina edolunio Akoloŋit ŋin, emam idiobore ipote iyes akiŋit ayoŋ. Nai akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar, ibore daadaŋ ŋini iŋitasi iyes alokiro kaŋ, ebuni Papa kaŋ ainakin iyes.
43016024	Akitodol tokona nyiŋita iyes idiobore alokiro kaŋ; kiŋita iryamunete, ikotere alelyan kus ilelebikin.
43016025	“Erwor ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ a ŋakitadapeta. Ebuni apaki ŋina nyerworya ayoŋ a ŋakitadapeta, nai abuni akisileerekin iyes Papa.
43016026	Akoloŋit ŋin, ipote iyes akiŋita alokiro kaŋ, nai nyakalimokinit ayoŋ iyes atemar ekelipakini iyes Papa kaŋ;
43016027	anerae ikimina iyes Papa elope. Ikimina iŋes iyes, anerae ikiminasi iyes ayoŋ ka inupito atemar abunit ayoŋ aneni a Papa.
43016028	Abu ayoŋ aneni a Papa, abu nakwap, nabo aesikini ayoŋ akwap, oboŋo neni a Papa.”
43016029	Ido tolimokis ŋikasyomak iŋes temasi, “Abe bo tokona nyeriŋa iyoŋ irworo a ŋakitadapeta, nai ileereete ŋakiro kon.
43016030	Ikiyeni tokona isua atemar iyeni iyoŋ ŋakiro daadaŋ, iŋes nai nyiitanitor idiotuŋanan akiŋit iyoŋ akirot. Ikitunupa nu isua atemar, ibunit iyoŋ aneni ka Akuj.”
43016031	Toboŋok Yesu ikes tema, “Inupa kire iyes tokona a?
43016032	Ebunit apaki, kire adolu apaki ŋina ikielarere iyes, ŋina elosyo ŋinituŋanan lore keŋ, okoesikin ayoŋ bon; nai nyedoŋi ayoŋ bon, anerae ikirukit Papa ka ayoŋ.
43016033	Akalimok ayoŋ iyes ŋun, ikotere toryamut iyes ekisil alotooma kaŋ. Ikiteryamuni akwap iyes ŋican, nai toena ŋitai! Elou ayoŋ akwap.”
43017001	Kedau Yesu akirwor ŋakiro ŋun, kireo nakuj, kilip tema, “Papa, adolu apaki, kitopoloo Lokoku kon, ikotere ikitopoloo Lokoku kon iyoŋ.
43017002	Anerae iinak iyoŋ Lokoku apedor ŋinakipukaet ŋituŋa daadaŋ, ikotere iinakini akiyar ŋina nyedaun neni a ŋulu daadaŋ ibu iyoŋ inak iŋes.
43017003	Erae na akiyar ŋina nyedaun, itoyenete ikes iyoŋ, Akuj ŋina erae apei bon ŋina a kire ka Yesu Kristo ŋolo ibu kiyaku iyoŋ.
43017004	Etoodik ayoŋ apolou kon nakwap anakirikakin etic ŋolo ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ akitiya.
43017005	Papa, inakinae ayoŋ apolou tokona alokiŋaren kon, apolou ŋinapei ikiyakar ayoŋ ka iyoŋ eriŋa tari akwap nyesubuna.
43017006	“Adau ayoŋ akisileerekin ekiro kon lotuŋa ŋulu ibu iyoŋ ikiinak ayoŋ anakwap a na. Arae ikes ŋulu kon, ibu iyoŋ ikiinak ayoŋ ka ericakis ikes akirot kon.
43017007	Tokona eyenete ikes atemar, ibore daadaŋ ŋini ikiinak iyoŋ ayoŋ, ebunit aneni kon.
43017008	Anerae alimok ayoŋ ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ikilimokini iyoŋ ayoŋ, ka acamut ikes. Ayenut ikes atemar, abunit ayoŋ kire aneni kon, ka anupa atemar, iyoŋ ikiyakuuni ayoŋ.
43017009	“Elipi ayoŋ aŋuna kec; nyelipi ayoŋ aŋuna ka akwap a daadaŋ, nai elipi aŋuna a ŋulu ikiinak iyoŋ ayoŋ, anerae erae ikes ŋulu kon.
43017010	Ŋini erae ŋini kaŋ erae ŋini kon ka ŋini erae ŋini kon erae ŋini kaŋ, itoodiunitae apolou kaŋ aneni kec.
43017011	Abunit ayoŋ neni kon; nyeriŋa ayoŋ ayai nakwap, nai eriŋa ikes eyakasi nakwap. Papa ŋolo Asegan, kiyok iyoŋ ikes ka apedor a ŋina ke ekiro kon, ekiro ŋolo ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ, ikotere eruworosi ikes ŋipei, ikwaŋina ikiraakar iwon ŋipei.
43017012	Ani eriŋa ayoŋ ikirukit ka ikes, abu eyok ikes ka apedor a ŋina ke ekiro kon, ekiro ŋolo ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ. Eyok ayoŋ ikes, emam ŋini aoliyo, mati ipei ŋini etemokino tooliyo – ikotere kiyookinotor Ŋakigireta.
43017013	Nai tokona abunit ayoŋ neni kon, adau ayoŋ akirwor ŋakiro ŋun anakwap, ikotere eryamunete ikes alelyan kaŋ ilelebikina alotai kec.
43017014	Ainak ayoŋ ikes akirot kon; etidiŋa ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap ikes, anerae nyerae ikes ŋulu ka akwap, ikwaŋinapei nyaraakar ayoŋ daŋ ŋolo ka akwap.
43017015	Nyekelipit ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar tolema ikes anakwap, nai ekelipit ayoŋ iyoŋ atemar, kiyok iyoŋ ikes aneni a ŋolo Aronon.
43017016	Nyerae ikes ŋulu ka akwap, ikwaŋinapei nyaraakar ayoŋ daŋ ŋolo ka akwap.
43017017	Kituruwo ikes ŋulu etyakunitae nakirot ŋina a kire; akirot kon iŋes erae ŋina a kire.
43017018	Ikwaŋinapei ibunio iyoŋ ikiyakiya ayoŋ nakwap, eyakiyarit ayoŋ daŋ ikes nakwap.
43017019	Aruwor ayoŋ ŋolo akatyakunitae aŋuna kec, ikotere toruworos ikes daŋ ŋulu seuna anakirot a ŋina a kire.
43017020	“Nyelipakinit ayoŋ ikes make, nai elipakinit tari ŋulu akanupete ayoŋ aŋuna ka akitatam kec.
43017021	Elipit ayoŋ atemar toruworos ikes daadaŋ ŋipei. “Papa! [Ikwaŋinapei iyakar iyoŋ tooma kaŋ, ka ayoŋ daŋ tooma kon,] pena ikes tooma yok, ikotere enupi akwap atemar, ikiyakuunit iyoŋ ayoŋ.
43017022	Ainak ayoŋ ikes apolou ŋinapei ikiinit iyoŋ ayoŋ, ikotere eruworosi ikes ŋipei, ikwaŋinapei ikiraakar iwon ŋipei.
43017023	Ayai ayoŋ tooma kec, iyai iyoŋ tooma kaŋ, ikotere toruworos ikes ŋipei jik, ikotere nai toyenu akwap atemar ikiyakuunit iyoŋ ayoŋ ka atemar imina iyoŋ ikes, ikwaŋinapei ikiminar iyoŋ ayoŋ.
43017024	“Papa! Acamit ayoŋ ŋulu ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ, oruko ka ayoŋ aneni ayai ayoŋ, ikotere eanyunete ikes apolou kaŋ, ŋina ikiinakinit iyoŋ ayoŋ; anerae ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ eriŋa tari akwap nyesubuna.
43017025	Okoe Papa ŋolo ka akiyookino! Nyikiyeni iyoŋ akwap kire, nai akayeni ayoŋ iyoŋ; eyenete lu atemar ikiyakuunit iyoŋ ayoŋ.
43017026	Eketeyenu ayoŋ iyoŋ ikes ka arubakini ekoni nenipei, ikotere min amina ŋina ikiminar iyoŋ ayoŋ tooma kec ka ayoŋ daŋ tooma kec.”
43018001	Kedau Yesu akilip ŋin, toloto iŋes ka ŋikeekasyomak ekekwaye aŋolol Kidron. Ayai nen emanikor ŋolo apotu Yesu ka ŋikeekasyomak tolomasi.
43018002	Ayeni Yuda ŋolo alukinon akibois ŋin, anerae eryamunun Yesu ka ŋikasyomak keŋ nen ŋarwa ŋuna alalak.
43018003	Toriko Yuda ŋasigarya ŋuna a Ŋiromanin ka ŋiketeok Akai ka Akuj lomanikor. Eakito ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Ŋiparisayon ikes. Atiŋito ikes ŋiboro ŋulu ke ejiye ka ŋitaae ta ŋagilae.
43018004	Ayeni Yesu ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna itiyakinio neni keŋ, kikomau kiŋaren kec, kiŋit tema, “Ŋae iwarito iyes?”
43018005	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret.” Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Ayoŋ lo!” Awuasi Yuda ŋolo alukinon ka ikes.
43018006	Ani kedau Yesu alimun ebe, “Ayoŋ lo,” kikutukutoosi ikes, kibusokinos kwap.
43018007	Kiŋit Yesu ikes nabo tema, “Ŋae iwarito iyes?” Temasi ikes, “Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret.”
43018008	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Adau ayoŋ alimokin iyes atemar ayoŋ lo. Ani nai kerae ayoŋ ikiwarito iyes, kimyekisi ŋikilyok lu toloto.”
43018009	(Arae ŋun akisiyookinio ŋakiro ŋuna sek alimunit iŋes ebala, “Papa, mam alokidiŋ ŋulu ibu iyoŋ ikiinak ayoŋ ŋini etooliyo ayoŋ.”)
43018010	Abu Simoni Petero ŋolo ayakar atum, kitel epito ŋolo ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi nakit ŋina aloteten, totubo. (Arae ekiro ke epito a ŋol Maliko.)
43018011	Tolimok Yesu Petero tema, “Kinyakak atum kon nakuraro! Itami iyoŋ atemar nyamasi ayoŋ ekopo ŋolo a ŋican ŋolo akainaki ayoŋ Papa kaŋ lo a?”
43018012	Apotu ŋasigarya ŋuna a Ŋiromanin ka ekapolon kec ta ŋiketeok Akai ka Akuj ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan kikamut Yesu toena.
43018013	Torikosi mono iŋes neni ka Anas, anerae arae Anas ekamuran a Kaipa a ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi alokaru a ŋol.
43018014	Arae Kaipa sek aris kicoco ŋikarikok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan atemar, ejok epeikile totwan aŋuna a ŋituŋa.
43018015	Kiwuapakis Simoni Petero ka ecekasyoman Yesu. Ayeni Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ekasyoman ŋol; aŋun, abu iŋes torukosi ka Yesu tari nenilapat ka akai a ŋina ke Esacaradoti a ŋol,
43018016	towuoi Petero alokiŋa alodiye epuke. Toboŋo nai ekasyoman ŋolo ayenen ka Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi, kisirwor apese ŋina eten epuke, ido yau Petero tooma.
43018017	Kiŋit apese ŋin Petero tema, “Meere iyoŋ daŋ epei alokasyomak ke ekile a ŋol a?” Toboŋok Petero tema, “Meere.”
43018018	Aŋuna alilimyo akwap, kinokakis ŋiketiyak ka ŋiketeok akim, towua kirikaut. Kiyoto nai Petero akiwuaŋar ka ikes.
43018019	Kiŋitiŋit esacaradoti ŋolo apolon Yesu ŋuna a ŋikasyomak keŋ ka ŋuna ka akitatam keŋ.
43018020	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Erwor ayoŋ lotuŋa daadaŋ, emam ŋakiro ŋuna abu ewua; abu ayoŋ jwi jwi etatam alosinagogae ka alo Kai ka Akuj, aneni ecunanakin Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ. Emam akirot alimu ayoŋ ewuait.
43018021	Nyo nai tokona ikiŋisiŋisitor iyoŋ ayoŋ? Kiŋit ŋituŋa ŋulu apotu kiirasi ŋuna abu ayoŋ erwor; eyenete ikes ŋakiro ŋuna abu ayoŋ erwor.”
43018022	Ani kedau Yesu alimun ŋakiro ŋun, abu epei alokidiŋ ŋiketeok kibap iŋes tema, “Ikokini iyoŋ irworo neni ke esacaradoti a ŋolo apolon ikoŋina ai?”
43018023	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Ani kalimunit ayoŋ ŋuna aronok, kiteyenik ŋituŋa lu daadaŋ neni abala ayoŋ. Ani kerworit ayoŋ ejok, kaanukiro bo ikibapya iyoŋ ayoŋ?”
43018024	Kiyakiya nai Anas Yesu eroko erocitae neni a Kaipa, a ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi.
43018025	Ariŋa Petero ewuoi iwuaŋa. Kiŋita ŋuluce iŋes temasi, “Meere iyoŋ daŋ epei alokidiŋ ŋikasyomak keŋ a?” Nai topeg Petero ŋun tema, “Meere.”
43018026	Abu epito epei ŋolo ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi, ŋolo arae eyenet ke ekile a ŋolo atubori Petero akit, kiŋit Petero tema, “Pa ekeŋolikinit ayoŋ iyoŋ ka iŋes alomanikor a?”
43018027	Topeg nabo Petero ŋun. Ŋinapeipaki toruuni ekokoroit.
43018028	Ani taparacu iwali akwap, torikosi ikes Yesu alokai a Kaipa tari kai ŋina apolon ŋina ke ekapolon a Ŋiromanin, a ŋolo anyaritae Pilato. Nyelomasi ŋikarikok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan tooma akai ŋin, anerae pa acamito ikes amunaar asegis kec aŋuna ka akimuja ŋasuban ŋuna a Paska.
43018029	Aŋun, abu Pilato toloma neni ayakasi ikes, kiŋit tema, “Anukiro isitakinitotor iyes ekile lo?”
43018030	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Kerae nyitiyat ekile lo ŋuna aronok, pa kikipotokinit isua iŋes neni kon.”
43018031	Tolimok Pilato ikes tema, “Yaasi iyes ŋilopeyek iŋes, totubokis a Lokisila kus.” Toboŋokis Ŋiyudayan iŋes temasi, “Nyikicamakinit apukan a Ŋiromanin isua akiar ituŋanan.”
43018032	(Etiyakinosi ŋun, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋakiro ŋuna alimunit Yesu, itoodiunit epite ŋolo etwania iŋes.)
43018033	Toboŋo Pilato kai keŋ ŋina apolon, tonyarau iŋes Yesu, kiŋit tema, “Irae iyoŋ erwosit a Ŋiyudayan a?”
43018034	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Ilimunit iyoŋ elope ŋakiro ŋun, kori ŋicetuŋa ikilimokinito iyoŋ ŋakiro kaŋ?”
43018035	Toboŋok Pilato iŋes tema, “Arae mono ayoŋ Eyudayat ŋolo ayeni ŋun a? Erae ŋikonituŋa ka ŋikonisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ikipotunito iyoŋ neni kaŋ. Nyo isecit iyoŋ?”
43018036	Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyerae apukan kaŋ ŋina ka akwap a na. Kerae torae apukan kaŋ ŋina ka akwap a na, kejito ŋikewuapak kaŋ, ikotere nyekepotokinere ayoŋ neni a ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan. Nai nyerae apukan kaŋ ŋina a ne.”
43018037	Kiŋit Pilato iŋes tema, “Iŋes atemar irae iyoŋ erwosit a?” Toboŋok Yesu iŋes tema, “Iyoŋ ilimu atemar arae ayoŋ erwosit. Aponi ekedoun ayoŋ ka abunit ayoŋ nakwap na aŋuna a ipeibore: akiteyenun ŋuna a kire. Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eyai tooma ŋuna a kire, epupi ŋakiro kaŋ.”
43018038	Kiŋit Pilato Yesu tema, “Nyo erae ŋuna a kire?”
43018039	Nai erae etal kus alacakin iyes epeimabus ŋolo iitanete iyes apaki ŋina a ŋasuban a ŋuna a Paska. Icamito nai tokona olacak ayoŋ erwosit a Ŋiyudayan a?”
43018040	Tocelut ikes temasi, “Mam, meere lo! Ikicamit isua Baraba!” (Arae Baraba ekademanaran.)
43019001	Toriko nai Pilato Yesu kibuŋae.
43019002	Toyeut ŋisigarya aikit ŋina a ŋikukwa, kiwuakis nakou keŋ, ido kitanapa iŋes elou ŋolo kipura-areŋan.
43019003	Potu nai neni keŋ temasi, “Maata erwosit a Ŋiyudayan!” Toloto kibapabapata iŋes.
43019004	Toloma nabo Pilato kiŋa, tolimok ŋituŋa tema, “Topupokisi, alosi ayoŋ arikun iŋes neni kus, ikotere toanyuniata iyes atemar nyeryamuna ayoŋ asecit ŋina tubokinet iŋes.”
43019005	Tolomu nai Yesu kiŋa enapit aikit ŋina a ŋikukwa anakou keŋ, tonapite elou ŋolo kipurat-areŋan. Tolimok Pilato ikes tema, “Elo ekile ŋolo!”
43019006	Ani iŋolikinete ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋiketeok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan iŋes, tocelut temasi, “Kibubuk! Kibubuk iŋes lomusalaba!” Tolimok Pilato ikes tema, “Yaasi iyes ŋilopeyek iŋes kibubukis, anerae nyeryamuna ayoŋ adiosecit ŋina tubokinet iŋes.”
43019007	Toboŋokis Ŋiyudayan temasi, “Eyakare isua Ekisil ŋolo ebala, itemokino iŋes totwan, anerae ebala, arae iŋes Lokoku ka Akuj.”
43019008	Ani iirari Pilato ŋakiro ŋun, tobul nooi.
43019009	Toboŋo nabo kai keŋ ŋina apolon, kiŋit Yesu tema, “Ai ibunitor iyoŋ?” Nai nyeboŋok Yesu.
43019010	Aŋun, tolimok Pilato iŋes tema, “Nyikisirwori iyoŋ ayoŋ a? Nyiyeni iyoŋ atemar ayakar ayoŋ apedor ŋina lacakinet ka ŋina kibubukinet iyoŋ a?”
43019011	Toboŋok Yesu tema, “Kemam iyoŋ apedor aneni kaŋ, kerae nyikiinakinit Akuj. Aŋun, ituŋanan ŋini ekepotokini ayoŋ neni kon, iŋes eyakar asecit ŋina epol akilo ŋina kon.”
43019012	Ani iirari Pilato ŋakiro ŋun, kiwar epite ŋolo lacakinet Yesu; nai apotu Ŋiyudayan tocelut nabo temasi, “Ani kilacak iyoŋ iŋes, nyirae iyoŋ ekone ke ekepukan a Roma. Ŋinituŋanan ebala arae iŋes erwosit, erae emoit ŋolo ke epepukan a Roma.”
43019013	Ani iirari Pilato ŋakiro ŋun, toriku Yesu kiŋa, kiboikin lokicoloŋ ŋolo ke ekatubon, nakibois ŋina enyaritae “Akititis”, nai a Ŋaburaniyae enyaritae “Gabata”.
43019014	Arae ŋisaae ŋikanikapei ŋulu ka apaaran, eriŋa nyedolo ŋasuban ŋuna a Paska. Tolimok Pilato Ŋiyudayan tema, “Kiŋolikisi, erwosit kus!”
43019015	Tocelut nabo temasi, “Toar! Toar! Kibubuk iŋes lomusalaba!” Kiŋit Pilato ikes tema, “Icamito iyes ebubuki ayoŋ erwosit kus lomusalaba a?” Toboŋokis ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok temasi, “Emam isua erwosit ece, mati ekepukan a Roma bon.”
43019016	Kipotok nai Pilato ikes Yesu, kibubukis lomusalaba.
43019017	Toloma iŋes kiŋa eryoŋit emusalaba keŋ tari neni enyaritae “Akuulu”, enyaritae a Ŋaburaniyae “Gologota.”
43019018	Kibubukis ikes iŋes kaapei ka ŋice ŋiarei, epei lowae ŋolo aloteten ka ŋoloce lowae ŋolo alokedyeny, toyai Yesu kidiŋ.
43019019	Kigir Pilato ŋakiro nu kiwuakinae kidiama emusalaba, egiritae ikona: “YESU ŊOLO A NASARET, ERWOSIT A ŊIYUDAYAN.”
43019020	Apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak tosyoma ŋakiro ŋun, anerae aapi neni ebubukinitoe Yesu alo Yerusalem, ka anerae egiritae a Ŋaburaniyae, a Ŋalatin ka a Ŋagirik.
43019021	Tolimokis ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok Pilato temasi, “Nyigir atemar, ‘Erwosit a Ŋiyudayan,’ nai kigir atemar, ‘Ebala ekile lo arae iŋes erwosit a Ŋiyudayan!’ ”
43019022	Toboŋok Pilato tema, “Ŋuna adau ayoŋ akigir, adau akigir.”
43019023	Ani kedaut ŋasigarya akibubukin Yesu lomusalaba, tolemut ŋilowi keŋ, tokora ŋarwa ŋaomwon, ŋolosigarit tolema atyaket apei. Tolacut tari ekaaso keŋ daŋ, ŋolo etiyaunitae emam ŋakiryamiryamet.
43019024	Apotu ŋasigarya kirworikinos make temasi, “Nyikicila elou lo; elamilama oanyuniata ŋini eai.” Etiyakinosi ŋun, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Apotu ikes tokora ŋikaalowi ka apotu kilamilama aŋuna ke ekaaso kaŋ.” Ŋuna apotu ŋasigarya kitiyata ŋun.
43019025	Awuasi toto a Yesu ka nakaato keŋ ta Maria aberu a Kileopa kaapei ka Maria Magadalena alokwap emusalaba a Yesu.
43019026	Ani iŋolikini Yesu toto keŋ ka ekasyoman ŋolo amina iŋes ewuasi alodiyete emusalaba, tolimok toto keŋ tema, “Toto, toanyuwa lokoku kon lo.”
43019027	Tolimok ekasyoman daŋ tema, “Toto kon na.” Ageun apaki ŋin, ya ekasyoman Maria lore keŋ.
43019028	Ayeni Yesu atemar erikakin ŋakiro daadaŋ. (Aŋuna ka akisiyookin ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta, abu iŋes tolimu) tema, “Akanyam akure.”
43019029	Ayai diyete nen abakule ŋina eleleba epiini ŋolo adadaŋan, kiwuakis ibore ŋini ayabuk, ido toenikis nakitoe ŋina anyaritae Isop, kikyaasi kidiama, kiwuakis nakituk keŋ.
43019030	Ani kedau Yesu akimat epiini ŋolo adadaŋan ŋol, tolimu tema, “Erikakin.” Kijuuru, kiridak.
43019031	Aŋina araakar apaaran ŋina etemonokinere aŋuna a ŋasuban a Paska, apotu ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan kiŋita Pilato tobilae ŋakejen a ŋulu ebubukinitoe ka tolemunae ŋawat alomusalabae, anerae pa acamitae ŋawat eyakasi lomusalabae akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato. (Arae Sabato ŋin ŋina apolon nooi.)
43019032	Apotu ŋasigarya toloto, tobila ŋakejen a ŋikilyok a ŋulu ebubukinitoe kaapei ka Yesu. Tobila mono ŋuna a ŋolo esyaunan, tobila nabo ŋuna a ŋoloce daŋ.
43019033	Nai ani edolunete ikes neni a Yesu, kiŋolikis kiridak. Aŋun, nyebila ikes ŋakejen keŋ.
43019034	Nai kicum esigarit epei ka akwara Yesu losyep; toleleut atipei ŋaokot ka ŋakipi anakicuma.
43019035	(Ituŋanan ŋini ete ŋakiro ŋun itiyakin, iŋes abu kisuuda, ikotere iyes daŋ tonupyata. Ŋuna erwor iŋes erae ŋuna a kire ka eyeni atemar erworo ŋuna a kire.)
43019036	Apotu ŋakiro ŋun kitiyakin, ikotere kiyookinotor ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Emam akoit keŋ apei daŋ ŋina ebilyo.”
43019037	Elimunitoe nabo a Nakigireta a ŋace ebe, “Epote ŋituŋa akiŋolikin ŋolo ecumete ikes.”
43019038	Kedaun ŋakiro ŋun, abu Yosepu ŋolo abunit alotaun a ŋolo ka Arimatea, kiŋitak Pilato erae kecamakini iŋes alemun akuwan a Yesu alomusalaba. (Arae Yosepu ekewuapan ŋolo a Yesu, nai pa etoodiuna, anerae akerit iŋes ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan.) Tocamak Pilato iŋes, aŋun, tolot iŋes tolema akuwan a Yesu.
43019039	Nikodemo daŋ ŋolo aris ekiŋaren kelot nakwaare aanyun Yesu, torukosi ka Yosepu, etiŋit eminae ka ŋamyeta ŋuna akukunyok ŋuna aapiyarito ŋakiloi kec ŋatomoniuni.
43019040	Tolemut ŋikilyok ŋul akuwan a Yesu alomusalaba, kilogilogakis anaŋga, kiwosakis akimyet ŋina akukunyon, ikwapei araakar etal ŋolo anuketa Ŋiyudayan ŋikatwak ŋol.
43019041	Ayai emanikor diyete neni ebubukinitoe Yesu ka tooma emanikor ŋol, ayai naturukan alyal ŋina kitete, ŋina pa anukakinitae idiotuŋanan.
43019042	Ikwaŋina araakar akoloŋit ŋina etemonokinere aŋuna a ŋasuban a ŋuna a Paska ka aŋuna nabo aapiya aturukan ŋin a nen, apotu ikes kiwuakis akuwan a Yesu nen.
43020001	Ani taparacu eriŋa akwap iryono, akoloŋit ŋina ke Esabit, tolot Maria Magadalena nalyal. Ani edoli inaa, kiŋolik amoru ŋina agolitere aturukan kelemar nawae alopuke.
43020002	Toem nai iŋes neni a Simoni Petero ka ekasyoman ŋoloce, ŋolo amina Yesu, tolimok ikes tema, “Kelemar akuwan ke Ekapolon analyal ka nyikiyeni tari neni kiwuakis ikes iŋes.”
43020003	Tonyout nai Petero ka ekasyoman ŋoloce, toloto nalyal.
43020004	Toema ikes, nai abu ekasyoman ŋoloce kilany Petero kisyau nalyal.
43020005	Tokukokin iŋes, kiŋolik anaŋga eperi a nen, nai nyeloma tooma.
43020006	Todolu nai Simoni Petero ŋolo amotuno alokaku, toloma tooma naturukan, kiŋolik anaŋga eperi,
43020007	pa erukito ŋina aenikinitae nakou a Yesu ka ŋinace, nai ebilakina aneni keŋ bon.
43020008	Abu ekasyoman ŋoloce daŋ ŋolo esyauni nen, toloma tooma aturukan, kiŋolik, ido tonup.
43020009	(Akigiret a ŋina abala ebe, itemokino iŋes toyaru alokatwak.)
43020010	Toboŋosi nai ŋikasyomak ŋul lorerya kec.
43020011	Nai awuoi Maria alokiŋa aturukan kigworo. Ani ekukokin iŋes aripikin aturukan,
43020012	kiŋolik ŋimalaikan ŋiarei ŋulu anapito ŋilowi ŋulu akwaŋak iboiyete aneni eperikinitoe akuwan a Yesu. Eboi epei alowae a ŋolo ka akou, epei alowae a ŋolo a ŋakejen.
43020013	Kiŋita ŋimalaikan Maria temasi, “Aberu, kaanukiro igworor iyoŋ?” Toboŋok Maria ikes tema, “Egworo ayoŋ, anerae kelemar akuwan ŋina ke Ekapolon kaŋ, ka nyayeni ayoŋ neni kiwuakis ikes iŋes.”
43020014	Kedau alimun ŋun, toboboŋ kiŋolik Yesu ewuoi, nai pa ayeni iŋes atemar arae Yesu.
43020015	Kiŋit Yesu Maria tema, “Aberu, kaanukiro igworor iyoŋ? Ŋae iwarit iyoŋ?” Abala Maria kori erae ekile ŋol eketen emanikor; aŋun, tolimok iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ani kerae iyoŋ ilemarit iŋes, tolimokinae neni iwuakinit iyoŋ iŋes, ikotere olot olema.”
43020016	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Maria!” Toboboŋ Maria tolimu a Ŋaburaniyae tema, “Rabbuni!” (Iŋes atemar eketataman.)
43020017	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Nyikitap ayoŋ, anerae eriŋa ayoŋ nyeboŋoro neni a Papa kaŋ; nai tolot, tolimok ŋikaitotoi kaŋ atemar alosi ayoŋ neni a Papa kaŋ, a ŋolo erae Papa kus daŋ; neni ka Akuj kaŋ, a ŋina erae Akuj kus daŋ.”
43020018	Tolot Maria Magadalena, tolimok ŋikasyomak a Yesu tema, “Aanyu ayoŋ Ekapolon.” Tolimok nabo ikes ŋakiro ŋuna alimokini Yesu iŋes.
43020019	Ataboŋ ŋinapei ŋin, ŋina ke Esabit, atukokina ŋikasyomak a Yesu tooma akai ŋina agolitoe ŋipukei, anerae akuryakito ikes aŋuna a ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan. Abu Yesu towo alokidiŋ kec tolimok ikes tema, “Toyai ekisil neni kus.”
43020020	Ani kedau alimokin ikes ŋun, kitoodik ikes ŋakan ka esyep keŋ. Tolakaros ŋikasyomak iŋolikinete Ekapolon.
43020021	Tolimok nabo Yesu ikes tema, “Toyai ekisil neni kus. Ikwaŋinapei ekeyakitor ayoŋ Papa, ekeyaki ayoŋ iyes daŋ.”
43020022	Kedau alimun ŋun, kieŋak neni kec tema, “Kijaasi Etau ŋolo Asegan.
43020023	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini isyoniyete iyes ŋasecisya keŋ, isyoniyo, ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini nyisyoniyete iyes ŋasecisya keŋ, nyisyoniyo.”
43020024	Amam Tomas (ŋolo anyaritae Emuut), ŋolo arae epei alokasyomak a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei, apaki ŋina abunio Yesu neni kec.
43020025	Aŋun, tolimokis ŋikasyomak ŋuluce Tomas temasi, “Ikianyu isua Ekapolon.” Nai abu Tomas tolimok ikes tema, “Mati keŋolik ayoŋ ŋapores ŋuna a ŋisumar anakan keŋ, ka ewuak ekimoin kaŋ napores ŋuna a ŋisumar ka ewuak akan kaŋ losyepi keŋ, nyanupi ayoŋ.”
43020026	Kelunyar esabit epei, eboiyete ŋikasyomak nabo kaapei, torukito ka Tomas daŋ alokai a ŋina agolol ŋipukei. Totakanu Yesu neni kec tema, “Toyai ekisil neni kus.”
43020027	Tolimok nai Yesu Tomas tema, “Kiwuak ekonikimoin ne, kiŋolik ŋakaakan. Torwau akonikan, kiwuak losyepi kaŋ, tojoŋo aŋayaŋayat, nai tonup!”
43020028	Tolimok Tomas Yesu tema, “Ekapolon kaŋ, Akuj kaŋ!”
43020029	Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Inup iyoŋ, anerae ikiŋolik ayoŋ a? Erereŋ ŋulu enupito pa iŋolikinito!”
43020030	Abu Yesu kitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna alalak iteete ŋikasyomak keŋ, nyigirir ŋakujuwuanisya ŋun daadaŋ lokitaabo lo.
43020031	Nai igiritae nu, ikotere tonupyata iyes atemar erae Yesu iŋes erae Kristo, Lokoku ka Akuj, ka alotooma anupit kus iŋes, toryamut akiyar alokiro keŋ.
43021001	Kedaun ŋun, abu Yesu totakanu nabo neni a ŋikasyomak keŋ alodiyete anam Tiberia. Abu iŋes totakanu ikonata.
43021002	Ayakasi ŋituŋa lu iwapei: Simoni Petero ka Tomas (ŋolo anyaritae Emuut), Nasaniel (ŋolo a Kana anakwap a ŋina a Galileya), kaapei ka ŋidwe a Sebedeo ŋulusapa, ta ŋikasyomak a Yesu ŋice ŋiarei.
43021003	Tolimok Simoni Petero ŋuluce tema, “Alosi ayoŋ akisurum ŋikolya.” Temasi ikes, “Apena kaapei.” Apotu nai ikes todoka ataker toloto nanam, nai nyisuruma ikes idiobore akuwar ŋin.
43021004	Ani taparacu ereŋuni Kide, towo Yesu alokipetot a ŋolo ka anam, nai nyeyena ŋikasyomak atemar erae Yesu.
43021005	Kiŋit Yesu ikes tema, “Ŋidwe, eyai iyes ediokolya a?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Emam.”
43021006	Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Tocakakisi atibait lowae ŋolo aloteten ataker, iryamunete iyes ŋikolya.” Tocakakis nai ikes atibait, kigaaliut ŋikolya ŋulu alalak, kipiyo akirikin tooma nataker.
43021007	Tolimok ekasyoman ŋolo amina Yesu Simoni Petero tema, “Erae Ekapolon!” Ani iirari Petero atemar arae Ekapolon, tonap ŋilowi, anerae alacarit sek iŋes ŋilowi itiyae; toporo anataker nakipi.
43021008	Apotu nai ŋikasyomak ŋuluce todolut lokipetot eya nataker, kiriut atibait ileleba ŋikolya, anerae pa alwaka ikes alokipetot a ŋolo ka anam; arae ŋamitae ŋuna aapiyarito amiat.
43021009	Ani edolunete ikes lokipetot neni aonon, kiŋolikis akim ŋina etotoleunit, idokokino ŋikolya kidiama ka toya ŋamugati daŋ diyete nen.
43021010	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Yautu ŋikolya ŋidi ŋulu igaaliut iyes.”
43021011	Tolot Simoni Petero kiriu atibait lokipetot, ileleba ŋikolya, arae ŋikolya daadaŋ amiat ka ŋatomonikan ka ŋiuni; tari aŋuna alalakyata daŋ, nyeŋeda apotis kec atibait.
43021012	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Potu kimuja.” Emam tari edio alokasyomak ŋolo abu totitinyik akiŋit iŋes tema, “Ŋae iyoŋ?” Ayenete ikes atemar arae Ekapolon.
43021013	Abu nai Yesu tolemu amugati inak ikes, tolemu ŋikolya daŋ tokorak ikes.
43021014	Arae atakanikinet a Yesu ŋin ŋina a ŋauni neni a ŋikasyomak keŋ, kedau ayarun alokatwak.
43021015	Kedaut ikes akimuj, tolimok Yesu Simoni Petero tema, “Simoni lokoku a Yoana, ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ akilo neni akaminatar ŋuluce lu a?” Toboŋok Petero tema, “Ee Ekapolon, iyeni iyoŋ atemar akamina ayoŋ iyoŋ.” Tolimok nai Yesu iŋes tema, “Kitan ŋikaalei kaŋ ŋulu meesekin.”
43021016	Kiŋit Yesu Simoni Petero akiŋiset ŋina a ŋaarei tema, “Simoni lokoku a Yoana, ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ a?” Toboŋok Petero tema, “Ee Ekapolon, iyeni iyoŋ atemar akamina ayoŋ iyoŋ.” Tolimok Yesu iŋes tema, “Kiyok ŋikaalei kaŋ ŋulu meesekin.”
43021017	Kiŋit Yesu Petero akiŋiset ŋina a ŋauni tema, “Simoni lokoku a Yoana, ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ a?” Kiyaloloŋ Petero aŋuna abunio Yesu kiŋit iŋes ŋakiŋiset ŋauni ebala, “Ikimina iyoŋ ayoŋ a?” Tolimok nai Petero Yesu tema, “Ekapolon, iyeni iyoŋ ŋakiro daadaŋ, iyeni daŋ atemar akamina ayoŋ iyoŋ!” Tolimok nai Yesu Petero tema, “Kiyok ŋamesekin kaŋ.
43021018	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ kire atemar, ŋina iriŋaakar iyoŋ isorokana, ibu iyoŋ kitemonokin, tonyou tolot neni icamit. Nai ŋina imojoŋi, ikeari iyoŋ ŋakan kon, ikitemok icetuŋanan iyoŋ itoriko neni nyicamit iyoŋ alosit.”
43021019	(Alimuni Yesu ŋakiro ŋun kitoodiunia epite ŋolo ebunio Petero atwanare, ido kitopoloo Akuj.) Ani kedau alimun ŋun, tolimok Petero tema, “Kiwuapakinae ayoŋ.”
43021020	Ani eboboŋi Petero, kiŋolik ekasyoman ŋolo amina Yesu iwuapunit ikes; arae ekasyoman ŋol ŋolo edunyit Yesu akoloŋit ŋina emujata ikes akimuj ŋina esidyon ŋina ka ataboŋ, iŋes ŋolo abala, “Ekapolon, ŋae ikilukini iyoŋ?”
43021021	Ani iŋolikini Petero iŋes, kiŋit Yesu tema, “Ani bo ekile lo?”
43021022	Tolimok Yesu Petero tema, “Ani nai kerae acamit kaŋ aesikin iŋes kidoŋ nege tari ŋina aboŋunio ayoŋ, anu ikikamunito iyoŋ? Kiwuapakinae iyoŋ ayoŋ!”
