43021023	Apotu ŋakiro ŋun kielakin lokasyomak daadaŋ ilereete ebe, nyetwani ekasyoman ŋol jik. Nai pa alimokinit Yesu iŋes atemar nyetwani, nai abala Yesu, “Ani nai kerae acamit kaŋ aesikin iŋes kidoŋ nege tari ŋina aboŋunio ayoŋ, anu ikikamunito iyoŋ?”
43021024	Ekasyoman ŋol iŋes erae esuuda a ŋakiro a nu a daadaŋ igirit ŋakiro nu daadaŋ, ka ikiyeni atemar erae ŋuna isuudat iŋes, ŋuna a kire.
43021025	Eyakasi ŋakiro ŋace ŋuna alalak ŋuna abu Yesu kitiya, ŋuna ani kerae kigiritetei daadaŋ a ŋapeipei, atami ayoŋ atemar kemam neni kiwuakina ŋikitaaboi anakwap a daadaŋ.
44001001	Ekapolon Teopilo: Alokitaabo a ŋolo ke ekiŋaren, egirit ayoŋ ŋiticisyo daadaŋ ŋulu abu Yesu kitiya ka ŋakiro ŋuna etatami iŋes apaki ŋina esyakinia etic keŋ,
44001002	akitodol akoloŋit ŋina ayaarere iŋes kidiama nakuj. Ani eriŋa iŋes nyeyaara nakuj, abu kicik Ŋikiyakia keŋ, ŋulu sek aris iŋes keseu alotooma apedor ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan.
44001003	Alotooma ŋirwa ŋatomoniomwon kelunyar atwanare keŋ, totakanu iŋes neni kec alopitesyo a ŋulu alalak a ŋulu etoodiunito kire atemar eyari iŋes; ido tolimok ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj.
44001004	Apeikoloŋit erukito iŋes ka ikes, kicik iŋes ikes tema, “Nyirotokis alo Yerusalem, nai kidarutu ainakinet ŋina abu ayoŋ okolimok iyes – Etau ŋolo Asegan ŋolo ikiikinit iyes Papa kaŋ.
44001005	Anerae ebatisae Yoana a ŋakipi, nai alorwa a ŋidi a ŋulu alokiŋaren, ikibatisao iyes a Etau a ŋolo Asegan.”
44001006	Aŋun, kiŋita ikes iŋes temasi, “A Ekapolon, inyakakini iyoŋ ŋirwa lupei lu apukan lotuŋa a Isirael a?”
44001007	Tolimok Yesu ikes tema, “Etubunit Akuj Papa ŋirwa ka ŋapakio keŋ. Nyerae ŋuna kus ayenut ŋuna itemokinit iŋes anapedor keŋ.
44001008	Nai iryamunete iyes apedor apaki ŋina ebunio Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kus; iruworosi iyes ŋisuudae kaŋ alo Yerusalem, alo Yudaya daadaŋ ka Samaria tari neni isalya akwap.”
44001009	Ani kedau iŋes alimun ŋakiro nu, yaarae iŋes kidiama nakuj iteete ikes; torapuwa edou iŋes nyiŋolikis ikes.
44001010	Ani eriŋa ikes ireorito kidiama eyaaryo iŋes, apotu ŋikilyok ŋiarei towua alodiye kec, enapito ŋilowi ŋulu akwaŋak kya
44001011	temasi, “Ŋikilyok ŋulu alo Galileya, nyo iwuatar iyes kireorito kidiama? Yesu lo ŋolo ayaar nakuj aneni kus, eboŋuni alopite a ŋolopei iŋolikiniata iyes iŋes elosi nakuj.”
44001012	Toboŋosi nai ikes alomoru a ŋikito a ŋulu enyaritae Olipa, toloto Yerusalem. Erae emoru ŋol apeikilomita alotaun.
44001013	Ani kelomut ikes lotaun, toloto todokasi nagule ŋina ayai kidiama, neni eboiyoto ikes; araakasi ikes Petero, Yoana, Yakobo, Anderia, Pilipo ka Tomas, Batolomayo ka Matayo, Yakobo lokoku ka Alipayo, Simoni ŋolo arae Eseletoit ka Yuda lokoku a Yakobo.
44001014	Acunakina ikes daadaŋ kilipeneneete kaapei ka ŋaberu ka Maria daŋ toto a Yesu ta ŋikaitotoi a Yesu.
44001015	Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋidikudyo, tocunakin ŋikanupak ŋulu aapikinito amiat ka ŋatomoniarei. Tosodi Petero tonyou kirworik
44001016	tema, “Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, itemokino Ŋakigireta kiyookin lopite ŋolo koloŋ adwaritor Etau ŋolo Asegan anakituk a Daudi. Adwarit iŋes aŋuna a Yuda, a ŋolo etenuni ŋituŋa ŋulu ekamunete Yesu.
44001017	Arae iŋes epei alokimar yok, anerae etiyat iŋes daŋ etic lo.”
44001018	(Togyel iŋes emanikor a eropit a ŋolo ka aronis a ŋina abu iŋes kitiya. Alomanikor a ŋol, toramakin iŋes, tobwaŋa akook, kiyesunos ŋiboro ŋulu ka akook daadaŋ kiŋa.
44001019	Kiirasi ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aya Yerusalem ŋakiro ŋun, ido tolimokis a aŋajep kec ekiro a emanikor a ŋol “Akel Dama,” iŋes atemar, “Emanikor ŋolo a ŋaokot.” )
44001020	“Anerae igiritae lokitaabo ŋolo a Ŋieosyo ebe: ‘Kipasakin akai keŋ koŋin; nyeloma ituŋanan idio akiboi tooma keŋ.’ Igiritae nabo ebe, ‘Kilunyokin ituŋanan ice lotic keŋ.’
44001021	“Aŋun, itemokino toseunae epei a ŋikilyok a ŋulu ikirukit ka iwon ŋapakio daadaŋ ŋuna ikirukitor iwon ka Ekapolon Yesu,
44001022	ameun apaki ŋina ebatisaa Yoana, akitodol ŋina ayaarere Yesu kidiama aneni yok. Itemokino iŋes oruko ka iwon oruworos ŋisuudae ŋulu ikibala ayaru Yesu alokatwak.”
44001023	Aponi nai tolimunoe ŋikilyok ŋiarei: Yosepu ŋolo anyaritae Barisaba (ŋolo arae ekiro keŋ ece Yusito) ka Matia.
44001024	Tosodo kilipa temasi, “Ekapolon, iyeni iyoŋ etau a ŋinituŋanan, kitoodikinae tokona isua alokilyok a ŋuluarei a lu ŋolo iseu iyoŋ.
44001025	Itemokino iŋes kitiya etic ŋolo ke Ekiyakia, kilunyokin lotic ŋolo aesikini Yuda ŋolo abu tolot neni etemokino iŋes toyai.”
44001026	Kilamilama ikes ŋamoru ŋuna egiritae ŋirorwa, kilo ekiro a Matia; toseunae nai iŋes kimorikinae Lokiyakia ŋulutomon ka epei.
44002001	Ani edoli akoloŋit ŋina a Pentekoste, acunakina ŋikanupak daadaŋ iwapei.
44002002	Tonaŋakin ikes atipei eruye ŋolo esibit ŋolo ke ekuwuam a ŋolo apolon ebuni alokidiama, kiryam tooma akai ŋina aya ikes.
44002003	Kiŋolikis nai ikes ŋiboorei ŋulu ekote ŋakimia ielakin pena neni kec a daadaŋ.
44002004	Kilelebikin Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kec daadaŋ, togeut akirwor ŋaŋajepa ŋuna agelegelya, ikwaŋina ainakinitor Etau ŋolo Asegan ikes akirwor.
44002005	Ayakasi nai nen Ŋiyudayan ŋulu eboiyete alo Yerusalem, ŋulu ainakina neni ka Akuj; aponito ikes alobukui a daadaŋ a ŋulu anakwap.
44002006	Ani iirarete ikes eruye ŋol, tocunun asepic a ŋituŋa ŋina alalan, toumokis ikes daadaŋ, anerae ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kec apupi Ŋikiyakia irworosi aŋajep keŋ.
44002007	Toumokis ikes nooi temasi, “Erae ŋituŋa lu ŋulu irworosi Ŋigalileyan.
44002008	Kaanukiro nai ikipupio iwon ikes irworosi ŋaŋajepa yok?
44002009	Ikiponit iwon anakwapin a nu: alo Parisia, alo Media ka Elam; alo Mesopotamia, Yudaya ka alo Kapadokia, Ponito ka Asia;
44002010	alo Pirigia, Pampilia ka Ijipit ta ŋiwaetin a Libia ŋulu eya diye Kurene. Ikirae iwon ŋice ŋulu alo Roma,
44002011	Ŋiyudayan ka ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋulu ikicamu anupit kec. Ikiponit bo iwon ŋice alo Kirete ka Arabia – nai opupete bo iwon daadaŋ ikes irworosi a ŋaŋajepa yok ŋakiro ŋuna ka aumokin ŋuna etiyak Akuj!”
44002012	Aŋuna ka aumokinit ka ataaŋaŋ kec, kisyakis akiŋitanar make ebasi, “Anukiro nu?”
44002013	Nai tokyenatar ŋice ikes temasi, “Emerasi ŋituŋa lu!”
44002014	Abu Petero towua ka Ŋikiyakia ŋuluce ŋulutomon ka epei, tosodi tocelu tema, “Ŋituŋa ŋulu a Yudeya ka iyes daadaŋ ŋulu iboiyete alo Yerusalem, toyenutu nu ka topupokisi ŋakiro kaŋ kojokan!
44002015	Nyemerasi ŋituŋa lu ikwaŋina itamakinitotor iyes; eriŋa erae ŋisaae ŋiuni ŋulu ka ataparacu.
44002016	Nai erae ŋuna iteete iyes tokona ŋuna erworit ekadwaran Yoel ebala:
44002017	‘Ebala Akuj, etiyakini ayoŋ nu alorwa a ŋulu esidyok; eyakikini ayoŋ Etau kaŋ lotuŋa daadaŋ. Edwarete ŋikusidwe ŋulusapa ka ŋulupesur, eanyunete ŋikusisorok ŋatakanikineta ka irujaete ŋikasikou kus.
44002018	Kire tari ŋiketiyak kaŋ, ŋikilyok ka ŋaberu, eyakikini Etau kaŋ ŋirwa ŋul, ido todwara.
44002019	Etiyakini ayoŋ ŋakujuwuanisya alokidiama ka ŋaumonokineta alokwap: eyakaun ŋaokot ka akim ta apuru ŋina alalan nooi;
44002020	isiryonio akoloŋ cuc, ka itereŋio elap puu kikok ŋaokot, eriŋa nyedolo Akoloŋit ŋina apolon nooi ŋina ke Ekapolon.
44002021	Ido nai ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini enyarit ekiro ŋolo ke Ekapolon, eiunio.’
44002022	Topupokisi ŋakiro nu, iyes ŋituŋa a Isirael! Arae Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret ituŋanan ŋini eyakuunit Akuj. Abu iŋes kiteyenik ŋakiro neni kus alotooma ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta ta ŋakitoodikineta ŋuna abu Akuj kitiya alotooma keŋ. Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek ŋun.
44002023	Aris Akuj anacamit ka anaosou keŋ ka alope ketyaku atemar itemokino ikirikokin iyes Yesu ka toara iŋes, anajalakin ŋituŋa ŋulu asecak ibubukinete iŋes lomusalaba.
44002024	Nai abu Akuj kiteyaru iŋes alokatwak; tolacu iŋes anapipilu a ŋina ka atwanare, anerae pa apedori atwanare akien iŋes.
44002025	Anerae erworit koloŋ Daudi ŋakiro keŋ ebala, ‘Ŋirwa daadaŋ, ete ayoŋ Ekapolon alokiŋaren kaŋ; eyai iŋes nakan kaŋ ŋina aloteten, ikotere nyeryaŋiryaŋakin ayoŋ.
44002026	Aŋun, elelyani ekaatau ka ikipuro iyoŋ etoil kaŋ. Ayeni ayoŋ atemar atwani, nai ayakar ayoŋ akigeno;
44002027	anerae nyikimyekini iyoŋ ayoŋ anakibois a ŋikatwak, kori nyicamakini iyoŋ eketiyan kon ŋoloseuna ebosi.
44002028	Ikitoodik iyoŋ ayoŋ ŋirotin ŋulu elosete nakiyar ka eketelelyani ayoŋ nooi neni ikirukitor ka iyoŋ.’
44002029	“Ŋikaitotoi: itemokino ayoŋ ekesileerek iyes ŋakiro ŋuna a papaa yok a Daudi. Abu iŋes totwan ka aponi tonukae, ido eyai alyal keŋ tari tokona ne neni ikiya iwon.
44002030	Ayeni Daudi atemar, aris Akuj kikoŋ atemar eturuwori lopapait keŋ epei erwosit, kilunyokin lokicoloŋ keŋ.
44002031	Aŋuna araakar Daudi ekadwaran, toyenu ŋuna alosi Akuj akitiyakin alorwa a ŋulu alokiŋaren, kirwor ŋuna ka ayarun a Kristo tema, ‘Nyimyekina Akuj iŋes anakibois a ŋikatwak, nyebosa akuwan keŋ analyal.’
44002032	Eteyaru Akuj Yesu ŋolopei ŋol alokatwak ka ikirae isua daadaŋ ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a ŋun.
44002033	Adau Akuj Papa akitopoloor iŋes, ewuak lowae keŋ ŋolo aloteten ka ainakin iŋes Etau ŋolo Asegan ikwaŋina aris kiikinere; ido ŋuna iteete iyes ka topupete tokona, erae ainakinet ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan a ŋolo ikibukok Yesu isua.
44002034	Anerae nyeloto Daudi nakuj, nai abu tema, ‘Atema Ekapolon neni ke Ekapolon kaŋ, kiboikin teten kaŋ,
44002035	akitodol neni ewuakinia ayoŋ ŋimoi kon kwap ŋakejen kon.’
44002036	Aŋun, itemokino tokona ŋituŋa a Isirael daadaŋ toyenut atemar, Yesu ŋolo ibubukinete iyes lomusalaba, iŋes abu Akuj kituruwo Ekapolon ka Kristo!”
44002037	Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋun, tonomosi ŋakiro ŋitai kec, tosodo kiŋita Petero ka Ŋikiyakia ŋuluce temasi, “A ŋikaitotoi, ikikokini tokona isua ai?”
44002038	Tolimok Petero ikes tema, “Tokiwa ŋasecisya kus, kibatisae ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kus alokiro a Yesu Kristo, ikotere isyoniyo ŋasecisya; ido toryamut ainakinet ŋina ka Akuj – Etau ŋolo Asegan.
44002039	Anerae arae akiikinet ka Akuj ŋina kus ka ŋikusidwe ta neni a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ a ŋulu elwaka a ŋulu enyaraunit Ekapolon yok Akuj neni keŋ.”
44002040	Kiteyenik Petero ikes ŋakiro ŋuna alalak, kisimukek tema, “Toiunos anakisicanio a ŋina eryamunete ŋituŋa ŋulu aronok ŋulu ka anyamet a na!”
44002041	Tonupa ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋakiro keŋ kibatisae, ido kiyatakin lokanupak ŋituŋa ŋulu adolito ŋalipyo ŋauni akoloŋit ŋin.
44002042	Torubakis ikes daadaŋ epupete ŋakiro ŋuna etatamete Ŋikiyakia, togeut ikes alosenen natukot ŋina a ŋikanupak akimuj kaapei ka akinumunum Akimuj ŋina ke Ekapolon ta akilipenen.
44002043	Etiyasi ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta ŋuna alalak aneni a Ŋikiyakia, toumokis nai ŋituŋa daadaŋ a ŋun.
44002044	Torubakis ŋikanupak daadaŋ erukito ka emorete ŋiboro kec.
44002045	Agyelanarete ikes ebari ka ŋiboro kec, tokorakis ŋisiliŋa neni a ŋinituŋanan lopite ŋolo eitanitor iŋes.
44002046	A ŋinakoloŋit, apotu ikes torubakis iryamunun kaapei Kai ka Akuj, akimuj kaapei ka akinumunum Akimuj ŋina ke Ekapolon alorerya kec. Amorete ikes akimuj ka alelyan ka arimao;
44002047	epurosi ikes Akuj ka tominakinito ŋituŋa daadaŋ ikes. A ŋinakoloŋit, eyatanakini Ekapolon natukot kec ŋulu aiununuyo.
44003001	Apeikoloŋit, toloto Petero ka Yoana Kai ka Akuj ŋisaae ŋikanikaomwon ŋulu ka apaaran ŋulu elipeneneere.
44003002	Ayai lopuke ŋolo anyaritae “Epuke ŋolo Ebusan” ŋolo ka Akai ka Akuj, ekile ŋolo aŋwalit ŋinapei anakidounet. A ŋinakoloŋit, adakanaryo iŋes lopuke ŋol akilipanar ŋainakineta alotuŋa a ŋulu alomanarete Kai ka Akuj.
44003003	Ani iŋolikini iŋes Petero ka Yoana eapikinit alomar Kai ka Akuj, kiŋit iŋes ikes daŋ ainakinet.
44003004	Kitekis Petero ka Yoana iŋes, tolimu Petero tema, “Kiŋolikinae isua!”
44003005	Kitek nai iŋes ikes ebala kori eyai idiobore aryamuni aneni kec.
44003006	Nai tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Emam ŋisiliŋa ayakar ayoŋ, nai akainakini ayoŋ iyoŋ ibore ŋini ayakar; alokiro a Yesu Kristo a ŋolo a Nasaret, abala ayoŋ iyoŋ, torotok!”
44003007	Kikamu Petero iŋes akan ŋina aloteten, kitonyou, towo. Togogoŋioto atipei ŋakejen ka ŋitobolae keŋ;
44003008	toporu iŋes kidiama towo, ido torotok tolomasi ka ikes Kai ka Akuj, epori ka ipuro Akuj.
44003009	Kiŋolikis ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aya nen iŋes elosi ka ipuro Akuj.
44003010	Ani eyenunete ikes atemar erae iŋes ekile ŋolo sek elipanar “Alopuke a ŋolo Ebusan” a ŋolo ka Akai ka Akuj, tobul ikes daadaŋ, toumokis a ŋakiro a ŋuna kepotu kitiyakinos neni keŋ.
44003011	Ani eriŋa ekile ŋol imiidikina neni a Petero ka Yoana aneni anyaritae Ebarasan a Solomon, toumokis ŋituŋa daadaŋ, tomotunos neni aya ikes.
44003012	Ani iŋolikini Petero ŋun, tolimok ikes tema, “A ŋituŋa a Isirael, nyo ikituumokinitotor iyes ŋun? Nyo ikiteoto iyes isua esibit erae apedor na ŋina kosi, kori esibit erae aŋuna ekeritere isua Akuj iŋes ikitorotokinio isua ekile lo?
44003013	Akuj ŋina atapapaa yok ŋina ka Aburaam, Isaka ka Yakobo, iŋes ainaki eketiyan keŋ Yesu apolou ŋina ka Akuj. Ipotu iyes kipotokis Yesu ŋolopei ŋol neni a ŋikepukak ka toŋero iŋes alokiŋaren Pilato, tari daŋ ketubu Pilato atemar itemokino iŋes tolacakinae.
44003014	Arae iŋes ŋolo ka Akuj ka eyookino, nai ipotu iyes toŋero ka kiŋita Pilato alacakin ekaaran.
44003015	Ido toara ekainakinan akiyar ŋolo abu Akuj kiteyaru alokatwak. Ikirae isua ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a ŋun.
44003016	Aŋuna ka anupit ekiro a Yesu, aponi kitaŋaleunoe ekile lo ŋolo iteete ka ŋolo iyenete iyes. Anupit Yesu iŋes ainaki ekile lo aŋaleun kire ikwaŋina iteoto iyes daadaŋ.
44003017	“Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, ayeni ayoŋ tokona atemar pa iyenete iyes ka ŋikepukak kus ŋuna ipotu iyes kitiyata.
44003018	Tari kikote neni daŋ, alimunit Akuj koloŋ alorwor a ŋikadwarak a daadaŋ atemar etemokino kisicanae Kristo keŋ ka esiyook Akuj ŋun alorot a lo.
44003019	Tokiwa nai, kibelekinos neni ka Akuj, ikotere ikisari iŋes ŋasecisya kus. Kitiyata ŋun, ikotere epote aneni ke Ekapolon ŋarwa ŋuna itogogoŋere ŋitai kus.
44003020	Iyakuuni nai iŋes Yesu, ŋolo erae Kristo, ŋolo aseu iŋes aŋuna kus.
44003021	Itemokino Kristo kiboi anakuj akitodol apaki ŋina ituruworya Akuj ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋikitet, lopite ŋolo koloŋ alimunitor iŋes alorwor a ŋikadwarak keŋ a ŋulu asegak.
44003022	Alimunit Moses ebe, ‘Akuj Ekapolon kus iŋes iyakuuni ekadwaran aŋuna kus, lopite ŋolo ekeyakuunia ayoŋ, elomuni iŋes alotuŋa kus pei. Itemokino iyes kiwuapa ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ikilimokini iŋes iyes.
44003023	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini nyiwuapi ŋakiro ŋuna irworo ekadwaran ŋol, etyakaryo alotuŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj, kinyasunae.’
44003024	Kire, ŋikadwarak daadaŋ ŋulu erwor ameun aneni a Samuel adwara ŋuna a ŋirwa a lu.
44003025	Erae ŋuna kus ŋakiikineta ŋuna ka Akuj ŋuna ekobunete ŋikadwarak keŋ ka imarakina iyes Nacamunet keŋ ikwaŋina alimokinia iŋes Aburaam ebe, ‘Eterereŋi ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap daadaŋ aŋuna a ŋiletok kon.’
44003026	Aŋun, abu Akuj toseu eketiyan keŋ, kiyaku mono neni kus akiterereŋ iyes; kibelekinos iyes daadaŋ alopitesyo kus a ŋulu aronok.”
44004001	Ani eriŋa Petero ka Yoana isirworete ŋituŋa, todolut ŋisacaradotin ka ekapolokiniton ŋiketeok ŋulu ka Akai ka Akuj ta Ŋisadukayon.
44004002	Aŋoito ikes, anerae etatamete ka eseraete Ŋikiyakia ŋuluarei ŋul ŋakiro ŋuna ka ayarun alokatwak aŋuna abaakatar ayaru Yesu.
44004003	Kikamunae nai ikes, togolokinoe mabus akitodol taparacu, anerae abu towar.
44004004	Nai apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak, ŋulu apotu kiirasi ŋakiro a Ŋikiyakia tonupa; toapik ekimar a ŋikilyok ŋalipyo ŋakan.
44004005	Ani iwalari, potu ŋikepukak ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan ka ŋikatukok ta ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila tocunakinos Yerusalem.
44004006	Kiryamiryama ikes ka Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋolo anyaritae Anas ka Kaipa, Yoana, Alekisanda ta ŋice ŋulu arae ŋiyeneta ŋulu ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi.
44004007	Kitowua ikes Ŋikiyakia alokiŋaren Atukot kec, kiŋita temasi, “Ikokinete iyes itiyaete ŋakiro ŋun ai? Apedor ani iyakatar iyes, kori ekiro a ŋae itiyaata iyes ŋakiro ŋun ?”
44004008	Toboŋok Petero ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan ikes tema, “Ŋikepukak ŋulu a ŋituŋa ka ŋikatukok!
44004009	Ani kikiŋisitae isua nakoloŋit na ŋakiro ŋuna ajokak ŋuna etiyakin neni ke ekaŋwalan ka epite ŋolo etaŋaleunere iŋes,
44004010	itemokino nai iyes daadaŋ ka ŋituŋa ŋulu a Isirael daadaŋ toyenut atemar, ewuoi ekile lo alokiŋaren kus eŋale nooi aŋuna ka apedor a ŋina ke ekiro a Yesu a ŋolo a Nasaret. Yesu ŋol, iŋes ŋolo ipotu iyes kibubukis lomusalaba, nai abu Akuj kiteyaru.
44004011	Erae Yesu igiritae ŋakiro keŋ Nakigireta atemar, ‘Amoru ŋina koloŋ ipotu iyes ŋikadukok toŋero, iŋes tokona itogogoŋit akai alokoona.’
44004012	Emam aiuno aneni a ice a daadaŋ, anerae emam ekiro ece anakwap a daadaŋ ŋolo einit Akuj ŋituŋa, ŋolo epedoryata ŋituŋa aiunor.”
44004013	Toumok Atukot iŋolikini atitinyu a Petero ka Yoana, a ŋulu tari pa asyomito ka torae ŋikoŋinae ka toyenut daŋ atemar arae ikes ŋirukitos a Yesu.
44004014	Nai ani iŋolikinete ikes ekile ŋolo etaŋaleunio erukito ka Ŋikiyakia, todaun ŋuna elimunete.
44004015	Aŋun, kitolomarae ikes a Natukot, kidoŋo ikes atuko make.
44004016	Kiŋitas ikes make temasi, “Ikikokini iwon ŋikilyok lu ai? Eyenete ŋituŋa daadaŋ alo Yerusalem atemar etiyata ikes akujuwuanut ileere ka nyikipedori iwon akipeg ŋun.
44004017	Nai ani pa kikicamit ibore en kielakin lotuŋa, ecika ŋikilyok lu nyisirwor ikes nabo jik idiotuŋanan alokiro a Yesu.”
44004018	Aŋun, tonyaraut nai ikes Petero ka Yoana Natukot, kicika ikes atemar nyirworo kori nyitatama nabo jik alokiro a Yesu.
44004019	Nai toboŋokis Petero ka Yoana temasi, “Totubutu iyes ŋilopeyek ŋuna iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj – akiwuap ŋakiro kus kori ŋuna ka Akuj.
44004020	Anerae nyeesikinio isua erwor ŋuna ikiŋolik ka ikiira.”
44004021	Tosodi Atukot kicik ikes nabo nooi, kimyek nai ikes toloto. Todaun Atukot epite ŋolokisicanet ikes, aŋuna epurotor ŋituŋa daadaŋ Akuj, ikotere ŋakiro ŋuna apotu kitiyakinos;
44004022	anerae aŋwalit ameun anakidouno ekile ŋolo etiyakinio akujuwuanut ŋina ka aŋaleun neni keŋ ka adeparito ŋikaru keŋ ŋatomoniomwon.
44004023	Ŋinapei alakakinere Petero ka Yoana, toboŋosi ikes neni aya ŋikanupak a Kristo ŋuluce, tolimokis ikes ŋakiro ŋuna alimokinete ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok ikes.
44004024	Ani iirarete ikes ŋakiro ŋun, kikeut daadaŋ ŋitoilon kec kaapei, kilipa neni ka Akuj temasi, “Ekapolon ka ekasuban nakuj, akwap ka anam ta ŋinibore eyai tooma kec daadaŋ!
44004025	Ibu iyoŋ koloŋ alotooma Etau kon kirwor anakituk ke eketiyan kon a papaa kosi Daudi itema, ‘Kaanukiro elemaritotor ŋibukui ŋulu ka akwap? Kaanukiro etukyoto ŋituŋa akitiya ŋakiro ŋuna koŋinae?
44004026	Acunakinosi ŋirwosi ŋulu ka akwap ka ŋikepukak iwapei akitepeg Ekapolon Akuj ka ŋoloseuna keŋ.’
44004027	Anerae kire alotaun a lo, apotu Erode ka Ponitio Pilato ka ŋibukui ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan ta ŋituŋa ŋulu a Isirael kitepega Yesu, eketiyan kon ŋolo asegan ŋolo ibu iyoŋ kituruwo Messia.
44004028	Apotu ikes tocunakinos akitiya ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna koloŋ itubuni iyoŋ ka apedor ka acamit kon atemar itiyakin.
44004029	Tokona Ekapolon, kiŋolik epite ŋolo ikitukuryaniata ikes isua. Kitepedoroe isua ŋiketiyak kon akirwor ŋakiro kon ka atitinyu a daadaŋ.
44004030	Torwaa akonikan, kitaŋaleu ŋituŋa ka kitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta alokiro ke eketiyan kon Yesu a ŋolo asegan.”
44004031	Ani irikakinete ikes akilip, tomaranik akibois ŋina elipyata ikes, kilelebikin ikes daadaŋ Etau ŋolo Asegan, kiserata ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ka atitinyu.
44004032	Arae atukot ŋina a ŋikanupak ŋina atami ka anupit ŋakiro ŋapei. Amam tari idio ŋini abala arae ŋiboro keŋ ŋulu keŋ ke elope, nai amorete ikes ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu ayakatar.
44004033	Kiteyenut Ŋikiyakia ka apedor a ŋina apolon ŋakiro ŋuna ka ayarun ke Ekapolon Yesu, ido kiterereŋ Akuj ikes daadaŋ nooi.
44004034	Amam alokidiŋ kec ituŋanan ŋini acanaana, anerae ŋulu ayakatar ŋamanat kori ŋakais, apotu togyelanasi yaut ŋisiliŋa ŋulu agyelanarere,
44004035	inakis Ŋikiyakia; tosodi tokorakinae ŋinituŋanan lopite ŋolo ayakar akiitanit keŋ.
44004036	Ayai daŋ ekile ŋolo anyaritae Yosepu ŋolo anateker a Lepi ŋolo edounitoe alo Kupuro. Anyarito Ŋikiyakia iŋes Baranaba (iŋes atemar “Ŋolo esimukekinan”)
44004037	Togyela iŋes emanikor keŋ, yau ŋisiliŋa inak Ŋikiyakia.
44005001	Ayai ekile ŋolo anyaritae Anania ka aberu keŋ Sapira. Togyelasi ikes daŋ emanikor kec ece,
44005002	nai abu Anania kiŋadaiya ŋisiliŋa ŋice, toyeni aberu keŋ daŋ; tosodi inak ŋuluce neni a Ŋikiyakia.
44005003	Nai tolimok Petero Anania tema, “Anania, kaanukiro imyekinia iyoŋ Satan ilelebikin lotau kon, ido tomodik iyoŋ Etau ŋolo Asegan, aŋuna iwuaya ŋisiliŋa ŋice ŋulu igyelarya iyoŋ emanikor?
44005004	Ani eriŋa iyoŋ nyegyelara emanikor ŋol, arae ŋolo kon; nabo ani kigyela, arae ŋisiliŋa ŋulu kon. Kaanukiro nai itubunio iyoŋ akitiya ŋakiro ŋuna ikote ŋun? Nyerae ŋituŋa imodikinit iyoŋ, nai erae Akuj!”
44005005	Ani iirari Anania ŋakiro ŋun, topokor, totwan. Tobul ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu eirarete ŋakiro ŋun.
44005006	Potu ŋisorok kimuko akuwan keŋ, yaasi kiŋa, tonuka.
44005007	Ani elunyar ŋisaae ŋulu aapiyarito ŋiuni, tolomu aberu ka Anania nen pa eyeni ŋakiro ŋuna kepotu kitiyakin.
44005008	Tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Tolimokinae ayoŋ, kerae lu ŋisiliŋa daadaŋ ŋulu iryamunete iyoŋ ka lokile kon igyelarete emanikor.” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ee, daadaŋ lu.”
44005009	Tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Kaanukiro iponiata iyoŋ ka lokile kon tocamut akikatakin Etau ŋolo ke Ekapolon? Topupok! Ipupi iyoŋ ŋakejen alopuke a? Erae ŋuna a ŋisorok a ŋulu sek alosito akinuk lokile kon, ikidakarete ikes iyoŋ daŋ kiŋa.”
44005010	Atipei, topokor Sapira alokiŋaren Petero, totwan alodiyete ŋakejen keŋ. Ani elomunete ŋisorok toryamut iŋes ketwana, yaasi kiŋa, tonuka diyete ekile keŋ.
44005011	Tobul nooi atukot a Ŋikristo ka ŋuluce daadaŋ ŋulu apotu kiirasi ŋakiro ŋun.
44005012	Apotu Ŋikiyakia kitiyata ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta ŋuna alalak alotuŋa. Acunanakin ŋikanupak daadaŋ Kai ka Akuj, tooma Ebarasan a Solomon.
44005013	Emam ituŋanan ŋini pa arae ekanupan ŋini abu toŋirik arukit ka ikes, nai etopoloorito ŋituŋa ikes.
44005014	Apotu ŋaberu ka ŋikilyok ŋulu alalak tonupa Ekapolon, kiyatakinos lokanupak.
44005015	Aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna etiyaete Ŋikiyakia, apotu ŋituŋa yaut ŋikadyakak lorotin, kiperikis lokitaadae ka lojamu, ikotere ani itori Petero nen, min etorube keŋ neni a ŋice kec.
44005016	Tosutut ŋituŋa alotaunio a ŋulu edunyasi ka Yerusalem daŋ, yaut ikes ŋikadyakak ka ŋulu ekamunito ŋipyan, kitaŋaleunoe daadaŋ.
44005017	Min arakao nooi aŋuna a Ŋikiyakia neni ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi ka ŋirukitos keŋ ŋulu arae ŋulu ka atukot a ŋina a Ŋisadukayon.
44005018	Ido apotu ikes kikamut Ŋikiyakia, kiwuakis ikes mabus iteete ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
44005019	Nai ani nakwaare, toŋaa emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon ŋikekya ŋulu a mabus, ido yau ikes kiŋa, tolimok ikes tema,
44005020	“Toloto Kai ka Akuj, tolimokis ŋituŋa ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ka akiyar a ŋina kitete a na, a ŋina ayau Yesu.”
44005021	Kitiyata Ŋikiyakia ikwaŋina alimokinitere: ani taparacu eriŋa elilim, tolomasi Kai ka Akuj, kisyakis akitatam ŋituŋa. Ani edolunete Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ka ŋirukitos keŋ, tonyaraut Atukot ka ŋikatukok daadaŋ ŋulu a Isirael iwapei. Kiyakiyasi nai ikes ŋisigarya mabus ayaun Ŋikiyakia.
44005022	Nai ani edolete ŋisigarya, torukaut Ŋikiyakia emameete alomabus. Toboŋosi ikes, tolimokis Atukot
44005023	temasi, “Aponi isua toryamunae ejera egolol ejok ka ŋisigarya ŋulu eteok ewuasi alokekya. Nai ani eŋaaryo isua, toryamunae emam ituŋanan ayai tooma!”
44005024	Ani iirarete ekapolokiniton ŋiketeok ŋulu ka Akai ka Akuj ka ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ŋakiro nu, totaaŋaŋa ikes nooi temasi, “Anu ta etakanunete aŋuna a ŋakiro a nu?”
44005025	Bu nabo ituŋanan ice, tolimok ikes tema, “Topupokisi! Ŋikilyok ŋulu iwuakinito iyes mabus, eya tokona Kai ka Akuj itatamete ŋituŋa!”
44005026	Toloto ekapolokiniton ŋol ka ŋiketeok ŋulu ka Akai ka Akuj arikun Ŋikiyakia alo Kai ka Akuj. Nai nyikamut ikes Ŋikiyakia ka agogoŋu, anerae akerito atemar kori ikimasete ŋituŋa ikes a ŋamoru.
44005027	Ani keyaut ikes Ŋikiyakia, kitowua alokiŋaren Atukot. Tolimok Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ikes tema,
44005028	“Ikicikit paaran isua iyes nooi atemar, toesikisi akitatam alokiro a lo, nai isiryam iyes ŋakiro ŋuna itatamete Yerusalem daadaŋ ka icamito daŋ areeun atemar pena ŋaokot keŋ nakyes kosi!”
44005029	Nai toboŋokis Petero ka Ŋikiyakia temasi, “Itemokino isua opupete Akuj akilo ŋituŋa.
44005030	Abu Akuj atapapaa yok kiteyaru Yesu, ŋolo ipotu iyes kibubukis lomusalaba, toara.
44005031	Kitopoloo Akuj iŋes, kisiboik lowae ŋolo aloteten keŋ toruwor Ekarikon ka Ekaiunan, ikotere Ŋisirael epedorete akiki, kisyoni Akuj ŋasecisya kec.
44005032	Ikirae isua ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a ŋun – isua ka Etau ŋolo Asegan, ŋolo einakinit Akuj neni a ŋulu iwuapito ŋakiro keŋ.”
44005033	Ani iirari Atukot ŋakiro ŋun, toŋo nooi, kiitan akiar ikes.
44005034	Nai tonyou Eparisayot epei a Natukot ŋolo anyaritae Gamaliel. Arae iŋes eketataman a Ŋikisila, ŋolo etopoloorito ŋituŋa daadaŋ. Abu tolimok ŋituŋa ayaar Ŋikiyakia kiŋa adiouriyen;
44005035	ido kisirwor ŋituŋa tema, “Ŋituŋa a Isirael, tocoito mono iyes ŋuna icamito akitiyakin lokilyok lu.
44005036	Anerae ŋikaru ŋidi ŋulu alunyar, abu Teudas bu itusubuna idiotuŋanan, kiwuapakis iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu aapikinit ekimar ŋamiae ŋaomwon. Nai aponi toarae iŋes kielaros ŋikewuapak keŋ, tosalut ŋuna etya neni.
44005037	Ekaku keŋ, bu Yuda ŋolo arae Egalilayat ŋirwa ŋulu emarere ŋituŋa, kiwuapakis ŋituŋa ŋice iŋes. Nai aponi toarae iŋes daŋ ka kielarae ŋikewuapak keŋ daadaŋ.
44005038	Aŋun, anakiro a ŋuna a tokona a nu, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar, kimyekisi ŋikilyok lu make! Toesikisi ikes toloto! Ani kerae lotuŋa eponitotor ŋuna elosikinito kori itiyaete ikes, esalunete.
44005039	Nai ani kerae neni ka Akuj eponitotor, nyipedorete iyes akiretakin ikes, acepaki iryamunete atemar itepegete iyes Akuj.” Tocamu Atukot ŋakiro a Gamaliel.
44005040	Tonyaraut nai ikes Ŋikiyakia tooma, kibuŋata, ido kicikakis nyirwor nabo alokiro a Yesu, tolakakis ikes toloto.
44005041	Tolomasi Ŋikiyakia a Natukot elakara nooi, anerae atamete ikes atemar amaikina ikes aryamun ŋican aŋuna ke ekiro a Yesu.
44005042	Torubakis Ŋikiyakia a ŋinakoloŋit itatamete ka elimonorete alo Kai ka Akuj ka alorerya atemar Yesu erae Kristo.
44006001	Alorwa a ŋulu eyatakinor ekimar ŋolo a ŋikasyomak a Yesu, kiŋuruŋurakinos Ŋiyudayan ŋulu erworosi Ŋagirik neni a Ŋiyudayan a ŋulu erworosi Ŋaburaniyae. Abasi ŋulu erworosi Ŋagirik ebe nyemitakinitae ŋapuseru kec a ŋinakoloŋit apaki ŋina ekorere akimuj.
44006002	Tonyaraut Ŋikiyakia ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei ŋikasyomak daadaŋ temasi, “Nyitemokino isua oesikisi akitatam ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, ido olomakisi akikor akimuj.
44006003	Aŋun ŋikaitotoi, toseutu alokidiŋ kus ŋikilyok ŋikanikaarei ŋulu ajokak, ŋulu ileleba Etau ŋolo Asegan ka aosou, ŋulu itemokino oinakisi etic lo.
44006004	Nai ericakisi isua akilip ka etic ŋolo ka akitatam ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.”
44006005	Tocamu asepic daadaŋ akirot na. Toseut ikes Stepano, ekile ŋolo ayai anupit nooi, ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan. Toseut nabo Pilipo, Prokoro, Nikanor, Timon, Parmena ka Nikolao ŋolo anakwap a ŋina ka Antiokio, ŋolo aris kibelekin toruwor ŋolo alodin a Ŋiyudayan.
44006006	Yaasi ŋituŋa ikes neni a Ŋikiyakia, kilipakis Ŋikiyakia ikes ka kidokokis ŋakan nakyes akiterereŋ ikes.
44006007	Kielakin nai akirot ka Akuj nen, kiyatakin nooi ekimar a ŋikasyomak alo Yerusalem. Apotu daŋ ŋisacaradotin ŋulu alalak kiwuapa Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, tonupa Yesu.
44006008	Kitiya Stepano, ŋolo ainakinit Akuj ajokis ka apedor, ŋaumonokineta ka ŋakujuwuanisya alotuŋa.
44006009	Nai kitepega ŋituŋa ŋice iŋes. Arae ikes ŋituŋa ŋulu ke esinagoga a ŋolo enyaritae, “Ŋituŋa ŋulu Elacakina”. Arukito ikes ka ŋulu alo Kurene, Alekisandaria, Cilicia ka Asia.
44006010	Nai inak Etau ŋolo Asegan Stepano aosou ŋina pa apedoryata ikes akitepeg, kilouniata iŋes.
44006011	Kicocoa nai ikes anakimunono ŋikilyok ŋice alimun atemar, “Ikiira isua Stepano irworo ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋiyany neni a Moses ka neni ka Akuj!”
44006012	Kisiguryakis ikes ŋituŋa, ŋikatukok ka ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila, toporokis iŋes yaasi neni ka Atukot.
44006013	Yaut ŋisuudae ŋulu esudete ŋakiro ŋulu abasi, “Nyieŋununui ekile lo erwor ŋuna aronok Kai ka Akuj na ŋina asegan ka Lokisila ŋulu ka Akuj;
44006014	anerae ikiira isua iŋes ebala ebe inyasuni Yesu lo ŋolo a Nasaret Akai ka Akuj ka kijulak ŋitalyo ŋulu abu Moses ikiinak iwon!”
44006015	Kitekis ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu ka Atukot Stepano, kiŋolikis ereet keŋ ecai ikwa ŋolo ke emalaika.
44007001	Kiŋit nai Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi Stepano tema, “Iyookino ŋakiro ŋuna ikisitakinitere iyoŋ nu a ?”
44007002	Toboŋok Stepano tema, “Ŋikaitotoi ka atapapa, topupokisi ŋakiro kaŋ! Abu koloŋ Akuj ŋina ka apolou totakanu neni a papaa yok Aburaam alo Mesopotamia, eriŋa iŋes nyewuoto Aran.
44007003	Tolimok Akuj iŋes tema, ‘Towot anakwap kon ka alotuŋa kon, tolot nakwap ŋina eketoodikini ayoŋ iyoŋ.’
44007004	Abu nai iŋes towot anakwap a Ŋibabiloniyae, tolot Aran. Ani ketwana papa keŋ, abu Akuj yau Aburaam nakwap ŋina tokona iboiyoto iyes na.
44007005	Tari kikote neni, abu Akuj apaki ŋin nyeinak iŋes tari atutubet adio ŋina ka akwap a na; nai kiik iŋes ka ŋiletok keŋ akwap na, tari eriŋa iŋes nyeuruuna idiokoku.
44007006	Kirwor Akuj neni keŋ alopite a lo tema, ‘Erikoryo ŋiletok kon nakwap ŋina gela, neni eruworotor ŋipi, kisicanae nooi ŋikaru ŋamiae ŋaomwon.
44007007	Nai esicani ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a ŋina eruworotor ikes ŋipi. Ani ekaku, elomunete ikes anakwap a ŋin, potu kilipa neni kaŋ a ne.’
44007008	Abu Akuj inak Aburaam Acamunet ŋina arae emacar keŋ akileŋer. Toruwor nai Aburaam papa a Isaka, kileŋer iŋes Isaka kelunyar esabit epei. Ekaku, toruwor Isaka papa a Yakobo, ido touru Yakobo atapapaa yok ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei.
44007009	“Torakaakyata atapapaa yok, togyelasi Yosepu Ijipit aruwor epito. Nai arukito Akuj ka Yosepu,
44007010	toiu Akuj iŋes alocan a daadaŋ. Inak Akuj iŋes aosou, ido tominak Parao ekepukan a Ijipit iŋes, kituruwo ekapolon ŋolo ka akwap ka ŋirerya keŋ daadaŋ.
44007011	Bu nai eron Ijipit daadaŋ ka Kanaan, toryamut ŋituŋa ŋican nooi, toŋopik atapapaa yok akimuj.
44007012	Nai ani iirari Yakobo atemar ayai akimuj Ijipit, kiyakiya iŋes ŋidwe keŋ – atapapaa yok akiyakiyaret ŋina ke ekiŋaren.
44007013	Ani iyakiyaryo ikes akiyakiyaret ŋina a ŋaarei, kiteyenun Yosepu neni a ŋikaitotoi keŋ ka kiteyenun ateker a Yosepu neni a Parao.
44007014	Ekaku, kitowotu Yosepu papa keŋ ka ekal keŋ daadaŋ. Arae ekimar kec ŋatomonikanikaarei ka ŋikan.
44007015	Tolot nai Yakobo Ijipit, neni eboiyoto iŋes ka atapapaa yok akitodol ŋina ekarya ikes.
44007016	Yaarae ŋawat kec kinyakarae Sekem, kiperikinoe naturukan ŋina koloŋ kegyeli Aburaam alodwe ka Amor a ŋisiliŋa.
44007017	“Ani eapuuni apaki ŋinakisiyookinet akiikinet ŋina eikinit Akuj Aburaam, kiyatakin ekimar ŋolo a ŋituŋa yok alo Ijipit, tolalata nooi.
44007018	Ekaku, min lokicoloŋ ekepukan ece ŋolo abu kipuka Ijipit. Pa ayeni ekepukan ŋol Yosepu.
44007019	Abu iŋes tomodik ateker yok, kitiŋak atapapaa yok acakanar ŋidwe kec ŋulu cicik nariet ikotere etwakyata.
44007020	Alorwa a ŋul, aponi kidounoe Moses, ebus iŋes nooi alokiŋaren Akuj; aponi kitanakae iŋes ŋilapyo ŋiuni alore a papa keŋ.
44007021	Ani eayo iŋes nariet akiwua, toryamu nakoku a Parao iŋes, ido kitopolou erae lokoku keŋ.
44007022	Kitatamae Moses ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ka aosou a ŋina ka akwap a Ijipit, togogoŋior iŋes alorwor ka aloticisyo keŋ.
44007023	“Ani edolete ŋikaru a Moses ŋatomoniomwon, kiitan iŋes aanyun ŋituŋa keŋ Ŋisirael.
44007024	“Ani elosi iŋes, kiŋolik Ejipitanoit epei ebolyar Esiraelit. Toik Moses Esiraelit, toar Ejipitanoit.
44007025	Atami Moses atemar kori eyenete ŋituŋa keŋ atemar esitiyae Akuj iŋes aiun ikes, nai apotu ikes nyeyenut.
44007026	Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, toryamu Moses Ŋisirael ŋiarei ejiete. Kikatak iŋes akisisil ikes ebala, ‘Ŋikilyok, iraakasi iyes ŋikaitotoi, kaanukiro icamitotor iyes awana make?’
44007027	Nai abu ekile ŋolo etiji ŋoloce kijuka Moses nawae tema, ‘Ŋae ikituruwori iyoŋ ekosikepukan ka ekatubon ŋakiro kosi?
44007028	Icamit iyoŋ akiar ayoŋ daŋ lopite ŋolo bien iarya iyoŋ Ejipitanoit a?’
44007029	Ani iirari Moses ŋakiro ŋun, tosi todoki nakwap a Median, neni abunio iŋes kiboiyo, touruunia ŋisapa ŋiarei.
44007030	“Tolunyaros nabo ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon. Totakanu emalaika neni keŋ anamoni a ŋina anoki analoŋisat a ŋina ke emoru Sinai.
44007031	Ani iŋolikini Moses arira, toumok, ido tolot akiŋolikin. Toapiya iŋes, kiira etoil ŋolo ke Ekapolon ebala,
44007032	‘Ayoŋ Akuj atapapaa kon, Akuj ka Aburaam ka Isaka ta Yakobo.’ Tobul Moses tomaranik, kijuuru pa ecamit akiŋolikin.
44007033	Tolimok nai Ekapolon iŋes tema, ‘Tolaca ŋamuk kon, anerae eseg akibois ŋina iwuaar iyoŋ.
44007034	Eŋolik ayoŋ kire epite ŋolo iteryamunitere ŋituŋa kaŋ ŋican alo Ijipit. Eira ayoŋ akigworo kec ka abu ayoŋ aiun ikes. Kiira tokona, ekeyakiyari ayoŋ iyoŋ Ijipit.’
44007035	“Arae lo Moses ŋolopei apotu Ŋisirael toŋero apaki ŋina aponiata tolimokis iŋes temasi, ‘Ŋae ikituruwori iyoŋ ekepukan ka ekatubon ŋakiro kosi?’ Iŋes pei abu Akuj alope kiyakiya neni kec aruwor ekepukan ka ekalakunan kec, alorwor a emalaika a ŋolo atakanikinit iŋes anamoni.
44007036	Abu Moses kiten Ŋisirael, kitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta alo Ijipit ka ananam a ŋina enyaritae Anam ŋina Areŋan ta analoŋisat ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon.
44007037	Arae lo Moses ŋolo alimokini Ŋisirael tema, ‘Iyakuuni Akuj neni kus ekadwaran ŋolo ikoni ayoŋ, ebuni iŋes alokidiŋ kus pei.’
44007038	Arukito iŋes ka asepic ŋina a Ŋisirael, ŋina acunakina naloŋisat. Abu iŋes kirworo ka atapapaa yok ka emalaika daŋ ŋolo erworotor iŋes alomoru Sinai, aneni ejaunia iŋes Ŋakiciketa ŋuna eteyarak, ikikobak iwon.
44007039	“Nai apotu atapapaa yok towout akiwuap ŋakiro keŋ. Toŋero ikes iŋes, kiitana aboŋor Ijipit.
44007040	Tolimokis ikes Aron temasi, ‘Kitiyakinae isua ŋakujo ŋuna ikirikete isua. Nyikiyeni isua ŋakiro ŋuna kitiyakin neni a Moses a ŋolo ikirikuni isua alo Ijipit.’
44007041	Apaki ŋin, iŋes etiyauniata ikes etorube ŋolo a itaok, ido inakis ŋamuronisya nakuj ŋin ka kimomwora aŋuna a ibore a ŋini etiyaunete ikes a ŋakan kec.
44007042	Ŋakiro ŋun abunio Akuj tomulenio ikes, kimyek ilipete ŋikacer ŋulu alokidiama, ikwapei igiritere lokitaabo ŋolo a ŋikadwarak ebe, ‘Ŋituŋa a Isirael, ipotu mono iyes iyaut ŋamuronisya ka ŋainakineta neni kaŋ ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon analoŋisat a?
44007043	Kire ipotu iyes kiwuoko eema ŋolo ka akuj a Molok, ka etorube ŋolo ke etop a ŋolo ka akuj kus a ŋina anyaritae Repan, ŋakujo ŋuna ipotu iyes kitiyaut, ido kilipa neni kec. Aŋun, ekeritari ayoŋ iyes toruworos ŋirikon anakwap a ŋina alwanan adepar tari Babilon.’
44007044	Ayakatar atapapaa yok analoŋisat Eema ŋolo ka Akiteyenunet atemar arukito Akuj ka ikes. Etiyaunitae iŋes ikwaŋina kelimokinitor Akuj Moses akitiyaun, lopite ŋolo keris kitoodikinere iŋes.
44007045	Ani kijaut ŋipapae kec Eema, apotu ikes kaapei ka Yosua yaut iŋes tari nakwap ŋina ekamarete ikes, apaki ŋina eritarya Akuj ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a ŋin aŋuna kec. Kiboi Eema anakwap a ŋin akitodol ŋirwa ŋulu a Daudi.
44007046	Abu Daudi tojokyar alokiŋaren Akuj, kilip adukokin akai aŋuna ka Akuj a Yakobo.
44007047	Nai arae lokoku keŋ Solomon abu todukok Akai ka Akuj.
44007048	“Nyiboyonokin bo Akuj ŋina alokidiama nooi nakais ŋuna edukito ŋituŋa; ikwaŋina elimunitor ekadwaran ebe, ebala Akuj Ekapolon:
44007049	‘Erae nakuj ekicoloŋ kaŋ ka erae akwap neni ecakit ayoŋ. Akai ŋina ikoni ai ikidukokinete iyes ayoŋ, ai eyai neni kieŋunet kaŋ?
44007050	Meere mono ŋakan kaŋ etiyaunete ŋiboro lu daadaŋ a?’
44007051	“Eninik ŋatameta kus nooi! Ikote ŋitai kus ŋulu a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyenupito Akuj! Nyicamunete iyes akiirar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj! Ikote iyes atapapaa kus, itepegete iyes jwi jwi Etau ŋolo Asegan!
44007052	Eyai mono ekadwaran epei daŋ ŋolo apotu atapapaa kus nyisicana a? Apotu ikes toara tari ŋulu adwarete abunore ŋina a ŋolo Iyookino, a ŋolo tokona idaut iyes alukin ka akiar.
44007053	Arae iyes ipotu toryamut Ŋikisila ŋulu ka Akuj, ŋulu ayaunete ŋimalaikan; nai nyiricakina iyes ikes!”
44007054	Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Atukot ŋakiro a Stepano, toŋoa ikes nooi, tonyoridido ŋireetin kec aŋuna keŋ.
44007055	Nai abu Stepano ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan kireo nakuj, toanyuwa akica ŋina ka apolou a ŋina ka Akuj ka Yesu ewuoi alowae a ŋolo aloteten Akuj.
44007056	Tocelu Stepano tema, “Kiŋolikisi! Ete ayoŋ nakuj eŋaara ka Lokoku a Ituŋanan ewuoi alowae a ŋolo aloteten Akuj!”
44007057	Nai tocelut ikes nooi, togolo ŋaki a ŋakan kec, kipumakinos daadaŋ iŋes.
44007058	Kitunyasi iŋes kiŋa etaun Yerusalem, tocaka a ŋamoru. Apotu ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a ŋun kicikakis ŋilowi kec neni ke esorokit a ŋolo anyaritae Saulo.
44007059	Ani erubakinete ikes ecakete iŋes, kilip tema, “Ekapolon Yesu, kijaa etau kaŋ!”
44007060	Toryedik nai tocelu a etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Ekapolon! Nyimarak asecit na neni kec!” Ani kedau iŋes alimun ŋun, kiridak.
44008001	Ayai Saulo nen, kitojokite atwanare a Stepano.
44008002	Tonuka nai Stepano ŋikilyok ŋulu ainakina neni ka Akuj, kigworos nooi aŋuna keŋ.
44008003	Nai abu Saulo kisyak akinyasun ŋatukon a ŋikanupak; erimit iŋes nakais akiriunun ŋikilyok ka ŋaberu, toen ikes alomabus.
44008004	Apotu ŋikanupak ŋulu aponi kielarae tolimonokis Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak nakwapin daadaŋ ŋuna apotu ikes toloto.
44008005	Tolot epei kec ŋolo anyaritae Pilipo lotaun ŋolo apolon alo Samaria, tolimonok ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna a Kristo.
44008006	Ani iirarete ŋasepico ŋakiro a Pilipo ka toanyuwasi ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna etiyae iŋes, topupokis nooi daadaŋ ŋakiro ŋuna erworo iŋes.
44008007	Anerae apotu ŋipyan tolomut alotuŋa a ŋulu alalak iworoete nooi a etoil a ŋolo apolon; kitaŋaleunoe ŋulu alalak ŋulu alilim ŋakoyo ka ŋawat ka ŋulu aŋwalito.
44008008	Aŋun, toyakaun alelyan nooi lotaun ŋolo apolon ŋol.
44008009	Ayai lotaun ŋol ekile ŋolo anyaritae Simoni, ŋolo sek kitiyae ŋakikukujaeta, ŋolo kebu kituumok ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a Samaria, etusubuna iŋes idiotuŋanan ŋini apolon.
44008010	Topupo ŋituŋa daadaŋ iŋes ameun alocaryo tari narwonita ebasi, “Erae ekile lo apedor ŋina ka Akuj ŋina enyaritae ‘Apedor ŋina Apolon.’ ”
44008011	Apupete ŋituŋa ŋakiro keŋ, anerae abu iŋes ya apaki ŋina aoyan ituumonokini ikes a ŋakikukujaeta keŋ.
44008012	Nai ani enupete ikes Pilipo ŋina alimonokinia Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj ka ŋuna ka apedor ke ekiro a Yesu Kristo, aponi kibatisae ikes, ŋikilyok kaapei ka ŋaberu.
44008013	Abu Simoni daŋ elope tonup, kibatisae. Abu iŋes torubak erukito ka Pilipo; etuumokinito iŋes ŋaumonokineta ka ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna apolok ŋuna etiyasi.
44008014	Kiirasi nai Ŋikiyakia ŋulu ayakasi Yerusalem atemar acamut ŋituŋa ŋulu a Samaria ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, kiyakiyasi ikes Petero ka Yoana neni kec.
44008015	Ani edolete ikes, kilipakis ŋituŋa, ikotere eryamunete Etau ŋolo Asegan.
44008016	Kibatisatae ikes alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu bon; ariŋa Etau ŋolo Asegan nyemino tari neni a ipei kec.
44008017	Kidokokis nai Petero ka Yoana ŋakan kec neni a ŋikanupak, ido toryamut ikes Etau ŋolo Asegan.
44008018	Ani eanyuni Simoni atemar aponi inakinae Etau ŋolo Asegan anakidokokin ŋakan ŋuna a Ŋikiyakia, inak iŋes ikes ŋisiliŋa,
44008019	tema, “Inakinae ayoŋ daŋ apedor na, ikotere ani ŋini daadaŋ edokokini ayoŋ ŋakan, toryamu Etau ŋolo Asegan.”
44008020	Nai kiŋenyak Petero iŋes tema, “Totwania iyoŋ kaapei ka ŋikonisiliŋa! Itami mono iyoŋ kire atemar ipedori aryamun ainakinet ŋina ka Akuj a ŋisiliŋa a?
44008021	Nyimarar iyoŋ ka emam ibore kon eyai lotic lo, anerae nyiyookino etau kon alokiŋaren Akuj.
44008022	Aŋun, toki nai aronis kon na, kilip neni ke Ekapolon atemar ani kepedor, kisyoni iŋes ŋuna eya lotau kon.
44008023	Anerae ete ayoŋ atemar ileleba arakao neni kon ka ikienit iyoŋ asecit.”
44008024	Toboŋok Simoni tema, “Kilipa neni ke Ekapolon aŋuna kaŋ, ikotere nyitiyakin idiobore ŋini ilimu iyoŋ neni kaŋ.”
44008025	Ani kedaut Petero ka Yoana akiteyenun ka erwor ŋakiro ke Ekapolon, toboŋosi Yerusalem elimonokinete Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lorerya ŋulu alalak ŋulu a Samaria.
44008026	Apeikoloŋit, tolimok emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon Pilipo tema, “Tonyou tolot nakan ŋina alo Kwap, lorot ŋolo etiyaar alo Yerusalem, ŋolo itori naloŋisat tari Gasa.”
44008027	Tonyou nai Pilipo, tolot. Ayai lorot ŋol ekile ŋolo anakwap a ŋina a Esiopia ŋolo arae ekolup. Apolokinit iŋes ŋisiliŋa daadaŋ ŋulu a Kandace, a ŋina epukat Esiopia. Kelosit sek ekile lo Yerusalem akilip.
44008028	Aboŋi iŋes lore apaki ŋin, edokit agaari ŋina erito ŋaŋolei, tosyomi ekitaabo ŋolo ke ekadwaran a Isaya.
44008029	Tolimok Etau ŋolo Asegan Pilipo tema, “Tolot nagaari ŋin, kidunya neni keŋ.”
44008030	Toem nai Pilipo nagaari, kiira ekile ŋol esyomi ekitaabo ŋolo ke ekadwaran a Isaya, kiŋit tema, “Iyeni iyoŋ apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna isyomi iyoŋ a?”
44008031	Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ekokini ayoŋ ayenuni ai, erae pa kakalimoki ayoŋ ituŋanan idio?” Tonyaraiya nai iŋes Pilipo adokar nagaari, kiboikin ka iŋes.
44008032	Ŋakiro ŋuna asyomi ekile ŋol a Nakigireta ikes nu: “Ikwa amesek ŋina erikoryo akiŋol kori ikwa ililiŋia imesek alokiŋaren ekatubon ŋajul keŋ, nyelimuno iŋes adiokirot.
44008033	Alotooma akitiditeuna keŋ, aponi kitiyae ŋuna nyeriyan neni keŋ. Ŋae elimori ŋuna a ŋiletok keŋ, anerae alemar akiyar keŋ anakwap.”
44008034	Kiŋit ekile ŋol Pilipo tema, “Tolimokinae kare, ŋae irworor ekadwaran, iŋes pei elope kori ituŋanan ice?”
44008035	Kirworik nai Pilipo, togeu a Nakigireta a ŋunapei a ŋun, tolimonok iŋes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna a Yesu.
44008036	Ani elosete ikes alorot, todolo neni ayakasi ŋakipi, ido tolimok ekapolon ŋol Pilipo tema, “Kiŋolik, ŋakipi nu! Nyo ekeretakini ayoŋ akibatisao?” [
44008037	Tolimu Pilipo tema, “Ani kinupit iyoŋ a ekonitau a daadaŋ, ipedori akibatisao.” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Anupit atemar erae Yesu Kristo Lokoku ka Akuj.”]
44008038	Kitowuo iŋes agaari, torukosi iŋes ka Pilipo kidiŋ ŋakipi, kibatisa Pilipo iŋes.
44008039	Ani elomunete ikes anakipi, ya Etau ŋolo ke Ekapolon Pilipo, nyiŋolik nabo ekapolon iŋes. Nai tolot lore keŋ elelyani.
44008040	Totakanu nai Pilipo aneni enyaritae Asotus, elimonokini Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lotaunio daadaŋ tari neni adolyo Kaisaria.
44009001	Nai ariŋa Saulo emunikinit akitukuryan ka akiar ŋikasyomak ŋulu ke Ekapolon Yesu. Abu iŋes tolot neni ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo Apolon nooi
44009002	akiŋit ŋabaruwae ŋuna itoodiunito atemar ecamakinitae iŋes alosit losinagogae ŋulu alo Damasko, ikotere ani keryamu ituŋanan idio ŋini enupit Kristo, ekile kori aberu, kikama ikes, toen ya Yerusalem. (Anyaritae daŋ ŋikewuapak a Kristo, “Ŋulu ke Erot.”)
44009003	Ani eapiyari iŋes Damasko, toŋesun atipei akica anakuj, kinuaku neni ayai iŋes.
44009004	Kimasar iŋes kwap, kiira etoil ebala neni keŋ, “Saulo, Saulo! Kaanukiro ikisicanitor iyoŋ ayoŋ?”
44009005	Kiŋit Saulo tema, “Ŋae iyoŋ Ekapolon?” Toboŋok etoil tema, “Arae ayoŋ Yesu ŋolo isicanit iyoŋ.
44009006	Nai tokona, tonyou toloma lotaun itolimokin ŋuna itemokino iyoŋ kitiya.”
44009007	Towua ŋikilyok ŋulu arukito ka Saulo kililiŋa cek; apupete ikes etoil, nai nyeanyuwasi idiotuŋanan.
44009008	Tonyou Saulo alokwap, nai ani eŋaari ŋakonyen keŋ, nyiŋolik idiobore. Aŋun, torikosi ikes iŋes tooma Damasko.
44009009	Ya iŋes ŋirwa ŋiuni emudukana, pa imuji kori emasi.
44009010	Ayai Damasko ekasyoman a Yesu ŋolo anyaritae Anania. Tonyara Ekapolon iŋes anatakanikinet tema, “Anania!” Toboŋok iŋes tema, “Ekapolon, ayoŋ lo.”
44009011	Tolimok Ekapolon iŋes tema, “Tonyou tolot lorukude ŋolo enyaritae, ‘Erukude ŋolo Idiiri,’ kiŋitu alokai a Yuda ekile ŋolo alo Taso, ŋolo enyaritae Saulo. Ilipi iŋes.
44009012	Aanyu iŋes anatakanikinet ekile ŋolo enyaritae Anania, ebuni akidokokin ŋakan neni keŋ, ikotere ekienyunia nabo.”
44009013	Toboŋok Anania tema, “Ekapolon, akalimonokis ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋakiro ŋuna ke ekile a ŋol ŋuna aronok nooi, ŋuna etiya iŋes lokanupak kon alo Yerusalem.
44009014	Abu iŋes Damasko ka apedor a ŋina eryamunit iŋes alosacaradotin a ŋulu apolok, akikam daadaŋ ŋulu enyarito ekiro kon.”
44009015	Nai tolimok Ekapolon Anania tema, “Tolot, anerae erae iŋes eketiyan kaŋ ŋoloseuna, ŋolo iteyenuni ekiro kaŋ lobukui ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ka lorwosi kec ta lotuŋa ŋulu a Isirael.
44009016	Etoodikini ayoŋ elope iŋes etyae ŋolo a ŋican a daadaŋ a ŋulu itemokino iŋes toryamu aŋuna ke ekiro kaŋ.”
44009017	Torotok nai Anania, toloma kai. Kidokok ŋakan neni keŋ tema, “Lokaato Saulo, ekeyakuu ayoŋ Ekapolon Yesu, ŋolo abu totakanu neni kon alorot apaki ŋina ibunio iyoŋ. ekeyakuu iŋes ayoŋ, ikotere tokienyu iyoŋ nabo, ikilelebikin Etau ŋolo Asegan.”
44009018	Atipei toraraun ibore ŋini ekoni ŋakabebekwa a ekolya anakonyen a Saulo, tokienyu iŋes nabo.
44009019	Tonyou nai iŋes, kibatisae. Kimuj iŋes, ido togogoŋu akuwan keŋ.
44009020	Kisyak iŋes atipei alimonokin alosinagogae ŋakiro a Yesu ebala, “Erae Yesu Lokoku ka Akuj.”
44009021	Toumokis daadaŋ ŋulu apupete iŋes, kiŋitiŋitas make temasi, “Meere mono ekile lopei lo esicani alo Yerusalem ŋulu anyarito ekiro lo a? Nyebunit ba ca iŋes akitiya ŋunapei a ne – akikamar ikes akiya neni a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu apolok a?”
44009022	Nai togogoŋior nooi apiiryanut a Paulo analimonokin keŋ, alopite a ŋolo etoodiunia atemar Yesu iŋes erae Kristo; kitataaŋaŋ Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alo Damasko.
44009023	Ani kelunyarosi ŋirwa ŋulu alalak, totukut Ŋiyudayan akiar Saulo;
44009024	nai abu Saulo toyenu ŋuna atukosi ikes. Kirojo ikes ŋikekya ŋulu ke etaun apaaran ka akuwar, ecamito akiar iŋes.
44009025	Nai apotu ŋikasyomak keŋ nakwaare yaasi iŋes kisitoro loole ŋolo ka arwatata, kiyooliyosi iŋes kwap a ebukit.
44009026	Bu Saulo Yerusalem, kikatak akiruk ka ŋikasyomak a Yesu, nai tokera ikes daadaŋ iŋes, anerae pa anupito ikes atemar erae iŋes ekasyoman kire.
44009027	Nai ya Baranaba iŋes Lokiyakia. Tolimok ikes epite ŋolo keanyunia Saulo alorot Ekapolon, ŋolo abu kirwor neni keŋ ka epite ŋolo kelimonokinia Saulo alo Damasko alokiro a Yesu pa ekuryana.
44009028	Aŋun, toruko Saulo ka ikes alo Yerusalem, tolimonok a nen daŋ alokiro ke Ekapolon pa ekuryana.
44009029	Kirwor iŋes ka topeganakin daŋ ka Ŋiyudayan ŋulu erworosi Ŋagirik, nai ewarito ikes akiar iŋes.
44009030	Ani eyenunete ŋikaitotoi ŋun, yaasi ikes iŋes Kaisaria, kitoloto lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Taso.
44009031	Arae epite ŋol abunio akinapakin lokanupak ŋulu alo Yudeya, Galileya ka Samaria. Abu Etau ŋolo Asegan kitogogoŋ ka kisimukek ŋikanupak, kiyatakin ekimar kec, kiboiyoto ekerito Ekapolon.
44009032	Kimaniman Petero akwap ŋin daadaŋ, tolot daŋ aanyun ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu aya Lidda.
44009033	Toryamu iŋes a nen ekile ŋolo anyaritae Aenea, ŋolo kebu ya ŋikaru ŋikanikauni eperi alokitaada, aŋuna alilimiyoritotor ŋakoyo kaapei ka akuwan keŋ.
44009034	Tolimok Petero iŋes tema, “Aenea, ikitaŋaleu iyoŋ Yesu Kristo, tonyou, topetak ekitaada kon.” Atipei, tonyou Aenea.
44009035	Toanyuwasi ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aya Lidda ka Saron iŋes eŋale; kibelekinos, tonupa Ekapolon.
44009036	Ayai Yoppa akanupan ŋina anyaritae Tabisa. (Anyaritae ekiro keŋ a Ŋagirik Dorka, iŋes atemar “Agete.”) Etiyae iŋes ŋuna ajokak akiŋaranakin ŋikulyak.
44009037	Apaki ŋin, abu iŋes todyakakin, totwan. Kilotasi ikes akuwan keŋ, kiperikis nagule ŋina alokidiama.
44009038	Keris ŋikasyomak kiirasi atemar ayai Petero Yoppa, ido aŋuna aapiya Lidda alo Yoppa, kiyakiyasi ikes ŋikilyok ŋiarei akimaima iŋes temasi, “Okoe, kiwonyu neni kosi atipei.”
44009039	Torukosi nai Petero ka ikes. Ani edoli, yaarae nagule ŋina ayai kidiama. Awuasi ŋapuseru daadaŋ alodiyete Petero, kigworos ka kitoodikis iŋes ŋikiteiteyo ka ŋikotyo ŋulu kitiyauni Tabisa eriŋa erukito ka ikes.
44009040	Kitoloma Petero ikes daadaŋ kiŋa. Toryedik kilip, toboboŋ neni aperyo akuwan tema, “Tabisa, tonyou!” Toŋaa iŋes ŋakonyen keŋ, ani iŋolikini iŋes Petero, tonyou, kiboikin.
44009041	Ya Petero akan, kitonyou iŋes. Tonyarau nai iŋes ŋikanupak ka ŋapuseru kipotok Tabisa eyari neni kec.
44009042	Toyenunae ŋakiro nu alo Yoppa daadaŋ, tonupa ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak Ekapolon.
44009043	Kiriya Petero ŋirwa ŋulu alalak alo Yoppa, iboi aneni a Simoni, a ŋolo emanyimanyi ŋilowi a ŋityaŋ.
44010001	Ayai Kaisaria ekile ŋolo anyaritae Kornelio, ŋolo apolokinit atutubet a ŋasigarya a Roma ŋina anyaritae “Ajore a Italia.”
44010002	Arae iŋes ekile ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj, ŋolo akerit ekal keŋ daadaŋ Akuj. Epotonori iŋes lokulyak ŋainakineta ŋuna alalak, kilipenenee iŋes Akuj ŋirwa daadaŋ.
44010003	Akoloŋit apei eapikini ŋisaae ŋikanikaomwon ŋulu ka apaaran, toanyuwa iŋes atakanikinet, kiŋolik emalaika ŋolo ka Akuj ileere ebunit neni keŋ, tolimok iŋes tema, “Kornelio!”
44010004	Kitek Kornelio emalaika ekuryanit, kiŋit tema, “Ekapolon, nyo?” Toboŋok emalaika iŋes tema, “Acamu Akuj akilip kon ka ŋainakineta kon lokulyak ka ikitamu iŋes iyoŋ.
44010005	Tokona kiyakiya ŋikilyok ŋidi Yoppa, tonyaraut Simoni ŋolo erae Petero.
44010006	Iboi iŋes alore a Simoni, a ŋolo emanyimanyan ŋilowi a ŋityaŋ. Eyai ere keŋ diyete anam.”
44010007	Ani kelot emalaika ŋolo erworo neni keŋ, tonyarau Kornelio ŋiketiyak keŋ ŋiarei ka esigarit ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj, ŋolo arae epei alokidiŋ ŋulu eyokiyete iŋes.
44010008	Kedau alimokin ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna apotu totakanut, kiyakiya ikes Yoppa.
44010009	Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini eriŋa ikes eya lorot toapiyarete Yoppa, tolot Petero akilip nagule ŋina alokidiama. Aapikinit ŋisaae ŋikanikapei ŋulu ka apaaran.
44010010	Tonyam akoro Petero kiitan ibore ŋini nyamat; ani eriŋa itemonokinio akimuj, toanyuwa iŋes atakanikinet.
44010011	Toanyuwa iŋes nakuj eŋaara ka iyooliunitoe kwap ibore ŋini ekoni anaŋga ŋina apolon, iyooliunitoe kwap alocileta a ŋuluomwon.
44010012	Aya nanaŋga ŋin ŋityaŋ daadaŋ egelegelya, ŋulu alyatok ka ŋikyeny daŋ.
44010013	Tolimok etoil iŋes tema, “Petero, tonyou, toar, tonyam!”
44010014	Nai tema Petero, “Ekapolon, mam! Anerae nyenyama ayoŋ ŋinapei idiobore ŋini ikitaleo kori ŋini nyeseg.”
44010015	Kirworik nabo etoil neni keŋ tema, “Ibore ŋini etesegu Akuj, nyitemokino iyoŋ ibala nyeseg.”
44010016	Kitiyakin ŋun ŋakitiyakinet ŋauni, ido kinyakarae ibore ŋin nakuj atipei.
44010017	Ani eriŋa Petero etaaŋaŋi etamatamae apolou ŋina ka atakanikinet a ŋin, keris ŋikilyok ŋulu eyakuunit Kornelio kiŋitut ere a Simoni ka awuasi apaki ŋin alopuke.
44010018	Tonyaras ikes iŋitasi erae keyai Simoni ŋolo erae Petero nen.
44010019	Ani eriŋa Petero etamatamae jik ŋuna ka atakanikinet, tolimok Etau ŋolo Asegan iŋes tema, “Simoni! Ikiitanito iyoŋ a ne ŋikilyok ŋiuni.
44010020	Aŋun, tonyou todoka kwap. Nyiŋayaŋaya arukor ka ikes, anerae ayoŋ elope eyakuunit ikes.”
44010021	Todoka nai Petero kwap, tolimok ŋikilyok ŋuluuni tema, “Ayoŋ iŋes ŋolo iitanito iyes. Anukiro iponitotor iyes?”
44010022	Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Kornelio, ekapolokiniton ŋasigarya, iŋes ikiyakuunit isua. Erae iŋes ekile ŋolo ajokan, ŋolo iyookino ka ekerit iŋes Akuj. Ekerito Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ iŋes. Alimokini emalaika ŋolo ka Akuj iŋes anyarare iyoŋ bu kai keŋ, ikotere kiira iŋes ŋuna ilimuni iyoŋ.”
44010023	Tonyaraiya Petero ŋikilyok tooma, topero kai keŋ. Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, torukosi iŋes ka ikes kaapei ka ŋikaitotoi ŋice daŋ ŋulu alo Yoppa.
44010024	Todolo ikes Kaisaria akoloŋit ŋina atupakini. Edarito Kornelio kaapei ka ŋiyeneta keŋ ta ŋikonei Petero.
44010025	Ani elomari Petero kai, kisiryam Kornelio iŋes toramakin nakejen keŋ, kilip neni keŋ.
44010026	Nai kikeu Petero iŋes tema, “Tonyou, anerae ayoŋ daŋ arae ituŋanan pei.”
44010027	Todolu Petero tooma kai eriŋa irworosi ka Kornelio, toryamu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ecunakina.
44010028	Tolimok ikes tema, “Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek epite ŋolo italeere ituŋanan ŋini Yudayat akipeyokin kori arukit ka ituŋanan ŋini gela. Nai eketoodik Akuj ayoŋ atemar nyitemokino abala idiotuŋanan erono kori nyeseg.
44010029	Aŋun, ani akaomunio ayoŋ, abu nyawou. Eŋita nai ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ikinyaritotor iyes ayoŋ.”
44010030	Toboŋok Kornelio tema, “Ŋirwa ŋiuni ŋulu alunyarosi, elipi ayoŋ alokai kaŋ ŋisaae ŋikanikaomwon ŋulu ka apaaran – arae esaa lopeilo. Apaki ŋinapei ŋin, onaŋakin ekile ŋolo anapit ŋilowi ŋulu amilimilete ewuoi alokiŋaren kaŋ.
44010031	Kirworik iŋes tema, ‘Kornelio, eira Akuj akilip kon ka atamu daŋ ŋainakineta kon lokulyak.
44010032	Aŋun, kiyakiya ŋikilyok Yoppa toryamut Simoni ŋolo erae Petero. Iboi iŋes alore a Simoni a ŋolo emanyimanyan ŋilowi a ŋityaŋ. Eyai ere keŋ diyete anam.’
44010033	Aŋun, abu ayoŋ atipei eyaki ŋikilyok aomun iyoŋ, ka ajokyar ibu iyoŋ. Ikiya tokona isua daadaŋ ne kiŋaren Akuj, akiirar ŋuna daadaŋ adau Ekapolon akicikakin iyoŋ.”
44010034	Togeu Petero erwor tema, “Tokona ayenu ayoŋ kire atemar nyetyakatyakat Akuj ŋituŋa;
44010035	nai ecamuna aneni keŋ ituŋanan ŋini ekerit iŋes alobukui a daadaŋ, kitiyae ŋakiro ŋuna iyookino.
44010036	Iyenete iyes ŋakiro ŋuna abu iŋes kiyakik Isirael – alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ke ekisil alotooma Yesu Kristo, ŋolo erae Ekapolon a daadaŋ.
44010037	Iyenete iyes ŋakiro ŋuna aponi kiserae anakwap a ŋina a Yudeya a daadaŋ, ageun alo Galileya kedau Yoana alimonokin ŋuna ke ebatisimu keŋ.
44010038	Iyenete iyes epite ŋolo aseunia Akuj Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret, inak Etau keŋ ka apedor. Abu iŋes kirim itiyae ŋuna ajokak ka kitaŋaleununu ŋulu daadaŋ ayakasi napedor ŋina a Satan, anerae arukito Akuj ka iŋes.
44010039	Ikirae isua ŋisuudae ŋulu a ŋakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna etiyat iŋes anakwap a Ŋiyudayan ka alo Yerusalem. Apotu nai Ŋiyudayan kibubukis iŋes lomusalaba, toara.
44010040	Nai abu Akuj kiteyaru iŋes kelunyarosi ŋirwa ŋiuni, kitatakanu iŋes eyari.
44010041	Nyitatakanuna iŋes lotuŋa daadaŋ, nai neni kosi make a ŋulu aris Akuj kikiseu aruwor ŋisuudae. Isua ikipotu emuja ka omata daŋ ka iŋes, kedau ayarun alokatwak.
44010042	Abu nai iŋes ikicikaki isua alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ka akiteyenun lotuŋa atemar erae iŋes ewuakin aruwor ekatubon a ŋulu eyarete ka ŋulu atwak.
44010043	Iteyenunito ŋikadwarak daadaŋ aŋuna keŋ atemar, ŋini daadaŋ enupi Yesu, isyoniyo ŋasecisya keŋ alokiro a Yesu.”
44010044	Ani eriŋa Petero irworo ŋakiro ŋun, min Etau ŋolo Asegan lotuŋa daadaŋ ŋulu apupete ŋakiro ŋun.
44010045	Toumokis ŋikanupak ŋulu arae Ŋiyudayan, ŋulu arukunete ka Petero, a ŋuna ainakinia Akuj Etau keŋ tari lotuŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan.
44010046	Anerae apupete ikes ŋituŋa ŋul irworosi ŋaŋajepa ŋuna agelegelya ka ipurosi Akuj. Tolimu Petero tema,
44010047	“Aryamut ŋituŋa lu Etau ŋolo Asegan ikwaŋina aryamunere iwon daŋ. Epedori nai idiotuŋanan akiretakin ikes anakibatisao a ŋakipi a?”
44010048	Aŋun, tolimu iŋes atemar kibatisae ikes alokiro a Yesu Kristo. Kiŋita nai ikes Petero akiboi ka ikes ŋirwa ŋidi.
44011001	Kiirasi Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikanupak ŋulu alo Yudaya daadaŋ atemar kecamut ŋituŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan daŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
44011002	Aŋun, ani elosi Petero Yerusalem, kitepega iŋes Ŋiyudayan ŋulu eitanito kileŋerae ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan temasi,
44011003	“Kaanukiro ilosyo iyoŋ lotuŋa ŋulu nyileŋeritae, akimuj ka ikes?”
44011004	Nai kisyak Petero alimonokin ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ereunit a ŋapeipei tema:
44011005	“Apeikoloŋit eriŋa ayoŋ elipi alotaun a ŋolo enyaritae Yoppa, abu oanyuwa atakanikinet. Eŋolik ibore ŋini ekoni anaŋga ŋina apolon, iyooliunitoe anakuj kwap alocileta a ŋuluomwon, bu towo alodiyete kaŋ.
44011006	Abu eŋolik kojokan, oanyuwa ŋityaŋ ŋulu ka ariet, ŋulu alyatok ka ŋikyeny.
44011007	Eira etoil ebala neni kaŋ, ‘Petero, tonyou, toar, tonyam!’
44011008	Nai otema ayoŋ, ‘Ekapolon, mam! Anerae nyenyama ayoŋ ŋinapei idiobore ŋini italeo kori ŋini nyeseg.’
44011009	Nai kirworik nabo etoil anakuj tema, ‘Ibore ŋini etesegu Akuj, nyitemokino iyoŋ ibala nyeseg.’
44011010	Kitiyakin ŋun ŋakitiyakinet ŋauni, ido kinyakarae nai ibore ŋin nakuj.
44011011	Apaki ŋinapei, todolunete ŋikilyok ŋiuni, ŋulu eyakuunitae neni kaŋ alo Kaisaria kai ŋina ayai ayoŋ.
44011012	Okolimok ayoŋ Etau ŋolo Asegan arukor ka ikes pa aŋayaŋayat. Orukosi daŋ ayoŋ ka ŋikaitotoi ŋulukanikapei lu, tolotoi kai a Kornelio.
44011013	Ikitatamik iŋes isua epite ŋolo keanyuwaritor iŋes emalaika ewuoi alokai keŋ ebala, ‘Kiyakiya ŋikilyok Yoppa, tonyaraut Simoni ŋolo erae Petero.
44011014	Ikilimokini iŋes iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna iunor iyoŋ kaapei ka ekal kon daadaŋ.’
44011015	Ani ageuni ayoŋ erwor, min Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kec, lopite ŋolo aminio neni yok anageunet.
44011016	Otamu nai ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon ŋina abaakar, ‘Abu Yoana kibatisa a ŋakipi, nai ikibatisao iyes a Etau a ŋolo Asegan.’
44011017	Ani nai keinakinit Akuj ikes ainakinet ŋina ikoni ŋina abu ikiinak iwon apaki ŋina anupere Ekapolon Yesu Kristo, karae nai ayoŋ ŋae ekatakini akiretakin Akuj?”
44011018	Ani iirarete ikes ŋun, tojoŋoto apega. Kipuro Akuj temasi, “Ainaki nai Akuj ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ apaki ŋina ekiyata, toyara!”
44011019	Toloto ŋikanupak ŋulu aponi kielarae aŋuna ka akisicanio a ŋina atakanuni kelunyar atwanare a Stepano, todolo Poenikia, Kupuro ka Antiokio. Kitatama ikes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni a Ŋiyudayan make.
44011020	Nai apotu ŋikanupak ŋice ŋulu arae ŋulu alo Kupuro ka Kurene toloto Antiokio, kirworo tari lotuŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan, tolimonokis ikes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ke Ekapolon Yesu.
44011021	Ayai apedor ŋina ke Ekapolon neni kec, kibelekinos ka tonupa ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak Ekapolon.
44011022	Todolo ŋakiro nu natukot ŋina a ŋikanupak a Yesu alo Yerusalem, ido kiyakiya atukot Baranaba alosit Antiokio.
44011023	Ani edoluni iŋes ka iŋolikini epite ŋolo kebunio Akuj kiterereŋio ikes, tolakar iŋes. Kicikak ikes arubakin anupit Ekapolon a ŋitai kec a daadaŋ.
44011024	Arae Baranaba ekile ŋolo ajokan, ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan ka anupit. Kiyatakin nooi ŋituŋa, potu neni ke Ekapolon.
44011025	Tolot nai Baranaba Taso akiwarit Saulo.
44011026	Ani eryamuni, yau iŋes Antiokio. Yaasi ikes ekaru daadaŋ iryamiryameneneete ka ŋikanupak, kitatama daŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak. Arae Antiokio esyakinere anyarare ŋikasyomak atemar Ŋikristo.
44011027	Alorwa a ŋul, aponeneete ŋikadwarak alo Yerusalem tari Antiokio.
44011028	Tonyou epei alokidiŋ kec ŋolo anyaritae Agabo, todwar ka apedor a ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan atemar ebuni eron ŋolo apolon nakwap daadaŋ. Abu nai eron ŋol bu apaki ŋina araakar Klauda ekepukan a Roma.
44011029	Totyakut ŋikasyomak a Yesu atemar itemokino ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kec tolemu alopite a ŋolo apedorya alemun idiobore ŋini kiŋarakinet ŋikanupak alo Yudaya.
44011030	Kitiyata ikes ŋun, kiyakiyasi Baranaba ka Saulo yaasi ŋisiliŋa, inakis ŋikatukok ŋulu ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Yudeya.
44012001	Ŋirwa ŋulupei, togeu erwosit Erode akikam ŋice alokidiŋ ŋikanupak ecamit akisican ikes.
44012002	Abu iŋes toar Yakobo lokaato keŋ a Yoana ka atum.
44012003	Ani eanyuni iŋes atemar ajoikinito ŋakiro ŋun Ŋiyudayan, abu kikamu Petero daŋ. (Atakanunete ŋakiro nu apaki ŋina enumunumere ŋasuban ŋuna a ŋamugati a ŋuna emam ŋakinyalet kec.)
44012004	Ani kedau iŋes akikamun Petero, kijukak mabus, kipotok losigarya ŋulu atyakitae ŋatyaket ŋaomwon, ŋinatyaket ŋisigarya ŋiomwon. Acamit Erode aŋaun iŋes kelunyar Paska, ido kisitakinae alokiŋaren ŋituŋa.
44012005	Aŋun, aponi togoloe Petero alomabus, nai elipete Ŋikristo nooi Akuj aŋuna keŋ.
44012006	Nakwaare nyiwalara akoloŋit ŋina acamitor Erode akisitakin Petero alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, ajotoe Petero alokidiŋ ŋisigarya ŋiarei, toenitetei iŋes a ŋiriko a ŋiarei. Toyakas daŋ ŋisigarya ŋulu eteok lokekia a mabus.
44012007	Atipei, totakanu emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon, kinuaku akica ejera. Totap emalaika eseket a Petero, kiiŋiiŋak kitekienyu, tolimok tema, “Tonyou atipei!” Tolacakinos ŋiriko anakan keŋ atipei.
44012008	Tolimok nai emalaika iŋes tema, “Tonap ŋilowi ka ŋamuk.” Kitiya Petero ŋun. Tolimok emalaika iŋes tema, “Tonap ekoti kon, ikiwuapak ayoŋ.”
44012009	Kiwuapak nai Petero iŋes kiŋa mabus. Pa ayeni iŋes atemar ŋuna etiyae emalaika erae ŋuna a kire; atami iŋes atemar kori ete atakanikinet.
44012010	Ani kedepasi ikes ŋisigarya ŋulu eteok ŋulu tanyan ka ŋulu atupakinete, todolo lopuke ŋolo a ŋasuwa ŋolo ecorosiyarit Yerusalem. Toŋaar epuke bon, tolomasi ikes kiŋa. Tomekis ikes erukude ŋolo ke etaun epei, atipei toŋopiya nai emalaika.
44012011	Toyenu nai Petero ŋuna kepotu kitiyakinos neni keŋ tema, “Ayenu ayoŋ kire tokona atemar Ekapolon iyakuunit emalaika keŋ aiun ayoŋ anapedor a ŋina ke Erode ka anakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna acamito Ŋiyudayan akitiya.”
44012012	Ani kileereto ŋakiro nu aneni keŋ, tolot kai a Maria a toto a Yoana a ŋolo arae Mariko, neni acunakina ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ilipete.
44012013	Ani ikoŋikoŋokini Petero epuke ŋolo alokiŋa, bu aketiyan ŋina anyaritae Roda akisirwor ŋini ekoŋikoŋi.
44012014	Ani eyeni iŋes etoil a Petero, tolakari nooi nyeŋaa mono epuke, nai toem tolimok ŋituŋa atemar ewuoi Petero alokiŋa.
44012015	Tolimokis ŋituŋa iŋes temasi, “Ikibilerit iyoŋ!” Nai torubak iŋes ebala ebe erae kire. Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Erae emalaika keŋ.”
44012016	Nai torubak Petero ikoŋikoŋi epuke. Ani eŋaarete ikes, kiŋolikis iŋes toumokis.
44012017	Kikia iŋes akan keŋ akisililiŋ ikes, ido kitatamik ikes epite ŋolo ayaunia Ekapolon iŋes alomabus. Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Tolimokisi nugu neni a Yakobo ka lokaitotoi.” Torotok nai iŋes, tolot iwace.
44012018	Ani iwalari, kiguryakinos nooi ŋisigarya aŋuna kepotu kitiyakinos neni a Petero.
44012019	Abu Erode tolimu atemar toripiripai nooi ŋakiro a Petero, nai nyeryamut ikes iŋes. Aŋun, abu kiŋitiŋit ŋisigarya ŋulu eteok mabus, ido tolimu atemar toarae ikes. Tolot nai Erode alo Yudaya tari Kaisaria, kiboi aina ŋirwa ŋidi.
44012020	Aŋoikinit Erode ŋituŋa ŋulu a Tiro ka Sidon. Potu nai ŋituŋa ŋul kaapei neni keŋ. Ani kedaut ikes akitacamun Blasto ŋolo arae eketiyan ke Erode, ŋolo ekinyomitae ŋakiro kec, kiŋita ikes Erode akisil ka ikes; anerae arae nakwap ŋina epukat Erode aryamununuya akwap kec akimuj.
44012021	Ani edoli akoloŋit ŋina aseunit Erode akiryamakinor ka ikes, tonap ŋikeelowi ŋulukipukaet, kiboikin lokicoloŋ ŋolo ka apolou, ido kirwor lotuŋa.
44012022	Tocelut ŋituŋa temasi, “Irworo iŋes erae akuj, meere ituŋanan!”
44012023	Apaki ŋinapei, kitedyakak emalaika ŋolo ke Ekapolon Erode toramakin kwap, anerae abu iŋes kimyek ŋituŋa itopoloorito iŋes erae akuj, pa etopoloorit iŋes Akuj ŋina a kire. Tonyama ŋikur iŋes, totwan.
44012024	Nai torubak akirot ŋina ka Akuj iyata ka tokeikin akwap.
44012025	Ani kedaut Baranaba ka Saulo etic kec ŋolo eyakitere ikes, toboŋut alo Yerusalem potu Antiokio, erukito ka Yoana ŋolo erae Mariko.
44013001	Ayakasi ŋikadwarak ka ŋiketatamak neni a Ŋikristo a ŋulu alo Antiokio. Araakasi ikes Baranaba ka Simeon ŋolo arae Niger (iŋes atemar ŋolokiryonon), Lukio ŋolo abunit alo Kurene, Manaen ŋolo kepolounete kaapei ka erwosit Erode ta Saulo.
44013002	Ani ilipete ikes neni ke Ekapolon ka kikanyete, tolimok Etau ŋolo Asegan ikes tema, “Kimyekisi Baranaba ka Saulo kitiyata etic ŋolo anyaritor ayoŋ ikes.”
44013003	Ani kedaut ikes akikany akimuj ka kilipete, kidokokis ŋakan kec neni a Baranaba ka Saulo, kiyakiyasi ikes.
44013004	Aŋun, kedau Etau ŋolo Asegan akiyak Baranaba ka Saulo, toloto ikes Seleukia; a nen, todoka ameeli toloto loculat ŋolo enyaritae Kupuro.
44013005	Ani edolete inaa, tolomasi lotaun ŋolo enyaritae Salamis, kiserata ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj alosinagogae a Ŋiyudayan. Arukito ikes ka Yoana ŋolo arae Mariko, ŋolo eŋarakinit ikes.
44013006	Ani kedaut ikes atubor aloculat, todolo lotaun ŋolo enyaritae Papos. Toryamut ikes a nen ekekukujan ŋolo anyaritae Ba-Yesu, ŋolo arae Eyudayat, torae daŋ ekadwaran ŋolo alyokonon.
44013007	Arae iŋes ekone ke ekepukan a Papos a ŋolo anyaritae Serugo Paulo. Arae Serugo Paulo ekile ŋolo aoson. Tonyaraiya iŋes Baranaba ka Saulo neni ayai iŋes, anerae acamit akiirar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
44013008	Nai abu ekekukujan Elimas (epite ŋol anyaritotor Ŋigirik Ba-Yesu ŋol), ŋolo acamit akitooliyor ekepukan ananupit ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, kitepeg ikes.
44013009	Nai abu Saulo, ŋolo daŋ anyaritae Paulo ŋolo eleleba Etau ŋolo Asegan, kitek ekekukujan,
44013010	tolimu tema, “Iyoŋ lokoku a Satan! Iyoŋ emoit ŋolo ka akiyookino a daadaŋ! Ileleba iyoŋ ŋamodyanakineta ŋuna egelegelya ka aronis! Nyijoŋoenene mono iyoŋ akilocenen ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon ŋuna a kire, kituruwo alyokonu a?
44013011	Kiira! Ikisicani tokona Ekapolon iyoŋ. Imudukani iyoŋ ka nyiŋolikini akica ŋina ka akoloŋ mono.” Ŋolopeikiro, tonaŋakin Elimas ilwacikini ŋakonyen keŋ kiriokyata cuc, kisyak akitwap iwarit idiotuŋanan ŋini ikamuni akan keŋ, toriko.
44013012	Ani iŋolikini ekepukan ŋuna apotu kitiyakinos, tonup, anerae abu iŋes toumok nooi aŋuna ka akitatam a ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋuna ke Ekapolon.
44013013	Torotokis nai Paulo ka ŋirukitos keŋ ka ameeli alo Papos, potu lotaun Periga ŋolo anakwap a Pampilia, neni abunio Yoana Mariko toesikinia ikes toboŋo Yerusalem.
44013014	Torotokis nai ikes alo Periga, todolo lotaun Antiokio ŋolo anakwap a Pisidia. Ani akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, toloto ikes losinagoga, kiboikinos.
44013015	Ani kesyomi ekitaabo ŋolo a Ŋikisila a Moses ka ŋakigireta ŋuna a ŋikadwarak, kiyakikis ŋikapolokinitok esinagoga ikes akirot ebasi, “Ŋikaitotoi, ani keyai iyes akirot ŋina isimukekini ŋituŋa, tolimutu.”
44013016	Aŋun, tonyou Paulo kikia akan keŋ akisililiŋ ikes, tolimok tema, “Ŋituŋa a Isirael ka iyes ŋulu ikerito Akuj, topupokisi!
44013017	Abu Akuj ŋina a ŋituŋa a lu a Ŋisirael toseu atapapaa yok, kipitu ikes apaki ŋina ayakatar Ijipit. Anapedor keŋ a ŋina apolon, abu yau ikes alo Ijipit.
44013018	Todaŋ iŋes ikes ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon analoŋisat.
44013019	Abu iŋes kilou ŋakwapin ŋakanikaarei alo Kanaan, ido inak ŋituŋa keŋ akwap a ŋituŋa a ŋul, kituruwo ŋina kec.
44013020	Apotu nu daadaŋ yaasi ŋikaru ŋamiae ŋaomwon ka ŋatomonikan ameun apaki ŋina aponiata ikes alo Ijipit. “Ekaku a ŋun, abu Akuj inak ikes ŋikatubok akitodol apaki ŋina a Samuel ke ekadwaran.
44013021	Kiitana nai ikes erwosit, ido inak Akuj ikes Saulo lokoku a Kis, a ŋolo ka ateker a Benjamin, aruwor erwosit kec ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon.
44013022	Ani kelema Akuj Saulo, kilunyok Daudi aruwor erwosit kec. Kiteyenu Akuj nu aŋuna a Daudi: ‘Aanyu ayoŋ atemar erae Daudi, lokoku a Yese ekile ŋolo elelyania etau kaŋ; itiyakini iŋes ŋuna daadaŋ acamit ayoŋ iŋes kitiya.’
44013023	Ayau Akuj aloletok a Daudi Ekaiunan ŋolo a Ŋisirael, ŋolo erae Yesu, ikwaŋina aris iŋes kiikinia.
44013024	Ani eriŋa Yesu nyebuno, aris Yoana kelimonoki ŋituŋa a Isirael daadaŋ atemar etemokino ikes tokiwa ŋasecisya kec, kibatisae.
44013025	Ani eapuuni Yoana akirikakin akitatam keŋ, tolimok ŋituŋa tema, ‘Itamete iyes atemar ŋae ayoŋ? Nyarae ayoŋ ŋolo idarito iyes. Emam, nai ekaku kaŋ, ebuni iŋes ŋolo nyapedori ayoŋ tari alacun ŋamuk keŋ.’
44013026	“Ŋikaitotoi, ŋiletok ka Aburaam ka iyes ŋuluce ŋulu ikerito Akuj. Erae neni yok eyakuun ŋakiro ŋuna ka aiuno a na!
44013027	Apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu a Yerusalem ka ŋikarikok kec nyeyena Yesu, kori nyiirasi ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋikadwarak ŋuna esyomeneneo a ŋinakoloŋit a Sabato. Tari kikote nen, apotu kisiyookis ŋun, toara iŋes.
44013028	Tari ŋina pa aryamuniata ikes ŋakiro ŋuna etemokino totubokinere iŋes atwanare, apotu ikes tolimokis Pilato atemar toarae iŋes.
44013029	Ani kedaut ikes akisiyookin ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna egiritae aŋuna keŋ, apotu tolemut akuwan keŋ alomusalaba, kiperikis nalyal.
44013030	Nai abu Akuj kiteyaru iŋes alokatwak
44013031	ka abu iŋes ŋirwa ŋulu alalak totakanu eyari neni a ŋulu arukunete ka iŋes alo Galileya tari Yerusalem, ŋulu tokona erae ŋisuudae keŋ alotuŋa.
44013032	Ikiinunit tokona isua iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak,
44013033	atemar ŋakiro ŋuna eikinit Akuj atapapaa yok, esiyook tokona aneni yok a ŋulu ikirae ŋiletok kec aŋuna eteyarunia Yesu. Ikwaŋinapei igiritere tooma Eete ŋolo a ŋiarei ebe: ‘Irae iyoŋ Lokoku kaŋ; aruwor ayoŋ Papa kon nakoloŋit na.’
44013034	Elimorit Akuj anakiro a nu atemar eteyaruni iŋes Yesu alokatwak, nyebosi jik, ebe: ‘Akainakini ayoŋ iyoŋ ŋarereŋisyo ŋuna asegak, ŋuna a kire ŋuna eikinit ayoŋ Daudi.’
44013035	Elimunit Daudi daŋ alotooma Eete ece ebe: ‘Nyimyekini iyoŋ eketiyan kon ŋolo asegan ebosi.’
44013036	Nai kire abu Daudi totwan, kedau akitiya ŋuna acamit Akuj iŋes kitiya ananyamet keŋ, tonukae diyete atapapaa keŋ, ido tobos.
44013037	Nai ŋolo abu Akuj kiteyaru alokatwak, abu nyebos.
44013038	Aŋun ŋikaitotoi, itemokino iyes toyenut atemar alotooma Yesu, iserao neni kus ŋakiro ŋuna ka akisyon ŋasecisya.
44013039	Alotooma keŋ, ŋinituŋanan enupi, elacakinio anasecit a daadaŋ a ŋina pa apedorete Ŋikisila a Moses alacakin iŋes.
44013040	Tocoito nai nyetakanut neni kus ŋuna elimunito ŋikadwarak ebasi:
44013041	‘Kiirasi! Iyes ŋikajamuwanarak ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj! Toumonokisi, totwaka! Anerae alosi ayoŋ akitiyakin alorwa kus ibore ŋini nyinupete iyes jik tari daŋ kikilimok iyes idiotuŋanan!’ ”
44013042	Ani erotokinete Paulo ka Baranaba alosinagoga, kiŋitakis ŋituŋa ikes alimokin ikes nabo ŋakiro ŋun akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato ŋina atupasi ka ŋin.
44013043	Ani kielarosi ŋituŋa alosinagoga, totupakis Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak kaapei ka ŋulu acamunito anupit ŋina a Ŋiyudayan, Paulo ka Baranaba. Apotu lu kisirworo ikes ka kitogogoŋo ikes arubakin anajokis a ŋina ka Akuj.
44013044	Akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato ŋina atupakini, adikino ŋituŋa daadaŋ isunyunosi alotaun akiirar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
44013045	Nai ani iŋolikinete Ŋiyudayan ŋasepico, min arakao nooi neni kec, kitepega erwor a Paulo ka kiyanya iŋes.
44013046	Kirworo nai Paulo ka Baranaba neni kec pa ekuryanito temasi, “Arae neni kus mono etemokino akirot ŋina ka Akuj tolimonokinae. Nai ikwapei iŋeryoto iyes ŋakiro nu ka itamete atemar nyemaikina iyes aryamun akiyar ŋina nyedaun, tokona elosyo isua lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
44013047	Anerae ŋuna ikilimok Ekapolon isua akitiya ikes nu: ‘Eketuruwo ayoŋ iyes akica ŋina a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ikotere iyaunete iyes aiuno nakisaleta ŋuna ka akwap.’ ”
44013048	Ani iirarete ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan alokidiŋ kec ŋakiro ŋun, tolakaros, kipuro Akuj aŋuna ka Akirot keŋ. Tonupa daadaŋ ŋulu aseunitae aryamun akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
44013049	Tokeikin ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon akwap ŋin daadaŋ.
44013050	Nai, apotu Ŋiyudayan kitutuko ŋaberu ŋuna apolok ŋuna ainakina neni ka Akuj ka ŋikarikok ŋulu ke etaun. Togeut ikes akisican Paulo ka Baranaba, kiritasi ikes anakwap kec.
44013051	Totwakis ŋikasyomak apuwa anakejen kec neni kec, kitoodiu nen atemar esecito ikes, ido toloto Ikonio.
44013052	Nai tari kikote nen daŋ, apotu ŋikasyomak ŋulu edoŋete Antiokio tolelyana, kilelebun Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kec.
44014001	Alo Ikonio, toloto Paulo ka Baranaba lopite ŋolopei sek, tooma esinagoga a Ŋiyudayan. Kirworo ikes a nen alopite a ŋolo abu kitunup Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alalak ka ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan ŋakiro a Yesu.
44014002	Nai apotu Ŋiyudayan ŋulu awounito akinup kiguryakis ka kicocoa daŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan akitoroniyar ŋikanupak.
44014003	Aŋun, kiboiyoto Ŋikiyakia a nen apaki ŋina aoyan, kirworos ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon pa ekuryanito. Abu Ekapolon kiteyenu ebe erae ŋuna a kire ŋakiro ŋuna erworosi ikes, aŋuna ainakinia ikes apedor ŋinakitiyaet ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta.
44014004	Nai atyakatyaka ŋituŋa ŋulu ke etaun; ariito ŋice ka Ŋiyudayan, toriito ŋice ka Ŋikiyakia.
44014005	Totukut nai ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋiyudayan kaapei ka ŋikarikok kec akibuŋa ka akicak Ŋikiyakia a ŋamoru.
44014006	Ani eyenunete Ŋikiyakia ŋakiro ŋun, tosiwa toloto Listra ka Derube, lotaunio ŋulu ka akwap a Likonia ka nakwapin ŋuna erikaunito.
44014007	Tolimonokis ikes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lotuŋa aina.
44014008	Ayai Listra ekile ŋolo aŋwalito ŋakejen; aŋwalit iŋes ŋinapei anakidounet ka pa arotonokini jik.
44014009	Apupi iŋes Paulo irworo. Kitek Paulo iŋes, ani keanyuwa atemar eyakar anupit akitaŋaleuno,
44014010	tolimu a etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Tonyou, towo kitenar!” Tokuraun ekile, torotok.
44014011	Ani iŋolikinete ŋasepico ŋakiro ŋuna abu Paulo kitiya, tocelut a Ŋalikoniae temasi, “Kepotu ŋakujo neni yok esibito ŋituŋa!”
44014012	Tomaikis ikes Baranaba ekiro ŋolo enyaritae Seus, tomaikis Paulo ekiro ŋolo enyaritae Eremes, anerae arae ekerworon ŋolo apolon.
44014013	Yau esacaradoti ŋolo ka akuj a ŋina anyaritae Seus a ŋina ayai akai keŋ kiŋaren etaun, ŋimoŋin ka ŋatur lokekia ŋulu ke etaun, anerae acamito iŋes ka ŋituŋa aarakin amuronot Lokiyakia.
44014014	Ani iirarete Baranaba ka Paulo ŋakiro ŋun, tociliciliyasi ŋilowi kec, toema tooma nasepico a ŋituŋa iworoete ebasi,
44014015	“A ŋikilyok, kaanukiro itiyaata iyes nu? Isua daŋ ikirae ŋituŋa ikwa iyes! Ikiyaunit isua Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni kus, ikotere kibelekinos anakujo a ŋuna koŋinae neni ka Akuj a ŋina eyari. Iŋes erae Akuj ŋina asubi kidiama ka akwap, anam ka ŋiboorei daadaŋ ŋulu eyakasi tooma kec.
44014016	Ananyameta a ŋuna amunyarosi, abu Akuj tocamak ŋakwapin akitiya ŋuna acamito.
44014017	Tari kikote nen, itoodiunit iŋes jwi jwi akiteyenunet ŋina ka ayakau keŋ aloboro a ŋulu ajokak, a ŋulu itiyae iŋes; ikiinunui iŋes akiru alokidiama ka ŋapakio ŋuna elemeneneere; ikisimuji iŋes iyes ka ikitalakanari iyes.”
44014018	Ani tari kirwor Ŋikiyakia ŋakiro ŋun, pa apatana ikes akiretakin ŋasepico aarakin ikes amuronot.
44014019	Nai aponito nen Ŋiyudayan alo Antiokio ka Ikonio, kicocoiyasi ikes ŋasepico, kitiriwo lowae kec; ido kimasamasata Paulo a ŋamoru, kiriyasi kiŋa etaun etamete atemar kori atwana.
44014020	Nai ani etukokinosi ŋikanupak neni keŋ, tonyou iŋes, toboŋo toloma lotaun. Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, tonyout iŋes ka Baranaba, toloto Derube.
44014021	Tolimonokis Paulo ka Baranaba Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak alo Derube. Ani kedaut aryamun ŋikanupak ŋulu alalak, toboŋosi Antiokio, kitoro Listra ka Ikonio.
44014022	Kitogogoŋo ikes ŋikanupak, kisimukekis arubakin ananupit. Kitatama ikes ŋikanupak ebe, “Itemokino iwon etoro locan ŋulu alalak, eriŋa nyelomara Napukan ka Akuj.”
44014023	Toseut nai Paulo ka Baranaba ŋikatukok a ŋinatukot a Ŋikristo, ŋulu epolokinete ikes. Alotooma ŋakilipeta ka akikany akimuj, apotu Ŋikiyakia kicikakis ikes neni ke Ekapolon, a ŋolo anupito ikes.
44014024	Ani kiryam ikes akwap ŋina a Pisidia, potu neni anyaritae Pampilia.
44014025	A nen, tomora mono Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak alotaun a ŋolo anyaritae Periga, toloto nai ŋolo anyaritae Atalia.
44014026	A nen, todoka ikes ameeli, toboŋosi Antiokio, etaun ŋolo ayai Siria, neni ecikakinitae ikes anajokis a ŋina ka Akuj aŋuna ke etic a ŋolo tokona adaut ikes akirikakin.
44014027	Ani edolunete ikes Antiokio, tocunakis ŋikanupak, tolimokis ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna abu Akuj kitiya aneni kec ka epite ŋolo abunio Akuj toŋaarya erot ŋolo enupyata ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
44014028	Kiboiyoto ikes apaki ŋina aoyan a nen erukito ka ŋikasyomak.
44015001	Apotu ŋikilyok ŋice potu alo Yudaya tari Antiokio togeut akitatam ŋikanupak temasi, “Nyipedorete iyes aryamun aiuno, mati kikileŋeri ikwaŋina ecamakinitotor Ŋikisila a Moses.”
44015002	Apotu ŋakiro nu inakis Paulo ka Baranaba ebura ka apeganakin ka ikes. Toseunae nai Paulo ka Baranaba ta ŋikanupak ŋice alosit Yerusalem aanyun Ŋikiyakia kaapei ka ŋikatukok a Ŋikristo aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun.
44015003	Aŋun, kiyaki atukot a Ŋikristo ikes. Ani etubete ikes neni anyaritae Poenikia ka Samaria, kitatamikis ikes ŋituŋa ŋul epite ŋolo anupyata ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan Akuj. Kitelelyana ŋakiro ŋun ŋikanupak daadaŋ.
44015004	Ani edolunete ikes Yerusalem, kijau atukot ŋina a Ŋikristo ka Ŋikiyakia ta ŋikatukok ikes. Tolimokis Paulo ka Baranaba ikes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna abu Akuj kitiya aneni kec.
44015005	Nai temasi ŋikanupak ŋice ŋulu ka atukot a ŋina a Ŋiparisayon, “Itemokino ŋikanupak ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan kileŋerae ka kitatamae kiwuapa Ŋikisila a Moses.”
44015006	Totukokin nai Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikatukok aripirip ŋakiro ŋun.
44015007	Ani kepeganakinosi ikes apaki ŋina aoyan, tonyou Petero tema, “Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, iyenete iyes atemar abu koloŋ Akuj okoseu ayoŋ alokidiŋ kus alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ikotere iirarete, tonupa.
44015008	Abu Akuj ŋina eyeni ŋitai a ŋituŋa kiteyenu atemar ecamunit iŋes ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan aŋuna ainakinia ikes Etau ŋolo Asegan, ikwaŋinapei ikiinakinia iwon.
44015009	Abu nyiwuak atyaketait kidiŋ yok ka ikes, nai abu kitesegu ŋitai kec anakisyon ŋasecisya, anerae apotu tonupa.
44015010	Aŋun, kaanukiro nai ikatakinitotor iyes akitoŋo Akuj alotooma akisiwuok ŋikanupak ŋigogoso ŋulu pa apedorito atapapaa yok kori iwon daŋ akiwuok.
44015011	Nyepedor! Ikinupit iwon atemar ikiiun iwon aŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina ke Ekapolon Yesu, ikwa ikes daŋ.”
44015012	Kililiŋa ŋituŋa ŋulu ka atukot daadaŋ, topupokis daŋ Baranaba ka Paulo elimonorete ŋuna a ŋaumonokineta ka ŋakujuwuanisya daadaŋ ŋuna kitiyat Akuj aneni kec alokidiŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan.
44015013	Ani kedaut ikes erwor, kirworik Yakobo tema, “Ŋikaitotoi, topupokinae ayoŋ!
44015014	Adau Simoni Petero alimun epite ŋolo esyaunia Akuj alemun ateker keŋ alotooma ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, kituruwo ŋulu keŋ.
44015015	Ecamuna ŋakiro nu ka ŋuna a ŋikadwarak ŋuna igiritae ikona: ebala Akuj,
44015016	‘Ekaku a nu aboŋuni ayoŋ, ka etonyouni akai a Daudi ŋina aŋopiya. Etonyouni ayoŋ ŋakinyasunet keŋ, ka etowuoi iŋes.
44015017	Tosodo ŋituŋa ŋuluce – ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan – ŋulu anyarau ayoŋ aruwor ŋulu kaŋ, ekewara ayoŋ.
44015018	Ayoŋ Ekapolon, ŋolo aberakin koloŋ sek akiteyenun ŋakiro nu ŋuna etiyakini.’
44015019	Aŋun, atami ayoŋ atemar nyitemokino iwon akicanit ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋulu ebelekinosi neni ka Akuj.
44015020	Nai itemokino akigirakin ikes abaruwa, ikotere toesikis akinyam ŋamuja ŋuna nyitesegunitae, anerae einakinitae sek nakujo; toesikis daŋ amalao ka nyenyamete ediotyaŋ ŋolo emyeditae kori ŋaokot.
44015021	Anerae elimonokinio Ŋikisila a Moses lotaunio daadaŋ ŋinapei koloŋ ka esyomeneneo alosinagogae a ŋinakoloŋit a Sabato.”
44015022	Tosodo nai Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikatukok kaapei ka ŋikanupak daadaŋ totyakut atemar, kejoikinit toseunae ŋikilyok ŋidi alokidiŋ kec, ido kiyakiyarae Antiokio kaapei ka Paulo ta Baranaba. Toseut ikes Silas ka Yuda ŋolo anyaritae Barasaba, ŋikilyok ŋulu akerer nooi alokanupak.
44015023	Inakinae ikes akiya abaruwa ŋina abala ne: “Isua Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikatukok ŋulu ikirae ŋikaitotoi kus, ikimalat iyes ŋikanupak daadaŋ ŋulu nyirae Ŋiyudayan ŋulu iyakasi Antiokio, Siria ka Cilicia.
44015024	“Eirar isua atemar kepotu ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu anatukot kosi potu inaa akican ka akisigurya ŋatameta kus aŋuna kirworito ikes; nai pa alimokinitae isua ikes akitiya ŋun.
44015025	Aŋun, aponi isua totukokinetei ka tocamunetei aseun ŋituŋa ŋidi kiyakuunae neni kus. Erukunete ikes ka ŋikonei kosi ŋuluminan, Baranaba ka Paulo,
44015026	ŋulu ajal akiyar kec aŋuna ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
44015027	Ikiyaku nai isua neni kus Yuda ka Silas, ŋulu ikilimokinete iyes alorwor kec a ŋilopeyek ŋakiro ŋunapei ikigirit isua.
44015028	Acamu Etau ŋolo Asegan kaapei ka isua atemar nyikiinakin iyes ŋatyokisyo ŋace adepar Ŋikisila lu, ŋulu iitana:
44015029	itemokino iyes toesikis akinyam ŋamuja ŋuna einakinitae nakujo, ŋaokot, ediotyaŋ ŋolo emyeditae ka akitiya amalao. Ani kicoikis iyes ŋun, itiyaete ejok. Ikianyun.”
44015030	Aŋun, kiyakiyarae ikes etiŋito abaruwa ŋin, toloto Antiokio. Kedaut acunakin ŋikanupak, inakis abaruwa neni kec.
44015031	Ani kesyoma ŋituŋa abaruwa, tolakaros aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna esimukekinak.
44015032	Apotu Yuda ka Silas ikwapei araakatar ŋikadwarak, kisimukekis ŋikanupak a ŋakiro a ŋuna alalak, kitogogoŋo ikes.
44015033	Ani kiboiyoto ikes a nen ŋirwa ŋidi, kitoloto ŋikanupak ikes ke ekisil, toboŋosi neni a ŋulu eyakuunito ikes. [
44015034	Nai totyaku Silas akidoŋ nen.]
44015035	Kiboiyoto Paulo ka Baranaba alo Antiokio, itatamete ka elimonokinete ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon, kaapei ka ŋice daŋ ŋulu alalak.
44015036	Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋidi, tolimok Paulo Baranaba tema, “Bua oboŋosi eŋoliasi ŋikanupak, ŋikaitotoi yok alotaunio a daadaŋ a ŋulu eseratere iwon ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon, oanyutu epite ŋolo eyakatar ikes.”
44015037	Acamit Baranaba atemar torukosi ikes ka Yoana Mariko.
44015038	Nai atami Paulo atemar pa etemokino ikes arukor ka ituŋanan ŋini abu toboŋo toesik ikes alo Pampilia, ŋini abu nyerukosi ka ikes lotic.
44015039	Tolomu ebura ŋolo amwanan, totyakas ikes. Ya Baranaba Mariko, toloto ka ameeli tari loculat Kupuro;
44015040	nai toseu Paulo Silas, ido toloto, kedaut ŋikanupak akicikakin ikes anajokis a ŋina ke Ekapolon.
44015041	Kirimo iŋes Siria ka Cilicia, kitogogoŋ ŋatukon ŋuna a ŋikanupak.
44016001	Todol Paulo tari Derube ka Listra. Ayai nen Ekristoit ŋolo anyaritae Timoteo, ŋolo arae toto keŋ Ayudayat ŋina anupit Yesu, nai arae papa keŋ Egirik.
44016002	Etojokito ŋikanupak daadaŋ ŋulu alo Listra ka Ikonio Timoteo.
44016003	Acamit Paulo arukor ka iŋes; abu iŋes ya Timoteo kileŋer aŋuna a Ŋiyudayan a ŋulu ayakasi nakwapin ŋun, anerae ayenete ikes daadaŋ atemar arae papa a Timoteo Egirik.
44016004	Ani irimorete ikes lotaunio, tolimonokis ikes ŋikanupak akiwuap ŋakiro ŋuna apotu Ŋikiyakia ka ŋikatukok totubut alo Yerusalem.
