44016005	Aŋun, kitogogoŋoi ŋatukon a ŋikanupak ananupit ka kiyatas ŋikanupak a ŋinakoloŋit.
44016006	Kirimosi ikes nakwapin ŋuna a Pirigia ka Galatia, kedau Etau ŋolo Asegan awoun ikes akisera ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj alo Asia.
44016007	Ani edolete ikes lokukoru ŋolo a Misia, kikatakis ikes alosit nakwap ŋina anyaritae Bisinia; nai nyecamak ikes Etau ŋolo a Yesu.
44016008	Aŋun, kitoro ikes Misia, totiyaaros Toroas.
44016009	Akoloŋit ŋin nakwaare, bu atakanikinet neni a Paulo: awoi ekile ŋolo alo Makedonia edyekit iŋes ebala, “Bua Makedonia, ikiŋarak isua!”
44016010	Ani keanyuwa Paulo atakanikinet ŋin, kiitanae isua atipei alosit Makedonia, anerae ikipotu oyenutu atemar kikinyar Akuj isua alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni kec.
44016011	Todokae isua ameeli alo Toroas tocorotae tari Samosirake, akoloŋit ŋina atupakini todoloi Neapolis.
44016012	Torotokinoe a nen a ŋakejen tolotoi Pilipi, etaun ŋolo apolon anakwap a Makedonia ŋolo eboiyoto Ŋiromanin. Kiriyae isua ŋirwa ŋidi alotaun a ŋol.
44016013	Ani edoli akoloŋit ŋina a Sabato, tolotoi isua kiŋa etaun diyete aŋolol, neni atamakinitae isua atemar kori etukonokin Ŋiyudayan akilip. Kiboikinetei isua, kirworoe neni a ŋaberu a ŋuna atukokina nen.
44016014	Apei alokidiŋ ŋuna ikipupete isua, arae aberu ŋina anyaritae Lidia ŋina alotaun a ŋolo a Tyatira, ŋina agyelanari ŋilowi ŋulu kipura areŋak. Arae iŋes aberu ŋina ainakina neni ka Akuj. Abu Ekapolon toŋaa etau keŋ akiirar tocamu ŋakiro ŋuna erworo Paulo.
44016015	Ani kibatisae iŋes kaapei ka ŋituŋa ŋulu ke ekal keŋ, itodyek isua tema, “Ani kire kitamete iyes atemar arae ayoŋ akanupan ŋina ke Ekapolon, potu kiboiyoto alokai kaŋ.” Abu iŋes ikitacamu isua alosit ka iŋes.
44016016	Apeikoloŋit elosyo isua neni elipeneneere, kiryamunetei ka apese ŋina arae apito, ŋina ayakar ekipye ŋolo ainakinit iŋes akidwar ŋakiro ŋuna eponito alokiŋaren. Aryamianakini iŋes ŋikapolok keŋ ŋisiliŋa ŋulu alalak anakidwar keŋ.
44016017	Kiwuapu iŋes Paulo ka isua ecela ebala, “Erae ŋikilyok lu ŋiketiyak ŋulu ka Akuj a ŋina alokidiama nooi! Iseraete ikes epite ŋolo ipedoryata iyes aiuno!”
44016018	Kitiya iŋes nu ŋirwa ŋulu alalak, akitodol ŋina aŋoya Paulo, ido toboboŋ tolimok ekipye tema, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ alokiro a Yesu Kristo atemar tolomu aneni keŋ!” Tolomu ekipye aneni keŋ esaa ŋolopei ŋol.
44016019	Nai ani eyenunete ŋikapolok keŋ atemar adaun epite ŋolo sek aryamununiata ikes ŋisiliŋa, aŋuna eritarere ekipye, kikamut ikes Paulo ka Silas, torikosi ikes lokepukak ŋulu ayakasi neni iikiikere.
44016020	Ani kedaut ikes ayaun ikes lokatubok, temasi, “Erae ŋikilyok lu Ŋiyudayan, isiguryaete ikes etaun yok.
44016021	Itatamete ikes ŋitalyo ŋulu italeo iwon Ŋiromanin akiwuap ka akitiya.”
44016022	Toloma asepic a ŋituŋa daŋ nakiro ŋuna esitakinitere ikes. Tociliciliyasi ŋikatubok ŋilowi a Paulo ka Silas, tolimokis ŋituŋa akibuŋa ikes a ŋadase.
44016023	Ani kibuŋae ikes nooi, kiwuakinae mabus, kicikakinae ekapolokiniton mabus akiyok ikes ejok.
44016024	Ani iirari ekapolokiniton mabus ŋuna ecikakinio iŋes, togolok ikes nagule ŋina alotooma nooi, toen ŋakejen kec nakito ŋuna apotyok.
44016025	Ani eapikini kidiŋ akuwar, elipete Paulo ka Silas toeos ŋieosyo neni ka Akuj, topupete ŋimabus ŋuluce ikes.
44016026	Ŋinapeipaki, tomaranik akwap nooi, kiukok ejera ameun alokwap. Atipei toŋaaros ŋikekya daadaŋ, tolacaros ŋiriko aneni a ŋimabus a daadaŋ.
44016027	Ani ekyenyuni ekapolokiniton mabus, kiŋolik ŋikekya ŋulu ke ejera daadaŋ eŋaara, totamak atemar keema ŋimabus; aŋun tolemu atum keŋ ecamit akicumakin bon.
44016028	Nai kiworou Paulo ke etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Nyiwan akonikuwan! Ikiya isua daadaŋ ne!”
44016029	Tonyarau ekapolokiniton mabus ituŋanan ayaun etaa, kipumar tooma, toramakin kiŋaren Paulo ka Silas emarani.
44016030	Ya nai iŋes ikes kiŋa, kiŋit ikes tema, “Ŋikapolok, nyo itemokino ayoŋ etiya, ikotere oiun?”
44016031	Temasi ikes, “Tonup Ekapolon Yesu, ido toiun kaapei ka ekonikal.”
44016032	Tolimonokis nai ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj neni keŋ ka lotuŋa ŋulu alokai keŋ.
44016033	Ya iŋes ikes nakwaare esaa ŋolopei ŋol, kilot ŋajemei kec. Aponi kibatisae iŋes atipei kaapei ka ekal keŋ.
44016034	Ya iŋes Paulo ka Silas kai keŋ, inak ikes akimuj. Tolakaros iŋes ka ŋituŋa keŋ, aŋuna aponiata ikes tonupa Akuj.
44016035	Ani iwalari akwap, kiyakuut ŋikatubok ŋipoliso atemar, “Kimyekisi ŋikilyok ŋul toloto.”
44016036	Tosodi ekapolokiniton mabus tolimok Paulo ŋakiro ŋun tema, “Eyakuut ŋikatubok akirot atemar ikilacakin iyes. Tonyoutu nai, toloto a ekisil.”
44016037	Nai tolimok Paulo ikes tema, “Aponi ikibuŋae isua alokiŋaren ŋituŋa pa ikitubokinitae – isua ŋituŋa ŋulu a Roma! Apotu ikes ikiwuakis isua mabus. Ecamito nai tokona ikes alacakin isua pa eyenete ŋituŋa a? Nyepedor jik! Itemokino potu ikes pei ŋilopeyek ikilacakis isua.”
44016038	Yaasi ŋipoliso ŋakiro ŋun lokatubok. Ani iirarete ikes atemar arae Paulo ka Silas ŋituŋa a Roma, tobul ikes.
44016039	A ŋun, potu ikes adyekit Paulo ka Silas akisyon ikes. Toŋaut nai ikes alomabus, kiŋitakis ikes alosit alotaun.
44016040	Tolomut Paulo ka Silas alomabus, toloto neni a Lidia. Kiryamun ikes aina ka ŋikanupak, tolimokis ikes ŋakiro ŋuna kisimukekinet, torotokis nai alotaun.
44017001	Toloto ikes, kitoro lotaunio ŋulu ka Ampipoli ka Apolonia tari Tesalonika neni ayai esinagoga ŋolo a Ŋiyudayan.
44017002	Ikwaŋina araakar epite a Paulo, abu tolosene losinagoga. Kiyana iŋes ka ŋituŋa a nen ŋirwa ŋuluuni ŋulu arae ŋulu a Sabato, tolimonokini ikes ŋakiro ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta.
44017003	Kisileerek ka kitoodik ikes atemar etemokino Kristo toryamu ŋican ka toyaru alokatwak. Tolimu Paulo tema, “Yesu lo, ŋolo eserae ayoŋ neni kus, iŋes erae Kristo.”
44017004	Tonupa ŋice alokidiŋ kec, toriwo neni a Paulo ka Silas. Tonupa daŋ Ŋigirik ŋulu alalak ŋulu ainakina neni ka Akuj, kaapei ka ŋaberu ŋuna alalak ŋuna apolok alotaun.
44017005	Nai min arakao neni a Ŋiyudayan, kiriraut ŋikerimitok emaket ŋice, toyeut aruruma. Kisiguryakis ikes etaun daadaŋ, tolomasi ka agogoŋu lore a Yason, iwarito Paulo ka Silas ayaun ikes kiŋa lotuŋa.
44017006	Nai ani eryamunete ikes emamukasi, kiriut Yason kaapei ka ŋikanupak ŋice lokapolok ŋulu ke etaun, tocelas ebasi, “Etolomut ŋikilyok lu ŋakiro ŋuna aronok nakwap daadaŋ! Tokona apotu ikes lotaun yok
44017007	ka ejau Yason ikes kai keŋ. Eŋerito ikes daadaŋ ŋikisila ŋulu ke ekepukan a Roma, aŋuna ebaakatar ebe eyai erwosit ece ŋolo enyaritae Yesu.”
44017008	Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ka ŋikapolok ŋulu ke etaun ŋakiro ŋun, kiidakinos nooi.
44017009	Kitelemut ŋikapolok Yason ka ŋuluce daŋ ŋisiliŋa ŋulu acamakinere ikes akiboi alokiŋa ejera. Tolacakis nai ikes toloto.
44017010	Ŋinapei ani ewari akwap, tolimokis ŋikanupak Paulo ka Silas atemar toloto Berea. Ani edolete ikes inaa, toloto losinagoga a Ŋiyudayan.
44017011	Apupete ŋituŋa a nen ŋakiro akilo ŋulu alo Tesalonika, anerae apotu kijaut ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ecamito nooi, tosyomete a ŋinakoloŋit ŋakiro ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta, ecamito aripun erae kerae kire ŋakiro ŋuna erworo Paulo.
44017012	Aŋun, tonupa ikes ŋulu alalak; tonupa daŋ Ŋigirik ŋulu alalak, ŋaberu ŋuna ajakaanak, kaapei ka ŋikilyok.
44017013	Nai ani iirarete Ŋiyudayan ŋulu alo Tesalonika atemar iserae Paulo ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj tari alo Berea, potu ikes neni daŋ, togeut akitutuk ŋituŋa, kisiguryakis.
44017014	Kitenakis ŋikanupak Paulo atipei, tolot ananam; nai kidoŋo Silas ka Timoteo Berea.
44017015	Apotu ŋikilyok ŋulu etenarete Paulo kitodolo iŋes Asen. Toboŋosi nai ikes Berea, kedau Paulo akicik ikes atemar okoryamut iŋes Silas ka Timoteo atipei alotooma apaki ŋina euruwuana.
44017016	Ani eriŋa Paulo idarit Silas ka Timoteo alo Asen, toronik iŋes nooi epite ŋolo alalaata ŋakujo alotaun a ŋol.
44017017	Aŋun, kirworo iŋes alosinagoga ka Ŋiyudayan kaapei ka ŋuluce ŋulu ainakina neni ka Akuj; kimocoete jwi jwi alomaket ka ŋulu arae ŋikalotok.
44017018	Kimocoto daŋ iŋes ka ŋikaosok ŋulu anyaritae Ŋipikuriyae ka Ŋisitoikae. Temasi ŋice, “Inyoni ecamit ekile ŋolo irworo car lo alimun?” Temasi ŋice, “Esibit elimonokini iŋes ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋakujo a ŋuna egelaaka.” Alimunete ikes ŋun, anerae alimonokini Paulo ŋakiro ŋuna a Yesu ka ŋuna ka ayarun alokatwak.
44017019	Aŋun, tonyaraiyasi ikes iŋes yaasi loikiiko ŋolo ke etaun, ŋolo anyaritae Areopago, tolimokis iŋes temasi, “Ikicamit isua akiirar akitatam ŋina kitete na, ŋina itatami iyoŋ.
44017020	Anerae epupyo isua ŋakiro ŋace ŋuna egelaaka; aŋun, ikicamit isua ayenun apolou kec.”
44017021	(Aminasi ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Asen ka ŋulu gelae ŋulu aya nen aayenen ŋapakio daadaŋ irworosi ŋakiro ŋuna alunyarosi ka akiiranar ŋuna kitet.)
44017022	Towo Paulo alokiŋaren eikiiko ŋolo ka Areopago, kirworik tema, “Ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Asen, ayenu ayoŋ atemar iraakasi iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu iyaito ibore daadaŋ alowae a ŋolo ke edin.
44017023	Apaki ŋina erimoritor ayoŋ etaun kus ka eŋolianak neni ilipyananaata iyes, abu oanyua neni imurotor iyes neni egiritae neni ebala, ‘Neni ka akuj a ŋina nyeyenio.’ Akuj ŋin nai, ŋina ilipete iyes neni keŋ nyiyenete, iŋes tokona eserae ayoŋ ŋakiro keŋ.
44017024	Akuj na ŋina asubuni akwap ka ibore daadaŋ ŋini eyai tooma keŋ, ŋina erae Ekapolon ŋolo anakuj ka akwap; nyiboi iŋes anakais a ŋuna edukito ŋituŋa akilipya ŋakujo.
44017025	Nabo daŋ nyiitanit iŋes akiŋarakinet a ŋituŋa esibit icana iŋes idiobore, torae bo iŋes einanakini akiyar ka ekieŋanu ta ŋiboro daadaŋ neni kec.
44017026	Abu Akuj tosub ŋibukui a ŋituŋa daadaŋ alokile ke epei, kisiboik ikes nakwap daadaŋ, kedau atubun apaki ŋina eyaryata ka neni iboikinosi.
44017027	Etiyae Akuj ŋun, ikotere kiwara ŋituŋa iŋes, toraraput, ido toryamut iŋes. Tari kikote nen daŋ, nyelwana iŋes aneni yok a daadaŋ.
44017028	Anerae ebookoi ebe: ‘Ikiyari, ikilosi ka ikiya iwon aŋuna ka Akuj.’ Ikwaŋinapei ebaakatar ŋikegirak kus ŋice ebe, ‘Ikirae iwon kire ŋiletok keŋ.’
44017029	Ikwaŋinapei ikiraakar iwon ŋiletok ŋulu ka Akuj, nyitemokino iwon ikitami atemar ikwaan eyakae keŋ ka etorube ŋolo eyeunitae ke egolid kori ke esilipa kori ka amoru – etorube ŋolo eyeuni ituŋanan ka aosou keŋ.
44017030	Akitodol apaki na, abu Akuj nyimaraki ŋapakio ŋuna pa ayeniata ŋituŋa iŋes, nai tokona ecikak ŋituŋa anakwapin a daadaŋ akibelekin neni keŋ.
44017031	Anerae atubu Akuj akoloŋit ŋina etubokinia ŋituŋa daadaŋ anakwap anakiyookino ka erae ituŋanan ŋini aseu iŋes itiyakini ŋun. Etoodiu iŋes ŋun lotuŋa daadaŋ anakiteyarun ituŋanan ŋin alokatwak!”
44017032	Ani iirarete ikes ŋuna ka ayarun alokatwak, tojamuwasi ŋice iŋes; nai temasi ŋice ebe, “Ikicamit isua akiirar iyoŋ irworo ŋakiro ŋun nabo.”
44017033	Aŋun, tolot Paulo aloikiiko.
44017034	Nai apotu ŋikilyok ŋice toriwo ka iŋes, tonupa: alokidiŋ ŋul, ayai Dionisio ŋolo ka atukot a ŋina ka Areopago ka aberu ŋina anyaritae Damaris ta ŋice daŋ.
44018001	Ekaku a ŋun, torotok Paulo alo Asen, tolot lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Korinto.
44018002	Toryamu iŋes aina Eyudayat ŋolo anyaritae Akwila, ŋolo auritae alo Ponitio. Keriŋa Akwila eboŋuni alo Italia, torukito ka aberu keŋ Prisila, anerae kebu Klauda ekepukan a Roma tolimu atemar torotokis Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ alo Roma. Tolot Paulo aanyun ikes,
44018003	toruko ka ikes, kitiyata kaapei, anerae arae iŋes daŋ ekadonyon ŋiemae ikwapei ikes.
44018004	Kimocoenenee Paulo alosinagoga a ŋinakoloŋit a Sabato, iwarit akitunup Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋigirik ŋakiro ŋun.
44018005	Ani epote Silas ka Timoteo alo Makedonia, totum Paulo aayenen akeepaki daadaŋ elimonokini ka iteyenunui Ŋiyudayan atemar Yesu iŋes erae Kristo.
44018006	Nai ani itepegete ikes iŋes ka kirworotor iŋes neni aronon, kilakilakaa iŋes ŋilowi keŋ tema, “Ani tokona kikitubok Akuj iyes, erae ŋun ŋuna kus! Emam ŋuna akatapito ayoŋ. Ameun tokona alosi ayoŋ lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.”
44018007	Torotok iŋes alosinagoga tolot, akiboi kai a Tito Yusito. Arae Tito ekile ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj ka pa arae Eyudayat. Aapi akai keŋ alosinagoga.
44018008	Tonupa nai ekapolokiniton esinagoga ŋolo arae ekiro keŋ Kirispo ka ekal keŋ daadaŋ Ekapolon Yesu. Ani iirarete ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋulu alo Korinto ŋakiro ŋun, tonupa, kibatisae.
44018009	Akoloŋit apei nakwaare, bu atakanikinet neni a Paulo, kisirworik Ekapolon iŋes tema, “Nyikuryaniar, nai torubak ilimonokini ka nyiesik jik,
44018010	anerae ikirukit ayoŋ ka iyoŋ. Emam ituŋanan epedori akiwan iyoŋ, anerae ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak alotaun a lo, erae ŋulu kaŋ.”
44018011	Aŋun, kiboi Paulo a nen todol ekaru epei ka ŋilapyo ŋikanikapei itatami ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj lotuŋa.
44018012	Ani ituruworyo Galio ekawuoikiniton ekepukan a Roma anakwap a ŋina ka Akaia, tocunakinos Ŋiyudayan iwapei, kikamut Paulo yaasi loikiiko.
44018013	Temasi ikes ebe, “Ikatakinit ekile lo akitacamun ŋituŋa akilip Akuj alopite a ŋolo nyecamito Ŋikisila a Moses!”
44018014	Ani edikino Paulo irworikini, tolimok Galio Ŋiyudayan tema, “Kerae torae ŋakiro nu ŋuna aronok kori ŋuna ka aseconu a ŋina apolon, keya ŋakiro ŋuna apedorya ayoŋ apupokin iyes Ŋiyudayan.
44018015	Nai ikwaŋinapei eraakar ebura lo ŋolo a ŋakiro ka ŋirorwa ka ŋikisila kus a ŋilopeyek, itemokino iyes ŋilopeyek tosubakis ŋakiro kus. Nyaruwor ayoŋ ekatubon ŋolo a ŋakiro a ŋuna ikote nu!”
44018016	Kirita iŋes ikes kiŋa aneni eikiikere.
44018017	Kikamut ikes daadaŋ Sostene ekapolokiniton esinagoga, kibuŋata iŋes alokiŋaren eikiiko. Nai nyemitak Galio ŋun tari iwadio.
44018018	Kiboiyoto Paulo ka ŋikanupak alo Korinto ŋirwa ŋulu alalak. Ani ekaku, totyakas ka ikes, torukosi iŋes ka Prisila ta Akwila, todoka ameeli, toloto Siria. Ani eriŋa Paulo nyeloto alo Kenikerea, totub ŋitim keŋ aŋuna ka akikoŋ a ŋina abu iŋes kikoŋ neni ka Akuj.
44018019	Todolo ikes Epeso, tolot Paulo bon losinagoga akiyan ka Ŋiyudayan.
44018020	Kiŋitakis ikes iŋes akiboi ekaoyan ka ikes, nai abu nyecamu.
44018021	Nai ani erotokini iŋes, tolimok ikes tema, “Aboŋuni ayoŋ neni kus, erae kerae acamit ka Akuj.” Todok nai iŋes ameeli alo Epeso, toesik Prisila ka Akwila a nen.
44018022	Ani edoli iŋes Kaisaria, tolot Yerusalem akimal atukot ŋina a ŋikanupak; tolot nai Antiokio.
44018023	Ani kedau iŋes apaki adio a nen, torotok tolot kirimo nakwapin ŋuna a Galatia ka Pirigia, kisimukek ŋikanupak daadaŋ.
44018024	Apaki ŋin, bu lotaun ŋolo ke Epeso Eyudayat ŋolo anyaritae Apolo, ŋolo edounitoe alo Alekisandaria. Ayeni iŋes erwor nooi, ayeni daŋ Ŋakigireta nooi.
44018025	Kitatamitae iŋes ejok Erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon. Etatami iŋes ŋakiro a Yesu alopite a ŋolo eyookino ka alelakinit nooi; nai ayeni iŋes ebatisimu a Yoana bon.
44018026	Kisyak nai iŋes erwor alosinagoga pa ekuryanit. Ani iirarete Prisila ka Akwila iŋes, tonyaraiyasi iŋes, tolimokis Erot ŋolo ka Akuj alopite a ŋolo iyookino adepar.
44018027	Ani etyakuni Apolo alosit Akaia, kisimukekis ŋikanupak ŋulu a Epeso iŋes alosit, kigirakis ŋabaruwae neni a ŋikanupak a ŋulu alo Akaia akijaun iŋes aina. Ani edoli iŋes inaa, kiŋarak iŋes nooi Ŋikristo ŋulu keris keruworosi ŋikanupak anajokis a ŋina ka Akuj.
44018028	Anerae anakimoco keŋ ka Ŋiyudayan alokiŋaren ŋituŋa, abu kilou ikes, kitoodiu a Nakigireta ebe Yesu iŋes erae Kristo.
44019001	Ani eriŋa Apolo eyai Korinto, kirimo Paulo nakwapin ŋuna a Galatia ka Pirigia, todol tari Epeso. Toryamu iŋes aina ŋikasyomak ŋidi,
44019002	kiŋit ikes tema, “Ipotu iyes toryamut Etau ŋolo Asegan apaki ŋina inupyata iyes a?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Nyiirara isua tari atemar eyai icebore ŋini enyaritae Etau ŋolo Asegan.”
44019003	Kiŋit Paulo ikes tema, “Alibatisimu nai ikibatisatere iyes?” Toboŋokis ikes temasi, “Arae ebatisimu a Yoana.”
44019004	Tema nai Paulo, “Abu Yoana kibatisa a ebatisimu a ŋolo kiyet ŋasecisya; nai alimonokini iŋes ŋituŋa akinup ŋolo ebuni alokaku keŋ, iŋes Yesu.”
44019005	Ani iirarete ikes ŋun, kibatisae ikes alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu.
44019006	Kidokok nai Paulo ŋakan keŋ neni kec, min Etau ŋolo Asegan neni kec; kirworikis ikes ŋaŋajepa ŋuna agelegelya, todwara ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
44019007	Aapikinit ekimar a ŋikilyok a ŋul ŋitomon ka ŋiarei.
44019008	Torubak Paulo elosenene losinagoga; ŋilapyo ŋiuni irworo lotuŋa pa ekuryana, kisimoco ikes iwarit akitunup ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj.
44019009	Nai esyaaka ŋice jik, nyenupa; ido irworotor Erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon alopite a ŋolo aronon alokiŋaren atukot daadaŋ. Aŋun, toesik Paulo ikes, totyakaros ka ŋikasyomak aneni kec. Anyoun apaki ŋin, erworo iŋes jwi jwi alokai a Tiranus neni a ŋituŋa.
44019010	Kitiya iŋes ŋun ŋikaru ŋiarei, kisiira Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋigirik daŋ alo Asia ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon.
44019011	Etiyae Akuj ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna ailiilok aneni a Paulo.
44019012	Ayaununuyete ŋituŋa neni a ŋikadyakak ŋakitambarae ka ŋarapeta ŋuna keris Paulo kisitiya, kiritanarere ŋidekesyo kec ka kitorotonokinere ŋipyan aneni kec.
44019013	Kikatakis nai Ŋiyudayan ŋice, ŋulu erimito kiritanarete ŋipyan, akisitiya ekiro ŋolo ke Ekapolon Yesu akiritanarya ŋipyan. Abasi ikes lopyan, “Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ alokiro a Yesu, a ŋolo iserae Paulo ŋakiro keŋ, tolot.”
44019014	Aya daŋ ŋisapa ŋikanikaarei ŋulu ke Eyudayat a ŋolo anyaritae Sikepa ŋolo arae esacaradoti ŋolo apolon. Etiyaete ikes daŋ ŋakiro ŋun.
44019015	Nai tema ekipye neni kec, “Ayeni ayoŋ Yesu ka ayeni Paulo; nai ataŋae bo iyes?”
44019016	Toboŋ ekile ŋolo ayai ekipye neni keŋ, kitijik ikes ka aryenyeo, kilou ikes. Toema ikes daadaŋ alokai ekoris ŋilowi ka eyakatar ŋaruma.
44019017	Toyenut Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋigirik daadaŋ ŋulu alo Epeso ŋakiro ŋun, tokuryaketa daadaŋ, kitopoloosi ekiro ŋolo ke Ekapolon Yesu.
44019018	Apotu ŋikanupak ŋulu alalak tolimonosi alokiŋaren ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna aronok, ŋuna sek keris ikes kitiyata.
44019019	Yaut ŋikalalak ŋulu sek arae ŋikekukujak ŋikitaaboi kec iwapei kicunyakis alokiŋaren ŋituŋa daadaŋ. Kimoriut ikes ebei ŋolo a ŋikitaaboi, todol daadaŋ ŋisilipae ŋalipyo ŋatomonikan.
44019020	Alopite a ŋol, abu akirot ŋina ke Ekapolon kiyatakin nooi ka kielakin nakwapin.
44019021	Ani kitiyakinosi ŋakiro ŋun, totyaku Paulo alosit Makedonia ka Akaia, tolot nai Yerusalem. Tolimu iŋes tema, “Ani kadau ayoŋ ayakaun nen, itemokino oanyu Roma daŋ.”
44019022	Kiyakiya iŋes kiŋaren ŋikeŋarakinitok keŋ ŋiarei, Timoteo ka Erasto, toloto Makedonia; eriŋa iŋes iriyat alo Asia.
44019023	Arae apaki na ayakar aruruma ŋina apolon Epeso aŋuna ke Erot a ŋolo ke Ekapolon.
44019024	Ayai nen eceketyekan ŋisilipae, ŋolo anyaritae Demetrio, ŋolo etyeki ŋitorubei ŋulu ka akai a ŋolo ka akuj a ŋina anyaritae Artemis. Ayaununui akicuruta keŋ epoida ŋolo alalan nooi neni a ŋiketiyak.
44019025	Tonyarau iŋes ŋiketiyak keŋ iwapei ka ŋuluce daŋ ŋulu etiyaete etic ŋolopei ŋol, tolimok ikes tema, “Ŋikilyok, iyenete iyes atemar neni itorunit ebari yok lotic lo.
44019026	Iteete ka iirasi iyes ŋilopeyek Paulo lo. Ebala iŋes ebe nyerae ŋakujo ŋuna itiyaunito ŋituŋa ŋakujo tari iwadio ka etunup ŋituŋa daadaŋ a ne alo Epeso ka akwap ŋina ka Asia daadaŋ.
44019027	Iŋes nai atemar alomu neni aronon; eryamuni akicuruta yok ekiro ŋolo aronon. Meere ŋun daŋ bon, eruwor akoŋinait akai ka akuj a ŋina enyaritae Artemis ka akuj yok ŋina apolon, edaun daŋ arwonu keŋ – ŋina ilipyata ŋituŋa alo Asia ka anakwapin a daadaŋ iŋes!”
44019028	Ani iirarete ŋasepico ŋakiro ŋun, toŋoa nooi, kisyakis ecelet ebasi, “Epol Artemis ŋina a Epeso!”
44019029	Kiguryakis ikes etaun daadaŋ. Kikamut ikes ŋirukitos a Paulo ŋiarei Gaio ka Aristako, ŋulu arae Ŋimakedoniyae, yaasi neni ebolyare.
44019030	Acamit Paulo alomar tooma nasepic, nai nyecamakis ŋikanupak iŋes.
44019031	Ŋikapolok daŋ ŋice ŋulu araakasi ŋikonei keŋ, kiyakikis iŋes akirot ŋina adyekitotor nyeloma neni ebolyare.
44019032	Apaki ŋin, egurya eikiiko nooi a nen; acelasi ŋice ŋakiro ŋace, tocelas ŋice ŋace ŋuna agelaaka, anerae pa ayenete ŋulu alalak ŋakiro ŋuna atukokinitere ikes.
44019033	Toreiyasi Ŋiyudayan Alekisanda kiŋaren ŋituŋa. Ani isimukekinete ŋituŋa iŋes akirworikin, kikia Alekisanda akan keŋ, ikotere eiunor iŋes.
44019034	Nai ani eyenunete ikes atemar arae iŋes Eyudayat, tocela ikes ŋakiro ŋapei, yaasi ŋisaae ŋiarei ebasi, “Epol Artemis ŋina a Epeso!”
44019035	Kelunyar apaki ŋina aoyan, kisililiŋ ekaran ŋolo ke etaun ikes tolimok tema, “Ŋikilyok ŋulu ke Epeso, eyenete ŋituŋa daadaŋ atemar Epeso iŋes erae eketen akai ŋina ka akuj a ŋina enyaritae Artemis a ŋina apolon ka etorube keŋ ŋolo adouni anakuj.
44019036	Emam ituŋanan ŋini epegi ŋakiro ŋun. Aŋun, itemokino iyes kililiŋa, nyitiyata idiobore ka atipei.
44019037	Iyaut iyes ŋikilyok lu ne tari pa erae ŋikokolak ŋulu a ŋakais a ŋuna ka akuj yok kori pa iyanyito akuj yok.
44019038	Ani kire kisitakinito Demetrio ka ŋiketiyak keŋ idiotuŋanan, eyakasi ŋirwa ŋulu iikiikere ka eyakasi ŋikatubok; epedorete ikes akisitanakin aina.
44019039	Nai ani keyai ibore ice ŋini icamito iyes, esubakinio aloikiiko a ŋolo a ŋituŋa yok.
44019040	Anerae epedoryo akisitakin iwon aŋuna ka aruruma a ŋina etiyakin nakoloŋit na. Emam ŋakiro ŋuna ejokya acela na ka nyikipedori iwon alimun adiokirot ŋina ikigaŋi iwon aŋuna keŋ.”
44019041	Ani kirwor ŋun, kiela ekaran ŋituŋa.
44020001	Ani kedaun aruruma, tonyarau Paulo ŋikanupak iwapei, kisimukek ikes, ido tolimok tema, “Ikianyun.” Torotok nai iŋes Makedonia.
44020002	Ani kedau akirim ŋitela ŋul daadaŋ, kisimukek ŋikanupak a nen, ido tolot Akaia.
44020003	Kiriya iŋes aina ŋilapyo ŋiuni. Ani eriŋa iŋes itemonokin alosit ka ameeli Siria, toyenu atemar etukosi Ŋiyudayan aŋuna keŋ. Aŋun, totyaku iŋes akitor nabo Makedonia eboŋori.
44020004	Torukosi ŋituŋa lu ka iŋes: Sopate ŋolo alo Berea – lokoku a Piro, Aristako ka Sekondo ŋulu alo Tesalonika, Gaio ŋolo alo Derube, Tuciko ka Tropimo ŋulu alo Asia ka Timoteo.
44020005	Toberaros ikes kiŋaren ikidarut isua alo Toroas.
44020006	Ani edaun ŋasuban ŋuna a ŋamugati a ŋuna emam ŋakinyalet, torotokinoe isua ka ameeli alo Pilipi. Kelunyarosi ŋirwa ŋikan, torukaunae ikes alo Toroas, kiriyae aina esabit epei.
44020007	Akoloŋit ŋina ke Esabit, apaki ŋina ikiyakar isua iwapei akinumunum Akimuj ŋina ke Ekapolon, abu Paulo kirwor neni a ŋikanupak a ŋulu a nen akitodol kidiŋ akuwar, aŋuna arotokinitor iŋes taparacu keŋ.
44020008	Ayakasi ŋitaae ŋulu alalak nagule ŋina alokidiama, ŋina ikitukokina isua.
44020009	Eboi esorokit ŋolo anyaritae Eutiko alodirisa; ikwaŋina arubakinitor Paulo irworo, kilurakin nooi Eutiko akitodol neni ajotooror. Kimasun kwap alodirisa a ŋolo anagule a ŋina ayai kidiama ŋunaarei. Toryamunae iŋes etwanit.
44020010	Todoka nai Paulo kwap, torwakin neni keŋ, totun iŋes, tolimu tema, “Nyikibul, eyari iŋes!”
44020011	Toboŋo iŋes kidiama kai, tokorak Akimuj ŋina ke Ekapolon kimuja kaapei. Kirworo iŋes ka ikes ekaoyan akitodol nakipiripirunet akoloŋ, ido torotok.
44020012	Yaasi ikes esorokit lore eyari ka alakara ikes nooi.
44020013	Tolotoi isua alo Toroas kiŋaren, todokae ameeli tari Asos, kimyekinae Paulo ebunit a ŋakejen a nen, aneni atyakunitae isua akitodokia iŋes ameeli; anerae aris iŋes kikilimok isua akitiya ŋun.
44020014	Ani ikiryamakin iŋes ka isua Asos, kitodokakinae isua iŋes ameeli, tolotoi tari loculat Mitilene.
44020015	Torotokinoe a nen, kitoroi taparacu iwalari diyete eculat ŋolo anyaritae Kios. Kelunyar akoloŋit apei, todolunoe isua loculat Samo; ani akoloŋit ŋina atupakini ŋin, todoloe Mileto.
44020016	Aris Paulo ketyaku adepar Epeso, ikotere nyicanicanaar adiopaki alo Asia. Ekirikira iŋes erae kepedori adolun Yerusalem nyedolo akoloŋit ŋina a Pentekoste.
44020017	Kiyaku Paulo akituk alo Mileto tari Epeso alimokin ŋikatukok ŋulu ka atukot a ŋikanupak akisiryam iŋes.
44020018	Ani edolunete ikes, tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek epite ŋolo ikirukitor iyes ka ayoŋ apaki daadaŋ, ameun akoloŋit ŋina adolunio ayoŋ Asia.
44020019	Abu ayoŋ etiyanak Ekapolon anapatanu tari anapakio a ŋuna egworor ka ŋuna aryamunitor ŋican, ikwaŋina arubakinitotor Ŋiyudayan etukosi aŋuna kaŋ.
44020020	Iyenete iyes atemar abu ayoŋ nyemunon idiobore ŋini eyai epoida aneni kus, abu okolimonok ka eketatamik anatukon ka alorerya kus.
44020021	Abu ayoŋ eteyenik Ŋiyudayan ka Ŋigirik daŋ atemar etemokino ikes tokiwa ŋasecisya kec alokiŋaren Akuj ka tonupa Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
44020022	Nai tokona, anakipup Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, alosi ayoŋ Yerusalem pa ayeni ŋuna akatakanikinete ayoŋ aina.
44020023	Ŋuna ayeni ayoŋ ikes nu: eketeyenunui Etau ŋolo Asegan ayoŋ alotaunio a daadaŋ atemar ekedarit ayoŋ alomar mabus ka aryamun ŋakisicaneta.
44020024	Nai aneni kaŋ nyepol akiyar nooi akilo aŋetakin akerit na ŋina erae etic ŋolo akainakinit Ekapolon Yesu ayoŋ akitiya. Etic ŋol iŋes akiteyenun Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina ka Akuj.
44020025	“Ayeni ayoŋ tokona atemar iyes daadaŋ ŋulu adau ayoŋ alimonokin ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj, nyikiŋolikinete ayoŋ nabo.
44020026	Aŋun, ekekekini iyes nooi napeikoloŋit na atemar, ani tokona kitutubokinosi iyes Akuj, emam ŋuna akatapito ayoŋ.
44020027	Anerae nyimunono ayoŋ akiserakin iyes ŋuna daadaŋ ecamit Akuj.
44020028	Kimukeuna make ka kiyoko esipan daadaŋ ŋolo ecikak Etau ŋolo Asegan nakan kus. Toraakas ŋikeyokok ŋulu ka atukot a ŋina a ŋikanupak Akuj, ŋina abu iŋes kituruwo ŋina keŋ a ŋaokot a Lokoku keŋ.
44020029	Ayeni ayoŋ atemar ani karotok ayoŋ, epote ŋipeei ŋulu adedeŋak nooi neni kus ka nyeesikinete akinyasun esipan.
44020030	Ebuni apaki ŋina elomuniata tari alokidiŋ kus ŋikalyokonok ŋice ecamito atemar kiwuapakis ŋikanupak ikes.
44020031	Aŋun nai, totenito totamunito atemar tari anapakio a ŋuna egworor ayoŋ, abu ekesimukek iyes daadaŋ akuwar ka apaaran, tolunyar ŋikaru ŋiuni.
44020032	“Nai tokona, ekewuakini ayoŋ iyes nakan ŋuna ka Akuj ka nakiro ŋuna ka ajokis keŋ, ŋina epedori akitogogoŋ ka ainakin iyes ŋarereŋisyo ŋuna iŋadat Akuj aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu eturuwo iŋes ŋulu keŋ.
44020033	Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek atemar nyiwuakina ayoŋ ekibure losilipa a ituŋanan a idio, logolid kori lolowi,
44020034	nai abu ayoŋ a ŋakan kaŋ etiya ka oryamu ibore daadaŋ ŋini ikiitanit ayoŋ ka ŋirukitos kaŋ.
44020035	Eketoodik ayoŋ iyes alopitesyo a daadaŋ atemar itemokino ŋinituŋanan kitiya ka agogoŋu, ikotere epedori akiŋarakin ŋulu epalag anatamunit ŋakiro ŋuna abala Ekapolon Yesu, ‘Eyai arereŋu nooi nainanakin akilo naryamunun.’ ”
44020036	Ani irikakini Paulo erwori, toryediko kaapei ka ikes daadaŋ, kilipa.
44020037	Totunakinos ikes daadaŋ neni keŋ enuyete ebasi, “Tolot neni ajokan.”
44020038	Egworosi ikes ka eyaloloŋete nooi a ŋakiro a ŋuna aris iŋes kelimu atemar nyiŋolikinete ikes iŋes nabo. Kitenakis nai iŋes nameeli.
44021001	Ani ketyakaroi isua aneni kec, todokae ameeli, kidiiriyaretei tari loculat ŋolo enyaritae Kos. Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini ŋin, todoloe loculat Rodes; a nen tolotoi tari lotaun Patara.
44021002	Toryamunae aina ameeli ŋina alosi Poenikia; aŋun, todokae ameeli ŋin, torotokinoe.
44021003	Poni isua neni atakania Kupuro, tomanae alowae a ŋolo alo Kwap, tolotoi nakwap ŋina anyaritae Siria. Todokunae alotaun Tiro, anerae arae nen aai ameeli ŋiboro ŋulu ewuokit.
44021004	Torukaunae ŋikanupak a Yesu aina, kiboi ka ikes esabit epei. Tolimokis ikes Paulo nyelot Yerusalem ikwapei eteyenikinitor ikes Etau ŋolo Asegan.
44021005	Tari ŋina alimunitere ŋun, ani edaun ŋarwa ŋuna arukitere isua ka ikes, kitemokinetei isua arotokin. Ikitenakis isua ŋikanupak daadaŋ ka ŋaberu kec ta ŋidwe daŋ, tolotoi kiŋa etaun nacukut ŋina ka anam, toryedikoe kilipae, ido totyakatei.
44021006	Todokae isua ameeli, toboŋosi ikes lorerya kec.
44021007	Torubakinae isua elosyo ka ameeli tari Tolemais, neni emalaere isua ŋikanupak ŋulu a nen, kiboi ka ikes akoloŋit apei.
44021008	Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini ŋin, torotokinoe isua todolunoe lotaun Kaisaria. A nen, tolotoi kai a Pilipo a ŋolo arae ekalimonokinan Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, kiboi ka iŋes. Arae iŋes epei alokidiŋ ŋikilyok ŋikanikaarei ŋulu aris keseun alo Yerusalem.
44021009	Ayakar iŋes ŋidwe keŋ ŋulupesur ŋiomwon ŋulu arae ŋikadwarak.
44021010	Ani eriŋa isua iriyatae a nen, bu alo Yudaya ekadwaran ŋolo anyaritae Agabo.
44021011	Bu iŋes neni kosi, tolema arokoba ŋina a Paulo, toenia ŋakejen keŋ pei ka ŋakan tema, “Ŋuna ebala Etau ŋolo Asegan ikes nu: eenete Ŋiyudayan elope ŋolo ka arokoba a na alo Yerusalem ka ipotokinete ikes iŋes lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.”
44021012	Ani iiraryo isua nu, aponi isua ka ŋulu ayakare nen torubakinae edyekitae Paulo nyelot Yerusalem.
44021013	Tema nai Paulo, “Nyo itiyaete iyes igworotor ikona ka ikiteryebiata ayoŋ etau kaŋ? Atenit ayoŋ aeno alo Yerusalem; meere ŋun bon, nai atenit atwanare daŋ aina aŋuna ke ekiro ke Ekapolon Yesu.”
44021014	Ani ewouni Paulo akiirar ŋakiro kosi, toesikinae isua erwor, ido temarae, “Kitiyakin ŋuna ecamit Ekapolon.”
44021015	Ani kedaunosi ŋirwa ŋul, kitemokinetei isua, torotokinoe Yerusalem.
44021016	Aponi isua torukoroe ka ŋikasyomak ŋice daŋ, ŋulu aponito alo Kaisaria. Arukito ikes ka ekile ŋolo alosyo isua akiboi kai keŋ alo Yerusalem. Arae iŋes Minason ŋolo alo Kupuro, ŋolo aberakin nooi aruwor ekanupan a Yesu.
44021017	Ani edolunio isua Yerusalem, ikijaut ŋikanupak isua ka alakara.
44021018	Ani taparacu keŋ, torukoroe isua ka Paulo aanyun Yakobo ka ŋikatukok daadaŋ ŋulu ka atukot a Ŋikristo ŋulu aponito nen.
44021019	Kimala Paulo ikes, ido kitatamik ereunit a ŋapeipei ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna aris Akuj kitiya alotic keŋ lotuŋa ŋulu pa arae Ŋiyudayan.
44021020	Ani kiirasi ikes erwor a Paulo, kipuro ikes Akuj. Temasi nai ikes daadaŋ neni a Paulo, “Lokaato, kiŋolik iyoŋ epite ŋolo alo Yerusalem a ne: eyakasi Ŋiyudayan ŋulu edolito ŋalipyo, ŋulu aruworosi ŋikanupak a Yesu. Tari kikote neni, iricakinito ikes daadaŋ Ŋikisila a Moses.
44021021	Itatamikinitae ikes atemar ibu iyoŋ kitatam Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ ŋulu eyakasi nakwapin ŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan aesikin Ŋikisila a Moses, alimokin ikes atemar nyileŋerete ŋikusidwe kori nyiwuapito ŋitalyo a Ŋiyudayan.
44021022	Nyo itemokino kitiyae? Kire iirarete ikes atemar idolu iyoŋ.
44021023	Aŋun nai, kitiya ŋuna ikilimokinio isua iyoŋ. Eyakasi ne ŋikilyok ŋiomwon ŋulu ikoŋito neni ka Akuj.
44021024	Torukosi ka ikes lotal ŋolo ka akiteseguno ikwaŋina icikakinitotor Ŋikisila; ido totac egyelit a ŋinibore iitanio aŋuna kec, ikotere epedoryata ikes akibany ŋakyes kec. Alopite a ŋol eyenunete ŋituŋa daadaŋ atemar emam ibore iyookino anakiro a ŋuna kelimonokin ikes aŋuna kon, nai eyenunete atemar iwuapit iyoŋ Ŋikisila a Moses.
44021025	Nai lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ŋulu sek aris keruworosi ŋikanupak, ikiyakik isua ikes abaruwa alimokin ikes ebe aponi isua totyakunae atemar itemokino ikes toesikis akinyam ŋamuja ŋuna einakinitae nakujo, ŋaokot, ediotyaŋ ŋolo emyeditae ka akitiya amalao.”
44021026	Torukosi nai Paulo ka ŋikilyok ŋul, ani taparacu keŋ, kitiyata kaapei etal ŋolo ka akiteseguno. Tolot nai iŋes Kai ka Akuj, tolimok ŋisacaradotin apaki ŋina adaunor etal ŋolo ka akiteseguno a ŋawat kec, ŋina earere amuronot aŋuna a ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kec.
44021027	Ani eapikini ŋirwa ŋulukanikaarei ŋulu ka akiteseguno adaun, kiŋolikis Ŋiyudayan ŋice ŋulu alo Asia Paulo alo Kai ka Akuj. Kisiguryakis ikes asepic daadaŋ, kikamut Paulo.
44021028	Tocelut ikes temasi, “Ŋituŋa a Isirael, kiŋarakinae! Elo ekile ŋolo irimit akwap daadaŋ akitatam ŋituŋa daadaŋ akitoroniyar ŋituŋa a Isirael, Ŋikisila a Moses ka Akai ka Akuj na. Nabo tokona ayau iŋes tari ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan tooma Akai ka Akuj, ido etooŋoryan ne, neni imyekinitae aŋuna ka Akuj!”
44021029	(Alimunete ikes ŋun, anerae keris ikes kiŋolikis Paulo ka Tropimo ŋolo alo Epeso erukito alotaun, totamakis atemar kori keyait Paulo iŋes tooma Akai ka Akuj.)
44021030	Kiguryakin etaun daadaŋ, toema ŋituŋa daadaŋ kaapei kikamut Paulo, kiriyasi iŋes kiŋa Akai ka Akuj ka togolokinoe atipei ŋikekya.
44021031	Ani eriŋa aruruma ikatakinit akiar Paulo, kiyakiyarae akirot neni ke ekapolon a ŋisigarya a Roma atemar ayeu Yerusalem daadaŋ aruruma.
44021032	Ya iŋes atipei ŋisigarya ka ŋikapolokinitok kec ŋice, kiwonyakis nasepic. Ani iŋolikinete ŋituŋa ikes, towua, toesikis akibuŋa Paulo.
44021033	Tolot ekapolon a ŋisigarya neni ayai Paulo, kikamu iŋes, totubu atemar toenae iŋes a ŋiriko a ŋiarei. Kiŋit nai ŋituŋa tema, “Ŋae ekile lo? Nyo itiyat iŋes?”
44021034	Tocelut ŋice anasepic ŋakiro ŋapei, tocelut nabo ŋice ŋace. Kiguryakinos ŋakiro neni aronon, todaun ekapolon a ŋisigarya epite ŋoloyenunet ŋuna kire kepotu kitiyakin. Aŋun, tolimok iŋes ŋisigarya keŋ ayaar Paulo lolain.
44021035	Ani edolunete ikes nadoketa ŋuna elomarere lolain, todedeŋiar asepic nooi, tosodo ŋisigarya todaka Paulo erae akidak.
44021036	Ewuapit ikes aruruma a ŋituŋa a ŋulu acelasi ebasi, “Oara iŋes!”
44021037	Ani eapiyaryata ŋisigarya Paulo tooma elain, kirworik Paulo neni ke ekapolon a ŋisigarya tema, “Alimuni adiokirot a?” Kiŋit ekapolon a ŋisigarya tema, “Ikwa iyeni iyoŋ erwor Ŋagirik a?
44021038	Ikwa nyirae iyoŋ Ejipitanoit ŋolo paaran ayeuni ajore, toriko ŋikajiyok ŋulu adedeŋak ŋulu adolito ŋalipyo ŋaomwon naloŋisat a?”
44021039	Toboŋok Paulo tema, “Arae ayoŋ Eyudayat ŋolo alo Cilicia, ŋolo ekedounitoe alo Taso, etaun ŋolo arwon. Kiŋarakinae kare mono erworik lotuŋa.”
44021040	Tocamak ekapolon a ŋisigarya iŋes, tosodi Paulo towo kiikiikok akeekan akisililiŋ ŋituŋa. Ani ililiŋete ikes, kirworik Paulo neni kec a Ŋayudayan ebala:
44022001	“Ŋikaitotoi ka atapapa, topupokinae ayoŋ erworo aŋuna kaŋ alokiŋaren kus!”
44022002	Ani iirarete ikes iŋes irworo a Ŋayudayan, kililiŋa ikes totakinos cek. Torubak Paulo irworo, tema,
44022003	“Arae ayoŋ Eyudayat ŋolo ekedounitoe alo Taso anakwap a ŋina a Cilicia, nai eketopolounitoe a ne alo Yerusalem, arae ekasyoman ŋolo a Gamaliel. Abu iŋes eketatam ayoŋ ejok epite ŋolo itemokino ewuapitor Ŋikisila ŋulu atapapaa yok ka abu ayoŋ olelaki Akuj nooi ikwapei tokona ilelakinitotor iyes daadaŋ a ne.
44022004	Abu ayoŋ esican ka oar ŋituŋa ŋulu ewuapito Erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon Yesu. Abu ayoŋ ekamununu ŋikilyok ka ŋaberu oyaana mabus.
44022005	Epedori Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ka atukot daadaŋ akisuuda atemar erworo ayoŋ ŋuna a kire. Abu ayoŋ oryamu aneni kec ŋabaruwae ŋuna losyet neni a ŋikaitotoi a ŋulu arae Ŋiyudayan alo Damasko. Ido abu olot inaa akikamun ŋituŋa ŋul, ikotere oyau ikes Yerusalem eenen a ŋiriko, kisicanae.
44022006	“Ani alosi ayoŋ aapiyari Damasko kidiŋ apaaran, toŋesun atipei anakuj akica ŋina apolon nooi kinuak neni ayai ayoŋ.
44022007	Emasakin ayoŋ kwap, eira etoil ebala neni kaŋ, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Kaanukiro ikisicanitor iyoŋ ayoŋ?’
44022008	Eŋit ayoŋ otema, ‘Ŋae iyoŋ, Ekapolon?’ Toboŋok iŋes tema, ‘Arae ayoŋ Yesu ŋolo a Nasaret, ŋolo isicanit iyoŋ.’
44022009	Toanyuwasi ŋikilyok ŋulu ikirukit ka ayoŋ akica, nai nyiirara ikes etoil a ŋolo erworo neni kaŋ.
44022010	Eŋit ayoŋ otema, ‘Nyo itemokino ayoŋ etiya, Ekapolon?’ Tema Ekapolon neni kaŋ, ‘Tonyou toloma Damasko, ikilimokinio iyoŋ aina ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna aseu Akuj atemar kitiya iyoŋ.’
44022011	Kabu ayoŋ omudukan aŋuna ka akica a ŋina emilia nooi; aŋun, apotu ŋirukitos kaŋ ekekamut akan, okorikosi Damasko.
44022012	“Ayai Damasko ekile ŋolo anyaritae Anania, ŋolo ajokan, ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj. Ewuapit iŋes Ŋikisila a Moses ka akerito iŋes Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ ŋulu alo Damasko.
44022013	Abu iŋes bu neni kaŋ, towo alodiyete kaŋ tema, ‘Lokaato Saulo, kiŋolik nabo!’ Esaa ŋolopei ŋol, okienyu ayoŋ, oanyuwa iŋes.
44022014	Tema nai iŋes, ‘Ikiseu iyoŋ Akuj ŋina atapapaa yok ayenun acamit keŋ, aanyun Eketiyan keŋ ŋolo iyookino ka akiirar iŋes irworo a etoil keŋ ke elope.
44022015	Anerae iruwor iyoŋ esuuda keŋ alotooma alimokin ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋuna ianyu iyoŋ ka ŋuna iira.
44022016	Nyo nai tokona eriŋa iyoŋ idarit? Tonyou, ikibatisae ka kilip alokiro a Yesu, ido kisyoni ŋasecisya kon.’
44022017	“Oboŋo ayoŋ Yerusalem. Ani akoloŋit apei eriŋa elipi alo Kai ka Akuj, bu atakanikinet neni kaŋ,
44022018	oanyuwa Ekapolon ebala, ‘Kiburuburak atipei arotokin alo Yerusalem, anerae nyecamunete ŋituŋa a ne akisuuda kon aŋuna kaŋ.’
44022019	Oboŋok ayoŋ otema, ‘Ekapolon, eyenete ikes nooi atemar abu ayoŋ olosenenee losinagogae akikam ka akibuŋa ŋulu ikinupito iyoŋ.
44022020	Ani ŋina aarere Stepano ŋolo arae esuuda kon, ayai ayoŋ elope nen etojokite atwanare keŋ ka eŋadat ŋilowi a ŋulu aarete iŋes.’
44022021	Tema Ekapolon neni kaŋ, ‘Tolot, anerae ekeyakiyari ayoŋ iyoŋ neni elwana nooi, lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan!’ ”
44022022	Topupokis ŋituŋa Paulo tari neni alimunio nu; togeut nai acela nooi temasi, “Tolemasi iŋes! Toara iŋes! Nyitemokino iŋes toyar!”
44022023	Acelasi ikes, kiwakiwakete ŋilowi kec, kielete ŋalup kidiama.
44022024	Tolimok ekapolon a ŋisigarya a Roma ŋisigarya keŋ ayaar Paulo lolain, kicikak ikes akibuŋa iŋes nooi, ikotere eyenunere ŋakiro ŋuna acelatar Ŋiyudayan neni keŋ ikona.
44022025	Nai ani kedaut ikes akien iŋes a ŋarukanes, tolimok Paulo ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat ŋolo awuoi alodiye tema, “Ikicamakinit iyoŋ ekisil akibuŋa ituŋanan ŋini a Roma, tari eriŋa nyetubokina a?”
44022026	Ani iirari ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat ŋakiro ŋun, tolot neni a ŋolo apol akilo iŋes, kiŋit tema, “Iyeni iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna itiyae iyoŋ a? Erae ekile lo ituŋanan a Roma!”
44022027	Aŋun, tolot ekapolon ŋol elope neni a Paulo, kiŋit tema, “Tolimokinae ayoŋ, irae iyoŋ ituŋanan ŋini a Roma a?” Toboŋok Paulo tema, “Ee.”
44022028	Tolimu ekapolon tema, “Abu ayoŋ oruwor ituŋanan ŋini a Roma anakitac ŋisiliŋa ŋulu alalak.” Tema Paulo, “Nai arae ayoŋ ŋolo a Roma anauruunet.”
44022029	Kikutukutoosi atipei ŋikilyok ŋulu sek alosete akiŋitiŋit Paulo ŋakiro. Tobul ekapolon a ŋisigarya nooi eyenuni atemar arae Paulo ituŋanan a Roma ka aŋuna abunio iŋes toen Paulo a ŋiriko.
44022030	Nai acamit ekapolon a ŋisigarya aanyun kire ŋakiro ŋuna esitakinitotor Ŋiyudayan Paulo; aŋun, abu iŋes taparacu keŋ tolaca ŋiriko aneni a Paulo, tocunak ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka Atukot daadaŋ. Ya nai iŋes Paulo kitowuo alokiŋaren kec.
44023001	Kitek Paulo atukot, kirworik tema, “Ŋikaitotoi! Ecayete ŋatameta kaŋ anakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna ikamunito akiyar kaŋ alokiŋaren Akuj akitodol akoloŋit napei na.”
44023002	Anenipei tolimok Anania, ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋituŋa ŋulu awuasi alodiyete Paulo akibap iŋes nakituk.
44023003	Tolimok Paulo iŋes tema, “Ikibapi kire jik Akuj iyoŋ – iyoŋ ŋolo ikoni arwatata ŋina iwositae eraŋgi ŋolo akwaŋan! Iboi iyoŋ a nen atubokin ayoŋ alotooma Ŋikisila ŋulu ka Akuj, nai tobilite bo iyoŋ Ŋikisila aŋuna ilimokinia ikes akibap ayoŋ!”
44023004	Tolimokis Paulo ŋikilyok ŋulu edunyito temasi, “Ikokini iyoŋ iyanyi Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋolo ka Akuj ai?”
44023005	Toboŋok Paulo tema, “Pa ayeni ayoŋ ŋikaitotoi atemar erae iŋes Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi. Kire ayeni atemar ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, ‘Nyitemokino iyoŋ kirwor ŋuna aronok neni ke ekepukan a ŋituŋa kon.’ ”
44023006	Nai ani eanyuni Paulo atemar arae ŋice a nen Ŋisadukayon ka ŋice arae Ŋiparisayon, kiworou neni ka Atukot tema, “Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ! Arae ayoŋ Eparisayot, lokoku a Ŋiparisayon. Ekesitakinitae ayoŋ a ne, anerae egeno ayoŋ atemar eyarunete ŋikatwak!”
44023007	Ani kedau iŋes alimun ŋun, togeut Ŋisadukayon ka Ŋiparisayon ebura, ido totyaka Atukot.
44023008	(Anerae ebasi Ŋisadukayon nyeyarunete ŋituŋa alokatwak ka daŋ emameete ŋimalaikan kori ŋitai; nai enupito Ŋiparisayon ŋakiro nu daadaŋ.)
44023009	Kiyatakin ecelet, tonyout Ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila ŋice ŋulu arae Ŋiparisayon, kitepega Atukot ka agogoŋu nooi temasi, “Emam ibore ikiryamu isua esecit ekile lo! Acepaki kirworit etau kori emalaika neni keŋ kire!”
44023010	Topoloor apega nooi, tobul ekapolon a ŋisigarya totamak atemar enyilinyilaarete ikes Paulo. Aŋun, tolimok iŋes ŋisigarya keŋ alosit nen arikor Paulo aneni kec yaasi lolain.
44023011	Ani nakwaare, towo Ekapolon Yesu alodiyete Paulo, tolimok iŋes tema, “Toen etau! Idau iyoŋ akisuuda ŋakiro kaŋ a ne alo Yerusalem ka itemokino kitiya ikwaŋinapei alo Roma daŋ.”
44023012	Ani taparacu, kiryamiryama Ŋiyudayan ŋice. Kikoŋo atemar nyikimuji kori nyikimasi idiobore akitodol ŋina earyata Paulo.
44023013	Adeparit ekimar a ŋulu atukunete ŋakiro ŋun ŋatomoniomwon.
44023014	Toloto nai ikes neni a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok temasi, “Ekoŋi isua kaapei atemar mam akimuj idiobore akitodol ŋina ikiarya Paulo.
44023015	Tokona nai, kiyakiyasi iyes a Natukot akirot neni ke ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya a Roma ayaun Paulo neni kus, esibit icamito iyes akiŋitiŋit iŋes nabo. Nai etenio isua akiar iŋes eriŋa nyedoluno ne.”
44023016	Nai kiira lokoku a nakaato a Paulo ŋuna apotu ikes totukut; aŋun, abu tolot tooma lolain, tolimok Paulo.
44023017	Tonyara nai Paulo ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat, tolimok tema, “Ya esorokit lo neni ke ekapolon a ŋisigarya; eyakar iŋes ŋakiro ŋadi ŋunalimokina iŋes.”
44023018	Ya nai ekapolokiniton ŋol esorokit neni ke ekapolon a ŋisigarya tolimok tema, “Abu Paulo ŋolo erae emabus okonyar ayoŋ ekeŋitak ayaun esorokit lo neni kon, anerae eyakar iŋes ŋakiro ŋadi ŋuna limokina iyoŋ.”
44023019	Kikamu ekapolon a ŋisigarya akan ke esorokit, toriko iŋes nawae, kiŋit tema, “Anukiro iyakar iyoŋ ŋuna icamit alimokin ayoŋ?”
44023020	Tema iŋes, “Acamunosi ŋikepukak ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan akiŋitakin iyoŋ ayaun Paulo Natukot kec moi taparacu, esibit ecamit Atukot akiŋitiŋit iŋes nabo.
44023021	Nai nyipupok ŋakiro kec, anerae eyakasi ŋikilyok alokidiŋ kec ŋulu edeparit ekimar kec ŋatomoniomwon, ŋulu edapunete iŋes. Adaut ikes akikoŋ atemar nyikimuji kori nyikimasi akitodol ŋina earyata Paulo. Etenito tokona ikes akitiyakin ŋun ka idarito ŋuna iboŋokini iyoŋ.”
44023022	Kitolot nai ekapolon a ŋisigarya esorokit ŋol, tolimok tema, “Nyilimok idiotuŋanan atemar ikilimok iyoŋ ayoŋ ŋakiro nu.”
44023023	Tonyara nai ekapolon a ŋisigarya ŋikapolokinitok ŋulu a ŋisigarya keŋ ŋiarei, tolimok ikes tema, “Kitemokisi ŋisigarya ŋamiae ŋaarei alosit Kaisaria kaapei ka ŋikilyok ŋatomonikanikaarei ŋulu a ŋaŋolei ta ŋamiae ŋaarei ŋulu a ŋakwaaras, totena arotokin ŋisaae ŋiuni ŋulu takae ka akuwar.
44023024	Toryamutu ŋaŋolei ŋadi ŋuna edoki Paulo ka kitodolo iŋes ejok neni a Pelekis ke ekepukan.”
44023025	Kigir nai ekapolon a ŋisigarya abaruwa ŋina egiritae ŋakiro nu:
44023026	“Ayoŋ Klauda Lisia egirit neni ke ekapolon Pelekis a ŋolo ipukat Palestina daadaŋ. Ekemalat iyoŋ.
44023027	“Apotu Ŋiyudayan kikamut ekile lo ka adikino earete iŋes. Abu ayoŋ oyenu atemar erae iŋes ituŋanan ŋini a Roma; aŋun, ikipotu ayoŋ ka ŋisigarya kaŋ oloto aiun iŋes.
44023028	Aŋuna acamitor ayoŋ ayenun ŋuna esitakinitotor ikes iŋes, abu oya iŋes Natukot kec.
44023029	Oryamu atemar emam ibore ŋini kebu iŋes kitiya ŋini etemokino toarere kori kiwuakinere iŋes mabus. Arae ŋakiro ŋuna esitakinitere iŋes ŋuna a ŋikisila kec a ŋilopeyek.
44023030	Ani akalimokinio ayoŋ atemar atukosi Ŋiyudayan ŋice aŋuna keŋ, abu eyaku iŋes neni kon atipei, olimok ŋikesitakinak keŋ akirwor alokiŋaren kon ŋakiro ŋuna isitakinitotor ikes iŋes.”
44023031	Apotu ŋisigarya kitiyata ŋuna ecikakinitae. Yaasi ikes Paulo nakwaare neni anyaritae Antipatiris.
44023032	Ani akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, toboŋosi ŋisigarya ŋulu alosete a ŋakejen lolain, kimyekis ŋulu a ŋaŋolei eriŋa elosete ka iŋes.
44023033	Ani edolete ikes Kaisaria neni eboiyo ekepukan Pelekis, kipotokis abaruwa neni keŋ, kimyekis Paulo daŋ aneni keŋ.
44023034	Ani kedau Pelekis akisyom abaruwa, kiŋit iŋes Paulo akwap keŋ. Ani eyenuni atemar abunit iŋes alo Cilicia,
44023035	tema, “Apupokini ayoŋ ŋakiro kon apaki ŋina edolunioto ŋikesitakinak kon.” Kicikak nai atemar kiyokoi Paulo alokai a ŋina koloŋ aduki erwosit Erode.
44024001	Ani kelunyar ŋirwa ŋikan, toloto Anania ŋolo arae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ka ŋikatukok ŋice ta ekerworon aŋuna a ŋituŋa ŋolo anyaritae Tatulo, toloto tari Kaisaria. Towua ikes alokiŋaren Pelekis ekepukan, kisitakis Paulo.
44024002	Ani enyaraunio Paulo, togeu Tatulo akisitakin iŋes tema, “Ekapolon! Ikiryamu isua anapukan kon ekisil ŋolo aya apaki ŋina aoyan ka etemonokin ejok ŋakiro ŋuna alalak ŋuna ka akwap kosi.
44024003	Ikijaunit isua nu alowaetin a daadaŋ ŋapakio daadaŋ ka ikilakara isua nooi neni kon.
44024004	Nai nyayai apaki kon ŋina aoyan, ekelipit ayoŋ iyoŋ alotooma arimao kon, topupok ŋakiro kosi euruwuaka.
44024005	Aponi isua toryamunae etuŋanan lo erae ŋolo aronon nooi, ŋolo ageununui aruruma alokidiŋ Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ ŋulu ka akwap a daadaŋ ka erae iŋes elope ekarikon ŋolo ka atukot a ŋina ebookoi ebe Ŋinasarin.
44024006	Abu tari kikatak amunaiyar Akai ka Akuj, nai aponi isua kikamunae iŋes. [Totukunoe isua atubokin iŋes alotooma Ŋikisila kosi make,
44024007	nai abu Lisia ŋolo epolokinit ŋisigarya kiŋucokin tooma ka aryenyeo a ŋina apolon, ya iŋes aneni kosi.
44024008	Tema itemokino ŋikesitakinak keŋ potu neni kon.] Ani kiŋitiŋit iyoŋ ekile lo, iyenuni iyoŋ elope aneni keŋ ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna isitakinitere isua iŋes.”
44024009	Tolomasi Ŋiyudayan nakiro ŋuna esitakinitere Paulo, temasi iyookino ŋun daadaŋ.
44024010	Ani kedau ekepukan aketun Paulo akirworikin, tolimu Paulo tema, “Ikwapei ayenia ayoŋ atemar iberakin iyoŋ aruwor ekatubon anakwap a na ŋikaru ŋulu alalak ŋulu alunyarosi, erwori aŋuna kaŋ emam akuryanu.
44024011	Ikwaŋina ipedorya iyoŋ elope ayenun, eriŋa nyelunyara ŋirwa ŋitomon ka ŋiarei anapaki a ŋina adokaritor ayoŋ Yerusalem akilip.
44024012	Nyeryamuna Ŋiyudayan ayoŋ ikipega ka idiotuŋanan alo Kai ka Akuj kori eguriguri ŋituŋa alosinagogae kori alotaun.
44024013	Nyepedorete ikes tari akitoodiun ibore ŋini ekesitakinitotor ayoŋ tokona.
44024014	Nai acamunit ayoŋ ŋakiro nu alokiŋaren kon: elipi ayoŋ Akuj atapapaa kosi, anakiwuapit erot ŋolo ke Ekapolon a Ŋikristo, ŋolo ebasi ikes erae alyokonu. Tari kikote nen, anupit ayoŋ ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna igiritae tooma Ŋikisila a Moses ka lokitaaboi ŋulu a ŋikadwarak.
44024015	Egeno ayoŋ neni ka Akuj, ikwaŋinapei igenotor ikes lu, ebe eyarunete ŋikatwak ŋulu iyookino kaapei ka ŋulu nyiyookino.
44024016	Aŋun, emukekinit ayoŋ jwi jwi akitacaunit ŋatameta kaŋ alokiŋaren Akuj ka alokiŋaren ŋituŋa.
44024017	“Ani kelunyar ŋikaru ŋidi, ŋulu amamukar ayoŋ anakwap akaŋ, abu oboŋu Yerusalem ayaun ŋakiŋaranakineta ka ŋainakineta lotuŋa kaŋ.
44024018	Arae apaki ŋina etiyaa ayoŋ ŋun iŋes akaryamuniata Ŋiyudayan ŋice ŋulu alo Asia ayoŋ alo Kai ka Akuj, kerikak etal ŋolo ka akiteseguno, ikwaŋina icikakinitotor Ŋikisila kosi. Amam asepic ikirukitor ayoŋ ka amam aruruma.
44024019	Itemokino ikes ŋilopeyek potu kiŋaren kon, kirworo ŋakiro ŋuna ekesitakinitotor ayoŋ, erae keyakatar ŋakiro ŋadi ŋuna aronia ayoŋ.
44024020	Kori kimyek ŋikilyok lu tolimut aseconu ŋina apotu ikes toryamut aneni kaŋ apaki ŋina awoitor ayoŋ alokiŋaren Atukot –
44024021	alemar akirot apei bon ŋina abu ayoŋ olimu apaki ŋina awoitor alokiŋaren kec ebe, ‘Ekesitakinitae ayoŋ nakoloŋit na, anerae anupit atemar eyarunete ŋikatwak.’ ”
44024022	Apaki ŋin, abu Pelekis ŋolo ayeni ejok nooi ŋakiro ŋuna ke Erot a ŋolo ke Ekapolon Yesu, tolimok ikes tema, “Atubi ayoŋ ŋakiro kus apaki ŋina edolunio Lisia ekapolon a ŋisigarya.”
44024023	Kicikak nai ekapolokiniton a ŋisigarya amiat ŋolo amet Paulo akiyok iŋes, nai inakinite iŋes akilajaara adio ka acamakin ŋikonei keŋ aanyunun iŋes.
44024024	Ani kelunyar ŋirwa ŋice, potu Pelekis ka Drusila aberu keŋ ŋina arae Ayudayat; kiyakiya iŋes akirot atemar tonyarae Paulo. Apotu ikes topupokis iŋes irworo ŋuna ka anupit Yesu Kristo.
44024025	Nai ani erubakini Paulo irworo ŋuna ka akiyookino, ŋuna ka akiyapara ka ŋuna ka abunore Akoloŋit ŋina etubokinia Akuj ŋituŋa, tobul Pelekis tolimok Paulo tema, “Ape mono! Akanyarae ayoŋ iyoŋ nabo aryamuni apaki.”
44024026	Emuit iŋes tari atemar okoinak Paulo ŋisiliŋa; aŋun, kirucuruc iŋes anyaraiyanar Paulo erwor ka iŋes.
44024027	Nai ani elunyarosi ŋikaru ŋiarei, kilunyokin ekepukan ece ŋolo anyaritae Porkias Pesto lorot a Pelekis. Aŋuna acamitor Pelekis akitiya ŋuna etalakarito Ŋiyudayan, abu kimyek Paulo alomabus.
44025001	Ŋirwa ŋiuni kedau Pesto alomar napukan keŋ, abu tolot alo Kaisaria tari Yerusalem.
44025002	Kisitakis ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikarikok a Ŋiyudayan Paulo alokiŋaren keŋ. Todyeka ikes Pesto
44025003	akitiya ŋuna etalakarito ikes, acamakin Paulo yaunae Yerusalem. Aris ikes ketukut akiar iŋes alorot.
44025004	Toboŋok Pesto ikes tema, “Erubakini Paulo eenen alo Kaisaria ka eapi ayoŋ aboŋor inaa.
44025005	Aŋun, kimyekisi ŋikarikok kus orukosi ka ayoŋ Kaisaria, kisitakis ekile ŋol erae kitiyat adioronis.”
44025006	Kedau Pesto akiboi ka ikes ŋirwa ŋulu pa adeparito ŋikanikauni kori ŋitomon, toboŋo nai Kaisaria. Ani akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, kiboikin neni etubonokinere, tolimu atemar yaunae Paulo.
44025007	Ani kedolu Paulo, towua Ŋiyudayan ŋulu apote alo Yerusalem kirikaut Paulo alokaku, kisyakis akisitanakin iŋes neni aronon a ŋakiro a ŋuna pa apedorete ikes akitoodiun atemar arae kire.
44025008	Kirwor Paulo aŋuna keŋ tema, “Emam ibore ŋini aronon ŋini etiyak ayoŋ Lokisila a Ŋiyudayan kori Kai ka Akuj kori lokepukan a Roma.”
44025009	Nai aŋuna acamitor Pesto akitiya ŋuna etalakarito Ŋiyudayan, kiŋit iŋes Paulo tema, “Icamit iyoŋ alosit Yerusalem ikitowuoi aina alokiŋaren kaŋ aŋuna a ŋakisitakineta a nu a?”
44025010	Nai tolimu Paulo tema, “Awoi ayoŋ a ne alokiŋaren ŋikatubok ŋulu etubonokinete alokiro a ŋolo ke ekepukan a Roma, neni itemokino ayoŋ eketowoere. Emam aronis etiyak ayoŋ neni a Ŋiyudayan, ikwapei iyenia iyoŋ elope.
44025011	Ani nai ketiyat ayoŋ ŋuna aronok, ŋuna itemokino otwania, nyewarit ayoŋ abucar anatwanare. Nai ani pa kiyookino ŋakiro ŋuna ekesitakinitotor ikes ayoŋ, emam ituŋanan epedori akipotokin ayoŋ neni kec. Eŋita ayoŋ ayaaro neni ke ekepukan a Roma.”
44025012	Tosodi nai Pesto kedaut akirworikin ka atukot keŋ, tolimok Paulo tema, “Iŋitak iyoŋ alosit neni ke ekepukan a Roma; aŋun, ilosi iyoŋ neni ke ekepukan a Roma.”
44025013	Kelunyar ŋirwa ŋice, torukut erwosit Agripa ka nakaato keŋ Berenike, potu Kaisaria akijaun Pesto.
44025014	Ani kiboiyoto ikes aina ŋirwa ŋulu alalak, kitatamik Pesto neni ke erwosit ŋakiro a Paulo tema, “Eyai nege mabus ekile ŋolo aesikini Pelekis ŋolo paaran arae ekepukan
44025015	ka ani apaki ŋina ayakar Yerusalem, apotu ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok ka ŋikatukok a Ŋiyudayan yaut ŋakiro ŋuna esitakinitotor iŋes, ekeŋitakis ayoŋ atubokin iŋes.
44025016	Nai abu ayoŋ olimok ikes atemar nyecamit ekisil a Ŋiromanin akipotor idiotuŋanan, eriŋa ŋolo isitakinitae nyiryamuna ka ŋulu isitakinito iŋes, toyakaunor apaki ŋina irworor iŋes aŋuna keŋ anakiro a ŋuna isitakinitere iŋes.
44025017	Ani apaki ŋina aponiata ikes ne, abu ayoŋ nyadidik, nai abu akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, abu eboikin neni etubonokinere, olimu atemar yaunae ekile ŋol.
44025018	Ani enyounete ŋulu esitakinito iŋes, nyelimut ikes idiobore ŋini aronon, ŋini sek atamakinit ayoŋ atemar kori isitakiniata.
44025019	Nai ayakatar ikes ŋakiro ŋace ŋuna a ŋiburasyo kec ka iŋes, ŋuna a ŋitalyo a ŋulu enupito ikes ka nabo ŋakiro ŋuna ke ekile a ŋolo enyaritae Yesu, ŋolo abu totwana; nai ebala Paulo itogogoŋit eyari.
44025020	Aŋuna abunio ayoŋ otaaŋaŋaa, todaun epite ŋolo ripunet erot a ŋakiro a nu, abu ayoŋ eŋit Paulo erae kecamit alosit Yerusalem, kitowuae aina aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun.
44025021	Nai abu Paulo kiŋitak akiboi a ne alomabus akidar alosit akiwo alokiŋaren ekepukan a Roma. Aŋun, abu ayoŋ olimu atemar kiboi iŋes akitodol neni eyakiyaria ayoŋ iŋes neni ke ekepukan a Roma.”
44025022	Tema Agripa neni a Pesto, “Acamit ayoŋ elope opupok ŋakiro ke ekile a lo.” Tema Pesto, “Ipupokini iyoŋ ŋakiro keŋ moi taparacu.”
44025023	Ani nai taparacu, potu Agripa ka Berenike esirito ka itopolooritae nooi. Arukito ikes ka ŋikapolok a ŋajorei ka ŋarwonita ŋuna ke etaun, tolomasi kai ŋina apolon. Tolimu Pesto atemar yaunae Paulo tooma.
44025024	Tema Pesto, “Erwosit Agripa ka ŋipeyok daadaŋ ŋulu iyakasi ne ka isua: iteete iyes ekile lo ŋolo isitakinito Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ ŋulu a ne ka ŋulu alo Yerusalem. Iworoete ikes ebasi nyitemokino iŋes torubak eyari.
44025025	Nai abu ayoŋ oryamu atemar emam ŋakiro itiyat iŋes ŋuna itemokino totubokinere iŋes atwanare. Ikwaŋinapei abunio iŋes elope kiŋitak alosit neni ke ekepukan a Roma, atyaku ayoŋ akiyakiyar iŋes.
44025026	Nai akaŋopikis ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna erae ŋakigirakina neni ke ekepukan a Roma aŋuna keŋ. Aŋun, ayau ayoŋ iŋes ne kiŋaren kus, akilo nooi kiŋaren kon erwosit Agripa, ikotere ani kikidau iwon aripirip ŋakiro keŋ, opedo ayoŋ aryamun ŋakiro ŋuna kigirakina iŋes.
44025027	Anerae esibit aneni kaŋ nyejok akiyakiyar emabus pa isileereunitoe ejok ŋakiro ŋuna isitakinitere iŋes.”
44026001	Tema Agripa neni a Paulo, “Ikicamakinitae iyoŋ akirwor aŋuna kon.” Kikia Paulo akeekan, kiikiikok, kirwor aŋuna keŋ ikona:
44026002	“Atami ayoŋ atemar ayakar arereŋu nakoloŋit na aanyun ebe erae kiŋaren kon erwosit Agripa erworor ayoŋ aŋuna kaŋ, akirwor ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ekesitakinitotor ayoŋ Ŋiyudayan.
44026003	Iyookino nu, anerae iyeni iyoŋ nooi ŋitalyo a Ŋiyudayan ka ŋiburasyo kec. Aŋun, ekelipit ayoŋ iyoŋ totitinyik, topupok ŋakiro kaŋ.
44026004	“Eyenete Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ epite ŋolo ka akiyar kaŋ ameun ŋinapei eriŋa asorokana, anerae apolouni ayoŋ anakwap kaŋ ka alo Yerusalem.
44026005	Eyenete ikes ŋinapei koloŋ atemar apolounit ayoŋ arae Eparisayot alopite a ŋolo ka atukot a ŋina elelakinit nooi ŋakiro ŋuna ke edin yok. Ani kecamito, epedorete akisuuda nu.
44026006	Tokona awoi ayoŋ a ne akisitakino, aŋuna egenor ayoŋ anakiikinet a ŋina ainaki Akuj neni atapapaa yok.
44026007	Erae na akiikinet ŋinapei igenosi ŋatekerin ŋunatomon ka ŋaarei ŋuna a Ŋisirael aanyun akisiyookino keŋ, ikwaŋina ilipyata ka agogoŋu jwi jwi. Erwosit Agripa, erae Ŋiyudayan pei ekesitakinito ayoŋ aŋuna ka akigeno a na!
44026008	Kaanukiro egogoŋio iyes akinup atemar epedori Akuj akiteyarun ŋikatwak?
44026009	“Abu ayoŋ elope ekiŋaren emukek atemar itemokino etiya ŋuna alalak ŋuna itepegito ekiro a Yesu a ŋolo a Nasaret.
44026010	Erae ŋun ŋuna abu ayoŋ etiya alo Yerusalem. Anapedor a ŋikepukak ka ŋisacaradotin ŋulu apolok, abu ayoŋ oeneene alomabus ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu ewuapito Yesu. Meere ŋun bon, abu daŋ oriwo ka ŋulu atubonokinete ikes atwanare.
44026011	Abu ayoŋ jwi jwi esican ikes alosinagogae a daadaŋ aŋuna ka akitiŋakin ikes akiŋer anupit kec; ido anyunyurikina ayoŋ ikes nooi, esican tari alotaunio a ŋulu agelaaka.
44026012	“Ŋakiro ŋun abunio ayoŋ olosyo Damasko ka acamakinet ka apedor aneni a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu apolok.
44026013	Erwosit Agripa, ani edoli kidiŋ apaaran, abu ayoŋ oanyua eriŋa alosi alorot akica ŋina aŋesun atipei anakuj, ŋina acai akilo akoloŋ. Tocau ekenuak ayoŋ kaapei ka ŋulu ikirukitor.
44026014	Ani kikidau isua daadaŋ akimasakin kwap, abu eira etoil ebala neni kaŋ a Ŋaburaniyae, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Kaanukiro ikisicanitor iyoŋ ayoŋ? Erae iyoŋ iwana bon erae kirubak ikitepegi ayoŋ. Ikwaan ka neni epetepeteo esigirya ebela ŋolo icumucumuyere iŋes.’
44026015	Eŋit ayoŋ otema, ‘Ŋae iyoŋ, Ekapolon?’ Tema Ekapolon, ‘Arae ayoŋ Yesu ŋolo isicanit iyoŋ.
44026016	Nai tonyou, towo. Anerae atakanu ayoŋ neni kon, akaseuni iyoŋ aruwor eketiyan kaŋ, akiteyenikin ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna iŋolik iyoŋ nakoloŋit na ka ŋuna akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ moi alokiŋaren.
44026017	Ekeyakiyari ayoŋ iyoŋ lotuŋa a Isirael ka neni a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ido euryari ayoŋ ikes nyikiwan iyoŋ.
44026018	Iŋaari iyoŋ ŋakonyen kec, ikotere kibelekinos anakiryonut nakica ka anapedor a ŋina a Satan, pena neni ka Akuj; toryamut nai aŋuna ka anupit kec akisyonio ŋina a ŋasecisya ka akibois aneni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu eturuwo Akuj ŋulu keŋ.’
44026019	“Aŋun, erwosit Agripa, abu ayoŋ nyawou akiwuap atakanikinet ŋina anakuj.
44026020	Nai abu esileereu nu, neni a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ akisyakin mono alo Damasko, tosodi nai alo Yerusalem ka akwap daadaŋ ŋina a Yudeya tari lobukui ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan. Abu olimonok atemar itemokino ikes tokiwa ŋakecesecisya kibelekinos neni ka Akuj, kitiyata ŋuna itoodiunete atemar kekiwa ikes.
44026021	Ŋakiro ŋun ikes ekekamuniata ayoŋ Ŋiyudayan alo Kai ka Akuj ekekatakinito akiar.
44026022	Akitodol nakoloŋit na, ekeŋarakinit Akuj ayoŋ a ŋun, awoi ayoŋ a ne akiteyenun nu neni a daadaŋ, neni a ŋulu caryo kaapei ka ŋulu arwok. Nyerworo ayoŋ ŋace, nai ŋuna abasi ŋikadwarak ka Moses etakanunete.
44026023	Abasi ikes ebe itemokino Kristo kisicanae ka toruwor ŋolo ke ekiŋaren ayarun alokatwak, kiserau nai akica ŋina ka aiuno neni a Ŋiyudayan ka ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ.”
44026024	Ani irworikini Paulo aŋuna keŋ alopite a lo, kiŋenyak Pesto iŋes tema, “Ikikerepikinit iyoŋ Paulo! Kikimunaiya iyoŋ asyomit kon ŋina apolon!”
44026025	Nai tema Paulo, “Ekapolon Pesto, nyekekerepikinit ayoŋ! Nai erworo ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna ecayete.
44026026	Eyeni tari erwosit ŋakiro ŋun ka erworo ayoŋ neni keŋ emam akuryanu. Ayeni kire atemar emam ŋakiro ŋun ŋuna ebucara aneni keŋ, anerae nyetakanuna ŋakiro nu anakimunono.
44026027	Erwosit Agripa, inupit iyoŋ ŋuna irworosi ŋikadwarak a? Ayeni ayoŋ atemar inupit iyoŋ!”
44026028	Tema Agripa neni a Paulo, “Emam ŋuna alalak ŋuna ebucara anakiro kon akituruwor ayoŋ Ekristoit!”
44026029	Tema Paulo, “Kerae ŋuna alalak kori ŋuna ekudyoko, elipit ayoŋ Akuj atemar meere ayoŋ bon anupi Kristo, nai tari daadaŋ ŋulu epupete ŋakiro kaŋ nakoloŋit na, itemokino ikes kikokis ayoŋ – alemar nyitemokino toenae!”
44026030	Tonyout nai erwosit ka Pesto ekepukan ka Berenike ta ŋituŋa ŋuluce daadaŋ,
44026031	torotokis kirworikinos make temasi, “Emam ŋakiro itiyat ekile lo, ŋuna itemokino toarere kori kiwuakinere mabus.”
44026032	Tema nai Agripa neni a Pesto, “Kelacakinitae ekile lo, kerae nyiŋitakinit alosit neni ke ekepukan a Roma.”
44027001	Ani etubuni Pesto atemar adol apaki ŋina erotokinere isua Italia, apotu ŋikapolok a Ŋiromanin alo Kaisaria inakis Paulo ka ŋimabus ŋice neni a Yulio, a ŋolo arae ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat ŋulu anyaritae “Ajore ŋina ke ekepukan.”
44027002	Todokae isua ameeli ŋina abunit alotaun Adaramitium, ŋina alosi lotaunio ŋulu ka Asia ŋulu aya lokipetot ŋolo ka anam. Ikirukit isua ka Aristako, ŋolo auruunitae alo Makedonia, a ŋolo a Tesalonika.
44027003	Todoloe isua lotaun Sidon akoloŋit ŋina atupakini. A nen, torimaan Yulio aneni a Paulo, tocamak iŋes alosit aanyun ŋikonei keŋ, ikotere eryamuni akiŋarakinet ŋina eitanit iŋes.
44027004	Kipororoe isua a nen, tolotoi ikiteriboorit ekipetot ŋolo ke eculat a Kupuro, anerae ikibukinit ekuwuam isua.
44027005	Ani kedoki isua anam ŋina a Cilicia ka Pampilia, poni lotaun Mira ŋolo anakwap a ŋina a Licia.
44027006	Toryamu a nen ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat ameeli ŋina abunit alotaun Alekisandaria, ŋina alosi Italia; tosodi ikitodok isua ameeli ŋin.
44027007	Kiyapae isua iwadio ŋirwa ŋulu alalak, ani ekaku todolunoe ka atyonis diyete etaun Kinido. Ikwaŋinapei pa ikitepedorya ekuwuam isua arubakin ikitorit neni ikicamit, ikipotu oloto a ŋun lowae ŋolo alo Kwap ikiteriboorit eculat Kirete, kitoroi neni anyaritae Salomone.
44027008	Torubakinae isua ka atyonis enokitoe ekipetot, todolunoe lotaun ŋolo enyaritae “Ŋolo iteere ŋameeli ejok”, neni eapi alotaun a Laseya.
44027009	Ikwapei abunio apaki ŋina alalan tolunyar ka aris kelunyar apaki ŋina ka akikany akimuj, togogoŋior alosit ka ameeli, anerae aapuunit apaki ŋina ejoŋoere alosit a ŋameeli. Tolimok Paulo ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna eŋarakinak tema,
44027010	“Ŋikilyok, ani kikirubak iwon ikilosi, eŋolikinit ayoŋ atemar ikiryamuni iwon ŋican ŋulu apipilak; emunaarosi ameeli kaapei ka ŋiboro ka acepaki ikitwaki iwon daŋ.”
44027011	Nai tomitak ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat ŋuna alimonokinete ekapolokiniton ameeli ka elope ameeli, akilo amitakin ŋuna erworo Paulo.
44027012	Aŋuna tari pa ajokya etaun ŋol akiboiyo ŋirwa ŋulu ka alilimu, apotu ŋikalalak temasi torotokinoe a nen, igenosi atemar kori ikidoli Poenikis etaun ece ŋolo alo Kirete, ŋolo eyai kidiŋ Kwap-To ka Kuju-To, ikotere iboiyete a nen ŋirwa ŋulu ka alilimu.
44027013	Ŋolopite ageunia ekuwuam ediocici akutun alowae a ŋolo alo Kwap, temasi ŋikilyok kori epedorete ikes akitiya ikwaŋina atubunitotor; kikeut ibore ŋini apotyon ŋini itowuoi ameeli, kitonoko ameeli ekipetot ŋolo a Kirete.
44027014	Nai tokut atipei ekuwuam ŋolo agogoŋon alowae a ŋolo a Kirete, anyaritae ekuwuam ŋol “Kuju-Kide”.
44027015	Ani enaŋi ekuwuam ameeli ka agogoŋu, todaun epite ŋolo elosyo lowae ŋolo akutunitor ekuwuam, ido tojamakinae isua akimukekinit kimyekinae ameeli tokuta ekuwuam.
44027016	Ani itoryo isua diyete ekipetot ŋolo ke eculat a ŋolo cici a ŋolo enyaritae Kauda, topedoroe ka atyonis akiriun atuba ŋina ka ameeli tooma.
44027017	Ani kedaun akiriun atuba, kilogiloga ŋilopeyek ameeli kec a ŋaunoi. Akerito ikes atemar kori ikilomari lorus ŋolo alokipetot a Libia. Aŋun, tocakut ikes anaŋga ŋina emetor ekuwuam ameeli, kimyekis ekuwuam bon ekutarit ameeli.
44027018	Torubak ekuwuam ŋolo apolon ekusi; togeut ŋilopeyek ameeli akoloŋit ŋina atupakini akimasanar kiŋa ŋiboro ŋice ŋulu aya nameeli
44027019	ka akoloŋit ŋinace, kimasasi ikes ŋiboro ŋulukitiyaet ameeli kiŋa.
44027020	Aŋuna adolyo ŋirwa ŋulu alalak pa etakani akoloŋ kori ŋikacer ka torubakinite ekuwuam ekusi nooi, tojoŋoi isua jik akigeno tari iwadio atemar eyaryo.
44027021	Aris kelunyar apaki ŋina aoyan nyimuja ikes aŋuna a ŋatyokisyo a ŋun, tosodi Paulo towo alokidiŋ kec tema, “Ŋikilyok, kerae kiirarito iyes ŋakiro kaŋ, pa kerotokinitoe iwon alo Kirete ka pa keryamunitae ŋican lu ŋulu apipilak ka atwakiyar ŋiboro.
44027022	Nai tokona akadyekit ayoŋ iyes, toena ŋitai; anerae emam ipei daŋ alokidiŋ kus ŋini etwaniari akiyar, nai ameeli bon etwakiaryo.
44027023	Anerae bien nakwaare, abu emalaika ŋolo ka Akuj a ŋina arae ayoŋ ŋolo keŋ ka ŋina elipi ayoŋ, bu neni kaŋ,
44027024	tema, ‘Paulo, nyikibul! Itemokino iyoŋ towo alokiŋaren ekepukan a Roma. Kiira! Aŋuna kon, eiuni Akuj tari ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu idokito ka iyoŋ ameeli.’
44027025	Aŋun, ŋikilyok, toena ŋitai! Anerae anupit ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj atemar ikokinete nenipei akalimokinitere ayoŋ.
44027026	Nai ikikutari ekuwuam iwon neni eyai eculat edio.”
44027027	Aris kelunyarosi ŋisabito ŋiarei ŋulu ageunia ekuwuam ŋolo apolon akikut, ikirimitor isua ananam a ŋina enyaritae Mediteranian. Ani edoli kidiŋ akuwar, temasi ŋikametok ameeli kori keapiar diyete akwap.
44027028	Aŋun, kiyooliyosi ikes nakipi auno ŋina aenikinitae ibore ŋini apotyon, toryamut atemar arae acukul a ŋakipi ŋamitae ŋatomoniomwon. Kelunyar apaki adiouriyen, kitiyata ikes ikoŋinapei, toryamut acukul a ŋakipi erae ŋamitae ŋatomoniuni.
44027029	Tobul ikes temasi kori elosi ameeli anaŋakin neni eya ŋatabab, aŋun kiyooliyosi ikes alokaku ŋiboorei ŋulu apotyok ŋiomwon ŋulu itowuoete ameeli, togata atemar kerae kiwala akwap atipei.
44027030	Ani eriŋa nyiwalara, kikatakis ŋikametok ameeli akisi anameeli esibit elosete akiyatakin kiŋaren ameeli ŋiboorei ŋice ŋulu itowuoete iŋes; nai keris ikes kiyooliyosi atuba nakipi, ecamito alomar tooma keŋ.
44027031	Nai tema Paulo neni ke ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat ka neni a ŋisigarya ebe, “Mati kerubakis ŋituŋa lu eyakasi nameeli, nyipedorete iyes aiun.”
44027032	Tosodo nai ŋisigarya totubo ŋaunoi ŋuna aenito atuba anameeli, kimyekis atuba todoiyo nakipi.
44027033	Ani eapuuni akiwalar, todyek Paulo ikes daadaŋ akinyam adiokimuj tema, “Iboiyoto iyes ŋirwa ŋitomon ka ŋiomwon nyimuja idiobore.
44027034	Aŋun, akadyekit nai ayoŋ iyes, kimuja adiokimuj; iitanito iyes iŋes aŋuna ka aryamunia agogoŋu ikwapei emamukar tari ipei alokidiŋ kus ŋini ewana.”
44027035	Kedau alimun ŋun, tolemu Paulo amugati, tolakar neni ka Akuj alokiŋaren kec a daadaŋ, tonyilinyili, togeu akimuj.
44027036	Toryamut nai ikes daadaŋ akisimukekinet, ido kimuj ŋinituŋanan akimuj adio.
44027037	Arae ekimar kosi a ŋulu ikiya nameeli ŋamiae ŋaarei ka ŋatomonikanikaarei ka ŋikanikapei.
44027038	Ani kimwoko ikes, kimasasi ŋaganoi kiŋa, ikotere tookiar ameeli.
44027039	Ani iwalari, kiŋolikis ikes akwap, nai nyeyena atemar ai. Nai kiŋolikis agule ŋina ka anam ŋina eleleba asinyon, neni apotu ikes totyakut atemar kirimok ameeli todolere nen.
44027040	Aŋun, totubutuboto ikes ŋaunoi ŋuna aenitere ŋiboorei ŋulu itowuoete ameeli, kidoŋo tooma nakipi; ŋinapeipaki, tolacanakis ŋaunoi ŋuna aenito ŋameeta. Kikyaasi nai anaŋga ŋina alokiŋaren ameeli, ikotere ekutarya ekuwuam ameeli kiŋaren, tolot lokipetot.
44027041	Nai tonaŋ ameeli neni tekeny, towo todaun arotokinet, tobwaŋa ŋikaguragurae a ŋakipi ŋulu elapasi nooi ameeli alokaku.
44027042	Totukut ŋisigarya akiar ŋimabus daadaŋ, ikotere nyelum tari epei, tolot lokipetot, ido toem nariet.
44027043	Nai aŋuna acamitor ekapolokiniton ŋisigarya amiat aiun Paulo, kiretak iŋes ikes akitiya ŋuna atukunito. Tolimok iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu apedorete akilum akisyaun aporor kiŋa ameeli, tolumo toloto lokipetot.
44027044	Ani ekaku, totupakis ŋuluce imiidikina nabaoi kori ŋabwaŋabwaŋaet ŋuna ka ameeli. Arae lo epite ŋolo adolere isua daadaŋ lokipetot emam ŋace.
44028001	Ani edolyo isua lokipetot emam ŋace, toyenunae atemar anyaritae eculat ŋol Malta.
44028002	Akoneoko nooi ŋituŋa ŋulu a nen. Ikijaut ikes isua, kinokakis akim, anerae atepit akiru, tolilim akwap.
44028003	Kirirau Paulo ŋakito, kiwuak nakim. Apaki ŋinapei ŋin, tolomu emun aŋuna ka amwanis a ŋina ka akim, tokony, kimiidikin nakan keŋ.
44028004	Ani iŋolikinete ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a ŋin emun ineno anakan a Paulo, temanaros make ebe, “Itemokino ekile lo kire torae ekaaran ŋituŋa. Anerae tari kebucuna iŋes ananam, nyecamakini atubokino ŋina ka Akuj iŋes toyar.”
44028005	Nai towuatak Paulo emun tooma nakim, nyewana iŋes tari iwadio.
44028006	Kidara ikes Paulo erae kebuuni akuwan kori kepokor totwan. Nai ani idarete ikes apaki ŋina aoyan nyiŋolikis idiobore ŋini gela itiyakin neni keŋ, kiloconokis ŋatameta kec temasi, “Erae iŋes akuj!”
44028007	Aapiyete ŋimanikorin ŋulu ke ekile a ŋolo anyaritae Pubulio a ŋolo apolokinit eculat ŋol. Ikijau isua, ikisipeyon neni ajokan, kiboi ka iŋes ŋirwa ŋiuni.
44028008	Adyaka papa keŋ elekes ka ekiuruton. Tolot Paulo neni ayai ekasikout, kilip, kidokok ŋakan neni keŋ, kitaŋaleu iŋes.
44028009	Ani itiyakinosi ŋun, potu ŋikadyakak ŋuluce daŋ ŋulu ayakasi loculat ŋol, kitaŋaleunoe.
44028010	Ikiinakis ikes isua ŋainakineta ŋuna alalak. Ani erotokinio isua, kiwuakis ikes nameeli ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu ikiitanit isua analosit kosi.
44028011	Ani kiriyae isua ŋilapyo ŋiuni alo Malta, torotokinoe todokae ameeli ŋina alo Alekisandaria, ŋina anyaritae “Ŋakujo ŋuna Muu.” Kiriyat sek ameeli ŋin aloculat ŋirwa ŋulu ka alilimu.
44028012	Todolunoe lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Sirakuse, neni eboiyere ŋirwa ŋiuni.
44028013	Torotokinoe a nen todoloe lotaun ŋolo enyaritae Regium. Akoloŋit ŋina atupakini, togeu ekuwuam akutun alowae a ŋolo alo Kwap, todoloe alorwa a ŋiarei lotaun ŋolo anyaritae Puteoli.
44028014	Toryamunae a nen ŋikanupak ŋulu apotu ikijaut isua akiboi ka ikes esabit epei. Poni nai Roma.
44028015	Ani iirarete ŋikanupak ŋulu alo Roma atemar ikipotu isua, tosodo potu akisiryam. Potu ŋice neni anyaritae Lomaket ŋolo ka Apios ka ŋice neni anyaritae Ŋiotelio Ŋiuni. Ani iŋolikini Paulo ikes, tolakar neni ka Akuj, min atitinyu neni keŋ.
44028016	Ani edolyo isua Roma, tocamakinae Paulo akiwarun akai keŋ bon, nai torukito ka esigarit ŋolo eten iŋes.
44028017	Ani kelunyarosi ŋirwa ŋiuni, tonyarau Paulo ŋikarikok ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan a nen aponare neni keŋ. Ani ketukokinosi ikes, kirworik iŋes tema, “Ŋikaitotoi ŋulu ka akwap kaŋ! Tari kemam ibore etiyat ayoŋ ŋini ka aremokino ŋituŋa yok kori ŋitalyo ŋulu koloŋ ikiesikiniata atapapaa yok iwon, aponi eketuruwor ayoŋ emabus alo Yerusalem ka ekepotokin neni a Ŋiromanin.
44028018	Ani kedaut ikes akiŋitiŋit ayoŋ, apotu Ŋiromanin tocamut alacakin ayoŋ, anerae amam akirot ŋina etemokino okotubokinere ayoŋ atwanare.
44028019	Nai aŋuna aŋeryoto Ŋiyudayan nu, abu ayoŋ etiŋakin atemar ekepukan a Roma etemokino totub ŋakiro kaŋ, tari ŋina amamukatar ŋakiro ŋuna esitakinitor ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap kaŋ.
44028020	Erae nai ŋakiro ŋun abunio ayoŋ eŋitaki aanyun iyes ka akirwor ka iyes, ikwapei eraakar ŋakiro ŋuna igenosi Ŋisirael, ikes akarocitere ayoŋ a ŋiriko a lu.”
44028021	Temasi ikes neni keŋ ebe, “Nyeryamuna isua alo Yudeya ŋabaruwae ŋadi ŋuna etapito ŋakiro kon, emam alokidiŋ Ŋiyudayan ŋulu apotu nege, ŋini ayau eemut edio kori tari ŋakiro ŋadi ŋuna aronok, ŋuna ikitapito iyoŋ.
44028022	Nai ikicamit isua akiirar aneni kon ŋakiro ŋuna itami iyoŋ, anerae ikiyeni isua atemar anakwap a daadaŋ itoroniarito ŋituŋa atukot ŋina iyai iyoŋ.”
44028023	Aŋun, totubut ikes akoloŋit ŋina iryamunotor ka Paulo. Akoloŋit ŋin, potu ikes elalak neni eboiyo Paulo. Ŋinapei taparacu akitodol eboŋ, kiteyenik ka kisileerek daŋ iŋes ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj. Alorwor keŋ ŋakiro ŋuna a Ŋikisila a Moses ka ŋakigireta ŋuna a ŋikadwarak, abu kikatak akitacamun ikes ŋakiro ŋuna a Yesu.
44028024	Tocamut ŋice ŋakiro ŋuna erworo iŋes, towout ŋice akinup.
44028025	Aŋun, torotokis ikes imocoete make, kedau Paulo alimun ebe, “Alimunit Etau ŋolo Asegan ejok neni atapapaa kus alorwor a ŋolo ke ekadwaran Isaya;
44028026	anerae abu iŋes tema, ebala Akuj ebe, ‘Tolot lotuŋa lu tolimok atemar, iirarete ŋina erae akiirar, nai nyiyenunete; iŋolikinete ŋina erae akiŋolikin, nai nyianyuwarete.
44028027	Anerae abaŋaaniyasi ŋatameta a ŋituŋa a lu, agol ikes ŋaki kec, arapa ŋakonyen kec. Kerae nyikote nen, keanyuwarito a ŋakonyen kec, kiirarito a ŋaki kec, nabo keyenunito a ŋitai kec, ido toboŋut neni kaŋ akitaŋaleuno!’ ”
44028028	Toŋetaki Paulo tema, “Toyenete nai atemar, eyakiya tokona Akuj ŋakiro ŋuna ka aiuno a ŋituŋa neni a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan. Nai iirarete ikes!” [
44028029	Ani kedau Paulo alimun ŋakiro ŋun, torotokis Ŋiyudayan epeganakinosi nooi alokidiŋ kec make.]
44028030	Kiboi Paulo ŋikaru ŋiarei alokai a ŋina atacenene iŋes, kijaununuye ŋulu daadaŋ aponeneete aanyunun iŋes.
44028031	Tolimonok iŋes ikes ŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj ka kitatam daŋ ŋuna ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo, kirwor pa ekuryanit ka amam ibore etukuruworit.
45001001	Ayoŋ Paulo, eketiyan a Yesu Kristo, egirit abaruwa na. Akanyarau Akuj ayoŋ aruwor ekiyakia ka akaseu aruwor ekalimonokinan Ŋakiro keŋ ŋuna Ajokak.
45001002	Kebu koloŋ sek Akuj kiik Ŋakiro keŋ ŋuna Ajokak neni a ŋituŋa ikwapei egiritotor ŋikadwarak Nakigireta.
45001003	Erae ŋakiro ŋun ŋuna a Lokoku ka Akuj a ŋolo erae Yesu Kristo Ekapolon yok. Alokuwane, erae iŋes eletonit ŋolo a Daudi.
45001004	Alopite a ŋolo ka akujuwuanut keŋ, erae iŋes ŋolo aseu Akuj aruwor Lokoku keŋ, aŋuna eteyarunere iŋes alokatwak anapedor a ŋina ka Akuj.
45001005	Akainaki Akuj ayoŋ arereŋu aneni a Yesu Kristo; arereŋu ŋina ruworet ekiyakia, ikotere etunupya ka esiwuapya ŋituŋa a ŋakwapin a daadaŋ ŋakiro keŋ, ido kitopolooroe ekiro a Kristo.
45001006	Iyes daŋ ŋulu iyakasi Roma, iraakasi ŋipei ka ŋulu anyara Akuj aruwor ŋulu a Yesu Kristo.
45001007	Aŋun, ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes daadaŋ alo Roma, iyes ŋulu ikimina ka ikinyar Akuj aruwor ŋulu keŋ. Toyai neni kus ajokis ka ekisil aneni ka Akuj Papa yok ka aneni ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo.
45001008	Ŋuna iŋarenete, alakara ayoŋ neni ka Akuj kaŋ alotooma Yesu Kristo, aŋuna kus a daadaŋ, anerae irworosi ŋituŋa a ŋakwapin a daadaŋ ŋuna ka anupit kus.
45001009	Eyeni Akuj atemar ŋuna erworo ayoŋ erae ŋuna a kire – Akuj ŋina etiyanakini ayoŋ a ekaatau a daadaŋ analimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna a Lokoku keŋ. Eyeni Akuj atemar akatamunit ayoŋ iyes,
45001010	apaki daadaŋ ŋina elipya ayoŋ. Elipit ayoŋ Akuj, erae kerae acamit keŋ, okoinak ayoŋ tokona apaki ŋina ajokan ŋina bunet neni kus.
45001011	Anerae ekeburit ayoŋ aanyun iyes, ikotere omora ŋainakineta ŋuna ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan, ŋuna akainaki Akuj ayoŋ, ikitogogoŋ iyes.
45001012	Iŋes atemar esimukekinos iwon kaapei ananupit yok; ekesimukek ayoŋ iyes ananupit kus ka ikisimukekis iyes ayoŋ ananupit kaŋ.
45001013	Acamit ayoŋ iyes ŋikaitotoi toyenut atemar eitanit ayoŋ ŋapakio ŋuna alalak abunore aanyun iyes, (nai akitodol tokona ekeretakinitae). Acamit kaŋ iŋes akitunup ŋituŋa alokidiŋ kus daŋ Ŋakiro a Yesu Kristo, ikwaŋina etunupya ŋuluce ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
45001014	Anerae ayakar ayoŋ etic ŋolo kitiyakina neni a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ a ŋulu eyakatar ayenut ka neni a ŋulu nyeyakatar ayenut, neni a ŋulu esyomito ka neni a ŋulu nyesyomito.
45001015	Aŋun, ekeburit ayoŋ alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni kus daŋ, a ŋulu iyakasi Roma.
45001016	Anerae nyekerumito ayoŋ ŋileec aŋuna a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak: erae ikes apedor ŋina ka Akuj ŋina eiunia ituŋanan daadaŋ, ŋini eyakar anupit, Ŋiyudayan mono, ido nai ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
45001017	Anerae isileereunito Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak epite ŋolo ituruworya Akuj ŋituŋa ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren keŋ: erae alotooma anupit, ameun anakisyakinet tari nasalunet, ikwapei igiritere atemar, “Iŋes ŋini iyookino a ŋuna enupitor neni ka Akuj, eyari.”
45001018	Itoodiunitae anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj anakuj nasecit ka naronis daadaŋ ŋina a ŋituŋa. Iretakinito ŋipitesyo kec ŋulu aronok ikes ayenun ŋuna a kire;
45001019	ikwapei ileereoto aneni kec ŋuna itemokino eyenere Akuj, anerae Akuj alope abu kisileerek ikes ŋakiro ŋun.
45001020	Emam ituŋanan epedori akiŋolikin Akuj. Nai ŋinapei koloŋ asubunia Akuj akwap, epedorete ŋituŋa ayenun apedor keŋ ŋina nyedaun ka akujuwuanut keŋ aloboro a ŋulu esubunit iŋes. Aŋun, emam epite ŋolo erimakinere ikes.
45001021	Eyenete ikes Akuj, nai nyitopoloorito ikes iŋes ikwa Akuj, kori nyitalakarito. Nai aruworosi ŋatameta kec ŋakoŋinae ka elelebikin akiryonut nakyes kec ŋuna ebaŋaaka.
45001022	Ebasi ikes ikiosok, nai erae ŋibaŋaanotin.
45001023	Akilo ikes akilip neni ka Akuj a ŋina eyari jik anapolou keŋ, ilipete ikes neni a ŋitorubei a ŋulu itiyaunitae ikwaan ka ŋituŋa ŋulu etwakete, kori ŋikyeny kori ŋityaŋ kori ŋiboorei ŋulu alyatok.
45001024	Aŋun, emyek Akuj ikes itiyaete ŋuna aronok ŋuna iitanito ŋitai kec ka itiyaete ŋuna a ŋileec neni kec make.
45001025	Anerae ilokonyete ikes Ŋakiro ka Akuj ŋuna a kire ka alyokonu; ilipete ka itiyanakinete ŋisubuna ŋulu ka Akuj akilo akitiyanakin Akasuban alope, ŋina itemokino kipuroe ŋikaru ka ŋikaru! Amen.
45001026	Aŋakiro a ŋun, emyek Akuj ikes itiyaete ŋuna ke ekibure kec a ŋolo a ŋileec, anerae ajoŋoto ŋaberu arukit ka ŋikilyok, alomakis arukit make ikwa ekile ka aberu.
45001027	Ŋikilyok daŋ, aesikis ŋaberu, ido iburakinit arukit make ikwa aberu ka ekile. Itiyaete ŋikilyok ŋuna a ŋileec ka ŋikilyok pei; aŋun, isicani Akuj ŋawat kec ka akisicanet a ŋina itemokino naronis ŋina etiyata ikes.
45001028	Aŋuna aŋeryoto ŋituŋa anatameta kec ayenun Akuj, emyek Akuj ikes iwuapito ŋatameta ŋuna ecamito akitiya ŋuna aronok, ikotere itiyaete ŋuna sek pa etemokino ikes kitiyata.
45001029	Ileleba neni kec ŋakiro ŋuna nyiyookino – aronis, akiŋobel ka ediŋet; ileleba arakao, akiar, ebura, amodiyo, ŋinyas ka asyoma.
45001030	Itoroniarito ŋuluce alorworisya kec make, eŋerito Akuj, itoŋoyeneneete ŋuluce, isupaka, ituroko, etamete ŋarwa ŋuna alalak akitiya aronis, nyekerito ikes ŋikecekauruunak.
45001031	Emam ŋakiro emisito ŋitai kec, nyiricito ŋakiro ŋuna iiyanakinete, emam ikes aminanar, emam akitim.
45001032	Eyenete ikes atemar ebala ekisil ŋolo ka Akuj ebe, ŋulu itiyaeneneete ŋakiro ŋun, itemokino totwaka. Tari kikote nen, nyerubakinito ikes itiyaete ŋun bon, nai itojokito daŋ ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna itiyaete ikes.
45002001	Iyoŋ daŋ ŋini itubokini ŋuluce, aŋuna itiyaata ikes aronis, emam ŋakiro ipedorya aiunor bon aneni ka Akuj tari kirae iyoŋ ŋae. Anerae ŋina itubokinia iyoŋ ŋuluce, ido kitiyae iyoŋ daŋ ekatubon ŋunapei, isitakin iyoŋ bon elope.
45002002	Ikiyeni iwon atemar iyookino Akuj etubokini ŋituŋa ŋulu itiyaete ŋakiro ŋuna aronok.
45002003	Nai iyoŋ ituŋanan ŋini itubonokini ŋulu itiyaete aronis, ido kitiyae iyoŋ daŋ ŋunapei, itami iyoŋ atemar ipedori abucar anatubokino a ŋina ka Akuj a?
45002004	Kori imenit iyoŋ Akuj aŋuna epoloo nooi arimao ka akidaŋidaŋ ta atitinyikinit keŋ? Nyiyeni iyoŋ atemar erae narimao keŋ ikirikorya iyoŋ Akuj nakiki ŋasecisya a?
45002005	Nai iyakar iyoŋ etau ŋolo ninik ka iwou akiki. Aŋun, italala iyoŋ akisicanio kon a ilope, ŋina ikisicanere iyoŋ Akoloŋit ŋina itoodiunere anyunyura ka atubokino ŋina iyookino ŋina ka Akuj.
45002006	Akoloŋit ŋin, eropi Akuj ŋinituŋanan lopite ŋolo itiyator iŋes.
45002007	Einakini Akuj akiyar ŋina nyedaun neni a ŋulu erubakinete itiyaete ŋuna ajokak, kiwarito akitopolooro ka akitojokyo aneni ka Akuj ka kiwarito akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
45002008	Nai ebuni anyunyura ka aŋoit ŋina ka Akuj neni a ŋulu iwarito ŋuna kec a ŋilopeyek make, toŋerito daŋ ŋuna iyookino, ido kiwuapito ŋuna aronok.
45002009	Eyakaun ŋican ka aryeba neni a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ a ŋulu itiyaete aronis; neni a Ŋiyudayan mono, ido nai neni a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ.
45002010	Nai neni a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ a ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna ajokak, einakini Akuj ikes ekisil, itopoloori ka itojoki daŋ; neni a Ŋiyudayan mono, ido nai neni a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ.
45002011	Anerae, nyetyakatyakat Akuj ŋituŋa.
45002012	Ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aseca pa eyenete Ŋikisila ŋulu ainakini Akuj Moses, emunyarosi tari pa keyenete Ŋikisila. Ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aseca toyenete Ŋikisila ŋul, etubokinio ikes alotooma Ŋikisila.
45002013	Anerae, meere ŋulu ekerito Ŋikisila iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj; nai ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna ebasi Ŋikisila, ikes ituruworyo ŋulu iyookino.
45002014	Emamukatar ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan Ŋikisila, nai apaki daadaŋ ŋina itiyaata ikes ka acamit kec ŋuna icikakinito Ŋikisila, etoodiut ikes atemar eyenete ŋuna ajokak kori ŋuna aronok, tari kemamukatar ikes Ŋikisila.
45002015	Itoodiunito ŋipitesyo kec atemar igirir lotai kec ŋuna icikakinito Ŋikisila. Elimorito ŋatameta kec daŋ atemar erae ŋun ŋuna a kire alopite a ŋolo isitanakiniata ka eiununuyata ŋatameta kec ikes.
45002016	Etakanunete ŋun Akoloŋit ŋina ebunio Akuj atubokin ŋituŋa alotooma Yesu Kristo anakiro a ŋuna eya lotai kec, ikwapei iteyenunitotor Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna alimonokini ayoŋ.
45002017	Ani bo iyoŋ ŋini ibala, “Arae ayoŋ Eyudayat?” Iyarikinit iyoŋ Lokisila a Moses ka ituror ayenaanut kon ka Akuj.
45002018	Iyeni ŋuna ecamit Akuj ka itojokit ŋuna ajokak nooi, anerae ikitatamitae iyoŋ alotooma Ŋikisila.
45002019	Ileere aneni kon kire atemar irae iyoŋ ekarikon a ŋimudukanotin, ikoni iyoŋ akica ŋina a ŋulu eya nakiryonut.
45002020	Irae eketataman a ŋibaŋaanotin, a ŋulu ikote ŋiŋwea ŋulu emam ibore eyenete. Erae kire atemar, alotooma Ŋikisila, iyakar iyoŋ aosou daadaŋ ka ŋuna a kire.
45002021	Ani nai kitatami iyoŋ ŋuluce, nyo bo nyitatamar iyoŋ bon? Itatami iyoŋ ŋuluce ibala “Nyikoko” – nai nyikokoenene iyoŋ a?
45002022	Ibala iyoŋ “Nyilom” – nai nyilomenene iyoŋ a? Ijamuwarit iyoŋ ŋakujo – nai nyikokoenene iyoŋ ŋiboro ŋulu eya nakais a ŋakujo a?
45002023	Aŋun, iyes ŋulu iturosi ibasi ikiyeni Ŋikisila ŋulu ka Akuj – nyiyaunete iyes ŋileec neni ka Akuj aŋuna ibilibilyata Ŋikisila keŋ a?
45002024	Anerae ikote nen igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Aŋuna kus Ŋiyudayan, iyanyete ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ekiro ka Akuj.”
45002025	Ani kiwuap iyes ŋuna ebasi Ŋikisila, nyeruwor akileŋeryo kus akoŋinait. Nai ani pa kiwuap iyes ŋuna ebasi Ŋikisila, eruwor akileŋeryo kus akoŋinait.
45002026	Nai ani kiricakis ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ka nyileŋeritae, ŋuna ebasi Ŋikisila, imarakini Akuj ikes esibit ŋulu ileŋeritae.
45002027	Ituŋanan ŋini nyileŋeritae kiwuapite Ŋikisila, ikitubokini iyes alokiŋaren Akuj, anerae ibilibilyata iyes Ŋikisila tari kiyakatar Ŋikisila ŋulu igiritae ka ikileŋeritetei daŋ.
45002028	Iŋes atemar, nyerae ituŋanan Eyudayat alotakane keŋ kori aŋuna ileŋeritere iŋes.
45002029	Nai Eyudayat ŋolo a kire, iŋes ituŋanan ŋini ileŋeritae alotau keŋ; iŋes atemar erae iŋes ituŋanan ŋini iwuapit Ŋikisila ŋulu ka Akuj. Erae ŋakiro ŋun itiyae Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, meere ŋuna a Ŋikisila a ŋulu igiritae. Eryamuni ituŋanan ŋin akitopolooro aneni ka Akuj, meere alotuŋa.
45003001	Inyoni ŋini alalan eyakatar Ŋiyudayan akilo ŋini eyakatar ŋituŋa ŋuluce? Kori alipoida eyakar akileŋeryo kec?
45003002	Eyai kire epoida lowaetin daadaŋ! Ŋuna iŋarenete, abu Akuj kicikak ŋakiro keŋ neni a Ŋiyudayan akiyok.
45003003	Nai nyiwuapa ŋituŋa ŋice ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj. Iŋes mono atemar nyerubakini Akuj daŋ iricit ŋakiikineta keŋ a?
45003004	Mam jik! Erubakini Akuj iricit ŋakiikineta keŋ tari kelyokoko ŋituŋa daadaŋ. Ikwapei igiritere Nakigireta ebe, “Apaki ŋina irworikinia iyoŋ Akuj, ileere atemar iyookino iyoŋ; ka iloununui iyoŋ ŋina ikisitakinere.”
45003005	Nai ani kitoodiunito ŋuna aronok ŋuna ikitiyae iwon akiyookino ŋina ka Akuj, ikitemari iwon ai? Ikitemari mono nyiyookino Akuj aŋuna ikisicania iwon aŋuna a ŋiticisyo yok a ŋulu aronok a? (Erworo ayoŋ nu lopite ŋolo a ŋituŋa)
45003006	Mam jik! Ani pa kiyookino Akuj, ikokini nai iŋes etubokini akwap ai?
45003007	Epedorete ŋice alimun ebe: ani bo kitopoloorit aronis kaŋ Akuj anakisileereunit akiyookino keŋ, kaanukiro erubakinitor iŋes akatubokinit ayoŋ arae ekasecan?
