45003008	Kaanukiro bo nyikitemarya ebe, “Etiyata ŋuna aronok ikotere itoodiunere ŋuna ajokak?” Kire apotu ŋicetuŋa ekeyany ayoŋ ebasi etatami ŋakiro nu! Aŋun nai, etubokini Akuj ikes alopite a ŋolo itemokino totubokinere.
45003009	Nyo nai kire? Eyai mono iwon Ŋiyudayan ibore ŋini ikilounitor iwon ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan a? Mam jik! Anerae adau ayoŋ alimun ebe ipukat asecit ŋituŋa daadaŋ – Ŋiyudayan ka ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ,
45003010	ikwaŋinapei igiritere Nakigireta ebe: “Emam ituŋanan iyookino, emam ipei daŋ;
45003011	emam idio daŋ eyeni ŋuna iyookino kori ŋini iwarit akimorikin ka Akuj.
45003012	Aŋero ŋituŋa daadaŋ Akuj; aruworosi daadaŋ ŋikoŋinae; emam ŋini itiyae ŋuna ajokak, emam tari ipei daŋ.
45003013	Ŋakiro ŋuna irworosi ikes eyaununuyete atwanare; ileleba amodiyo ŋina aronon lorwor kec, nabo daŋ ŋakiro ŋuna irworosi ikes erae ŋuna aarak, ikote akisorit ŋina ke emun.
45003014	Ileleba ŋilam ka adedeŋu nakituka kec.
45003015	Nyeayeneneete ikes apaki ŋina aoyan akiwan kori akiar idiotuŋanan.
45003016	Neni daadaŋ elosete ikes, inyasunete ido kidoŋo ŋican nen.
45003017	Nyeyenete ikes ŋuna ke ekisil.
45003018	Nyeyenete ikes ŋuna ka akerit Akuj.”
45003019	Ikiyeni nai iwon atemar ŋuna elimunito Ŋikisila, elimunito aŋuna a ŋulu ipukato Ŋikisila, ikotere isililiŋere ŋipegeta daadaŋ ka yaunae ŋituŋa daadaŋ, totubok Akuj ikes.
45003020	Anerae, emam ituŋanan elimoryo atemar iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj aŋuna iricitor Ŋikisila. Etic a Ŋikisila iŋes akitoodikin ituŋanan atemar esecit iŋes.
45003021	Nai tokona adaun akisileereun epite ŋolo elimorya Akuj atemar iyookino ituŋanan alokiŋaren keŋ, ikwapei iteyenunitotor Ŋikisila ka ŋikadwarak. Nai nyikamunito ŋun Ŋikisila.
45003022	Akiyookino na, ŋina ka Akuj, ebunit alotooma anupit Yesu Kristo, neni a daadaŋ a ŋulu enupito. Emam atyeketait,
45003023	anerae aseca daadaŋ ka aŋopiki epite ŋolo eryamuniata apolou ŋina anakuj ŋina etemokino toryamut.
45003024	Nai anajokis keŋ abu Akuj tolimo atemar iyookino ikes alokiŋaren keŋ aŋuna a Yesu Kristo a ŋolo elakununui ikes anakipukao a ŋina ka asecit. Erae ŋin ainakinet ŋina nyetacio.
45003025	Abu Akuj kipoto Yesu Kristo, ikotere akeetwanare eruwor ŋina isyoniyere ŋasecisya a ŋituŋa a ŋulu enupete iŋes. Abu Akuj kitiya ŋun, ikotere kitoodiunia atemar iyookino iŋes alope. Koloŋ sek abu Akuj totitinyik ka nyemitak ŋasecisya a ŋituŋa.
45003026	Nai tokona, emitakinit Akuj ŋasecisya a ŋituŋa. Alopite a lo, itoodiunit iŋes atemar iyookino iŋes alope, nabo elimori Akuj atemar iyookino ŋituŋa daadaŋ alokiŋaren keŋ ŋulu enupito Yesu.
45003027	Nyo nai ikisiturokini iwon? Emam ibore ipei daŋ! Ikotere nyo? Erae aŋuna ikiwuapitor iwon Ŋikisila a? Meere, nai aŋuna ikinupitor.
45003028	Anerae ikinupit ebe elimori Akuj atemar iyookino ituŋanan alokiŋaren keŋ aŋuna enupitor iŋes, meere aŋuna iwuapitor Ŋikisila.
45003029	Erae mono Akuj ŋina a Ŋiyudayan bon a? Meere mono iŋes Akuj a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ a? Ee, erae iŋes Akuj a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ.
45003030	Erae Akuj apei, elimori atemar iyookino Ŋiyudayan alokiŋaren keŋ aŋuna ka anupit kec ka itiyae ikwaŋinapei neni a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
45003031	Itoodiunito nai ŋun atemar ikijamuwarit iwon Ŋikisila aŋuna ka anupit a ŋin a? Mam jik! Akilo, ikitopoloorit iwon Ŋikisila.
45004001	Ikitemari nai iwon ai aŋuna ka Aburaam a papaa yok? Nyo abu iŋes toyenu?
45004002	Kerae tolimorite Akuj atemar iyookino Aburaam alokiŋaren keŋ aŋuna a ŋiticisyo keŋ, keyakar Aburaam ŋakiro ŋuna ituror, nai meere alokiŋaren Akuj.
45004003	Ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, “Anupit Aburaam Akuj; aŋuna ka anupit keŋ, abu Akuj tocamu iŋes erae ŋolo iyookino.”
45004004	Ituŋanan ŋini itiyae, etacio. Nyimarakinitae ekeropit erae ainakinet, nai erae eropit keŋ ŋolo itemokino iŋes toryamu.
45004005	Nai ituŋanan ŋini ikinyomit Akuj ŋina isiyookini ŋikasecak, meere ŋiticisyo keŋ eyenuni iŋes atemar erae anupit keŋ, imarakini Akuj aŋuna ka alimor atemar iyookino iŋes alokiŋaren keŋ.
45004006	Erae ŋun daŋ apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna abu Daudi kirwor aŋuna ka arereŋu a ituŋanan a ŋini adau Akuj acamun erae ŋini iyookino, akilo ŋiticisyo keŋ.
45004007	“Erereŋ ŋulu adau Akuj akisyon ŋaronisya kec, ŋulu ekisar ŋasecisya kec!
45004008	Erereŋ ituŋanan ŋini nyerubakini Akuj idyasi ŋasecisya keŋ!”
45004009	Erae mono arereŋu ŋin ŋina abu Daudi kirwor ŋina a ŋulu ileŋeritae bon a? Meere! Erae ŋina a ŋulu nyileŋeritae daŋ, anerae adau ayoŋ erwor ŋuna ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, “Anupit Aburaam Akuj, aŋuna ka anupit keŋ, abu Akuj tocamu iŋes erae ŋolo iyookino.”
45004010	Ori kitiyakinotor ŋun? Arae mono eriŋa nyileŋera Aburaam kori kileŋeri? Meere kileŋeri, nai eriŋa nyileŋera iŋes.
45004011	Eleŋeryo iŋes ekaku, ido toruwor akileŋeryo keŋ emacar ŋolo itoodiunit atemar aŋuna ka anupit keŋ, aris Akuj kecamu iŋes erae ŋolo iyookino eriŋa nyileŋera. Aŋun, erae Aburaam papaa a daadaŋ a ŋulu enupito Akuj ka ŋulu adau iŋes acamun erae ŋulu iyookino, tari pa kileŋeritae.
45004012	Erae iŋes papaa a ŋulu ileŋeritae daŋ, meere aŋuna ileŋeritere ikes, nai aŋuna iboiyoto ananupit ikwaŋina eboiyo papaa yok Aburaam eriŋa nyileŋera.
45004013	Abu Akuj kiik Aburaam ka ŋiletok keŋ atemar eruwor akwap ŋina kec; pa etiyae Akuj ŋun aŋuna ewuapitor Aburaam Ŋikisila, nai aŋuna acamunere iŋes erae ŋolo iyookino ananupit keŋ.
45004014	Ani kerae torae akiikinet ŋina ka Akuj neni a ŋulu iwuapito Ŋikisila, kerae anupit akoŋinait ka kecaryono akiikinet.
45004015	Anerae eyaunete Ŋikisila anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj erae kebila ŋituŋa Ŋikisila: nai neni emam Ŋikisila, emam Ŋikisila ebilyo.
45004016	Aŋun, arae akiikinet aŋuna ka anupit, ikotere toruwor akiikinet ainakinet ŋina a ikoŋin aneni ka Akuj, neni a ŋiletok ka Aburaam a daadaŋ – meere neni a ŋulu iwuapito Ŋikisila make, nai tari neni a ŋulu enupito ikwaŋina anupitor Aburaam. Anerae Aburaam erae papaa yok a daadaŋ,
45004017	ikwapei igiritere Nakigireta ebe, “Ayoŋ Akuj eketuruwo iyoŋ papa a ŋibukui a ŋulu alalak.” Aŋun, erae Aburaam Paapa yok alokiŋaren Akuj ŋina abu iŋes tonup – Akuj ŋina iteyarununui ŋikatwak, ŋina iteyakauni analimunet keŋ ibore ŋini sek pa ayai.
45004018	Abu Aburaam tonup ka kigeno, tari ŋina amamukatar ŋuna etemokino iŋes igenor, ido toruwor “Papa a ŋakwapin a ŋuna alalak.” Ikwapei igiritere Nakigireta ebe, “Elalakiarosi ŋikoniletok ikwa ŋikacer.”
45004019	Aapiyarito ŋikaru ka Aburaam amiat; nai abu akikinyomit keŋ Akuj torubak egogoŋ tari apaki ŋina etamakinia iŋes atemar asalu akuwan keŋ ka Sara daŋ aberu keŋ pa auri.
45004020	Abu iŋes nyimyek akikinyomit Akuj ka nyeŋayaŋaya ŋuna ka akiikinet a ŋina ka Akuj; abu anupit keŋ togogoŋior ido abu iŋes kitopoloo Akuj.
45004021	Anupit iŋes kire atemar epedori Akuj akitiyakin ŋuna adau akiikin.
45004022	Arae ŋakiro ŋuna ka anupit keŋ, “Abunio Akuj tocamunia iŋes erae ŋolo iyookino.”
45004023	Ŋakiro ŋuna ebasi, “Abunio Akuj tocamunia iŋes erae ŋolo iyookino”, pa egiritae aŋuna keŋ bon.
45004024	Egiritae aŋuna yok daŋ a ŋulu elosi Akuj acamun erae ŋulu iyookino, iwon ŋulu ikinupit Akuj ŋina eteyaruni Yesu Ekapolon yok alokatwak.
45004025	Aponi kipotoroe iŋes totwan aŋuna a ŋasecisya yok ka aponi kiteyarunae aŋuna ka akituruwor iwon ŋulu ikiyookino alokiŋaren Akuj.
45005001	Aŋuna tokona ikicamunere iwon alokiŋaren Akuj ikirae ŋulu ikiyookino ananupit yok, ikiyakar iwon ekisil kaapei ka Akuj alotooma Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
45005002	Aŋuna a Yesu Kristo, ikiyakar iwon apedor ŋinamoret ajokis na ŋina ka Akuj ka ikilelyani daŋ, anerae ikigeno atemar ikiruki moi ka Akuj anapolou keŋ.
45005003	Meere a ŋun bon, ikilelyani daŋ alocan yok, anerae ikiyeni iwon atemar ŋican ikes ikiinakinete iwon atitinyu.
45005004	Ani kikititiny iwon, ikidaŋidaŋakini, ido ikiinak akidaŋidaŋ akigeno.
45005005	Nyikitakadanakini iwon akigeno na, anerae elelebik Akuj amina keŋ lotai yok aneni ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan, a ŋolo erae ainakinet ŋina ka Akuj neni yok.
45005006	Anerae ani eriŋa iwon ikipalag aŋuna ikipukator asecit iwon, abu Kristo totwan aŋuna yok a ŋikasecak apaki ŋina aseunit Akuj.
45005007	Nyepatana ituŋanan atwanare aŋuna a ituŋanan a ŋini ajokan. Acepaki epedori icetuŋanan kire akidaŋ atwanare aŋuna a ituŋanan a ŋini ajokan.
45005008	Nai ikitoodik Akuj iwon etyae ŋolo ikiminar iŋes iwon, anerae abu Kristo totwan aŋuna yok eriŋa iwon ikirae ŋikasecak.
45005009	Aŋuna ka atwanare keŋ, adaun acamun iwon ikirae ŋulu ikiyookino alokiŋaren Akuj. Ani kikote nen, kire jik ikiuni Kristo iwon ananyunyura a ŋina ka Akuj.
45005010	Ikipotu iwon oruworos ŋimoi ŋulu ka Akuj, nai abu iŋes ikisisil iwon ka iŋes alotooma atwanare a Lokoku keŋ. Ikwaŋina tokona ikiraakar iwon ŋikonei ŋulu ka Akuj, etya nai ai aiuno ŋina ikiryamuni iwon alotooma akiyar a Yesu Kristo.
45005011	Meere a ŋun bon, nai ikilelyani daŋ alotooma Akuj aŋuna a Yesu Kristo a ŋolo ikituruwo iwon ŋikonei ŋulu ka Akuj.
45005012	Abu asecit bu nakwap alotooma ipeituŋanan ka anerae abu iŋes tosec, etemokino iŋes totwan ka aŋun, akeikin atwanare lotuŋa daadaŋ, anerae aseca daadaŋ.
45005013	Ayai asecit nakwap eriŋa Akuj nyeina Ŋikisila a Moses, nai neni emam Ŋikisila, nyimaryo ŋasecisya.
45005014	Nai ageun alorwa ka Adam tari lorwa ŋulu a Moses, abu atwanare kipuka ŋituŋa daadaŋ, tari ŋulu pa asecito ikwa asecitor Adam ŋolo pa akerit akiciket ŋina ka Akuj. Arae Adam etorube a ŋolo etemokino bu.
45005015	Nai ŋuluarei nyikwaan; anerae nyikwaan ainakinet ka Akuj ŋina a ikoŋin ka asecit ŋina ka Adam. Erae kire atemar apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak totwaka aŋuna ka asecit a ipeituŋanan. Nai elal nooi ajokis ŋina ka Akuj, ka ainakinet keŋ daŋ neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu alalak alotooma ajokis ŋina a ipeituŋanan a ŋin, a ŋini erae Yesu Kristo.
45005016	Eyai atyaketait kidiŋ ainakinet ŋina ka Akuj ŋina a ikoŋin ka asecit ŋina a ipeituŋanan a ŋin, a ŋini erae Adam. Aŋuna ka asecit ka apei, abu atubokino bu lotuŋa daadaŋ; nai ekaku a ŋasecisya a ŋuna alalak, abu ainakinet ŋina ka Akuj bu, ŋina elimorit ŋituŋa daadaŋ erae ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj.
45005017	Erae kire atemar aŋuna ka asecit a ipeituŋanan abu atwanare togeu akipuka, aŋuna a ipeituŋanan a ŋin. Nai etya ai ŋuna apotu alotooma ŋuna adau Yesu Kristo akitiya? Ŋulu daadaŋ eryamunete ajokis ka Akuj ŋina alalan ka ainakinet keŋ ŋina ecamunere ikes erae ŋulu iyookino, eyarete ikes tokona ka ipukato asecit aŋuna a Yesu Kristo.
45005018	Aŋun, ikwapei abunio asecit ŋina a ipeituŋanan totubok ŋituŋa daadaŋ, ikwaŋinapei, adaun alacakin ka eteyari ŋituŋa daadaŋ aŋuna ka akiyookino a ŋina a ipeituŋanan.
45005019	Anerae ikwaŋina aponere kituruworere ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ŋikasecak aŋuna aŋeryo ipeituŋanan akiwuap ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, ikwaŋinapei, ituruworyo ŋikalalak ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj, aŋuna ewuapya ipeituŋanan ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
45005020	Abu Akuj kitolomu Ŋikisila aŋuna ka akiyatakin asecit, anerae aponi iŋes kisileereunoe; nai neni abunio asecit kiyatakinor, abu ajokis ŋina ka Akuj kiyatakin nooi adepar.
45005021	Aŋun, ikwaŋinapei abunio asecit kipuka aŋuna ayaunia atwanare lotuŋa daadaŋ, ipukae ajokis ŋina ka Akuj daŋ aŋuna isiyookinio ŋituŋa daadaŋ, ido ikitena iwon nakiyar ŋina nyedaun alotooma Yesu Kristo Ekapolon yok.
45006001	Ikitemari nai tokona iwon ai? Ikitemari orubakisi ikisecenene ikotere ajokis ŋina ka Akuj iyatakin a?
45006002	Mam jik! Nyepedori asecit akitap iwon, anerae ikipotu iwon otwaka alokiŋaren asecit, ikikokini nai iwon ikirubakini ikisecenene ai?
45006003	Nyiyenete mono iyes atemar iwon daadaŋ ŋulu aponi ikibatisae akimorikin ka Yesu Kristo, aponi ikibatisae akimorikin ka atwanare keŋ a?
45006004	Aŋuna nai ka akibatisao yok, iwon ikipotu omora atwanare keŋ ka aponi itonuki ka iŋes; ikotere nai iwon daŋ ikiyari anakiyar a ŋina kitete, ikwaŋinapei eteyarunere Kristo alokatwak aŋuna ka apolou a ŋina ka Akuj a Papa.
45006005	Ani kikimorikina sek iwon ka iŋes anatwanare keŋ alopite a ŋolo atwania iŋes, ikwaŋinapei, ikimorikin iwon ka iŋes anayarun keŋ alopite a ŋolo eteyarunere iŋes.
45006006	Ikiyeni iwon atemar epite ŋolo sek ikiyakar iwon, aponi toarae kaapei ka Kristo alomusalaba, ikotere inyasunio epite ŋolo ka asecit alotooma yok ka nyikirubak iwon ikirae ŋipi ŋulu ka asecit.
45006007	Anerae ani etwani ituŋanan, adaun iŋes alacakin anasecit.
45006008	Nai ani kikitwakit sek iwon kaapei ka Kristo, ikinupit daŋ atemar ikiponi akiyar kaapei ka iŋes.
45006009	Anerae ikiyeni iwon atemar aponi kiteyarunae Kristo alokatwak ka nyetwani nabo; nyipukae atwanare iŋes nabo jik.
45006010	Abu iŋes totwan alokiŋaren asecit; nyitemokino iŋes totwan nabo, nai eyari iŋes tokona aŋuna ka Akuj.
45006011	Aŋun, iyes daŋ, itemokino totamakis atemar itwakito iyes ŋilopeyek alokiŋaren asecit ka iyarete aŋuna ka Akuj anakimorikina ka Yesu Kristo.
45006012	Nyitemokino nai asecit ipukae ŋawat kus, ikotere nyiwuapyata iyes ekibure ŋolo a ŋawat kus.
45006013	Nyijalakis ediokineri kus neni ka asecit, ikotere nyisitiyae ikwa ibore ŋini ejiyere alowae a ŋolo ka aronis. Nai inakisi ŋakusiwat neni ka Akuj ikwa ŋuna eteyarun alokatwak nakiyar ŋina kitete. Tojalakisi ŋinerin kus daadaŋ neni ka Akuj, ikotere kisitiya ikwa ŋiboro ŋulu ejiyere alowae a ŋolo ka akiyookino.
45006014	Nyikipukat asecit iyes, anerae nyikipukato iyes Ŋikisila, nai ikipukat ajokis ŋina ka Akuj.
45006015	Nyo nai? Itemokino iwon oseca, anerae meere Ŋikisila ikipukato iwon, nai ikipukat ajokis ŋina ka Akuj a? Mam jik!
45006016	Iyenete iyes kire atemar, ŋina ijalatar iyes tocamut aruwor ŋipi ŋulu a ituŋanan a ice, iruworosi ŋipi ŋulu a ituŋanan a ŋini iwuapito iyes – kerae ŋipi ŋulu ka asecit a ŋina ikirikori natwanare kori ŋipi ŋulu ka akiwuapit ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, ŋuna eyaunete akiyookino alokiŋaren Akuj.
45006017	Nai olakaros neni ka Akuj! Anerae apaki ace, ipotu iyes toruworos ŋipi ŋulu ka asecit; nai ekaku ipotu kiwuapa a ŋitai kus a daadaŋ ŋuna a kire, ŋuna eya nakitatam ŋina ipotu iyes toryamut.
45006018	Aponi itolacakin iyes anasecit, ido idaut aruwor ŋipi ŋulu ka akiyookino, ŋulu itiyaete aŋuna ka Akuj.
45006019	(Erworo ayoŋ alopite a ŋolo irworotor ŋituŋa ikotere epataniar iyes ayenun ŋakiro kaŋ, anerae ipalag iyes anatameta.) Koloŋ sek ipotu iyes tojala ŋawat kus toruworos ŋipi ŋulu a ŋuna nyesegak ka ŋuna aronok aŋuna ka akitiya ŋuna nyiyookino alokiŋaren Akuj. Ikwaŋinapei, itemokino tokona iyes tojala ŋawat kus toruworos ŋipi ŋulu ka akiyookino, kitiyata ŋuna ka akiyookino alokiŋaren Akuj.
45006020	Apaki ŋina iponiata iyes toruworotor ŋipi ŋulu ka asecit, ilacakina iyes anakiyookino.
45006021	Nyo nai ipotu iyes toryamut apaki ŋina itiyaata iyes ŋakiro ŋun ŋuna tokona ikirumitotor iyes ŋileec? Atwanare iŋes abu bu anakiro a ŋun!
45006022	Nai tokona aŋuna ikilacakinere iyes anasecit ka iruworotor ŋipi ŋulu itiyaete aŋuna ka Akuj, iryamunete tokona iyes akiyar ŋina italakarit Akuj ka iryamunete moi akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
45006023	Anerae eropit ŋolo ka asecit iŋes atwanare; nai ainakinet ŋina a ikoŋin ŋina ka Akuj iŋes akiyar ŋina nyedaun alotooma Yesu Kristo Ekapolon yok.
45007001	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, ayeni ayoŋ atemar ipedorete iyes ayenun ŋuna alosi ayoŋ alimun. Anerae iyenete iyes daadaŋ ŋuna ikamunito Ŋikisila. Ipukato Ŋikisila ituŋanan ŋirwa ŋulu eyarya iŋes.
45007002	Akitaanyikinet iŋes na: aberu ŋina iisitae erae iŋes ŋina a lokile keŋ alokisila ŋirwa ŋulu eyarya lokile keŋ; nai ani ketwana lokile keŋ, elacakin iŋes alokisila a ŋulu eraakar iŋes ŋina alokile keŋ.
45007003	Aŋun nai, ani keruko iŋes ka ekile ece eriŋa lokile keŋ eyari, enyarao iŋes akaloman; nai ani ketwana lokile keŋ, eruwor iŋes ŋina elacakina alokisila a ŋul ka nyeruwor iŋes akaloman erae keruko ka ekile ece.
45007004	Ikote iyes daŋ nenipei nen ŋikaitotoi kaŋ. Apaki ŋina iponiata iyes tomoryata atwanare a Kristo ipotu iyes tolacakinos aneni a Ŋikisila ka itwakito tokona alokiŋaren Ŋikisila. Irae iyes tokona ŋulu a Kristo a ŋolo aponi kiteyarunae alokatwak, ikotere itiyaete ŋuna ajokak aŋuna ka Akuj.
45007005	Anerae apaki ŋina ikiboiyo iwon ikiwuapit ekibure yok bon, etiyae ekibure ŋolo aronon ŋolo isiguryakinito Ŋikisila anawat yok ka ikipotu iwon oruworos ŋulu ikitiyae ŋuna ikirikorete natwanare.
45007006	Nai tokona, ikilacakina iwon aneni a Ŋikisila, anerae ikipotu iwon otwaka alokiŋaren Ŋikisila ŋulu sek ikituruworito iwon ŋimabus. Nyeriŋa tokona iwon ikitiyae etic ŋolo ka Akuj alopite a ŋoloŋorot a ŋolo ke ekisil a ŋolo igiritae, nai alopite a ŋolokitete a ŋolo ke Etau ka Akuj.
45007007	Ikitemari nai tokona iwon Ŋikisila ikes erae asecit a? Mam jik! Nai arae Ŋikisila apotu eketeyenut ayoŋ ibore ŋini erae asecit. Pa kayenunit ayoŋ atemar erae akiŋobel icebore, kerae nyebasi Ŋikisila ebe, “Nyiŋobel.”
45007008	Nai abu asecit toryamu anakiciket a na apaki ŋina kisiguryakinet aneni kaŋ ŋipitesyo daadaŋ ŋulu ka akiŋobel. Anerae ani emam Ŋikisila, etwanit asecit.
45007009	Ayari koloŋ ayoŋ elope eriŋa nyepona Ŋikisila. Nai ani ebuni akiciket, toyaru asecit,
45007010	ido otwana ka abu akiciket ŋina etemokino yau akiyar neni kaŋ, yau atwanare.
45007011	Abu asecit toryamu apaki keŋ, tosodi okomodik ayoŋ anakiciket a na; abu asecit kisitiya akiciket aŋuna ka aarya ayoŋ.
45007012	Aŋun, nyerae Ŋikisila asecit, nai eponito aneni ka Akuj ka eponito ŋakiciketa kec daŋ aneni ka Akuj, nabo iyookino ka ejokak.
45007013	Akeepolou mono atemar ŋuna ajokak ŋuna erae Ŋikisila, ikes apotu yaut atwanare neni kaŋ a? Mam jik! Arae asecit abu kitiya ŋun. Abu asecit yau atwanare alotooma akisitiya ŋuna ajokak, ikotere eyenunere ibore ŋini kire erae asecit. Aŋun, alotooma akiciket, itoodiunitae asecit esecana nooi tari adepar.
45007014	Ikiyeni iwon atemar erae Ŋikisila ŋulu eponito aneni ka Akuj, nai arae ayoŋ ituŋanan ŋini apalag ŋini akagyelaritae nasecit arae epito.
45007015	Nyayeni ayoŋ ŋuna etiyae; anerae nyetiyaenene ayoŋ ŋuna acamit, nai etiyaenene ŋuna aŋerit.
45007016	Ani etiyae ayoŋ ŋuna nyacamit akitiya, itoodiunito ŋun atemar acamunit ayoŋ atemar ejokak Ŋikisila.
45007017	Aŋun, nyerae ayoŋ kire etiyaenene ŋuna aronok, nai erae asecit ŋina eyai tooma kaŋ.
45007018	Ayeni ayoŋ atemar nyeyakasi ŋuna ajokak tooma kaŋ – iŋes atemar, alopite kaŋ a ŋolo araakar ituŋanan. Anerae tari keyai tooma kaŋ acamit akitiya ŋuna ajokak, nyapedorit akitiyakin.
45007019	Anerae nyetiyae ayoŋ ŋuna ajokak ŋuna acamit akitiya; nai, etiyae ŋuna aronok ŋuna nyacamit akitiya.
45007020	Ani etiyae ayoŋ ŋuna nyacamit akitiya, nyerae ayoŋ kire etiyaenene ŋuna aronok, nai erae asecit ŋina eyai tooma kaŋ.
45007021	Aŋun, aanyu ayoŋ atemar alotooma kaŋ, itiyae ekisil lo: ani acamit ayoŋ akitiya ŋuna ajokak, ŋuna aronok bon apedori ayoŋ aseun akitiya.
45007022	Elakara ekaatau nooi aŋuna a Ŋikisila a ŋulu eponito aneni ka Akuj.
45007023	Nai ete ayoŋ ekisil ŋolo egelaana itiyae aloticisyo kaŋ – ekisil ŋolo isiiryae ekisil ŋolo iyookino anatameta kaŋ. Eketuruworit ayoŋ emabus ŋolo a ekisil a ŋolo ka asecit – ekisil ŋolo a ŋiticisyo kaŋ.
45007024	-
45007025	Erae nai epite ŋolo ayakar ayoŋ lo: Ayoŋ elope anaosou kaŋ ewuapit ekisil ŋolo ka Akuj, nai alopite a ŋolo araakar ituŋanan, ewuapit ekisil ŋolo ka asecit. Okoe nyipeituŋanan a ŋipapan ayoŋ! Ŋae akaiuni ayoŋ anakuwan a na, a ŋina akarikorit natwanare? Alakara ayoŋ neni ka Akuj a ŋina epedori aiun ayoŋ alotooma Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo!
45008001	Emam tokona atubokino eriŋa eyai neni a ŋulu erukito kaapei ka Yesu Kristo.
45008002	Anerae ekisil ŋolo ke Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj, ŋolo eyaununui akiyar neni yok anakimorikina ka Yesu Kristo, iŋes akalacu ayoŋ alokisil a ŋolo ka asecit a ŋina ikirikori natwanare.
45008003	Adau Akuj akitiya ibore daadaŋ ŋini pa apedorete Ŋikisila akitiya, anerae epalag ŋipitesyo a ituŋanan. Abu Akuj totubok asecit alotooma ituŋanan anakiyakuun Lokoku keŋ, ŋolo abu bu alokuwane a ŋolo a ituŋanan a ŋolo eyai asecit, alemarya asecit.
45008004	Abu Akuj kitiya ikoŋina, ikotere iwon ŋulu ikiyari anakiwuapit Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, meere anakiwuapit aseconu a ituŋanan, ikipedori akitiya ŋuna ecamito Ŋikisila atemar iyookino.
45008005	Ikes ŋulu eyarete alopite a ŋolo ka aseconu kec, ipukato ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka aseconu kec tari ŋatameta kec. Ikes ŋulu eyarete alopite a ŋolo ke Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj, ipukato ŋuna ecamit Etau ŋolo ka Akuj tari ŋatameta kec.
45008006	Ani kikipukato iwon ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka aseconu, ikitwaki, nai kikipukat Etau ŋolo ka Akuj iwon, ikiinakini Akuj iwon akiyar ka ekisil.
45008007	Aŋun, ituŋanan ŋini ipukato ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka aseconu, erae iŋes emoit ŋolo ka Akuj; anerae nyiwuapit iŋes ekisil ŋolo ka Akuj, kori daŋ nyepedori jik akiwuap.
45008008	Ŋituŋa ŋulu iwuapito ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka aseconu kec, nyepedorete akitalakar Akuj.
45008009	Nai nyiyarete iyes alopitesyo a ŋulu ka aseconu, nai iyarete alopitesyo a ŋulu ecamitor Etau ŋolo ka Akuj iyes toyaryata – ikwapei kire eyakar Etau ŋolo ka Akuj tooma kus. Ituŋanan ŋini nyeyakar Etau ŋolo a Kristo, nyerae ŋini a Kristo.
45008010	Nai ani kiboi Kristo alotooma kus, ikiteyari iyes Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, tari kelosete ŋawat kus atwakare a ŋuna ka asecit; anerae ikituruwor iyes ŋulu iyookino aneni ka Akuj.
45008011	Ani keyai tooma kus Etau ŋolo ka Akuj ŋolo eteyaruni Kristo alokatwak, iteyaruni daŋ iŋes ŋawat kus ŋuna etwakete alotooma Etau keŋ ŋolo eyai tooma kus.
45008012	Aŋun nai ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, nyeriŋa ikireikinitae iwon akiwuapit ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka aseconu yok.
45008013	Anerae ani kiwuap iyes ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka aseconu, itwakete; nai ani kisitiyata iyes Etau ŋolo ka Akuj aarya ŋiticisyo kus ŋulu aronok, iyarete.
45008014	Ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu erikit Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, ikes erae ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj.
45008015	Anerae abu Akuj nyikiinak Etau ŋolo abu ikituruwo iyes ŋipi keŋ, ido tokuryaketa nabo. Nai ikiinak iŋes iyes Etau ŋolo ikituruwo ŋidwe keŋ ka anapedor a ŋina ke Etau, ikiworouni neni ka Akuj otemasi, “Papa! Apa kaŋ!”
45008016	Imorikin Etau ŋolo ka Akuj ka ŋitai yok alimor atemar ikirae iwon kire ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj.
45008017	Ikwaŋina ikiraakar iwon ŋidwe keŋ, ikiryamuni iwon ŋarereŋisyo ŋuna iŋadat Akuj aŋuna a ŋituŋa keŋ ka ikiryamuni iwon kaapei ka Kristo ŋuna iŋadat Akuj aŋuna keŋ. Anerae ani kikimora iwon akisicanio a Kristo, ikimori daŋ ka iŋes apolou keŋ.
45008018	Ayeni ayoŋ atemar ŋican ŋulu ikiryamunit iwon tokona, nyepedoryo akisikwaanikin ka apolou ŋina ikidaritere iwon, ŋina nyisileereuno.
45008019	Idarito nooi ŋisubuna daadaŋ apaki ŋina iseleereunio Akuj ŋidwe keŋ.
45008020	Anerae aponi ŋisubuna daadaŋ totubokinae aruwor ŋikoŋinae, meere aŋuna ka acamit kec, nai aŋuna acamitor Akuj kitiyakin ŋun. Torae bo ayai akigeno na,
45008021	ebe apeikoloŋit, elacakinio ŋisubuna daadaŋ alotooma apitoonut kec ŋina ka abosiyar, ido tomora ka ŋidwe ka Akuj alacakina ŋina ka apolou kec.
45008022	Anerae ikiyeni iwon atemar akitodol tokona, irurumaete ŋisubuna daadaŋ eryebasi ikwa aberu ŋina edolit akidoun.
45008023	Nai meere ŋisubuna bon irurumaete anaryeba; iwon daŋ ŋulu ikiyakar Etau ŋolo ka Akuj ikwapei ainakinet ka Akuj ŋina ke ekiŋaren, ikirurumae anaryeba alotooma yok, anapaki a na a ŋina ikidaritor Akuj ikituruwo iwon ŋidwe keŋ, tolacak ŋawat yok anatwanare.
45008024	Anerae arae aŋuna ka akigeno a na aponere ikiiun iwon; nai ani kikiŋolik iwon ŋuna ikigeno iŋes atemar meere ŋin akigeno. Anerae ani kite ituŋanan ibore, kan nyo nabo igenor iŋes?
45008025	Nai ani kikigeno iwon ibore ŋini nyikite, ikidaruni iwon ibore ŋin ikititinyikinit.
45008026	Ikwaŋinapei ikiŋarakinitor akigeno ŋin iwon, ebuneene Etau ŋolo ka Akuj daŋ akiŋarakin iwon, ŋulu ikipalag nooi. Anerae nyikiyeni iwon epite ŋolo itemokino elipyata; nai erae Etau ilipit Akuj aŋuna yok, alotooma aryeba elimit ŋakiro ŋuna nyikipedori iwon alimun.
45008027	Akuj ŋina eripit ŋitai a ŋituŋa eyeni ŋatameta ŋuna ke Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj. Anerae imaimai Etau Akuj aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj, lopite ŋolo ecamitor Akuj.
45008028	Ikiyeni iwon atemar aloboro a daadaŋ, itiyae Akuj ŋuna ajokak kaapei ka ŋulu eminasi iŋes, ikes ŋulu adau iŋes anyarare akitiya ŋuna ecamit iŋes.
45008029	Abu Akuj keseu ŋituŋa ŋulu sek aris ketyaka nawae toyakaunos ikwaŋina eyakar Lokoku keŋ, ikotere nai Lokoku keŋ eruwor ŋolo eŋarenon alokidiŋ ŋikaitotoi ŋulu alalak.
45008030	Aŋun, abu Akuj tonyarau ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu aris iŋes ketyaka nawae ka ŋulu abu iŋes tonyara daŋ, abu kituruwo ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren keŋ ka ŋulu abu iŋes kituruwo ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren keŋ, abu kitopoloo ikes.
45008031	Aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun a daadaŋ, ikitemari iwon ai? Ani keriit Akuj neni yok, ŋae epedori akitepeg iwon?
45008032	Abu Akuj nyewounia Lokoku keŋ, nai abu tojal iŋes aŋuna yok a daadaŋ! Abu ikiinak iwon Lokoku keŋ – nyikiinakini mono iŋes iwon ŋiboro daadaŋ alotooma Kristo a?
45008033	Ŋae isitakini ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu eseunitae? Emam ipei daŋ, anerae Akuj alope acamu ikes erae ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren keŋ.
45008034	Ŋae nai etubokini ikes? Emam ipei daŋ, anerae Yesu Kristo abu totwan, nabo akilo aponi kiteyarunae alokatwak, ido iboi alowae a ŋolo aloteten a ŋolo ka Akuj. Iŋes edyekit aŋuna yok Akuj.
45008035	Ŋae epedori atyakari iwon anamina a Kristo? Epedorete ŋican atyakar a? Kori ŋatyokisyo, kori akisicanio kori eron kori akulyako, kori awasya kori atwanare a?
45008036	Ikwaŋinapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe: “Aŋuna kon Akuj, ikiapikinit isua atwanare apaaran daadaŋ; ikitiŋito ŋituŋa isua nalya ikwa ŋamesekin ŋuna emearyo akiŋol.”
45008037	Nai alotooma ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, ikiloit iwon tari ŋikelounak aŋuna a ŋolo abu ikiminak iwon.
45008038	Anerae ayeni ayoŋ atemar emam ibore epedori atyakar iwon anamina a Kristo; nyepedori atwanare kori akiyar, nyepedorete ŋimalaikan kori ŋikepukak; nyepedorete ŋuna a tokona kori ŋuna epote kori ŋapedorosyo.
45008039	Nyepedori ibore ŋini eyai nadis kori nakwap – emam ibore alosubuna a daadaŋ ŋini epedori atyakar iwon anamina a ŋina ka Akuj, a ŋina erae ŋina yok alotooma Yesu Kristo Ekapolon yok.
45009001	Erae ŋakiro ŋuna tokona alosi ayoŋ erwor ŋuna a kire; nyerworo ayoŋ alyokonu, anerae arae ayoŋ ŋolo a Kristo. Ŋatameta kaŋ daŋ, erae ŋuna ipukat Etau ŋolo Asegan, eketeyenunito ikes ayoŋ atemar nyerworo ayoŋ alyokonu.
45009002	Erae ŋun kire atemar epol nooi akiyaloloŋ kaŋ ka nyedaun aryeba ŋina eyai lotau kaŋ aŋuna a ŋituŋa kaŋ. Erworo ayoŋ aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ke ekabila kaŋ.
45009003	Kerae ca opedori ayoŋ akiŋarakin ikes, kacamu daŋ aŋuna kec ekecen Akuj ka okotyakar aneni a Kristo!
45009004	Ikes erae ŋituŋa ŋulu a Isirael ŋulu eseunit Akuj kituruwo ŋidwe keŋ ka kitoodik apolou keŋ neni kec. Abu iŋes bu neni kec inak ikes Acamunet ka Ŋikisila daŋ. Eyenete ikes kire epite ŋolo kilipet; aryamut ikes ŋakiikineta ŋuna ka Akuj.
45009005	Erae ikes ŋiletok ŋulu atapapaa yok a ŋulu apolok nooi a ŋulu elimokinitae ŋirorwa kec lokabilae a ŋituŋa ka Kristo daŋ alopite a ŋolo araakar iŋes ituŋanan, arae ŋolo anateker kec. Kipuroe Akuj ŋina ipukat daadaŋ, ŋikaru ka ŋikaru! Amen.
45009006	Nyabala ayoŋ epiyo Akuj akisiyookin akiikinet keŋ; anerae meere ŋituŋa a Isirael daadaŋ erae ŋiseuna ŋulu ka Akuj.
45009007	Nabo daŋ nyerae ŋiletok ŋulu ka Aburaam daadaŋ ŋidwe keŋ. Abu Akuj tolimok Aburaam ebe, “Imarakinio ŋiletok ŋulu ka Isaka erae ŋulu kon.”
45009008	Iŋes atemar meere ŋidwe daadaŋ ŋulu anakuwan keŋ erae ŋulu ka Akuj, nai ŋulu idounitoe anakiikinet a ŋina ka Akuj bon ikes erae ŋiletok ŋulu a kire.
45009009	Anerae abu Akuj kiik akiikinet keŋ anakiro a nu, “Aboŋuni ayoŋ ekaru ŋolo moi apaki napei na, ido aryamuni Sara kidou ikoku ŋini sapat.”
45009010	Nabo meere daadaŋ ŋun. Rebeka daŋ ayakatar ŋidwe ŋulusapa ŋiarei, ŋulu arae papa kec epei, iŋes papaa yok Isaka.
45009011	-
45009012	Tari eriŋa ikes nyidouno ka eriŋa ikes nyitiya ŋuna ajokak kori ŋuna aronok, aponi tolimokinae Rebeka ebe, “Eruwor edya ŋolo apolon eketiyan a ŋolo cici.” Aŋun, erae aseunet ŋina ka Akuj ŋina iwuapit epite ŋolo ikinyaraa iŋes alope; meere aŋuna a idiobore a ŋini itiyae ituŋanan.
45009013	Ikwaŋinapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Abu ayoŋ ominak Yakobo, nai abu etidiŋ Esau.”
45009014	Ikitemari nai tokona iwon ai? Ikitemari erae Akuj ŋina nyetubi ŋakiro iyookino a? Mam jik!
45009015	Anerae abu iŋes tolimok neni a Moses tema, “Esyoni ayoŋ ŋini acamit akisyon, etimi ŋini acamit akitim.”
45009016	Aŋun nai, nyerae akisyon aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna ecamit ituŋanan kori imukekinit, nai erae aŋuna ka akisyon a ŋina ka Akuj bon.
45009017	Anerae ebasi Ŋakigireta abala Akuj neni a Parao ebe, “Abu ayoŋ eketuruwo iyoŋ ekepukan aŋuna a ŋakiro a nupei a nu: akisitiya iyoŋ kitoodiu apedor kaŋ ka akiserakin ekiro kaŋ nakwap daadaŋ.”
45009018	Aŋun nai, isyoni Akuj ŋini ecamit iŋes ka itininiki ŋatameta a ŋini ecamit iŋes.
45009019	Etemari nai ipei alokidiŋ kus neni kaŋ ebe, “Ani kikote ŋun nen, kaanukiro nai erubakinitor Akuj isitanakini ituŋanan aŋuna ka asecit? Anerae emam ituŋanan epedori akiretakin acamit keŋ.”
45009020	Nai ŋae mono iyoŋ ituŋanan itepegi Akuj? Nyepedori amot akiŋit ekayan keŋ ebe, “Kaanukiro ikiyeunia iyoŋ ayoŋ ikwana?”
45009021	Nyeyakar mono ekayan ŋamoti apedor ŋinakitiyaunet alolupe a epei ŋamoti ŋuna a ŋiticisyo a ŋulu apolok ka ŋace ŋuna a ŋiticisyo a ŋulucaryo a?
45009022	Ŋuna etiya Akuj lotuŋa, ikote kire nenipei. Acamit iŋes akitoodiun akeenyunyura ka akiteyenun apedor keŋ neni a ŋulu etemokino tomunyarae. Tari kikote nen abu iŋes totitinyik nooi ka kidaŋidaŋ aronis a ŋulu adikino eryamunete anyunyura keŋ.
45009023	Acamit daŋ Akuj akitoodikin apolou keŋ ŋina epol nooi neni a ŋulu esyon iŋes ka neni a ŋulu adau koloŋ iŋes akitemokin aryamun apolou keŋ.
45009024	Erae iwon ŋituŋa ŋul; abu iŋes ikinyara iwon alobukui a daadaŋ, meere aneni a Ŋiyudayan bon.
45009025	Ŋakiro nu ikes irworo Akuj alokitaabo a ŋolo ke ekadwaran a Osea ebe, “Ŋituŋa ŋulu pa arae ŋulu kaŋ, anyarae ayoŋ ikes, ‘Ŋituŋa kaŋ.’ Ebuku ŋolo sek pa amina ayoŋ, anyarae ayoŋ iŋes, ‘Ŋolo minat kaŋ.’
45009026	Anakibois a ŋinapei alimokinere ikes atemar ‘Meere iyes ŋituŋa kaŋ’; enyarao ikes ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj a ŋina eyari.”
45009027	Abu ekadwaran Isaya kisileereu ŋakiro a Ŋisirael tema, “Tari kelalak ŋituŋa ŋulu a Isirael ketya asinyon ŋina ka anam, ŋidikudyo bon eiunio;
45009028	anerae ebuni Ekapolon atipei atubokin ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu ka akwap, kirikakin.”
45009029	Ikwaan ŋakiro ŋun ka ŋuna aris Isaya kedwar ebala, “Ani kerae nyikiesikinitor Ekapolon ŋolo etiron iwon ŋiletok ŋice, ketinen iwon kikikok Sodoma ka Gomora, ŋulu aponi kinyasunae.”
45009030	Ikitemari nai tokona iwon ai? Ikote ne: pa ekatakinito ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan akituruwor ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj, nai arae Akuj abu kituruwo ikes ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren keŋ, anerae apotu ikes tonupa Akuj.
45009031	Nai Ŋisirael, ŋulu ewarito aruwor ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj anakiwuapit Ŋikisila, ikes apotu nyepedosi.
45009032	Kaanukiro nai? Anerae ŋuna apotu ikes kitiyata, pa arae alotooma anupit, nai arae alotooma ŋiticisyo. Abu kiguki ikes amoru ŋina enyaritae “Ikiguwanakini.”
45009033	Amoru ŋin iŋes ŋina irworo Akuj alotooma Ŋakigireta ebe, “Kiŋolikisi, ewuakini ayoŋ neni a Sion amoru ŋina iguwanakini ŋituŋa, ataaba ŋina ibusonokini ikes. Nai ituŋanan ŋini enupi neni ka Akuj, nyirumete ŋileec jik.”
45010001	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ! Agasi ayoŋ alotau kaŋ a daadaŋ atemar toiun ŋituŋa kaŋ! Elipit ayoŋ Akuj aŋuna kec!
45010002	Apedori ayoŋ aruwor esuuda kec atemar erae ikes ŋulu elelakinito anupit Akuj. Nai ibatara alelakinit kec.
45010003	Nyeyenete ikes epite ŋolo ituruwonorya Akuj ŋituŋa ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren keŋ ka ekatakis ikes akisyakin erot kec a ŋilopeyek; aŋun, apotu ikes nyecamut erot ŋolo ka Akuj ŋolo ituruwori ŋituŋa ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren keŋ.
45010004	Anerae adau Kristo ayaun ekisal ŋolo a Ŋikisila, ido nai ituŋanan ŋini enupit ituruworyo ŋini iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj.
45010005	Ŋuna ikamunito akiyookino alokiŋaren Akuj anakiwuapit Ŋikisila, abu Moses kigir ŋakiro nu, “Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini itiyae ŋuna icikakinito Ŋikisila, eyari a ŋun.”
45010006	Nai ŋuna ikamunito akiyookino alokiŋaren Akuj anakiwuapit anupit, igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Nyitema alotau kon, ŋae elosi kidiama nakuj?” (iŋes atemar aŋuna ka ayaun Kristo kwap.)
45010007	“Nyitema nabo daŋ, ŋae elosi Nakibois ŋina a ŋikatwak?” (iŋes atemar aŋuna ka ayaun Kristo alokatwak.)
45010008	Ŋuna irworosi Ŋakigireta ikes nu: “Eapiyete ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj aneni kon, alopon kon ka alotau kon” – ikes ŋuna ka anupit a ŋina ikilimonokini isua.
45010009	Ani kilimu ka akituk kon atemar, “Erae Yesu Ekapolon” ka tonup alotau kon atemar abu Akuj kiteyaru iŋes alokatwak, iiun iyoŋ.
45010010	Anerae ikinupit iwon alotai yok, ido ikituruwor ŋulu ikiyookino alokiŋaren Akuj; ikilimu iwon a ŋakitukwa yok, ido ikiun.
45010011	Ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, “Ŋinituŋanan enupi iŋes, nyirumete ŋileec jik.”
45010012	Anerae emam atyaketait eyai kidiŋ Ŋiyudayan ka ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan; erae Akuj apei ka erae Ekapolon a daadaŋ, ido iterereŋi nooi daadaŋ ŋulu ilipete neni keŋ.
45010013	Ikwapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Ŋinituŋanan ilipi alokiro a ŋolo ke Ekapolon, eiun.”
45010014	Nai ikokinete ikes ilipete neni keŋ ai, erae keriŋa nyenupa? Ikokinete ikes enupete ai, erae keriŋa nyiirara ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj? Nabo ikokinete ikes iirarete ai, erae pa kiserae ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj?
45010015	Ikokinio iserao ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ai, erae pa kiyakiyar ŋikiyakia? Ikwaŋinapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Ejok nooi abunore ŋina a ŋulu eyaunete Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak.”
45010016	Nai meere daadaŋ acamut Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak. Aŋun, abala ekadwaran Isaya ebe, “Ekapolon, ŋae enupi ŋakiro kosi?”
45010017	Aŋun nai, epedorete ŋituŋa akinup anakiirar ŋakiro ka epedorete akiirar analimonokin ŋakiro a Kristo.
45010018	Nai eŋita ayoŋ nu: erae mono kire atemar nyiirara ikes ŋakiro a? Kire apotu ikes kiirasi – ikwapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Apotu ŋakiro ŋuna erworosi ŋikiyakia kielakin akwap daadaŋ; apotu ŋakiro kec tonaŋa nakisaleta ŋuna ka akwap.”
45010019	Eŋita nabo ayoŋ nu: pa ayenete Ŋisirael apolou a ŋakiro a ŋun a? Arae Moses elope abu kisyau aboŋokin ebe: “Ebala Akuj, eketuruwori ayoŋ iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu iyakatar arakao neni a ŋulu emamukatar ebuku. Eketuruwori ayoŋ iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu iŋoikinito ebuku ŋolo ebaŋaaka ŋituŋa keŋ.”
45010020	Nyekuryana Isaya elimunit atemar, “Apotu ŋulu pa ekewarito ayoŋ okoryamut, abu ayoŋ otakanu neni a ŋulu pa ekeŋitasi ayoŋ.”
45010021	Nai arae a ŋuna a Ŋisirael abaakar Isaya ebe, ebala Akuj, “Ŋapakio daadaŋ abu ayoŋ ebaki ŋakan kaŋ neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyakakerito ka ŋulu akaŋerito ayoŋ.”
45011001	Eŋita nai ayoŋ atemar, abu Akuj toŋer ŋikeetuŋa a? Mam jik! Arae ayoŋ elope Esiraelit, lopapait ka Aburaam ka arae ŋolo anateker a Benjamin.
45011002	Nyeŋero Akuj ŋituŋa keŋ, ŋulu abu iŋes toseu anakisyakinet. Iyenete iyes ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta ŋuna edyekitor Eliya Akuj aŋuna keŋ itoroniyarit ŋituŋa a Isirael ebala,
45011003	“Ekapolon, adaut ŋituŋa lu akiar ŋikadwarak kon ka abwaŋabwaŋaasi ŋamuroeta kon, ayoŋ bon edoŋ ka iwarito ikes akiar ayoŋ.”
45011004	Aniboŋokinet abu Akuj tolimok Eliya? Abu toboŋok tema, “Adau ayoŋ akisidoŋ ŋikilyok ŋalipyo ŋakanikaarei aŋuna kaŋ ŋulu nyeryediko kilipa neni ka akuj a ŋina koŋinait, a ŋina enyaritae Baal.”
45011005	Ikote tokona daŋ nenipei: eyakasi ŋituŋa ŋidikudyo ŋulu adau Akuj aseun aŋuna ka ajokis keŋ.
45011006	Eseunit Akuj ikes kire aŋuna ka ajokis keŋ, meere aŋuna adaut ikes akitiya. Anerae kerae toseununuye Akuj ŋituŋa aŋuna a ŋiticisyo kec, pa kerae ajokis keŋ ŋina a kire.
45011007	Aŋakiro a ŋun, meere Ŋisirael daadaŋ apotu toryamut ibore ŋini ewarito, nai ŋidikudyo bon ŋulu abu Akuj toseu apotu toryamut; apotu ŋuluce kitogogoŋo ŋakyes towuout akiirar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
45011008	Ikwaŋinapei igiritere Nakigireta ebe, “Abu Akuj kitililimiyo ŋitai kec, kitabaŋaan ŋatameta kec. Akitodol tari tokona, nyepedorete ikes akiŋolikin a ŋakonyen kec kori akiirar a ŋaki kec.”
45011009	Ido ebala Daudi ebe, “Elipi ayoŋ neni ka Akuj toruwor ŋasuban kec ŋaunoi ŋuna isirumere ikes; elipi ayoŋ kisican Akuj ikes.
45011010	Elipi ayoŋ atemar kitumudukan Akuj ikes, ikotere nyiŋolikis ka tokudos ŋigurae kec jik anakiwokit ŋiboro aŋuna ka apitoonut kec.”
45011011	Eŋita nai ayoŋ atemar apaki ŋina aoliyoritotor Ŋiyudayan, apotu mono ikes torubakis eoliyorito jik a? Mam jik! Nai aŋuna asecitotor ikes, abu aiuno neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ikotere erakaakiata Ŋiyudayan aŋuna kec.
45011012	Abu asecit ŋina a Ŋiyudayan yau ŋarereŋisyo ŋuna alalak nakwap ka abu atwaniyar kec aiuno yau ŋarereŋisyo ŋuna alalak lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan. Etyaunete nai ŋarereŋisyo ai ŋina imarakinere Ŋiyudayan daadaŋ etya neni etya aruwor ŋikanupak a Kristo!
45011013	Ekesirwori tokona ayoŋ iyes ŋulu nyirae Ŋiyudayan, ikwaŋinapei araakar ayoŋ ekiyakia lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, enisakin ayoŋ nooi alotic kaŋ.
45011014	Acepaki apedori ainakin arakao lotuŋa kaŋ, Ŋiyudayan, ikotere aŋuna kaŋ toiunia Akuj ikes ŋice.
45011015	Anerae ŋina aŋerere ikes, aponi kituruworoe akwap ekone ŋolo ka Akuj. Ikokini nai ai apaki ŋina ecamunia Akuj Ŋiyudayan? Eyarunete ŋikatwak!
45011016	Ani keinakin Akuj anyilet ŋina ke ekiŋaren anamugati, erae nai amugati daadaŋ ŋina keŋ ka ani keinakin Akuj ŋataagor ŋuna ke ekitoe, erae ŋaten daŋ ŋuna keŋ.
45011017	Adaun abilanar ŋaten ŋace ŋuna ke ekitoe a ŋolo ka akimyet a ŋolo edupitae ka adaun akiderakin neni keŋ ateni ŋina ke ekitoe a ŋolo ka ariet, a ŋolopei erae ŋolo ka akimyet. Ikote iyes ŋulu nyiraakasi Ŋiyudayan ateni ŋina ke ekitoe a ŋolo ka ariet ka imorete tokona agogoŋu ka akiyar ŋina ileleba ŋina ke ekitoe a ŋolo edupitae, ŋolo erae Ŋiyudayan.
45011018	Aŋun nai, nyitemokino iyes isoloete Ŋiyudayan ŋulu abilanaritae ikwa ŋaten. Inisasi iyes aŋuna ainyo? Iraakasi iyes ŋaten ca; meere iyes igaŋito ŋataagor – ŋataagor ikigaŋito iyes.
45011019	Nai itemarete iyes, “Aponi tobilibilaarae ŋaten ikotere ikityeikis isua.”
45011020	Erae ŋun kire! Aponi tobilanarae ikes, anerae pa anupito, tosodi ikilunyokin iyes nen, anerae inupito. Nai nyiturokinosi a ŋun; akilo, itemokino toyakatar akerit.
45011021	Abu Akuj nyerimak Ŋiyudayan, ŋulu isikwaanitae ka ŋaten ŋuna lopeyek; itamete iyes atemar ikirimakini iŋes iyes a?
45011022	Anakiro a ŋun ikiyenuni epite ŋolo erimaania Akuj ka epite ŋolo ededeŋia. Ededeŋ iŋes aneni a ŋulu adaut atwakiar, nai erimaana aneni kus – erae kirubakis iyes iyakasi narimaanut keŋ. Nai ani pa kirubakis, ikibilaryo iyes daŋ.
45011023	Ŋiyudayan daŋ, ani keŋero ikes ŋakiro ŋuna nyenupitotor, iderakinio ikes nenipei paaran ayakasi; anerae epedori Akuj akiderakin ikes nabo.
45011024	Iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu nyirae Ŋiyudayan, ikote iyes ateni ŋina ebilaryo ŋina ke ekitoe a ŋolo ka ariet a ŋolopei erae ŋolo ka akimyet, ŋina ereikinio kiderakinae lokitoe ŋolo edupio ŋolo ka akimyet tari sek pa kitiyaeneneo ikoŋina. Ikote Ŋiyudayan ŋaten ŋuna ke ekitoe a lo a ŋolo edupio; iŋes atemar epatanikini Akuj nooi akiderakin ŋaten ŋun ŋuna ebilaritae pena lokitoe kec.
45011025	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, eya ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna ka akimunono ŋuna acamit ayoŋ iyes toyenut. Ikitojoŋoe nen iyes akitam atemar kori iosok iyes. Ikote ŋakiro ne: nyerae akisyaanua Ŋisirael a ŋice ŋinaruba, nai edaun anapaki a ŋina ecamuniata daadaŋ ŋulu eseunitae aneni a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋakiro ka Akuj.
45011026	Erae epite ŋol iŋes eiunotor Ŋisirael daadaŋ, ikwaŋina igiritere Nakigireta ebe, “Ebuni Ekaiunan alo Sion, tolema aronis daadaŋ aneni a ŋiletok a Yakobo.”
45011027	Ebala Akuj ebe, “Ikicamun ayoŋ ka ikes anakiro a nu apaki ŋina alemarya ayoŋ ŋasecisya kec.”
45011028	Aŋuna eŋeritotor Ŋiyudayan Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, eraakasi ikes ŋimoi ŋulu ka Akuj ikotere iyes ŋulu nyirae Ŋiyudayan. Nai aŋuna aseunia Akuj ikes, eraakasi ikes ŋikonei keŋ aŋuna atapapaa kec.
45011029	Anerae nyiloconokini Akuj ŋatameta keŋ alotooma ŋuna ikamunito ŋini adau iŋes aseun kori akiterereŋ.
45011030	Nai iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu nyirae Ŋiyudayan, ipotu koloŋ iyes toŋero Akuj; nai tokona iryamut akisyon ŋina ka Akuj, anerae apotu Ŋiyudayan toŋero Akuj.
45011031	Ikwaŋinapei, eŋerito tokona Ŋiyudayan Akuj; nai aŋuna ka akisyon a ŋina iryamut iyes, eryamunete ikes daŋ akisyon ŋina ka Akuj.
45011032	Anerae agoloki Akuj ŋituŋa daadaŋ tooma aŋerit ŋakiro keŋ, ikotere itoodikinia akisyon keŋ neni kec a daadaŋ.
45011033	Okoe, kelalaar nooi ebari ŋolo ka Akuj, epol nooi aosou ka ayenut keŋ! Ŋae epedori akitacaun ŋuna etubununui iŋes? Ŋae epedori ayenun ŋakiro ŋuna itiyae iŋes.
45011034	Ikwapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Ŋae eyeni ŋatameta ŋuna ke Ekapolon, ŋae epedori akitatamyanakin iŋes ŋakiro?
45011035	Ŋae mono ainaki idiobore neni keŋ, ikotere nai iŋes inyaŋari?”
45011036	Anerae abu iŋes tosub ŋiboro daadaŋ ka itorunito ŋiboro daadaŋ neni keŋ ka eyakasi aŋuna keŋ. Toyai apolou neni ka Akuj ŋikaru ka ŋikaru! Amen.
45012001	Aŋun nai, ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, aŋuna ka akisyon a ŋina apolon a ŋina ka Akuj neni yok, ekemaimai ayoŋ iyes: kituruwosi ŋawat kus amuronot ŋina eyari aŋuna ka Akuj, ŋina einakinitae neni keŋ ka ŋina italakarit iŋes. Erae ŋol epite ŋolo itemokino iyes kilipyata.
45012002	Nyirubakis itiyaete ŋuna itiyaete ŋituŋa ŋulu anakwap a na, nai tocamakisi Akuj kibelek ŋitai kus, ikiinak iyes ŋatameta ŋuna kitet. Ikotere nai iyes iyenunete acamit ŋina ka Akuj – ayenut ibore ŋini ejok ka ŋini italakarit iŋes ka ŋini iyookino.
45012003	Aŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina abu Akuj okoinak ayoŋ, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes daadaŋ atemar, nyitamete atemar kori ipolok iyes nooi, torae bo nyipolok. Nai torae ŋulu iyakatar ŋatameta ŋuna ecayete ka itemokino ŋinituŋanan aneni kus toyenu epite ŋolo eyakar iŋes alotyae a ŋolo ka anupit a ŋina einakinitae iŋes.
45012004	Ikiyakar iwon ŋinerin ŋulu alalak anakuwan ka apei ka eyakar ŋolokiner etic keŋ.
45012005	Ikwaŋinapei, iwon daŋ tari kikilalak, ikirae akuwan apei anakimorikina ka Kristo, ido ikirucokina iwon daadaŋ iwapei ikirae ŋinerin ŋulu egelegelya ŋulu ka akuwan ka apei.
45012006	Aŋun, itemokino iwon esitiyaete ŋainakineta yok ŋuna egelegelya alopite a ŋolo ikiinakinitor Akuj iwon anajokis keŋ. Ani kerae ainakinet yok akidwar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, itemokino iwon odwara alopite a ŋolo ka anupit a ŋina ikiyakar.
45012007	Ani kerae akitiyanakin, itemokino iwon etiyanakisi. Ani kerae akitatam, itemokino iwon etatama.
45012008	Ani kerae akisimukekin ŋuluce, itemokino iwon esimukekisi. Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini ipotonori ka arimao neni a ŋuluce, itemokino kitiya ka alakara. Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini erae ekarikon, itemokino kitiya ka alelakinit.
45012009	Kimyekisi amina torae ŋina emamukar ŋisoswae alotooma keŋ. Toŋero ŋuna aronok. Torubakisi iricito ŋuna ajokak.
45012010	Tominin make ejok ikwaŋina iraakatar ŋikaitotoi alotooma Kristo ka tolelakinito akitoodiunit akitopoloorit ŋuluce.
45012011	Kitiyata ka agogoŋu ka nyikalanyaka. Kitiyata etic ke Ekapolon a ŋitai a ŋulu einakina kire.
45012012	Kimyekisi akigeno kus ikiturubak iyes ilelyanete, kidaŋidaŋete alocan kus ka kilipete jwi jwi.
45012013	Tomora ŋiboro kus ka ŋikanupak ŋuluce ŋulu ekulyakaka ka toŋaununutu ŋituŋa ŋulugelae lorerya kus.
45012014	Kilipa Akuj kiterereŋ ŋulu ikisicanete iyes; ee, kilipa iŋes kiterereŋ; nyicenete ikes!
45012015	Tolakara kaapei ka ŋulu elakara, kigworo kaapei ka ŋulu igworosi.
45012016	Kiboiyoto ka ŋituŋa daadaŋ irae ŋipei. Nyiturosi, nai tocamutu ŋiticisyo ŋulu ka akitiditeuna. Nyitamete atemar kori iosok iyes.
45012017	Ani kitiya ituŋanan ŋuna aronok neni kus, nyinyaŋasi ka aronis. Kikatakisi iyes akitiya ŋuna ejoikinito ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
45012018	Kitiyata alowae kus ŋuna ipedorete, ikotere iboiyete ka ŋituŋa daadaŋ isilito.
45012019	Ŋikaakonei, nyinyaŋanarete jik, nai kimyekisi anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj kitiya ŋun. Anerae ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, “Ebala Ekapolon, ‘Erae akinyaŋanar ŋina kaŋ; ayoŋ elope enyaŋari.’ ”
45012020	Nai akilo kitiyaete ikwaŋina ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Ani kenyamit akoro ekonimoit, kisimuj; ani kenyamit akure, kitamat; anerae ani kitiya iyoŋ ikwaŋina, isurumi iyoŋ iŋes ŋileec.”
45012021	Kiurya ŋuna aronok nyikireut iyoŋ, nai toreu ikes kan ajokis.
45013001	Itemokino ŋinituŋanan tokerite ŋikapolok ŋulu ka apukan, anerae neni ka Akuj iŋes ebunitor apolou daadaŋ ka erae Akuj einakinit ikes apolou.
45013002	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini itepegi ŋikapolok ŋulu ipukato, itepegi iŋes ŋuna atubu Akuj ka daadaŋ ŋini itiyae ikoŋina, eyauni atubokino neni keŋ ka ilope.
45013003	Anerae nyeyaunete ŋikapolok akuryanu neni a ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna ajokak, nai eyaunete akuryanu neni a ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna aronok. Aŋun, ani kicamit iyoŋ akiboi emam akuryanit anituŋanan a ŋini ipukat, kitiya ŋuna ajokak ikotere ikituruwori iŋes iyoŋ ŋolo ijok aneni keŋ.
45013004	Anerae erae iŋes eketiyan ŋolo ka Akuj, ŋolo itiyae etic keŋ aŋuna ka akiŋarakin iyoŋ. Nai ani kitiya iyoŋ ŋuna aronok, itemokino tokuryaniar aneni keŋ, anerae eyakar iŋes apedor ŋinakisicanet iyoŋ. Erae iŋes eketiyan ŋolo ka Akuj ŋolo eyauni akisicanet ŋina ka anyunyura a ŋina ka Akuj neni a ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna aronok.
45013005	Aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun, itemokino iyes tokerito ŋikapolok ŋulu ka apukan – meere ca aŋuna ka akerit anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj bon, nai itemokino torae aŋuna ikilimokinitotor iyes ŋatameta kus daŋ.
45013006	Erae ŋakiro ŋunapei ŋun itacata iyes ocur daŋ, anerae itiyaete ŋikapolok aŋuna ka Akuj, apaki daadaŋ ŋina itiyaata etic ŋolo itemokino ikes kitiyata.
45013007	Inakisi ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋiboro ŋulu ebeiyarito neni kec: ocur neni a ŋulu ebeiyarit ocur, akerit neni a ŋulu ebeiyarit akerit ka akitopoloorit neni a ŋulu ebeiyarit apolou.
45013008	Kiuryasi nyemin amica adio kidiŋ kus ka ituŋanan ice – mati amica ŋina itemokino toyakatar – iŋes bon amina ŋuluce. Ŋini emina ituŋanan ŋinice, adau akiwuap Ŋikisila.
45013009	Ŋakiciketa ŋuna ebasi: “Nyilom, nyiar, nyikoko, nyikiburak ibore a ŋinicetuŋanan” ka ŋakiciketa ŋunace daadaŋ, eyakasi tooma Lokisil epei ŋolo ebala, “Tomina ekonikidunyet ikwaŋina iminar iyoŋ akonikuwan.”
45013010	Ituŋanan ŋini emina ekidunyet keŋ, nyitiyakini jik aronis neni keŋ. Amina nai, iŋes akiwuap Ŋikisila daadaŋ.
45013011	Nabo akilo, itemokino iyes kitiyata ŋun, anerae iyenete iyes apaki ŋina a tokona: adolu apaki ŋina itemokino iyes tokienyuniata anajo. Anerae aapuu nooi apaki ŋina ikiunere iwon akilo neni ekoni apaki ŋina ikigeunia akinup.
45013012	Aapuu akuwar alunyar, aapuu akiwalar. Ojoŋoto nai akitiya ŋiticisyo ŋulu ka akiryonut, olemutu ŋiboro ŋulu ikijiyo anakica.
45013013	Eboiyoto ejok ikwa ŋituŋa ŋulu eya nakica ŋina ka apaaran; olemasi adakanu kori emeret, olemasi amalao kori akiŋobel, olemasi ejiye kori arakao.
45013014	Nai tolemutu ŋiboro ŋulu ke ejiye ŋulu erae ŋulu a Yesu Kristo, ido tojoŋoto atamunit aseconu ŋina a ŋawat kus aŋuna ka akitiya ŋuna ecamito ikes akitiya.
45014001	Tocamutu ekile ŋolo epalag ananupit eyakaun neni kus, nai nyipeganakinosi ka iŋes anakiro a ŋuna erae ŋatameta keŋ a elope.
45014002	Ecamakini anupit a ituŋanan a ice ilope akinyam ibore daadaŋ, nai ituŋanan ŋini epalag ananupit, eŋeri iŋes akinyam akiriŋ.
45014003	Nyitemokino ituŋanan ŋini enyami ibore daadaŋ isoloe ŋini nyenyami daadaŋ; aso ŋini eŋerit akinyam akiriŋ, nyitemokino etubokini ŋini enyami ibore daadaŋ, anerae acamu Akuj iŋes.
45014004	Ŋae iyoŋ itubokini eketiyan a ituŋanan a ice? Erae ekapolon keŋ etyakuni erae kibusokina iŋes kori kilounit; elosi iŋes akiloun, anerae Ekapolon iŋes epedori akisiloun iŋes.
45014005	Etami ituŋanan ice atemar eyai akoloŋit ŋina epol akilo ŋunace, nai etami ice atemar ikwaan ŋirwa daadaŋ. Itemokino ŋinituŋanan kiwuap ŋuna ebasi ŋatameta keŋ ejokak.
45014006	Ituŋanan ŋini itopoloorit akoloŋit ace, itiyae ŋun anakerit Ekapolon. Iŋes daŋ ŋini enyami ibore daadaŋ, itiyae ŋun anakerit Ekapolon, anerae elakari iŋes neni ka Akuj aŋuna ka akimuj. Ŋini daŋ eŋeri akinyam ŋiboro ŋice, itiyae ŋun anakerit Ekapolon ka elakari iŋes neni ka Akuj.
45014007	Emam iwon ŋini eyari aŋuna keŋ bon, emam iwon ŋini etwani aŋuna keŋ bon.
45014008	Ani kikiyari iwon, ikiyari aŋuna ke Ekapolon, ka ani kikitwaka, ikitwaki aŋuna ke Ekapolon. Tari nai kikiyari kori kikitwaka, ikirae iwon ŋulu ke Ekapolon.
45014009	Anerae abu Kristo totwan ka toyaru aŋuna ka aruwor Ekapolon a ŋulu eyarete ka ŋulu atwak.
45014010	Kaanukiro nai etubonokiniata ŋice kus ŋuluce? Ka kaanukiro isolooto ŋice kus ŋuluce? Ikilosi iwon daadaŋ akiwo alokiŋaren Akuj, ikitubok iŋes iwon.
45014011	Anerae ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, “Ebala Ekapolon, ikwaŋina eraakar kire atemar ayari ayoŋ, ikoni nenipei atemar eryediki ŋinituŋanan alokiŋaren kaŋ, ka elimori ŋinituŋanan atemar ayoŋ arae Akuj.”
45014012	Isisauni nai ŋinituŋanan alotooma yok ŋakiro keŋ a ilope alokiŋaren Akuj.
45014013	Aŋun nai, ojoŋoto atubonokin make. Nai ŋuna itemokino iwon otyakutu akitiya nu: nyitemokino akitiya idiobore ŋini isigukini lokaato yok ananupit keŋ kori ŋini itolomari iŋes nasecit.
45014014	Ayeni ka eketoodikinit ayoŋ Ekapolon Yesu atemar emam ibore ŋini nyeseg alotooma keŋ bon, nai ani kenup ituŋanan atemar nyeseg icebore, eruwor nai ibore ŋin ŋini nyeseg aneni keŋ.
45014015	Ani kitakadak iyoŋ lokaato kon aŋuna a ibore a ŋini inyami iyoŋ, ido nyenyami iŋes, iŋes atemar nyeriŋa nai iyoŋ itiyae ŋuna ka amina. Nyimyek akimuj ŋina imuji iyoŋ emunaiyari ituŋanan ŋini abunio Kristo totwania!
45014016	Nyimyek ibore ŋini ibala iyoŋ ejok eryamuni ekiro ŋolo aronon.
45014017	Anerae meere Apukan ka Akuj ŋina ca imujere ka emasere, nai erae ŋina ka akiyookino ka ŋina ke ekisil ta ŋina ka alelyan a ŋina ikiinakinit Etau ŋolo Asegan.
45014018	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini itiyanakini Kristo alopite a ŋol, elakar Akuj aŋuna keŋ ka itojokete ŋituŋa etic keŋ.
45014019	Aŋun nai, itemokino iwon jwi jwi ekatakisi akitiya ŋuna eyaunete ekisil ka ŋuna ikiŋarakinete akitogogoŋo make.
45014020	Nyinyasut aŋuna ka akimuj ŋuna adau Akuj akitiya. Epedoryo ŋamuja daadaŋ akimuj, nai erono akimuj ibore ŋini itolomari ituŋanan ŋinice nasecit.
45014021	Ŋuna itemokino akitiya ikes ŋuna ka akimyekin akinyam akiriŋ kori akimat ŋagwe kori akitiya ŋinibore daadaŋ ŋini isigukini lokaato kon ananupit keŋ.
45014022	Kiricite nai ŋuna inupit iyoŋ aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun, erae ŋuna kon bon ka Akuj. Elakara ituŋanan ŋini nyitusubuna ekasecan itiyae ŋuna ebala ejokak!
45014023	Nai ani keŋayaŋayat ituŋanan aŋuna ka akimuj a ŋina imuji iŋes, etubokini Akuj iŋes apaki ŋina imuja iŋes akimuj ŋin, anerae nyitiyae iŋes ŋuna elimokinit anupit keŋ iŋes; ido ibore daadaŋ ŋini eŋerit ŋuna elimunit anupit, erae asecit.
45015001	Itemokino iwon ŋulu ikigogoŋ ananupit eŋaranakinete ŋulu epalag, egaŋakisi ikes anatyokisyo kec. Nyitemokino iwon ikitiyae ŋuna ikitalakarete iwon make.
45015002	Akilo, itemokino ŋinituŋanan aneni yok kitiya neni ke ekanupan ibore ŋini ajokan ŋini italakari iŋes, ikotere kitogogoŋ iŋes ananupit.
45015003	Anerae pa abu Kristo kitiya ŋuna etalakarito iŋes bon. Nai akilo, ebala Daudi aŋuna keŋ alotooma Ŋakigireta ebe, “Apotu neni kaŋ ŋiyany ŋulu ikiyanyata ikes iyoŋ Akuj.”
45015004	Ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta, aponi kigirae aŋuna ka akitatamya iwon, ikotere ikiryamuni akigeno anatitinyu ka anakimukekin ŋuna ikiinakinete Ŋakigireta iwon.
45015005	Elipi ayoŋ Akuj, ŋina erae alope atitinyu ka akimukekinit toyakaunotor alokidiŋ kus akimorikina ŋina ajokan anakiwuapit akitoodikinet ŋina a Kristo.
45015006	Ido nai topedosi akipuro kaapei a etoil a epei Akuj ŋina erae Papa ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
45015007	Tocamuna nai make, aŋuna ka akitopoloor Akuj, ikwapei adaunia Kristo acamun iyes.
45015008	Anerae akalimokini ayoŋ iyes atemar abu Kristo toruwor eketiyanakinan aneni a Ŋiyudayan kitoodiunia atemar erae ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ŋuna a kire, isiyoonokini iŋes ŋakiikineta keŋ neni atapapaa.
45015009	Etiyae iŋes ŋun ikotere ipurete ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan Akuj aŋuna ka akisyon keŋ. Ikwaŋina igiritere Nakigireta ebe; “Aŋun, eketalakari ayoŋ iyoŋ aneni a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan. Ayeikini ayoŋ, ido epur ekiro kon.”
45015010	Igiritae nabo Nakigireta ebe, “Tolakaros iyes ŋulu nyirae Ŋiyudayan, kaapei ka ŋituŋa ka Akuj ŋulu seuna!”
45015011	Igiritae nabo Nakigireta ikona: “Kipuro Ekapolon, iyes daadaŋ ŋulu nyirae Ŋiyudayan; kipuro iŋes ŋituŋa daadaŋ.”
45015012	Ebala nabo Isaya ekadwaran ebe, “Ebuni eletonit ŋolo a Yese, itopolooryo iŋes kipuka ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ka iwuakinete ikes akigeno kec neni keŋ.”
45015013	Elipi ayoŋ Akuj, ŋina erae alope akigeno; kilelebik neni kus alelyanu ka ekisil alotooma anupit kus; ikotere torubak akigeno kus iyata anapedor a ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan.
45015014	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ: ayeni ayoŋ elope atemar ileleba ajokis neni kus ka daŋ ileleba aosou neni kus, ido ipedorete akitatama make.
45015015	Nai eyakasi ŋakiro ŋace ŋuna eketatamunit ayoŋ iyes anabaruwa a na emam akuryanu. Ikimamukar ayoŋ akuryanu aŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina abu Akuj okoinak ayoŋ.
45015016	Aruwor ayoŋ eketiyan ŋolo a Yesu akitiya aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan. Etiyae ayoŋ ikwa esacaradoti analimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna eponito aneni ka Akuj, ikotere nai ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan eruworosi amuronot ŋina ecamunit Akuj, ŋina etojok Akuj nooi alotooma Etau ŋolo Asegan.
45015017	Anakimorikina nai ka Yesu Kristo, apedori ayoŋ akiturokin, anerae etiyae etic ŋolo ka Akuj.
45015018	Erwori ayoŋ emam akuryanu, ido alimuni ŋuna etiya Kristo aneni kaŋ, ŋuna ka akirik ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan tokera Akuj. Apotu ŋun kitiyakinos alotooma alimonokin ka ŋiticisyo,
45015019	alotooma ŋakitoodikineta ka ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna apolok ka anapedor a ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan. Aŋun, abu ayoŋ erim nooi, ameun alo Yerusalem tari neni enyaritae Illirikom ka adau a nen akiserakin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna a Kristo.
45015020	Ŋuna alelakinit ayoŋ jwi jwi, ikes ŋuna ka akiserakin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak anakiboisyo a ŋuna eriŋa ŋituŋa nyiirara ŋakiro a Kristo, ikotere nyarubak erworo ŋakiro ŋuna aris ituŋanan ice kegeu.
45015021	Ikwaŋina igiritere Nakigireta ebe, “Ikes ŋulu ŋinapei pa alimokinitae ŋakiro keŋ, iŋolikinete ka ikes ŋulu eriŋa nyiirara ŋuna keŋ, eyenunete.”
45015022	Aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun, aponi ekeretanakin ayoŋ ŋarwa ŋuna alalak abunore neni kus.
45015023	Nai tokona aŋuna erikakinia ayoŋ etic kaŋ anakiboisyo a nu ka ikwaŋinapei eitanitor ayoŋ ŋikaru ŋulu alalak aanyun iyes;
45015024	egeno ayoŋ aanyun iyes. Acamit akitorun neni kus alosi Sipania, ikotere daŋ ikiŋarakis iyes ayoŋ alosit inaa, kedaun iwon akiboi kaapei ka alelyan apaki ŋina euruwuana.
45015025	Nai alosi mono ayoŋ Yerusalem akiya ŋainakineta ŋadi aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj aina.
45015026	Anerae adaut Ŋikristo ŋulu alo Makedonia ka ŋulu ka Akaia alakar alemun ŋainakineta aŋuna a ŋikulyak alokidiŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu eya Yerusalem.
45015027	Erae ŋakiro ŋun ŋuna apotu ikes ŋilopeyek totubut akitiya. Erae tari amica aneni kec aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋul. Anerae ikwapei adauniata Ŋiyudayan akimor ka ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋarereŋisyo ŋuna ka Akuj, itemokino ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan daŋ tomora ka Ŋiyudayan ŋarereŋisyo ŋuna a ŋiboro ka akwap.
45015028	Ani nai kadau ayoŋ akirikakin etic ŋol, ainakin ikes ŋainakineta ŋuna ecunakinio, etoruni nai neni kus alosi Sipania.
45015029	Ayeni ayoŋ atemar apaki ŋina abunio ayoŋ neni kus, ayauni ŋarereŋisyo aŋuna a Kristo, ido omora.
45015030	Ekemaimai ayoŋ iyes ŋikaitotoi kaŋ atemar, aŋuna ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo ka aŋuna ka amina a ŋina ikiinakinit Etau ŋolo ka Akuj emorikinos oŋirikisi akilip Akuj aŋuna kaŋ.
45015031	Elipa, ikotere oiun ayoŋ alotuŋa a ŋulu alo Yudaya a ŋulu nyenupito ka daŋ ikotere tocamut ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj alo Yerusalem ŋuna etiyae ayoŋ.
45015032	Tosodi nai, kerae acamit ŋina ka Akuj, abuni ka alelyan ka eeŋu apaki ŋina ayakar ayoŋ neni kus.
45015033	Toyai neni kus daadaŋ Akuj ŋina erae alope ekisil. Amen.
45016001	Acamit ayoŋ alimokin iyes atemar erae nakaato yok Poibe, ŋina itiyae etic ŋolo ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Kenikerea, ituŋanan ŋini ajokan.
45016002	Kijautu iŋes alokiro ke Ekapolon, lopite ŋolo itemokino ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj itiyaete ka inakisi iŋes akiŋarakinet daadaŋ ŋina iitani iŋes aneni kus; anerae abu iŋes kiŋarak ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak, ekeŋarak tari ayoŋ.
45016003	Kimalakinae Prisika ka Akwila, ŋulu ikitiyae ka ayoŋ etic ŋolo a Yesu Kristo;
45016004	ajalito ikes akiyar kec aŋuna kaŋ. Alakara ayoŋ nooi neni kec – meere nai ayoŋ bon, elakara tari Ŋikristo daadaŋ ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
45016005	Kimalata tari Ŋikristo ŋulu iryamiryameneneete kai kec. Kimalakinae Epaeneto lokone kaŋ ŋolo erae iŋes ageuni akinup ŋakiro a Kristo anakwap a Asia.
45016006	Kimalakinae Maria ŋina itiyae etic aŋuna kus.
45016007	Kimalakinae tari Andoroniko ka Yunia, ŋulu erae Ŋiyudayan ikwa ayoŋ, ŋulu aponi toenae kaapei ka ayoŋ. Erwoko ikes nooi alokiyakia ka apotu toruworos Ŋikristo eriŋa ayoŋ.
45016008	Kimalakinae Ampliato lokone kaŋ ŋolo minat anaraakau ŋipei aneni ke Ekapolon.
45016009	Kimalakinae tari Urubano ŋolo ikitiyae ka ayoŋ etic a Kristo; kimalata tari lokone kaŋ ŋolo minat Sitaku.
45016010	Kimalakinae Apele ŋolo adaun aripun atemar emina kire Kristo. Kimalakinae ŋituŋa ŋulu ke ere ka Arisitobulo.
45016011	Kimalakinae Erodio ŋolo erae Eyudayat ikwa ayoŋ ka ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu ke ekal a Narikiso, ŋulu emorikin ke Ekapolon.
45016012	Kimalakinae Turupena ka Turuposa, ŋuna itiyaete etic ke Ekapolon ka nakone kaŋ Peresi, ŋina itiyae etic ŋolo alalan ŋolo ke Ekapolon.
45016013	Kimalakinae Rupus, Ekristoit ŋolo eyenen alotic ke Ekapolon ka toto keŋ ŋina ekeuryarit ayoŋ ikwa lokoku keŋ.
45016014	Kimalakinae Asunikirito, Pelego, Erime, Patiroba ka Erima ta ŋikaitotoi ŋulu Kristayon daadaŋ ŋulu erukito ka ikes.
45016015	Kimalakinae Pilologo ka Yulia, Nereo ka nakaato keŋ Olumpa, ta ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj daadaŋ ŋulu erukito ka ikes.
45016016	Kimalas itunasi make itoodiunito atemar iminin. Ikimalaete iyes Ŋikristo daadaŋ.
45016017	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, ekemaimai ayoŋ iyes atemar tocoikis ŋulu etyakatyakaete ŋituŋa, ido kitooliyosi ananupit kec; ŋulu eŋerito ŋakiro ŋuna aponi ikitatami iyes. Tocoito irukete ka ikes!
45016018	Anerae nyerae Kristo itiyanakinete ŋituŋa ŋulu ikote ŋul, nai itiyanakinete etic ŋolo ka akiwarit akimuj. Irworosi ikes ŋakiro ŋuna abobok, kirapirapete ŋituŋa alorwor kec ecamito amodikin ŋituŋa ŋulu epalag!
45016019	Eirasi ŋituŋa daadaŋ epite ŋolo iwuapitotor iyes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ka alakara ayoŋ nooi ikotere iyes. Acamit ayoŋ iyes toosok, toyenete ibore ŋini ejok ka tomam ŋuna ikikamunito anakiro a ŋuna aronok.
45016020	Ido eapi Akuj ŋina erae alope ekisil, ainakin iyes apedor akipicar Satan a ŋakejen kus. Toyai neni kus ajokis ŋina ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
45016021	Ikimalae iyes Timoteo ŋolo ikitiyae ka ayoŋ, ikimalae tari Lukio, Yason tari Sosipatiro, ŋulu erae Ŋiyudayan ikwa ayoŋ.
45016022	Ayoŋ Teretio ŋolo ekesigiritae abaruwa na, ekemalae iyes alokiro ke Ekapolon.
45016023	Ikimalae Gaio ŋolo eketepeyonit ayoŋ, ŋolo erae kai keŋ iryamiryameneneete Ŋikristo. Ikimalat iyes Erasto ŋolo erae ekeŋadan ŋisiliŋa ŋulu ke etaun alo ka lokaatokosi Kwarito.[
45016024	Toyai neni kus a daadaŋ ajokis ŋina ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo. Amen.]
45016025	Oinakisi akipuro neni ka Akuj! Epedori iŋes akiturubakin iyes inupito alopite a ŋolo a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak a ŋuna a Yesu Kristo, ŋuna etatami ayoŋ ka alopite a ŋolo ka akitoodikinet a ŋakiro a ŋuna koloŋ emunonitae.
45016026	Nai tokona esileereun ŋakiro ŋun a Nakigireta a ŋikadwarak ka eteyenikin lotuŋa a ŋibukui a daadaŋ lopite ŋolo icikakinitor Akuj ŋina nyesaluni; ikotere tonupa ka kiwuapa daadaŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
45016027	Toyai apolou ŋina nyedaun alotooma Yesu Kristo neni ka Akuj, a ŋina erae iŋes bon eos nooi! Amen.
46001001	Ayoŋ Paulo ŋolo akanyarau Akuj aŋuna ka acamit keŋ aruwor ekiyakia ŋolo a Yesu Kristo ka Sostene lokaato yok,
46001002	ikigirit abaruwa na neni ka atukot a Ŋikristo a ŋina eyai Korinto: neni kus a ŋulu ikityakunitae anakimorikina ka Yesu Kristo, ŋulu ikinyarae aruwor ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj, kaapei ka ŋulu daadaŋ ilipete anakiboisyo a daadaŋ alokiro a Yesu Kristo Ekapolon yok, a ŋolo erae Ekapolon kec ka ŋolo yok.
46001003	Toyai neni kus ajokis ka ekisil aneni ka Akuj Papa yok ka aneni ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo.
46001004	Alakara ayoŋ neni ka Akuj kaŋ jwi jwi aŋuna kus, aŋuna ikiinia iŋes iyes ajokis alotooma Yesu Kristo.
46001005	Anerae anakimorikina kus ka Kristo, iryamut iyes alopitesyo a daadaŋ erwor ka ayenut daadaŋ.
46001006	Igogoŋioto iyes anakiro a ŋuna a Kristo a ŋuna aponi isua ikiteyenikin iyes.
46001007	Aŋun, emam ainakinet ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan ŋina nyiryamunito iyes eriŋa idarito kitoodiunae Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo anapolou keŋ.
46001008	Erubakini iŋes ikitogogoŋit iyes ananupit kus tari nasalunet, ikotere itoryamun iyes emam ŋuna ikisitakinere Akoloŋit ŋina ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
46001009	Ikinyoma Akuj ŋina adau anyarare iyes nakimorikina ka Lokoku keŋ, Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
46001010	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ! Ekemaimai ayoŋ iyes alokiro a Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo, atemar tocamunos make alorwor kus tomam atyakatyaka alokidiŋ kus, nai toraakas ŋulu imorikina anatameta ka ananupit kus.
46001011	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, akalimokis ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu a Kilowe atemar iburaete iyes make.
46001012	Ŋuna ayeni ayoŋ aneni kus ikes nu: irworo ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kus ebala, “Arae ayoŋ ŋini a Paulo”, kori “Arae ayoŋ ŋini ka Apolo”, kori “Arae ayoŋ ŋini a Petero”, kori “Arae ayoŋ ŋini a Kristo.”
46001013	Ketyakatyakae mono Kristo a? Arae mono Paulo aponi kibubukinoe lomusalaba aŋuna kus a? Kori aponi ikibatisae iyes alokiro a Paulo?
46001014	Alakara ayoŋ neni ka Akuj, anerae nyibatisa ayoŋ idiotuŋanan alokidiŋ kus, mati Kirispo ka Gaio.
46001015	Aŋun, emam ituŋanan ŋini itemokino tolimu atemar aponi ikibatisae iyes alokiro kaŋ.
46001016	(Ikwa kire abu ebatisa tari ŋituŋa a Stepana; nyayeni erae kebatisat icetuŋanan.)
46001017	Anerae abu Kristo nyekeyakiya ayoŋ akibatis, nai alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak; meere ka aosou a ituŋanan, ikotere nyeruwor atwanare ŋina a Kristo alomusalaba akoŋinait.
46001018	Anerae akirot ŋina ke emusalaba erae abaŋao aneni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ebukoro, nai aneni yok a ŋulu ikiiun erae apedor ŋina ka Akuj.
46001019	Igiritae Nakigireta atemar, “Amunaari ayoŋ aosou a ŋikaosok ka etoŋopiari ayenut a ŋulu ayenak. ”
46001020	Ai mono alokiŋaren Akuj eyai ituŋanan ŋini aoson? Ai eyai ituŋanan ŋini eyeni? Ai eyai eketepegan anakwap a na? Nyeanyuwara tokona iyes epite ŋolo etabaŋaaniarya Akuj aosou ŋina ka akwap a na a?
46001021	Ŋinapei koloŋ, abu Akuj anaosou keŋ nyecamak ŋituŋa ayenun iŋes anaosou kec, nai abu Akuj tolakar tocamu aiun ŋulu enupete anakiro a ŋuna ikilimonokin iwon, a ŋuna erae abaŋao aneni a ŋituŋa.
46001022	Iitanito Ŋiyudayan ŋakujuwuanisya kiwarito Ŋigirik aosou.
46001023	Nai tolimonokinetei bo isua ŋuna a Kristo a ŋolo aponi kibubukinoe, ŋolo erae akigukinet ananupit aneni a Ŋiyudayan ka ŋolo erae abaŋao alotuŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan.
46001024	Nai neni a ŋulu adau Akuj anyarare, kerae Ŋiyudayan kori Ŋigirik, erae Kristo apedor ka aosou ŋina ka Akuj.
46001025	Anerae ibore ŋini esibit abaŋao ŋina ka Akuj alotuŋa, eos nooi akilo aosou ŋina a ŋituŋa ka nabo ibore ŋini esibit apalagu ŋina ka Akuj alotuŋa, egogoŋ nooi akilo agogoŋu ŋina a ŋituŋa.
46001026	Ŋikaitotoi, totamakisi mono iyes atemar ataŋae iyes ŋulu ikinyara Akuj; ekudyoko ŋulu esyomito nooi alokidiŋ kus alopite a ŋolo ka akwap, ekudyoko ŋulu erae ŋikepukak kori ŋulu idounitoe alokalya a ŋikarwok.
46001027	Nai abu Akuj toseu ŋulu etami akwap atemar ebaŋaaka, ikotere kisirumia ŋulu aosok ŋileec, abu Akuj toseu ŋulu etami akwap atemar epalag, ikotere kisirumia ŋulu agogoŋok ŋileec.
46001028	Abu Akuj toseu ŋulu ejamuwarit akwap, ikotere ituruwori ŋulu itopolooro ŋikoŋinae.
46001029	Abu Akuj kitiya ŋun, ikotere nyiturokinor idiotuŋanan alokiŋaren keŋ.
46001030	Erae aŋuna keŋ iŋes iyakatar iyes nakimorikina ka Yesu Kristo ŋolo abu Akuj kituruwo aosou yok, akiyookino yok ka ikiruwor iwon ŋulu ikityakunitae aŋuna ka Akuj ka ŋulu ikilakuna.
46001031	Isiyookinito ŋun, ŋuna eya Nakigireta ebe, “Iŋes ŋini ituro, kiturokin aŋuna etiya Ekapolon.”
46002001	Ŋikaitotoi, apaki ŋina abunio ayoŋ neni kus alimonokin ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, ŋuna imunono pa erworo ayoŋ ebeli ŋakiro anapiiryanut kori anaosou.
46002002	Anerae abu ayoŋ otyaku atemar nyitemokino ayoŋ eketatam iyes idiobore, mati ŋuna a Yesu Kristo bon a ŋolo aponi kibubukinoe lomusalaba.
46002003	Apaki ŋin, ayai ayoŋ neni kus arae ituŋanan ŋini palag anakuryanu a ŋina apolon ka anamaran.
46002004	Ipotu iyes nyicamut ŋakiro kaŋ aŋuna ka aosou a ŋina a ŋituŋa, nai arae aŋuna abunio Akuj kitoodiu atemar erae ŋuna a kire anapedor a ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj.
46002005	Abu ayoŋ olimonok ikoŋina, ikotere nyeruwor anupit kus ŋina ebunit anaosou a ŋituŋa, nai anapedor a ŋina ka Akuj.
46002006	Tari kikote nen, ikitatami isua ka aosou neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu epakito anatameta kec tari pa kerae aosou na ŋina ka akwap a na, kori ŋina a ŋikepukak a ŋulu ka akwap a na a ŋulu esaluni apolou kec.
46002007	Nai ikitatami isua iyes aosou ŋina ka Akuj ŋina imunono ŋina iwuaitae. Eriŋa tari akwap nyesubuna, keris Akuj ketyaku atemar itemokino iwon omora ka iŋes apolou keŋ.
46002008	Amam tari ŋikepukak ŋulu ka akwap a na ŋulu ayenete ŋun, amam tari epei daŋ; kerae toyenunito, pa kibubukinito Ekapolon ŋolo ka apolou.
46002009	Ikwaŋina igiritere Nakigireta ebe, “Ibore ŋini nyiŋolikina ŋakonyen, kori nyiirara ŋaki, kori nyetama ŋatameta a ŋituŋa, erae ibore ŋin ŋini abu Akuj kitemok aŋuna a ŋulu eminasi iŋes.”
46002010	Nai adau Akuj akitoodikin isua ŋun alotooma Etau keŋ. Eripiripi Etau ŋakiro daadaŋ, tari ŋuna iwuaitae ŋuna ka Akuj.
46002011	Ŋae alotuŋa eyeni ŋatameta a ŋuluce? Etau a ituŋanan ŋolo eyai tooma keŋ, iŋes bon eyeni. Ikwaŋinapei, emam ituŋanan eyeni ŋatameta ŋuna ka Akuj mati Etau ŋolo ka Akuj.
46002012	Nai aryamun isua Etau ŋolo ebunit aneni ka Akuj, meere ŋolo ka akwap, ikotere oyenuniata ibore daadaŋ ŋini ikiinak isua Akuj ikoŋin.
46002013	Aŋun nai, ikilimonokini isua ŋakiro ŋun alopite a ŋolo itatamya Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, meere alopite a ŋolo itatamyata ŋituŋa anaosou kec, nai lopite ŋolopei ikilimonokinia isua ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ikwa ecamitor Etau keŋ.
46002014	Ituŋanan ŋini emamukar Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, nyecamuni ŋakiro ŋuna ke Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj, anerae erae ŋun abaŋao aneni keŋ; ido nyepedori ayenun ikes, anerae epedorosi ŋun ayenun anakiŋarakinet a ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj bon.
46002015	Ituŋanan ŋini eyakar Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, epedori ayenun aronis ka ajokis a ŋinibore a daadaŋ, nai emam ŋini epedori ayenun aronis ka ajokis keŋ.
46002016	Igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Ŋae ayenu ŋatameta ŋuna ke Ekapolon Akuj, ŋae epedori akitatam Akuj?” Nai ikiyakar isua ŋatameta ŋuna a Kristo.
46003001	Ŋikaitotoi, pa apedorit ayoŋ akisirwor iyes ikwa ŋituŋa ŋulu ipukat Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, nai ikwa ŋituŋa ŋulu ipukato ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka aseconu; ikote iyes ŋidwe ŋulu cicik ananupit kus Kristo.
46003002	Abu ayoŋ eketan iyes a ŋakile, meere ka akimuj a ŋina agogoŋon, anerae ariŋa iyes idisyak. Tari tokona daŋ eriŋa iyes ikote nenipei,
46003003	anerae eriŋa ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka aseconu ikipukato iyes. Anerae ani keyai arakao ka ebura kidiŋ kus, nyitoodiunito nai ŋun atemar ikipukato ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka aseconu ka ikwaan iyes ka ŋituŋa ŋuluce a?
46003004	Anerae kelimu ipei tema, “Arae ayoŋ ŋini a Paulo”, tema ice, “Arae ayoŋ ŋini ka Apolo”, nyikote nai iyes ŋituŋa ŋuluce ŋulu nyipukat Etau ŋolo ka Akuj a?
46003005	Nyo mono ca Apolo? Ka nyo erae Paulo? Ikirae isua ŋiketiyak ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu apotu ikitunupa iyes, ikwaŋina ekorakinitor Ekapolon ŋinituŋanan ekeetic.
46003006	Abu ayoŋ odupak ekinyomit, tobukok Apolo ŋakipi; nai Akuj iŋes etopolouni.
46003007	Aŋun nai, emam apolou eyai neni a ŋini adupan kori neni a ŋini abukon ŋakipi, nai eyai neni ka Akuj bon a ŋina itopoloe ŋinibore.
46003008	Ikwaan ituŋanan ŋini edupi ka ŋini ebuki ŋakipi ka eryamuni ŋinituŋanan aneni ka Akuj eropit lotyae ŋolo ke etic keŋ.
46003009	Anerae ikitiyae isua kaapei ka Akuj. Irae iyes emanikor ŋolo ka Akuj. Iraakasi daŋ Akai ka Akuj.
46003010	Aŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina abu Akuj okoinak ayoŋ, abu etiya ikwa ekadukon ŋolo aoson, odukok akisyakinet ŋina ka akai, ido eduki ituŋanan ice akai ŋin. Nai itemokino ŋinituŋanan tocoikinete epite ŋolo edukyo akai ŋin.
46003011	Anerae emam akisyakinet ace ŋina epedori idiotuŋanan abokakin akilo ŋina erae Yesu Kristo.
46003012	Edukete ŋituŋa ŋice nakisyakinet ŋin a egolid, esilipa kori a ŋamoru a ŋuna epol egyelit; ŋice edukete a ŋakito, a ŋanya kori a eoot.
46003013	Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon, isileereunio etic a ŋinituŋanan alotooma akim, anerae ikatakinio ka akim ibore ŋini edukitor iŋes.
46003014	Ani pa kenomiya akim ibore ŋini kedukokinit ituŋanan ŋin nakisyakinet, eryamuni iŋes eropit.
46003015	Ani kenomiya akim ibore ŋini kedukokinit iŋes nakisyakinet, nyeryamuni ituŋanan ŋin eropit, nai eiun iŋes ikwa ituŋanan ŋini abucun anakim.
46003016	Nyiyenete mono iyes atemar iraakasi iyes Akai ka Akuj ka eyai Etau ŋolo ka Akuj tooma kus a?
46003017	Ituŋanan ŋini emunaari Akai ka Akuj, emunaari Akuj iŋes daŋ, anerae erae Akai ka Akuj ŋina keŋ bon ka iyes pei iraakasi Akai keŋ.
46003018	Nyitemokino idiotuŋanan emodikin bon. Ani ketami idiotuŋanan alokidiŋ kus atemar aos iŋes alopitesyo a ŋulu ka akwap a na, itemokino iŋes tobaŋaan, ikotere nai eruwor ŋini aoson kire.
46003019	Anerae aosou ŋina ka akwap a na, erae abaŋao alokiŋaren Akuj. Ikwaŋina igiritere Nakigireta ebe, “Ikamununui Akuj ŋikaosok anaosou kec”
46003020	ka ebasi Ŋakigireta aiwace, “Eyeni Ekapolon Akuj atemar erae ŋatameta a ŋikaosok ŋakoŋinae.”
46003021	Aŋun nai, nyitemokino iyes iturokinotor idiotuŋanan. Erae ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu kus;
46003022	kerae Paulo, Apolo kori Petero; kerae akwap na, akiyar kori atwanare, kerae ŋuna a tokona kori ŋuna a rwanu. Erae daadaŋ ŋulu kus;
46003023	nai iraakasi iyes ŋulu a Kristo ka erae Kristo ŋolo ka Akuj.
46004001	Itemokino iyes toyenete atemar ikirae isua ŋiketiyak ŋulu a Kristo, ŋulu adau Akuj ainakin apolokin etic ŋolo ka akisera ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna imunono.
46004002	Ibore ŋini iitana aloketiyan a ŋolo epolokinit etic, iŋes akikinyoma alokiŋaren ekapolon keŋ.
46004003	Anapolokinit kaŋ etic, nyamitakinit ayoŋ epite ŋolo etubonokiniata ŋituŋa. Emam tari nyatubonokin ayoŋ bon.
46004004	Emam idiobore ŋini ayeni ayoŋ atemar asecit, nai nyitoodiunito ŋun atemar emam ŋuna akatubokinere ayoŋ, Akuj ŋina erae Ekapolon a daadaŋ, iŋes akatubokini ayoŋ.
46004005	Aŋun, nyitubokis idiotuŋanan eriŋa nyedoluno apaki ŋina itemokino, ŋina eboŋunio Ekapolon. Inwakuni Ekapolon ibore daadaŋ ŋini iwuaitae anakiryonut, itatakanuni ŋakiro ŋuna iwuaitae ŋuna a ŋitai a ŋituŋa. Eryamuni nai ŋinituŋanan akipuro ŋina ejoikinit toryamu aneni ka Akuj.
46004006	Aŋuna kus, ŋikaitotoi, adau ayoŋ akirwor ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ esitiyae Apolo ka ayoŋ erae akitaanyikinet. Etiya ayoŋ ŋun, ikotere toyenut aneni kosi apolou ŋina ka alimunet a ŋina ebala, “Totupa Ŋikisila ŋulu a kire.” Nyitemokino idio aneni kus iturokina aŋuna a ituŋanan a ipei, ido tojamuwa ŋinice.
46004007	Anerae anityaketait mono iyakar iyoŋ aneni a ŋuluce? Akuj iŋes ikiinakinit iyoŋ ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu iyakar iyoŋ. Ikokini nai iyoŋ ituro ai esibit nyerae ŋiboro ŋulu iyakar iyoŋ ainakinet?
46004008	Nai idaut kire iyes aryamun ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu iitanito a? Idaut iyes akibara a? Iruworosi iyes ŋirwosi emamukae isua a? Okoe kerae toraakas iyes ŋirwosi kire, kikirae isua daŋ ŋirwosi kaapei ka iyes!
46004009	Anerae atami ayoŋ atemar adau Akuj akituruwor isua Ŋikiyakia ŋulu ikidisyak akilo daadaŋ. Ikikokini isua ŋituŋa ŋulu etubokinitae atwanare alokiŋaren ŋimalaikan ka ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
46004010	Aŋuna a Kristo, ikirae isua ŋibaŋaanotin, nai iosok iyes anakimorikina ka Kristo! Ikipalag isua, nai igogoŋ iyes. Ikijamuwaritae isua, nai ikitopolooritae iyes!
46004011	Akitodol tokona daŋ, ikinyamit isua akoro ka akure; ikinapit isua ŋilowi ŋulu rocom; ikibuŋao ka ikimamukar ŋirerya.
46004012	Ikilelenyit isua aŋuna ka akitiya etic ŋolo ikiyarya isua ŋilopeyek. Ani ikicenio isua, ikiterereŋi ŋulu ikicenete isua; ani ikisicanio isua, ikititinyikini;
46004013	ani ikiyanyo isua, ikiboŋokini ikes anarimao. Ikiruwor isua ŋatunyeny alotuŋa, tari tokona ikirae isua agasiya ŋina ka akwap!
46004014	Nyekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes nu akisurumya ŋileec, nai akitatam iyes ikwa ŋidwe kaŋ ŋuluminan.
46004015	Tari kiyakatar iyes ŋiketatamak ŋulu alalak nooi ananupit kus Kristo, iyakatar iyes papa epei; anerae anakiyar kus iraakasi Ŋikristo, abu ayoŋ oruwor papa kus aŋuna ayaunia Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni kus.
46004016	Aŋun nai, ekemaimai iyes totupakis ŋuna etiyae ayoŋ!
46004017	A ŋakiro a ŋun, eyakuunit ayoŋ neni kus Timoteo lokoku kaŋ ŋolo minat alotooma Kristo ka erae ŋolo ekinyomit ayoŋ. Ikitatamuni iŋes iyes ŋipitesyo ŋulu atupit ayoŋ anakiyar kaŋ anakimorikina ka Yesu Kristo ikwapei etatamya ayoŋ natukon daadaŋ ŋuna a Ŋikristo anakwapin.
46004018	Eturokinosi ŋice alokidiŋ kus, anerae etamete ikes atemar kori nyabuni ayoŋ aanyun iyes.
46004019	Nai, abuni ayoŋ atipei aanyun iyes erae kerae acamit ŋina ke Ekapolon, ido nai oanyu ayoŋ elope apedor kire ŋina eyakatar ŋituŋa ŋulu eturok ŋul, akilo ŋuna irworosi ikes.
46004020	Anerae nyerae Apukan ka Akuj erworikituk, nai erae ŋina eyai apedor.
46004021	Nyaanu ŋuna icamito iyes? Itemokino mono ayoŋ obu neni kus ka adaset, kori a etau a ŋolo ka amina ka akiyapara.
46005001	Elimunitoe kire atemar eyai amalao kidiŋ kus ŋina aronon nooi, ŋina nyeryamun tari aneni a ŋulu nyenupito Akuj ŋina a kire. Anerae elimunitoe ebe eyai ekile ŋolo elomenene aberu a papa keŋ ŋinace!
46005002	Kaanukiro nai iturotor iyes? Kitemokino iyes kiyaloloŋete, nabo kitemokino ituŋanan ŋini itiyae ŋakiro ŋun, totyakarae anatukot kus.
46005003	-
46005004	Aneni kaŋ, adau ayoŋ alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu atubokin ŋini itiyae ŋun esibit kikirukit iyes ka ayoŋ alo Korinto, tari daŋ kalwana ayoŋ aneni kus, ikirukit iyes ka ayoŋ jik alotau kaŋ. Apaki ŋina itukokinotor iyes ka apedor a ŋina ke Ekapolon yok Yesu, ikirukit iwon kaapei alotau.
46005005	Itemokino iyes nai apaki ŋin kipotokis ituŋanan ŋin neni a Satan, ikotere kinyasunae akuwan keŋ, ido toiunae etau keŋ Akoloŋit ŋina ke Ekapolon.
46005006	Nyitemokino iyes iturosi! Nyiyenete mono iyes alimunet ŋina ebala, “Itubuunete ŋakinyalet ŋuna ekudyoko ŋakirya ŋuna alalak” a?
46005007	Itemokino tolemasi ŋakinyalet ŋuna ŋorok ŋuna erae asecit, kikwaanikinos ka amurat ŋina kitete ŋina emam ŋakinyalet, ikotere tosegut nai nooi ikwapei kire ayenia ayoŋ atemar ikote iyes neni. Anerae aponi Kristo ŋolo erae imesek ŋini a Paska toarae erae amuronot yok.
46005008	Nyikinumunum Paska yok a ŋamugati a ŋuna eya ŋakinyalet kec ŋuna ŋorok ŋuna ka asecit ka aronis, nai enumunuma a ŋamugati a ŋuna emam ŋakinyalet – ŋamugati ŋuna itesegunitae ka ŋuna a kire.
46005009	Anabaruwa a ŋina ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes, abu okolimok iyes aesikin arukit ka ŋituŋa ŋulu malaanotin.
46005010	Pa akalimokinit ayoŋ iyes atemar nyirukito ka ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae ŋikanupak ŋulu emalaaka, kori ŋulu erorokaka kori ŋulu ekokolaka kori ŋulu ilipete neni a ŋakujo a ŋace. Ani kerae olimunite ayoŋ ikoŋina, kitemokino iyes aesikin akwap na jik.
46005011	Nai ŋuna abu ayoŋ olimu ikes nu: nyirukito ka ituŋanan ŋini ebala arae iŋes lokaato alotooma Kristo, nai tomalaana kori tororokana kori kilipi neni a ŋakujo a ŋace kori tosyomar ŋuluce kori tomerana kori tokokolana. Nyimora tari ka ituŋanan ŋin akimuj.
46005012	-
46005013	Nyerae ekaatic atubonokin ŋituŋa ŋulu nyeyakasi natukot a Ŋikristo. Akuj iŋes etubokini ikes. Nai itemokino iyes totubonokinete ŋituŋa ŋulu eyakasi natukot a Ŋikristo ikwapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Totyakasi anatukot kus ituŋanan ŋini itiyae aronis.”
46006001	Ani mono keyai kidiŋ kus ipei ŋini iburato ka Ekristoit ŋoloce, epedori iŋes ikwaani akiya Ekristoit ŋoloce lokatubok ŋulu nyenupito Akuj, akilo ainakin ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj totubo ŋakiro kec?
46006002	Nyiyenete iyes atemar etubokinete ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj akwap a? Aŋun, ani kerae iyes itubokinete akwap nyipedorito nai iyes akitub ŋakiro tari ŋuna edisyak a?
46006003	Nyiyenete iyes atemar erae iwon ikitubokini ŋimalaikan a? Ani nai kikote neni, itemokino iwon opedorito akitub ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋinakoloŋit.
46006004	Ani nai ŋina etakanuniata ŋakiro ŋuna ikote ŋun neni kus, kaanukiro eayeneneere iyes ikes totubo ŋituŋa ŋulu emamukatar apolou alokidiŋ Ŋikristo?
46006005	Erworo ayoŋ ŋun akisurumya iyes ŋileec! Iŋes mono atemar emam alokidiŋ kus ituŋanan ŋini aoson, ŋini epedori akitub ŋakiro ŋuna iburaata Ŋikristo make a?
46006006	Nai akilo eayi Ekristoit lokaato keŋ alotooma Kristo loikiiko, ido totubo tari ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋikristo ŋakiro kec!
46006007	Iŋes nai kire atemar itoodiunito ŋiburasyo ŋulu iyakatar iyes alokidiŋ kus atemar idaut iyes akibusokin. Akilo, kejoikinit iyes tocamut ikitunaete ŋuluce! Kejoikinit iyes tocamut ŋuluce ikidemanarete ŋiboro kus!
46006008	Nai iyes pei itunaete ka idemanarete ŋuluce ŋulupei erae ŋikaitotoi kus alotooma Kristo!
46006009	Iyenete iyes kire atemar nyeruwor Apukan ka Akuj ŋina a ŋulu itiyaete aronis. Nyikimodikin! Ŋituŋa ŋulu itiyaete amalao kori ŋulu ilipete neni a ŋakujo a ŋace kori ŋikalomak kori ŋikilyok ŋulu iteperete ŋikilyok ŋuluce
46006010	kori ŋikokolak, ŋirorokanotin, ŋikamerak, ŋulu esyomatar ŋuluce kori ŋikademanarak – emam ipei daŋ alokidiŋ ŋul ŋini eruwor Apukan ka Akuj ŋina keŋ.
46006011	Apotu ŋice alokidiŋ kus kitiyata ŋakiro ŋun. Nai adaun akitesegun iyes anasecit; adaun ainakin iyes neni ka Akuj; adau Ekapolon Yesu Kristo ka Etau ka Akuj yok akituruwor iyes ŋulu iyookino alokiŋaren Akuj.
46006012	Etemari ice ebe, “Akacamakinitae ayoŋ akitiya ŋinibore daadaŋ.” Iyookino, nai nyejokak ŋiboro daadaŋ aneni kon. Apedori ayoŋ atemar akacamakinitae ayoŋ akitiya ŋinibore daadaŋ, nai nyacamuni ayoŋ idiobore ekepukat ayoŋ.
46006013	Etemari ice ebe, “Erae akimuj ŋina ka akook ka erae akook ŋina ka akimuj.” Iyookino, nai itasaluni Akuj ikes daadaŋ. Nyitemokino akuwan isitiyao aŋuna ka amalao, nai itemokino kitiyanakinere Ekapolon ka Ekapolon iŋes iyokit akuwan.
46006014	Abu Akuj kiteyaru Ekapolon anatwanare, ikiteyaruni daŋ iŋes iwon anatwanare aŋuna ka apedor keŋ.
46006015	Iyenete iyes atemar erae ŋawat kus ŋinerin ŋulu ka akuwan a Kristo. Apedori nai ayoŋ atyakar ekiner epei anakuwan a Kristo, ido eturuwo ekiner ŋolo ka akuwan ka amalaat a? Mam jik!
46006016	Kori nyiyenete iyes atemar ituŋanan ŋini imorikinosi ka amalaat eruworosi apeikuwan ka amalaat a? Elimunito Ŋakigireta ileerete ebe, “Eruworosi ŋuluarei ŋul apeikuwan.”
46006017	Nai ituŋanan ŋini imorikinosi ka Ekapolon, eruworosi epeitau ka iŋes.
46006018	Toŋero amalao. Nyetapito ŋasecisya ŋunace ŋuna itiyae ituŋanan akuwan keŋ, nai ituŋanan ŋini itiyae amalao, itiyae asecit nakuwan keŋ a ilope.
46006019	Nyiyenete iyes atemar erae ŋawat kus Akai ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan, a ŋolo eyai tooma kus, a ŋolo ikiinakinit Akuj iyes a? Nyiraakasi iyes ŋulu kus a ŋilopeyek, nai ŋulu ka Akuj.
46006020	Anerae adau Akuj akigyel iyes a egyelit; aŋun nai, kisitiyata ŋawat kus aŋuna ka akitopolooritor Akuj.
46007001	Tokona, acamit ayoŋ akirwor ŋakiro ŋuna etapito ŋuna ipotu iyes ikigirakis ayoŋ. Itiyae ekile ŋuna ajokak erae pa keryamu aberu.
46007002	Nai aŋuna elalaata ŋakitemyeta ŋuna ka adoteu, itemokino ŋolokile toryamu aberu keŋ a elope ka ŋinaberu ekile keŋ ka alope.
46007003	Itemokino ekile kitiya etic keŋ ejok ikwapei eraakar ekile, aberu daŋ kitiya etic keŋ ikwapei eraakar aberu.
46007004	Nyepolokinit aberu akuwan keŋ ka alope, nai ekile epolokinit; ikwaŋinapei, nyepolokinit ekile akuwan keŋ a elope, nai aberu epolokinit.
46007005	Nyimikasi make ŋawat kus, mati sek icamuna iyes ikoŋina apaki adio, ikotere kisitiyata apaki ŋin akilipya. Nai kiryamunos nabo ikwapei ekile ka aberu ikwaŋinapei sek, ikotere nyikitem Satan iyes, anerae imamukatar iyes akiyapara.
46007006	Alimunit ayoŋ ŋun pa akareikinit, nai erae ca acamakinet.
46007007	Okoe, kerae kikote ŋituŋa daadaŋ ayoŋ ŋolo amamukar aberu. Nai eyakar ŋinituŋanan ainakinet keŋ aneni ka Akuj; icetuŋanan ainakinet ŋina ikoni ŋin, ice ŋina egelaana.
46007008	Abala nai ayoŋ neni a ŋulu nyiitara ka neni a ŋapuseru ebe, ejok ikes akiboi nyiitara ikwa ayoŋ.
46007009	Nai ani pa kepedorito ikes akiyaparit ekibure kec, itemokino kiitasi. Ejok akiitar akilo akitaara ekibure.
46007010	Nai abala ayoŋ neni a ŋulu iitarito ebe, nyerae alimunet na ŋina kaŋ, nai ŋina ke Ekapolon: nyitemokino aberu etyakar aneni ke ekile keŋ.
46007011	Nai ani ketyakar, itemokino iŋes kiboi emam ekile kori kisila toboŋokinos ka ekile keŋ. Nyitemokino ekile elaki aberu keŋ.
46007012	Nai neni a ŋuluce, alimuni ayoŋ elope, meere Ekapolon, ebe: ani keyakar Ekristoit aberu ŋina nyerae Akristoit, nai tocamunite aberu ŋin akiruk ka iŋes, nyitemokino iŋes tolak.
46007013	Keyakar aberu ŋina erae Akristoit ekile ŋolo nyerae Ekristoit, nai tocamunite ekile ŋol akiruk ka iŋes, nyitemokino iŋes totyakar.
