46007014	Anerae ecamunit Akuj iŋes aŋuna ka akimorikina ka aberu keŋ. Aberu ŋina nyerae Akristoit daŋ ecamunit Akuj aŋuna ka akimorikina ka ekile ŋolo Kristoit. Kerae nyikote nen, kikote ŋidwe kec ŋulu a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyenupito Akuj; nai ecamunit Akuj ikes.
46007015	Nai ani kecamit ŋini nyerae Ekristoit atyakar aneni ke Ekristoit, kimyekisi totyakar. Anakiro a ŋuna ikote ŋun, nyereikinitae ŋini erae Ekristoit, kerae ekile kori aberu. Anerae adau Akuj anyarare iyes akiboi alotooma ekisil.
46007016	Iyoŋ aberu ŋina Kristoit, ianyuni iyoŋ ikwaani atemar iuni iyoŋ lokile kon? Iyoŋ ekile ŋolo Kristoit, ianyuni iyoŋ ikwaani atemar iuni iyoŋ aberu kon?
46007017	Itemokino ŋinituŋanan torubak iboi alopite a ŋolo einakinit Akuj iŋes akiboi, ikwaŋina eboiyo apaki ŋina anyaraa Akuj iŋes. Erae akirot na ŋina etatami ayoŋ natukon a Ŋikristo daadaŋ.
46007018	Ani kileŋeritae sek ituŋanan apaki ŋina enyaraa Akuj iŋes, nyitemokino iŋes alemar ŋimacarin ŋulu ka akileŋer; ani pa kileŋeritae sek ituŋanan apaki ŋina enyaraa Akuj iŋes, nyitemokino iŋes kileŋerae.
46007019	Tari kileŋeritae ituŋanan kori kemam, erae ŋun ŋakoŋinae aneni ka Akuj, nai akiwuap Ŋikisila ŋulu ka Akuj iŋes epol.
46007020	Itemokino ŋinituŋanan torubak eyai lopite ŋolo sek anyaraa Akuj iŋes.
46007021	Ani sek kirae iyoŋ epito apaki ŋina ikinyaraa Akuj iyoŋ, nyimitak; nai ani kipedori iyoŋ aryamun alacakino, kisitiya apaki kon.
46007022	Anerae, epito ŋolo adau Ekapolon anyarare, aruwor ŋolo elacakina, ŋolo ke Ekapolon; ikwaŋinapei, ŋini elacakina, ŋini adau Kristo anyarare, aruwor epito a Kristo.
46007023	Abu Akuj itogyelu iyes aruwor ŋulu keŋ, aŋun, nyiruworosi ŋipi a ŋituŋa.
46007024	Ŋikaitotoi, itemokino ŋinituŋanan torubak imorikina ka Akuj lopite ŋolopei ayakar iŋes apaki ŋina anyaraa Akuj iŋes.
46007025	Egiri tokona ayoŋ ŋuna ikamunito ŋuna ipotu iyes kigira aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyiitara: emam ŋuna akalimoki ayoŋ Ekapolon, nai alimuni ayoŋ ŋuna atami ayoŋ elope, ikwapei araakar ayoŋ ŋolo ekinyoma aŋuna ka akisyon a ŋina ke Ekapolon.
46007026	Ani eŋolikini ayoŋ ŋican ŋulu tokona eyakasi, atami ayoŋ atemar, ejok ekile akiboi nyiitara.
46007027	Ani kiitarit iyoŋ, nyiwar atyakar aneni ka aberu kon. Ani kimamukar iyoŋ aberu, nyiwar aryamun adio.
46007028	Nai ani kiita iyoŋ, nyisecit iyoŋ ka ani kiitar aberu ŋina sek nyiisitae, nyesecit iŋes. Nai eryamunete ŋituŋa ŋulu iitarito ŋatyokisyo ka acamit ayoŋ akiŋarakin iyes nyiryamut ŋun.
46007029	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, apolou a ŋakiro a ŋun iŋes na: aditeu apaki. Ameun tokona, itemokino ŋikilyok ŋulu iitarito kiboiyoto esibit nyiitarito;
46007030	ŋulu igworosi, kiboiyoto esibit nyiyaloloŋete; ŋulu ekienasi, kiboiyoto esibit nyelakara; ŋulu egyelete ŋiboro, kiboiyoto esibit nyerae ŋiboro ŋul ŋulu kec.
46007031	Itemokino ŋituŋa ŋulu isitiyaete ŋiboro ŋulu ka akwap a na, kiboiyoto esibit nyidaŋakina ikes loboro ŋul. Anerae epite ŋolo eyakar akwap na tokona, esaluni.
46007032	Acamit ayoŋ iyes tomamukatar amitakinit aneni kus. Emitakinit ekile ŋolo nyiitarit etic ŋolo ke Ekapolon, anerae ecamit iŋes akitalakar Ekapolon.
46007033	Nai emitakinit ekile ŋolo iitarit ŋiboro ŋulu ka akwap a na, anerae ecamit iŋes akitalakar akeeberu;
46007034	aŋun, iriyarito iŋes ŋirotin ŋiarei. Aberu ŋina nyiitit kori apese ŋina nyiryamakina ka ekile emitakinit etic ŋolo ke Ekapolon, anerae ecamit iŋes ainakin akuwan ka etau keŋ daŋ neni ke Ekapolon. Nai aberu ŋina iitit, emitakinit ŋiboro ŋulu ka akwap a na, anerae ecamit iŋes akitalakar lokile keŋ.
46007035	Alimunit ayoŋ ŋun akiŋarakin iyes. Nyewuakinit ayoŋ neni kus egogos ŋolo apolon. Nai acamit ayoŋ iyes kiboiyoto alopite a ŋolo iyookino ka kitiyanakis Ekapolon emam akitumonor.
46007036	Ani keyai ekile ŋolo etami atemar nyejokak ŋipitesyo keŋ alotooma aŋayaŋayat akiit apese ŋina iikina ka iŋes ka ani kegogoŋ ekibure keŋ, itemokino ikes kiitas ikwa ecamitor iŋes. Nyesecit iŋes.
46007037	Nai ani ketubu kire ekile atemar nyeitari, nyereikinitae iŋes, nabo ani kipukat iŋes ekibure keŋ ka toris sek iŋes atyaku alotau keŋ ŋuna kitiya, etiya iŋes ejok erae pa kiit apese ŋin.
46007038	Aŋun, ekile ŋolo iitari apese ŋina iikina akiito ka iŋes, itiyae ŋuna ajokak; nai ekile ŋolo nyiitari, itiyae ŋuna ajokak nooi.
46007039	Aberu ŋina iitit, eenikinito Ŋikisila ŋulu ka Akuj neni ke ekile keŋ, eriŋa ekile keŋ eyari, nai ani ketwana ekile keŋ, ecamakinio iŋes akiitakin ka ekile daadaŋ ŋolo ecamit iŋes, nai itemokino ekile ŋol torae Ekristoit.
46007040	Anakitam kaŋ ebuni aberu ŋin alakari nooi, erae kidoŋ iŋes nyiitara. Erae ŋun atamakinit ayoŋ, nai atami ayoŋ atemar ayakar ayoŋ daŋ Etau ŋolo ka Akuj.
46008001	Egiri tokona ŋuna ikamunito ŋuna ipotu iyes kigira aŋuna a ŋamuja a ŋuna einanakinio erae amuronot nakujo ŋace. Iyookino kire atemar, “Ikiyakar iwon daadaŋ ayenut.” Isiturokini ayenut ituŋanan, nai amina iŋes itogogoŋi ituŋanan.
46008002	Ŋini etami atemar ayeni idiobore, eriŋa nyeyenuna lopite ŋolo itemokino toyenunia.
46008003	Nai ituŋanan ŋini emina Akuj, eyeni Akuj iŋes.
46008004	Aŋun nai, ŋuna etapito akinyam ŋamuja ŋuna einanakinio erae amuronot nakujo ŋace: ikiyeni atemar erae ŋakujo ŋuna kitiyauna ŋuna eyakasi nakwap ŋakoŋinae. Eyai Akuj apei bon.
46008005	Tari keyakasi nakuj kori nakwap, ŋiboorei ŋulu enyaritae ŋakujo ikwapei kire elalaata ŋakujo ŋun ka ŋikapolok ŋul,
46008006	nai aneni yok eyai Akuj apei bon, Papa ŋolo asubi ŋiboro daadaŋ, ŋolo ikiteyari iwon ka eyai iwon Ekapolon epei bon, Yesu Kristo ŋolo asubia Akuj ŋiboro daadaŋ, ido iŋes ikiyarya iwon.
46008007	Nai emamukatar ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak ayenut ŋin. Anaikis ŋituŋa ŋice ŋakujo ŋace; iŋes nai ani kenyama ikes akimuj ŋina einakinitae erae amuronot nakujo ŋace, eriŋa ikes etamete atemar ilipete ikes neni a ŋakujo a ŋun; epalag ŋatameta kec ka eyenete ikes alotai kec atemar ikisecit.
46008008	Nyepedori akimuj akitojok epite ŋolo iboiyere iwon ka Akuj: emam ibore ikibuci iwon erae pa kikinyam ŋamuja ŋun, nabo emam ibore ikiryamuni iwon erae kikinyam.
46008009	Nai tocoito nyeruwor alacakina kus ŋina nyamet ŋamuja, ŋina iteseci ŋulu epalag ayenut kec anakiro a ŋun.
46008010	Iyoŋ ituŋanan ŋini ibala ayakar ayenut; ani mono kikiŋolik iyoŋ ituŋanan ŋini epalag ayenut inyami akimuj alokai a ŋina a ŋakujo a ŋace, nyiburakini mono iŋes aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun akinyam akimuj ŋin a?
46008011	Aŋun, inyasun ituŋanan ŋin, ŋini epalag ayenut keŋ aŋuna ka ayenut kon – iŋes ŋini abu Kristo totwan aŋuna keŋ.
46008012	Alopite a lo, isecete iyes alokiŋaren ŋikaitotoi kus alotooma Kristo ka kinyasut ikes anatameta kec a ŋuna palag, iseca iyes kire alokiŋaren Kristo.
46008013	Aŋun, ani kerae akimuj iteseci lokaato kaŋ, nyanyami nabo akiriŋ jik, ikotere nyetesec iŋes.
46009001	Nyayakar mono ayoŋ apedor akitiya ŋuna acamit a? Meere mono ayoŋ ekiyakia a? Nyeŋolikinit mono ayoŋ Yesu Ekapolon yok a? Meere mono iyes ŋulu ipotu tonupa anakitatam kaŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon a?
46009002	Tari pa keketeete ŋice ayoŋ atemar arae ekiyakia, kire icamunito iyes atemar arae ayoŋ. Aŋuna ka akiyar kus anakimorikina ke Ekapolon, iyes ŋilopeyek itoodiunito araakau kaŋ ekiyakia.
46009003	Erae lo epite ŋolo erworya ayoŋ aŋuna kaŋ apaki ŋina ekeŋisiŋisiyere ayoŋ alokiŋaren ŋituŋa:
46009004	nyayakar mono ayoŋ apedor ŋina maset ka ŋinakimujet akimuj aŋuna ke etic kaŋ a?
46009005	Nyayakar mono ayoŋ apedor ŋina ryamunet aberu ŋina Kristoit orukito ka ayoŋ analosit kaŋ, ikwapei Ŋikiyakia ŋuluce ka ŋikaitotoi ŋulu ke Ekapolon ka Petero a?
46009006	Kori Baranaba bon ka ayoŋ itemokino kitiyaetei aŋuna ka aryamunia akimuj ŋinayaret?
46009007	Emam esigarit itiyae etic keŋ pa etacio. Emam eketan ŋolo nyenyamenene ŋaraito ŋuna ke epiini alomanikor keŋ. Kori alikeyokon nyemasenene ŋakile a ŋamesekin keŋ?
46009008	Nyerworo ayoŋ ŋun alopite bon a ŋolo irworotor ŋituŋa. Irworosi Ŋikisila a Moses daŋ ŋunapei.
46009009	Igiritae Lokisila a Moses ebe, “Nyien akituk ke emoŋ apaki ŋina isitiyaa iyoŋ ikes aramya ŋimomwa”. Etapito mono Akuj ŋuna a emoŋ a?
46009010	Kori pa alimuni iŋes ŋakiro ŋun kan iwon a? Kire egiritae ŋakiro ŋun kan iwon. Itemokino eketan ka ekaleman kitiyata etic kec igenosi aryamun ekimar kec ŋolo a ŋaraito a ŋun.
46009011	Adaun isua aekin ŋikinyom ŋulu erae ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj neni kus. Erono mono nooi aryamun aneni kus ikwapei ŋaraito ŋiboro ŋulu ikiitanit isua a?
46009012	Ani nai keyakatar ŋulucetuŋa apedor ŋina ryamunet ŋiboro ŋul aneni kus, nyikiyakar nai isua apedor ŋina apolon akilo ikes a? Tari kikote neni, nyisitiya isua apedor ŋin; nai ikititinyik isua ŋican daadaŋ, ikotere nyitukuruwor alimonokin ŋina a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak a ŋuna a Kristo.
46009013	Kire, iyenete iyes atemar, ŋikilyok ŋulu itiyaete Kai ka Akuj eryamununeeteakimuj kec alo Kai ka ŋulu itiyaete Namuroet, eryamununeeteakimuj kec anamuronisya a ŋuna einanakinete ikes.
46009014	Ikwaŋinapei, icikakinit Ekapolon atemar ŋituŋa ŋulu elimonokinete Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, itemokino toyarikis nalimonokin ŋinapei.
46009015	Nai, nyisitiya ayoŋ ŋapedorosyo ŋun tari apei daŋ, nabo nyegiri ayoŋ ŋun aŋuna ka aryamun idiobore aŋuna kaŋ. Kejok ayoŋ otwan akilo idiotuŋanan alemar aneni kaŋ ibore ŋini eturor ayoŋ.
46009016	Nyapedori ayoŋ akituro aŋuna alimonokinia Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak. Anerae ekecikak Akuj ayoŋ alimonokin ŋakiro ŋun. Erokyarosi aneni kaŋ erae pa kalimonok Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak!
46009017	Ani kalimonok ayoŋ aŋuna ka acamit kaŋ, iŋes atemar aryamuni ayoŋ eropit; nai itemokino ayoŋ etiyae ŋun, anerae ekecikak Akuj ayoŋ akitiya.
46009018	Aliropit nai aryamuni ayoŋ? Eropit kaŋ iŋes alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak emam etacit, ido nyesitiyae ŋapedorosyo ŋuna itemokino oyakar alotic a ŋol.
46009019	Arae ayoŋ ituŋanan ŋini alacakina ka nyarae epito a idiotuŋanan, nai eturuwor ayoŋ epito a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ, ikotere onyaraunia ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak nooi neni a Kristo.
46009020	Ani ikiruki ayoŋ ka Ŋiyudayan ekoni Eyudayat, ikotere onyaraunia ikes neni a Kristo. Ani ikiruki ka ŋulu iwuapito Ŋikisila a Moses, ekoni ŋulu iwuapito Ŋikisila a Moses – tari pa kekepukato Ŋikisila a Moses ayoŋ, ikotere onyaraunia ikes neni a Kristo.
46009021	Ikwaŋinapei, ani ikiruki ka ŋulu nyiwuapito Ŋikisila a Moses, ekoni ŋulu nyiwuapito Ŋikisila a Moses, ikotere onyaraunia ikes neni a Kristo. Nyerae nai ŋun atemar aŋerit ayoŋ Ŋikisila ka Akuj, nai ekepukato ayoŋ Ŋikisila ŋulu a Kristo.
46009022	Aneni a ŋulu epalag ananupit, apalag ikwa ikes, ikotere onyaraunia ŋulu palag daŋ neni a Kristo. Aruwor ayoŋ ŋinibore daadaŋ alotuŋa a daadaŋ, ikotere oiunia ŋice a epite a daadaŋ a ŋolo apedorya.
46009023	Etiyae ayoŋ ŋun daadaŋ aŋuna a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak, ikotere oryamunia ayoŋ daŋ ŋarereŋisyo aneni kec.
46009024	Iyenete iyes kire atemar anakerit, elalak ŋituŋa ŋulu isyakinete akerit, nai ipei bon eryamuni eropit. Aŋun, tokera nai lopite ŋolo ipedoryata aryamun eropit.
46009025	Ekakeran daadaŋ ŋolo itatamio, ipukae iŋes ekibure daadaŋ, ikotere eryamunia ebokot ŋolo nyeropari; ikitiyae iwon daŋ ikwaŋinapei, ikotere oryamuniata ebokot ŋolo eropari.
46009026	Iŋes nai akeria ayoŋ ocorosi tari naŋetakinet; ikikwaan ayoŋ ka ekanaŋan egum ŋolo nyedyaki ŋoloce.
46009027	Etogogoŋi ayoŋ akuwan kaŋ a ŋanaŋan, ikotere kiwuap ŋuna acamit ayoŋ, ikotere nyakalemar ayoŋ ŋolo abu onyarau ŋuluce nakerit.
46010001	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, acamit ayoŋ iyes totamut ŋuna apotu kitiyakinos neni atapapaa yok, ŋulu apotu totupakis Moses. Abu edou toiu ikes, todoka daadaŋ anam ŋina enyaritae “Anam ŋina areŋan”.
46010002	Aponi kibatisae ikes daadaŋ ananam eriŋa edou imukorit ikes, toruworos ŋikewuapak a Moses.
46010003	Tonyama daadaŋ akimuj ŋina ainakini Akuj ikes,
46010004	tomata daŋ ŋakipi ŋuna ainakini iŋes ikes. Apotu ikes tomata anataaba a ŋina ka Akuj a ŋina arukito ka ikes; arae ataaba ŋin Kristo elope.
46010005	Nai pa alakara Akuj neni kec a ŋulu alalak, aŋun apotu ŋalyalin kec kiryama aloŋisat.
46010006	Erae ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ akitaanyikinet aneni yok, ikotere nyikiburakinito ŋiboro ŋulu ka aronis ikwa ikes.
46010007	Nyitemokino iwon elipete neni a ŋakujo a ŋace, ikwa kilipyata ikes ŋice; ikwapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Apotu ŋituŋa kiboikinos; kimuja, tomata ka tobolyata.”
46010008	Nyitemokino iwon etiyata ŋuna ka amalao ikwa kitiyaata ikes ŋice; aŋun, apotu ŋalipyo ŋatomoniarei ka ŋiuni totwaka apeikoloŋit bon.
46010009	Nyitemokino iwon etemo Ekapolon ikwa etemitotor ŋice kec; aŋun, apotu ŋimuno tomunyasi ikes.
46010010	Nyitemokino iwon eŋuruŋuras ikwa eŋuruŋuratar ŋice kec; aŋun, abu Emalaika ŋolo ka Atwanare tomunya ikes.
46010011	Apotu ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ kitiyakinos neni kec, erae akitaanyikinet aneni a ŋuluce ka aponi kigirae erae akiciket neni yok a ŋulu ikiboi anapakio a ŋuna eapiya Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon.
46010012	Aŋun, itemokino ituŋanan ŋini etami atemar eboi ecasit, tocoite nyibusokin.
46010013	Emam akitemyet ŋina iryamut iyes ŋina nyitemitere ŋituŋa ŋuluce. Nai erae Akuj ŋina itiyae ŋuna adau akiikin, ka nyikicamakini iŋes iyes ikitemio tari adepar agogoŋu kus. Apaki ŋina ikitemere iyes, ikiinakini Akuj iyes erot ŋolo ibucarotor, ido topedosi atitinyikin.
46010014	Aŋun nai, ŋikaitotoi kaŋ ŋuluminan, toŋero akilip neni a ŋakujo a ŋace.
46010015	Erworo ayoŋ neni kus iraakasi ŋituŋa ŋulu iosok, totamatamata mono iyes ŋakiro ŋuna erworo ayoŋ.
46010016	Ekopo ŋolo isitiyao iwon Anakimuj a ŋina ke Ekapolon – ekopo ŋolo ikilakanaror iwon neni ka Akuj – apaki ŋina ikimasya erae ŋolo ikimorya iwon ŋaokot a Kristo. Amugati daŋ ŋina ikinyilinyili iwon apaki ŋina enyamere, erae ŋina ikimorya iwon akuwan a Kristo.
46010017	Aŋuna eyakar amugati apei, ikirae iwon ŋulu alalak akuwan apei, anerae ikimori iwon daadaŋ amugati apei.
46010018	Totamakisi epite a Ŋisirael: nyimorikina mono ŋulu enyamete ŋamuronisya ka Namuroet a?
46010019	Nyaanu mono ŋuna alosikinit ayoŋ? Abala mono ayoŋ erae ŋakujo ŋace kori ŋamuronisya ŋuna einanakinio ikes ŋiceboro ajokak a?
46010020	Emam, nai alosikinit ayoŋ atemar ŋamuronisya ŋun, einanakinitae neni a ŋipyan, meere neni ka Akuj. Nyacamit ayoŋ iyes kimorikina ka ŋipyan.
46010021	Nyipedorete iyes akimat alokopo a ŋolo ke Ekapolon, ido tomata alokopo a ŋolo a ŋipyan daŋ. Nyipedorete iyes akimuj alomesa a ŋolo ke Ekapolon, ido kimuja alomesa a ŋolo a ŋipyan daŋ.
46010022	Ikicamit mono iwon akitoŋo Ekapolon a? Ikigogoŋ mono iwon akilo Akuj a?
46010023	Ebookoi ebe, “Ikicamakinitae iwon akitiya ŋinibore daadaŋ”. Nai nyejokak ŋiboro daadaŋ, kire, “Ikicamakinitae iwon akitiya ŋinibore daadaŋ.” Nai nyikitogogoŋete ŋiboro daadaŋ.
46010024	Nyitemokino idiotuŋanan atamuna bon, nai itemokino totamunite ŋulucetuŋa.
46010025	Ikicamakinitae iyes akinyam akiriŋ ŋina egyelanaryo alomaket. Nyejoikina akiŋita, ikotere nyepodosi ŋatameta kus.
46010026	Anerae igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Erae akwap ka ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu eya tooma keŋ ŋulu ke Ekapolon.”
46010027	Ani kikinyaraiya iyes ituŋanan ŋini nyerae Ekristoit kai keŋ akimuj ka iŋes, ido tocamut iyes, ejoikinit iyes kimuja ibore daadaŋ ŋini ikiinakinio tomam akiŋita, ikotere nyepodosi ŋatameta kus.
46010028	Ani nai kikilimok iyes ituŋanan atemar, “Erae akimuj na ŋina ka amuronot a ŋina einakinitae nakujo ŋace”, nyinyama akimuj ŋin aŋuna a ituŋanan a ŋini abu itolimok iyes ka ikotere nyipodosi;
46010029	iŋes atemar meere aŋuna a ŋatameta kus, nai aŋuna a ŋatameta keŋ. Kaanukiro iretakinitor icetuŋanan alacakina kaŋ aŋuna a ŋatameta keŋ?
46010030	Ani kalakanar ayoŋ neni ka Akuj aŋuna ka akimuj kaŋ, kaanukiro eketoroniyaritor ayoŋ ituŋanan aŋuna ka akimuj a ŋina alakanaror ayoŋ neni ka Akuj?
46010031	Aŋun nai, ŋinibore daadaŋ imujete kori imasete kori itiyaete iyes, kitiyata ŋun daadaŋ aŋuna ka akitopoloor Akuj.
46010032	Nyitoŋoa Ŋiyudayan kori Ŋigirik kori ŋatukon a Ŋikristo ŋuna erae ŋuna ka Akuj.
46010033	Kiboiyoto lopite ŋolopei eboiyo ayoŋ; ekatakinit ayoŋ akitalakar ŋituŋa daadaŋ alopitesyo a daadaŋ, nyatami ŋuna kaŋ bon, nai atami aŋuna a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ, ikotere toiunos ikes daadaŋ.
46011001	Kituputoe ayoŋ, ikwapei etupusyo ayoŋ daŋ Kristo.
46011002	Ekepuro ayoŋ iyes, anerae ikitamunito iyes ayoŋ jwi jwi anakiro a daadaŋ ka iwuapito iyes ŋitalyo a Ŋikristo, ŋulu eketatamianakini ayoŋ iyes.
46011003	Acamit daŋ ayoŋ iyes toyenete atemar Kristo iŋes epolokinit ŋolokile daadaŋ ka epolokinit ekile aberu; nabo epolokinit Akuj Kristo.
46011004	Ekile daadaŋ ŋolo ilipi kori edwari kimukite akou, nyitopoloorit Kristo.
46011005	Nai aberu daadaŋ ŋina ilipi kori edwari nyimukit akou keŋ nyitopoloorit ekile keŋ – ikwaan ka abanyit akou keŋ.
46011006	Ani pa kimuk aberu akou keŋ ka akitambara, itemokino tari tobanya ŋitim keŋ, nai ikwapei eraakar ŋileec aneni ka aberu abanyit akou keŋ, itemokino iŋes kimuk akou keŋ ka akitambara.
46011007	Nyitemokino ekile akimuk akou keŋ, anerae erae iŋes etorube ka erae iŋes akitoodiunet ŋina ka apolou ka Akuj; erae nai aberu akitoodiunet ŋina ka apolou ke ekile.
46011008	Anerae pa asubuni Akuj ekile anaberu, nai asubuni iŋes aberu alokile.
46011009	Nabo pa asubuni Akuj ekile aŋuna ka aberu, nai asubuni iŋes aberu aŋuna ke ekile.
46011010	Erae ŋakiro ŋun itemokino aberu imukitor akou ka akitambara kitoodiunia apolou keŋ aŋuna a ŋimalaikan.
46011011	Nai anakiyar yok alotooma Ekapolon, epol nooi ayakar ekile, nabo epol nooi ekile ayakar aberu.
46011012	Esubunitae aberu alokile, nai tari ekile daŋ itorunit neni ka aberu ka Akuj iŋes asubi ŋiboro daadaŋ.
46011013	Totyakutu mono iyes ŋilopeyek erae kejok aberu akilip neni ka Akuj pa imukit akou.
46011014	Nyeyenete mono ŋituŋa atemar eronikinito ekile ŋitim ŋulu aoyak a?
46011015	Nai aneni ka aberu erae ŋitim ŋulu aoyak akibuses. Anerae einakinitae iŋes ŋitim ŋulu aoyak kimukitor akou keŋ.
46011016	Nai ani keyai ituŋanan ecamit apega ŋakiro ŋuna ikamunito ŋun, alimuni ayoŋ nu bon atemar emam etal ece ŋolo eyakare isua kori eyakatar ŋatukon a ŋikanupak.
46011017	Anakiro a ŋuna tokona alimuni ayoŋ, nyekepurit ayoŋ iyes, anerae ŋapakio daadaŋ ŋuna iryamiryamyata iyes iwapei akilip, itiyaeneneete iyes ŋinyas, meere ajokis.
46011018	Ŋuna esyaunak, eira ayoŋ atemar ŋina iryamiryamyata iyes ikwapei atukot a ŋikanupak, eyai atyakatyaka kidiŋ kus; aneni kaŋ, esibit ŋakiro ŋun ŋuna a kire.
46011019	(Kire itemokino toyai atyakatyaka kidiŋ kus, ikotere kileereunioto ŋulu enupito kire.)
46011020	Apaki ŋina iryamiryamyata iyes, nyerae kire Akimuj ŋina ke Ekapolon imujete iyes.
46011021	Anerae ani imujete iyes, isyakini ŋinituŋanan akinyam akeekimuj a ilope, tonyamite akoro ŋice ka tomeras ŋice.
46011022	Emam mono iyes ŋirerya ŋulu imujata ka imasyata a? Kori ijamuwarito iyes atukot ŋina a ŋikanupak a ŋulu ka Akuj ka isurumito ŋileec ŋituŋa ŋulu emam ibore eyai a? Nyaanu ŋuna alimuni ayoŋ anakiro a nu? Ekepuri ayoŋ iyes a? Nyapedori!
46011023	Anerae abu ayoŋ ejau aneni ke Ekapolon ŋakiro nu ŋuna adau ayoŋ akikobakin iyes. Abu Ekapolon Yesu ataboŋ ŋina alukinere, tolemu amugati,
46011024	ani kedau alakar neni ka Akuj, tonyilinyili, tolimu tema, “Erae naga akaakuwan ŋina ejalyo ikotere iyes. Kitiyaete ikona ikotere ikiitunitotor ayoŋ.”
46011025	Ikoŋinapei, kirikakis akimuj, tolemu ekopo tema, “Erae logo ekopo ŋolo a ŋaokot kaŋ a ŋuna ka Acamunet a ŋina kitete. Apaki daadaŋ ŋina imasyata iyes alokopo a lo, tomata ikiitunitotor ayoŋ.”
46011026	Iŋes atemar apaki daadaŋ ŋina imujata amugati na ka ŋina imasyata alokopo a lo, iseraete iyes atwanare ŋina ke Ekapolon akitodol ŋina eboŋunio Ekapolon.
46011027	Aŋun, ŋini daadaŋ imuji amugati kori emasi alokopo a ŋolo ke Ekapolon pa itopoloorit Ekapolon, eyany iŋes akuwan ka ŋaokot ke Ekapolon.
46011028	Aŋun, itemokino ŋinituŋanan kisyemo bon mono, ido nai kimuj amugati ka tomat alokopo.
46011029	Anerae ŋini daadaŋ imuji amugati ka emasi alokopo pa enupit apolou ŋina ka akuwan ka ŋaokot ke Ekapolon, etubokini Akuj iŋes.
46011030	Iŋes nai eraakatar ŋice alokidiŋ kus ŋulu epalag ka ŋulu edyakasi, nabo atwaka ŋice daŋ.
46011031	Kerae esyemem iwon mono make, pa kikitubok Akuj iwon.
46011032	Nai ani ikisicani Ekapolon iwon, ikitatami erae akitatam, ikotere nyikitubokin iwon kaapei ka ŋituŋa ŋuluce ŋulu ka akwap.
46011033	Aŋun nai ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, ani iryamiryamete iyes akinyam Akimuj ŋina a Ekapolon, itemokino kidarunos daadaŋ.
46011034	Ani kenyamit idiotuŋanan akoro, itemokino iŋes kimuj mono alore keŋ, ikotere nyikitubok Akuj iyes daadaŋ. Ŋuna etapito ŋakiro ŋunace, akalimokini ayoŋ iyes ŋuna kitiya apaki ŋina abunio ayoŋ neni kus.
46012001	Ŋakiro ŋuna etapito ŋainakineta ŋuna eponito aneni ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan: tokona, acamit ayoŋ iyes ŋikaitotoi kaŋ toyenut ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna etapito ŋakiro ŋun.
46012002	Iyenete iyes atemar apaki ŋina iraakatar iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu pa inupito Akuj ŋina a kire, aponi ikitooliyor iyes alorotin a ŋulu alalak nakujo ŋace ŋuna etwakito.
46012003	Aŋun, acamit ayoŋ iyes toyenut atemar emam ituŋanan ŋini irworo a Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj epedori alimun ebe, “Itemokino kicenoi Yesu!” Nabo, emam ituŋanan epedori alimun ebe, “Erae Yesu Ekapolon”, mati erae Etau ŋolo Asegan erikit iŋes.
46012004	Egelegelya ŋainakineta ŋuna ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan, nai Etau ŋolopei ekori ikes.
46012005	Egelegelya ŋirotin ŋulu ijaanakinere, nai Ekapolon ŋolopei ijaanakinio.
46012006	Egelegelya ŋirotin ŋulu itiyaere ŋiticisyo, nai Akuj apei ekorakinit ŋinituŋanan apedor ŋinakitiyaet etic.
46012007	Itoodiunitae ayakau ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan tooma ŋinituŋanan alopite ke ece, aŋuna ka akiŋarakinia ŋuluce daadaŋ.
46012008	Einakini Etau ŋolo Asegan neni a ipei apedor ŋina kirworet ŋuna ka aosou, neni a ice einakini Etau ŋolopei ŋol apedor ŋina ka ayenut ŋakiro.
46012009	Neni a ice einakini Etau anupit, neni a ice einakini Etau ŋolopei ŋol apedor ŋina kitaŋaleununuyet.
46012010	Neni a ice einakini apedor ŋinakitiyaet ŋakujuwuanisya, neni a ice akidwar; neni a ice apedor ŋinayenunet ŋakiro ŋuna erae ŋuna ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan kori ŋuna nyerae. Einakini neni a ice apedor ŋina kirworet ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka, neni a ice einakini akisileereun ŋuna irworoe a ŋaŋajepa a ŋuna egelaaka.
46012011	Ŋainakineta ŋun daadaŋ erae Etau ŋolo Asegan ŋolopei ŋol einanakini, iŋes ekoranakini neni a ŋinituŋanan anacamit keŋ.
46012012	Ikoni Kristo akuwan ŋina erae apei ŋina eyakar ŋinerin ŋulu alalak; anerae ani tari kelalak ŋinerin anakuwan, eriŋa erae apeikuwan.
46012013	Ikwaŋinapei, iwon daadaŋ tari kikirae Ŋiyudayan kori ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan, ŋipi kori ŋulu nyerae ŋipi, ikibatisae tooma nakuwan apei a Etau a ŋolopei a ŋol ka ikimori iwon Etau ŋolopei ŋol.
46012014	Kire, nyeyakar akuwan ekiner epei, nai ŋinerin ŋulu alalak.
46012015	Ani kerae tolimu akeju tema, “Nyarae ayoŋ ekiner ŋolo ka akuwan, anerae nyarae ayoŋ akan”, nyiretakinete ŋun akeju araakau ekiner ŋolo ka akuwan.
46012016	Ani kerae tolimu akit tema, “Nyarae ayoŋ ekiner ŋolo ka akuwan, anerae nyarae ayoŋ akoŋu”, nyiretakinete ŋun akit araakau ekiner ŋolo ka akuwan.
46012017	Ani bo kerae torae akuwan daadaŋ akoŋu, kiiranari bo iŋes ikwaani? Ani bo kerae torae akuwan daadaŋ akit, kiŋuununui iŋes ikwaani?
46012018	Nai ikwaŋinapei tokona eyakar, abu Akuj kitemok ŋinerin nakuwan ŋulu egelegelya, ikwaŋina ecamitor iŋes.
46012019	Kerae torae ikes daadaŋ ekiner epei, kemam akuwan eyai!
46012020	Nai ikwaŋinapei tokona eyakar, elalak ŋinerin, nai akuwan apei.
46012021	Aŋun nai, nyepedori akoŋu atemar akan ebe, “Nyekeitanit ayoŋ iyoŋ!” Nabo nyepedori akou atemar ŋakejen ebe, “Nyekeitanit ayoŋ iyes!”
46012022	Nai akilo, ŋinerin ŋulu ka akuwan ŋulu esibito epalag, ikes iitana nooi.
46012023	Ŋinerin ŋulu ikitami iwon atemar emam nyelal ajokis eyai, ikes ŋinerin ŋulu ecoikinitae nooi ka ŋinerin ŋulu ka akuwan ŋulu nyejokak akiŋolikin, ikes ŋulu ikiyait iwon ka akiyapara.
46012024	Nai, nyiitanito ŋinerin ŋulu ejokak, iŋolikini acoikinit nooi. Akuj alope iŋes abu kimorik ŋinerin ŋulu ka akuwan ka kitopoloo ŋinerin ŋulu epalag.
46012025	Aŋun, emam atyakatyaka eyai nakuwan, nai ŋinerin daadaŋ emitakina make.
46012026	Ani keryabakin ekiner epei, eryebakinosi ŋinerin ŋuluce daadaŋ; ani kipuri ekiner epei, elakarosi ŋinerin ŋuluce daadaŋ.
46012027	Iraakasi iyes daadaŋ akuwan a Kristo ka erae ŋinituŋanan ekiner keŋ.
46012028	Anatukot a Ŋikristo, adau Akuj akiwuakin ŋituŋa loticisyo kec: ŋulu esyaunak erae ŋikiyakia, ŋulu a ŋiarei erae ŋikadwarak, ŋulu a ŋiuni erae ŋiketatamak, totupakis ŋulu etiyak ŋakujuwuanisya ka nabo ŋulu einakinitae apedor akitaŋaleunun ŋidekesyo; ŋice akiŋarakin ŋuluce, ŋice apolokinit ŋuluce ka ŋice daŋ akirworo ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka ŋuna ke Etau.
46012029	Nyerae daadaŋ ŋikiyakia kori ŋikadwarak, kori ŋiketatamak. Nyeyakatar daadaŋ apedor ŋinakitiyaet ŋakujuwuanisya
46012030	kori ŋina kitaŋaleununuyet ŋidekesyo, kori ŋina kirworet ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka kori akisileereun ŋuna irworoe a ŋaŋajepa a ŋuna egelaaka.
46012031	Kiitana nooi ŋainakineta ŋuna apolok akilo. Eketoodikini nai ayoŋ iyes erot ece ŋolo ajokan nooi adepar.
46013001	Ani kerwor ayoŋ a ŋaŋajepa a ŋituŋa ka a ŋuna a ŋimalaikan daŋ, nai tomam amina aneni kaŋ, ikoni erwor kaŋ asuwat ŋina arwon kori ekadoŋodoŋot ŋolo ikilya.
46013002	Ani kayakar ayoŋ apedor ŋina dwaret ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, oyeni ŋuna imunono ka aosou daadaŋ; ani kayakar anupit ŋina apolon ŋina iitana aŋuna ka akisiyotonor ŋimoru, nai tomam amina aneni kaŋ, arae ayoŋ koŋin.
46013003	Ani kakorak ayoŋ ŋiboro kaŋ lokulyak, ojalak daŋ ŋituŋa kicunya akuwan kaŋ, nai tomam amina aneni kaŋ, emam ibore aryamuni.
46013004	Etitiny amina ka erimaana; nyerakaana amina kori nyitojoka bon kori nyiturono.
46013005	Nyitiyae amina ŋipitesyo ŋulu aronok ka emam emwane aneni keŋ; nyeŋoyenene amina atipei. Nyidyasi amina ŋakiro ŋuna aronok.
46013006	Nyelakara amina aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna nyiyookino, nai elakara aŋuna a kire.
46013007	Idaŋidaŋi amina ŋakiro daadaŋ, enupit ŋakiro daadaŋ, igeno ka etitinyikinit ŋinibore daadaŋ.
46013008	Erae amina ŋina a jik. Eyakasi ŋakiro ŋuna edwaritae, nai erae ŋuna ka adiouriyen; eyakasi ŋainakineta ŋuna kirworet ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka, nai elunyarosi; eyai ayenut, nai esaluni.
46013009	Anerae ŋainakineta yok ŋuna ka ayenut ka ŋuna ka akidwar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj erae ŋuna eriŋa nyirikakina,
46013010	nai ani ŋina ebunio akiyookino daadaŋ, eŋopiarete ŋuna eriŋa nyirikakina.
46013011	Apaki ŋina ariŋa ayoŋ araakar ikoku, arae erwor kaŋ ŋolo a ikoku, ayeni ŋakiro ikwa ikoku ka atami ikwa ikoku; ani ŋina aruworor ituŋanan ŋini apolon, abu oesik ŋuna a ikoku.
46013012	Ibore ŋini ikite iwon tokona ikoni etorube ŋolo emuimui anaroet, nai moi, ikianyuni iwon Akuj; ŋuna ayeni ayoŋ tokona erae ŋuna eriŋa nyirikakina, nai moi, ayenuni ejok lopite ŋolopei akayenia Akuj ayoŋ.
46013013	Eriŋa nai nu ŋunauni eroparito: anupit, akigeno ka amina, nai ŋina iloit ŋun daadaŋ iŋes amina.
46014001	Itemokino toŋirikis aryamun amina. Kiitanito ŋainakineta ŋuna ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan, kiitana nooi ainakinet ŋina ka akidwar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
46014002	Anerae ituŋanan ŋini irworo ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka, nyirworo lotuŋa, nai irworo neni ka Akuj, anerae emam ituŋanan eyeni ŋakiro ŋuna irworo iŋes, nai irworo iŋes ŋakiro ŋuna imunono aŋuna ka apedor a ŋina ke Etau ka Akuj.
46014003	Nai ituŋanan ŋini edwari, irworo lotuŋa aŋuna ka akitogogoŋ, akisimukekin ka akimaima ikes.
46014004	Ituŋanan ŋini irworo ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka itogogoŋo iŋes bon, nai ituŋanan ŋini edwari, itogogoŋi iŋes atukot a Ŋikristo.
46014005	Acamit ayoŋ iyes daadaŋ kirworo ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka, nai nooi todwarete. Anerae epol ŋini edwari akilo ŋini irworo ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka – mati eyai ŋini isileereuni ŋuna irworo iŋes, ikotere kitogogoŋio atukot a Ŋikristo daadaŋ.
46014006	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, kabu ayoŋ neni kus, erworo ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka, anijokis iryamunete iyes alorwor kaŋ? Emam tari adio, mati kerwor ayoŋ adiokitoodikinet aneni ka Akuj, kori adioyenut kori akidwar adio kori akitatam adio.
46014007	Totamakisi mono iyes ŋiboro ŋice ŋulu ikote apilu kori aduŋgu, ŋulu nyeyarete; ikokini ituŋanan eyenuni eete ŋolo eramio a ŋiboro a ŋul, erae pa kerwosi ikes ejok ai?
46014008	Ani pa kekutaki ekakutan aluut ejok, ŋae eteni aŋuna ka alosit lojiye?
46014009	Ikote nenipei aneni kus daŋ. Ani kirwor iyes a ŋaŋajepa a ŋuna egelaaka, ido nyilereete ŋuna irworosi iyes, ikokini nai ituŋanan eyenuni ŋakiro ŋun ai? Eŋopikinete ŋakiro ŋuna irworosi iyes lokuwuam.
46014010	Eyakasi ŋaŋajepa ŋuna alalak ŋuna egelegelya nakwap, nai epuposi daadaŋ.
46014011	Nai ani pa kayeni ayoŋ aŋajep ŋina irworo ituŋanan, iŋes atemar eruworekerworon egela aneni kaŋ ka Aruwor ayoŋ daŋ egela aneni keŋ.
46014012	Aŋun nai, ikwapei iitanitotor iyes aryamun ŋainakineta ŋuna ke Etau ka Akuj, akilo daadaŋ itemokino toyenut ŋainakineta ŋuna itogogoŋete atukot a Ŋikristo.
46014013	Aŋun, ituŋanan ŋini irworo ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka, itemokino kilip Akuj aŋuna ka ainakinet a ŋinakisileereunet ŋuna irworo iŋes.
46014014	Anerae ani elipi ayoŋ aŋajep a ŋina egelaana, elipi alotooma Etau ka Akuj, nai nyimorikina ŋatameta kaŋ ka Etau.
46014015	Nyo nai erae ayoŋ etiya? Etiyae ayoŋ nuarei nu: elipi alotooma Etau ka Akuj ka a ŋatameta kaŋ daŋ; aeo alotooma Etau ka Akuj ka a ŋatameta kaŋ daŋ.
46014016	Nai ani ilakar iyoŋ neni ka Akuj ka aŋajep a ŋina ke Etau ka Akuj, ikokini nai ituŋanan ŋini emamukar ainakinet ŋin etemari “Amen” aŋuna ka akilip a ŋina ka alakar kon neni ka Akuj ai? Emam epite ŋolo epedorya iŋes ayenun ŋuna irworo iyoŋ.
46014017	Tari kejok akilip kon ŋina ka alakara neni ka Akuj, nyepedori akitogogoŋ ituŋanan ŋinice.
46014018	Alakara ayoŋ neni ka Akuj, anerae erworo ayoŋ ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka ŋuna ke Etau akilo iyes daadaŋ.
46014019	Nai anatukot a Ŋikristo, ejok ayoŋ alimun ŋakiro ŋakan bon ŋuna epuposi ikotere etatam ŋuluce, akilo akirworo ŋakiro ŋalipyo a ŋaŋajepa a ŋuna egelaaka.
46014020	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, nyikote ŋidwe alopite a ŋolo itamyata iyes. Ipedorete iyes akitiya ikwa ŋidwe anakiro a ŋuna aronok, nai alopite a ŋolo itamyata iyes, toruworos ŋituŋa ŋulu ipakito anakiro a ŋuna ka Akuj.
46014021	Igiritae Nakigireta ebe, “Ebala Ekapolon ebe, ‘Alorwor a ŋituŋa a ŋulu irworosi ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelegelya, erwori ayoŋ neni a ŋituŋa kaŋ. Erwori ayoŋ anakituka a ŋituŋa a ŋulu gelae. Nai tari kikote neni daŋ, nyepedorete apupokin ŋakaakiro!’ ”
46014022	Aŋun nai, ainakinet ŋina kirworet ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka erae akitoodikinet aneni a ŋulu nyenupito Kristo, meere neni a ŋulu enupito. Ainakinet ŋina ka akidwar erae akitoodikinet neni a ŋulu enupito, meere neni a ŋulu nyenupito Kristo.
46014023	Ani nai kecunakinosi ŋikanupak daadaŋ iwapei, togeut daadaŋ akirworo ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka, ido tolomut nai nen ŋituŋa ŋulu nyeyenete ŋun kori ŋulu nyerae ŋikanupak, nyetemarete mono ikes ikikerepikinit iyes daadaŋ a?
46014024	Nai ani kirworosi daadaŋ ŋakiro ŋuna einakinit Akuj ikes, ido tolomu ituŋanan ŋini nyerae ekanupan kori ŋini nyeyeni ŋun, epedori iŋes ayenun atemar asecit iŋes. Etubokinete nai iŋes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna epupi iŋes.
46014025	Isileereuni ŋuna alotau keŋ ŋuna imunono, ido toryedik kilip neni ka Akuj, ebala, “Kire, eyai Akuj neni kus!”
46014026	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, apolou a ŋakiro a ŋuna erworo ayoŋ iŋes na: ani iryamiryamete akilip, epedori ipeituŋanan alimun eete, kitatam ice ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, ice toyakar akitoodikinet aneni ka Akuj, ice toyakar akirot a ŋaŋajepa a ŋuna egelaaka, ka ice daŋ kisileereu ŋuna irworoe a ŋaŋajepa a ŋuna egelaaka. Nai itemokino ŋinibore torae ŋini itogogoŋi ŋikanupak.
46014027	Ani keya ŋulu irworosi ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka, itemokino ituŋanan ice kisileereu ŋuna irworosi ikes.
46014028	Ani kemam ituŋanan isileereuni, itemokino ikes kililiŋa cek, kirwor ŋinituŋanan nenipei keŋ bon ka neni ka Akuj.
46014029	Itemokino ŋituŋa ŋiarei kori ŋiuni ŋulu einakinit Akuj ŋakiro keŋ, kirworikis, totamatamaete ŋuluce ŋakiro ŋun.
46014030	Nai, ani kisileerek Akuj akirot keŋ neni a icetuŋanan a ŋini iboi anatukot, itemokino ituŋanan ŋini sek erworo kililiŋ.
46014031	Ipedorete iyes daadaŋ akisera ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj a ŋipeipei, ikotere eyenunete ŋituŋa daadaŋ ka kimukekis.
46014032	Itemokino ainakinet ŋinakiseraet ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj torae ekerworon eyeni epite ŋolo isitiyaa.
46014033	Anerae nyerae Akuj ŋina ke eguriguri, nai erae ŋina ke ekisil. Ikwapei itiyaere anatukon a Ŋikristo a daadaŋ,
46014034	itemokino ŋaberu kililiŋete anatukot a Ŋikristo. Nyecamakinitae ikes erwori; ikwaŋina igiritere Lokisila a Moses, nyecamakinitae ikes apolokinit atukot.
46014035	Ani kecamito ikes ayenun ŋakiro ŋadi, itemokino ikes kiŋita ŋikilyok kec alorerya; anerae erae ŋileec aberu akirworo anatukot a Ŋikristo.
46014036	Meere neni kus elomunitotor Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Akuj. Meere iyes bon iryamut ŋakiro ŋun.
46014037	Ani ketami ituŋanan atemar erae iŋes ekadwaran ŋolo ka Akuj kori ipukat Etau ka Akuj iŋes, itemokino toyenu atemar ŋakiro ŋuna egir ayoŋ tokona neni kus erae akiciket aneni ke Ekapolon.
46014038	Ani pa kemitaki idiotuŋanan ŋakiro ŋun, nyimitakis iŋes daŋ.
46014039	Aŋun nai ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, kiitana nooi akidwar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj. Nyiretakis idiotuŋanan akirwor ŋaŋajepa ŋuna egelaaka,
46014040	nai itemokino kitiyae ŋiboro daadaŋ alopite a ŋolo ajokan ka alopite a ŋolo eriyan.
46015001	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, acamit ayoŋ akitatamun iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna abu ayoŋ okolimok iyes, ŋuna ipotu iyes tocamut, ŋuna tokona icasitor anupit kus.
46015002	Ikiunete iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋun, erae kicata iyes aneni kec lopite ŋolo akalimokinitor ayoŋ iyes – ŋaye kerae anupit kus akoŋinait!
46015003	Abu ayoŋ mono ekobu neni kus ŋakiro ŋuna apolok, ŋuna abu ayoŋ ejau: Abu Kristo totwan aŋuna a ŋasecisya yok, ikwaŋina igiritere Nakigireta.
46015004	Aponi iŋes tonukae, kiteyarunae kelunyar ŋirwa ŋiuni, ikwaŋina igiritere Nakigireta.
46015005	Abu kitoodiun neni a Petero ka neni a Ŋikiyakia a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei.
46015006	Ekaku nabo, abu kitoodiun apaki apei neni a ŋikewuapak keŋ a ŋulu adeparit ekimar kec ŋamiae ŋakan. Eriŋa tokona ŋice kec daŋ eyarete, erae ketwakito ŋice daŋ.
46015007	Ekaku nai, abu kitoodikin neni a Yakobo ka neni a Ŋikiyakia a ŋuluce a daadaŋ.
46015008	Ekaku a daadaŋ, abu eketoodikin ayoŋ daŋ, tari kekoni ayoŋ ituŋanan ŋini ikirikiriunitae akidoun.
46015009	Anerae arae ayoŋ ecaryoit a Lokiyakia, nyitemokino akanyaritae ekiyakia, anerae abu ayoŋ esican Ŋikristo.
46015010	Nai aŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina ka Akuj, arae ayoŋ tokona ekiyakia ka nyeruworo ajokis ŋina abu iŋes okoinak ayoŋ akoŋinait. Akilo, etiya ayoŋ nooi adepar Ŋikiyakia ŋuluce daadaŋ, tari pa kerae agogoŋu kaŋ a elope etiyae, nai ajokis ŋina ka Akuj ŋina eyai neni kaŋ.
46015011	Aŋun, kitorunito Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋun neni kaŋ kori neni a Ŋikiyakia a ŋuluce, ŋakiro ŋun ikes elimonokinio isua, ido ikes pei inupito iyes.
46015012	Ŋakiro nu ikes ikilimonokini isua: adaun akiteyarun Kristo alokatwak. Kaanukiro nai ebaakatar ŋice kus nyiteyarunio ŋikatwak?
46015013	Ani kemam ayarun a ŋikatwak, iŋes atemar nyiteyaruna Kristo;
46015014	ani pa kiteyarunitae Kristo, iŋes atemar erae alimonokin kosi akoŋinait ka erae anupit kus daŋ akoŋinait.
46015015	Nabo daŋ, ikitakani isua esibit ikimodyanakini ŋituŋa ikirworo ŋuna ka Akuj, anerae aponi isua tolimonokinae ebe abu Akuj kiteyaru Kristo alokatwak. Nai pa kiteyarunit Akuj Kristo, iŋes kire atemar nyiteyarunio ŋikatwak.
46015016	Ani pa kiteyarun ŋikatwak, iŋes atemar nyiteyaruna Kristo.
46015017	Ani pa kiteyarunitae Kristo, iŋes atemar erae anupit kus akoŋinait ka eriŋa nyisyoniyo ŋasecisya kus.
46015018	Iŋes nabo atemar, tari ŋulu atwaka enupito Kristo daŋ abukorosi.
46015019	Ani kerae akigeno kosi neni a Kristo ŋina ka akiyar a na bon, iŋes atemar itemokino ŋituŋa ikisyonito isua adepar tari idiotuŋanan anakwap.
46015020	Nai kire, adaun akiteyarun Kristo alokatwak ka itoodiunito ŋun atemar iteyarunio daŋ ŋulu etwakito.
46015021	Anerae ikwaŋinapei ayaunia ituŋanan ipei atwanare neni a ŋituŋa, ayau daŋ ituŋanan ipei ayarun alokatwak neni a ŋituŋa.
46015022	Anerae ikwaŋinapei etwakyata ŋituŋa daadaŋ anakimorikina kec ka Adam, iteyarunio daŋ anakimorikina kec ka Kristo.
46015023	Nai iteyarunio ŋinituŋanan ikona: eteyarun mono Kristo; ekaku iteyarunio ŋikanupak a Kristo apaki ŋina eboŋunio iŋes.
46015024	Todolu nai asalunet ŋina ka akwap; apaki ŋin, ilouni Kristo ŋapukasinei ka ŋapolon ka ŋapedorosyo daadaŋ, ido inak Apukan neni ka Akuj a Papa.
46015025	Anerae, itemokino Kristo kipuka akitodol ŋina ilounia Akuj ŋimoi keŋ daadaŋ, kiwuak ikes kwap ŋakejen a Kristo.
46015026	Emoit ŋolo ilounio ekaku iŋes atwanare.
46015027	Anerae ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, “Adau Akuj akiwuakin ŋiboro daadaŋ kwap ŋakejen a Kristo.” Nai ileere atemar nyimarakinitae Akuj nakiro ŋuna ebasi “Ŋiboro daadaŋ”, anerae Akuj ewuakini ŋiboro daadaŋ kwap ŋakejen a Kristo.
46015028	Nai ani iwuakinio ŋiboro daadaŋ Napukan a Kristo, ebuni nai Lokoku elope kiwuakin Napukan ka Akuj a ŋina adau akiwuakin ŋiboro daadaŋ Napukan a Kristo, ikotere nai toruwor Akuj akepukan a daadaŋ.
46015029	Anukiro nai elosikinito ŋituŋa ŋulu ibatisao aŋuna a ŋikatwak a ŋulu nyibatisatae? Ani pa kiteyarunio ŋikatwak, ikwapei ebaakatar ŋice, kaanukiro nai ibatisaere ŋituŋa ŋul aŋuna a ŋikatwak?
46015030	Kaanukiro ikiwuakinitor isua akiyar kosi natyokisyo ŋisaae daadaŋ?
46015031	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, eyai atwanare kiŋaren kaŋ jwi jwi! Erae nu ŋuna a kire lopite ŋolo eturor ayoŋ aŋuna kus anakimorikina yok ka Yesu Kristo Ekapolon.
46015032	Inyoni nai aryamuni ayoŋ aŋuna ca ke ekibure a ituŋanan, erae ketijiye ŋituŋa ŋulu ikote ŋityaŋ ŋulu adedeŋak alo Epeso? Ani pa kiteyarun ŋikatwak, etiyata nai ikwapei elimunitere, “Emuja ka omata, anerae ikitwaki moi taparacu.”
46015033	Tocoito nyikimodikin! “Emunaarete ŋirukitos ŋulu aronok ŋipitesyo ŋulu ajokak.”
46015034	Itemokino tokyenyut, tojoŋoto asecesec, anerae nyeyenete ŋice alokidiŋ kus Akuj. Alimunit ayoŋ ŋun akisirum iyes ŋileec.
46015035	Nai epedori ituŋanan ice akiŋit atemar, “Ikokinio iteyarunio ŋikatwak ai? Ŋawat mono ŋuna ikote ai eyakaunotor ikes?”
46015036	Iyoŋ ebaŋaanot! Ŋina iekinia iyoŋ ekinyomit nalup, nyelomuni, nyeyari, mati mono ketwana.
46015037	Ibore ŋini iekini iyoŋ erae ca ekinyomit, kerae emomwae kori ekinyomit ece daadaŋ, nai meere ekitoe ŋolo apolou ŋolo adau arupun.
46015038	Nai einakinio ekinyomit ŋol akuwan lopite ŋolo ecamitor Akuj; einakini iŋes ŋolokinyomit akuwan ŋina itemokino.
46015039	Nyikwaan ŋawat a ŋiboorei a ŋulu eyarete; eyakatar ŋituŋa ekuwane ŋolo egelaana, ŋityaŋ daŋ eyakatar ekuwane ece, ŋikyeny daŋ ece ka ŋikolya daŋ ekecekuwane.
46015040	Eyai ekuwane ŋolo alokidiama ka eyai ŋolo alokwap; akibuses ŋina a ŋawat a ŋiboorei a ŋulu alokidiama nyikwaan ka akibuses ŋina a ŋiboorei a ŋulu alokwap.
46015041	Eyakar akoloŋ akibuses keŋ ka alope, elap daŋ eyakar akibuses keŋ, ŋikacer daŋ eyakatar akibuses ŋina egelaana; nabo egelaana akibuses a ŋolokacerit.
46015042	Ikoni nenipei ayarun a ŋikatwak daŋ. Apaki ŋina enukere akuwan, erae ŋina inyasuna; ani iteyarunio, eruwor ŋina nyinyasuna.
46015043	Apaki ŋina enukere, eŋotor ka epalag; ani iteyarunio, ibusiar ka egogoŋior.
46015044	Ani enukio, erae iŋes akuwan ŋina eyakar ekuwane ŋolo ka akwap a na; ani iteyarunio, eruwor akuwan ŋina eyakar ekuwane ŋolo erae etau. Ikwapei eyakar akuwan ŋina erae ekuwane ŋolo ka akwap a na, itemokino daŋ toyai akuwan ŋina eyakar ekuwane ŋolo erae etau.
46015045	Anerae ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, “Abu Akuj tosub ituŋanan ŋini ke ekiŋaren – Adam – erae ituŋanan ŋini eyari”; nai Adam ŋolo esidyon – Kristo – abu toruwor Etau ŋolo einanakini akiyar.
46015046	Meere akuwan ŋina eyakar ekuwane ŋolo erae etau iŋareni mono, nai akuwan ŋina eyakar ekuwane ŋolo ka akwap a na; totupak nai ekuwane ŋolo erae etau.
46015047	Adam ŋolo eŋarenon, ŋolo asubunio analup, erae ekaakwap. Adam ŋolo a ŋiarei ŋolo erae Kristo, erae ekanakuj.
46015048	Ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap, ikote ŋolo asubunio analup; ŋituŋa ŋulu anakuj, ikote ŋolo anakuj.
46015049	Ikwapei ikikwaanar tokona iwon ka ituŋanan ŋini asubunio analup, ikwaŋinapei, ikikwaanikin iwon ka ituŋanan ŋini anakuj.
46015050	Ŋikaitotoi, apolou a ŋakiro a ŋun iŋes na: ibore ŋini esubunitae anakiriŋ ka anaokot, nyepedori aryamun Apukan ka Akuj; ibore ŋini inyasun, nyeryamuni ibore ŋini nyinyasun.
46015051	-
46015052	Kiirasi ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna imunono nu: nyikitwaki iwon daadaŋ, nai ani eruuni arupepe ŋina esidyon, ikilocokinio iwon daadaŋ atipei, ikwa akirwapakinet ŋina ka akoŋu. Anerae ani eruuni arupepe, iteyarunio ŋikatwak, nyetwakete nabo jik; ka ikilocokinio iwon ŋulu ikiyari.
46015053	Anerae ibore ŋini inyasun, itemokino kilocokinoe toruwor ŋini nyinyasun; ibore ŋini etwani, itemokino kilocokinoe toruwor ŋini nyetwani jik.
46015054	Aŋun nai, kedau akinyasuno akilocokin toruwor ŋina nyinyasun ka ibore ŋini etwani toruwor ŋini nyetwani jik, iyookin nai Ŋakigireta ŋuna ebasi, “Adaun atwanare akinyasun; eloun, erikakin!
46015055	Atwanare, ai eyai akiloun kon? Ai atwanare eyai apedor kon ŋina wanet?”
46015056	Eryamunit atwanare apedor ŋina wanet anasecit ka eryamunit asecit apedor keŋ a Lokisila.
46015057	Nai ikilakara neni ka Akuj, a ŋina ikiinak iwon akiloun aŋuna ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo!
46015058	Aŋun nai, ŋikaitotoi kaŋ ŋuluminan, kicata ka nyiryaŋiryaŋasi. Kitiyata ka agogoŋu etic ŋolo ke Ekapolon ikwapei iyeniata iyes atemar emam etic ŋolo itiyaete iyes anakimorikina ke Ekapolon, ŋolo eruwor ekoŋinait.
46016001	Acamit tokona akirwor ŋakiro ŋuna etapito ŋuna a ŋisiliŋa a ŋulu erae tocunakinae kiŋaranakinere ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu eyakasi Yudeya. Itemokino iyes kitiyata ŋuna abu ayoŋ olimok ŋatukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo a ŋulu anakwap a Galatia.
46016002	A ŋinakoloŋit a Esabit, itemokino ŋinituŋanan kus toseta nawae ŋisiliŋa ŋidi lotyae ŋolo ke ebari keŋ, kidiatakinos, ikotere ani abuni ayoŋ, nyecuni nabo ŋice.
46016003	Ani adoluni ayoŋ neni kus, ainakini ŋikilyok ŋulu iseunete iyes ŋabaruwae ŋuna elimorito atemar erae ikes ataŋae; kiyakiyarae ikes yaasi ŋainakineta kus Yerusalem.
46016004	Ani erae kejok ayoŋ daŋ alosit, ikirukori ayoŋ ka ikes.
46016005	Abuni ayoŋ aanyun iyes kadau akitor nakwap a Makedonia, anerae itemokino etor Makedonia.
46016006	Acepaki ikiruki iwon adiouriyen, kori daŋ ikiruki iwon ŋirwa ŋulu ka alilimu; ikotere ikiŋarakis iyes ayoŋ olot kiŋaren analosit kaŋ neni ca alosi ayoŋ daadaŋ.
46016007	Nyacamit akitorun aanyun iyes tokona alotooma apaki na ŋina euruwuana, nai egeno ayoŋ akiya adiopaki ŋina aoyan ka iyes, erae kecamaki Ekapolon.
46016008	Nai eboi ayoŋ a ne alotaun a Epeso akitodol akoloŋit ŋina a Pentekoste.
46016009	Anerae ayakar tokona ayoŋ apaki ŋina ajokan ŋina itemokino ayoŋ etiyaa etic ŋolo apolon ŋolo emaikina etiya, tari kelalak ŋiketepegak a ne.
46016010	Ani kebu Timoteo neni kus, kijautu iŋes ejok, ikotere nyekuryana iŋes irukito ka iyes; anerae itiyae iŋes etic ŋolo ke Ekapolon ikwa ayoŋ.
46016011	Nyejamuwa idiotuŋanan iŋes. Kiŋarakisi iŋes, ikotere torubak elosi a ekisil, ido toboŋu neni kaŋ; anerae edarit ayoŋ iŋes torukut ka ŋikanupak.
46016012	Ŋuna etapito lokaato yok Apolo, abu ayoŋ esimukek iŋes nooi abunore kaapei ka ŋikaitotoi ŋuluce aanyun iyes, nai nyecamunit iŋes nooi abunore inaa ŋirwa lu. Nai ani eryamuni iŋes apaki, ebuni.
46016013	Totenito, kicata ananupit, totitiny ka togogoŋ!
46016014	Ŋuna daadaŋ itiyaete iyes, kitiyata anamina.
46016015	Iyenete iyes Stepana ka ŋituŋa ŋulu ke ekal keŋ, erae ikes Ŋikristo ŋulu esyaunete akinup anakwap a ŋina ka Akaia ka ainakinosi akitiya etic aŋuna a ŋituŋa ka Akuj. Ekemaimai ayoŋ iyes ŋikaitotoi,
46016016	topupo ŋikilyok ŋulu ikote ŋul ka ŋulu itiyaete ka ikes.
46016017	Alakara ayoŋ aŋuna ka abunore a Stepana, Potunato ka Akaiko, anerae etemokis ikes daadaŋ ŋuna arae ŋuna kus;
46016018	anerae esiyeŋut etau kaŋ, ikwaŋinapei aponiata kisieŋuniata ŋitai kus. Ejok akerit ŋikilyok ŋulu ikote ŋul.
46016019	Ikimalaete iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a Asia. Ikimalaete iyes nooi Akwila ka Prisila ta ŋikanupak ŋulu iryamunun kai kec akilip alotooma Ekapolon.
46016020	Ikimalaete iyes ŋikaitotoi daadaŋ ŋulu eya ne. Kimalas itunasi make itoodiunito atemar iminin.
46016021	Ayoŋ Paulo egirit ŋimalasyo lu ka akan kaŋ a elope.
46016022	Ani pa kemina ituŋanan Ekapolon, itemokino iŋes kicenoi. Ekapolon kosi, bua!
46016023	Toyai neni kus ajokis ŋina ke Ekapolon Yesu.
46016024	Toyai neni kus daadaŋ amina kaŋ anakimorikina yok ka Yesu Kristo.
47001001	Ayoŋ Paulo ŋolo arae ekiyakia ŋolo a Yesu Kristo, aŋuna ka acamit a ŋina ka Akuj ka Timoteo lokaato yok, ikigirit abaruwa na neni ka atukot a Ŋikristo a ŋina eyai Korinto ka lotuŋa ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu eya Akaia daadaŋ.
47001002	Toyai neni kus ajokis ka ekisil aneni ka Akuj Papa yok ka aneni ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo.
47001003	Epuro ayoŋ Akuj ŋina erae Papa ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo, Papa ŋolo esyonon, Akuj ŋina ebunitor akiŋarakinet daadaŋ!
47001004	Ikiŋaranakini iŋes iwon alocan yok a daadaŋ, ikotere opedoryata akiŋarakin ŋuluce, ŋulu eyakatar ŋican kan akiŋarakinet ŋinapei abu Akuj ikiinak iwon.
47001005	Ikwaŋinapei ikimorya iwon ŋican ŋulu a Kristo ŋulu alalak, ikimori daŋ alotooma Kristo ŋakiŋaranakineta ŋuna alalak ŋuna ka Akuj.
47001006	Ani kikiryamu isua ŋican, erae aŋuna ka akiŋarakino ka aiuno kus; ani kikiŋarakin isua, erae aŋuna ka akiŋarakino kus, ikiinakinete iyes ŋun akidaŋidaŋ ŋican ŋulu ikote ŋulu idaŋidaŋio isua daŋ.
47001007	Nyiloconokin akigeno kosi ŋina ikiyakar isua neni kus; anerae ikiyeni isua atemar, ikwaŋinapei ikimorya ŋican kosi, ikimori daŋ ŋakiŋaranakineta kosi.
47001008	Ŋikaitotoi, ikicamit isua iyes toyenut ŋican ŋulu aponi isua toryamunae anakwap a ŋina ka Asia. Aponi isua toryamunae ŋican ŋulu alalak nooi, tolalata ŋican ŋul nooi, todaun aneni kosi akigeno daadaŋ ŋina ka akiyar.
47001009	Kire aponi isua totamakinae atemar ikitubokin atwanare. Nai apotu ŋun kitiyakin, ikotere nyiwuakin isua akigeno neni kosi a ŋilopeyek, nai neni ka Akuj bon, a ŋina iteyarununui ŋikatwak.
47001010	Erae iŋes abu itoiu isua anatwanare a ŋina ikoni ŋin ka ikiuni iŋes isua nabo; ikiwuakinit isua akigeno kosi neni keŋ: ikiuni iŋes isua nabo.
47001011	Itemokino iyes daŋ ikiŋarakis isua anakilipasinei kus; ikotere tolakaros ŋikalalak neni ka Akuj aŋuna a ŋarereŋisyo a ŋuna ikiinakini Akuj isua, a ŋuna erae aboŋokinet a ŋakilipasinei a ŋuna alalak.
47001012	Erae akituro kosi na akiteyenunet ŋina a ŋatameta kosi ebe: ikitiŋ isua jwi jwi ŋituŋa daadaŋ akilo nooi iyes, anakerit ka anapatanu a ŋina ebunit aneni ka Akuj ka aŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina ka Akuj, ikidau isua akitiya nu emam aosou ŋina a ŋituŋa.
47001013	Ikigirunit isua neni kus ŋakiro ŋuna ipedorete iyes asyomun ka ayenun. Egeno ayoŋ atemar,
47001014	ikiyenunete iyes isua ejok lopite ŋolopei ikiyenuniata tokona iwadio, ikotere kiturokinos aŋuna kosi lopite ŋolopei iturokinere isua daŋ aŋuna kus Akoloŋit ŋina ke Ekapolon Yesu.
47001015	Aŋuna ayenia ayoŋ nooi ŋuna alosikinit, iŋes acamitor abunore mono neni kus, ikotere toryamut arereŋu ace nabo.
47001016	Atubunit sek ayoŋ abunore aanyun iyes apaki ŋina alosyo ayoŋ Makedonia ka etoru nabo neni kus aboŋuni, ikotere aryamunia adiokiŋarakinet aneni kus aŋuna ka alosit kaŋ Yudeya.
47001017	Apaki ŋina atubunio ayoŋ nu, itamete mono iyes atemar kaŋayaŋayat ayoŋ a? Kori atuki ayoŋ alopite a ŋolo a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka akwap, a ŋulu etenito atemar, “Ee, Ee” ka “Mam, Mam” apaki ŋinapei a?
47001018	Akuj iŋes erae esuuda kaŋ atemar nyerae akiikinet kaŋ atemar ca “Ee” ka “Mam”.
47001019	Anerae Yesu Kristo ŋolo erae Lokoku ka Akuj ŋolo apotu Silipano, Timoteo ka ayoŋ itolimonokin iyes ŋakiro keŋ – nyerae iŋes, “Ee” ka “Mam”, nai erae iŋes, “Ee” ŋolo ka Akuj.
47001020	Anerae aryamut ŋakiikineta daadaŋ ŋuna ka Akuj “Ee” kec aneni a Yesu. Iŋes nai ikilimununuyo alotooma Yesu Kristo atemar “Amen” apaki daadaŋ ŋina ipurore Akuj.
47001021	Akuj alope iŋes ikimorik isua ka iyes alotooma Kristo ka Akuj alope ikityaku iwon,
47001022	ewuak iŋes emacar keŋ neni yok ka ewuak Etau keŋ lotai yok erae ibore ŋini ikiteyenuni iwon atemar eryamunio ibore ŋini adau iŋes akiikin.
47001023	Anyarit ayoŋ Akuj erae esuuda kaŋ, iŋes eyeni ŋuna eyakasi lotau kaŋ! Arae aŋuna pa acamitor ayoŋ akisican iyes, iŋes pa abunio ayoŋ Korinto.
47001024	Nyikicamit isua akitiŋakin iyes ŋuna itemokino tonupa; ikiyeni isua atemar icasito iyes ananupit kus. Akilo ŋun, ikitiyae isua kaapei ka iyes aŋuna ka alakara kus.
47002001	Aŋun, abu ayoŋ otyaku atemar nyabu nabo neni kus eyaloloŋi.
47002002	Ani nai kerae ekesiyaloloŋ ayoŋ iyes, kerae nai ŋae idoŋi akitalakar ayoŋ? Erae ca ŋituŋa ŋulupei abu ayoŋ esiyaloloŋ.
47002003	Iŋes nai abunio ayoŋ egiria abaruwa ŋin neni kus. Pa acamit ayoŋ abunore neni kus, ido ekesiyaloloŋ ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulupei etemokino eketalakasi ayoŋ. Anerae acamunit kire ayoŋ atemar, ani alakara ayoŋ, iŋes atemar ilakara iyes daadaŋ.
47002004	Abu ayoŋ egir neni kus iyaloloŋi ka eryeba etau kaŋ nooi ka egworo daŋ; pa arae ŋuna acamit ayoŋ ŋuna ka akisiyaloloŋ iyes, nai ikotere toyenut amina kaŋ ŋina apolon nooi neni kus daadaŋ.
47002005	Ani keyai idio ŋini esiyaloloŋ ŋinice, nyekesiyaloloŋi iŋes ayoŋ, nai ikisiyaloloŋi iŋes iyes daadaŋ.
47002006	Ituŋanan ŋini ikoni ŋin, akisican anatukot iŋes epedori.
47002007	Nai akilo, itemokino kisyonioto ka kimaimaa iŋes, ikotere nyesuro etau keŋ nooi, ido toluŋakin jik.
47002008	Aŋun, ekelipit ayoŋ iyes kiteyenikis iŋes atemar iminasi kire iyes iŋes nooi.
47002009	Abu ayoŋ ekegirak iyes abaruwa ŋin, anerae acamit ayoŋ ayenun epite ŋolo kiponiata iyes topedoryata akipiyor akikatakinet ŋin, ka erae kipedorito jwi jwi akiwuap ŋakitatameta kaŋ.
47002010	Ani kisyonioto iyes ituŋanan, esyoni ayoŋ daŋ iŋes. Ani kesyon ayoŋ idiotuŋanan – erae kire keyai ŋini itemokino esyoni – esyoni aŋuna kus alotooma Kristo,
47002011	ikotere nai nyikilounia Satan iwon. Anerae ikiyeni iwon ŋuna etuko iŋes.
47002012	Ani ŋina adolunio ayoŋ Toroas alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna a Kristo, abu oryamu atemar kesir Ekapolon keŋaa aina erot ŋolo a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak.
47002013	Nai eyaloloŋi ayoŋ nooi, anerae nyeryamuna ayoŋ lokaato kaŋ Tito aina. Aŋun, abu otema neni a ŋituŋa aina ikianyun, ido olot nai Makedonia.
47002014	Olakaros neni ka Akuj! Anerae ikiŋarenikinit iŋes iwon jwi jwi anakiloun a ŋina a Yesu Kristo! Ikisitiyae iŋes iwon akielakin nakwap daadaŋ eure ŋolo akukunyon ŋolo ka ayenut keŋ.
47002015	Kire, ikirae iwon aneni ka Akuj eure ŋolo akukunyon ŋolo a Kristo ŋolo ielakin lotuŋa ŋulu eiunitae ka ŋulu ebukoro.
47002016	Aneni a ŋice, erae eure ŋolo ka atwanare ŋolo eyauni atwanare; aneni a ŋice, erae eure ŋolo ka akiyar, ŋolo eyauni akiyar. Ŋae epedori akitiya ŋiticisyo ŋulu ikote ŋul?
47002017	Nyikikwaan isua ka ŋuluce ŋulu elalak, ŋulu itusubunito etic ŋolo ka Akuj ŋolo kicurutaet; nai aŋuna eraakar Akuj ikiyakit isua, ikirworo isua ŋuna a kire alokiŋaren keŋ aŋuna ikiraakar ŋiketiyak ŋulu a Kristo.
47003001	Iŋes nai atemar esyakin nabo isua akituro a? Kori ikiitanit isua ikwapei ŋituŋa ŋuluce, aryamun ŋabaruwae ŋuna ikiyenunere isua iyes kori iyes isua?
47003002	Iyes iraakasi ŋabaruwae kosi – ikidau isua akigirakin Kristo lotai kus – ikotere daadaŋ eyenuniata ka tosyoma.
47003003	Iyookino kire atemar iraakasi iyes abaruwa ŋina a Kristo, ŋina erae isua ikigirit. Nyigiritae iŋes ka akalam, nai igiritae a Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj a ŋina eyari ka nyigiritae namoru, nai lotai a ŋituŋa.
47003004	Ikirworo isua nu, anerae ikiwuakinit isua akikinyomit kosi neni ka Akuj, alotooma Kristo.
47003005	Emam ibore ŋini ikiyakar isua, ŋini ikitilimuni atemar ikiyakar isua apedor ŋinakitiyaet etic lo. Apedor ŋina ikiyakar isua ebunit aneni ka Akuj.
47003006	Erae iŋes abu ikiinak isua apedor ŋina kitiyanakinet neni ka Acamunet a ŋina kitete, meere ŋina a Ŋikisila a ŋulu igirir, nai ŋina ke Etau, anerae Ŋikisila ŋulu igiritae ikiarete, nai ikiinanakini Etau akiyar.
47003007	Edeŋokinitoe Ŋikisila namoru, ido abu akica ŋina ka Akuj totakanu apaki ŋina epotunere ikes ka akwaŋ nooi akica aloreet a Moses, kilore Ŋisirael nyepedosi akitere iŋes. Ikwapei keponiata Ŋikisila ŋulu eyaunete atwanare torukut ka akica ŋina etya ŋin,
47003008	etya nai ai akica ŋina erukunete ka ŋiticisyo ŋulu ke Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj?
47003009	Ani ketya nen apolou ŋina a ŋiticisyo a ŋulu ka atubokino, etya nai ai ŋina a ŋiticisyo a ŋulu ka aiuno!
47003010	Iŋes atemar, elunyokin tokona akica ŋina epol nooi neni ayai akica ŋinaŋorot, ŋina apuripuryaar akwaŋis keŋ.
47003011	Ikwaŋina kepoloo akica ŋina kebu topuripuryaar, etya nai ai akica ŋina nyedaun?
47003012	Aŋuna ikiyakar isua akigeno na ŋina apolon, ikirworo emam akuryanu.
47003013	Nyikikwaan isua ka Moses, ŋolo abu torap ereet keŋ ka akitambara, ikotere nyeanyuwaryata ŋituŋa a Isirael akica epuripuryaar, toŋopiya.
47003014	Apotu ŋatameta kec kiryokiata! Tari tokona daŋ, ŋina esyometa ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Acamunet a ŋina Ŋorot, eriŋa ŋatameta kec erapap ka akitambara a ŋinapei a ŋin. Elemanaryo akitambara ŋin apaki bon ŋina imorikinotor ituŋanan ka Kristo.
47003015	Kire, tari tokona, apaki daadaŋ ŋina esyomyata ikes Ŋikisila a Moses, erapenene akitambara ŋatameta kec.
47003016	Nai, ani ibelekin ituŋanan neni ke Ekapolon, elemaryo akitambara ŋin anatameta keŋ.
47003017	Erae nai Ekapolon Etau ŋolo ka Akuj ka neni eyai Etau ŋolo ke Ekapolon, eyai alacakina.
47003018	Ikitoodiunit iwon daadaŋ akica ŋina ke Ekapolon a ŋireetin yok a ŋulu nyerapap ka akitambara. Ikiloconokinio iwon iwadio akitodol ŋina ikikwaanikinor ka iŋes ka erae lo etic ŋolo ke Ekapolon a ŋolo erae Etau ŋolo ka Akuj.
47004001	Ikiinak Akuj isua anakisyon keŋ akitiya etic lo, aŋun, nyikiupi isua atitinyikinit.
47004002	Aŋeri isua ŋiticisyo ŋulu ka amodiyo ŋulu iwuaitae; aŋeri isua amodiyanut ka akibatanar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj. Nai ikiserae isua ŋuna a kire emam akuryanu, ikotere oryamuniata akikinyoma alotuŋa a daadaŋ alokiŋaren Akuj.
47004003	Ani tari kerapap Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ikilimonokini isua, erapap aneni a ŋulu ebukoro.
47004004	Adau ekepukan ŋolo ka akwap a na akitumudukan ŋatameta a ŋulu nyenupito, ikotere nyiŋolikiniata akica ŋina a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak, ŋuna ka apolou a Kristo, a ŋolo ikwaan ka Akuj per.
47004005	Nyikilimonokini isua ŋuna ikikamunito isua; nai ikilimonokini Yesu Kristo ikwapei Ekapolon, ka isua ikwapei ŋiketiyak kus aŋuna a Yesu.
47004006	Arae Akuj abu tema, “Tocau akica anakiryonut”, Akuj ŋinapei ŋin etacau akica keŋ alotai yok, ainakinia iwon akica ŋina ka ayenut ka apolou ŋina ka Akuj ŋina etacaun aloreet a Kristo.
47004007	Nai iwon ŋulu ikiyakar ebari ŋolo ebunit aneni ka Akuj, ikikoni iwon ŋamoti ŋuna eyeunitae a elupe, ikotere ikitoodiunia atemar nyerae apedor ŋina apolon ŋina ka Akuj ŋina yok.
47004008	Ikisilekio isua alowaetin a daadaŋ, nai nyibusokina ikes isua, nyikiyeni isua ŋuna kitiya, nai nyesaluni akigeno kosi.
47004009	Ikisicanitae isua, nai nyeesikina Akuj isua; ikiwanawanae isua, nai nyetwaka isua.
47004010	Ŋapakio daadaŋ iwokitae isua atwanare a Yesu anawat kosi, ikotere itoodiunere akiyar a Yesu anawat kosi daŋ.
47004011	Anakiyar kosi a daadaŋ ikiyapikinit isua jwi jwi atwanare aŋuna a Yesu, ikotere itoodiunere akiyar a Yesu anawat kosi a ŋuna etwakete.
47004012	Iŋes atemar itiyae atwanare aneni kosi, nai itiyae akiyar aneni kus.
47004013	Ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, “Abu ayoŋ erwor, anerae abu onup”. Alonupitene a ŋolopei, ikinupit isua daŋ ka erae ŋakiro ŋun ikirworor.
47004014	Ikiyeni isua atemar, ŋolopei abu kiteyaru Ekapolon Yesu, iŋes pei ebuni akiteyarun isua daŋ kaapei ka Yesu, ido ikiya isua ka iyes kiŋaren keŋ.
47004015	Ŋun daadaŋ itiyasi aŋuna kus, ikotere ajokis ŋina iyata alokimar a ŋikanupak iyatakini akipuro ŋina ka alakara neni ka Akuj.
47004016	Aŋun, nyikiupi isua atitinyikinit. Tari kiyosete iwadio ŋawat kosi amunaar, nai iteteununuyo ŋitai kosi a ŋinakoloŋit.
47004017	Anerae ŋican ŋulu ikiryamunit iwon ŋulu esalunete, erae koŋin kisikwaani ka apolou ŋina ajokan nooi ŋina nyesaluni ŋina itemonokinete ŋican ŋul aŋuna yok.
47004018	Nyikiwuakinit isua ŋatameta kosi loboro ŋulu etakanete, nai loboro ŋulu nyetakanete; ibore ŋini ite iyoŋ, nyeropari, nai ŋini nyetakani, eropari ŋikaru ka ŋikaru.
47005001	Ikiyeni iwon atemar, ani ŋina inyasunor eema lo – akuwan yok ŋina esaluni – eyakaunor Akuj akai aŋuna yok nakuj, akai ŋina adau iŋes alope akitemokin, ŋina a ŋikaru ka ŋikaru.
47005002	Aŋun tokona, ikirurumae iwon ka ikiitanit atemar kerae onapa ere yok ŋolo anakuj – akuwan yok ŋina nyesaluni;
47005003	ani kenapi iwon akuwan ŋina nyesaluni ŋin, nyikiyakaun iwon ikileri.
47005004	Anerae, ani eriŋa iwon ikiya loeema lo, ŋolo ka akwap a na, ikirurumae ka ikiridakinitae; meere aŋuna ikicamitor alemar ekuwane lo ŋolo ka akwap, nai ikicamit iwon onapa ŋawat ŋuna nyesalunete, ikotere kiliko akiyar ŋina nyesaluni akuwan ŋina esaluni.
47005005	Akuj iŋes ikitemok iwon aŋuna ka akilocokin a na ka ikiinak iŋes iwon Etau keŋ erae ibore ŋini ikiteyenuni iwon atemar eryamunio iwon ibore ŋini adau iŋes akiikin.
47005006	Aŋun, ikiyakar isua atitinyu jwi jwi. Ikiyeni atemar ani ca eriŋa isua ikiyari alokuwane a lo, ikilwaka aneni eyai Ekapolon.
47005007	Anerae ikiyari iwon ananupit, meere aŋuna ikiŋolyanakini.
47005008	Ikiyakar isua atitinyu, ido ikiburit isua nooi akimyekin ekuwane lo, ido oruko ke Ekapolon anakuj.
47005009	Aŋun, tari erae kikiya isua lokuwane lo, kori kikiruk ka iŋes anakuj, ŋuna ikilosikinit isua erae akitalakar iŋes.
47005010	Anerae, itemokino iwon daadaŋ owua alokiŋaren Kristo ekatubonokinan yok. Eryamuni nai ŋinituŋanan eropit ŋolo emaikina iŋes toryamu lopite ŋolo itiyator iŋes ejok kori erono alokuwane a lo.
47005011	Ikiyeni isua ibore ŋini erae akerit Ekapolon, aŋun nai ikikatakinit isua akitacamun ŋuluce. Ikiyeni Akuj isua nooi ka egeno ayoŋ atemar ikiyenete iyes daŋ ayoŋ alotai kus.
47005012	Nyikikatakinit isua akitojoka aneni kus; nai ikikatakinit isua ainakin iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, ŋuna emaikina iyes kiturokinotor aŋuna kosi, ikotere topedoryata aboŋonokin ŋulu iturosi aŋuna ke etakane a ituŋanan, nai meere aŋuna a ŋipitesyo keŋ.
47005013	Ani kesibit ikikerepikinit isua, erae aŋuna ka Akuj ka ani kesibit ikiosok isua, erae aŋuna kus.
47005014	Amina ŋina a Kristo iŋes ikipukat isua, anerae ikiyeni isua atemar abu ituŋanan ipei totwan aŋuna a daadaŋ, iŋes atemar emorete daadaŋ atwanare keŋ.
47005015	Abu iŋes totwan aŋuna a daadaŋ, ikotere ŋulu eyarete tojoŋoto akiyar aŋuna kec make, nai toyara aŋuna a ŋolo atwani ka kiteyarunae aŋuna kec.
47005016	Ameun tokona, nyeriŋa isua ikitubokini idiotuŋanan alopite a ŋolo a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka akwap. Tari erae kikiyenunit isua Kristo kocooloŋ alopite a ŋolo ka akwap a na, nyeriŋa tokona ikiyeni iŋes alopite a ŋol.
47005017	Aŋun, ani keyai ŋini eyai tooma Kristo, aruwor iŋes isubuna ŋini kitete; asalut ŋuna ŋorok, apotu ŋuna kitet.
47005018	Akuj iŋes etiya nu daadaŋ, Akuj ŋina ikimorik iwon ka iŋes alotooma Kristo ka abu iŋes ikiinak iwon etic ŋolo ka akimoryanakin.
47005019	Akuj iŋes abu kimorikinos ka akwap alotooma Kristo, nyimari iŋes ŋasecisya a ŋituŋa aŋuna ka akisicania ikes. Ikicikak iŋes isua etic ŋolo ka akimoryanakin.
47005020	Ikirae isua ŋikawuoikinitok ŋulu a Kristo ka erae neni kosi ikinyaritor iyes Akuj anakiro kosi: alokiro a Kristo, ikimaimai isua iyes tocamut akimorikin ka Akuj.
47005021	Amam asecit aneni a Kristo, nai abu Akuj kituruwo iŋes asecit aŋuna yok, ikotere nai iwon alotooma keŋ oruworos ŋulu ikiyookino aneni ka Akuj.
47006001	Ikwaŋina itiyaere iwon kaapei ka Akuj, ikilipit isua iyes nyicanican ajokis ŋina idaut iyes aryamun aneni ka Akuj.
47006002	Anerae ebala Akuj: “Ani ŋina adolyo apaki ŋina kitoodiunet ajokis kaŋ, abu ekeira iyes; ani ŋina adolyo akoloŋit ŋina akaiunia iyes, abu ayoŋ ekeŋarak iyes.” Kiirasi! Erae tokona na apaki ŋina ryamunet ajokis ŋina ka Akuj, erae tokona na Akoloŋit ŋina ka aiuno!
47006003	Nyecamitae isua aruwor akigukinet aneni a idiotuŋanan, ikotere tomam ŋuna itoroniaritere etic kosi.
47006004	Akilo, aloticisyo a daadaŋ a ŋulu ikitiyae isua, ikitoodiunit isua atemar ikirae ŋiketiyak ŋulu ka Akuj, aŋuna ikidaŋidaŋia ka atitinyu: alotooma ŋican, ŋatyokisyo ka ŋiburasinei.
47006005	Aponi ikibuŋae isua, ikiwuakin mabus ka itosutonokin; aponi ikisitiyae isua nooi, nyejotooro kori nyimuja.
47006006	Aŋuna ka asegis alotai kosi, anayenut, anatitinyikinit ka anarimao, ikitoodiun isua ikirae ŋiketiyak ŋulu ka Akuj alotooma Etau ŋolo Asegan, ka anamina kosi a ŋina a kire
47006007	ka ŋakiro ŋuna a kire anapedor a ŋina ka Akuj. Ikiyakar isua akiyookino erae ibore ŋinijiet, ŋinikitijikinet ka ŋini kipakaret.
47006008	Ikitopolooritae ka ikijamuwaritae isua; ikiyanyo ka ikipuroe. Ikitusubunitae isua ŋikalyokonok, erworos bo isua ŋuna a kire;
47006009	ikitusubunitae ŋulu nyikiyenio, itoyenete bo daadaŋ, ikitusubunitae ŋulu ikitwakit, nai kire ikiyari isua ikwapei iteoto iyes. Tari kikisicanitae daŋ, nyikiaritae isua;
47006010	tari kikisiyaloloŋitoe daŋ, ikilelyani isua jwi jwi; kikisibit ŋikulyak daŋ, nai ikitabarenene isua ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak, kesibit emam ibore ikiyakar daŋ, ikiyakar kire ŋiboro daadaŋ.
47006011	Ikirworo isua neni kus Ŋikorinto analacakina; ikisunyakinit isua iyes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna alotai kosi.
47006012	Meere isua ikigol ŋitai kosi aneni kus, nai iyes igol ŋitai kus aneni kosi.
47006013	Erworo tokona ayoŋ neni kus esibit irae iyes ŋidwe kaŋ: kisunyakinae iyes isua daŋ ŋakiro ŋuna alotai kus!
47006014	Tocoito ilomarete nayokot apei ka ŋituŋa ŋulu nyenupito Kristo. Ikokinete mono ŋuna iyookino ka ŋuna nyiyookino erukete ai? Ikokinete akica ka akiryonut imorikinosi ai?
47006015	Ikokinete Kristo ka Satan ecamunosi ai? Nyo epedori akimorikin ekanupan ka ŋini nyerae ekanupan?
47006016	Ikokinete ŋakujo ŋace elomarete Kai ka Akuj ai? Anerae ikirae iwon Akai ka Akuj a ŋina eyari! Ikwaŋina elimunitor Akuj ebe, “Abuni akiboi alotuŋa kaŋ, ido oruko ka ikes; oruwor ayoŋ Akuj kec ka eruworosi ikes ŋituŋa kaŋ.”
47006017	Nabo, ebala Ekapolon, “Itemokino iyes toesikis ikes, totyakaros aneni kec. Nyitap idiobore ŋini nyeseg, ido ekejau ayoŋ iyes.
47006018	Abuni ayoŋ oruwor Papa kus ka iruworosi iyes daŋ ŋidwe kaŋ ŋulusapa ka ŋulupesur, adau Ekapolon ŋolo etiron alimun.”
47007001	Ŋikaakonei ŋuluminan, ikiinakinitae iwon ŋakiikineta nu daadaŋ. Aŋun, etesegutu ŋawat yok aloboro a daadaŋ a ŋulu nyitesegete akuwan ka etau, ido oruworos jik ŋulu ikisegak nooi alotooma akerit Akuj.
47007002	Toŋakinae isua ŋitai kus. Emam ŋuna aronok ŋuna etiyae isua neni a idiotuŋanan, nyemunauna isua idiotuŋanan ka emam ituŋanan ŋini amodikin isua.
47007003	Nyalimunit ayoŋ nu aŋuna ka atubokinia iyes; anerae ikwapei sek alimunitor ayoŋ ekiŋaren atemar ikiminae isua iyes nooi, iŋes nai ikitamunitor isua iyes jwi jwi alotai kosi, kikiyari kori kikitwaka.
47007004	Ekekinyomit ayoŋ iyes nooi, eketuror ayoŋ iyes nooi; ileleba neni kaŋ atitinyu nooi ka alocan yok a daadaŋ, ilapara aneni kaŋ alelyan.
47007005	Tari ŋina adolunere isua Makedonia, nyieŋuna isua. Ayakasi ŋatyokisyo ŋiwaetin daadaŋ, ikirikaunito isua ŋiburasyo alowaetin a daadaŋ ka ayai ekabule lotai kosi.
47007006	Nai, abu Akuj ŋina emaimaan ŋulu esiliyorito ikitogogoŋ isua apaki ŋina adolunio Tito.
47007007	Meere adolun keŋ bon abu ikitalaka isua, nai arae tari epite ŋolo kiponiata iyes kisimukekis iŋes. Abu iŋes itolimok isua epite ŋolo iitanitotor iyes nooi aanyun ayoŋ, epite ŋolo ikibulitor iyes, epite ŋolo ilelakinitotor iyes akiŋarakin ayoŋ; aŋun, eatakin tokona tari alakara kaŋ.
47007008	Kikisiyaloloŋit iyes abaruwa kaŋ, nyeyaloloŋi ayoŋ aŋuna abunio egiria. Abu ayoŋ eyaloloŋ ekiŋaren apaki ŋina aanyunia atemar ipotu iyes kiyaloloŋo aŋuna ka abaruwa a ŋin.
47007009	Nai tokona, alakara ayoŋ, meere aŋuna abunio ekesiyaloloŋ iyes, nai aŋuna abunio akiyaloloŋ kus ikiinak iyes akiki. Abu Akuj kitojok akiyaloloŋ kus, aŋun nyitiya isua ŋadi ŋuna aronok neni kus.
47007010	Anerae akiyaloloŋ ŋina erae acamit ŋina ka Akuj, iŋes ikiinakini iwon akibelekin neni ka Akuj, yau nai aiuno. Emam ituŋanan iyaloloŋi a ŋakiro a ŋun! Nai akiyaloloŋ ŋina ka akwap a na, eyauni atwanare.
47007011	Toanyuwasi ŋuna abu Akuj kitiya aŋuna ka akiyaloloŋ kus! Abu akiyaloloŋ ŋin ikiinak iyes alelakinit akitiya ka akitoodiun atemar emam ŋuna ikikamunito iyes! Ipotu iyes toŋoa aŋuna apotu totakanut, ipotu tokuryaketa aŋuna epedorete akitiyakin nabo. Apotu ŋakiro ŋun ikiinakis iyes akiitan aanyun ayoŋ, ekimuye ŋolo kigaŋet ayoŋ ka akisican ŋolo aratan.
47007012	Aŋun, ani nai kegirit ayoŋ neni kus, nyerae aŋuna a ŋini abu kitiya aronis kori aŋuna a ŋini aponi kitiyakinae aronis neni keŋ, nai arae akisileerekinio iyes alokiŋaren Akuj epite ŋolo epoloo nooi ekimuye kus aŋuna kosi.
47007013	Ŋakiro ŋun nai ikisimukekinito isua. Akilo akimukekinit ŋin bon, ikilelyani isua nooi aŋuna ka alelyan a Tito a ŋolo kipotu iyes daadaŋ kisiyeŋut ŋatameta keŋ!
47007014	Eturo ayoŋ aŋuna kus alokiŋaren keŋ ka nyekerumito ayoŋ ŋileec a ŋun. Nai ikwapei ikirworor isua ŋuna a kire jwi jwi neni kus, erae akituro ŋina ikitoodiunit isua aŋuna kus alokiŋaren Tito ŋina iyookino.
47007015	Aŋun, iyata amina keŋ aŋuna kus ŋapakio daadaŋ ŋuna etamunia iŋes epite ŋolo itenitotor iyes daadaŋ akipup ŋakitatameta keŋ ka epite ŋolo ijauniata iyes iŋes ikuryanito.
47007016	Alelyani ayoŋ nooi, anerae ekekinyomit ayoŋ iyes nooi!
47008001	Ŋikaitotoi, ikicamit isua iyes toyenut ajokis ŋina ka Akuj ŋina adau iŋes ainakin ŋatukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo alo Makedonia.
47008002	Aponi ikes kitemoe nooi alocan a ŋulu apotu ikes kitoro; nai abu alelyan kec ŋina alal kitirimaan ikes anainanakin, tari kekulyakaka daŋ nooi.
47008003	-
47008004	Akalimokini ayoŋ iyes kire atemar apotu ikes inanakis alotyae a ŋolo apedoritotor ikes ka kitedepakis daŋ etyae ŋolo apedoritotor ikes ainanakinia. Anacamit kec a ŋilopeyek, apotu ikes ikidyeka ka ikimaimaa isua ainakin ikes daŋ arereŋu ŋina ruworet ŋipei ka ŋulu iŋarakinete ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj alo Yudaya.
47008005	Apotu ikes kitiyata ŋun – ŋuna pa atamakinitae isua tari iwadio! Ŋina eŋarenon, apotu ikes inakinos neni ke Ekapolon; ani ekaku aŋuna ka acamit a ŋina ka Akuj, apotu ikes inakinos neni kosi.
47008006	Aŋun nai, aponi isua kiŋitakinae Tito ŋolo esyakini etic lo, torubak itiyae jik ka ikiŋarak iyes akirikakin etic ŋolo ajokan lo ŋolo ka amina.
47008007	Iyakatar iyes ŋakiro nu nooi adepar: anupit, erwor, ayenut, akiitanit akiŋarakin, ka amina kus isua; aŋun, ikicamit isua iyes torimaakiata alopite a lo daŋ a ŋolo ka amina.
47008008	Nyalimunit ayoŋ ŋun erae akiciket, nai acamit aanyun akikinyoma ŋina ka amina kus alotooma akisikwaanikin ka epite ŋolo iburitor ŋituŋa ŋulu a Makedonia ainanakin.
47008009	Kire iyenete iyes arimaanut ŋina ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo, ŋolo abu aŋuna kus, tari ŋina abaritor, kituruwor bon ekulyakit aŋuna kus, ikotere nai toruworos iyes ŋikabarak aŋuna ka akulyako keŋ.
47008010	Anakiro a nu, atami ayoŋ atemar ejok iyes akirikakin etic ŋolo ipotu iyes ekaru ŋolo ŋoon kisyakis. Iyes ipotu toruworos ŋulu ke ekiŋaren akitiya etic ŋol, meere akitiya bon, nai acamit akitiya daŋ.
47008011	Aŋun nai, toyakatar acamit ŋinakirikakinet etic ŋol lopite ŋolo iponiata iyes toyeuniata akisyakin ka inanakisi alotyae a ŋolo a ŋiboro a ŋulu iyakatar iyes tokona.
47008012	Ani kiitanito iyes ainanakin, ecamuni Akuj ainakinet kus alotyae a ŋolo iyakatar iyes ŋiboro kus, meere alotyae a ŋolo nyiyakatar.
47008013	Nyabala ayoŋ esieŋa ŋuluce, ido tolalata ŋican kus, nai acamit toriyan iyes daadaŋ.
47008014	Nai tokona, aŋuna iyakatar iyes ŋiboro ŋulu alalak, kiŋarakisi ŋulu a ŋican, ikotere ani moi eryamunete ikes daŋ ŋiboro ŋulu alalak, ikiŋarakis iyes alocan kus, toriyanikin nai epite ŋolo iŋaranakinotor iyes.
47008015	Ikwapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Ituŋanan ŋini kebu kirirau ŋuna alalak, pa ayakar ŋuna alalak nooi ka ŋini kebu kirirau ŋuna ekudyoko, pa ayakar ŋuna ekudyoko nooi.”
47008016	Ikilakara neni ka Akuj aŋuna ewuakinia neni a Tito akiitanit ŋina ka akiŋaranakin ikwa isua daŋ aŋuna ka akiŋarakin iyes!
47008017	Anerae, nyecamuna iŋes ŋuna bon eŋitakinitae isua iŋes, nai acamu iŋes elope anakiitanit keŋ akiŋarakin iyes.
47008018	Ikiyakuunit isua iŋes ka lokaato ŋolo ipurito ŋatukon a Ŋikristo daadaŋ aŋuna ke etic keŋ a ŋolo a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak.
47008019	Meere ŋun bon, apotu nabo ŋatukon a Ŋikristo toseut iŋes arukor ka isua lotic lo ŋolo ka amina ŋolo itiyao isua aŋuna ka akitopoloorya Ekapolon ka akitoodiun epite ŋolo ikiitanitor isua akiŋarakin.
47008020	Ikicoikinit atemar nyikirworore isua neni aronon alotooma epite ŋolo ikiricitor isua ainakinet na ŋina apolon.
47008021	Ikilosikinit isua akitiya ŋuna iyookino, meere alokiŋaren Ekapolon bon, nai alokiŋaren ŋituŋa daŋ.
47008022	Aŋun, ikiyakuunit isua lokaato kosi kaapei ka ikes; adaun isua akirot iŋes ŋarwa ŋuna alalak ka ikiryamu iitanit nooi akiŋarakin anakiro a ŋuna alalak. Nai tokona, eyatakin nooi akiitanit keŋ aŋuna ikikinyomitor iŋes iyes.
47008023	Erae Tito erukitos kaŋ ŋolo ikitiyae kaapei ka ayoŋ akiŋarakin iyes; nai eraakasi ŋikaitotoi ŋuluce ŋikiyakia ŋulu a ŋatukon a Ŋikristo ka eyaunito akipuro neni a Kristo.
47008024	Aŋun, kitoodikisi ikes amina kus, ikotere eyenunete ŋatukon a Ŋikristo daadaŋ amina kus ka toyenut atemar iyookino akituro kosi aŋuna kus.
47009001	Ecaryono ayoŋ akigirakin iyes abaruwa ŋina etapit ŋainakineta ŋuna iyakiyanaryo lotuŋa ŋulu ka Akuj alo Yudeya.
47009002	Ayeni ayoŋ atemar itenito iyes akiŋarakin ka eketuror ayoŋ iyes alotuŋa a ŋulu a Makedonia. Abala ayoŋ ebe, “Ageun alokaru a ŋolo alunyar, etenito ŋikanupak ŋulu eya Akaia akiŋarakin.” Adau alelakinit kus ŋina ka akiŋaranakin akisimukekin ikes ŋulu alalak.
47009003	Tokona, eyakuunit ayoŋ ŋikaitotoi lu, ikotere nyeruwor akituro kosi aŋuna kus akoŋinait anakiro a ŋun. Nai, ikwapei alimunitor ayoŋ, itenito iyes akiŋarakin.
47009004	Ani nai kikipotu isua ka ŋituŋa ŋulu a Makedonia, ido ikiryamun iyes pa itenito, ikirumete isua ŋileec – nyikilimuni nai ŋuna a ŋileec kus a ŋilopeyek – anerae ikikinyomitae sek isua iyes!
47009005	Aŋun, abu ayoŋ otamu atemar ejok akiŋitakin ŋikaitotoi ŋul aberun neni kus eriŋa ayoŋ, ikotere kitemokis ŋainakineta ŋuna iikinito iyes alemun. Kitemokino nai erae ŋainakineta ŋuna icamito iyes ŋilopeyek alemun, meere ŋuna ikitiŋakinitae.
47009006	Toyenete nu: ituŋanan ŋini eekini ŋikinyom ŋulu ekudyoko, elemuni ŋidikudyo; ituŋanan ŋini eekini ŋikinyom ŋulu elalak, elemuni ŋulu elalak.
47009007	Itemokino nai ŋinituŋanan inak ikwapei etubunitor iŋes elope, meere ka alejeo kori ka akitiŋakinit, anerae emina Akuj ŋini einanakini ka alakara.
47009008	Epedori Akuj ainakin iyes alotyae a ŋolo alalan adepar etyae ŋolo iitanito iyes, ikotere nai toyakatar iyes jwi jwi ŋinibore daadaŋ iitanito ka kilapara daŋ aŋuna a etic a ŋolo ajokan a daadaŋ.
47009009	Ikwapei ebaakar Akigiret ebe, “Einanakini ka arimao ŋainanakineta neni a ŋikulyak anakwapin; erubakini akiyookino keŋ ŋikaru ka ŋikaru.”
47009010	Akuj ŋina ekori ŋikinyom neni ke eketan ka atap ŋina kimuja, ikikorakini daŋ iŋes iyes ŋikinyom ŋulu iitanito iyes, kitopolou ikes toraa nooi ŋaraito ŋuna ka arimao kus.
47009011	Ikitabari iŋes iyes jwi jwi, ikotere toruworos ŋulu irimaaka ŋarwa daadaŋ, ikotere nai tolakaros ŋikalalak neni ka Akuj aŋuna a ŋainakineta kus a ŋuna eryamunete ikes aneni kosi.
47009012	Anerae etic ŋolo itiyaete iyes ŋol, nyiŋaranakinit ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj bon, nai eyaunit daŋ neni ka Akuj akipuro ŋina apolon adepar.
47009013	Itoodiuni etic kus ŋol akiyar kus a Ŋikristo ka epote ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak akipuro Akuj aŋuna ke epite a ŋolo ilimoritotor ka iwuapitotor iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna a Kristo, ŋuna iseraete iyes. Ipurete daŋ ikes Akuj aŋuna imoryata iyes ka ikes ta ŋikanupak ŋuluce daadaŋ ibore ŋini iyakatar iyes.
47009014	Anamina a ŋina apolon nooi, ikilipakinete ikes iyes aŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina apolon a ŋina adau Akuj akitoodikin iyes.
47009015	Olakaros neni ka Akuj aŋuna ka ainakinet keŋ a ŋina apolon a ŋina nyepedoryo alimun.
47010001	Ayoŋ Paulo ekemaimai iyes anakiyapara ka anarimaanut a Kristo – ayoŋ ŋolo “Akuryana apaki ŋina ikirukitor iwon” ka “Aryenyaana apaki ŋina alwania aneni kus”.
47010002	Ekelipit iyes nyikitiŋakis ayoŋ aryenyaaniar apaki ŋina adolunio inaa! Ayeni ayoŋ kire atemar apedori aryenyaanikin ŋituŋa ŋulu ikisitanakinete isua ebasi ebe ikitiyae alopite a ŋolo ka akwap a na.
47010003	Kire, ikiboi isua anakwap a na, nai nyikiji alopite a ŋolo ka akwap a na.
47010004	Nyerae ŋiboro ŋulu ikijiyo isua ŋulu ka akwap a na, nai erae ŋiboro ŋulu agogoŋok ŋulu ka Akuj. Ikisitiyae isua ŋiboro ŋul akilounia ŋajorei a ŋolo Aronon.
47010005	Inyasunio isua ŋipegeta ŋulu nyiyookino ka ŋinibore eturon daadaŋ ŋini epedori akiretakin ayenut Akuj; ikikatakinit isua akikamun ŋatameta daadaŋ etacamutu akipup Kristo.
47010006	Ani nai kidaut iyes akitoodiun atemar ipupete ŋuna ikilimokin, etenio isua akisican daadaŋ ŋulu nyepupete ŋuna elimokinitae ikes.
47010007	Iteete iyes ŋiboro alopite a ŋolo etakaniata alokiŋa bon. Eyai idiotuŋanan ŋini ebala arae iŋes ŋini a Kristo a? Itemokino iŋes totam nabo, ido eyenuni atemar eraakae isua daŋ ŋulu a Kristo ikwapei iŋes.
47010008	Anerae nyekerumito ayoŋ ŋileec, tari keturokina ayoŋ nooi aŋuna ka apolou a ŋina ikiinak Ekapolon isua adukunio iyes, nai meere akielielaar iyes.
47010009	Nyacamit ayoŋ otakan esibit acamit akitubul iyes a ŋabaruwae kaŋ.
47010010	Anerae, ebasi ŋice ebe, “Eryenyaaka ka etyoko ŋabaruwae a Paulo, nai ani ikirukit iŋes ka iwon, erae ŋolo epalag ka erae ŋakiro keŋ ŋacaryo!”
47010011	Itemokino ŋituŋa ŋul toyenete atemar ŋakiro ŋuna ikirworo isua a ŋabaruwae ikilwaka, ikwaan ka ŋuna ikirworo isua tari ikirukit ka iyes.
47010012	Kire, nyikiyakar isua atitinyu akimarakin ka akikwaanikin ka ŋituŋa ŋulu igiranakinosi make ŋabaruwae ŋuna eyenunere ikes. Ebaŋaaka ikes nooi! Elemunito ikes akipimet kec a ŋilopeyek ka ipimasi ka akipimet a ŋin.
47010013	Nai nyedepari akituro kosi akipimet ŋina erae etic ŋolo abu Akuj ikiinak isua ka ikimarakinitae iyes nakipimet ŋin.
47010014	Ikimarakinitae iyes nakipimet ŋina abu Akuj ikigerok isua. Aŋun nyitedepakina isua neni sek ikigerokinitoe anaponare kosi akitodol Korinto akisera Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna a Kristo.
47010015	Aŋun, nyikituro isua aŋuna ke etic a ŋolo adaut ŋuluce akitiya, a ŋolo nyimarakinitae nakipimet ŋina sek ikigerokinit Akuj isua. Nai akilo, ikigeno isua atemar topolou anupit kus ka opedosi akitiya etic ŋolo apolon nooi alokidiŋ kus.
47010016	Ani kitiyakinosi ŋun, ikipedori isua alosit nakwapin ŋunace ŋuna alokiŋa Korinto, ido olimonokisi Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak. Nyikiponi isua akiturokinor etic ŋolo adau ituŋanan ice akitiya aneni egerokinit Akuj iŋes.
47010017	Nai ikwapei ebaakatar Ŋakigireta ebe, “Iŋes ŋini ituro, kiturokin aŋuna etiya Ekapolon.”
47010018	Nyecamunit Ekapolon ituŋanan ŋini iteyenuna bon, nai ecamunit Ekapolon ŋini iteyenunit iŋes elope.
47011001	Eitanit ayoŋ atemar itodaŋ iyes ayoŋ, tari kabaŋaana ayoŋ iwadio. Okoe, todaŋae ayoŋ!
47011002	Ayakar ayoŋ arakao aŋuna kus ikwapei eyakar Akuj daŋ arakao aŋuna kus; ikote iyes apese ŋina nyiryamakina ka ekile, ŋina adau ayoŋ akiikin ekile epei bon akiit iŋes – Kristo elope.
47011003	Nai akuryanit ayoŋ ebe ikwaŋina abunio emun tomodikinia Epa ka aosou keŋ, itooliyoryo ŋatameta kus anakikinyomit ka ananupit Kristo.
47011004	Anerae iminasi iyes adaŋit ŋakiro a ituŋanan ca daadaŋ a ŋini ebuni neni kus alimonokin ŋuna a Yesu a ece, nai meere ŋuna a Yesu a ŋolo ikilimonokini isua iyes; icamut iyes etau ka ŋakiro ŋuna ajokak ŋace, ŋuna egelaaka alotau a ŋolo ka Akuj ka a Nakiro a ŋuna Ajokak a ŋuna ipotu iyes kijaut aneni kosi.
47011005	Atami ayoŋ atemar emam epite ŋolo ekeloitotor ayoŋ ŋituŋa ŋul, ŋulu ebookoi iyes “Ŋikiyakia ŋulu apolok nooi”.
47011006	Tari pa kayeni ayoŋ erwor, ayakar ayoŋ aosou ŋina a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak. Adaun isua akisileereun nu neni kus anapakio ka alorotin a daadaŋ.
47011007	Emam idiobore abu ayoŋ ekeŋit iyes ainakin ayoŋ apaki ŋina alimonokinia ayoŋ Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Akuj neni kus. Abu ayoŋ etiditeun bon, ikotere topolooros iyes.
47011008	Apaki ŋina etiyaa ayoŋ alokidiŋ kus, apotu ŋatukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo ŋunace okatac ayoŋ. Alimuni ayoŋ atemar abu ayoŋ odemana ikes ŋiboro kec aŋuna ka akiŋarakinia iyes.
47011009	Ani apaki ŋina arukitere iwon, ŋina ayakar akiitanit kaŋ, abu nyeŋit idiotuŋanan ŋisiliŋa, anerae apotu ŋikanupak ŋulu apote alo Makedonia okoinakis ayoŋ ŋiboro ŋulu eitanit ayoŋ daadaŋ. Aŋun, abu ayoŋ nyetogogoŋ akiyar kus apaki ŋin alopite ke edio.
47011010	Aŋuna a Kristo a ŋolo erae kire, a ŋolo alimonokini ayoŋ, eikinit ayoŋ atemar emam ituŋanan anakwap ka Akaia daadaŋ epedori akiretakin ayoŋ anakituro kaŋ.
47011011	Alimunit mono ayoŋ nu anerae nyakamina ayoŋ iyes a? Eyeni Akuj atemar akamina ayoŋ iyes!
47011012	Arubakini ayoŋ etiyae ŋuna tokona etiyae, ikotere etoŋopikinia “Ŋikiyakia ŋul” ibore ŋini iturotor ebasi itiyaete ikes daŋ lopite ŋolo itiyaere isua.
47011013	Nyeraakasi ŋikilyok ŋul ŋikiyakia ŋulu a kire, eraakasi ŋikiyakia ŋulu alyokonok, ŋulu emodyanakinete ŋituŋa a ŋuna etapito etic kec. Itusubuna ikes ŋikiyakia a Kristo.
47011014	Kire, eyenen ŋun nooi! Tari Satan daŋ epedori akitusubun bon emalaika ŋolo ka akica!
47011015	Aŋun, nyeumokinio erae kitusubun ŋiketiyak keŋ make ŋiketiyak ŋulu itiyaete ŋuna iyookino. Nai ani ekaku, eryamunete ikes ibore ŋini itemokino aŋuna a ŋiticisyo kec.
47011016	Aboŋokini ayoŋ: nyitemokino idiotuŋanan etami atemar arae ayoŋ ebaŋ. Nai ani ketami ituŋanan koŋina, eŋitakinit ayoŋ iŋes okocamu ayoŋ arae ebaŋaanot, ikotere nai oyakaunor ayoŋ daŋ ibore idio ŋini eturokinor.
47011017	Kire, ŋuna alimunit ayoŋ tokona, meere ŋuna ecamit Ekapolon ayoŋ alimun, nai anakiro a nu a ŋuna eturor ayoŋ, erworo ikwa ebaŋaanot.
47011018	Ikwapei eyakatar ŋulu alalak ŋulu iturosi aŋuna a ŋiboro a ŋulu ka akwap, ayoŋ daŋ etiyae ŋunapei.
47011019	Iosok iyes ŋilopeyek, aŋun idaŋito iyes ŋibaŋaanotin ka alakara!
47011020	Idaŋito iyes ituŋanan ŋini ikitusubunit iyes ŋipi kori ŋini ikinipit kori ikilokit kori ikijamuwarit kori ikibapabapae iyes.
47011021	Ekerumito ayoŋ ŋileec acamun atemar ikitimit isua nooi akitiya ŋakiro ŋun. Ani kepedo ituŋanan idio akiturokin aŋuna a idiobore – erworo ayoŋ nu ikwa ebaŋaanot – apedori ayoŋ daŋ akitiya ikwaŋinapei koŋin.
47011022	Eraakasi ikes Ŋiburaniyae a? Ayoŋ daŋ arae. Eraakasi ikes Ŋisirael a? Ayoŋ daŋ arae. Eraakasi ikes ŋiletok ka Aburaam a? Ayoŋ daŋ arae.
47011023	Eraakasi ikes ŋiketiyak a Kristo a? Erworo ayoŋ ikwa ŋolo a ŋikerep – eloit ayoŋ ikes anaraakau eketiyan! – Abu ayoŋ etiya nooi adepar, aponi ekewuakin mabus ŋarwa ŋakalalak, ekebuŋatae ŋakibuŋa ŋuna nyimarun, ŋapakio ŋuna alalak adikino atwani.
47011024	Ŋarwa ŋakan apotu Ŋiyudayan ekebuŋata ayoŋ a ŋadase ŋakibokoi ŋatomoniuni ka ŋakanikaomwon.
47011025	Ŋarwa ŋauni aponi ekebuŋae ayoŋ a ŋibelae; apeirwait aponi ekemasamasae a ŋamoru. Ŋarwa ŋauni, abu ameeli ŋina adokit ayoŋ tobuburikin nanam; apeirwait abu eriya anakipi apaaran jwii ka akuwar kya.
47011026	Analosit kaŋ ŋarwa ŋuna alalak, abu omin kidiŋ aronis ŋina a ŋaŋololin a ŋuna aleleete ka aronis ŋina a ŋikademanarak, aronis ŋina a Ŋiyudayan a ŋulu pei erae ŋikaatuŋa ka ŋina a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan; ayai aronis lotaunio, nariet, aronis ŋina a ŋanamyo ka aronis ŋina a ŋikonei a ŋulu alyokonok.
47011027	Alal etic ka ŋatyokisyo; ŋarwa ŋakalalak pa ajotoonor ayoŋ; abu akoro ka akure okonyam, ŋarwa ŋuna alalak, amam akimuj ŋina etemokino, amam neni perot, kori ŋilowi ŋulu napan.
47011028	Akilo akimar ŋuluce daadaŋ, ayakar ayoŋ jwi jwi atamatam nooi ŋuna ka akiŋarakin ŋatukon a Ŋikristo daadaŋ.
47011029	Ani epalag idiotuŋanan, ayoŋ daŋ apalagagi; ani kiteseci idiotuŋanan, eyaloloŋi ayoŋ daŋ.
47011030	Ani kemaikina ayoŋ akiturokin, itemokino eturokin a ŋiboro a ŋulu itoodiunito atemar apalag ayoŋ.
47011031	Eyeni Akuj, Papa ke Ekapolon Yesu – ŋolo ipuritoe ŋikaru ka ŋikaru atemar nyerworo ayoŋ alyokonu.
47011032	Ani ayai ayoŋ Damasko, abu ekawuoikiniton etic ke erwosit a ŋolo enyaritae Aretas kiwuak ŋisigarya lokekia ŋulu ke etaun akikamun ayoŋ.
47011033	Nai aponi ekeyooliyor ayoŋ a ebukit, ekesitori loole ŋolo ayai narwatata ka abu osi aneni keŋ.
47012001	Itemokino ayoŋ eturokin tari kemam epoida daŋ a? Nai erwori ayoŋ tokona ŋuna eketatakanik ka eketoodik Ekapolon ayoŋ.
47012002	Ayeni ayoŋ ekile ece ŋolo a Kristo, ŋolo aponi yaarae kidiama nakuj ŋikaru ŋitomon ka ŋiomwon ŋulu alunyarosi. Nyayeni ayoŋ erae keyakar iŋes aina akuwan kori etau bon – Akuj bon eyeni!
47012003	Ayeni ayoŋ atemar aponi ekile ŋol yaarae najakaanut ŋina anakuj. Nyayeni ayoŋ erae keyakar iŋes aina akuwan kori etau bon – Akuj bon eyeni!
47012004	Abu iŋes kiira ŋakiro ŋuna nyepedori idiotuŋanan akirwor ŋuna nyepedoryo alimun.
47012005	Aŋun, eturokinor ayoŋ ekile ŋol, nai nyeturokin ayoŋ aŋuna kaŋ ke elope, mati apalago kaŋ bon.
