51003016	Kimyekisi ŋakiro a Kristo anapedor ka anaosou kec kiboiyoto alotai kus; kitatamas ka tolimonokinos ŋun make anaosou a daadaŋ. Toeos Ŋieosyo a Daudi, ŋieosyo ŋulu ipurore Yesu ta ŋieosyo ŋulu ke Etau; toeikisi ka alakara neni ka Akuj alotai kus.
51003017	Ŋinibore daadaŋ itiyaete kori irworosi iyes, itemokino kitiyata alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu, tolakara neni ka Akuj Papa alotooma Yesu.
51003018	Ŋaberu, topupete ŋikilyok kus, ikwa ŋina itemokino Ŋikristo kitiyata.
51003019	Ŋikilyok, tominas ŋaberu kus ka nyidedeŋikinito ikes.
51003020	Ŋidwe, topupete ŋikauruunak kus alopitesyo a daadaŋ, anerae italakarito ŋun Akuj.
51003021	Atapapa, nyitoŋoa ŋidwe kus, ikotere nyeluŋakin ikes.
51003022	Ŋipi, topupete ŋikapolok kus ŋulu ka akwap a na alopitesyo a daadaŋ, meere apaki ŋina ikiteoto ikes iyes bon, anerae icamito iyes ikitojoka ikes iyes; nai kitiyata ka ainakina aŋuna ka akerit Ekapolon Yesu.
51003023	Ibore ŋini itiyaete iyes daadaŋ, kitiyata ka agogoŋu kus a daadaŋ esibit itiyaete ŋuna ke Ekapolon, meere ŋuna a ŋituŋa;
51003024	anerae iyenete iyes atemar Ekapolon iŋes ikiinakini iyes eropit ŋolo iŋadakinit iŋes aŋuna a ŋituŋa keŋ. Kristo iŋes erae Ekapolon ŋolo a kire, ŋolo ijaanakinete iyes.
51003025	Ŋini daadaŋ itiyae aronis, isicanio emam atyakatyak aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna aronok a ŋuna itiyae iŋes.
51004001	Ŋikapolok, totiŋito ŋipi kus alopite a ŋolo ajokan; toyenete atemar eyai iyes daŋ Ekapolon nakuj.
51004002	Torubakisi jik ilipete ka totenito anakilip, tolakara neni ka Akuj.
51004003	Kilipeneneete aŋuna kosi daŋ, ikotere ikiinakini Akuj isua apaki ŋina ajokan ŋina limonokinet ŋakiro ŋuna imunono, ŋuna erae ŋakiro a Kristo, ŋuna erae ikes pei ayakar ayoŋ mabus.
51004004	Kilipete, ikotere eserae ayoŋ ŋun, alopite a ŋolo emaikina ayoŋ eseraa.
51004005	Itemokino iyes toosok alopitesyo a ŋulu iboiyoto iyes alokidiŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu nyeraakasi Ŋikristo. Kisitiyata ejok apaki daadaŋ ŋina iyakatar iyes.
51004006	Itemokino erwor kus jwi jwi tojok ka tobob ka itemokino iyes toyenete epite ŋolo emaikina toboŋonokinioto ŋinituŋanan ejok.
51004007	Ikilimokini iyes Tuciko ŋakiro ŋuna akatapito ayoŋ daadaŋ. Erae iŋes lokaato ŋolo minat alotooma Ekapolon Kristo, ŋolo erae eketiyan ŋolo ikinyomitae isua, ŋolo ikitiyae kaapei ka isua etic ŋolo ke Ekapolon.
51004008	Ŋakiro ŋun iŋes eyakuunitor ayoŋ iŋes neni kus, alimokin iyes epite ŋolo iboiyere isua, ikotere nai ikisimukekis iyes ŋun.
51004009	Erukunete iŋes ka Onesimo, lokaato yok ŋolo minat alotooma Kristo, ŋolo ikinyomitae isua, ŋolo erae ekaatukot kus. Ikilimokinete ikes iyes ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna itiyasi a ne.
51004010	Iyakuunit Aristako ŋolo eyai mabus kaapei ka ayoŋ ŋimalasyo neni kus; Mariko daŋ lokaaya a Baranaba iyakuunit ŋimalasyo neni kus. (Idaut iyes ayenun ŋuna kitiya aŋuna ka akijaun Mariko erae kebu inaa.)
51004011	Yesu daŋ ŋolo enyaritae Yusito iyakuunit ŋimalasyo. Ŋuluuni ŋul ikes bon eraakasi Ŋiyudayan ŋulu enupito neni a Kristo, ŋulu ikitiyae kaapei ka ayoŋ aŋuna ka Apukan ka Akuj ka ekesimukekinito ikes ayoŋ nooi.
51004012	Ikimalae iyes Epapuras, ŋolo erae ekaatukot kus, eketiyan ŋolo a Yesu Kristo. Ikitamunit iŋes iyes nooi jwi jwi anakilip keŋ, ilipenene iŋes atemar ikisicat Akuj iyes ikwapei ŋulu iyenete ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj nooi ka ŋulu itiyaete anacamit keŋ.
51004013	Apedorit ayoŋ elope alimokin iyes epite ŋolo abunio iŋes kitiyaa ka agogoŋu aŋuna kus ka aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu eyakasi Laodikeya ka Ierapolis.
51004014	Ikimalaete iyes Demas ka Luka ŋolo minat ŋolo erae edakitar kosi.
51004015	Kimalakinae ŋikaitotoi alotooma Kristo ŋulu eyakasi Laodikeya, kimalata Nimpa daŋ ka ŋikanupak ŋulu iryamunun kai keŋ.
51004016	Ani kirikakis iyes akisyom abaruwa na, itemokino kiyakiyasi tosyomae anatukot a Ŋikristo a ŋina eyai Laodikeya. Nabo, itemokino iyes daŋ tosyoma abaruwa ŋina ikiyakikinete iyes ŋikanupak ŋulu eya Laodikeya.
51004017	Tolimokisi Arikipo ebe, “Itemokino iyoŋ kirikak etic ŋolo ke Ekapolon, ŋolo aponi ikiinakin iyoŋ akitiya.”
51004018	Ayoŋ Paulo egirit ŋimalasyo lu ka akan kaŋ ke elope. Nyikimuryak iyes aenonu kaŋ alomabus. Toyai neni kus ajokis ŋina ka Akuj.
52001001	Ayoŋ Paulo ka Silipano ta Timoteo ikigirit abaruwa na neni ka atukot a Ŋikristo a ŋulu eyakasi Tesalonika, a ŋulu erae ŋulu ka Akuj Papa ka ŋulu ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo. Toyai neni kus ajokis ka ekisil.
52001002	Ikilakanari isua jwi jwi neni ka Akuj aŋuna kus a daadaŋ, ka ikitamununuyo isua iyes apaki daadaŋ ŋina ilipere.
52001003	Anerae apaki daadaŋ ŋina ilipere isua Akuj Papa, ikitamunit epite ŋolo itiyaata iyes aŋuna ka anupit kus ka epite ŋolo imunikinitotor aŋuna ka amina kus, ta epite ŋolo ititinyikinitotor aŋuna ka akigeno kus neni ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
52001004	Ŋikaitotoi, iyes ŋulu ikimina Akuj, ikiyeni isua atemar adau iŋes aseun iyes aruwor ŋulu keŋ.
52001005	Anerae aponi isua yaunae Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak neni kus, meere alorwor bon, nai anapedor a Etau a ŋolo Asegan ka ipotu iyes toanyut kire epite ŋolo ikikinyomitor isua jik ŋakiro ŋun. Iyenete iyes epite ŋolo ikiboiyo isua apaki ŋina ikirukitor iwon; arae aŋuna ka akiŋarakin iyes.
52001006	Ipotu iyes ikituputo isua ka Ekapolon, anerae ipotu kijaut ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ka alakara a ŋina ebunit aneni ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan, tari ŋina daŋ iponiata iyes toryamuniata ŋican ŋulu alalak.
52001007	Alopite a ŋol, ipotu iyes toruworos akitaanyikinet neni a ŋikanupak a daadaŋ a ŋulu alo Makedonia ka Akaia.
52001008	Anerae meere bon ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon ŋuna alimonokin iyes eelakin Makedonia ka Akaia, nai tari anupit kus Ekapolon, eelakin akwap daadaŋ. Aŋun, emam ŋace ŋuna itemokino isua olimutu.
52001009	Kire, erae ŋituŋa ŋuluce ŋilopeyek irworosi epite ŋolo ikijauniata iyes isua apaki ŋina aponere isua akipeyokin iyes ka epite ŋolo iponiata iyes kibelekinos anakujo, ido kiwuapa Akuj ŋina a kire ŋina eyari;
52001010	nabo, irworosi epite ŋolo idaritotor iyes Lokoku keŋ bu anakuj – Yesu ŋolo abu iŋes kiteyaru alokatwak ŋolo ikiuni iwon ananyunyura a ŋina ebunit aneni ka Akuj.
52002001	Ŋikaitotoi, iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek atemar abu aponare kosi aanyun iyes nyeruwor akoŋinait.
52002002	Iyenete iyes epite ŋolo aponere ikiteryamunere isua ŋican ka itobolyare alo Pilipi. Kikote neni daŋ, abu Akuj yok ikiinak isua atitinyu ŋina limonokinet iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna eponito aneni keŋ, tari ŋina atyonio nooi etic kosi.
52002003	Apaki ŋina ekatakinitere isua akitacamun iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, pa adyakaritae isua, kori pa erworoe ŋakiro ŋuna ka asiilyo ka daŋ pa arae ŋuna modikinet idiotuŋanan.
52002004	Nai akilo, erae ŋuna ikirworo isua jwi jwi ŋuna ecamit Akuj isua kirworoe, anerae adau iŋes aryamun isua ikirae ŋulu emaikina ikicikakin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak. Aŋun, nyikirworo isua aŋuna ka akitalakar ŋituŋa, nai akitalakar Akuj ŋina eyeni ŋuna eya lotai kosi.
52002005	Anerae iyenete iyes kire atemar, nyirworo isua ŋakiro ŋuna ka akirapirap iyes ka nyelimonokina isua Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak aŋuna ka aryamunia idiobore aneni kus – Akuj iŋes erae esuuda kosi!
52002006	Pa ewaritae isua arwonu alotuŋa, kerae aneni kus kori anituŋanan a idio.
52002007	Ikwapei ikiraakar isua Ŋikiyakia a Kristo, kepedoritae akisiyaloloŋ iyes aŋuna ka aryamun akiŋarakinet adio aneni kus. Nai ikiyapara isua apaki ŋina ikirukitor iwon; ikikoni isua aberu iricit ŋidwe keŋ.
52002008	Aponi isua ikiminakin iyes nooi, ido aponi toryamunae alakara, meere ŋinamoret Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak bon ka iyes, nai tari akiyar kosi a ŋilopeyek; anerae ipotu iyes toruworos ŋuluminan kosi.
52002009	Anerae ŋikaitotoi, itamunito iyes epite ŋolo etiyaere isua ka agogoŋu nooi akuwar ka apaaran, ikotere nyikisiyaloloŋ isua iyes alotooma apaki ŋina ikilimonokinia isua iyes Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ka Akuj.
52002010	Iraakasi iyes ŋisuudae kosi, Akuj daŋ erae, iŋes atemar arae ŋipitesyo kosi ŋulu ajokak nooi, ŋulu eyookino ka ŋulu amam adyakaret adio aneni kus a ŋulu inupito.
52002011	Iyenete iyes epite ŋolo eŋarakinitere isua ŋinituŋanan alokidiŋ kus ikwa iŋarakinitor papa ŋidwe keŋ.
52002012	Aponi isua ikisimukekin iyes, ikimaimae ka aponi torubakinae ikitumunikinitoe iyes akiboi anakiyar a ŋina itopoloorit Akuj, ŋina ikinyarit iyes Napukan ka napolou keŋ.
52002013	Ikilakanar nabo isua jwi jwi neni ka Akuj, anerae ŋina iponiata iyes kiiraryata ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj aneni kosi, ipotu iyes tocamut pa erae ŋakiro ŋuna a ituŋanan, nai erae ŋuna ka Akuj ka erae kire ŋakiro keŋ ŋuna tokona itiyaete alotooma kus a ŋulu inupito.
52002014	Ŋikaitotoi, ikitakanikis iyes daŋ ŋunapei apotu totakanut neni a ŋatukon a Ŋikristo a ŋulu ka Akuj a ŋulu alo Yudaya, neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu erae ŋulu a Yesu Kristo. Ipotu iyes daŋ toryamut ŋican alotuŋa a ŋulu erae ŋulu ka akwap kus, lopite ŋolopei aponiata ikes toryamuniata ŋican aneni a ŋituŋa kec a ŋulu erae Ŋiyudayan.
52002015	Ikes apotu toara Ekapolon Yesu ka ŋikadwarak daŋ; nabo apotu ikisican isua. Nyitalakarito ikes Akuj, itidiŋito ikes ŋituŋa daadaŋ nooi.
52002016	Apotu ikes kikatakis tari akiretakin isua alimonokin ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋakiro ŋuna eryamuniata ikes aiuno. Alopite a ŋol, apotu ŋasecisya kec kilelebikinos. Nai tokona adolu anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj neni kec.
52002017	Nai ŋikaitotoi, apaki ŋina ikiesikinere isua iyes adiouriyen – nai meere anatameta kosi – aponi isua ikiitun iyes nooi, kiwarae epite ŋolo ikianyunor ka iyes nabo!
52002018	Aŋuna acamitere isua aboŋun neni kus, abu ayoŋ Paulo elope ekatak abunore ŋapakio ŋuna alalak, nai abu Satan ikisipiyo isua.
52002019	Anerae iyes iraakasi akigeno kosi, alelyan ka ŋakiro ŋuna ikituror isua alotooma akiloun alokiŋaren Ekapolon yok Yesu, apaki ŋina eboŋunio iŋes.
52002020	Kire, irae iyes akituro ka alelyan kosi!
52003001	Ekaku jik, pa ikipedorit isua akidaŋidaŋakin. Aŋun, aponi isua totyakunae akiboi make alo Asen,
52003002	aponi isua kiyakuunae Timoteo lokaato yok ŋolo ikitiyae ka isua aŋuna ka Akuj alotooma alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna a Kristo. Aponi isua kiyakuunae iŋes akitogogoŋ ka akisimukekin iyes ananupit kus,
52003003	ikotere nai nyejamak idio alokidiŋ kus anupit keŋ aŋuna a ŋakisicaneta a ŋun. Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek atemar erae ŋican ŋul ŋulu acamaki Akuj atemar kitiyakinos neni yok.
52003004	Anerae, ani eriŋa isua ikirukit ka iyes, aponi isua itolimokin iyes eriŋa apaki atemar ikilosi iwon aryamun ŋican; erae kire ŋunapei ŋun apotu totakanut ikwaŋinapei iyeniata iyes.
52003005	Aŋakiro a ŋun, pa apedorit ayoŋ akidaŋidaŋakin jik; ido abu eyaku Timoteo, ikotere oyenunia epite ŋolo eyakar anupit kus, anerae akuryanit ayoŋ atemar acepaki kedau Satan eketemon akitem iyes ka aruwor etic kosi ekoŋinait!
52003006	Nai tokona, aboŋu Timoteo aneni kus, ikilimok iŋes isua ŋakiro ŋuna ka alakara ŋuna ka anupit ka ŋuna ka amina kus. Ikilimok iŋes isua atemar ikitamunito iyes isua jwi jwi ka alakara; nabo ikiburakinit iyes aanyun ka isua lopite ŋolopei ikiburakinitor isua daŋ aanyun ka iyes.
52003007	Aŋakiro a ŋun ŋikaitotoi, abu epite ŋolo inupitotor iyes ikisimukek isua anatyokisyo ka alocan kosi.
52003008	Ikiyari kire tokona isua, anerae igogoŋ iyes anakimorikina kus ke Ekapolon.
52003009	Epol nooi alakara kosi neni ka Akuj yok aŋuna ka alelyan a ŋina ikiyakar isua alokiŋaren keŋ aŋuna kus.
52003010	Apaaran ka akuwar, ikiŋisit isua Akuj ka agogoŋu itocamak isua oanyunos ka iyes ka ikiyataki iyes ŋuna daadaŋ iitanito ananupit kus.
52003011	Ikilipi Akuj Papa elope ka Ekapolon yok Yesu, kitemonok erot aŋuna kosi, ikotere todolunoe isua neni kus!
52003012	Nai aŋuna kus, ikilipit isua Ekapolon atemar kiyatak amina kus ŋina imininia iyes make ka ŋina iminatar iyes ŋituŋa daadaŋ, tolalaar iŋes kikok ŋina ikiyakar isua aŋuna kus.
52003013	Alopite a ŋol, ikitogogoŋi iŋes iyes ka iruworosi iyes ŋulu iyookino ka ŋulu asegak alokiŋaren Akuj Papa yok, apaki ŋina etakanuniata Ekapolon Yesu kaapei ka ŋulu erae ŋulu keŋ.
52004001	Ŋuna esidyok ŋikaitotoi, ipotu iyes toyenut aneni kosi epite ŋolo itemokino iyes iboiyoto, ido kitalakasi Akuj. Kire erae epite ŋolopei ŋol sek iboiyoto iyes. Nai tokona ikilipit ka ikimaimai isua iyes alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu, kitiyata nooi akilo tari ŋina sek.
52004002	Anerae iyenete iyes ŋuna aponi isua itolimokin iyes alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu.
52004003	Ŋuna ecamit Akuj ikes nu: toruworos ŋulu isegak ŋulu itoodiuna anakiyar kus atemar irae ŋulu keŋ. Toŋero amalao;
52004004	itemokino ŋolokile toyeni epite ŋolo eryamunia aberu, epite ŋolo italakarit Akuj ka ŋituŋa.
52004005	Meere alokibure a ŋolo aronon, ikwa ŋituŋa ŋulu a ŋakwapin ŋulu nyeyenete Akuj.
52004006	Anakiro a ŋun nai, nyitemokino idiotuŋanan itiyae ŋuna aronok neni a lokaato keŋ alotooma Ekapolon, kori amodikin iŋes a ediopite. Adaun isua alimokin iyes ŋun ka agogoŋu eriŋa apaki, ikiteyenikin daŋ atemar ebuni Ekapolon akisican ŋulu itiyaete ŋun.
52004007	Nyenyara Akuj iwon akiboi alokibure a ŋolo ka amalao, nai akiboi anakiyar a ŋina asegan, a ŋina itoodiunit atemar ikirae ŋulu keŋ.
52004008	Aŋun nai, ŋini ewouni ŋakiro ŋun ŋuna ikilimonokini isua, nyerae ituŋanan eŋerit iŋes, nai Akuj, ŋina adau ainakin iyes Etau ŋolo Asegan.
52004009	Nyitemokino ayoŋ ekegirak iyes ŋakiro ŋuna ikamunito amina alokidiŋ kus ŋikanupak, anerae adau Akuj akitatam iyes ŋilopeyek epite ŋolo ipedoryata aminanar make.
52004010	Kire iminasi iyes ŋikaitotoi kus daadaŋ alotooma Ekapolon, ŋulu eyakasi nakwap daadaŋ ŋina a Makedonia. Nai ikisimukekinit iyes ŋikaitotoi, kitiyata nooi akilo tari ŋina sek.
52004011	Kiwara nooi epite ŋolo ajokan ŋolo kiboiyet; itemokino ŋinituŋanan tomitak ŋuna keŋ a ilope, kitiyau a ŋakan keŋ ibore daadaŋ ŋini iitanit iŋes aŋuna ka akiyar keŋ, ikwapei sek ikilimokinitor isua iyes.
52004012	Alopite a ŋol, ikikerete iyes ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae ŋikanupak, ido daŋ nyiitanete iyes adiokiŋarakinet aneni a ituŋanan a idio.
52004013	Ŋikaitotoi, ikicamit isua iyes toyenut ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu atwaka, ikotere nyiyaloloŋioto iyes ikwa ŋituŋa ŋuluce ŋulu emam akigeno.
52004014	Ikinupit iwon atemar abu Yesu totwan ka abu toyaru, ikwaŋinapei, iteyaruni Akuj ŋikatwak ŋulu sek anupito Yesu, ido ya ikes kaapei ka Kristo neni keŋ.
52004015	Ŋuna ikilimonokinio tokona isua iyes erae ŋakiro ŋuna etatami Ekapolon: iwon ŋulu eriŋa ikiyari akitodol apaki ŋina eboŋunio Ekapolon, nyiŋarenikinio iwon ŋituŋa ŋulu adaut atwakare.
52004016	Anerae, apaki ŋina elimunio Akuj atemar adol apaki, iirarete ŋituŋa etoil ŋolo ke emalaika a ŋolo apolon ka eruye ŋolo ka arupepe a ŋina ka Akuj. Apaki ŋin nai ebunio Ekapolon elope anakuj. Isyaunete mono ŋikatwak ŋulu sek anupito Kristo ayarun;
52004017	ido nai orukosi iwon ŋulu eriŋa ikiyari kaapei ka ikes kidiama lodouwon akiryamun ka Ekapolon. Oruko nai ka Ekapolon jwi jwi.
52004018	Aŋun nai, kisimukekinos make a ŋakiro a ŋun.
52005001	Ŋikaitotoi kaŋ, nyitemokino ayoŋ ekegirak iyes ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋirwa kori a ŋapakio a ŋuna itiyakinotor ŋakiro ŋun.
52005002	Anerae iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek ejok nooi atemar ebuni Akoloŋit ŋina ke Ekapolon ikoni neni ebunio ekokolan nakwaare.
52005003	Erae apaki ŋina etemaryata ŋituŋa ebe, “Eyai ekisil ka emam awasya,” iŋes atipei eŋesunor akinyasuno neni kec! Eŋesun iŋes lopite ŋolo eŋesunor aryebo neni ka aberu a ŋina eapi akidoun, ka emam ŋituŋa ebucarosi.
52005004	Nai ŋikaitotoi, nyiyakasi iyes nakiryonut, aŋun nyikiŋesari iyes Akoloŋit ŋin ikwa ekokolan.
52005005	Anerae irae iyes daadaŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akica ka ŋulu ka apaaran; meere iwon ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akuwar kori ŋulu ka akiryonut.
52005006	Aŋun nai, nyitemokino iwon ikijotoe ikwa ŋuluce, nai itemokino iwon ikikienyi ka ikiyeni ŋuna kitiyakina ikwa ŋituŋa ŋulu nyemerasi.
52005007	Ŋulu ejotoete, ejotoete nakwaare ka erae nakwaare emeranakinotor ŋikamerak.
52005008	Nai ikirae iwon ŋulu ka apaaran, ido itemokino iwon ikikwaan ka ŋituŋa ŋulu nyemerasi, ŋulu eyenete ŋuna itiyaete. Onapa anupit ka amina ikwa arapet ka akigeno ŋina ka aiuno yok ikwa akopiya ŋina iuryarit akou nyewana.
52005009	Pa ikiseuni iwon Akuj aryamun ŋican ŋulu ka anyunyura keŋ, nai aryamun aiuno alotooma Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
52005010	Abu iŋes totwan aŋuna yok, ikotere nai kikiyari kori kikitwakit apaki ŋina eboŋunio iŋes, eboiyoto ka iŋes.
52005011	Aŋun, kisimukekinos ka kiŋaranakinos make, ikwaŋina tokona itiyaata iyes.
52005012	Ŋikaitotoi, ikimaimai isua iyes tokerito alokidiŋ kus ŋituŋa ŋulu itiyaete nooi alokidiŋ kus, ŋulu ikipukato iyes alotooma Ekapolon, ŋulu ikitatamete iyes ŋipitesyo ŋulu ka akiyar a Ŋikristo.
52005013	Tokerito ikes nooi anamina aŋuna ke etic a ŋolo itiyaete ikes. Kisilito iyes make.
52005014	Ikimaimai isua iyes ŋikaitotoi, kisirworiut ŋituŋa ŋulu ekalanyaka, kisimukekisi ŋulu ekuryaka, kiŋarakisi ŋulu epalag, todaŋa ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
52005015	Nyitemokino iyes itacakinete aronis kan aronis, nai ŋarwa daadaŋ kikatakisi akitiya ŋuna ajokak alokidiŋ kus make ka alotuŋa a daadaŋ.
52005016	Tolelyanete jwi jwi;
52005017	kilipeneneete jwi jwi,
52005018	tolakanaros neni ka Akuj anakiro a daadaŋ; anerae erae ŋun ŋuna ecamit Akuj aneni kus alotooma Yesu Kristo.
52005019	Nyiretakis Etau ŋolo Asegan;
52005020	nyijamuwanarete ŋakiro ŋuna edwaritae.
52005021	Torota ŋinibore daadaŋ: kiwuapa ŋuna ajokak,
52005022	toŋero ŋuna aronok daadaŋ.
52005023	Ikimaimai Akuj ŋina erae alope ekisil ikituruwo iyes ŋulu ikwaan ka iŋes alopitesyo a daadaŋ ka ikiyokite iyes daadaŋ alotai, anakiyar ka anawat tomam ŋakiro ŋuna aronok jik akitodol Akoloŋit ŋina eboŋunio Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
52005024	Iŋes ŋolo ikinyarit iyes, erae ŋolo ikinyoma; itiyakini iŋes ŋuna adau akiikin.
52005025	Ŋikaitotoi, kilipakinitetei isua daŋ.
52005026	Kimalata ŋikaitotoi daadaŋ itunasi make itoodiunito atemar iminin.
52005027	Ekeŋitakinit ayoŋ iyes alokiro ke Ekapolon asyomakin abaruwa na neni a ŋikaitotoi daadaŋ.
52005028	Toyai neni kus ajokis ŋina ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
53001001	Ayoŋ Paulo ka Silipano ta Timoteo ikigirit abaruwa na neni ka atukot a Ŋikristo a ŋulu eyakasi Tesalonika, a ŋulu erae ŋulu ka Akuj Papa yok ka ŋulu ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo.
53001002	Toyai neni kus ajokis ka ekisil aneni ka Akuj Papa yok ka aneni ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo.
53001003	Ŋikaitotoi, itemokino isua olakaros neni ka Akuj ŋapakio daadaŋ aŋuna kus. Iyookino ŋun, anerae iyata anupit kus nooi ka daŋ epoloe amina ŋina iyakatar iyes alokidiŋ kus make.
53001004	Ŋakiro ŋun ikes ikiturore isua iyes anatukon a Ŋikristo aŋuna ka Akuj. Ikituro isua aŋuna kus, anerae irubakinito iyes iŋirikinito ka inupito tari anapakio a daadaŋ a ŋuna ka akisicanio ka alocan a ŋulu iryamunito iyes.
53001005	Itoodiunito ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ atemar iyookino epite ŋolo etubokinia Akuj; aŋun, iruworosi iyes ŋulu emaikina alomar Napukan ka Akuj, Apukan ŋina tokona iryamunitotor iyes ŋican aŋuna keŋ.
53001006	Itiyakini Akuj ŋuna iyookino: iteryamuni ŋican ŋituŋa ŋulu ikiteryamunito iyes ŋican
53001007	ka ikisieŋuni iyes ŋulu iryamunito ŋican ka ikisieŋuni isua daŋ. Itiyakini iŋes ŋun apaki ŋina etakanunia Ekapolon Yesu anakuj kaapei ka ŋimalaikan keŋ ŋulu eyakatar apedor.
53001008	Ebuni iŋes anasarae a ŋina ka akim akisican ŋituŋa ŋulu eŋerito Akuj ka ŋulu eŋerito Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna ke Ekapolon yok Yesu.
53001009	Eryamunete ikes akisicanio ŋina ka akinyasuno a ŋina nyesaluni; etyakaryo ikes aneni ke Ekapolon ka nyiŋolikinete ikes apolou ka apedor keŋ.
53001010	Itiyakinio ŋun Akoloŋit ŋina ebunio iŋes aryamun akitopolooro aneni a ŋituŋa keŋ ka aryamun aumokinet aneni a ŋulu enupito iŋes. Iyakaunosi iyes daŋ kidiŋ kec, anerae inupa iyes ŋakiro ŋuna aponi isua ikilimokin iyes.
53001011	Ŋakiro ŋun iŋes ikilipanakinia isua iyes jwi jwi, ikotere ikituruwo iyes Akuj ŋulu iyookino anakiyar a ŋina ikinyarak iŋes iyes. Ikilipit isua Akuj anapedor keŋ, atemar kirikak iŋes ŋuna ajokak daadaŋ ŋuna icamito iyes akitiya ka daŋ kirikak etic kus ŋolo itiyaete iyes ananupit.
53001012	Alopite a lo, itopolooryo ekiro ŋolo ke Ekapolon yok Yesu ka ikitopolooryo iyes daŋ aneni keŋ aŋuna ka ajokis ka Akuj yok ka ŋina ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo.
53002001	Ŋikaitotoi, ŋuna ikamunito abunore ŋina ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo ka acunakin yok akisiryam iŋes, ikimaimai isua iyes
53002002	nyiryaŋiryaŋakin atipei anatameta kus, nyikibul aŋuna elimuni ice atemar adolu Akoloŋit ŋina ke Ekapolon. Nyinupa ŋun, tari kikilimok daŋ idiotuŋanan atemar erae ŋakiro ŋun ŋuna edwaritae kori ŋuna alimunitoe kori egiritae isua.
53002003	Nyikimodik iyes idiotuŋanan alopite a edio daŋ, anerae nyebuni Akoloŋit ŋin, mati kedol mono apaki ŋina eŋeryoto ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak Akuj, ido totakanu nai Eketepegan ŋolo ka Akuj, ŋolo emaikina tocakakinae nakim ŋina nyeduŋe.
53002004	Itepegi iŋes ibore daadaŋ ŋini enyaritae akuj kori ibore daadaŋ ŋini isitiyaete ŋituŋa akitopoloonorya ŋakujo ka itopoloori iŋes bon akilo ŋakujo daadaŋ. Iboikin tari Kai ka Akuj, ido kitusubun bon Akuj.
53002005	Nyitamunito mono iyes atemar abu ayoŋ okolimok iyes ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ apaki ŋina ikirukitor iwon a?
53002006	Iyenete iyes ibore ŋini iretakinit ŋakiro tokona. Isileereunio Eketepegan ŋolo ka Akuj edoli apaki keŋ.
53002007	Anerae adaut ŋapedorosyo ŋuna itiyaete aronis anakimunono ageun etic kec, nai nyisileereunio ikes mati mono kelemar iŋes alorot a ŋolo iretakinitor iŋes ikes.
53002008	Kisileereunoe nai Eketepegan Akuj; nai ani ebuni Ekapolon Yesu, eari Eketepegan ŋol a ekuwuam a ŋolo ka akituk keŋ ka inyasuni Yesu iŋes ka akica a ŋina enwakinwaki a ŋina ebunio iŋes.
53002009	Ebuni Eketepegan ŋolo ka Akuj ŋol ka apedor a ŋina a Satan, akitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ka ŋaumonokineta ŋuna alalak ŋuna ka amodiyo
53002010	ka isitiyae amodiyo daadaŋ ŋina ka aronis keŋ alotuŋa a ŋulu ebukoro. Ebukorosi ikes, anerae apotu ikes nyijaut ka nyeminakis ŋakiro ŋuna a kire, ikotere toiunos.
53002011	Aŋakiro a ŋun, ejalakini Akuj ikes nakiro ŋuna nyiyookino, ikotere tonupa ŋakiro ŋuna ka amodiyo.
53002012	Aŋun nai, etubokini Akuj ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu pa apotu tonupa ŋuna a kire, ŋulu abobokinit asecenen.
53002013	Ŋikaitotoi, itemokino isua olakaros neni ka Akuj ŋapakio daadaŋ aŋuna kus a ŋulu ikimina Ekapolon. Anerae abu Akuj itoseu iyes anakisyakinet aŋuna ka aiuno alotooma akiteseguno kus aneni ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan ka alotooma anupit kus ŋakiro ŋuna a kire.
53002014	Abu Akuj alotooma Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna aponi isua itolimonokin iyes itonyar iyes naiuno, ikotere toryamut iyes daŋ apolou ŋina ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo.
53002015	Aŋun ŋikaitotoi, kicata ka torubakisi ikamunito ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna aponi isua ikitatamyanakin iyes analimonokin ka anabaruwa kosi.
53002016	Ikilipi isua neni ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo elope ka neni ka Akuj Papa yok, ŋolo abu itominak iwon ka ikiinak iwon anajokis keŋ atitinyu ŋina nyedaunun ka akigeno ŋina ajokan,
53002017	akisimukekin iyes ka akitogogoŋ iyes, ikotere kitiyata ka kirworo ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna ajokak.
53003001	Ŋuna isidiyete ŋikaitotoi, kilipa aŋuna kosi, ikotere kielakin atipei ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon lotuŋa, ido kijaut ikes ŋun itopoloorito, lopite ŋolopei ijauniata iyes daŋ.
53003002	Kilipa daŋ, ikotere itoiu isua Akuj aneni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu asecak, a ŋulu aronok, anerae nyenupito ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
53003003	Nai ikinyoma Ekapolon; ikitogogoŋi ka ikiyoki iŋes iyes aneni a ŋolo Aronon – Satan.
53003004	Ikikinyomit isua Ekapolon aŋuna kus atemar itiyaete ka irubakinete itiyaete ŋuna adaun isua akicikakin iyes.
53003005	Ikilipi isua neni ke Ekapolon kibelek ŋitai kus namina ŋina ka Akuj ka natitinyikinit ŋina a Kristo.
53003006	Ŋikaitotoi, ikicikakinit isua iyes alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo, atemar totyakaros aneni a ŋikaitotoi a ŋulu ekalanyaka, ŋulu nyiwuapito ŋakiro ŋuna aponi isua kitatamae.
53003007	Iyenete iyes ŋilopeyek epite ŋolo eboiyere isua alokidiŋ kus; itemokino epite ŋol toruwor akitaanyikinet aneni kus. Pa ikikalanyaka isua apaki ŋina ikirukitor iwon.
53003008	Nyimuja isua akimuj a ituŋanan a idio pa etacitae. Nai ikipotu isua etiyata ka agogoŋu nooi; aponi isua kitiyae akuwar ka apaaran, ikotere nyikisiyaloloŋi isua iyes aŋuna ka aryamun akiŋarakinet adio aneni kus.
53003009	Aponi isua kitiyae ŋun, meere aŋuna amamukar isua apedor ŋina kiitanet akiŋarakinet adio aneni kus, nai ikotere eruworoe isua akitaanyikinet ŋina itemokino iyes kiwuapa.
53003010	Tari ŋina ikirukitor iwon, aponi isua ikicikakin iyes ŋakiro nu, “Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eŋerit etic, nyemaikina iŋes kimuj.”
53003011	Anerae epupyo isua atemar ekalanyaka ŋice alokidiŋ kus, epanapanato tomam ediotic itiyaete.
53003012	Alokiro ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo, icikakinitae ka elimokinitae isua ŋituŋa ŋulu ikote ŋul akitiya etic kec alopite a ŋolo ajokan, ikotere ikes kitiyaut a ŋakan kec ibore daadaŋ ŋini iitanito ikes aŋuna ka akiyar kec.
53003013	Ŋikaitotoi, nyikiup akitiya ŋuna ajokak.
53003014	Ani kewou idiotuŋanan akiwuap ŋuna irworoe isua anabaruwa a na, tocoikisi iŋes ejok, ka totyakaros aneni keŋ, ikotere kiruma iŋes ŋileec.
53003015	Nyitusubut iŋes emoit; nai kisirworo iŋes erae lokaato kus.
53003016	Ikilipit isua Ekapolon ŋolo ke ekisil ikiinak iyes ekisil jwi jwi alopitesyo a daadaŋ. Toyai Ekapolon neni kus a daadaŋ.
53003017	Ayoŋ Paulo egirit ŋimalasyo lu ka akan kaŋ ke elope. Epite lo iŋes egiria ayoŋ ekiro kaŋ aŋetakini akigir ŋinabaruwa kaŋ daadaŋ.
53003018	Toyai neni kus daadaŋ ajokis ŋina ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
54001001	Ayoŋ Paulo ŋolo arae ekiyakia ŋolo a Yesu Kristo, aŋuna ka akicikakinet a ŋina ka Akuj a ŋina erae Akaiunan yok ka aŋuna ka akicikakinet a Yesu Kristo a ŋolo erae akigeno yok,
54001002	egirit abaruwa na neni a Timoteo a ŋolo erae lokoku kaŋ ŋolo a kire ananupit. Toyai neni kon ajokis, akisyon ka ekisil aneni ka Akuj Papa ka aneni a Yesu Kristo Ekapolon yok.
54001003	Acamit ayoŋ iyoŋ kiboi alo Epeso ikwapei akadyekitor ayoŋ iyoŋ apaki ŋina alosio ayoŋ Makedonia. Itatamete ŋituŋa ŋice aina ŋakiro ŋuna erae alyokonu, ido itemokino iyoŋ kicikak ikes tojoŋoto akitatam ŋakiro ŋun.
54001004	Tolimok ikes tojoŋoto akitumoro aloemuto a ŋul ka anakimar ŋirorwa ŋulu alalak ŋulu atapapaa – ŋulu iatakinete ŋakiŋiseta ka ŋipegeta akilo akiyokit etic ŋolo ka Akuj ananupit.
54001005	Nai ŋuna elosikinitoe isua anakitatam kosi erae amina ŋina ebunit alotau a ŋolo Asegan, anatameta a ŋuna ecayete ka ananupit a ŋina a kire.
54001006	Aoliyosi ŋituŋa ŋice anakiro a ŋun, ido alosikis akiyan ŋakiro ŋuna koŋinae.
54001007	Iitanito ikes araakau ŋiketatamak a Ŋikisila, nai nyeyenete ŋakiro kec a ŋilopeyek kori ŋakiro ŋuna irworosi ikes ebasi ikiyeni nooi.
54001008	Nai ikiyeni iwon atemar ejokak Ŋikisila, erae kisitiyae alopite a ŋolo itemokino kisitiyaere.
54001009	Itemokino iwon oyenete atemar nyeyeunitae Ŋikisila aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu iyookino, nai aŋuna a ŋulu ebilibiliyete Ŋikisila ka ŋulu eŋerito akipukao, aŋuna a ŋulu nyenupito Akuj, ŋikasecak, aŋuna a ŋulu nyesegak alotai ka ŋulu ejamuwarito Akuj, aŋuna a ŋulu earete atapapa kec kori atatoto kec, ka ŋikaarak,
54001010	aŋuna a ŋulu emalaaka, aŋuna a ŋikilyok a ŋulu iteperete ŋikilyok ŋuluce, aŋuna a ŋulu ekokoiyanarete ŋituŋa ŋuluce, aŋuna a ŋikalyokonok ka ŋulu ikoŋete ka alyokonu ka ŋulu itiyaete ŋace ŋuna nyemaasi ka akitatam ŋina iyookino.
54001011	Emaasi akitatamet ŋin ka Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna aponi ekecikakin ayoŋ akisera, Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna elimorito apolou ŋina ka Akuj a ŋina erereŋ.
54001012	Alakara ayoŋ neni a Yesu Kristo Ekapolon yok, ŋolo akainaki ayoŋ agogoŋu aŋuna ke etic kaŋ, anerae ekemarak ayoŋ atemar arae ŋolo ekinyoma aŋuna ekewuakinia ayoŋ lotic keŋ,
54001013	tari paaran keyanyit ayoŋ iŋes kori kesicanit kori ketoŋoit; nai aponi ekesyoni ayoŋ, anerae apaki ŋin, pa anupit ayoŋ Kristo; aŋun, pa ayeni ayoŋ ŋuna etiyae.
54001014	Abu Ekapolon okoinak ayoŋ ajokis keŋ ilapara; ido okoinak anupit ka amina, ŋuna erae ŋuna yok alotooma akimorikina ka Yesu Kristo.
54001015	Erae na alimunet ŋina ikinyoma ka emaikina tocamunae: Abuni Yesu Kristo nakwap aiun ŋikasecak. Ayoŋ iŋes ekasecan ŋolo aronon nooi akilo daadaŋ,
54001016	nai aponi ekesyoni ayoŋ; ikotere nai itoodiuni Yesu Kristo akidaŋidaŋ keŋ daadaŋ alotooma ŋuna abu iŋes ekiŋaren kitiya neni kaŋ. Alopite a lo, abu eketuruwo ayoŋ akitaanyikinet neni a daadaŋ a ŋulu epote ekaku akinup Yesu, ido toryamut akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
54001017	Toyai akerit ka apolou ŋina nyedaun neni ke Erwosit a ŋolo ipukae ŋikaru ka ŋikaru, ŋolo nyetwani, ŋolo erae iŋes bon erae Akuj! Amen.
54001018	Timoteo lokoku kaŋ, ekecikakini ayoŋ iyoŋ ŋakiro nu, ikwaŋina koloŋ kedwaritere aŋuna kon. Kisitiya ŋakiro nu ikwapei ŋiboro ŋulu ijiyo iyoŋ, ikotere ijiyo ejok,
54001019	ido torubak irae ŋolo inupit ka ŋolo ecayete ŋatameta. Aŋero ŋituŋa ŋice akipup ŋuna ecayete anatameta kec, tosodi enyasut anupit kec.
54001020	Ŋice alokidiŋ ŋul ikes Umenayo ka Alekisanda, ŋulu adau ayoŋ akipotokin neni a Satan; ikotere itatamete ŋun ikes ajoŋore ŋiyany kec.
54002001	Ŋuna iŋarenete, ekemaimai ayoŋ iyes daadaŋ atemar toyai akimaima, akilip, akiŋita ka alakanar neni ka Akuj aŋuna a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ;
54002002	aŋuna a ŋirwosi ka aŋuna a daadaŋ a ŋulu einakinitae apolou, ikotere nai ikiboi iwon anakiyar a ŋina inapakina ka ŋina isilit; ŋina ecamit Akuj ka alopitesyo a ŋulu ajokak.
54002003	Erae ŋun ŋuna ajokak ka italakarito Akuj Akaiunan yok,
54002004	ŋina ecamit ŋituŋa daadaŋ toiunae ka toyenut ŋuna a kire.
54002005	Anerae eyai Akuj apei bon ka eyai epei bon ŋolo erae ekemorikinan Akuj ka ŋituŋa; ituŋanan ŋin, iŋes Yesu Kristo.
54002006	Abu iŋes elope tojal akiyar keŋ aiunia ŋituŋa daadaŋ. Ŋakiro ŋun, ikes apotu toruworos akitoodikinet anapaki a ŋina eyookino atemar ecamit Akuj aiun ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
54002007	Iŋes nai ekeyakuunere ayoŋ ikwapei ekeseran ka ekiyakia, akitatam ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋakiro ŋuna ka anupit ka ŋuna a kire. Nyesudi ayoŋ ŋakiro; erworo ayoŋ ŋuna a kire!
54002008	Eitanit nai ayoŋ atemar anakiboisyo a daadaŋ, a ŋuna ilipyata Ŋikristo, itemokino ŋikilyok kilipa ikiarito ŋakan ŋuna emam asecit; tomam aŋoit kori ebura eyakatar.
54002009	Eitanit ayoŋ ŋaberu daŋ tonapito ejok alopitesyo a ŋulu nyisuparete ŋituŋa ŋuluce. Nyitemokino ikes akisibusa a ŋitim a ŋulu eoitoe, kori anapit ŋiboro ŋulu itiyaunitae a egolid kori a ŋakamilimili kori a ŋilowi a ŋulu epol egyelit;
54002010	nai itemokino ikes torae ŋuna ajokak a ŋiticisyo, ikwapei ejokyata ŋun anaberu a ŋuna ebasi ikinupit ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
54002011	Itemokino ŋaberu toyenut ŋakiro anakililiŋ ka anakitiditeuna.
54002012	Nyacamakinit ayoŋ aberu adio itatami kori epolokinit ŋikilyok; itemokino ikes erae ŋuna ililiŋete.
54002013	Anerae Adam aponi tosubunae ekiŋaren, tosubunae nai Epa.
54002014	Nabo meere Adam aponi tomodikinae, nai arae aberu, ido tobil ekisil ŋolo ka Akuj.
54002015	Nai eiun aberu aŋuna ka akidore, erae kerubaki iŋes ananupit, anamina, alopite a ŋolo itoodiunit atemar ekerit iŋes Akuj ka ŋolo ka akiyapara.
54003001	Erae na alimunet ŋina ikinyoma: ani kiitanit ituŋanan aruwor ekarikon ŋolo a Ŋikristo, iitanit iŋes etic ŋolo ajokan nooi.
54003002	Itemokino ekarikon ŋolo a Ŋikristo erae ŋolo nyitoronitae, ŋolo eyakar aberu apei, ŋolo etyamaarit, ŋolo ecayete ŋatameta, ŋolo ejokak ŋipitesyo, ŋolo ijaununui ŋituŋa lore keŋ ka ŋolo epedorit akitatam ejok.
54003003	Itemokino nyerae ŋolo emerana, ŋolo eryenyaana, nai torae ŋolo iyapara, meere ŋolo iburana ka ŋolo emina ŋisiliŋa.
54003004	Itemokino iŋes erae ŋolo epedorit akidar ekal keŋ ke elope ejok ka ŋolo epedorit akituruwor ŋidwe keŋ ŋulu epupete ŋakiro ka ŋulu eyakatar akerit alopitesyo a daadaŋ.
54003005	Anerae ani pa keyeni ituŋanan epite ŋolo kidaret ekal keŋ ke elope, ikokini nai iŋes idari atukot a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj ai?
54003006	Nyitemokino iŋes erae ituŋanan ŋini ariŋa enupi ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, anerae acepaki iturokin, tosodi toloma natubokino ŋina ka Akuj ŋina etubokinitere Satan.
54003007	Itemokino iŋes erae ituŋanan ŋini itojokito ŋituŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋikristo daŋ, anerae acepaki eruwor ŋolo itoronitae, tosodi toloma nauno ŋina a Satan.
54003008	Itemokino ŋikeŋarakinitok ŋulu a Ŋikristo daŋ erae ŋulu emaikina tokeritetei ka nyekicaraka ŋaŋajepa; nyitemokino ikes erae ŋulu emataka ŋagwe ŋuna alalak kori ŋulu erorokaka alosiliŋa.
54003009	Itemokino ikes kiricito akimunono ŋina ka anupit a ŋatameta a ŋuna ecayete.
54003010	Itemokino ikes torotae mono; ani nai keryamun ikes emam ŋuna itoroniyaritere, ejok akimyekin kitiyata erae ŋikeŋarakinitok ŋulu a Ŋikristo.
54003011	Ŋaberu kec daŋ, itemokino erae ŋuna emaikina tokeritetei, nyirworotor ŋulucetuŋa, torae ŋuna etyamaarito ka ŋuna ikinyomitae anakiro a daadaŋ.
54003012	Itemokino ŋikeŋarakinitok ŋulu a Ŋikristo toyakatar ŋaberu ŋapeipei ka topedorito akidar ŋikalya kec a ŋilopeyek ejok.
54003013	Ŋikeŋarakinitok ŋulu itiyaete etic kec ejok, ikes eryamunete akereru ka epedorete ikes erwor ŋuna ka anupit Yesu Kristo emam akuryanu.
54003014	Egeno ayoŋ abunore neni kon atipei, nai egiri ayoŋ ŋakiro nu neni kon, ikotere
54003015	ani keketididi ayoŋ, toyenu iyoŋ epite ŋolo itemokino iyoŋ kiboiyo alokidiŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj, ikes atukot a Ŋikristo ŋina erae ŋina ka Akuj a ŋina eyari. Atukot ŋin iŋes erae akigaŋet ka akiyokiyet ŋakiro ŋuna a kire.
54003016	Ikilimorit iwon ebe, epol kire jik akimunono ŋina ke edin yok: “Abu iŋes totakanu erae ituŋanan, abu Etau kitoodiu iŋes erae ŋolo iyookino, apotu ŋimalaikan kiŋolikis iŋes. Aponi tolimonokinae ŋakiro keŋ lobukui, apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak anakwap tonupa iŋes, aponi yaarae iŋes kidiama napolou ŋina ka Akuj.”
54004001	Elimunit Etau ŋolo ka Akuj ŋakiro ŋuna ileereete ebala, alorwa a ŋulu esidyok, epalikinete ŋituŋa ŋice anupit Kristo. Iwuapakinete ikes ŋitai ŋulu alyokonok ka akitatam ŋina a ŋipyan.
54004002	Akitatam ŋina ikoni ŋin, erae ŋina ebunit aneni a ŋikalyokonok a ŋulu emodiyaka, ŋulu etwakito ŋatameta kec esibit icunyitae ka asuwat a ŋina emwana.
54004003	Itatamete ŋituŋa ŋul atemar erono akiitar ka akinyam ŋamuja ŋace. Nai erae ŋamuja ŋun ŋuna abu Akuj tosub, ikotere ŋituŋa ŋulu enupito ka toyenete ŋuna a kire imujete kedaut alakari neni ka Akuj.
54004004	Ejok ibore daadaŋ ŋini abu Akuj tosub, emam ibore ŋini itemokino toŋeroe, erae kijaunitae ka alakara aneni ka Akuj;
54004005	anerae akirot ŋina ka Akuj ka akilip, ikes ituruwuorete akimuj ŋin ŋina itesegitae alokiŋaren keŋ.
54004006	Ani kilimok iyoŋ ŋakiro nu neni a ŋikaitotoi alotooma Kristo, iruwor iyoŋ eketiyan a Yesu Kristo ŋolo ajokan, apaki daadaŋ ŋina irubakinitor iyoŋ iryamunit agogoŋu anakiro a ŋuna ka anupit ka anakitatam a ŋina ajokan a ŋina idau iyoŋ akiwuap.
54004007	Nai toŋer ŋiemuto ŋulu nyecamam ka ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, ŋulu emam apolou kec. Torubak itatama bon aruwor ŋolo iboi anakiyar a ŋina ecamit Akuj.
54004008	Ejok akitiya etic edio aŋuna ka akuwan toryamunia agogoŋu, nai ejok alowaetin a daadaŋ arubakin itatama akiboi anakiyar a ŋina ecamit Akuj, anerae ikiikinete ŋun akiyar ŋina a tokona ka ŋina a rwanu.
54004009	Erae na alimunet ŋina ikinyoma ka emaikina tocamunae.
54004010	Ikicatakinit iwon ka ikitiyae ka agogoŋu nooi, anerae ikigeno iwon neni ka Akuj a ŋina eyari, a ŋina erae Akaiunan a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ, akilo nooi ŋulu enupito iŋes.
54004011	Kicikak ka kitatam ŋikanupak ŋuluce ŋakiro ŋun.
54004012	Nyikijamuwa iyoŋ ituŋanan idio aŋuna iraakar iyoŋ esorokit, nai torae akitaanyikinet ŋina a ŋikanupak alorwor kon, alopitesyo kon, anamina kon, ananupit kon ka anasegis ke etau kon.
54004013	Kiwuak ŋatameta kon daadaŋ ka agogoŋu kon daadaŋ nasyomanakin ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, nalimonokin ka nakitatam akitodol ŋina abunio ayoŋ.
54004014	Nyijamak ainakinet ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo ka Akuj ŋina eyai neni kon, ŋina aponi ikiinakin iyoŋ apaki ŋina erworotor ŋikadwarak, ido kidokok atukot a ŋikatukok ŋakan kec nakou kon.
54004015	Kitiyaenenee ŋakiro ŋun ka inakina aŋuna kec; ikotere nai eanyuwarete ŋituŋa daadaŋ akiyata alotooma ŋuna itiyae iyoŋ.
54004016	Toyeni iyoŋ epite ŋolo iboiyo ka ŋakiro ŋuna itatami. Torubak itiyae ŋakiro ŋun, anerae kitiya iyoŋ, iiun iyoŋ elope ka ŋulu iirarete ŋuna itatami.
54005001	Nyisibura ekasikout edio, nai kisiyan iŋes ikwa papa kon. Kisirwor ŋisorok ikwa ŋikaitotoi kon,
54005002	ŋakimak ikwa atatoto kon ka ŋasorok ikwa ŋakaitotoi kon anasegis ke etau.
54005003	Tokerite ŋapuseru ŋuna emam kire jik ituŋanan ŋini iŋarakinit.
54005004	Nai ani keyakar apuserut ŋidwe kori ŋitatae, itemokino mono ŋidwe toyenut akitiya ŋiticisyo kec ŋulu ke edin alokalya kec a ŋilopeyek, ido alopite a lo, etacakinete ikes ŋikauruunak kec, atapapaa kec ka atatata kec, anerae ŋun ikes italakarito Akuj.
54005005	Apuserut ŋina erae iŋes bon, ŋina emam kire jik ituŋanan ŋini iŋarakinit, iŋes igeno neni ka Akuj, erubakini ilipi ka imaimai Akuj, nakwaare ka naparan.
54005006	Nai apuserut ŋina aruwor akewariton ŋuna italakarito akuwan keŋ, adau atwanare, tari keriŋa eyari.
54005007	Tolimok ikes ŋakiro ŋun, ikotere todaun ituŋanan itoroniyari ikes.
54005008	Nai ani pa kidarit ituŋanan ŋiyeneta keŋ, akilo nooi ŋituŋa ŋulu ke ekal keŋ, adau iŋes akiŋer anupit Kristo ka aroniar nooi akilo ŋini nyenupit.
54005009	Nyimarak ekiro ŋolo ka apuserut a ŋina eriŋa ŋikaru keŋ nyedepara ŋatomonikanikapei lororwa ŋulu a ŋapuseru. Itemokino iŋes torae ŋina sek eisitae akiiset apei bon
54005010	ka ŋina eyenitae aŋuna a ŋiticisyo keŋ a ŋulu ajokak, ŋina abu kitopolou ŋidwe keŋ ejok, ŋina abu kijaununuye ŋituŋa ŋulu gelae lore keŋ, ŋina abu kitiya ŋiticisyo ŋulu ka akitiditeuna neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj, ŋina abu kiŋarak ŋituŋa alocan kec ka ŋina abu torubak itiyae ŋuna ajokak alopitesyo a daadaŋ.
54005011	Nyigirakis ŋirorwa ŋulu a ŋapuseru a ŋuna eriŋa esorokaka lororwa a ŋunace, anerae ŋina iitaniata ikes akiitar nabo, eŋerete ikes Kristo,
54005012	ido eryamunete ikes atubokino ŋina ka Akuj, aŋuna abilyata ŋuna sek ekoŋito ikes ekiŋaren neni a Kristo.
54005013	Nabo eyenikinete ikes akalanyanut anakirimit ŋakais; meere ŋun bon, eyenikinete daŋ akirworor ŋituŋa ka apanapanat emam ediotic itiyaete ta akirworo ŋakiro ŋuna nyitemokino ikes irworosi.
54005014	Aŋun, atami ayoŋ atemar emaikina ŋapuseru ŋuna eriŋa esorokaka kiitae, toryamut ŋidwe ka kidara ŋirerya kec, ikotere nai nyeryamut ŋimoi yok adiopaki ŋina ikitoroniyaryata iwon.
54005015	Anerae adaut ŋapuseru ŋace akiŋer Kristo, ewuapakis Satan.
54005016	Nai ani keyakar aberu ŋina erae Akristoit ŋapuseru lokal keŋ, itemokino iŋes kidar ikes, nyeinak atyonis neni ka atukot a Ŋikristo, ikotere nai atukot idarit ŋapuseru ŋuna emam kire jik ituŋanan ŋini iŋarakinit.
54005017	Itemokino ŋikatukok ŋulu idarito ejok atukot a Ŋikristo etacio ŋarwa ŋaarei, akilo nooi ŋulu elimonokinete, kitatamete ka alelakinit.
54005018	Anerae ebasi Ŋakigireta, “Nyien ŋakituka a ŋimoŋin apaki ŋina isitiyaa iyoŋ ikes aramya ŋimomwa”; nabo, “Itemokino eketiyan eropyo.”
54005019	Nyipupok ŋakiro ŋuna isitakinitere ekatukon, mati erae ŋisuudae ŋiarei kori ŋiuni.
54005020	Kisibura iteete ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu eseceneneete, ikotere ekerete ŋuluce akitiya ŋun.
54005021	Alokiŋaren Akuj ka Yesu Kristo ta ŋimalaikan ŋulu seuna, ekeciki ayoŋ iyoŋ ka agogoŋu atemar kiwuap ŋakiro nu tomam atubonokin eriŋa nyeripiripa ejok kori tomam atyakatyakat ŋituŋa.
54005022	Nyikirikirakin akidokokin ŋakan kon neni a ituŋanan a idio aŋuna ka akituruwor iŋes eketiyan ŋolo ka atukot a Ŋikristo. Nyiloma nasecisya a ŋituŋa a ŋuluce; torubak irae ŋolo iseg alotau.
54005023	Tojoŋo akimat ŋakipi bon, nai tomasi epiini ediocici, ikotere iŋarakini akook kon, anerae idyakana iyoŋ.
54005024	Ilereete ŋasecisya a ŋituŋa a ŋice, esibit iŋarenikinito ikes natubokino, nai ŋasecisya a ŋice ileereunete ekaku.
54005025	Ikwaŋinapei, ilereete ŋiticisyo ŋulu ajokak, nai ŋulu nyilereete daŋ, nyepedoryo akiwua ekaku.
54006001	Itemokino ŋulu eryamunito ŋican aŋuna eraakatar ŋipi toyenete atemar ejok ikes akerit ŋikapolok kec, ikotere nai emam ituŋanan ŋini itoroniyari ekiro ŋolo ka Akuj ka akitatam yok.
54006002	Nyejok ŋipi ŋulu erae ŋikapolok kec Ŋikristo ejamuwarito ikes, aŋuna eraakatar ŋikepukak kec ŋikaitotoi alotooma Kristo. Nai akilo, itemokino ikes kitiyanakis ikes ejok nooi, anerae ŋulu itiyanakinio eraakasi ŋikanupak ŋuluminan.
54006003	Itemokino iyoŋ kitatam. Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini itatami ŋakiro ŋuna egelaaka ka ŋini nyecamunit ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna ke Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo ka ŋuna ikitatami iwon alodin yok,
54006004	erae iŋes ŋini elal akituro ka emam ibore eyeni. Eyakar iŋes ekibure ŋolo aronon ŋolo ka apega ka ŋolo kiburaet, ido eyaunete ŋun: arakao, ŋiburasyo, akiyany ŋuluce ka atamakinit ŋakiro ŋuna aronok neni a ŋuluce,
54006005	ŋipegeta ŋulu nyedaun alotuŋa a ŋulu nyisitiyaete ŋatameta kec, ŋulu nyeriŋa eyakatar ŋakiro ŋuna a kire. Etamete ŋituŋa ŋul atemar edin iŋes erot ŋolo eryamunere ebari.
54006006	Kire, einakini edin ituŋanan aryamun epoida erae kecamu iŋes akimwonikina a ibore a ŋini eyakar.
54006007	Nyo aponi iwon yaunae nakwap? Emam ipei daŋ! Nyo ikipedori iwon akiya anakwap? Emam ipei daŋ!
54006008	Aŋun, ani kikiyakar iwon akimuj ka ŋilowi, itemokino emwonikina aŋuna kec.
54006009	Nai ikes ŋulu ecamito aruwor ŋikabarak elomarete nakitemyo ka ikamunete ŋaloketa ŋuna ke ekibure a ŋolo ka abaŋao a ŋolo awanan, ŋuna isibusokinete ikes toryamut ŋican ka akinyasuno.
54006010	Anerae amina ŋisiliŋa iŋes erae akisyakinet ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋuna aronok a daadaŋ. Erae ekibure ŋol iŋes etooliyo ŋice ananupit kec ka etalalata ŋican ŋulu ka akiyaloloŋ alotai kec.
54006011	Nai iyoŋ ŋolo ka Akuj, toŋer ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ. Toŋirik ka agogoŋu akiyookino, akiyar ŋina ecamit Akuj, anupit, amina, atitinyikinit ka akiyapara.
54006012	Tojiye ejiye ŋolo ajokan ŋolo ka anupit, ikotere iryamuni akiyar ŋina nyedaun, ŋina abu Akuj ikinyarak iyoŋ apaki ŋina iserakinia iyoŋ alokiŋaren ŋisuudae ŋulu alalak anupit kon Kristo.
54006013	Alokiŋaren Akuj ŋina einanakini akiyar neni a ŋinibore daadaŋ ka alokiŋaren Yesu Kristo ŋolo abu kisera anupit keŋ alokiŋaren Ponitio Pilato, ekecikakini ayoŋ iyoŋ
54006014	akiwuap ŋakiro ŋun alopite a ŋolo ajokan a ŋolo nyepedorya idiotuŋanan akitoronia iyoŋ Akoloŋit ŋina etakanunia Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo.
54006015	Eyauni Akuj atakanun ŋina a Yesu Kristo anapaki a ŋina itemokino, Akuj ŋina erereŋ ka ŋina erae iŋes bon erae Ekapolon, Erwosit ŋolo a ŋirwosi ka Ekapolon ŋolo a ŋikapolok.
54006016	Iŋes bon erae ŋolo nyetwani jik; iboi iŋes anakica a ŋina emam ituŋanan eapikini. Emam ituŋanan aanyuwa iŋes; emam ŋini epedori aanyuwar iŋes. Toyai neni keŋ akerit ka apedor ŋina nyedaun! Amen.
54006017	Tolimok ŋituŋa ŋulu ebarito a ŋiboro a ŋulu ka akiyar a na nyiturokinosi, nyiwuakis akigeno kec lobari ŋolo nyeropari, nai kigenos neni ka Akuj, a ŋina ikiinanakini iwon ibore daadaŋ anarimao, ikotere ikilakara iwon.
54006018	Tolimok ikes kitiyata ŋuna ajokak, tobarito aloticisyo a ŋulu ajokak ka totenito akimor ŋiboro kec ka ŋuluce anarimao.
54006019	Alopite a lo, iŋadakinete ikes aŋuna kec ebari ŋolo a kire ŋolo a rwanu, ido eryamunete akiyar ŋina erae akiyar kire.
54006020	Timoteo, kidar ejok ŋuna ikicikakin iyoŋ akidar. Toŋer ŋakiro ŋuna nyecamakina aneni ka Akuj ŋuna koŋinae ka ŋipegeta ŋulu enyarito ŋituŋa ŋice atemar “Aosou.”
54006021	Anerae ebasi ŋice ikiyakatar ikes aosou ŋin, ŋuna nai atakanut ikes nu, aoliyosi ikes ananupit Kristo. Toyai neni kus ajokis ŋina ka Akuj.
55001001	Ayoŋ Paulo ekiyakia a Yesu Kristo, aŋuna ka acamit a ŋina ka Akuj, ŋolo ekeyakitae akisera akiyar ŋina ikimori iwon anakimorikina ka Kristo, ŋina abu Akuj ikiik iwon –
55001002	egirit abaruwa na neni a Timoteo a ŋolo erae lokoku kaŋ ŋolo minat. Toyai neni kon ajokis, akisyon ka ekisil aneni ka Akuj Papa ka aneni a Yesu Kristo Ekapolon yok.
55001003	Alakara ayoŋ neni ka Akuj, a ŋina etiyae ayoŋ etic keŋ alotooma ŋatameta ŋuna ecayete, ikwaŋinapei aponiata atapapaa kaŋ kitiyaata. Alakara ayoŋ neni keŋ ikwapei akatamunitor ayoŋ iyoŋ jwi jwi anakilip kaŋ nakwaare ka naparan.
55001004	Atamunit ayoŋ ŋakiyo kon ka ekeburit ayoŋ nooi aanyun ka iyoŋ, ikotere nai alelyani ayoŋ nooi.
55001005	Atamunit anupit ŋina a kire ŋina iyakar iyoŋ, ŋina ikoni ŋina a tata kon Lois ka ŋina a toto kon Eunike. Ayeni ayoŋ jik atemar iyakar tari iyoŋ anupit ŋin.
55001006	Aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun, eketatamunit ayoŋ iyoŋ torubak isitiyae ainakinet ŋina ke Etau, ŋina abu Akuj ikiinak iyoŋ apaki ŋina edokokinio ayoŋ ŋakan kaŋ neni kon.
55001007	Anerae pa abu Akuj ikiinak iwon Etau ŋolo ka akuryanu, nai abu ikiinak Etau ŋolo ka apedor ka amina ta akiyapara.
55001008	Kiurya nyikirumito ŋileec aŋuna ka akisera ŋakiro ŋuna ke Ekapolon yok kori aŋuna kaŋ, a ŋolo arae emabus aŋuna a Kristo. Nai todaŋ ŋican aŋuna a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak, lopite ŋolo ikiinakinitor Akuj iyoŋ agogoŋu akitiya ŋun.
55001009	Abu iŋes ikiu ka ikinyara iwon aruwor ŋituŋa keŋ ka alope, meere aŋuna ikidau iwon akitiya, nai aŋuna ka acamit ka ajokis keŋ. Eriŋa akwap nyesubuna, abu iŋes ikiinak iwon ajokis ŋin alotooma Yesu Kristo,
55001010	nai tokona adau akisileerekin neni yok anabunore a ŋina ke Ekaiunan yok Yesu Kristo. Adau Kristo akiloun atwanare ka adau akisileereun alotooma Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak akiyar ŋina nyetwakere.
55001011	Iŋes nai ekeyakuunere ayoŋ ikwapei ekeseran ka ekiyakia akitatam Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋun;
55001012	erae nai Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋunapei ŋun ikes adaŋitor ayoŋ daŋ ŋican. Nai nyekerumito ayoŋ ŋileec, anerae ayeni ayoŋ ŋini ekinyomit ka ayeni kire atemar epedori iŋes akiyok ejok ŋuna adaun akicikakin ayoŋ akitodol Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon.
55001013	Kiric ejok ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna abu ayoŋ eketatam iyoŋ ananupit ka anamina ŋuna erae ŋuna yok alotooma akimorikina ka Yesu Kristo.
55001014	Alotooma Etau ŋolo Asegan ŋolo iboi alotooma yok, kiyok Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak ŋuna adaun akicikakin iyoŋ.
55001015	Iyeni iyoŋ atemar akaesikis ayoŋ daadaŋ ŋulu eyakasi Asia, akaesikis ayoŋ tari Pugelos ka Erimogene.
55001016	Elipit ayoŋ Ekapolon kisyonioto iŋes ŋituŋa ŋulu alokal a Onesiporo, anerae abu iŋes ekesimukek ayoŋ ŋarwa ŋuna alalak. Pa erumito iŋes ŋileec aŋuna ayakar ayoŋ mabus;
55001017	nai ŋinapei adolunio iŋes Roma, abu togeu akiwarit ayoŋ ka alelakinit akitodol ŋina akaryamunia.
55001018	Elipit ayoŋ Ekapolon kisyoni Onesiporo Akoloŋit ŋina esidyon! Iyeni iyoŋ nooi ŋuna abu iŋes kitiya aŋuna kaŋ alo Epeso.
55002001	Ani iyoŋ lokoku kaŋ, toruwor ŋolo igogoŋ anajokis a ŋina erae ŋina yok alotooma akimorikina ka Yesu Kristo.
55002002	Ŋakiro ŋuna ibu iyoŋ kiira eserae ayoŋ alokiŋaren ŋisuudae ŋulu alalak, kicikak ŋakiro ŋun lokilyok ŋulu ikinyoma ŋulu epedorete akitatam ejok ŋuluce daŋ.
55002003	Todaŋ ŋican ikwapei ekajion ŋolo ajokan ŋolo a Yesu Kristo.
55002004	Nyitemokino ekajion ŋolo ani eyai lojiye totamatamae eyare ŋolo palemu sek, anerae iwarit iŋes akitalakar ekapolon ŋolo enyaraunit iŋes lojiye.
55002005	Nyepedori ekakeran aryamun ebokot ŋolo erae eropit aŋuna ka akerit keŋ, mati keker iwuapit ŋikisila ŋulu ekerere.
55002006	Eketan ŋolo icidari ŋakinyinyir iŋes isyauni alemikin eriŋa ŋuluce.
55002007	Totamatama ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, ido ikitepedori Ekapolon iyoŋ ayenun ikes daadaŋ.
55002008	Totamatamae ŋuna a Yesu Kristo a ŋolo aponi kiteyarunae alokatwak, ŋolo arae ŋolo anateker a Daudi ikwapei itatamere a Nakiro a ŋuna Ajokak a ŋuna alimonokini ayoŋ.
55002009	Aŋuna alimonokinia ayoŋ Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, aryamunit ŋican ka akaenitae a ŋiriko ikwa ekeworon. Nai nyeenitae akirot ŋina ka Akuj.
55002010	Edaŋidaŋi ayoŋ ŋun daadaŋ aŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu aseu Akuj, ikotere ikes daŋ eryamunete aiuno ŋina ebuni aneni a Yesu Kristo ka ŋina eyauni ajakaanut ŋina nyedaun.
55002011	Erae na alimunet ŋina ikinyoma: “Ani kikitwakit iwon ka iŋes, ikiyari daŋ iwon kaapei ka iŋes.
55002012	Ani kikidaŋidaŋ iwon, ikipukae iwon daŋ kaapei ka iŋes. Ani kikipeg iwon atemar ikiyeni iŋes, iŋes daŋ epegi atemar ikiyeni iwon.
55002013	Ani kejoŋoe iwon akikinyomit iŋes, erubakini iŋes erae ŋolo ikinyoma, anerae nyepedori iŋes akilocokin eyakae keŋ.”
55002014	Tolimok nabo ŋituŋa kon ŋakiro ŋun ka kicik ikes ka agogoŋu alokiŋaren Akuj tojoŋoto apega a ŋakiro; emam ajokis eyaunete ŋakiro ŋun, nai emunaarete ŋulu epupete ikes.
55002015	Toŋirikinite araakau ŋolo ikitojokitae alokiŋaren Akuj, eketiyan ŋolo emamukar ŋileec, ŋolo itatami ŋakiro ŋuna a kire alopite a ŋolo iyookino.
55002016	Toŋer ŋakiro ŋuna koŋinae ŋuna nyecamam ka ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj; itooliyorete ikes ŋituŋa aneni ka Akuj.
55002017	Akitatam ŋina ikoni ŋin, ikwaan ka ajeme ŋina eriŋa nyeiyoro ŋina enyami akuwan. Ŋikilyok ŋiarei ŋulu adaut akitatam ŋakiro ŋuna ikote ŋun ikes Umenayo ka Pileto.
55002018	Aoliyosi ikes anakiro a ŋuna a kire aŋuna itatamyata atemar adau ayarun alunyar, ido alopite a ŋol, etaŋayaŋayakis anupit a ŋice.
55002019	Nai akisyakinet ŋina agogoŋon ŋina kebu Akuj todupaki, ewuoi nyiukonokin; kidiama keŋ igiritae ŋakiro nu, “Eyeni Ekapolon ŋulu erae ŋulu keŋ” ka “Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini ebala arae iŋes ŋini ke Ekapolon, itemokino toesik akitiya aronis.”
55002020	Tooma akai ŋina apolon, eyakasi ŋiboro ŋulu egelegelya; itiyaunitae ŋice a egolid, ŋice a esilipa, ŋice iceunitae anakito ka ŋice eyeunitae a elupe. Erae ŋice ŋikisitiya aloticisyo a ŋulu apolok, ŋice aloticisyo a ŋulu caryo.
55002021	Ani nai kitesegun ituŋanan bon anakiro a ŋuna aronok a daadaŋ, eruwor iŋes eborosit ŋolo kisitiya aloticisyo a ŋulu epolok; itesegunitae iŋes ka epedori Ekapolon keŋ akisitiya iŋes, anerae etenit aŋuna a ŋiticisyo a ŋulu ajokak a daadaŋ.
55002022	Toŋer ekibure ŋolo itemi ŋisorok akisec, toŋirik ka agogoŋu aruwor ŋolo iyookino, ŋolo inupit, ŋolo imina ka ŋolo isilito kaapei ka ŋulu ilipete neni ke Ekapolon a ŋitai a ŋulu asegak.
55002023	Toŋer ŋipegeta ŋulu a ŋimasimas ka ŋulu ka abaŋao, anerae iyeni iyoŋ atemar ebura bon eyaunete ikes.
55002024	Nyitemokino eketiyan ŋolo ke Ekapolon iburae. Itemokino iŋes erae ŋolo iyapara aneni a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ, ŋolo epedori akitatam ejok ka ŋolo edaŋana.
55002025	Itemokino iŋes erae ŋolo epatana apaki ŋina itatamya ŋulu itepegete iŋes, anerae acepaki einakini Akuj ikes apaki ŋina kiet ŋasecisya kec, ido toyenut ŋuna a kire.
55002026	Eosunete nai ikes ŋilopeyek, tolomut anauno a ŋina a Satan, a ŋolo abu kikamu ikes ka ŋolo abu kituruwo ikes ŋulu iwuapito acamit keŋ.
55003001	Totamunite rika atemar eyakaunosi ŋarwa ŋuna a ŋatyokisyo, ŋirwa ŋulu esidyok.
55003002	Eruworosi ŋituŋa ŋulu eseguwaka, erorokaka alosiliŋa, ituroko ka isupaka; eruworosi ŋulu itoŋoyeneneete ŋuluce, ŋulu nyekerito ŋikauruunak kec, ŋulu nyetemarete alakara ka ŋulu nyesegak alotai;
55003003	eruworosi ŋulu emamukatar aminanar, ŋulu emam akitim, ŋulu irworotor ŋuluce, ŋulu ededeŋ ka eryenyaaka; eruworosi ŋulu eremokino ŋuna ajokak,
55003004	eruworosi ŋikalukinok, ŋulu enyamete ŋakiro emwaka, ŋulu ileleba akituro, ŋulu eminasi ekibure ŋolo ka akuwan bon, akilo amina Akuj;
55003005	ŋulu esibito iricito ŋakiro ŋuna ke edin, nai kitoodiunite akiyar kec atemar emam apedor ŋina ka Akuj alotooma kec. Toŋer ŋituŋa ŋulu ikote ŋul.
55003006	Anerae ŋice alokidiŋ kec eloloto anakais a ŋituŋa, ido kibatasi ŋaberu ŋuna epalag ananupit kec ŋuna ileleba ŋasecisya, ŋuna iriyarit ekibure a ŋinibore a daadaŋ,
55003007	ŋaberu ŋuna ikatakinito jwi jwi ayenun idiobore, nai nyepedorito jik ayenun ŋuna a kire.
55003008	Ikwaŋina aponiata Yane ka Yambure kitepega Moses, itepegete ŋikilyok ŋul daŋ ŋakiro ŋuna a kire – ŋikilyok ŋulu nyisitiyaete ŋatameta kec ka ŋulu enyasut anupit kec.
55003009	Nai nyerubakinete ikes itiyaete ŋun, anerae eyenunete ŋituŋa daadaŋ abaŋao kec. Ŋunapei ŋun apotu totakanikis neni a Yane ka Yambure.
55003010	Nai ŋuna ikikamunito iyoŋ, idau akiwuap akitatam kaŋ, ŋipitesyo kaŋ ka ŋuna alosikinit ayoŋ anakiyar; idau iyoŋ akiwuap anupit kaŋ, atitinyikinit kaŋ, amina kaŋ, akidaŋidaŋ kaŋ,
55003011	ŋakisicaneta ŋuna aryamunit ayoŋ ka ŋican kaŋ. Iyeni iyoŋ daadaŋ ŋuna apotu totakanut neni kaŋ alo Antiokio ka alo Ikonio ta alo Listra, ŋakisicaneta ŋuna aronok nooi ŋuna edaŋidaŋi ayoŋ! Nai abu Ekapolon okoiu ayoŋ aneni kec a daadaŋ.
55003012	Kire, ŋulu daadaŋ ecamito akiboi anakiyar a ŋina ecamit Akuj anakimorikina ka Yesu Kristo, eryamunete ŋakisicaneta.
55003013	Nai ŋituŋa ŋulu aronok ka ŋulu a ŋisoswae erubakinete erae ŋulu aronok ka iyatakin aronis kec nooi, emodyanakinete ŋuluce ka emodikin ikes ŋilopeyek.
55003014	Nai ani eruwor iyoŋ, torubak anakiro a ŋuna a kire a ŋuna aponi ikitatami iyoŋ ka tonup ka agogoŋu. Iyeni iyoŋ ŋulu arae ŋiketatamak kon.
55003015	Itamunit iyoŋ atemar ameun ŋinapei eriŋa iyoŋ irae ikoku, iyeni iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta, ŋuna epedorete ainakin iyoŋ aosou ŋina ikirikori naiuno alotooma anupit Yesu Kristo.
55003016	Ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna igiritae Nakigireta erae ŋuna ieŋakinit Akuj Etau keŋ; ejokak ikes akitatamya ŋuna a kire, akitepegia ŋuna edyakara, arikinio ŋuna emunaara ka alimonokinia ŋakiro ŋuna ka akiyar a ŋina iyookino,
55003017	ikotere nai ituŋanan ŋini ka Akuj erae ŋini ilelebikina, ŋini etenit aŋuna a ŋiticisyo a ŋulu ajokak a daadaŋ.
55004001	Ekeciki ayoŋ iyoŋ alokiŋaren Akuj ka alokiŋaren Yesu Kristo ŋolo etubokini ŋulu eyarete ka ŋulu etwakito ka aŋuna etakanunia iŋes akipuka erae Erwosit:
55004002	kisera Ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj, torubak iserae ikes anapaki a ŋina itemokino, kori nyitemokino, kitepeg ŋuna edyakara, kikilyak ka kimaima apaki ŋina itatamya alotooma atitinyikinit daadaŋ.
55004003	Anerae ebuni apaki ŋina nyepupokiniata ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna erae ŋuna a kire, nai iwuapete ekibure kec a ŋilopeyek ka ecununete aŋuna kec ŋiketatamak ŋulu alalak ŋulu elimokinete ikes ŋuna ecamito ŋaki kec akiirar.
55004004	Eŋerete ikes apupokin ŋakiro ŋuna a kire, ido elosikinete akipup ŋiemuto ŋulucaryo.
55004005	Nai aneni kon, itemokino torae ŋolo ipakit anakiro a daadaŋ, kidaŋidaŋi ŋican, kitiya etic ŋolo ke ekalimonokinan a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak ka kitiya etic kon daadaŋ irae eketiyan ŋolo ka Akuj.
55004006	Aneni kaŋ, adol apaki ŋina ekepotorere ikwa amuronot, apaki ŋina aesikinia ayoŋ akiyar na.
55004007	Adau ayoŋ ajore ejiye ŋolo ajokan ŋolo ka anupit, aŋetak ayoŋ akerit ŋina ka anupit ka eric ayoŋ anupit kaŋ Kristo.
55004008	Ekedaritere ayoŋ ebokot ŋolo ka akiyookino ŋolo erae ainakinet ŋina ka akiloun, ŋolo akainakini ayoŋ Ekapolon ŋolo erae ekatubon ŋolo iyookino Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino – meere neni kaŋ bon, nai neni a daadaŋ a ŋulu iitanito atakanun keŋ.
55004009	Kiwonyu atipei.
55004010	Aminaki Demas ŋakiro ka akwap a na, ido akaesiki ayoŋ, alot Tesalonika, alot Keresike nakwap a Galatia, alot Tito nakwap a Dalamatia.
55004011	Luka bon iŋes ikirukit ka ayoŋ. Toryamu Mariko, ido torukut ka iyoŋ, anerae epedori iŋes akiŋarakin ayoŋ alotic.
55004012	Eyakiya ayoŋ Tuciko lotaun Epeso.
55004013	Ani ibuni, yau ekoti ŋolo abu ayoŋ oesik alo Toroas aneni a Karipo; yau ŋikitaaboi daŋ, akilo nooi ŋulu itiyaunitae a ŋilowi a ŋakinei.
55004014	Abu Alekisanda ŋolo etyekan ŋasuwa kitiya ŋaronisya ŋuna alalak neni kaŋ. Etacakini Ekapolon iŋes ŋuna eriyan ka ŋuna abu iŋes kitiya.
55004015	Tocoite mono iyoŋ iŋes, anerae itepegit iŋes ka agogoŋu ŋakiro yok.
55004016	Emam ituŋanan abu okoik ayoŋ apaki ŋina ke ekiŋaren ŋina erworor ayoŋ aŋuna kaŋ aloikiiko; apotu daadaŋ okoesikis ayoŋ. Elipit Akuj nyimarak ŋun erae asecit aneni kec!
55004017	Nai abu Ekapolon okowoik ayoŋ, okoinak agogoŋu, ido abu opedo alimonokin Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak daadaŋ, ikotere ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan iirarete ka aponi okoiun anatubokino atwanare.
55004018	Akalakuni ayoŋ Ekapolon anaronis a daadaŋ ka akaiuni iŋes ayoŋ okoya Napukan keŋ ŋina anakuj. Toyai apolou ŋina nyedaun neni keŋ ŋikaru ka ŋikaru! Amen.
55004019	Kimalakinae Prisila, Akwila ka ŋituŋa ŋulu ke ekal a Onesiporo.
55004020	Abu Erasto kidoŋ akiboi alo Korinto, abu ayoŋ oesik Tropimo alo Mileto, anerae adyaka iŋes.
55004021	Kiwonyu atipei eriŋa nyedolo ŋirwa ŋulu ka alilimu. Ikimalaete iyoŋ Ebulo ka Pudens ka Lino ta Kilaudia, ikimalaete tari ŋikaitotoi daadaŋ alotooma Kristo.
55004022	Toyai Ekapolon lotau kon! Toyai neni kus daadaŋ ajokis ŋina ka Akuj.
56001001	Ayoŋ Paulo eketiyan ŋolo ka Akuj ka ekiyakia ŋolo a Yesu Kristo egirit abaruwa na. Abu Akuj okoseu ayoŋ, ekeyakia daŋ akiŋarakin ka akitogogoŋ anupit a ŋituŋa keŋ a ŋulu seuna ka akirik ikes toyenut ejok ŋakiro ŋuna a kire ŋuna eyenuniata ikes akerit Akuj ejok;
56001002	ŋakiro ŋuna eponito anakigeno a ŋina ka akiyar a ŋina nyedaun. Abu Akuj ŋina nyelyokono ikiik iwon akiyar ŋin eriŋa ŋakwapin nyesubuna
56001003	ka anapaki a ŋina eyookino, abu kisileereu akiikinet ŋin anakirot keŋ. Abu Akuj, ŋina erae Akaiunan yok, ekecikak ayoŋ alimonokin ŋakiro ŋun neni a daadaŋ.
56001004	Egirit ayoŋ neni kon Tito, a ŋolo irae lokoku kaŋ ŋolo a kire ananupit a ŋina ikimori ayoŋ ka iyoŋ. Toyai neni kon ajokis ka ekisil aneni ka Akuj Papa ka aneni a Yesu Kristo Ekaiunan yok.
56001005	Abu ayoŋ ekemyek iyoŋ alo Kirete, ikotere isubakini ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna etemokino tosubakinae aina ka aseun ŋikatukok ŋulu epolokinito ŋatukon a Ŋikristo alotooma ŋolotaun, ikwaŋina eketatamikinitor ayoŋ iyoŋ.
56001006	Itemokino ŋolokatukon kikoni ne: torae ŋolo nyitoronitae, toyakar aberu apei; tonupito ŋidwe keŋ Yesu Kristo ka nyelimitoe anakiro a ŋuna ka adedeŋu ka aŋerit akipup ŋakiro.
56001007	Ikwapei eraakar ekarikon ŋolo a Ŋikristo epolokinit etic ŋolo ka Akuj, itemokino iŋes pa itoronitae. Nyitemokino iŋes ituro kori epatana akiŋo kori emerana kori eryenyaana kori erorokana alosiliŋa.
56001008	Itemokino iŋes erae ŋolo ijaununui ŋituŋa daadaŋ, tomina ibore ŋini ajokan daadaŋ. Itemokino iŋes erae ŋolo ecayete ŋatameta, ŋolo iyookino, ŋolo itoodiunito ŋipitesyo keŋ atemar iwuapit iŋes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj; torae ŋolo iyokuuno bon.
56001009	Itemokino kiricite ejok akitatam ŋina ecamuna, ŋina ikinyoma ŋina a Ŋikristo. Alopite a ŋol epedori akisimukekin ŋuluce anakitatam a ŋin, a ŋina iyookino ka akitepeg ŋulu itepegito akitatam ŋin.
56001010	Anerae eyakasi ŋulu alalak, akilo nooi ŋulu ebelekinosi alodin a ŋolo a Ŋiyudayan aruwor Ŋikristo, ŋulu eŋerito akipukao ka emodyanakinete ŋuluce a ŋakiro kec a ŋuna erae ŋacaryo.
56001011	Emaikina kiretakinae ikes alorwor kec, anerae eguryakis ikes ŋikalya daadaŋ, aŋuna itatamyata ŋakiro ŋuna nyitemokino kitatamae. Itatamete ikes ŋakiro ŋun aŋuna ca ka aryamunia ŋisiliŋa.
56001012	Tari epei a ŋikadwarak a Ŋikiretei, alimunit atemar, “Erae jwi jwi Ŋikiretei ŋikalyokonok, ikwaan ikes ka ŋityaŋ ŋulu asiilyanak ka erae ŋikadakak ŋulu akalanyanak.”
56001013	Iyookino ŋakiro ŋuna abu iŋes tolimu. Aŋakiro a ŋun, itemokino iyoŋ kisibura ikes nooi, ikotere toruworos ikes ŋikanupak ŋulu ajokak;
56001014	tojoŋoto akiwuapit ŋiemuto ŋulu a Ŋiyudayan ka ŋakiciketa ŋuna eponito alotuŋa a ŋulu adaut akiŋer ŋuna a kire.
56001015	Esegak ŋiboro daadaŋ aneni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu esegak ikes ŋilopeyek, nai emam ŋiboro esegak aneni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu nyenupito, anerae erae ŋatameta ka ŋitai kec esiilyaka.
56001016	Ebasi ikes iwogasi ebe ikiyeni Akuj, nai itepegito ŋiticisyo kec ŋun. Erae ikes ŋulu emoitaka, nyepupete ŋakiro ka nyepedorete akitiya idiobore ŋini ajokan.
56002001	Nai itemokino iyoŋ kitatam ŋakiro ŋuna ecamuna ka akitatam ŋina a Ŋikristo ŋina iyookino.
56002002	Kitatam ŋikasikou toraakas ŋulu ecoito, ŋulu emaikina tokeritetei, ŋulu epakito, ŋulu egogoŋ ananupit, anamina ka anatitinyikinit.
56002003	Ikwaŋinapei, kitatam ŋakimak kiboiyoto alopite a ŋolo itoodiunit atemar ekerito ikes Akuj, nyirworotor ŋulucetuŋa ka nyeruworosi ŋakamerak. Itemokino ikes toruworos ŋuna itatamete ŋakiro ŋuna ajokak,
56002004	ikotere epedoryata ikes akitatam ŋaberu ŋuna esorokaka: amina ŋikilyok kec ka ŋikecedwe,
56002005	toraakas ŋuna epakito, ŋuna ecayete ŋatameta, ŋuna esegak ŋitai, ŋuna itiyaete etic alokalya kec ejok, ŋuna ajokak ka ŋuna ekerito ŋikilyok kec; ido alopite a ŋol, emam ituŋanan itoroniyari ŋakiro ŋuna eponito aneni ka Akuj.
56002006	Ikwaŋinapei, kitatam ŋisorok toraakas ŋulu ecayete ŋatameta.
56002007	Anakiro a daadaŋ itemokino iyoŋ elope torae akitaanyikinet ŋina a ŋipitesyo a ŋulu ajokak. Kitatam emam alyokonu ka tomukeana.
56002008	Kirwor ŋakiro ŋuna ileereete ŋuna nyitepegio, ikotere ŋiketepegak yok isurumyo ŋileec, anerae eŋopete ŋakiro ŋuna aronok ŋuna ikitoroniyaryata ikes iwon.
56002009	Kitatam ŋipi topupete ŋikapolok kec anakiro a daadaŋ, kitalakanarete ikes tomam apeganakin ikes,
56002010	kori nyekokoyete aneni kec. Akilo, itemokino ikes kitoodiunito atemar ejokak ka ikinyoma ikes jwi jwi, ikotere itopoloorete ikes akitatam ŋina ka Akuj a ŋina erae Akaiunan yok, anibore a daadaŋ a ŋini itiyaete ikes.
56002011	Anerae etoodiu Akuj ajokis keŋ aŋuna ka aiunia ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
56002012	Ikitatami ajokis ŋin iwon aesikin ŋipitesyo ŋulu nyekerito Akuj ka ekibure ŋolo ka akwap a na ka itemokino ikiboi ikirae ŋulu ikitenit anatameta, ŋulu ikiyookino ka ŋulu ikikerit Akuj anakwap a na,
56002013	eriŋa ikidarit arereŋu ŋina ikigeno iwon, iŋes atemar itatakanunio apolou ŋina ka Akuj yok a ŋina etiron ka ŋina ke Ekaiunan yok Yesu Kristo.
56002014	Abu iŋes tojal akiyar keŋ aŋuna yok, aiun iwon anaronis a daadaŋ ka akituruwor iwon ŋituŋa ŋulu asegak ŋulu erae ŋulu keŋ make, ŋulu imuit nooi akitiya ŋuna ajokak.
56002015	Kitatam ŋakiro ŋun; kisitiya apolou daadaŋ ŋina iyakar iyoŋ apaki ŋina isimukekinitor ka ŋina isiburaa ikes epupete ŋakiro ŋuna irworo iyoŋ. Nyicamak idio alokidiŋ kec ikimenit iyoŋ.
56003001	Tolimok ŋituŋa kon atemar itemokino ikes ekerito ŋikepukak ka ŋikapolok, toruworos ŋulu epupete ŋakiro, ŋulu imuit akitiya ŋuna ajokak alopitesyo a daadaŋ.
56003002	Tolimok ikes nyirworotor idiotuŋanan, nai torae ŋulu ke ekisil ka ŋulu edaŋaŋ make, ŋulu itoodiunito arimao neni a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ.
56003003	Anerae ikibaŋaaka paaran sek iwon daŋ ŋilopeyek, pa ikipupi ŋakiro ka ikimodikinitae. Ikirae ŋipi ŋulu ke ekibure ka ŋulu a ŋakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna etalakarito ŋikasecak. Ikipotu iwon eboiyoto alopite a ŋolo aronon ka ŋolo ka arakao; ikitidiŋito iwon ŋuluce ka ikitidiŋit iwon daŋ ikes.
56003004	Nai ŋina etoodiunere lotuŋa arimao ka amina ŋina ka Akuj Akaiunan yok,
56003005	abu iŋes ikiu iwon. Pa arae aŋuna a ŋiticisyo a ŋidi a ŋulu ajokak a ŋulu ikitiyat iwon, nai arae aŋuna ka akisyon keŋ ka alope abunio iŋes ikiunia iwon. Abu iŋes ikiu iwon, ikitesegu iwon anakidouno a ŋina a ŋaarei ka ikituruwo iwon ŋulu kitet aneni ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan.
56003006	Abu Akuj ikilelebik nooi iwon Etau ŋolo Asegan alotooma Yesu Kristo Ekaiunan yok,
56003007	ikotere nai aŋuna ka ajokis keŋ ikituruworyo iwon ŋulu ikiyookino alokiŋaren Akuj ka oryamutu akiyar ŋina nyedaun, ŋina ikigeno iwon.
56003008	Erae ŋun ŋakiro ŋuna a kire. Acamit iyoŋ kitatam ŋakiro ŋun ka agogoŋu, ikotere nai ŋulu enupito Akuj eruwor ŋulu emitakinito akitiya ŋiticisyo ŋulu ajokak. Ejokak ŋakiro ŋun daadaŋ, ido iŋarakinete ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
56003009	Nai toŋerite ŋipegeta ŋulu ka abaŋao, akirworo ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋirorwa a ŋulu alalak a ŋulu atapapaa yok, ŋiburasinei ka ŋijiyesyo ŋulu ejiyo aŋuna a Ŋikisila. Erae ikes ŋicaryo, ido nyiŋarakinete ŋituŋa.
56003010	Ani keyau ituŋanan idio atyakatyaka aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun, tolimok iŋes apeilimokinet kori ŋalimokinet ŋaarei bon, ido ekaku todaun iyoŋ ka iŋes ŋace jik.
56003011	Iyeni iyoŋ atemar ituŋanan ŋini ikoni ŋin, erae ŋini emunaara ka itoodiunito ŋasecisya keŋ atemar etubokina iŋes bon.
56003012	Ani eyakuuni ayoŋ Aretemas kori Tuciko neni kon, bua atipei aryamun ayoŋ alo Nikopoli, anerae adau ayoŋ atyakun akiboi a nen ŋirwa ŋulu ka alilimu.
56003013	Kikatak nooi alopite a daadaŋ akiŋarakin Senas ŋolo erae eketataman a ŋikisila, kaapei ka Apolo analosit kec ka itemokino toanyu atemar eyakatar ikes ibore daadaŋ ŋini iitanito.
56003014	Itemokino ŋituŋa ŋulu a ŋatukon yok toyenut akitiya ŋiticisyo ŋulu ajokak, ikotere eryamunete ŋiboro ŋulu iŋarakiniata ŋituŋa ŋulu eyakatar akiitanit; ido nyiboiyete erae ŋicaryo.
56003015	Ikimalaete iyoŋ ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu ikirukit ka ayoŋ. Kimala ŋulu ikiminasi isua ananupit, a ŋina ikimori isua ka ikes. Toyai neni kus daadaŋ ajokis ŋina ka Akuj.
57001001	Ayoŋ Paulo emabus aŋuna a Yesu Kristo ka lokaato yok Timoteo, ikigirit abaruwa na neni kon Pilemon ŋolo minat, ŋolo ikirae ka isua ŋiketiyak etic a Kristo.
57001002	Igirit daŋ neni ka Apia nakaato yok ka Arikipo ŋolo ikirae ka isua ŋisigarya a Yesu, ta neni ka atukot a Ŋikristo a ŋulu ecunanakin kai kon.
57001003	Toyai ajokis ka ekisil ŋulu eponito aneni ka Akuj a Papa yok ka aneni a Ekapolon Yesu Kristo neni kus.
57001004	Apaki daadaŋ ŋina akatamunia ayoŋ iyoŋ anakilip kaŋ, alakar ayoŋ neni ka Akuj kaŋ.
57001005	Anerae apupi ayoŋ ŋuna ka amina ka anupit kon Ekapolon Yesu ka ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj daadaŋ.
57001006	Elipi ayoŋ Akuj atemar kiyatak nooi anakimorikina yok ananupit ayenut ŋina a ŋarereŋisyo a daadaŋ a ŋuna erae ŋuna yok alotooma Kristo.
57001007	Lokaato, aryamu ayoŋ alelyan ŋina alalan ka atitinyu aŋuna ka amina kon, anerae italaka iyoŋ ŋitai a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj.
57001008	A ŋakiro a nu, kejoikinit ayoŋ ikwapei lokaato kon alotooma Kristo akicikakin iyoŋ akitiya ŋuna itemokino akitiya;
57001009	nai aŋuna ka amina, ayoŋ Paulo acamit akimaima iyoŋ. Etiyae ayoŋ nu, tari karae ekiyakia ka ŋolo tokona akaenitae alomabus aŋuna a Yesu Kristo.
57001010	Ekemaimai iyoŋ aŋuna ka Onesimo a lokoku kaŋ, a ŋolo aruwor ayoŋ papa keŋ anaenenu kaŋ.
57001011	Paaran sek, arae Onesimo ituŋanan ŋini pa ikiŋarakini iyoŋ, nai tokona ikiŋarakini iŋes iyoŋ ka ayoŋ nooi.
57001012	Eyakuunit tokona ayoŋ iŋes neni kon, iŋes ŋolo emina etau kaŋ nooi.
57001013	Acamit sek ayoŋ akisidoŋ iŋes oruko ka ayoŋ a ne, ikotere ekeŋarakini ayoŋ, akilo iyoŋ akiŋarakin ayoŋ apaki na ŋina ayakar mabus aŋuna a Ŋakiro a ŋuna Ajokak.
57001014	Nai pa acamit ayoŋ akitiya idiobore alotooma ŋun eriŋa nyecamuna iyoŋ, ikotere nyeruwor ajokis kon ŋina itiŋaunitae, nai torae acamit kon a elope.
57001015	Acepaki ŋakiro nu ketyakarere Onesimo aneni kon apaki ŋina euruwana, ikotere nai ani eboŋuni, toruko ka iyoŋ jik.
57001016	Nyeriŋa tokona iŋes erae epito, ajokyar akilo epito; erae iŋes lokaato ŋolo minat alotooma Kristo. Erae iŋes lokaato ŋolo minat aneni kaŋ, nai ŋolo minat nooi adepar aneni kon, iŋes ŋolo erae epito ka torae lokaato kon alotooma Ekapolon!
57001017	Aŋun, ani kimarit iyoŋ atemar arae ayoŋ erukitos kon, kijau Onesimo lopite ŋolo ikijaunia iyoŋ ayoŋ.
57001018	Ani keyai idiobore ŋini esecit iŋes kori keyakar iŋes amica kon, kimicae ayoŋ.
57001019	Egiri ayoŋ nu ka akan kaŋ a elope, ayoŋ Paulo akataci iyoŋ. (Nai nyitemokino ayoŋ eketatamu iyoŋ atemar erae neni kaŋ iryamunitor iyoŋ akiyar kon ŋina kitete alotooma Kristo.)
57001020	Nai lokaato kaŋ, okoe kiŋarakinae aŋuna ke Ekapolon; kitalaka etau kaŋ alotooma Kristo!
57001021	Ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyoŋ abaruwa, anerae ayeni atemar iwuapi iyoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ – ka itiyakini tari ŋuna iloito ŋun.
57001022	Nabo daŋ, kitemok agule ŋina a ŋipeyok aŋuna kaŋ, anerae egeno ayoŋ atemar eboŋokini Akuj ŋakilipeta kus daadaŋ, ekenyakun ayoŋ neni kus.
57001023	Ikimalae iyoŋ Epapuras ŋolo ikirae ka ayoŋ ŋimabus aŋuna a Kristo.
57001024	Ikimalaete nabo ata Mariko, Aristako, ka Demas ta Luka ŋulu ikitiyae ka ayoŋ.
57001025	Toyai ajokis ŋina ke Ekapolon Yesu Kristo neni kus daadaŋ.
58001001	Koloŋ sek, abu Akuj kirwor neni atapapaa yok alotooma ŋikadwarak ŋarwa ŋakalalak, alopitesyo a ŋulu agelegelya;
58001002	nai ŋirwa ŋulu esidyok lu erwor iŋes neni yok alotooma Lokoku keŋ. Iŋes abunio Akuj tosubunia akwap, toseu iŋes aryamun ŋiboro daadaŋ ekaku.
58001003	Inwakunit iŋes akica ŋina ka apolou a ŋina ka Akuj, nabo ikwaan iŋes per ka Akuj alope. Isicasit iŋes akwap ka agogoŋu a ŋina ka akirot keŋ. Ani kedau aryamikin ŋituŋa akisyonio ŋina a ŋasecisya kec, abu kiboikin nakuj lowae ŋolo aloteten Akuj.
58001004	Aponi kitopolooroe Lokoku ka Akuj akilo ŋimalaikan, ikwapei itoodiunitor tari ekiro keŋ atemar epol iŋes akilo ŋimalaikan.
58001005	Anerae abu Akuj nyelimok emalaika tari epei atemar, “Irae iyoŋ Lokoku kaŋ. Aruwor ayoŋ papa kon nakuwar na.” Kori nyelimuno Akuj ŋakiro ŋadi aŋuna ke emalaika ebe, “Aruwor ayoŋ papa keŋ, ka eruwor iŋes Lokoku kaŋ.”
58001006	Nabo, ani eapuuni Akuj akiyakuun Lokoku keŋ ŋolo kiyae nakwap, abu tolimu tema, “Itemokino ŋimalaikan ŋulu ka Akuj daadaŋ toryediko kipuro iŋes.”
58001007	Nabo kirwor Akuj ŋuna ikamunito ŋimalaikan tema, “Isikokini Akuj ŋimalaikan keŋ ŋikuwuamin; isikokini ŋiketiyak keŋ arira ŋina ka akim.”
58001008	Nai neni a Lokoku keŋ, tolimu Akuj tema, “Irae iyoŋ Akuj ka eropari Apukan kon jik! Ipukat iyoŋ ŋituŋa kon anakiyookino.
58001009	Ibu iyoŋ tominak ŋuna iyookino ka ibu toŋer ŋuna aronok. Aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun, akaseu ayoŋ ŋina arae Akuj kon iyoŋ alelyan aŋuna akainakinia iyoŋ apolou ŋina iloit ŋina a ŋirukitos kon.”
58001010	Igiritae nabo a Nakigireta aŋuna keŋ ebe, “Ekapolon, iyoŋ koloŋ isubuni akwap anakisyakinet ka iyoŋ pei ibu tosub nakuj.
58001011	Esalunete ikes nai iropari iyoŋ; enyamunosi daadaŋ ikwa ŋilowi.
58001012	Ipupunyikini iyoŋ ikes ikwa ekoti ŋolo enyamuna. Ilokonyikini ikes ikwa ŋilowi, nai iropari iyoŋ ikoni nenipei jik; nabo nyedaun akiyar kon.”
58001013	Nai nyelimokina Akuj tari epei a ŋimalaikan atemar, “Kiboikin lowae ŋolo aloteten kaŋ akitodol ŋina ewuakinia ayoŋ ŋimoi kon kwap ŋakejen kon, toreu iyoŋ ikes.”
58001014	Erae nai ŋimalaikan nyo? Erae ŋitai ŋulu itiyaete etic ŋolo ka Akuj, ŋulu iyakuunitae akiŋarakin ŋulu eiunio.
58002001	Aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋun, itemokino ericakisi ejok ŋuna ikidau akiirar, ikotere nyikioliyo.
58002002	Anerae tari ŋakiro ŋuna koloŋ alimonokinete ŋimalaikan atapapaa yok, arae ŋuna a kire, ido ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini abili ka towou akiricakin ŋakiro ŋun, abu toryamu akisicanio ŋina ewarit iŋes ilope.
58002003	Ikikokini nai iwon ikibucari anakisicanio ai, erae kikijamak aiuno ŋina epol ŋina etya na? Ekapolon koloŋ esyauni erwor ŋakiro ŋuna ka aiuno a ŋin ka apotu ŋulu eirarito ikitunupa atemar erae ŋakiro ŋun ŋuna a kire.
58002004	Nabo abu Akuj daŋ kitoodiu atemar erae ŋun kire alotooma akitiya ŋakitoodikineta ka ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna egelegelya ka ŋiticisyo ŋulu ka apedor keŋ ka nabo alotooma akoranakin ŋainanakineta ŋuna ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan alopite a ŋolo ecamitor iŋes.
58002005	Pa abu Akuj kituruwo ŋimalaikan ŋikepukak ka akwap a ŋina kitete a ŋina ebuni mwanan – akwap ŋina ikilimit iwon.
58002006	Nai igiritae iwace a Nakigireta ikona, “Okoe Akuj! Nyo mono ituŋanan itamunitor iyoŋ ŋakiro keŋ? Nyo lokoku a ituŋanan ŋolo imitakinit iyoŋ?
58002007	Ibu iyoŋ kitiditeu iŋes apaki ŋina diouriyen akilo ŋimalaikan, ibu nai inak iŋes apolou ka akerit;
58002008	tosodi kituruwo iŋes ekepukan a ŋiboro a daadaŋ.” Tari kelimunitoe atemar abu Akuj kituruwo ituŋanan “Ekepukan a ŋiboro a daadaŋ,” iŋes atemar emam ibore ŋini nyipukat iŋes, nai nyetakani bo tokona atemar ipukat ituŋanan ŋiboro daadaŋ.
58002009	Nai erae Yesu ŋolo aponi kitiditeunae apaki ŋina diouriyen akilo ŋimalaikan, etakani tokona einakinitae apolou ka akerit, anerae abu iŋes tocamu atwanare; aŋuna ka ajokis a ŋina ka Akuj etemokino iŋes totwan aŋuna a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ.
58002010	Etemokino kire Akuj ŋina erae neni keŋ eponitotor ŋiboro daadaŋ ka erae ŋiboro daadaŋ aŋuna keŋ kituruwo Yesu ŋolo iyookino kire alotooma ŋican, ikotere eyauni ŋidwe ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu alalak napolou keŋ. Anerae Yesu itenari ikes naiuno.
58002011	Iŋes ŋolo itesegi ŋitai kaapei ka ŋulu itesegunio, erae papa kec epei. Erae ŋakiro ŋun nyitimitor Yesu anyarare ikes ŋikaitotoi keŋ.
58002012	Alimoki Yesu Akuj atemar, “Alimokini ayoŋ ŋikaitotoi kaŋ ŋuna itiya iyoŋ. Ekepuro ayoŋ iyoŋ anatukot a ŋikelipak.”
58002013	Nabo ebala, “Ekinyomi ayoŋ iŋes ka daŋ, ayoŋ lo kaapei ka ŋidwe ŋulu akainaki Akuj ayoŋ.”
58002014	Aŋuna eraakatar ŋituŋa ŋulu enyarit iŋes ŋidwe, ŋulu eya ŋawat ka ŋaokot, abu Yesu tomora ka ikes ekuwane ŋol; ikotere alotooma atwanare keŋ inyasuni Satan ŋolo epolokinit atwanare.
58002015	Alopite a ŋol abu Yesu tolacaki ŋulu arae ŋipi anakiyar kec a daadaŋ, aŋuna akeritotor ikes atwanare.
58002016	Ileere kire ebe, meere ŋimalaikan iŋaranakini Yesu, nai erae ŋiletok ŋulu ka Aburaam, ikwapei igiritere.
58002017	Apolou a ŋakiro a ŋun atemar etemokino iŋes kikwaanikinos ka ŋikaitotoi keŋ alopitesyo a daadaŋ, ikotere toruwor Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋolo isyoniono, ŋolo ikinyoma alotic ka Akuj, ikotere elemarere ŋasecisya a ŋituŋa.
58002018	Aŋuna abunio iŋes toryamunia ŋican anakitem a Satan, epedori nai tokona iŋes akiŋaranakin ŋulu itemit Satan.
58003001	Ŋikaitotoi ŋulu adau Akuj anyarare, ŋulu iraakasi ŋulu keŋ! Totamatamata ŋuna a Yesu a ŋolo erae ekiyakia ŋolo ka Akuj ka erae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋolo ka anupit yok.
58003002	Ekinyomit Yesu Akuj ŋina abu kiyaku iŋes akitiya etic keŋ lopite ŋolo koloŋ ekinyomitor Moses etic ŋolo ke ekal a ŋolo ka Akuj.
58003003	Ipuryo nooi ituŋanan ŋini eduki ekal akilo ekal ŋolo aduki iŋes. Ikwaŋinapei, itemokino kipuroe Yesu akilo Moses.
58003004	Eyai kire ŋolokal daadaŋ ekekadukon, nai Akuj iŋes erae akadukon a ŋiboro a daadaŋ.
58003005	Arae Moses ekile ŋolo abu Akuj kikinyom ikwapei eketiyan keŋ alokal a ŋolo ka Akuj, ido abu kiteyenu ŋituŋa ŋakiro ŋuna epote ekaku.
58003006	Nai ekinyomit Akuj Yesu ikwapei Lokoku keŋ apolokin ekal keŋ. Ikirae iwon ekal ŋolo ka Akuj, erae kikirubak ikititinyikinit ka ikituro aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna ikigeno iwon.
58003007	Aŋakiro a ŋun, elimunit Etau ŋolo Asegan atemar, “Ani kiirasi etoil kaŋ nakoloŋit na,
58003008	nyitininika ŋatameta kus, lopite ŋolo koloŋ etiyaata atapapaa kus apaki ŋina akaŋeritotor ayoŋ. Nyitiyata ŋuna ikote ŋuna apotu ikes kitiyata analoŋisat apaki ŋina ekekatakinitotor ayoŋ.
58003009	Apotu ikes ekekatakis ayoŋ anariet, tari daŋ ŋina aanyunitotor ikes ŋikaaticisyo ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon.
58003010	Aŋakiro a ŋun, abu oŋoik ŋituŋa ŋul nooi otema, ‘Eoliyonorete ŋituŋa lu jwi jwi aneni kaŋ, nyeyenuna ikes ŋipitesyo ŋulu emaikina kiwuapa.’
58003011	Abu ayoŋ oŋo nooi, ekoŋ otema, ‘Nyelomarete ikes jik nakwap ŋina eikinit ayoŋ ikes akieŋunia.’ ”
58003012	Ŋikaitotoi, tocoito nyeyakar idio alokidiŋ kus etau ŋolo aronon ŋolo nyenupit ŋakiro ka Akuj, ido tooliyo aneni ka Akuj a ŋina eyari.
58003013	Nai kiŋaranakinos iyes make ŋapakio daadaŋ eriŋa ikiya napaki ŋina enyaritae, “Nakoloŋit na,” ikotere nyemodik asecit idio kus kitininik ŋatameta.
58003014	Anerae ikirae iwon daadaŋ ŋipei alotooma Kristo, erae kikirubak ikititinyikinit ananupit lopite ŋolo ikisyakinia.
58003015	Ebasi Ŋakigireta ebe, “Ani kiirasi etoil ka Akuj nakoloŋit na, nyitininika ŋatameta kus, lopite ŋolo koloŋ etiyaata atapapaa kus apaki ŋina ekatakinitotor Akuj.”
58003016	Ataŋae koloŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu apotu kiirasi etoil ka Akuj, ido kitoŋoa iŋes? Arae ŋituŋa ŋulu koloŋ arikori Moses alo Ijipit.
58003017	Arae ataŋae koloŋ aŋoikinit Akuj ŋikaru ŋatomoniomwon? Arae ŋituŋa ŋulu asecito, ŋulu apotu totwaka analoŋisat.
58003018	Arae ataŋae erworor Akuj apaki ŋina ekoŋio iŋes atemar, “Nyelomarete ikes jik nakwap ŋina eikinit ayoŋ ikes akieŋunia?” Arae ŋituŋa ŋulu aŋerete iŋes.
58003019	Ikianyu tokona iwon atemar apotu ikes nyelomasi nakwap ŋin, anerae pa anupito ŋakiro ka Akuj.
58004001	Nai tokona, adau Akuj ainakin iwon akiikinet keŋ ŋina abu itolimok iwon atemar ieŋunete. Nai aŋuna tokona eriŋaakar akiikinet ŋina ka Akuj ŋina ka alomar nakwap ŋina ka akieŋun keŋ eyai, itemokino ocoikisi, ikotere nyekuruwo ipei daŋ alokidiŋ yok alomar nakieŋun ŋin.
58004002	Anerae ikiira ŋakiro ŋuna ajokak ŋuna ka akieŋun a ŋin lopite ŋolo eiraryata atapapaa yok analoŋisat. Nai ŋina eiraryata ikes ŋakiro ŋun, emam ibore ŋini ajokan ŋini apotu ikes toryamut, anerae apotu towout akinup ŋakiro ŋun.
58004003	Erae anupit bon ŋakiro ka Akuj, iŋes ikilomarya iwon nakwap ŋina ka akieŋun ikwapei elimunitor Akuj atemar, “Abu ayoŋ oŋo nooi, ekoŋ otema, ‘Nyelomarete ikes jik nakwap ŋina eikinit ayoŋ ikes akieŋunia!’ ” Abu Akuj tolimu ŋun, tari ŋina aris iŋes kedaunia akitiya ekeetic ageun ŋina asubunia akwap.
58004004	Anerae igiritae iwace a Nakigireta ŋakiro ŋuna ka akoloŋit a ŋina a ŋakanikaarei ikona, “Abu Akuj kieŋu akoloŋit ŋina a ŋakanikaarei alotic keŋ a daadaŋ.”
58004005	Elimunitoe nabo ŋakiro nu a ne daŋ ebe, “Nyelomarete ikes jik nakwap ŋina eikinit ayoŋ ikes akieŋunia.”
58004006	Pa apotu ŋulu ageunete akiirar Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak toryamut akieŋun ŋin, anerae pa anupito. Nai eyakasi nabo ŋice ŋulu ecamakinitae tolomasi nakieŋun ŋin.
58004007	Nabo adau Akuj atyakun akoloŋit ace ŋina enyaritae “Akoloŋit na.” Erae akoloŋit ŋin iŋes abu Akuj kirwor aneni a Daudi a Nakigireta, kelunyar apaki ŋina aoyan ebala, “Ani kiirasi etoil ka Akuj nakoloŋit na, nyitininika ŋatameta kus.”
58004008	Kerae kitodolite Yosua Ŋisirael nakwap ŋina ka akieŋunia a ŋina eikinit Akuj ikes, pa nabo kirworit Akuj ekaku ŋakiro ka akoloŋit ka ace.
58004009	Aŋun nai, eriŋa akieŋun ace eyai aŋuna a ŋituŋa ka Akuj; akieŋun ŋina ikoni ŋina eeŋunia Akuj akoloŋit ŋina a ŋakanikaarei.
58004010	Anerae ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini elomari nakieŋun ŋina adau Akuj akiikin, ieŋuni alotic keŋ lopite ŋolo eeŋunia Akuj alotic keŋ.
58004011	Ekatakisi nai tokona iwon nooi anacamit alomar nakieŋun ŋin, ikotere nyekuruwo idiotuŋanan alomar nakieŋun ŋin ikwa abunio tokuruworya ŋituŋa ŋulu koloŋ, aŋuna pa anupitotor ŋakiro ka Akuj.
58004012	Eyari akirot ŋina ka Akuj ka itiyae daŋ ka agogoŋu, iloit akwanis keŋ ŋina ka atum a ŋina ekwaka ŋiwaetin keŋ daadaŋ. Eduŋi todol tari neni iryamiryameta akiyar ka etau kori tari neni eya ŋakilenyet ka asumet, isileereununui ŋatameta ka ŋakiro ŋuna elosikinit etau.
58004013	Emam isubuna ipei daŋ ŋini epedoryo akiwua aneni ka Akuj, ileere ibore daadaŋ eyai eŋaara aneni keŋ. Erae neni keŋ elimoryo iwon ŋakiro ŋuna kitiya.
58004014	Itemokino iwon orubakisi ikititinyikinit ananupit Yesu; anerae Yesu Lokoku ka Akuj, iŋes erae Esacaradoti yok ŋolo Apolon nooi, ŋolo adau alosit nakuj.
58004015	Erae Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi ŋolo isyonit kire apalagu yok ŋina a ŋitai. Esacaradoti ŋolopei ŋol abu Satan kitem alopitesyo a daadaŋ a ŋulu ikitemio iŋes iwon, nai abu iŋes nyesec.
58004016	Otitinyoto nai tokona iwon, oloto neni ka Akuj a ŋina ipukat ka ajokis, ikotere ikiryamuni akisyon ka ajokis, ikiŋarakis iwon apaki ŋina ka akiitanit.
58005001	Esacaradoti daadaŋ ŋolo Apolon nooi, eseununui Akuj alokidiŋ ŋituŋa keŋ, ikotere itiyae etic ka Akuj aŋuna a ŋituŋa; inak ŋainakineta ka ŋamuronisya aŋuna a ŋasecisya.
58005002	Ikwaŋinapei epalagia iŋes daŋ alotau, epataniar iŋes aneni a ŋulu edyakanarete, anerae emam ŋuna eyenete.
58005003	Ido aŋuna epalagia iŋes daŋ, itemokino inak ŋamuronisya aŋuna a ŋasecisya keŋ, meere aŋuna a ŋasecisya a ŋituŋa bon.
58005004	Nyeseun ituŋanan bon tema apoloor iŋes oruwor Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi. Akuj bon enyarae ituŋanan kituruwo Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi – ikwapei anyaraa koloŋ Aron.
58005005	Ikwaŋinapei, abu Kristo nyitopoloor bon kituruwor Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi. Akuj alope alimokini iŋes atemar, “Irae iyoŋ Lokoku kaŋ, aruwor ayoŋ papa kon nakuwar na.”
58005006	Tolimu nabo Akuj ŋuna igiritae iwace tema, “Irae iyoŋ Esacaradoti ŋoloruba, lopite ŋolo ke esacaradoti a ŋolo anyaritae Melekisedek.”
58005007	Ani eriŋa Yesu eyari anakwap, elipenene, todyekitoi a etoil a ŋolo apolon, kigwori daŋ neni ka Akuj a ŋina eyakar apedor aiun iŋes anatwanare. Ikwapei araakar iŋes ŋolo ainakina neni ka Akuj, abu Akuj kiira ŋakiro keŋ.
58005008	Nabo tari kerae iŋes Lokoku ka Akuj, abu toyenu anaryamun ŋican apolou ŋina ka akerit Akuj.
58005009	Ani kituruwor iŋes ŋolo iyookino kire, abu toruwor ŋolo eyauni aiuno ŋina nyedaun neni a ŋulu daadaŋ ekerito iŋes;
58005010	ka abu Akuj tolimu atemar erae iŋes Esacaradoti ŋolo Apolon nooi, lopite ŋolo ke Esacaradoti a ŋolo anyaritae Melekisedek.
58005011	Eya ŋakiro ŋuna alalak ŋuna itemokino isua tolimoroe anakiro a ŋun, nai etyono akiteyenun iyes, anerae ibaŋaaketa iyes.
58005012	Kire, etemokino iyes tokona toraakas ŋiketatamak, nai iitanito nabo iyes akitatamo ŋakiro ŋuna egeunio akitatam anakiro ka Akuj. Ikokis iyes ŋidwe; akilo akinyam akimuj, eriŋa iitanito akinak.
58005013	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eriŋa enaki erae ikoku, nyeyeni ŋakiro ŋuna ka akiyookino a ŋina ka Akuj.
58005014	Nai erae akimuj ŋina nyamat ŋina a ŋituŋa a ŋulu apolok, a ŋulu ayenut anakitiya epite ŋolo etyaketa ŋakiro ŋuna ajokak ka ŋuna aronok.
58006001	Aŋun, oloto tokona kiŋaren etatama ŋakiro ŋuna apolok ŋuna ikamunito Kristo, ido emyekisi ŋakiro ŋuna ageunio akitatam anakiro ka Akuj. Nyitemokino tokona nabo ikiboŋokini akitatam ŋakiro ŋuna koloŋ kegeunio akitatam, ŋakiro ŋun ikes nu: akiŋer ŋakiro ŋuna ikirikorete natwanare ka ananupit Akuj;
58006002	akitatam ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋibatisimui, ŋuna ka akidokonokin ŋakan, ŋuna ka ayarun a ŋikatwak ka ŋuna ka atubokino a ŋina nyedaun.
58006003	Oloto kiŋaren! Ido toruwor ŋun ŋuna ikilosi akitiya, erae kikicamak Akuj.
