62001008	Ani kikitema iwon ebe nyikisecenene, ikimodyanakin iwon make, ido emam ŋuna a kire alotooma yok.
62001009	Nai ani kikilimo iwon ŋasecisya yok, isyoni Akuj ŋasecisya yok, ikitesegu iwon alopitesyo a ŋulu aronok a daadaŋ; anerae nyiloconokini iŋes ŋuna alimu ka iyookino.
62001010	Ani kikitema iwon ebe nyikisecit, ikitusubuni iwon Akuj ŋina alyokonon ka emam ŋakiro keŋ alotooma yok.
62002001	Ŋidwe kaŋ, ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes ŋakiro nu, ikotere nyiseceta; nai ani kesec idiotuŋanan, ikiyakatar iwon ekesirworikinan ka Akuj Papa, iŋes Yesu Kristo ŋolo iyookino.
62002002	Iŋes erae amuronot ŋina isyoniyere ŋasecisya yok; meere ŋasecisya yok bon, nai ŋasecisya a ŋituŋa a daadaŋ.
62002003	Ikianyuni iwon kire atemar, ikiyeni iwon Akuj, erae kikiricak iwon Ŋakiciketa keŋ.
62002004	Iŋes ŋini ebala, “Ayeni ayoŋ Akuj,” nai nyiricakinit Ŋakiciketa keŋ, erae iŋes ikalyokonon ka emam ŋuna a kire alotooma keŋ.
62002005	Nai ŋini iricit akirot keŋ, neni keŋ kire itemokinor amina ŋina ka Akuj. Aŋun, ikiyenuni iwon kire atemar, ikiya neni ka Akuj.
62002006	Ituŋanan ŋini ebala, “Ikirukit ka Akuj,” itemokino iŋes iboi ikwaŋina eboiyo Yesu Kristo.
62002007	Ŋikaakonei, nyekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes akiciket ŋina kitete, nai akiciket ŋinaŋorot, ŋina iyakatar iyes ŋinapei anakisyakinet. Akiciket ŋinaŋorot ŋin, iŋes akirot ŋina idaut iyes akiirar.
62002008	Nai ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes akiciket ŋina kitete, ŋina erae kire aneni a Kristo ka aneni kus; anerae elosi akiryonut alunyar ka adau akica ŋina a kire acaun.
62002009	Ŋini ebala ayai nakica, ido toremokino lokaato keŋ, eriŋa iŋes eyai nakiryonut.
62002010	Ŋini emina lokaato keŋ, iboi alotooma akica ka emam idiobore anakica ŋini isigukini iŋes.
62002011	Nai ŋini eremokino lokaato keŋ, eyai iŋes nakiryonut ka elosi anakiryonut, nyeyeni neni elosi; anerae etumudukan akiryonut iŋes.
62002012	Ŋidwe kaŋ, ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes, anerae esyoni ŋasecisya kus aŋuna a Yesu Kristo.
62002013	Atapapa, ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes, anerae iyenete iyes ŋolo eyai ameun anakisyakinet. Ŋisorok, ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes, anerae igogoŋ iyes ka iboi akirot ŋina ka Akuj alotooma kus ka idaut iyes akiloun ŋolo Aronon.
62002014	Ŋidwe, ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes, anerae iyenete iyes Papa. Atapapa, ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes, anerae iyenete iyes ŋolo eyai ameun anakisyakinet. Ŋisorok, ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes, anerae igogoŋ iyes ka iboi akirot ŋina ka Akuj alotooma kus ka idaut akiloun ŋolo Aronon.
62002015	Nyiminakis akwap kori ŋinibore eyai tooma keŋ. Ani keminaki idiotuŋanan akwap, nyemina ituŋanan ŋin Papa.
62002016	Anerae ŋinibore daadaŋ eyai nakwap, ekibure ŋolo ka akuwan ka ekibure ŋolo a ŋakonyen, ta akituro ŋina ka akiyar, nyerae ŋulu a Papa; nai erae ŋulu ka akwap.
62002017	Edaun akwap ka ekibure keŋ; nai iŋes ŋini itiyae acamit ŋina ka Akuj, eropari jik.
62002018	Ŋidwe kaŋ, erae na apaki ŋina esidyon! Ikwaŋinapei iiraryata iyes atemar ebunit emoit ŋolo a Kristo, tari tokona daŋ, adolut ŋimoi ŋulu a Kristo ŋulu alalak; aŋun, ikiyenu iwon atemar erae apaki na ŋina esidyon.
62002019	Apotu ikes totyakaros aneni yok, nai pa arae ikes ŋirukitos yok. Kerae torubakinito ikirukit ka iwon, kikirukit ka iwon; nai abu atyakar kec kisileereu atemar pa arae ikes ŋirukitos yok.
62002020	Nai ikiinak iyes Kristo Etau ŋolo Asegan ka iyenete iyes daadaŋ ŋun.
62002021	Ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes nu, meere aŋuna nyiyeniata ŋuna a kire, nai erae aŋuna iyeniata ka toyenete atemar emam alyokonu alotooma ŋuna a kire.
62002022	Ŋae erae ekalyokonon? Iŋes ŋolo epegit atemar Yesu iŋes erae Kristo. Ŋolo eŋerit Papa ka Lokoku keŋ, iŋes erae emoit ŋolo a Kristo.
62002023	Anerae ŋini eŋerit Lokoku, eŋerit iŋes tari Papa; ŋini ecamuni Lokoku, ecamuni iŋes tari Papa.
62002024	Kimyekisi ŋakiro ŋuna ipotu iyes kiirasi anakisyakinet kiboiyoto alotooma kus. Ani kiboiyoto alotooma kus ŋakiro ŋuna ipotu iyes kiirasi anakisyakinet, iboiyete nai iyes alotooma Lokoku ka alotooma Papa.
62002025	Ibore ŋini ikiinit Lokoku iwon iŋes en: akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
62002026	Ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes nu, ŋuna a ŋulu ikatakinito amodikin iyes.
62002027	Nai aŋuna kus, adau Kristo ainakin iyes Etau keŋ. Ani ca kiboi Etau keŋ alotooma kus, nyiitanito iyes ituŋanan idio ikitatam iyes. Anerae ikitatami iyes Etau keŋ ŋakiro daadaŋ ka ŋuna itatami iŋes erae ŋuna a kire, meere alyokonu. Kiwuapa nai akitatam ŋina ke Etau keŋ ka kiboiyoto kaapei ka Kristo.
62002028	Ŋidwe ŋuluminan, kiboiyoto alotooma Kristo, ikotere ani etakanuni iŋes, oyakatar iwon atitinyu ŋina nyikirumiata iwon ŋileec apaki ŋina etakanunia iŋes.
62002029	Ani kiyenete iyes atemar iyookino Kristo, toyenete daŋ atemar, ŋini daadaŋ itiyae ŋuna iyookino, erae iŋes ikoku ka Akuj.
62003001	Toanyutu iyes epite ŋolo ikiminar iwon Akuj Papa! Amina ŋin, iŋes ikinyaritere iwon ŋidwe ka Akuj, ikirae kire ŋidwe keŋ. Nyikiyeni akwap iwon, anerae nyeyenuna iŋes Akuj.
62003002	Ŋikaakonei ŋuluminan, ikirae tokona iwon ŋidwe ka Akuj, nai nyileere neni ikikokini iwon. Nai ikiyeni iwon atemar ani isileereunio Kristo, ikikokini iwon iŋes; anerae ikiŋolikini iwon iŋes ikwapei eyakar iŋes.
62003003	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini igeno neni keŋ, iteseguna bon ikwapei esegia Kristo.
62003004	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eseci, abil iŋes Ŋikisila ŋulu ka Akuj, anerae erae asecit akibil Ŋikisila.
62003005	Iyenete iyes atemar atakanuni Yesu alemar ŋasecisya ka emam asecit aneni keŋ.
62003006	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini iboi alotooma Kristo, nyesecenene; ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini esecenene, nyeanyuna iŋes Kristo kori nyeyenuna iŋes.
62003007	Ŋidwe kaŋ! Tocoito nyikimodik iyes idiotuŋanan! Ituŋanan ŋini itiyae ŋuna iyookino, iŋes iyookino ikwapei Kristo ŋolo iyookino.
62003008	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini esecenene, iŋes erae ŋini a Satan, anerae aberakin koloŋ sek Satan asecenen ŋinapei anakisyakinet. Atakanuni Lokoku ka Akuj aŋuna ka akinyasun etic a Satan.
62003009	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini erae ikoku ka Akuj, nyesecenene, anerae eyakar iŋes epite ŋolo eyakar Akuj; nyepedori asecenen, anerae erae iŋes ikoku ka Akuj.
62003010	Aŋun, ileereunete ŋidwe ŋulu erae ŋulu ka Akuj ka ŋulu erae ŋulu a Satan; ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini nyitiyae ŋuna iyookino, kori ŋini nyemina lokaato keŋ, nyerae iŋes ikoku ka Akuj.
62003011	Kire, erae nu ŋakiro ŋuna ipotu iyes kiirasi ŋinapei anakisyakinet ebe, itemokino ominin make.
62003012	Nyikikwaanikin ka Kain ŋolo ariit neni a ŋolo Aronon, ŋolo abu toar lokaato keŋ Abel. Kaanukiro aarya iŋes lokaato keŋ? Anerae aroko ŋiticisyo keŋ ka kiyookino ŋulu a lokaato keŋ.
62003013	Ŋikaitotoi, nyiumokis erae kikitidiŋ iyes akwap.
62003014	Ikiyeni iwon atemar ikilunyar iwon anatwanare ka ikiloma nakiyar, anerae ikimina iwon ŋikaitotoi yok. Ŋini nyemina, erubakini eyai natwanare.
62003015	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini itidiŋit lokaato keŋ, erae iŋes ekaaran ka iyenete iyes atemar emam ekaaran ŋolo erubakini eyakar akiyar ŋina nyedaun tooma keŋ.
62003016	Epite lo ikiyenia iwon amina: abu Kristo tojal akiyar keŋ aŋuna yok. Ojala iwon daŋ akiyar yok aŋuna a ŋikaitotoi yok!
62003017	Nai ani keyakar ituŋanan ebari ŋolo ka akwap a na, ido kitee lokaato keŋ iitanit akiŋarakino, ido tojamak iŋes, ikokini nai amina ŋina ka Akuj iboi alotooma keŋ ai?
62003018	Ŋidwe kaŋ! Nyikiminin a ŋakiro a ŋuna ikirworo bon, nai ominin kire a ŋiticisyo.
62003019	Epite lo iŋes ikiyenia iwon atemar ikirae ŋulu a kire ka epite lo etitinyoto ŋitai yok alokiŋaren Akuj:
62003020	apaki ŋina ikiyenia alotai yok atemar ikisecit, epol Akuj nooi akilo ŋitai yok, nabo daŋ eyeni iŋes ŋinibore daadaŋ.
62003021	Ŋuluminan, ani kikiyeni alotai yok atemar nyikisecit, ikiyakar iwon atitinyu alokiŋaren Akuj.
62003022	Ikiryamuni iwon ŋinibore daadaŋ ikiŋisi iŋes, anerae ikiricakinit iwon Ŋakiciketa keŋ ka ikitiyae ŋuna italakarito iŋes.
62003023	Akiciket ŋina ka Akuj iŋes na ebe, itemokino iwon onupa alokiro a Lokoku keŋ, Yesu Kristo ka ominin make, ikwapei ikicikakinitor iŋes iwon.
62003024	Ikes daadaŋ ŋulu iricakinito Ŋakiciketa keŋ, iboiyete alotooma keŋ ka iboi iŋes alotooma kec. Epite lo iŋes ikiyenia iwon atemar iboi iŋes alotooma yok, aŋuna ke Etau a ŋolo ikiinak iŋes iwon.
62004001	Ŋikaakonei ŋuluminan, nyinupito ŋulu daadaŋ ebasi ebe ikiyakar Etau ŋolo ka Akuj, nai torota ikes erae keponito ŋatameta kec aneni ka Akuj, anerae aloto ŋikadwarak ŋulu alalak ŋulu alyokonok nakwap.
62004002	Epite lo iyenuniata iyes Etau ŋolo ka Akuj: ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini elimori atemar abu Yesu Kristo bu erae ituŋanan, erae iŋes ŋini ka Akuj.
62004003	Nai ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini nyelimori Yesu, nyerae iŋes ŋini ka Akuj. Erae ituŋanan ŋin emoit ŋolo a Kristo ŋolo ipotu iyes kiirasi atemar ebunit ka eyai tokona nakwap.
62004004	Ŋidwe kaŋ, irae iyes ŋulu ka Akuj ka ilout iyes ŋikadwarak ŋulu alyokonok, anerae Akuj ŋina eyai tooma kus, egogoŋ akilo ekepukan ŋolo ka akwap.
62004005	Erae ikes ŋulu ka akwap, aŋun, ŋuna irworosi ikes, erae ŋuna ka akwap ka epupi akwap ŋakiro kec.
62004006	Nai ikirae iwon ŋulu ka Akuj. Ŋini eyeni Akuj, epupi ŋakiro yok ka ŋini nyerae ituŋanan ŋini ka Akuj, nyepupi ŋakiro yok. Epite ŋol ikiyenunia iwon Etau ŋolo a kire ka ŋolo ka alyokonu.
62004007	Ŋikaakonei ŋuluminan, ominin make, anerae ebunit amina aneni ka Akuj. Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini emina, erae iŋes ikoku ka Akuj ka eyeni Akuj.
62004008	Ŋini nyemina, nyeyeni ituŋanan ŋin Akuj, anerae erae Akuj amina.
62004009	Epite lo iŋes abunio Akuj ikisileerekinio iwon amina keŋ: Abu kiyaku Lokoku keŋ ŋolo donupei nakwap, ikotere iwon ikiyari aŋuna keŋ.
62004010	Nu ikes erae amina: meere atemar iwon ikipotu ominakisi Akuj, nai Akuj iŋes abu ikiminak iwon, kiyaku Lokoku keŋ, toruwor erot ŋolo isyoniyere ŋasecisya yok.
62004011	Ŋikaakonei ŋuluminan, ikwaŋina abunio Akuj ikiminakinia iwon ikoŋina, itemokino iwon daŋ ominin make.
62004012	Emam ŋini eŋolik Akuj ŋinapei koloŋ. Ani kikiminin iwon make, iboi Akuj alotooma yok, ido itemokin kire amina keŋ neni yok.
62004013	Epite lo iŋes ikiyenunia iwon atemar ikiboi alotooma Akuj ka iboi iŋes alotooma yok, anerae ikiinak iŋes iwon Etau keŋ.
62004014	Ikianyu ka ikiteyenik daŋ atemar eyaku Akuj Papa Lokoku keŋ aruwor Ekaiunan ŋolo ka akwap.
62004015	Ŋini elimori atemar erae Yesu Lokoku ka Akuj, iboi Akuj alotooma keŋ ka iboi iŋes alotooma Akuj.
62004016	Aŋun, ikiyeni iwon ka ikinupit amina ŋina eyakar Akuj aŋuna yok. Erae Akuj amina ka ŋini iboi alotooma amina, iboi iŋes alotooma Akuj ka iboi Akuj alotooma keŋ.
62004017	Epite lo iŋes itemokinere kire amina keŋ neni yok, ikotere oyakatar atitinyu Akoloŋit ŋina ka atubokino, anerae akiyar yok anakwap a na ikoni ŋina a Kristo.
62004018	Emam akuryanu anamina, nai iritari amina ŋina itemokino kire akuryanu. Anerae ŋini ekuryanit, eyeni atemar ebunit akisicanio; aŋun, ŋini ekuryanit, eriŋa amina nyitemokino kire neni keŋ.
62004019	Eyai iwon amina, anerae aris sek Akuj kikiminak iwon.
62004020	Kelimu ituŋanan atemar, “Amina ayoŋ Akuj,” ido toremokino lokaato keŋ, erae iŋes emodiyanot; anerae iŋes ŋini nyemina lokaato keŋ ŋolo etakani, nyepedori aminakin Akuj ŋina nyetakani.
62004021	Erae na akiciket ŋina ikiira iwon aneni keŋ: ŋini emina Akuj, itemokino tomina lokaato keŋ daŋ.
62005001	Ŋini enupi atemar Yesu iŋes erae Kristo, erae iŋes ikoku ka Akuj, ŋini emina ekauruunan, emina ikoku keŋ daŋ.
62005002	Epite lo ikiyenunia atemar ikimina iwon ŋidwe ka Akuj: Apaki ŋina eminare iwon Akuj ka ericakinito Ŋakiciketa keŋ.
62005003	Epite lo iŋes erae amina Akuj: akiricakin Ŋakiciketa keŋ. Nyegogoŋ Ŋakiciketa keŋ,
62005004	anerae ŋini daadaŋ erae ikoku ka Akuj, eyakar apedor ŋina kilounet akwap. Naga iŋes erae apedor ŋina elounan akwap – anupit yok.
62005005	Ŋae epedori akiloun akwap? Erae ŋini bon enupit atemar erae Yesu Lokoku ka Akuj.
62005006	Abu Yesu Kristo bu a ŋakipi a ŋuna ke ebatisimu keŋ ka a ŋaokot a ŋuna ka atwanare keŋ. Nyebuno iŋes a ŋakipi bon, nai abu bu a ŋakipi ka ŋaokot. Nabo daŋ elimorit Etau elope atemar erae nu ŋuna a kire, anerae erae Etau ŋolo a kire.
62005007	Eyakasi ŋisuudae ŋiuni,
62005008	Etau, ŋakipi ka ŋaokot; elimorito ŋisuudae ŋuluuni lu daadaŋ ibore ipei.
62005009	Ikinupit akiteyenunet ŋina a ituŋanan, nai akiteyenunet ŋina ka Akuj iŋes egogoŋ nooi ka ainaki iŋes akiteyenunet ŋin aŋuna a Lokoku keŋ.
62005010	Ŋini enupit Lokoku ka Akuj, eyakar akiteyenunet ŋin tooma keŋ. Ŋini nyenupit Akuj, itusubunit iŋes Akuj ŋina alyokon, anerae nyenupit iŋes ŋuna alimu Akuj aŋuna a Lokoku keŋ.
62005011	Alimoret iŋes na: Ikiinak Akuj iwon akiyar ŋina nyedaun ka ebunit akiyar na aneni a Lokoku keŋ.
62005012	Ŋini eyakar Lokoku, eyakar akiyar na; ŋini nyeyakar Lokoku ka Akuj, nyeyakar akiyar.
62005013	Ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes nu daadaŋ, ikotere toyenuniata kire atemar iyakatar iyes akiyar ŋina nyedaun, iyes ŋulu inupito alokiro a Lokoku ka Akuj.
62005014	Ikiyakar iwon atitinyu alokiŋaren Akuj, anerae ikikinyomit iwon atemar, ani kikiŋit iwon ibore daadaŋ ŋini ejok anacamit keŋ, ikiirari iŋes iwon.
62005015	Ikwaŋina ikiyenia iwon atemar ikiiranari iŋes iwon ŋinapaki ikiŋisya idiobore daadaŋ, ikiyeni daŋ atemar, ikiinakini iwon ibore ŋini ikiŋita aneni keŋ.
62005016	Ani kiŋolik ipei lokaato keŋ eseci asecit ŋina nyikirikori natwanare, itemokino iŋes kilip neni ka Akuj aŋuna a lokaato keŋ, ido inak Akuj iŋes akiyar. Erworo ayoŋ, ikotere ŋulu nyeseca asecit ŋina ikirikori natwanare. Eyai asecit ŋina ikirikori natwanare; nyabala ayoŋ itemokino iyes kilipa ikotere ŋakiro ŋun.
62005017	Ŋaronisya daadaŋ erae asecit, nai eyai asecit ŋina nyikirikori natwanare.
62005018	Ikiyeni iwon atemar ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini erae ikoku ŋini ka Akuj nyesecenene, anerae iyoki Lokoku ka Akuj iŋes, ka nyepedori ŋolo Aronon akiwan iŋes.
62005019	Ikiyeni iwon atemar ikirae iwon ŋulu ka Akuj, tari kipukat ŋolo Aronon akwap daadaŋ.
62005020	Ikiyeni daŋ iwon atemar, adau Lokoku ka Akuj abunore ka ikiinak iwon ayenut, ikotere oyenuniata ŋolo a kire. Ikiyari iwon anakimorikina ka Akuj ŋina erae ŋina a kire ka anakimorikina ka Lokoku keŋ Yesu Kristo. Kristo iŋes Akuj ŋina a kire, iŋes akiyar ŋina nyedaun.
62005021	Ŋidwe kaŋ, tocoikisi ŋakujo ŋuna nyerae ŋuna a kire.
63001001	Abaruwa aneni ke ekatukon, neni a toto a ŋina seuna ka ŋidwe keŋ ŋulu amina ayoŋ kire. Meere ayoŋ bon, ikiminasi iyes daadaŋ ŋulu eyenete ŋuna a kire;
63001002	anerae iboiyete ŋuna a kire alotooma yok ka erubakinete alotooma yok jik.
63001003	Toyai neni yok ajokis, akisyon, ka ekisil aneni ka Akuj a Papa ka aneni a Yesu Kristo Lokoku a Papa; toruworos ikes ŋulu yok alotooma ŋuna a kire ka alotooma amina.
63001004	Abu ayoŋ olelyan nooi aryamuni ŋidwe kon ŋice iwuapito ŋakiro ŋuna a kire, ikwaŋinapei abunio Papa ikicikakinia iwon.
63001005	Ekemaimai tokona ayoŋ iyoŋ toto: ominin make. Meere akiciket na ŋina ekegirakinit ayoŋ iyes ŋina kitete aneni kus; erae akiciket ŋina ikipotu iwon eirasi ŋinapei anakisyakinet.
63001006	Erae na amina: itemokino iwon ewuapa Ŋakiciketa keŋ. Akiciket ŋina ipotu iyes kiirasi ŋinapei anakisyakinet iŋes na: itemokino iyes daadaŋ iboiyete iminin.
63001007	Anerae aloto nakwapin ŋikalyokonok ŋulu alalak, ŋulu eŋerito atemar abu Yesu Kristo bu erae ituŋanan. Ituŋanan ŋini ikoni ŋin, erae ekalyokonon ka erae emoit ŋolo a Kristo.
63001008	Tocoikinito nyitwakiasi eropit ŋolo idaut iyes akitiyaun, ikotere iryamunete eropit kus daadaŋ.
63001009	Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini eoliyori ka nyiwuap akitatam a Kristo, emam Akuj aneni keŋ; ituŋanan ŋini iboi anakitatam a Kristo, eyai Papa ka Lokoku neni keŋ.
63001010	Ani kebu ituŋanan neni kus nyikilimok iyes akitatam ŋin, nyijaut iŋes kai, kori nyimalata iŋes;
63001011	anerae ituŋanan ŋini imalae iŋes, itiyae aronis ikwapei itiyaa ituŋanan ŋin.
63001012	Tari keyakasi ŋuna alalak ŋuna acamit ayoŋ akigir neni kus, nyitemokino egir, nai egeno ayoŋ abunore neni kus erworo ka iyes kaapei, ikotere ilelebikin alelyan yok.
63001013	Ikimalaete iyes ŋidwe ŋulu a nakaato kus a ŋina seuna.
64001001	Abaruwa aneni ke ekatukon, neni a Gaio a ŋolo amina ayoŋ kire.
64001002	Ekaakone ŋolo minat, elipit ayoŋ atemar tomameete ŋace ŋuna aronok aneni kon, ka toŋalee iyoŋ ejok; ayeni ayoŋ atemar iŋale iyoŋ alotau kon.
64001003	Abu ayoŋ olelyan nooi apaki ŋina adolunioto ŋikaitotoi ŋice, ido okolimokis ayoŋ anupit kon ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋuna a kire, ikwapei irubakinitor iyoŋ anakiro a ŋuna a kire.
64001004	Emam alelyan ace ŋina aryamunit ayoŋ akilo akiirar atemar iwuapito ŋidwe kaŋ ŋuna a kire.
64001005	Ekaakone ŋolo minat, irae iyoŋ ŋolo ajokan alotooma ŋuna itiyae iyoŋ neni a ŋikaitotoi, tari kerae ikes ŋigelae.
64001006	Eteyenikis ikes Ŋikristo ŋulu a ne ŋuna ka amina. Okoe! Kiŋarak ikes torubakis itiyaete alorot kec alopite a ŋolo itemokino aneni ka Akuj.
64001007	Anerae ŋuna ke ekiro a Kristo aponiata ikes kimyekis ŋirerya kec, pa acamununuyete akiŋarakino aneni a ŋulu nyenupito.
64001008	Aŋun, itemokino iwon Ŋikristo eŋarakisi ŋikilyok ŋul, ikotere ikitiyae kaapei ka ikes ŋuna a kire.
64001009	Adau ayoŋ akigir ŋakiro ŋadi neni a Ŋikristo; nai Doterepes ŋolo ebobokinit akiŋarenikinit ikes, nyecamuni ŋakiro kaŋ.
64001010	Nai ani kabu ayoŋ, alimuni ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna etiya iŋes, ŋakiro ŋuna aronok nooi ŋuna ikirworor iŋes isua ka alyokonu a ŋina irworo iŋes. Meere ŋun bon itiyae iŋes, nyijaununui iŋes ŋikaitotoi, iretanakini daŋ ŋulu ecamito akijaun ŋikaitotoi ka iritanari ikes aneni a Ŋikristo.
64001011	Ekaakone ŋolo minat, nyiroku ŋuna aronok, nai toroku ŋuna ajokak. Ituŋanan ŋini itiyae ŋuna ajokak, erae ŋini ka Akuj, ituŋanan ŋini itiyae ŋuna aronok, nyeanyuna iŋes Akuj.
64001012	Iteyenunito ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋuna ajokak aŋuna a Demetrio; ŋakiro ŋuna a kire daŋ iteyenunito aŋuna keŋ. Ikiteyenunit isua daŋ aŋuna keŋ, ka eteyenunit ayoŋ atemar erae kire.
64001013	Ikiyakar ayoŋ ŋakiro ŋuna alalak ŋuna acamit akigirakin iyes, nai nyitemokino ayoŋ egir;
64001014	egeno ayoŋ abunore atipei aanyun ka iyes, erworo kaapei ka iyes. Toyai neni kus ekisil. Ikimalaete iyes ŋikonei. Kimalata ŋikonei yok daadaŋ.
65001001	Ayoŋ Yuda ŋolo arae eketiyan a Yesu Kristo ka lokaato a Yakobo, egirit abaruwa na neni a ŋulu adau Akuj anyarare, ka ŋulu emina iŋes ŋolo erae Papa ka iyokitoe aŋuna a Yesu Kristo:
65001002	Tolalaar aneni kus akisyon, ekisil ka amina!
65001003	Ŋikaitotoi ŋulu minan, ikwaŋina acamitor ayoŋ akigir neni kus aŋuna ka aiuno a ŋina ikimori iwon, abu oanyu atemar itemokino egir anakilipit iyes tojioto aŋuna ka anupit a ŋina abu Akuj inak ŋituŋa keŋ apeiinakinet kirikakin.
65001004	Anerae erepunosi kidiŋ kus ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu eŋerito Akuj. Ilocete ikes ajokis ŋina ka Akuj yok aŋuna ka akitiya asiilyanut ka eŋerito Yesu Kristo Ekarikon ka Ekapolon yok ŋolo erae epei bon. Asubakinitae koloŋ sek atubokino aŋuna kec.
65001005	Acamit tokona akitatamun iyes, tari sek daŋ kikiteyenikinitae daadaŋ, atemar abu Ekapolon, kedau aiun ŋituŋa keŋ ŋulu a Isirael anakwap a Ijipit, tomunya ekaku ŋulu pa anupito.
65001006	Ŋimalaikan daŋ ŋulu apotu toŋero apolou kec, apotu toesikis neni eboiyoto ikes, ido eenit Akuj ikes a ŋiriko a ŋulu ruba, anakiryonut a ŋina iryono cuc, akitodol Akoloŋit ŋina apolon ŋina ka atubokino.
65001007	Totamunito daŋ Sodoma ka Gomora ta ŋitaunio ŋulu edunyatar ikes, ŋulu apotu ŋituŋa kitiyaata ikwa ŋimalaikan ŋul anakitiya ŋakiro ŋuna ka amalao ka asupitoi ŋina gelaanot. Isicanitae tokona ikes anakim a ŋina nyeduŋe. Alopite a lo erae ikes akitaanyikinet tocoikiniata daadaŋ.
65001008	Nai itiyaete ŋituŋa ŋul daŋ ikwaŋinapei: anatakanikineta kec emunaanarete ikes ŋawat kec, eŋerito ŋakiro ŋuna a ŋikapolok, iyanyete ŋisubuna ŋulu itopolooritae alokidiama.
65001009	Tari Mikael emalaika ŋolo apolon nyitiya nu, ŋina apeganakinotor iŋes ka Satan ebasi ŋae alokidiŋ kec itemokino ya akuwan a Moses. Abu iŋes nyetitinyik atubokin Satan anakiyany, nai abu tema, “Ekapolon elope ikiyeyakini iyoŋ!”
65001010	Nai iyanyete ŋituŋa ŋul ibore daadaŋ ŋini nyeyenete ikes apolou keŋ, ka ibore daadaŋ ŋini idounitere ikes eyenete lopite ŋolo a ŋityaŋ iŋes pei inyasuni ikes.
65001011	Ekaŋ neni kec! Anerae ewuapakis ikes epite a Kain. Aŋuna a ŋisiliŋa, amaryaarosi ikes nadyakaret ŋina koloŋ a Balaam. Ikwapei Kora, awout ikes eboŋito ka inyasunio ikes.
65001012	Anasuban kus a ŋuna ka aminanar, ikote ikes aŋoryanut, anerae elaerikinito amata nooi kaapei ka iricakinito ŋawat kec make anakimuj. Ikote ikes ŋidouwon ŋulu nyilimete, ŋulu ekutanari ekuwuam, ŋikito ŋulu emam ŋaraito nakamu, ŋulu etwakito kire torutunoe.
65001013	Ikote ikes ŋakipi ŋuna ka anam imorokokoete, kilepunito ekurudo ŋolo a ŋileec kec; ikote ikes ŋikacer ŋulu imasanar ŋulu adau Akuj akitemokin aŋuna kec akiryonut ŋina iryono cuc, ŋina ruba.
65001014	Arae ikotere ikes abunio Enok ŋolo a ŋikanikaarei alokidiŋ ŋipapae ŋulu ka Adam todwarya tema, “Topupokisi! Erukunete Ekapolon ka ŋimalaikan keŋ ŋulu nyimarun,
65001015	atubokin ŋituŋa daadaŋ, atubokin ŋulu nyekerito Akuj aŋuna a ŋaronisya a ŋuna apotu ikes kitiyata, ka atubokinia ikes a ŋakiro a daadaŋ a ŋuna kepotu ikes kirworotor iŋes emam akerit.”
65001016	Erae ŋituŋa lu ŋikeŋuruŋurak, ŋikokopyanotin, iwuapito ekibure ŋolo a ŋawat kec make; iturosi ikes nooi ka isupete ŋituŋa ŋuluce, ikotere eryamuniata ibore ŋini ecamito ikes.
65001017	Ŋikaakonei ŋulu minan, totamunito ŋakiro ŋuna sek aris Ŋikiyakia a Yesu Kristo ke Ekapolon yok kirwor.
65001018	Apotu ikes itolimokis iyes ebe, “Alorwa a ŋulu esidyok, epote ŋikesolok, ŋulu iwuapito ekibure ŋolo a ŋawat kec make.”
65001019	Ŋul ikes ŋulu eyaunito atyakatyaka, ikes ŋulu iricakinito ŋiboro ŋulu ka akwap bon; emamukatar ikes Etau ŋolo ka Akuj.
65001020	Nai iyes ŋikaitotoi ŋulu minan, torubakisi ipoloete ananupit a ŋina asegan akilo; torubakisi ilipeneneete alotooma Etau ŋolo Asegan.
65001021	Kiboiyete alotooma amina ŋina ka Akuj, eriŋa idarito iyes Ekapolon yok Yesu Kristo ainakin iyes akiyar ŋina nyedaun anakisyon keŋ.
65001022	Kigaŋa, kitunupa ŋulu eŋayaŋayato;
65001023	toiutu ŋice anakopun ikes anakim. Eyakasi nabo ŋice ŋulu itemokino torimakinito, nai toyakatar acoit, tolwaka tari alolowi kec a ŋulu itooŋoryanit asecit.
65001024	Epedori Akuj akiyok iyes nyikiguk ananupit ka ikiyau iyes emam asecit ka iyakatar alelyan tooma nakica ŋina ka apolou.
65001025	Neni keŋ, a ŋolo erae Akuj ŋina donupei, Ekaiunan yok alotooma Yesu Kristo Ekapolon yok, toyai akipuro, apolou, agogoŋu ka apedor, tari eriŋa nyesubuna akwap, tokona ka ŋikaru ka ŋikaru! Amen.
66001001	Erae ekitaabo lo ŋolo igiritae ŋakiro ŋuna abu Yesu Kristo kisileereu. Abu Akuj inak iŋes akiseleerekinet na, ikotere iseleerekinio ŋiketiyak keŋ ŋuna itemokino totakanut atipei. Abu Kristo kiyakiya emalaika keŋ neni a Yoana ke eketiyan keŋ akiteyenikin iŋes ŋakiro nu.
66001002	Eteyenu Yoana ŋakiro daadaŋ ŋuna abu iŋes toanyu, ŋuna eponito aneni ka Akuj ka ŋuna eteyenu Kristo.
66001003	Erereŋ ituŋanan ŋini esyomi ŋakiro ŋuna edwaritae ka erereŋ ŋulu epupete nu kiricakis ŋakiro ŋuna igiritae lokitaabo lo! Anerae eapi apaki ŋina etakanuniata ŋakiro nu.
66001004	Ayoŋ Yoana egirit emalas lo neni a ŋatukon a Ŋikristo a ŋunakanikaarei a ŋuna eyakasi Asia: Toyai ajokis ka ekisil neni kus ŋulu eponito aneni ka Akuj a ŋina erae ka arae, ka ŋina ebuni, ka aneni a ŋitai a ŋulukanikaarei, a ŋulu eyakasi kiŋaren ekicoloŋ keŋ,
66001005	ta aneni a Yesu Kristo ŋolo erae esuuda ŋolo ikinyomitae, ŋolo esyaunan ayarun alokatwak, torae daŋ ekepukan ŋolo a ŋirwosi a ŋulu ka akwap. Ikimina iŋes iwon, ka aŋuna ka atwanare keŋ abu itolacak iwon anasecisya yok.
66001006	Ikituruwo iŋes iwon apukan ŋina a ŋisacaradotin a ŋulu itiyaete neni ka Akuj a Papa keŋ. Toyai apolou ka apedor neni a Yesu Kristo ŋikaru ka ŋikaru! Amen.
66001007	Kiirasi, ebunit iŋes alodowuon! Eanyuwarete ŋituŋa daadaŋ tari ŋulu ecumete iŋes. Ikalounete ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu ka akwap aŋuna keŋ. Kire ikokinete neni! Amen!
66001008	Ebala Ekapolon Akuj ŋina etiron, ŋina erae ka ŋina arae ka ŋina ebuni, “Arae ayoŋ Alpa ka Omega” (iŋes atemar Akisyakinet ka Asalunet).
66001009	Ayoŋ Yoana lokaato kus ikimori kaapei ka iyes atitinyikinit ŋican ŋulu eryamunito ŋituŋa ŋulu erae ŋulu ka Apukan a Yesu. Abu oyakaun loculat ŋolo ka anam ŋolo enyaritae Patimos aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna ka Akuj ka aŋuna ka akiteyenunet a ŋina a Yesu.
66001010	Anakoloŋit a ŋina ke Ekapolon, abu apedor ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan min neni kaŋ, abu eira etoil alokaku kaŋ ŋolo ereta ikwa arupepe.
66001011	Tolimu ebe, “Kigir ibore ŋini iŋolikini iyoŋ daadaŋ lokitaabo, ido kiyakiya natukon ŋunakanikaarei ŋuna a Ŋikristo alo Epeso, Simirina, Perigamo, Tyatira, Sardis, Piladelipia ka Laodikeya.”
66001012	Abu oboboŋ akiŋolikin ŋini erworo neni kaŋ, oanyuwa ŋawuoeta a ŋitaae ŋakanikaarei ŋuna etiyaunitae a egolid.
66001013	Alokidiŋ ŋawuoeta ŋun ayai ŋini ekoni ituŋanan, ŋini anapit elou ŋolo aoyan, ŋolo adolit kwap ŋakejen keŋ ka tonapite alokore keŋ arokoba ŋina etiyaunitae a egolid.
66001014	Akwaŋ akou ka ŋitim keŋ ikwa ŋajul ŋuna ka amesek a ŋina akwaŋan kya kori ikwa ŋakako; ekote ŋakeekonyen arira ŋina ka akim.
66001015	Acayete ŋakejen keŋ ikwa asuwat ŋina epwasitae ka erurumae etoil keŋ ikwa ŋakipi ŋuna ipumasi.
66001016	Anakan keŋ a ŋina aloteten, adakit ŋikacer ŋikanikaarei; anakituk keŋ, tolomu atum ŋina akwaka ŋiwaetin daadaŋ. Acai ereet keŋ ikwaŋina ecaya akoloŋ kidiŋ apaaran.
66001017	Ŋinapei eŋolikinia ayoŋ iŋes, abu oramakin nakejen keŋ ekok ituŋanan ŋini atwan. Abu nai iŋes kiwuak akan keŋ ŋina aloteten neni kaŋ tema, “Nyikuryaniar! Arae ayoŋ ŋolo Eŋarenon ka ŋolo Esidyon.
66001018	Arae ayoŋ ŋolo ayari; abu ayoŋ otwana, nai tokona ayari ŋikaru ka ŋikaru! Ayoŋ epukat atwanare ka akwap ŋina a ŋikatwak.
66001019	Aŋun, kigir tokona ŋuna daadaŋ iŋolik iyoŋ, ameun ŋuna itiyakin tokona ka ŋuna itiyakin tari rwanu.
66001020	Apolou ŋina a ŋikacer a ŋulu ŋikanikaarei a ŋulu ite iyoŋ, anakan kaŋ a ŋina aloteten ka ŋina a ŋawuoeta a ŋitaae a ŋuna itiyaunitae a egolid iŋes na: erae ŋikacer ŋulukanikaarei ŋimalaikan ŋulu a ŋatukon a Ŋikristo a ŋunakanikarei ka erae ŋawuoeta ŋunakanikaarei ŋatukon ŋunakanikaarei.”
66002001	“Kigir neni ke emalaika a ŋolo ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Epeso atemar: “Erae ŋakiro nu ŋuna eponito aneni a ŋolo edakit ŋikacer ŋikanikaarei anakan keŋ a ŋina aloteten, ka ŋolo elosi alokidiŋ ŋawuoeta a ŋitaae ŋunakanikaarei ŋuna itiyaunitae a egolid.
66002002	Ayeni ayoŋ ŋuna idau iyoŋ akitiya, ayeni ayoŋ epite ŋolo imukekinitor iyoŋ etic ka epite ŋolo ititinyikinitor iyoŋ. Ayeni ayoŋ atemar nyipedori iyoŋ acamakin ŋikaronok, idau iyoŋ akirot ŋulu ebasi ikirae ikes ŋikiyakia, nai nyerae ka iryamu ikes erae ŋikalyokonok.
66002003	Ititiny iyoŋ, iryamu iyoŋ ŋican aŋuna kaŋ ka nyeupa iyoŋ.
66002004	Nai eketoroniyarit ayoŋ iyoŋ a ŋakiro a nu: iesik iyoŋ akonimina ŋina paaran sek ikiminar iyoŋ ayoŋ.
66002005	Totamatama neni etya aronis ŋina ka akibusokin kon! Toki, kisyak akitiya ŋiticisyo ŋulu sek itiyae iyoŋ ekiŋaren. Ani pa kikii iyoŋ, abuni ayoŋ neni kon alemar awuoet kon ŋina ke etaa aneni sek eyai.
66002006	Nai erae nu ŋuna ikitojokito iyoŋ: iŋerit iyoŋ ŋiticisyo a ŋituŋa a ŋulu enyaritae Ŋinikolaitae – ŋiticisyo ŋulu aŋerit ayoŋ daŋ.
66002007	“Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki, kiira ŋuna irworo Etau natukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo! “Iŋes ŋini ilouni, ainakini apedor ŋinakimujet arait ŋina ke ekitoe a ŋolo ka akiyar, a ŋolo eyai lomanikor ŋolo ka Akuj.”
66002008	“Kigir neni ke emalaika a ŋolo ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Simirina atemar: “Erae ŋakiro nu ŋuna eponito aneni a ŋolo erae ŋolo Eŋarenon ka ŋolo Esidyon, ŋolo abu totwan ka toyaru nabo.
66002009	Ayeni ayoŋ ŋatyokisyo kon ka ayeni ayoŋ atemar ikulyakana iyoŋ, nai kire ibarit! Ayeni ayoŋ tari ŋuna aronok ŋuna ikirworotor iyoŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu ebasi ebe ikirae ikes Ŋiyudayan, nai nyerae; eraakasi ikes atukot ŋina a Satan!
66002010	Nyikuryaniar aŋuna a ŋican a ŋulu eapi iyoŋ aryamun. Topupok! Eapi Satan acunakin ŋice alokidiŋ kus mabus, ikikatak iyes, ido toryamut akisicanio ŋirwa ŋitomon. Torubak ananupit, erae kedolu atwanare daŋ, ido akainakini ayoŋ iyoŋ akiyar, toruwor eropit.
66002011	“Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki, kiira ŋuna irworo Etau natukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo! “Iŋes ŋini ilouni, nyeari atwanare ŋina a ŋaarei iŋes.
66002012	“Kigir neni ke emalaika a ŋolo ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Perigamo atemar: “Erae ŋakiro nu ŋuna eponito aneni a ŋolo eyakar atum ŋina ekwaka ŋiwaetin daadaŋ.
66002013	Ayeni ayoŋ neni iboiyo iyoŋ; erae neni ipukat Satan. Nai irubakinit iyoŋ ikinupit ayoŋ, ibu iyoŋ nyiŋer anupit ayoŋ tari alorwa a ŋulu aarere Antipa, esuuda kaŋ ŋolo anupit nooi aina, anakwap a ŋina iboiyo Satan.
66002014	Nai eketoroniyarit ayoŋ iyoŋ a ŋakiro a ŋadi a nu: “Eyakasi kidiŋ kus ŋituŋa ŋice ŋulu etupito akitatam ŋina ke ekile a ŋolo enyaritae Balaam, a ŋolo koloŋ abu kitatam ekile ŋolo enyaritae Balak akicocoiyar Ŋisirael nasecit anakitanyam ŋamuja ŋuna ainakinitae ŋakujo ka akitiya amalao.
66002015	Ikwaŋinapei, eyakasi kidiŋ kus ŋituŋa ŋulu etupito akitatam ŋina a ŋituŋa a ŋulu enyaritae Ŋinikolaitae.
66002016	Toki nai tokona! Ani pa kikii, abuni ayoŋ neni kon atipei akitijiyore iyoŋ ka atum a ŋina elomuni anakituk kaŋ.
66002017	“Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki, kiira ŋuna irworo Etau natukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo! “Iŋes ŋini ilouni, ainakini Manna adio ŋina iwuaitae. Ainakini nabo ayoŋ iŋes amoru ŋina akwaŋan ŋina igiritae ekiro ŋolokitete, ŋolo emam ituŋanan eyeni, mati ŋini einakinio amoru ŋin.
66002018	“Kigir neni ke emalaika a ŋolo ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Tyatira atemar: “Erae ŋakiro nu ŋuna a Lokoku ka Akuj, a ŋolo ikote ŋakonyen arira ŋina ka akim ka ŋolo ecayete ŋakejen keŋ ikwa asuwat ŋina epwasitae.
66002019	Ayeni ayoŋ ŋiticisyo kon, amina kon, anupit kon, akijaanakin kon, atitinyu ŋina nyibunyakina ka ayeni atemar iloito ŋiticisyo kon ŋulu a tokona ŋulu paaran ke ekiŋaren.
66002020	Nai eketoroniyarit ayoŋ iyoŋ a ŋakiro a nu: “Icamakinit iyoŋ aberu ŋina enyaritae Yesabel, ŋina ebala ebe arae iŋes akadwaran. Anakitatam keŋ, ecocoiya ŋiketiyak kaŋ, aya akitiya amalao ka akinyam ŋamuja ŋuna einakinitae ŋakujo ŋace.
66002021	Abu ayoŋ oinak iŋes apaki ŋina kiet, nai ewounit iŋes akiki amalao.
66002022	Aŋun, emasakini ayoŋ iŋes ka ŋulu elomete ka iŋes, lokitaada neni eryamuniata ŋican ŋulu apipilak. Etiyakini ayoŋ ŋun tokona, mati kekiwa ikes ŋuna aronok ŋuna etiyaete ikes ka iŋes.
66002023	Aari ayoŋ ŋikeedwe, ikotere toanyuniata ŋatukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo daadaŋ atemar ayoŋ iŋes ŋolo ayeni ŋitai ka ŋatameta ŋuna a ŋinituŋanan ka aropi ayoŋ ŋinituŋanan ikwaŋina itiyator.
66002024	Nai iyes ŋice alo Tyatira, nyetupa iyes akitatam ŋina aronon ŋin, nyeyenuna iyes ŋuna ebasi ŋice erae akimunono ŋina apolon ŋina a Satan. Abala ayoŋ neni kus: nyakainakini ayoŋ iyes etic ece;
66002025	nai torubakisi iricito anupit ŋina iyakatar iyes, akitodol ŋina abunio ayoŋ.
66002026	“Iŋes ŋini ilouni ka kiricak ŋakiro kaŋ akitodol nasalunet, ainakini ayoŋ iŋes apedor ŋinakipukaet ŋakwapin.
66002027	Ipukae iŋes ikes ka aryenyeo, kinyas ikes ikwa ŋamoti ŋuna ebwaŋabwaŋaaryo, ikwapei akainitor ayoŋ Papa kaŋ apedor.
66002028	Ainakini daŋ ayoŋ iŋes etop ŋolo ka ataparacu.
66002029	“Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki, kiira ŋuna irworo Etau natukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo.
66003001	“Kigir neni ke emalaika a ŋolo ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Sardis atemar: “Erae ŋakiro nu ŋuna eponito aneni a ŋolo eyakar ŋitai ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulukanikaarei ka ŋikacer ŋulukanikaarei. Ayeni ayoŋ ŋiticisyo kon; itakani iyoŋ iyari, nai itwanit.
66003002	Aŋun, tokienyu, kitogogoŋ ŋuna idoŋito eriŋa ikes nyetwaka.
66003003	Totamu nai ŋuna aponi ikitatami ka ikisiirar iyoŋ, kiricak ikes ka toki! Ani pa kikienyu iyoŋ, abuni ayoŋ neni kon ikwa ekokolan ka nyiyeni iyoŋ apaki ŋina abunio ayoŋ.
66003004	Nai eriŋa iyoŋ iyakar ŋituŋa ŋidi Sardis ŋulu nyitooŋoryana ŋilowi kec ka asecit. Epote ikes akiruk ka ayoŋ enapito ŋilowi ŋulu akwaŋak, anerae itemokino ikes ikokinete nen.
66003005	“Iŋes ŋini ilouni, itanapyo ŋilowi ŋulu akwaŋak ikwa ikes, ka nyekisari ayoŋ ekeekiro alokitaabo a ŋolo ka akiyar; nai alimori ayoŋ ekiro keŋ alokiŋaren Papa kaŋ ka ŋimalaikan keŋ.
66003006	“Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki, kiira ŋuna irworo Etau natukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo.
66003007	“Kigir neni ke emalaika a ŋolo ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Piladelipia atemar: “Erae nu ŋakiro ŋuna eponito aneni a ŋolo Asegan ka ŋolo erae kire, ŋolo eyakar ekipuŋguwo ŋolo ka apedor ŋina a Daudi; ekek ŋolo eŋaari iŋes, emam ŋini epedori agolokin ka ekek ŋolo egolokini iŋes, emam ŋini epedori aŋaar.
66003008	Ayeni ayoŋ ŋiticisyo kon. Kiira! Ewuak ayoŋ kiŋaren kon ekek ŋolo eŋaara ŋolo emam ŋini epedori agolokin. Ayeni ayoŋ atemar iyakar iyoŋ agogoŋu ŋinadio edit, nai iricit iyoŋ akirot ka nyieŋero iyoŋ anupit ayoŋ.
66003009	Kiira! Ayauni ayoŋ neni kon atukot ŋina a Satan, ŋikalyokonok ŋulu ebasi ikirae Ŋiyudayan, nai nyerae. Ayauni ikes eteryedik alokiŋaren kon, ikotere eyenunete atemar akamina ayoŋ iyoŋ.
66003010	Aŋuna iricakinia iyoŋ akirot kaŋ ŋina ikicikak iyoŋ atitinyu ŋina nyikirikira, ekeuryari ayoŋ iyoŋ apaki ŋina ka akikatakino ŋina ebunit nakwapin daadaŋ akikatakin ŋulu iboiyete anakwap.
66003011	Abunit ayoŋ atipei. Torubak iricit anupit ŋina iyakar iyoŋ, ikotere nyikidema iyoŋ icetuŋanan eropit ŋolo ka akiloun.
66003012	“Iŋes ŋini ilouni, eturuwori ayoŋ iŋes epir alo Kai ka Akuj kaŋ; nyelomuni nabo iŋes kiŋa jik. Egirakini ayoŋ neni keŋ ekiro ŋolo ka Akuj kaŋ ka ekiro ŋolo ke etaun a ŋolo apolon, Yerusalem ŋolokitete, ŋolo ebunit anakuj aneni ka Akuj kaŋ; egirakini daŋ ekiro kaŋ ŋolokitete neni keŋ.
66003013	“Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki, kiira ŋuna irworo Etau natukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo.
66003014	“Kigir neni ke emalaika a ŋolo ka atukot a Ŋikristo alo Laodikeya atemar: “Erae ŋakiro nu ŋuna eponito aneni a ŋolo enyaritae Amen, esuuda ŋolo ikinyomitae ka ŋolo a kire ŋolo erae akisyakinet ŋina a ŋisubuna ka Akuj.
66003015	Ayeni ayoŋ ŋiticisyo kon: nyililim iyoŋ ka nyimwana daŋ. Okoe, kitemokino iyoŋ tolilim kori tomwana!
66003016	Nai aŋuna ijalamya, nyililimyo kori nyimwania, akalekuni ayoŋ iyoŋ anakituk kaŋ.
66003017	Anerae ibala iyoŋ, ‘Abarit, ayakar ibore daadaŋ ka emam ibore eitanit.’ Nai nyiyeni iyoŋ atemar icana, irae ekaŋipapan, ekulyakit, emudukanot ka ileri.
66003018	Aŋun, akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ, togyelu egolid aneni kaŋ, egolid ŋolo eliitae ka akim, ikotere tobar. Togyelu daŋ ŋilowi ŋulu akwaŋak, ikotere torapya ŋileec kon ŋulu ileryo. Togyelu tari ekitoe ŋolo a ŋakonyen kon, ikotere tokienyu.
66003019	Eyayakini ka esicani ŋulu amina ayoŋ; aŋun, tomwakutu tokiwa!
66003020	Kiira! Awuoi ayoŋ alokek, ekoŋikoŋi. Ani kiira ituŋanan etoil kaŋ, ido toŋaa ekek, alomuni ayoŋ neni keŋ, emuja ka iŋes ka ikimuji iŋes ka ayoŋ.
66003021	Iŋes ŋini ilouni, ainakini apedor, akiboikin ka ayoŋ lokicoloŋ kaŋ, ikwapei abunio ayoŋ daŋ elounia eboikinotor ka Papa kaŋ lokicoloŋ keŋ.
66003022	“Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki, kiira ŋuna irworo Etau natukon ŋuna a Ŋikristo.”
66004001	Ani kelunyar ŋun, abu oanyuwa ekek eŋaara anakuj! Abu nabo eira etoil ŋolo sek aris ayoŋ keira irworo neni kaŋ ikwa arupepe ebala, “Bua laalo eketoodik ŋuna itemokino totakanut ekaku a nu.”
66004002	Ŋinapeipaki abu apedor ŋina ke Etau a ŋolo Asegan min neni kaŋ. Ayai nakuj ekicoloŋ ŋolo eboiyo ituŋanan ice.
66004003	Amilimili ituŋanan ŋini eboi a nen, ekwaan ka amilimil a ŋamoru a ŋuna enyaritae Yaspa ka Karanelia. Erikaunit ekicoloŋ alokakinet ŋina ekwaan ka amoru ŋina aliban nooi ŋina enyaritae Emeral.
66004004	Erikaunito ekicoloŋ ŋol ŋikicoloŋo ŋulu arae ekimar kec ŋatomoniarei ka ŋiomwon, kicoloŋito ŋikatukok ŋatomoniarei ka ŋiomwon, ŋulu anapito ŋikaasoi ŋulu akwaŋak, tonapito daŋ ŋibokoi ŋulu etiyaunitae a egolid.
66004005	Bu alokicoloŋ akimilyaunet, eruye ka akirurum ŋina ka agirokin. Alokiŋaren ekicoloŋ, ayakasi ŋagilae ŋakanikaarei ŋuna anepete, ŋuna erae ŋitai ŋulukanikaarei ŋulu ka Akuj.
66004006	Ayai nabo kiŋaren ekicoloŋ ŋol ibore ŋini ekoni anam ŋina a ŋakalilii, ŋini alilii ikwa aroet. Nawaetin ke ekicoloŋ, ayakasi ŋisubuna ŋiomwon ŋulu ayarete, ŋulu eryamito ŋakonyen kiŋaren ka kaku daŋ.
66004007	Ekwaan esubuna ŋolo ke ekiŋaren ŋolo ayari ka eŋatuny, ŋolo a ŋiarei ekwaan ka emoŋ, ŋolo a ŋiuni ayakar ereet ŋolo ekoni ŋolo a ituŋanan ka ŋolo a ŋiomwon ekwaan ka egole ŋolo epori alokidiama.
66004008	Ayakar ŋolosubuna ŋabebenuk ŋakanikapei ŋuna eryamito ŋakonyen kiŋa ka tooma. Apaaran ka akuwar nyieŋununuyete ikes aeo ebasi, “Eseg, eseg, eseg Ekapolon Akuj ŋina etiron, ŋina arae ka erae ka ŋina ebuni.”
66004009	Apaki daadaŋ ŋina ipurioto, ŋina itopolooryata ka ŋina italakaryata ŋisubuna ŋul ŋini iboi alokicoloŋ ka ŋini eyari ŋikaru ka ŋikaru,
66004010	eramakinosi ŋikatukok ŋulutomoniarei ka ŋiomwon kwap kiŋaren iŋes ŋini iboi alokicoloŋ ka kilipa neni a ŋolo eyari ŋikaru ka ŋikaru. Imasakinete ikes ŋibokoi kec kiŋaren ekicoloŋ eosi ebasi,
66004011	“Ekapolon ka Akuj kosi! Emaikina iyoŋ toryamu apolou, akerit, ka apedor, anerae ibu iyoŋ tosub ŋiboro daadaŋ, ka aŋuna ka acamit kon ibu tosub ikes inak akiyar.”
66005001	Abu ayoŋ eŋolik ekitaabo anakan a ŋina aloteten a ŋolo eboi alokicoloŋ; egiritae ekitaabo ŋol ŋiwaetin daadaŋ ka epucitae a ŋakipuceta a ŋakanikaarei.
66005002	Abu nabo eŋolik emalaika ŋolo agogoŋon ŋolo eserae a etoil a ŋolo apolon ebala, “Ŋae emaikina tolema ŋakipuceta toŋaa ekitaabo?”
66005003	Nai amam anakuj kori anakwap ka anakwap a ŋikatwak ŋini amaikina aŋaar ekitaabo ŋol tosyom.
66005004	Abu ayoŋ egwor nooi, anerae amam ituŋanan ŋini amaikina aŋaar ekitaabo ŋol tosyom.
66005005	Abu epei alokatukok okolimok ayoŋ tema, “Nyigwor, toanyuwa, elou eŋatuny ŋolo anateker a Yuda ŋolo erae eletonit a Daudi. Elou iŋes ka apedor alemar ŋakipuceta ŋunakanikaarei, toŋaa ekitaabo.”
66005006	Abu ayoŋ eŋolik Imesek ewuoi alokidiŋ ekicoloŋ irikaunito ŋisubuna ŋuluomwon ka ŋikatukok. Atakani Imesek esibit earitae. Ayakar iŋes ŋamomwar ŋakanikaarei ka ŋakonyen ŋakanikaarei, ŋulu erae ŋitai ŋulukanikaarei ŋulu ka Akuj ŋulu iyakiyaritae nakwap daadaŋ.
66005007	Abu Imesek tolot, tolemu ekitaabo anakan a ŋina aloteten a ŋolo eboi alokicoloŋ.
66005008	Ani kedau iŋes alemar ekitaabo, apotu ŋisubuna ŋuluomwon ka ŋikatukok ŋulutomoniarei ka ŋiomwon toramakinos kwap kiŋaren Imesek. Ayakar ŋolosubuna ka ŋolokatukon aduŋgu ka abakule ŋina etiyaunitae a egolid, kileleba eminae ŋolo ke ekinyate ŋolo erae ŋakilipasinei ŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj.
66005009	Apotu ikes toeikis eete ŋolokitete temasi, “Emaikina iyoŋ alemun ekitaabo toŋaa ŋakipuceta keŋ. Anerae ikiaritae sek iyoŋ ka ibu togyelu ŋituŋa a ŋaokot kon iyau neni ka Akuj, ŋituŋa a ŋikabilae, a ŋaŋajepa, a ŋakwapin ka a ŋibukui a daadaŋ.
66005010	Ituruwo iyoŋ ikes apukan a ŋisacaradotin ŋulu ka Akuj yok, ipukaete ikes akwap.”
66005011	Nabo abu ayoŋ eŋoliya, eira ŋitoilon a ŋimalaikan a ŋulu adolito ŋalipyo ka ŋamilyonin! Awuasi ikes irikaunito ekicoloŋ kaapei ka ŋisubuna ŋuluomwon ta ŋikatukok,
66005012	abasi a etoil a ŋolo apolon: “Emaikina Imesek ŋini aaritae eryamuni apedor, ebari, aosou, agogoŋu, akerit, apolou ka akipuro!”
66005013	Abu eira ŋolosubuna anakuj, anakwap ka anakwap a ŋikatwak ka ananam ta ŋinibore daadaŋ eyai tooma kec ebasi, “Toyai akipuro, akerit, apolou ka agogoŋu neni a ŋolo iboi alokicoloŋ ka neni a Imesek, ŋikaru ka ŋikaru!”
66005014	Apotu ŋisubuna ŋulu eyarete ŋuluomwon toboŋokis temasi, “Amen!” Ido toramakinos ŋikatukok kwap, kilipa.
66006001	Abu eŋolik Imesek eŋaari akipucet ŋina esyaunan a ŋunakanikaarei. Abu eira epei alosubuna a ŋuluomwon elimuni a etoil a ŋolo acela ikwa agirokinet ebala, “Bua!”
66006002	Abu eŋoliya oanyuwa aŋole ŋina akwaŋan. Ayakar ekameton keŋ akau ŋina a ŋikaleŋeleŋe ka aponi inakinae iŋes ebokot. Abu nai iŋes torotok iloununui ka ikotere ilounia.
66006003	Ani eŋaari Imesek akipucet ŋina a ŋaarei, eira esubuna ŋolo eyari ŋolo a ŋiarei ebala, “Bua!”
66006004	Tolomu aŋole ace ŋina areŋan. Aponi inakinae ekameton keŋ apedor ŋina lemaret ekisil anakwap, ikotere toaras ŋituŋa make. Aponi inakinae iŋes atum ŋina apolon.
66006005	Ani eŋaari Imesek akipucet ŋina a ŋauni, eira esubuna ŋolo eyari ŋolo a ŋiuni ebala, “Bua!” Abu eŋoliya oanyuwa aŋole ŋinakiryonon, ayakar ekameton keŋ ŋaratilio nakan keŋ.
66006006	Abu eira ibore ŋini erworo ikwa etoil ŋolo ebunit alosubuna a ŋuluomwon ebala, “Einakinio apeikilo ŋina a ŋaganoi ka ŋakiloi ŋauni ŋuna ke ekidikidi aŋuna ke etic a ŋolo ka apeikoloŋit. Nai nyinyas ŋikito ŋulu ka akimyet ka ŋimanikorin ŋulu ke epiini!”
66006007	Ani eŋaari Imesek akipucet ŋina a ŋaomwon, eira esubuna ŋolo eyari ŋolo a ŋiomwon ebala, “Bua!”
66006008	Ani eŋoliyari, oanyuwa aŋole ŋina nyaŋaliban; anyaritae ekiro ke ekameton aŋole ŋin Atwanare, totupite akwap ŋina a ŋikatwak iŋes. Aponi inakinae ikes apedor ŋinakipukaet atutubet ŋina a ŋaomwon ŋina ka akwap, akiar alotooma ejiye ka eron ka edeke ka ŋityaŋ ŋulu adedeŋak.
66006009	Ani eŋaari Imesek akipucet ŋina a ŋakan, abu eŋolik alokwap Namuroet ŋitai a ŋituŋa a ŋulu kearyo aŋuna ka alimonokin ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ka aŋuna ka araakau ŋisuudae keŋ ŋulu ikinyoma.
66006010	Apotu ŋitai ŋul kiworout a etoil a ŋolo apolon temasi, “Ekapolon ŋolo etiron, ŋolo Asegan ka ŋolo a kire! Apaki mono ŋina etya ai iyai iyoŋ eriŋa nyebuno atubokin ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap, ido kisican ikes aŋuna ikiaryata isua?”
66006011	Aponi inakinae ikes ŋikaasoi ŋulu akwaŋak ka tolimokinae ikes akieŋun adiopaki akitodol ŋina itemokinor ekimar a ŋirukitos kec alotic ka Akuj ka ŋikaitotoi daadaŋ ŋulu earyo, ikwaŋina aarere ikes.
66006012	Ani eŋaari Imesek akipucet ŋina a ŋakanikapei, abu oanyuwa akwap emarani nooi ka kiryoniar akoloŋ cuc ikwa ŋatotol, toreŋiar elap puu ikwa ŋaokot.
66006013	Tocakunos ŋikacer kwap anadis ikwa ŋaboboryo ŋuna nyekokito ŋuna erarauni ekuwuam ŋolo agogoŋon.
66006014	Toŋopya adis kikok akaratas ŋina ebilakinio ka aponi kisiyotoroe ŋimoru ka ŋiculata ŋulu ka anam aneni sek eyakasi.
66006015	Apotu ŋirwosi ŋulu ka akwap, ŋikepukak ka ŋikapolokinitok ŋasigarya, ŋikabarak, ŋikagogoŋok ka ŋituŋa ŋuluce daadaŋ, ŋipi, ka ŋulu nyerae ŋipi, toduka anaturukanin ka anatabab alokidiama ŋimoru.
66006016	Temasi ikes neni a ŋimoru ka ŋatabab, “Tocakunos kare ca neni kosi ikiwua anakonyen a ŋolo iboi alokicoloŋ ka ananyunyura a ŋina a Imesek!
66006017	Anerae adolu Akoloŋit ŋina ka anyunyura kec, ŋae epedori akidaŋidaŋ?”
66007001	Kelunyar ŋun, abu oanyuwa ŋimalaikan ŋuluomwon ewuasi alowaetin a ŋuluomwon ka akwap, iretakinito ŋikuwuamin ŋuluomwon ŋulu ka akwap, ikotere nyekutakis akwap kori anam kori ediokitoe.
66007002	Oanyuwa nabo emalaika ece ebunit alo Kide eyakar emacar ŋolo ka Akuj a ŋina eyari. Tonyara iŋes a etoil a ŋolo apolon ŋimalaikan ŋuluomwon ŋulu ainakinitae apedor akiwan akwap ka anam.
66007003	Tolimok iŋes ikes tema, “Nyiwan akwap kori anam kori ŋikito akitodol ŋina ikiwuakinia ŋimacarin loreetin a ŋulu erae ŋiketiyak ŋulu ka Akuj yok.”
66007004	Abu eira ayoŋ ekimar a ŋituŋa a Isirael ŋulu eyakatar emacar ŋolo ka Akuj loreetin kec; arae ikes ŋalipyo amiat ka ŋatomoniomwon ka ŋiomwon. Arae ikes ŋulu a ŋikabilae a ŋulutomon ka ŋiarei a ŋulu a Isirael:
66007005	ŋulu amacaritae anateker a Yuda, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei; ŋulu anateker a Ruben, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei; ŋulu anateker a Gad, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei;
66007006	ŋulu anateker ka Aser, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei; ŋulu anateker a Naputali, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei; ŋulu anateker a Manase, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei;
66007007	ŋulu anateker a Simeon, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei; ŋulu anateker a Lepi, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei; ŋulu anateker a Isakar, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei;
66007008	ŋulu anateker a Sebulon, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei; ŋulu anateker a Yosepu, arae ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei; ŋulu anateker a Benjamin, arae ŋulu daŋ ŋalipyo ŋatomon ka ŋaarei.
66007009	Ani kelunyar ŋun, abu oanyuwa asepic a ŋituŋa a ŋulu pa apedori idiotuŋanan akimarun. Arae ikes ŋulu a ŋibukui, a ŋikabilae, a ŋakwapin ka a ŋaŋajepa a daadaŋ. Apotu ikes towua alokiŋaren ekicoloŋ ŋolo a Imesek; tonapito ŋilowi ŋulu akwaŋak ka toyakatar ŋaten ŋuna a ŋaŋolya nakan kec.
66007010	Tocelas a ŋitoilon a ŋulu apolok ebasi, “Ebunit aiuno aneni ka Akuj yok a ŋina iboi alokicoloŋ ka aneni a Imesek!”
66007011	Towua nai ŋimalaikan daadaŋ irimokinito ekicoloŋ, ŋikatukok ka ŋisubuna ŋulu eyarete ŋuluomwon, toramakinos kiŋaren ekicoloŋ, kijuuroto kilipa neni ka Akuj
66007012	ebasi, “Amen! Akipuro, apolou, aosou, akitalakanar, akerit, apedor ka agogoŋu toyakas neni ka Akuj ŋikaru ka ŋikaru! Amen!”
66007013	Abu ekatukon epei ekeŋit ayoŋ tema, “Ataŋae ŋituŋa lu ŋulu enapito ŋikaasoi ŋulu akwaŋak ka ai eponitotor ikes?”
66007014	Abu ayoŋ oboŋok iŋes otema, “Ekapolon, iyoŋ iyeni.” Okolimok iŋes ayoŋ tema, “Erae ŋituŋa lu ŋulu adaut akitorun nakisicanio ŋina aronon nooi, elotasi ikes ŋikaasoi kec ka etokwaŋut kya a ŋaokot a ŋuna a Imesek.
66007015	Erae ŋakiro ŋun ewuatar ikes alokiŋaren ekicoloŋ ŋolo ka Akuj ka kitiyaete Kai keŋ apaaran ka akuwar. Iŋes ŋolo iboi alokicoloŋ iuryari ikes aŋuna ka ayakau keŋ.
66007016	Emam nabo jik nyenyami ikes akoro kori akure; nyenomi ikes akoloŋ kori acemwanis.
66007017	Anerae eruwor Imesek ŋini alokidiŋ ekicoloŋ ekeyokon kec. Itenari ikes lolelyan ŋulu a ŋakipi a ŋuna ka akiyar ka emyetari Akuj ŋakiyo anakonyen kec.”
66008001	Ani eŋaari Imesek akipucet ŋina a ŋakanikaarei, kililiŋ nakuj cek ŋadakikae ŋuna aapiyarito ŋatomoniuni.
66008002	Abu nai oanyuwa ŋimalaikan ŋulukanikaarei ŋulu ewuasi alokiŋaren Akuj, aponi inakinae ikes ŋarupepe ŋakanikaarei.
66008003	Abu emalaika ece ŋolo ayakar abakule ŋina etiyaunitae a egolid, ŋina ecunyeneneere eminae ŋolo ke ekinyate, bu towo alokiŋaren Namuroet. Aponi inakinae iŋes eminae ŋolo ke ekinyate ŋolo alalan, kimorikin ka ŋakilipasinei ŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj a daadaŋ, ya Namuroet ŋin ŋina etiyaunitae a egolid ŋina ayai kiŋaren ekicoloŋ.
66008004	Tolot apuru ŋina ke ekinyate ka ŋakilipasinei ŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj kidiama anakan a ŋina ke emalaika a ŋolo awuoi alokiŋaren Akuj.
66008005	Abu emalaika tolemu abakule, kilelebik akim ŋina Namuroet, kimasu nakwap. Totakanu agiro ŋina ereta, ŋitoilon, akimilyaa ka amaran ŋina ka akwap.
66008006	Totena ŋimalaikan ŋulukanikaarei ŋulu ayakatar ŋarupepe ŋunakanikaarei akutakin ŋarupepe kec.
66008007	Abu emalaika ŋolo esyaunan tokutak arupepe keŋ. Potu ŋakako ka akim inyaluna ka ŋaokot tobukunos nakwap. Tonomiya atutubet apei alotooma ŋunauni ŋuna ka akwap, tonomiya nabo ŋikito daŋ apeitutubet alotooma ŋunauni, ka abu tonomiya ŋinya ŋulu alibak daadaŋ.
66008008	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋiarei tokutak arupepe keŋ. Aponi ibore ŋini ekoni emoru ŋolo apolon nooi, ŋolo anoki akim, kimasakinae nanam. Abu atutubet apei ŋina ka anam alotooma ŋunauni toruwor ŋaokot bon,
66008009	totwana apeitutubet ŋina a ŋisubuna a ŋulu eyarete, a ŋulu eya nanam, alotooma ŋatutubeta ŋunauni ka aponi kinyasunae apeitutubet a ŋameeli alotooma ŋatutubeta ŋunauni.
66008010	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋiuni tokutak arupepe keŋ. Tocakun etop ŋolo apolon nooi enoki ikwa agilae, tocakakin natutubet apei ŋina a ŋaŋololin alotooma ŋunauni ka lolelyan.
66008011	(Anyaritae etop ŋol “Adwaris”.) Abu atutubet apei ŋina a ŋakipi alotooma ŋunauni todwaryar, totwaka ŋituŋa ŋulu alalak aŋuna amasyata ŋakipi ŋun, anerae kepotu todwaryata.
66008012	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋiomwon tokutak arupepe keŋ. Aponi atutubet apei ŋina ka akoloŋ alotooma ŋunauni kinyasunae; kinyasunae atutubet apei ŋina ke elap daŋ alotooma ŋunauni, kinyasunae atutubet apei ŋina a ŋitopon daŋ alotooma ŋunauni. Aŋun, kiryoniar atutubet apei alotooma ŋatutubeta kec ŋunauni. Aponi kisiryonae atutubet apei alotooma ŋunauni ŋuna ka apaaran; ikwaŋinapei, aponi kisiryonae atutubet apei alotooma ŋunauni ŋuna ka akuwar.
66008013	Ani eŋoliyari ayoŋ, abu eira egole ŋolo apori alokidiama ecela a etoil a ŋolo apolon ebala, “Oitakoi! Oitakoi! Erokyarosi ŋakiro ŋuna eryamunete ŋituŋa ŋulu alokwap apaki ŋina eruunioto ŋarupepe ŋuna eapi ŋimalaikan ŋuluuni akutakin!”
66009001	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋikan tokutak arupepe keŋ. Oanyuwa etop ŋolo kebu kimasun anakuj kwap, ainakinitae etop ŋol ekipuŋguwo ŋolo ŋaaret auwuat ŋina aoyan ŋina nyesalunit alokwap.
66009002	Abu etop toŋaa auwuat ŋina aoyan ŋin, tolomu apuru ŋina ekoni ŋina ka arira a ŋina apolon nooi, kisiryon apuru akoloŋ ka kidiama cuc.
66009003	Tolomu emaase anapuru a ŋin bu kwap, aponi inakinae emaase agogoŋu ŋina ikoni ŋina eyakatar ŋikiitwania.
66009004	Aponi tolimokinae ikes nyewan ŋinya kori ŋikito kori ŋinibore erupunit alokwap daadaŋ; nai mati ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu emam emacar ŋolo ka Akuj aloreetin kec.
66009005	Pa acamakinitae emaase ŋol akiar ŋituŋa ŋul, nai akisican ikes ŋilapyo ŋikan. Apipilu ŋina ka akisicanet a ŋin, ikoni ŋina ikipesyo ekiitwan.
66009006	Alolapyo a ŋulukan a ŋul, iwarete ŋituŋa atwakare, nai nyeryamunete; iwarete epite ŋolo twanet, nai eŋopiyari atwanare aneni kec.
66009007	Ekwaan emaase ka ŋaŋolei ŋuna etenito aŋuna ke ejiye; ayakasi nakyes kec ŋiboorei ŋulu ikwaan ka ŋibokoi ŋulu itiyaunitae a egolid, ekwaan ŋireetin kec ka ŋulu a ŋituŋa.
66009008	Ekwaan ŋitim kec ka ŋulu a ŋaberu, ekwaan ŋikyal kec ka ŋulu a ŋiŋatunyo.
66009009	Arapap ŋatorobwo kec a ŋarapeta a ŋuna etiyaunitae a ŋasuwa, eruye ŋolo a ŋabebenuk kec ekwaan ka eruye ŋolo a ŋagaari a ŋuna irito ŋaŋolei a ŋuna emaryaara lojiye.
66009010	Eyakatar ikes ŋiladoi ŋulu pesyet ŋulu ikwaan ka ŋulu a ŋikiitwania, loladoi kec iŋes eyai agogoŋu ŋina wanet ŋituŋa ŋilapyo ŋikan.
66009011	Eyakatar ikes erwosit ŋolo ipukat ikes ŋolo erae emalaika ŋolo epolokinit auwuat ŋina aoyan ŋina nyesalunit alokwap. Enyaritae ekeekiro a Ŋaburaniyae Abadon; a Ŋagirik enyaritae Apolyon (akeepolou iŋes atemar “Ekenyasunan.”)
66009012	Alunyarosi ŋican ŋulu esyaunak, nai eponito nabo ŋiarei.
66009013	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋikanikapei tokutak arupepe keŋ. Abu eira etoil ebunit a Namuroet, alowaetin a ŋuluomwon, a ŋulu ikote ŋamomwar. Etiyaunitae Namuroet a egolid ka eyai kiŋaren Akuj.
66009014	Tolimok etoil ŋol emalaika ŋolo a ŋikanikapei ŋolo ayakar arupepe tema, “Tolacak ŋimalaikan ŋuluomwon ŋulu eenitae anaŋolol a ŋina apolon a ŋina enyaritae Eupurate.”
66009015	Aponi tolacakinae ŋimalaikan ŋuluomwon ŋulu etemokinitoe aŋuna a esaa a ŋol ka akoloŋit a ŋin, ka aŋuna a elap a ŋol ka aŋuna a ekaru a ŋol, akiar atutubet apei alotooma ŋunauni ŋuna a ŋituŋa.
66009016	Aponi okolimokin ayoŋ ekimar ŋolo a ŋituŋa a ŋulu etemokinitoe aŋuna ke ejiye: arae ikes ŋamilyonin ŋamiae ŋaarei.
66009017	Anakiruja kaŋ, abu oanyuwa ŋaŋolei ka ŋikametok kec alopite a lo: anapito ŋikametok ŋarapeta ŋuna areŋak ikwa akim, topusiyaka ikwa ebuulu ka tonyaŋaaka ikwa Sulpa. Ekote ŋakyes ŋuna a ŋaŋolei a ŋun ŋuna a ŋiŋatunyo, alomunit akim, apuru ka Sulpa anakituka kec.
66009018	Apotu ŋakisicaneta ŋunauni nu: akim, apuru ka Sulpa, ŋuna alomunito anakituka a ŋaŋolei, toara atutubet apei alotooma ŋunauni ŋuna a ŋituŋa.
66009019	Anerae eyai agogoŋu ŋina a ŋaŋolei nakituka kec ka loladoi. Ikote ŋiladoi kec ŋimuno a ŋuna eyakatar ŋakyes ŋuna ewanawanaata ŋituŋa.
66009020	Ŋituŋa ŋulu pa apotu ŋakisicaneta ŋun toara, apotu nyekiwa akilip neni a ŋipyan ka neni a ŋakujo a ŋuna etiyaunito ikes ŋilopeyek. Etiyaunitae ŋakujo ŋun a egolid, a esilipa, a eburonis, a ŋamoru ka a ŋakito; ŋakujo ŋuna nyepedorete aanyuwar, akiirar, kori alosit.
66009021	Apotu daŋ ŋituŋa nyekiwa akiar, akikukuja, amalao, kori akoko.
66010001	Abu nabo ayoŋ oanyuwa emalaika ŋolo agogoŋon ebunit anakuj. Anapit iŋes edou, kirimokinite alokakinet akou keŋ, kikoni ereet keŋ akoloŋ, kikote ŋakejen keŋ arira ŋina eremit kidiama.
66010002	Ayai nakan keŋ ekitaabo ŋolo adit ŋolo aŋaara. Abu kiwuak akeju keŋ ŋina aloteten nanam ka ŋina alokedyen kwap,
66010003	kiworou a etoil a ŋolo apolon ikwa ŋolo ke eŋatuny irurumae; ani kiworou, torukis ŋagirokineta ŋunakanikaarei.
66010004	Ani keruut ŋagirokineta ŋunakanikaarei ŋun adikino ayoŋ egirakini, nai abu eira etoil anakuj ebala, “Kipuca ŋakiro ŋuna alimut ŋagirokineta ŋunakanikaarei, nyigirak ikes!”
66010005	Abu emalaika ŋolo aris ayoŋ keŋolik ewuoi ananam ka akwap kikyaa akan keŋ ŋina aloteten nakuj.
66010006	Abu iŋes kikoŋ alokiro ka Akuj a ŋina eyari ŋikaru ka ŋikaru, a ŋina asubuni nakuj, akwap, anam ka ibore daadaŋ ŋini eyai tooma kec; tema, “Emam nabo apaki ace ŋina idaryo.”
66010007	Nai, ani ekutakini emalaika ŋolo a ŋikanikaarei arupepe keŋ, irikakini Akuj ŋakiro ŋuna ka akimunono ŋuna elosikinit iŋes akitiya, ikwaŋinapei alimokinitor ŋikadwarak ŋulu erae ŋiketiyak keŋ.
66010008	Abu nabo etoil ŋolo sek eirarit ayoŋ irworo anakuj okolimok ayoŋ tema, “Ape tolema ekitaabo ŋolo eŋaara ŋolo eyai nakan ŋina ke emalaika a ŋolo ewuoi ananam ka anakwap.”
66010009	Abu ayoŋ olot neni ke emalaika, eŋit iŋes ainakin ayoŋ ekitaabo ŋol. Abu iŋes okolimok ayoŋ tema, “Tolema tonyam; edwariar anakook kon, nai eboboor anakituk kon ikwa akimyet ŋina ka ao.”
66010010	Abu ayoŋ ejau ekitaabo ŋolo adit ŋol anakan keŋ onyam, toboboor iŋes anakituk kaŋ ikwa akimyet ŋina ka ao. Nai ani kadau ayoŋ akilikor, abu todwaryar anakook kaŋ.
66010011	Aponi nai okolimokin ayoŋ temarae, “Itemokino iyoŋ nabo todwar ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj ŋuna ikamunito ŋakwapin, ŋibukui, ŋaŋajepa ka ŋirwosi.”
66011001	Aponi nai okoinakin ayoŋ ebela ŋolo ekoni asuwat ŋina kipimet, ido okolimokin temarae, “Ape kipim Akai ŋina ka Akuj ka Namuroet, kimar ŋituŋa ŋulu ilipete alotooma Akai.
66011002	Nai, nyipim ŋibarasanin, anerae einakinitae ikes lotuŋa ŋulu nyerae Ŋiyudayan ŋulu ipudaarete etaun ŋolo ka Akuj ŋilapyo ŋatomoniomwon ka ŋiarei.
66011003	Eyakuuni ayoŋ ŋikadwarak kaŋ ŋuluarei enapito ŋiguniyae, elimonokinete ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj alorwa a ŋulu ka apeiliput a ŋamiae ŋaarei ka ŋatomonikanikapei.”
66011004	Erae ŋikadwarak ŋuluarei ŋul ŋikito ŋiarei ŋulu enyaritae Olipa ka ŋitaae ŋiarei ŋulu ewuasi alokiŋaren Ekapolon ŋolo ka akwap.
66011005	Ani kikatak idiotuŋanan akiwan ikes, elomuni akim anakituka kec, toar ŋimoi kec; ikwaŋinapei, ŋini daadaŋ ikatakini akiwan ikes, earyo.
66011006	Eyakatar ikes apedor ŋinagolyet adis, ikotere nyilim akiru apaki ŋina elimonokiniata ikes ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj. Eyakatar ikes tari apedor lolelyan ŋulu a ŋakipi akituluwor ikes ŋaokot; eyakatar ikes tari apedor ŋinakisicanet akwap a ŋakisicaneta a daadaŋ ŋapakio daadaŋ ŋuna ecamitotor ikes.
66011007	Ani kedaut ikes alimonokin ŋakiro kec, elomuni etyaŋ anakipany a ŋina aoyan a ŋina nyesalunit alokwap akitijiyore ikes. Ilouni iŋes ikes ka toar,
66011008	ido topero ŋawat kec alorukude a ŋolo ke etaun a ŋol, neni ebubukinitoe Ekapolon kec. Isikwaanitae ekiro ŋolo ke etaun a ŋol ka Sodoma kori Ijipit.
66011009	Epote ŋituŋa a ŋakwapin, a ŋikabilae, a ŋaŋajepa ka a ŋibukui a daadaŋ aanyun ŋawat kec ŋirwa ŋiuni ka atutubet ka nyecamakinete ikes tonukae.
66011010	Elakarosi ŋituŋa a ŋakwapin aŋuna ka atwanare a ŋuluarei a ŋul. Imomworete ikes ka kiyakiyanakinos ŋainakineta, anerae apotu ŋikadwarak ŋul yaut ŋican lotuŋa.
66011011	Ani kelunyarosi ŋirwa ŋiuni ka atutubet, bu ekiaŋanu ŋolo ka akiyar aneni ka Akuj, toloma neni kec, ido tonyout, tobul ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu apotu toanyuwasi ikes.
66011012	Apotu ŋikadwarak ŋuluarei ŋul kiirasi etoil ŋolo apolon anakuj ebala neni kec, “Potu nege!” Apotu toloto nakuj alotooma edou iteete ŋimoi kec.
66011013	Anapaki a ŋinapei a ŋin, toyakaun amaran ŋina ka akwap ŋina aronon; abu atutubet apei alotooma ŋunatomon ŋuna ke etaun a ŋolo apolon toritakin, totwaka ŋituŋa ŋalipyo ŋakanikaarei. Tobul ŋituŋa ŋuluce, kipuro apedor ŋina ka Akuj a ŋina anakuj.
66011014	Alunyar ŋican ŋulu a ŋiarei, nai eponito ŋican ŋulu a ŋiuni atipei!
66011015	Abu nai emalaika ŋolo a ŋikanikaarei tokutak arupepe keŋ. Toyakaunos ŋitoilon ŋulu acelasi anakuj ebasi, “Tokona, erae apedor ŋinakipukaet akwap ŋina ke Ekapolon yok ka ŋina a Kristo keŋ, ipukae iŋes ŋikaru ka ŋikaru!”
66011016	Apotu nai ŋikatukok ŋulutomoniarei ka ŋiomwon ŋulu iboiyete alokicoloŋo kec alokiŋaren Akuj toramakinos kwap, kijuuroto kilipa neni ka Akuj
66011017	ebasi, “Ekapolon Akuj ŋina etiron, ŋina erae ka ŋina arae! Ikitalakarit isua iyoŋ aŋuna isitiyaa apedor ŋina apolon ka isyak daŋ akipuka.
66011018	Apotu ŋituŋa ŋulu nyenupito Akuj tonyunyura, anerae adolu apaki ŋina ka anyunyura kon, apaki ŋina etubokinere ŋikatwak. Adolu apaki ŋina eropere ŋiketiyak, ŋikadwarak ka ŋituŋa kon daadaŋ ŋulu ikikerito iyoŋ, ŋulu arwok ka ŋulu caryo kaapei. Adolu apaki ŋinamunyaret ŋulu enyasak akwap!”
66011019	Aponi toŋaarae Akai ka Akuj anakuj, totakanu Asaduku ŋina ka Acamunet. Toyakaun akimilyaa, ŋitoilon, agiro ŋina ereta, amaran ŋina ka akwap ka ŋakako ŋuna apolok.
66012001	Totakanu aanyunet ŋina apolon ŋina ka aumokin anakuj. Ayai aberu ŋina arae ekeelou akoloŋ ka ayakar elap kwap ŋakejen keŋ ka ebokot ŋolo a ŋikacer a ŋitomon ka ŋiarei nakou keŋ.
66012002	Apoti iŋes ka adolit akidoun; apotu aryeba ka ŋican ŋulu ka akidoun kisiworout iŋes.
66012003	Totakanu aanyunet ace ŋina apolon ŋina ka aumokin anakuj. Ayai epiu ŋolo apolon nooi ŋolo areŋan ŋolo ayakar ŋakyes ŋakanikaarei ka ŋamomwar ŋatomon ta ŋatoriet ŋakanikaarei ŋuna aya nakyes keŋ.
66012004	Torarau elado keŋ atutubet apei alotooma ŋunauni ŋuna a ŋikacer, kimasa kwap. Towo epiu ŋol alokiŋaren aberu, ikotere enyamia ikoku apaki ŋina idounere.
66012005	Abu aberu kidou ikoku ŋini sapat, ŋini ipukae ŋakwapin daadaŋ ka aryenyeo. Nai aponi ikoku ŋin tokoporoe neni ka Akuj ka lokicoloŋ keŋ.
66012006	Abu aberu ŋin todoki naloŋisat neni etemokinit Akuj aŋuna keŋ, neni iyokiyere iŋes ŋirwa apeiliput ka ŋamiae ŋaarei ka ŋatomonikanikapei.
66012007	Kisyak nai ejiye anakuj. Kitijioto Mikael ka ŋimalaikan keŋ epiu, ido toboŋo epiu ka ŋimalaikan keŋ.
66012008	Nai aponi kilounae epiu ka ŋimalaikan keŋ, nyecamakin akiboi anakuj nabo.
66012009	Aponi kimasunae epiu ŋolo apolon ŋol anakuj, ŋolo erae emun ŋoloŋorot ŋolo enyaritae Ekipye kori Satan; ŋolo abu tomodik akwap daadaŋ. Aponi kimasunae iŋes kwap kaapei ka ŋimalaikan keŋ.
66012010	Abu eira etoil ŋolo apolon anakuj ebala, “Adolu tokona aiuno ŋina ka Akuj! Etoodiu tokona Akuj apedor keŋ ikwa Erwosit! Etoodiu tokona Kristo keŋ apolou! Anerae emasun anakuj ŋolo awuoi alokiŋaren Akuj yok, ŋolo sek esitakinit ŋikaitotoi yok apaaran ka akuwar.
66012011	Apotu ŋikaitotoi yok kilout iŋes a ŋaokot a ŋuna a Imesek ka aŋuna a ŋakiro a ŋuna eteyenunete ikes; anerae acamunito ikes akijal akiyar kec, totwaka.
66012012	Aŋun, tolakari iyoŋ nakuj ka ŋulu iya tooma keŋ! Nai ekaŋ iyes ŋulu iyakasi nakwap ka nanam! Anerae abu Satan kwap neni kus ka enyunyura nooi, aŋuna eyenia atemar eyakar iŋes apaki ŋina euruwuana nooi.”
66012013	Ani eanyuni epiu atemar ekemasun iŋes kwap, abu kisyak akiwuapit aberu ŋina edouni ikoku ŋini sapat.
66012014	Aponi inakinae aberu ŋin ŋabebenuk ŋaarei ŋuna ke egole a ŋolo apolon, ikotere topororia tolosio nakibois keŋ naloŋisat neni etemokinit Akuj aŋuna keŋ; neni iyokiyere iŋes ŋikaru ŋiuni ka atutubet nyewania epiu iŋes.
66012015	Abu nai epiu tobuk akalele ŋina a ŋakipi anakituk keŋ neni ka aberu, ikotere iwoki akalele iŋes.
66012016	Nai abu akwap kiŋarak aberu; abu toŋaa akituk keŋ, kiliko ŋakipi ŋuna aponito anakituk ke epiu.
66012017	Toŋoik epiu aberu, tolot akitijiyore ŋiletok ŋuluce ŋulu ka aberu, ŋiletok daadaŋ ŋulu iwuapito Ŋakiciketa ŋuna ka Akuj ka ŋulu erae ŋisuudae a Yesu.
66012018	Abu epiu towo alokipetot ka anam.
66013001	Abu oanyuwa etyaŋ elomuni ananam. Ayakar ŋamomwar ŋatomon ka ŋakyes ŋakanikaarei; a ŋinamomwara ayakar atoriet ka ŋinakou ayakar ekiro ŋolo eyanyit Akuj.
66013002	Ekwaan etyaŋ ŋol ka eris, ayakar ŋakejen ŋuna ekwaan ka ŋuna ka etyaŋ a ece a ŋolo adedeŋan, ekwaan akituk keŋ ka ŋina ke eŋatuny. Abu epiu inak etyaŋ ŋol apedor, ekicoloŋ ka apolou keŋ ŋina alalan.
66013003	Atakani akou ŋina ke etyaŋ apei ewanan nooi, nai keris keiyo. Abu akwap daadaŋ toumok, kiwuap etyaŋ ŋol.
66013004	Kilipa ŋituŋa daadaŋ neni ke epiu, anerae abu inak apolou keŋ neni ke etyaŋ. Kilipa ikes tari neni ke etyaŋ ebasi, “Ŋae ikoni etyaŋ? Ŋae epedori akitijiore iŋes?”
66013005	Aponi tocamakinae etyaŋ ŋol akirwor ŋakiro ŋuna ka akituro ka ŋuna ka akiyany Akuj ka aponi tocamakinae iŋes ayakau napolou ŋilapyo ŋatomoniomwon ka ŋiarei.
66013006	Kisyak etyaŋ ŋol akiyany Akuj, akiyany ekiro ŋolo ka Akuj ka neni iboiyo Akuj ta ŋulu eyakasi nakuj.
66013007	Aponi tocamakinae etyaŋ akitijiyore ka akiloun ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj. Aponi inakinae iŋes apolou ŋinakipukaet ŋikabilae, ŋakwapin, ŋaŋajepa ka ŋibukui.
66013008	Epote ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu anakwap akilip neni keŋ; ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu pa kigiritae ŋikecerorwa lokitaabo ŋolo ka akiyar, ŋinapei anasubunet akwap, erae ekitaabo ŋol ŋolo a Imesek a ŋini aponi toarae.
66013009	“Iŋes ŋini eya ŋaki, kiira nu:
66013010	Ituŋanan ŋini itemokino kikamarae, itemokino kire kikamarae; ituŋanan ŋini itemokino toarae ka atum, itemokino kire toarae ka atum. Aŋun, itemokino ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj totitinyikis ananupit kec.”
66013011	Abu oanyuwa etyaŋ ece elomuni alotooma akwap. Ayakar iŋes ŋamomwar ŋaarei ŋuna ekwaan ka ŋuna a imesek ka erworo ikwa epiu.
66013012	Esitiyae iŋes apolou daadaŋ ŋina ke etyaŋ a ŋolo ke ekiŋaren, a ŋolo ariŋa eyai nen. Abu kitiŋak ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu iboiyete anakwap akilip neni ke etyaŋ a ŋolo esyaunan a ŋolo keris ajeme keiyo.
66013013	Abu etyaŋ lo ŋolo a ŋiarei kitiya ŋakujuwuanisya ŋuna ka aumokin; kitodou tari akim anakuj kwap iteete ŋituŋa daadaŋ.
66013014	Abu tomodik ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu iboiyete anakwap a ŋakujuwuanisya a ŋuna acamakinitae iŋes akitiya alokiŋaren etyaŋ ŋolo ke ekiŋaren. Tolimok etyaŋ ikes adukokin etorube ŋolo ke etyaŋ a ŋolo awanitae ka atum, nai ayari.
66013015	Aponi tocamakinae etyaŋ ŋolo a ŋiarei akieŋakin akiyar tooma lotorube ŋolo ke etyaŋ a ŋolo ke ekiŋaren, ikotere kisirworik etorube ka kitaar daadaŋ ŋulu awounete akilip neni keŋ.
66013016	Abu etyaŋ ŋol toreik ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu caryo ka ŋulu arwok, ŋikabarak ka ŋikulyak, ŋipi ka ŋulu nyerae ŋipi, akiwuakin emacar nakan kec ŋuna aloteten kori loreetin kec.
66013017	Emam ituŋanan ŋini apedori akigyel kori agyelanar emam emacar ŋol, mati eyakar emacar ŋol ŋolo erae ekiro ŋolo ke etyaŋ kori enamba ŋolo erae ŋolo ke ekiro a ŋol.
66013018	Itemokino toyakatar aosou. Ituŋanan ŋini eos, epedori aripun enamba ŋolo ke etyaŋ, anerae erae enamba ŋol ŋolo ke ekiro a ituŋanan. Enamba keŋ erae ŋamiae ŋakanikapei ka ŋatomonikanikapei ka ŋikanikapei (666).
66014001	Abu eŋolik oanyuwa Imesek ewuoi alomoru a ŋolo enyaritae Sion; arukito ka ŋituŋa ŋalipyo amiat ka ŋatomoniomwon ka ŋiomwon, ŋulu egiritae ekiro a Imesek ka ŋolo a Papa keŋ loreetin kec.
66014002	Abu eira etoil anakuj ŋolo arwo ikwa ŋakipi ŋuna eremuno anakope, ekwaan eruye ka ŋolo ka agirokinet a ŋina ireta. Arwo ikwa ŋaduŋgui eeotor ŋikaeok.
66014003	Aeosi ŋituŋa ŋul eete ŋolokitete alokiŋaren ekicoloŋ ka alokiŋaren ŋityaŋ ŋuluomwon ŋulu ayarete ka alokiŋaren ŋikatukok. Amam idiotuŋanan ŋini apedori ayenun eete ŋol, mati ŋulu arae ŋalipyo amiat ka ŋatomoniomwon ka ŋiomwon, ŋulu keris keiun anakwap.
66014004	Erae ikes ŋikilyok ŋulu nyiryamakina ka ŋaberu, anerae etaleoro ikes. Iwuapito ikes Imesek neni elosi daadaŋ. Aponi toiunae ikes alokidiŋ ŋituŋa ŋuluce ka erae ikes ainakinet ŋina ke ekiŋaren ŋina ainakinio neni ka Akuj ka neni a Imesek.
66014005	Emam nyiirara adiolyokonu aneni kec, emam adioronis aneni kec.
66014006	Abu nai oanyuwa emalaika ece epori alokidiama aneni alwanan, eyakar Ŋakiro ŋuna Ajokak, ŋuna nyesalunete ŋuna limokina neni a ŋituŋa a ŋulu eya nakwap, neni a ŋibukui a daadaŋ, a ŋikabilae, a ŋaŋajepa ka a ŋakwapin.
66014007	Abu iŋes kirwor a etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Tokerito Akuj ka kitopoloorito iŋes! Anerae adolu apaki ŋina etubokinia iŋes ŋituŋa. Kilipa neni a ŋolo asubuni nakuj, akwap, anam ka ŋilelyan!”
66014008	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋiarei kiwuapak ŋolo ke ekiŋaren tema, “Aukor iŋes! Aukor Babilon ŋolo apolon nooi! Ŋolo abu kitamat ŋakwapin daadaŋ epiini keŋ ŋolo ka amalao!”
66014009	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋiuni kiwuapak ŋuluarei ŋulu ke ekiŋaren irworo a etoil a ŋolo apolon ebala, “Ituŋanan daadaŋ ŋini ilipi neni ke etyaŋ ka neni ke etorube keŋ, ido toryamu emacar aloreet kori anakan keŋ,
66014010	ebuni iŋes elope akimat epiini ŋolo ka Akuj; epiini ŋolo ka anyunyura a ŋina ka Akuj, ŋolo abukoki iŋes pa ecaritae lokopo ŋolo ka aŋoit keŋ! Iŋes daadaŋ ŋini itiyae ŋun, isicanio ka akim ka Sulpa alokiŋaren ŋimalaikan ŋulu ka Akuj ka Imesek.
66014011	Erubakini apuru ŋina ka akim a ŋina isicani ikes elosi kidiama ŋikaru ka ŋikaru. Emam apaaran kori akuwar ŋina ieŋuniata alocan kec. Ŋituŋa ŋulu ilipete neni ke etyaŋ a ŋol ka neni ke etorube keŋ, ikes ŋulu eyai emacar keŋ loreetin kec.”
66014012	Itemokino totitinyikis ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj, ŋulu iwuapito Ŋakiciketa keŋ, ŋulu enupito Yesu.
66014013	Abu eira etoil anakuj ebala, “Kigir nu: erereŋ ŋituŋa ŋulu etwakete anakijaanakin Ekapolon ameun tokona!” Toboŋok Etau tema, “Ee, kire jik! Ieŋunete ikes alocan kec, anerae erukorete ikes ka ŋiticisyo kec.”
66014014	Abu eŋoliya oanyuwa edou ŋolo akwaŋan, alokidiama edou ŋol, eboi ŋini ekoni ituŋanan, tonapite ebokot ŋolo etiyaunitae a egolid, toyakar ekileŋ ŋolo ŋeret ŋolo emilia nakan keŋ.
66014015	Abu emalaika ece tolomu alo Kai ka Akuj, kiworou a etoil a ŋolo apolon neni a ŋini eboi alodou tema, “Kisitiya ekileŋ kon ŋolo ŋeret alemia, anerae adolu apaki ŋina lemet. Akono akwap, etemokin akilem!”
66014016	Abu nai ŋini eboi alodou tolem a ekileŋ keŋ akwap, kirikakin akilem ŋina ka akwap.
66014017	Tolomu nabo emalaika ece alo Kai ka Akuj anakuj, ayakar iŋes daŋ ekileŋ ŋolo ŋeret ŋolo emilia.
66014018	Abu nabo emalaika ece ŋolo epolokinit akim tolomu a Namuroet, kiworou a etoil a ŋolo apolon neni a ŋolo ayakar ekileŋ ŋolo emilia tema, “Kisitiya ekileŋ kon, tolem ŋaraito ŋuna ke epiini alomanikor a ŋolo ka akwap, anerae akoko ŋaraito.”
66014019	Abu nai emalaika ŋol tolem a ekileŋ keŋ akwap, tolem ŋaraito alopiini, kimasak nacuet epiini – acuet ŋina ka anyunyura a ŋina ka Akuj.
66014020	Aponi tocuunae ŋaraito ŋun anacuet alokiŋa etaun ŋolo apolon, toleleut ŋaokot anacuet, toleleiyasi ŋakilomitae ŋamiae ŋauni ka arae acukul kec alokwap ŋamitae ŋaarei.
66015001	Abu nai oanyuwa alokidiama atakanunet ace ŋina ka aumokin ŋina apolon nooi. Ayakasi ŋimalaikan ŋikanikaarei ŋulu ayakatar ŋakisicaneta ŋakanikaarei ŋuna esidyok, anerae ikes eŋetakinere anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj.
66015002	Abu oanyuwa ibore ŋini ekoni anam ŋina a ŋakalilii imorikina ka akim. Abu daŋ oanyuwa ŋulu kepotu kilout etyaŋ ka etorube keŋ ta enamba ŋolo ke ekiro keŋ. Awuasi ikes ke epeiwae anam ŋina a ŋakalilii, toyakatar ŋaduŋgui ŋuna keinakini Akuj ikes.
66015003	Aeosi ikes eete ŋolo a Moses a ŋolo arae eketiyan ka Akuj ka eete ŋolo a Imesek ebasi, “Okoe Ekapolon! Akuj ŋina etiron! Epolok nooi ka eumokina ŋiticisyo kon! Okoe Erwosit ŋolo a ŋakwapin! Iyookino ka erae kire ŋipitesyo kon!
66015004	Ekapolon! Ŋae ituŋanan ŋini nyikikeri iyoŋ? Ŋae ewouni alimor apolou kon? Iyoŋ bon irae ŋolo Asegan. Epote ŋakwapin daadaŋ akilip neni kon, anerae aanyut daadaŋ ŋiticisyo kon ŋulu iyookino.”
66015005	Kedaunosi ŋun, abu oanyuwa Akai ka Akuj anakuj eŋaara, arae iŋes eema ŋolo ayai Akuj.
66015006	Apotu ŋimalaikan ŋulukanikaarei ŋulu ayakatar ŋakisicaneta ŋunakanikaarei tolomut alo Kai ka Akuj enapito ŋilowi ŋulu asegak ŋulu amilimilak, tonapito ŋarokobae ŋuna ke egolid anatorobwo kec.
66015007	Abu epei alotooma ŋisubuna ŋuluomwon ŋulu eyarete inak ŋimalaikan ŋulukanikaarei ŋabakulei ŋakanikaarei ŋuna etiyaunitae a egolid ŋuna eleleba anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj a ŋina eyari ŋikaru ka ŋikaru.
66015008	Kilelebun Kai ka Akuj apuru ŋina abunit anakica ka anapedor a ŋina ka Akuj. Amam ituŋanan ŋini apedori alomar Kai ka Akuj akitodol ŋina asaluniata ŋakisicaneta ŋunakanikaarei ŋuna ayaunete ŋimalaikan ŋulukanikaarei.
66016001	Abu nai eira etoil ŋolo apolon alo Kai ka Akuj irworo neni a ŋimalaikan a ŋulukanikaarei ebala, “Toloto, tobukosi nakwap anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj anabakulei a ŋunakanikaarei!”
66016002	Abu emalaika ŋolo ke ekiŋaren tolot, tobukok anyunyura ŋina anabakule keŋ nakwap. Apotu ŋajemei ŋuna aronok nooi ŋuna apipilak pena lotuŋa ŋulu ayakatar emacar ŋolo ke etyaŋ ka neni a ŋulu elipete neni ke etorube keŋ.
66016003	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋiarei tobukok anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj anabakule keŋ nanam. Apotu ŋakipi kikokis ŋaokot a ituŋanan a ŋini atwan ka totwaka ŋisubuna daadaŋ ŋulu ayakasi nanam.
66016004	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋiuni tobukok anyunyura anabakule keŋ naŋololin ka lolelyan. Apotu ŋakipi toruworos ŋaokot.
66016005	Eira emalaika ŋolo apolokinit ŋakipi ebala neni ka Akuj, “Itubok iyoŋ iyookino, iyoŋ ŋina Asegan, ŋina irae ka ŋina arae!
66016006	Apotu ikes tobukonosi ŋaokot ŋuna a ŋituŋa ka Akuj ka ŋuna a ŋikadwarak, aŋun, itamat iyoŋ ikes ŋaokot. Aryamut ikes ŋuna itemokino ikes toryamut.”
66016007	Abu eira etoil a Namuroet ebala, “Ekapolon Akuj ŋina etiron! Iyookino kire ŋuna itubi iyoŋ!”
66016008	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋiomwon tobukok anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj anabakule keŋ nakoloŋ ka aponi tocamakinae akinom ŋituŋa ka amwanis keŋ a ŋina arirae.
66016009	Aponi kicunyae ikes ka amwanis a ŋina arirae. Kiceno ikes ekiro ŋolo ka Akuj, a ŋina arae iŋes eyakuunit ŋakisicaneta ŋun daadaŋ. Nai apotu nyekiwa akitiya ŋasecisya ka apotu nyipuro ka nyitopoloosi Akuj.
66016010	Tobukok emalaika ŋolo a ŋikan anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj anabakule keŋ lokicoloŋ ŋolo ke etyaŋ. Kiryoniar ebuku ŋolo ke etyaŋ cuc; tokonyokonyata ŋituŋa ŋaŋajepa kec aŋuna aryebatar.
66016011	Kiceno ikes ekiro ŋolo ka Akuj a ŋina eyai nakuj aŋuna ka aryeba ka ŋajemei kec. Nai apotu nyekiwa ŋipitesyo kec ŋulu aronok.
66016012	Abu emalaika ŋolo a ŋikanikapei tobukok anyunyura ŋina ka Akuj anabakule keŋ naŋolol ŋina enyaritae Eupurate. Abu aŋolol kijuwa toono deu aŋuna ka akitemokin neni itorete ŋirwosi ŋulu epote alo Kide.
66016013	Abu oanyuwa ŋipyan ŋiuni ŋulu ekote ŋakidodoka. Aponito ikes alotooma akituk na ke epiu ka ŋina ke etyaŋ ta ŋina ke ekadwaran a ŋolo alyokonon.
66016014	Erae ikes ŋipyan ŋulu itiyaete ŋakujuwuanisya. Eloseneneete ikes neni a ŋirwosi a ŋakwapin a daadaŋ acunun ikes lojiye Akoloŋit ŋina apolon ŋina ka Akuj a ŋina etiron.
66016015	“Ebala Ekapolon, topupokisi! Abuni ayoŋ ikwa ebunio ekokolan! Erereŋ ituŋanan ŋini etenit apaki daadaŋ, ŋini eyakar ŋilowi keŋ diyete, ikotere nyelot iŋes lotuŋa emam ŋilowi kiruma ŋileec!”
66016016	Apotu ŋitai ŋul tocunakis ŋirwosi neni enyaritae a Ŋaburaniyae Arimagedon.
66016017	Tobukok emalaika ŋolo a ŋikanikaarei anyunyura ŋina anabakule keŋ lokuwuam. Bu etoil alokicoloŋ alotooma Kai ka Akuj ebala, “Erikakin!”
66016018	Toyakaun akimilyaa, ŋitoilon, agiro ŋina ereta ka amaran ŋina ka akwap ŋina apolon. Nyetakanuna amaran ŋina ikoni ŋin ŋinapeisubunet ituŋanan, arae ŋin amaran ka akwap ŋina aronon nooi akilo daadaŋ.
66016019	Totyaka akwap, totyaka etaun ŋolo apolon ŋatyaket ŋauni, kinyasun ŋitaunio ŋulu apolok ŋulu a ŋakwapin a daadaŋ. Abu Akuj totamu Babilon ŋolo apolon nooi ka kitamat iŋes epiini ŋolo ke ekopo keŋ, epiini ŋolo ka anyunyura keŋ.
66016020	Toŋopiyasi ŋiculae daadaŋ, toŋopiyasi ŋimoru daadaŋ;
66016021	todout ŋakako ŋuna apolok nooi, ŋuna arae apotis a ŋinakakot ŋakiloi ŋuna edolito ŋatomonikan, todoto ikes kidiama lotuŋa eriŋa ikes icenete Akuj aŋuna ka akisicanet a ŋina a ŋakako, anerae arae ŋin akisicanet ŋina aronon nooi.
66017001	Abu epei a ŋimalaikan a ŋulukanikaarei a ŋulu ayakatar ŋabakulei ŋakanikaarei, bu neni kaŋ tema, “Bua, eketoodikini ayoŋ iyoŋ epite ŋolo isicanere amalaat ŋina yenen, etaun ŋolo apolon ŋol, ŋolo edukitoe diyete ŋaŋololin ŋuna alalak.
66017002	Apotu ŋirwosi ŋulu anakwap tomalaana ka iŋes, tomerakinos ŋituŋa ka akwap aŋuna amasyata epiini ŋolo ka amalao keŋ.”
66017003	Abu Etau min neni kaŋ, okoya emalaika naloŋisat. Oanyuwa ayoŋ aina aberu ŋina eboi alokidiama etyaŋ ŋolo areŋan ŋolo egiritae lowaetin keŋ daadaŋ ŋirorwa ŋulu iyanyitere Akuj. Ayakar etyaŋ ŋakyes ŋakanikaarei ka ŋamomwar ŋatomon.
66017004	Anapit aberu ŋilowi ŋulu kipura-areŋak ka ŋulu areŋak, kisibusite akuwan keŋ a ŋinapen a ŋulu etiyaunitae a egolid, a ŋamoru a ŋuna epol egyelit ka ŋakamilimili. Ayai nakan keŋ ekopo ŋolo etiyaunitae a egolid, kileleba aronis ka asiilyo ŋina ka amalao keŋ.
66017005	Egiritae ikona loreet keŋ ekiro ŋolo imunono apolou keŋ, “Babilon ŋolo apolon nooi, toto a ŋamalaae ka ŋakiro ŋuna aronok anakwap daadaŋ.”
66017006	Abu oanyuwa aberu ŋin emerete ŋaokot ŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj ka ŋuna a ŋulu kearyo aŋuna kenupitotor Yesu. Ani eŋolikini ayoŋ iŋes, abu okobul nooi.
66017007	Nai ekeŋit ayoŋ emalaika tema, “Kaanukiro ikibulitor iyoŋ? Akalimokini ayoŋ iyoŋ apolou ŋina a ŋakiro a ŋuna imunono a ŋuna ka aberu a ŋin ka ŋuna ke etyaŋ a ŋolo iboiyo iŋes, a ŋolo eyakar ŋakyes ŋakanikaarei ka ŋamomwar ŋatomon.
66017008	Ayari koloŋ etyaŋ ŋol, nai tokona nyeriŋa eyari; eapi iŋes alomun anakipany a ŋina aoyan a ŋina nyesalunit alokwap, tolot nai toarae. Eumokinete ŋituŋa ŋulu koloŋ pa keponi kigirae ŋirorwa kec lokitaabo ŋolo ka akiyar ameun anasubunet akwap, apaki ŋina iŋolikiniata etyaŋ. Anerae ayari koloŋ, tokona nyeriŋa eyari, nai etakanuni nabo.
66017009	“Itemokino toyakatar aosou ka ayenut. Erae ŋakyes ŋunakanikaarei ŋikamukumukui ŋikanikaarei, ŋulu iboiyo aberu. Erae daŋ ikes ŋirwosi ŋikanikaarei;
66017010	adaut ŋikan alokidiŋ kec atwakare, eriŋa epei ipukat ka eriŋa epei nyebuno; nai ŋina ebunio iŋes, itemokino kipuka apaki ŋina euruwuana.
66017011	Etyaŋ ŋolo koloŋ ayari, nai tokona nyeriŋa eyari, erae iŋes erwosit ŋolo a ŋikanikauni, ŋolo erae epei a ŋulukanikaarei, ŋolo elosi aaro.
66017012	“Ŋamomwar ŋunatomon ŋuna ianyuwarit iyoŋ, erae ŋirwosi ŋitomon ŋulu eriŋa nyeryamuna apukan, nai eryamunete ikes apedor ŋinakipukaet kaapei ka etyaŋ esaa epei bon.
66017013	Eruworosi ŋulutomon ŋul daadaŋ ŋipei, einakinete daŋ apedor ka apolou kec neni ke etyaŋ.
66017014	Itijiyete ikes Imesek, nai ilouni ikes Imesek kaapei ka ŋulu enyaritae, ŋulu eseunitae ka ŋikewuapak ŋulu erubakinito enupito iŋes, anerae erae iŋes Ekapolon a ŋikapolok ka Erwosit a ŋirwosi.”
66017015	Abu emalaika okolimok ayoŋ tema, “Ŋakipi ŋuna ibu iyoŋ toanyuwa iboiyo amalaat, erae ŋituŋa, ŋasepico, ŋakwapin, ka ŋaŋajepa.
66017016	Ŋamomwar ŋatomon ŋuna ibu iyoŋ toanyuwa, eremokinosi ikes kaapei ka etyaŋ eŋerete amalaat; elemarete ikes ibore daadaŋ ŋini eyakar iŋes, kimyekis eleri, irikarete ikes iŋes ka kicunyasi.
66017017	Anerae adau Akuj akiwuakin lotai kec akitiya acamit keŋ, ŋina erae akimorikina kaapei, inakis etyaŋ apedor kec akipukaa akitodol ŋina iyookinotor ŋakiro ŋuna ka Akuj.
66017018	“Aberu ŋina ibu iyoŋ toanyuwa erae etaun ŋolo apolon, ŋolo ipukat ŋirwosi ŋulu ka akwap.”
66018001	Kelunyarosi ŋun, abu oanyuwa emalaika ece ebuni anakuj. Ayakar iŋes apolou nooi, kinuak akica keŋ akwap daadaŋ.
66018002	Abu kiworou a etoil a ŋolo apolon tema, “Aukor iŋes! Aukor Babilon ŋolo apolon nooi! Aruwor ere ŋolo a ŋipyan ka ŋauyenito; iboiyete tokona ŋikyeny ŋulu asiilyanak ka ŋulu aronok aneni keŋ.
66018003	Anerae adaut ŋakwapin daadaŋ akimat epiini keŋ – epiini ŋolo ke ekibure ŋolo ka amalao keŋ. Apotu ŋirwosi ŋulu ka akwap tomalaana ka iŋes, tobara daŋ ŋimucurus ŋulu ka akwap aloterekune keŋ a ŋolo a ŋiboro.”
66018004	Abu nabo eira etoil ece anakuj ebala, “ A ŋituŋa kaŋ, tolomutu aneni keŋ! Ikotere nyiseca ikwa ŋituŋa keŋ, ido toryamut ŋakisicaneta keŋ!
66018005	Anerae alalata ŋasecisya keŋ, edyatakin adol tari nakuj, etamunit daŋ Akuj ŋiticisyo keŋ ŋulu aronok.
66018006	Kitiyata neni keŋ lopite ŋolopei abunio iŋes kitiyaa neni kus. Totaca iŋes ŋatacet ŋaarei aŋuna ke etic a daadaŋ a ŋolo etiya iŋes. Kitemokisi epiini ŋolo adwaran lokopo keŋ ŋarwa ŋaarei ikwa epiini ŋolo abu iŋes kitemok aŋuna kus.
66018007	Inakisi iŋes ŋican ka akiyaloloŋ iriyan ka akituro ta eleilei ŋolo ayakar iŋes. Anerae erubakinit iŋes ebala, ‘Eboi ayoŋ a ne, arae arwosit! Meere ayoŋ apuserut, nyikiryamakin jik ayoŋ ka akiyaloloŋ!’
66018008	Aŋun, ikamunete iŋes ŋakisicaneta nu alotooma apeikoloŋit bon – edeke, akiyaloloŋ ka eron. Icunyaryo iŋes ka akim, anerae erae Ekapolon Akuj ŋina etubokini iŋes ŋina etiron.”
66018009	Ikalounete ka iyaloloŋete ŋirwosi ŋulu ka akwap, ŋulu kitiyaete ka iŋes amalao ka ekibure ŋolo aronon, aŋuna ke etaun a ŋolo apolon, apaki ŋina eanyuwaryata apuru ŋina ka arira a ŋina enyamuwari iŋes.
66018010	Ewuoete ikes aneni alwanan aŋuna ekeritotor aryamun ŋican kaapei ka iŋes, temasi, “Oitakoi! Oitakoi! Iyoŋ Babilon, etaun ŋolo apolon nooi! Alotooma epeisaa bon adolu atubokino kon!”
66018011	Ikalounete ka iyaloloŋete ŋimucurus ŋulu ka akwap aŋuna keŋ, anerae adaun ŋini egyeli ŋiboro kec.
66018012	Emam ŋini egyeli egolid kec, esilipa, ŋamoru ŋuna ajokak ka ŋakamilimili, ŋilowi kec ŋulu amilimilak, ŋulu kipura-areŋak, ŋuludelet ka ŋulu areŋak; ŋabaoi ŋuna egelegelya, ŋuna akukunyok, ŋiboro ŋulu egelegelya, ŋulu itiyaunitae a ŋikyal a ŋitome, ŋiboro ŋulu itiyaunitae a ŋabaoi a ŋuna epol egyelit, ŋulu itiyaunitae a eburonis, ŋasuwa ka ŋamoru ŋuna iceo ŋiboro;
66018013	Sinamo – ekitoe ŋolo itukukunyi akimuj, eminae ŋolo ke ekinyate ka akimyet ŋina akukunyon ŋina eminae ka eceminae ŋolo akukunyon nooi ŋolo icunyo; epiini ka akimyet, ŋakirya ka ŋaganoi, ŋaatuk ka ŋamesekin, ŋaŋolei ka ŋagaari; ŋipi ka ŋituŋa daŋ.
66018014	Elimokinete ŋimucurus iŋes temasi, “Aŋopiyasi ŋiboro daadaŋ ŋulu sek iitanit iyoŋ akituruwor ŋulu kon, adaun ebari ka arwon kon daadaŋ, nyiryamuni nabo iyoŋ ikes jik!”
66018015	Ewuoete aneni alwanan ŋimucurus ŋulu apotu tobara aŋuna ecurutaata alotaun a ŋolo apolon a ŋol, anerae ekerito ikes aryamun ŋican kaapei ka iŋes. Epote ikes akigworo ka akiyaloloŋ,
66018016	temasi, “Oitakoi! Kerokyata ŋakiro ŋuna atakanut lotaun ŋolo apolon nooi lo! Anapenene sek iŋes ŋilowi ŋulu amilimilak, ŋulu kipura-areŋak ka ŋulu areŋak, kisibusite akuwan keŋ a ninapen a ŋulu etiyaunitae a egolid, a ŋamoru a ŋuna epol egyelit ka ŋakamilimili!”
66018017	Atwania iŋes ebari ŋol daadaŋ alotooma esaa epei! Apotu ŋikapolokinitok ŋameeli ka ŋikalotok ŋulu aya nameeli, ŋikametok ŋameeli ka ŋituŋa ŋuluce daadaŋ ŋulu eyarikinito nanam towua aneni alwanan,
66018018	kikalout eanyuwarete apuru ŋina ka arira a ŋina anomiyari iŋes temasi, “Emam etaun ece ŋolo ekoni etaun ŋolo apolon nooi lo ŋinapei koloŋ!”
66018019	Tobukonokis ŋalup ŋakyes kec, kigworo ka kiyaloloŋo temasi, “Oitakoi! Kerokyata ŋakiro ŋuna atakanut lotaun ŋolo apolon nooi lo! Arae iŋes etaun ŋolo abarakinete ŋimucurus ŋulu ayakatar ŋameeli! Atwania iŋes ebari ŋol daadaŋ alotooma esaa epei.”
66018020	Nakuj, tolakari! Ŋituŋa ŋulu ka Akuj ka ŋikiyakia ta ŋikadwarak, tolakaros! Anerae adau Akuj atubokin iŋes aŋuna abu iŋes kitiya neni kus!
66018021	Abu emalaika tolemu amoru ŋina atya ŋinakiryeet, kimasa nanam ebala, “Ikokinio inyasunio Babilon etaun ŋolo apolon nooi nege, nyeanyuwar nabo.
66018022	“Nyiiraryo nabo aneni kon eruye ŋolo a ŋaduŋgui ka ŋitoilon a ŋituŋa, ŋolo a ŋikakutak ŋapilui ka ŋarupepe! Nyeryamun nabo ŋiketiyak kon ŋulu aosok jik. Nyiirar nabo eruye ŋolo ka amoru a ŋinakiryeet.
66018023	Nyeanyuwar nabo akica ŋina ke etaa aneni kon, nyiirar nabo ŋitoilon ŋulu a ŋaterak ka ŋulu a ŋikeitak aneni kon. Arwoko ŋimucurus kon anakwap a daadaŋ, nai ibu iyoŋ tomodik ŋituŋa ŋulu ka akwap a daadaŋ a ekamuka a ŋolo ke ekitoe kon.”
66018024	Aponi Babilon kisicanae, anerae aponi toryamunae ŋaokot ŋuna a ŋikadwarak ka ŋuna a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj aneni keŋ; ŋaokot a ŋituŋa daadaŋ a ŋulu aaryo anakwap.
66019001	Kedaunosi ŋun, abu eira ebunit anakuj etoil ŋolo apol, ŋolo asibit ŋolo a ŋituŋa a ŋulu alalak ebala, “Alleluia! Aiuno, apolou ka apedor erae ŋulu ka Akuj yok!
66019002	Erae kire ka iyookino ŋatubokineta ŋuna ka Akuj! Atuboki iŋes amalaat ŋina enyasunit akwap aŋuna ka amalao keŋ. Enyaŋarya Akuj iŋes, anerae abu iŋes toar ŋiketiyak ŋulu ka Akuj.”
66019003	Tocelut nabo temasi, “Alleluia! Elosi apuru ŋina ka arira a ŋina enyamuwari etaun ŋolo apolon nooi ŋol kidiama ŋikaru ka ŋikaru!”
66019004	Apotu ŋikatukok ŋulutomoniarei ka ŋiomwon ta ŋisubuna ŋuluomwon ŋulu eyarete, toramakinos kwap, kilipa neni ka Akuj, a ŋina eboi alokicoloŋ temasi, “Amen! Alleluia!”
66019005	Bu etoil alokicoloŋ ebala, “Kipuro Akuj yok, iyes ŋiketiyak keŋ daadaŋ ka ŋituŋa daadaŋ ŋulu ikerito iŋes, ŋulu arwok ka ŋulu caryo!”
66019006	Abu eira etoil ŋolo asibit ŋolo a ŋituŋa a ŋulu alalak, ŋolo asibit ŋolo a ŋakipi a ŋuna eremuno anakope, ŋolo asibit ŋolo ka agirokinet a ŋina ireta. Eira ikes ebasi, “Alleluia! Anerae erae Ekapolon Akuj yok ŋina etiron, Erwosit!
66019007	Olelyana ka olakaros, epuro apolou keŋ! Anerae adol apaki ŋina a ŋasuban a ŋuna ke ekiitanu a Imesek, itemokino daŋ ateran keŋ aŋuna keŋ.
66019008	Ainakin iŋes ŋilowi ŋulu ajokak ŋulu amilimilak ŋuludelet.” (Ŋilowi ŋulu ajokak ŋul, ikes erae ŋiticisyo ŋulu ka akiyookino a ŋituŋa a ŋulu ka Akuj.)
66019009	Okolimok nai emalaika tema, “Kigir nu: erereŋ ŋulu enyaritae nasuban ŋuna ke ekiitanu a Imesek.” Tema nabo emalaika, “Erae ŋakiro ŋun ŋuna a kire ŋuna ka Akuj.”
